1a1(1): dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud/
1b1(1): rgya gar skad du/ shrI ya ma hA rA ga kr-iSh+Na ma ra d+ha ra tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud/ 'jam dpal gsin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal
1b2(1): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang brdal khyab chen po na/ gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i
1b3(1): gzhal yas ni/ rgya yongs su ma chad pa/ rtsa ba nas ra ga rak+Sha chags pa'i rba glong 'khrug cing 'khyil ba/ rak+ta 'khrug pa skabs brer la/ rak+ta brag gi mi reng bsam gyis mi khyab pa
1b4(1): 'jigs pa'i gar byed pa/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas bse'i sdig pa dmar po kha dgu mig dgu pas sems can gyi srog klom pa/ gser gyi rus sbal la mtshon cha'i spu yod pa/ nyi zla
2a1(1): 'bar ba'i mig yod pa/ lto ba nas srid pa gsum gyi bla tshe 'khyams pa/ rak+ta chags pa'i rlabs ni 'khrug cing 'khyil ba'i dbus na/ zod pa brtsegs pa las grub
2a2(1): pa'i mkhar/ bse'i mdung 'khrol ba/ mi ro mang pa'i rgya mtshan 'phyar rked pa nas rlung nag gi 'khor lo ni/ rdo rje rgya gram ljang nag gi phyogs bcur 'thor ba/ srid pa'i rlung nag
2a3(1): las grub pa'i sprul pa/ rlung nag rol ba'i bu gnod sbyin 'bum dar nag gi g.yab 'dor ba/ steng na gnam lcags 'phar ba'i thog gi tsha tshar 'phro ba/ gnam lcags thogs gi 'od
2a4(1): zer las/ gnam lcags kyi mda'i 'phen pa dang / 'khor lo bsgeg ldan gyi mda' 'phen pa dang / mtshon cha 'khrug pa'i char pa rgyun du 'bab pa/ phyogs mtshams thams cad nas ro
2b1(1): myags dur khrod stong stong yod pa/ dur khrod kyi tshal re re na ma mo bye ba dgu khri dgu khri yod pa/ sprul pa bye ba sa yar 'gyed pa/ shin tu gdug pa 'chang zhing yangs pa/ mtshon cha 'khrug pa'i tshar pa dang / skad mi
2b2(1): snyan par grags pa/ dri mi zhim pa/ ro langs pa dang / ro bdug mnam pa/ ro rab tu kha ba/ dur khrod kyi rgyan de dag dang re re la las kyi srin po dang srin mo sha za ba dang // khrag 'thung ba dang / dbugs 'phrog
2b3(1): pa dang / mdangs len pa dang / sha rus longs spyod pa dang / 'thub pa dang / gshog pa dang / spyugs pa'i glu len pa dang / stag dang / bya rog dang / khra dang / sha ba dang / spyang ki dang / dom dang / dred dang /
2b4(1): gzig dang / seng ge dang / sre mo dang / byi la dang / stag rgod dang / phag pa dang / sbrul dang / de dag la sogs pa ni shin tu nga ro mi snyan pa/ sdug pa'i sgra skad rab tu sgrogs pa'o// rab tu 'jigs pa gdul
2b5(1): bya'i gnas de na ni/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khro mchog ya mAn ta ka zhi ba kun tu bzang po mnyam pa nyid kyi sku las/ las kyi gnod sbyin dregs pa 'dul ba'i don du sbyin dregs pa can gyi tshul bzung ste/ gser
2b6(1): gyi mdog rin chen dbyibs 'dra ba'i sku nyid chu nag gi sprin nag 'dra ba/ gdug byed kyi mtshon cha phyag na bsnams te/ dur khrod rgyan dang ro nyes spras/ de'i tshe ye shes dang las kyi lha mo 'bum gtso mo// gtso mo
3a1(1): nyid kyi g.yon 'khod pa/ las byed 'bum gyi gtso mo yang / lha mchog nyid kyi g.yas na rab tu khros par bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor yang ye shes las grub pa'i 'khor dang / gdug
3a2(1): byed ye shes kyi sprul pa dang / 'jigs rten rlag par mdzad pa'i gshin rje ni/ phyi 'byung ba la dbang byed pa'i gshin rje dang / nang phung po la dbang byed pa'i gshin rje dang / gsang ba rig pa khrid pa'i gsin rje
3a3(1): dang / bse'i gyad gtum po dang / bse'i skyes bu drag po dang / bse'i rol pa dang / bse'i khye'u chung dang / bse'i lha mo dang / bse'i skyes pa dang / rje'u dang / blon po dang / sprul pa dang / bsam las 'das pa
3a4(1): ste/ dur khyi nag po dang / lce spyang nag mo ro la rngam pa dang / myos byed dang / lkugs byed dang / 'dzin ging dang / sprul pa yang sbrul dang / rje mo dang / yang rje mo dang / blon mo yang g.yog mor bcas te/ la la ni
3a5(1): sha la za/ la la ni khrag la 'thung / la la ni rus pa 'cha'/ la la ni ngu/ la la ni dgod/ la la ni mi sdug pa'i gar byed/ la la ni glu len/ la la ni gom pa'i stabs rdeg/ la la ni gnam lcags 'phen/ la la
3a6(1): ni 'khor lo 'phen la la ni mda' 'phen/ la la ni srog la zhal gyis rngub ste/ kha nas kha rlangs dug gi chu 'bab/ mig nas khrag 'dzag/ dbugs zhe sdang gi me 'bar sna nas nad kyi na bun 'thul/ 'jig rten
3b1(1): khams la dbang byed pa'o// de'i tshe de'i dus na mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje/ las kyi gnod sbyin mi 'grungs pa 'dul ba'i phyir/ karma khrag 'thung khros pa'i skur gyur te/ sku mdog smug nag ra ga
3b2(1): rak+ta'i mdog/ dpal 'bar chen mo'i mdun na gnas// 'jig rten dregs pa can gyi 'khor// gdug pas skyong zhing gtso bo mdzad// nyid las mi gzhan sprul bas gdug pa 'dul// lha klu las sogs 'jig
3b3(1): rten dreg pa can// dur khrod mchog gi gnas nas thabs cig go/ de nas yang de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dpal 'bar chen po ya mAn ta ka de/ gdug pa can dang 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mi g.yo mi 'khrug par
3b4(1): bzhugs te/ oM sa ma ya Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mu tra ya mAn ta ka/ ha la tsakru/ pany+tsa rU pa ni/ kun lan rtsa sa ma ya/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la e a ra li ru lu/
3b5(1): ru lu ru lu/ hring hring hring / zhes gsungs pas gdug byed dregs pa'i 'khor de dag bred/ rab tu dngangs shing bred/ lus 'dar/ yid dngangs nas/ rab tu dngangs shing yid 'khrug dran pa'i sems stong ste/
3b6(1): rang rang gi srog ni gdungs pa'i shugs kyis brjod do// srog gi snying po phyung nas phul lo// ya ma ta du a ra ra sha sha ha/ tsa dza rtsi tri/ tan ga phu/ bstan pa dam pa bsrung bar dam bcas so// dpal gshin rje
4a1(1): dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgud las/ drag po'i gleng gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas 'jig rten spong ba'i gtso bo des stan las langs te/ dpal 'bar chen po khro bdag rdza
4a2(1): la// bskor ba lan du mas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye dpal 'bar khro bdag rje// srid gsum gdug pa tshar gcad nas// 'jam pa'i dpa' bos bzhugs pa de// de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yi// las dang
4a3(1): bya ba bka' stsol mdzod// ces zhus pas/ dpal 'bar chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyin cig 'jig rten mgon po khyod// lnga brgya dus kyi nye dus su// dam sri dag gi bstan pa 'byung // rang gis rang gi bstan pa
4a4(1): 'jig/ rdo rje nang dme byung ba yis// sngags kyi byin rlabs nyams par gyur// nad dang gdon du 'khrug pa yis// dus med cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung // de tshe nga yi dus yin pas// bstan pa nga yis gnas par
4a5(1): byed// dus gsum 'byung bar ma nges te// nga la su zhig thugs gtod na// lha mchog nyid du mngon du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// nga la nyan par brtson pa legs// 'jig rten gtso
4a6(1): bopo legs par nyon// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// mnyam par rdzogs la yid bsam ste// yul la rten pas rtogs pa skye// snang ba stong pa dbyer mi phyed// rang bzhin rdzogs la dngos grub myur// snang la
4b1(1): 'gag med rgyan shar bas// nga yi dngos grub 'dod pa des// sku mdog phyag mtshan nges med bsgom// gal te 'byung po dam sri ni// rang gi rgyud las lhar srid pas// bdag ces med pa'i ngang du bsgral// ces
4b2(1): gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ma rig 'khrul rgyas rgyu lus la// bag chags khrig pa'i rten bcas nas// mi 'dod pa dag 'byung gyur bas// mtshan ma rdzogs pas gshed po lngas// las rnams
4b3(1): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir// gnas dus dkyil 'khor rdzas la sogs// grub pa'i sngags la sogs pa sbyar// nad 'khrug dam tshig nyams pa'i tshe// 'byung ba bshig phyir gshin rje rbad/ mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rang
4b4(1): srog gcad// bsnyen pa'i lha nyid bdud du dbab// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ gleng bslang drag po'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas dpal 'bar chen po
4b5(1): la// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad zhus// kye ma dpal 'bar khro bdag rje// gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// lho yi ro phyogs nyams 'jigs pa// shan ma ri la sogs pa ni// dur khrod shing gcig dur
4b6(1): khrod dang // brag dmar brag nag sa phug dang // nyams dga' ba yi gnas su bya// byang chub rtsal nas sems sbyangs te// bsnyen pa'i don du gsungs pa yi// zhi khro cho ga gzhung bzhin te// 'bras bu lnga la rten
5a1(1): bcas nas// sbyor sgrol mchod pas mnyes byas la// las kyi rim pa rdzogs par bya// khrus dang skabs 'gro sems bskyed la// shag gdab 'ben bca' go cha bstar// phyag rgya chen po'i sku rdzogs
5a2(1): pas// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas la// ku sha'i stan la sems par 'dug/ ris su bris sam 'bur du gtod// mig gi rten la yid bsam lha// sgo lnga rang so yul med gzhag/ be shing 'khar ba thogs nas
5a3(1): ni// bying nas rmugs par gyur pa na// 'jam dbyangs khro bo'i 'dzab kyis bskul// g.yel zhing dgod par gyur pa na// mtshan ma lha yi sku la brtag/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn ta ka hUM phaT/ khro rgyal rngam pa'i rgyal
5a4(1): po nyid// bdag dang dbyer med rdzogs pa'i sku// thugs ka'i hUM las yi ge ni// 'khor lo'i tshul de rang rgyud sbyangs// klad pa sku dang mgrin dbugs gsungs// 'khor lo rdzogs pas 'phro 'du'i gnas// mtshon
5a5(1): pa'i sprin tshogs rgyas 'gyur ba// mtho gang las ni stong gsum gang // 'dod yon phul te byin brlabs bsdu// sngags nyid lha yi skur gyur pas// snang ba'i dus na skur gsal bas// stong pa'i dus na rdzogs pa
5a6(1): nyid// rgyu lus lha yi sku ru 'pho// ngag gis grag stong sngags su 'pho// sems nyid gsal stong chen por 'pho// sgrib pa gsum las rim par grol// nam mkha' bzhin te mnyam rdzogs che// 'khor lo thams cad
5b1(1): rdzogs par 'dod// dka' thub chen po byed pa na// gsad pa'i las kyi sngags yang gdags// sku gzugs bzhad dam 'gul ba'am// lung ston sgra 'am gzugs brnyan nam// rmi lam rtags rnams mang du
5b2(1): 'byung // bstan par red nas dngos grub slang // zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ yi ge 'khor lo rdzogs chen gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas dpal
5b3(1): 'bar chen po la// 'jig rten gtso bos 'di skad gsol// kye ma dpal 'bar khro bdag ni// bsnyen pa de ltar rdzogs gyur nas// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par bya// de skad gsol pa btab pa
5b4(1): dang // dam tshig bdag pos yang dag gsungs// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag dang // gsar rnying yi dgas grong khyer na// gdug pa 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis// rdo rje 'gros dang stang thabs bya// grong khyer
5b5(1): bshig pa'i sa dag las// rak+Sha khrag gis chag chag gdab// gzhan gyi thal chen ma yin pa// rang gi don du bsgrub pa yi// thal chen gyis ni bri bar bya// gnam sa gnyis la thig btab pas// dkyil 'khor
5b6(1): rnam gnyis lhun gyis grub// dur khrod gzhal yas phun sum tshogs// dbus ni gru gsum mthing nag la// zla gam dmar la gru chad ser// 'khor lo brgyad dang zla gam dmar po bzhi// thod 'phreng me ris rab
6a1(1): tu mdzes// dur khrod rgyan dang rdzogs spras la// rab tu 'jigs par dpa' bos bri// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa'i// rdo rje dpa' bo'i tsham rngam gyis// bgegs bskrad rdo
6a2(1): rje'i gur chen dbub// sgra rnams brdung zhing nga ro yis// dam can mkha' 'gros sprin ltar gtibs// tshogs phud de dag mnyes byas la// ris su bris sam blugs su blugs// tsa ka li la sogs pas
6a3(1): dgram// yig 'bru srog dang 'dra bas dgod// ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdzas phur byin brlabs dbang bskur ba// bskyed pa'i sngags bri dar lce'u gdags// dbyings nas spyan drangs
6a4(1): dbyer med bstim// so so'i rtsa ba'i drag sngags las// dgyes shing brtan par bya ba ni// gshed phur nyid la lcags phur te// de 'dra sor tshad bcu gnyis pa// ma mo gnyis dang sgrol ging la'o// thar byed brgyad
6a5(1): dang drag phur re// yang sngon re dang brag la bya// bse ti dun ti ba ti dang // go ti la sogs phur rdzas so// glon ma la sogs bla rkun ma// dgrol bdag la sogs dgod dang bsam// ya mAn ta ka la sogs
6a6(1): pa'i// yab yum sras dang bcas pa yis// ru tra sgrol zhing 'gugs par byed// sku stod khro rgyal 'jigs pa las// smad ni lcags phur dpal dang ldan// zhal nas phur bu'i 'dzab zlos pas// nyi shu bzhi dang rtsa
6b1(1): ba bzhis mdzes// rten bca' 'ben bca' thun yang bca'// 'brub khang chas gzhug sbrang phur bca'// bsgrub dang drag po'i gtor ma bca'// dngos grub la sogs tshe rten bca'// las kyi sbyor ba sbyar skabs
6b2(1): la// zhi dang rgyas pa dag dang sbyar// mngon spyod dag dang 'gug pa dang // dbye bskrad mnan dang spro 'phros dang // las ni gsang ba'i sngags dang sbyar// ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// chos
6b3(1): rnams kun gyi rtsa ba byang chub sems// spros pa'i mtshon cha mi mnga' ba'i// rtog med spros bral chos dbyings ni// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin spros dang bral ba la// rig pa spros bral mi rtog
6b4(1): pas// chos sku bde ba chen po'i klong // chos nyid kun khyab ye nas don// ma rtog sems can 'khor ba la// snying rje nam mkha' lta bu'i 'od// skye ba med las sems nyid a// a yi cho 'phrul byin rlabs
6b5(1): las// 'byung ba dbang chen sa bon spros// yum chen lnga yi mkha' klong nas// thugs rje 'byung ba'i yig 'bru las// gru gsum mthing nag gzhal yas shar// dregs pa khyo shug nyi zla mdzes// a las sprul pa'i hUM
6b6(1): nag ni// stag gzig dug gi 'phro dang 'dra// spros 'dul thugs mtshan nyid las ni// dpal 'bar khros pas gshin rje gshed// mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug ste// gyad kyi dor stabs yi dgas
7a1(1): gnon// g.yas sngo g.yon ldang dbus mthing zhal// be con dgra sta stir dbyug g.yas// sdigs mdzub mthe'u chung thod rlon g.yon// ko rlon g.yang gzhi sham thabs dang // thod 'brel sbrul dang me
7a2(1): ris brgyan// rgyal ba rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing // ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// dbang bskur byin gyis rlob dang sgom// de don yang dag nges bshad pa// skye med sems nyid don dam lha// de yi ngang las
7a3(1): sku gsal ba// mtshan ma'i lha zhes bya ba ste// de las sprul pa las kyi lha// de ltar gsal ba'i sems nyid de// snying po byang chub sems zhes bya// sems la 'gyur med rtag chen snga// de nyid ngang gi stong pa
7a4(1): nyid// ro langs khro mo dpal 'bar ma// thig le gsang sngags sa bon rgyu// de nyid don dam stong pa nyid// gdug pa 'dul phyir zhe sdang khros// rtsa ba'i sa bon rgyu dang bral// 'jam dpal khros pas gshin rje
7a5(1): gshed// thugs sbrul gshin rje ma ru rtses// bdud ni srin mo ma ru rtse// dur khrod khrag la rol pa'i phyir// snang srid rak+ta'i gzhal yas su// sku mdog dmar nag khrag rul mdog/ drang srong khros pa'i cha byad
7a6(1): can// be con 'khor los dgra bgegs sgrol// bse mo snying zan ma ru rtse// blon mo yang blon la sogs pa// dpag tu med pas bskor bar bsam// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rim bskyed de// ye shes dkyil
7b1(1): 'khor spyan drangs mchod// dus bzhi ma yengs brtson 'grus kyis// yang dang yang du bya ba min// ya mAn ta ka la sogs pa'i// thugs kha la sogs gnas dag tu// 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i thig le klong // bcud
7b2(1): kyi dam pa 'di nyid la// dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par 'dod// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ dngos grub chen po rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas dpal 'bar chen
7b3(1): po la// 'jig rten jo bos yang dag bshad// kye ma'o 'jigs byed chen po lags// dngos grub chen po rdzogs mdzad pas// rdzogs dang 'pho ba byang sems gang // de la yang dag bshad bya ba// stong pa nyid
7b4(1): las sku ru gsal// 'gro don thugs rje rdzogs pa la// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid can// klad pa sku yi 'khor lo la// mgrin pa gsung la snying kha zugs// lte ba yon tan 'khor lo la// gsang ba'i
7b5(1): 'phrin las 'khor lo la// stong pa nyid las skur gsal ba// tsit+ta gsang ba'i ga'u ru// ye shes 'jam dpal rdo rje nyid// 'khor lo rdzogs dang yig 'brus brgyan// chos nyid 'khor lo rdzogs rtsar 'dod// bde
7b6(1): chen 'khor lo rdzogs rtsar 'dod// bde chen 'khor lo rdzogs tshul gyis// gsang ba ya ma ra tsa'i sku// gzugs snang 'ongs spyod rdzogs par mdzad// logs spyod chen pos si ra gnyis// thugs rje chags tshul
8a1(1): ma ru rtses// sgra snang sprul ba'i skur rdzogs mdzad// gzhi stengs yon tan rdzogs pa yi// sprul pa nyid la 'khor la rdzogs// ye shes myos byed 'bar bas ni// yon tan ye shes klong du
8a2(1): rdzogs// gsang ba rdzogs pa'i me rlung nyid// thogs med ral pa tshar dgu yis// kun nas rdzogs pas don 'grub ste// dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs pa'o// ye shes sems rdzogs gzugs dkyil du// kha
8a3(1): dog lnga ldan yig 'bru lnga// sa pa ta tsa ru la// a li drug pas brgyan pa ste// A li ban tsas spros pa nyid// gcig la lnga rdzogs ye shes rtags// 'jigs pa'i bdud 'joms 'gro drug bcod// nyon mongs lnga
8a4(1): nyid rang sar grol// thogs med ngos gzung med pa dang // 'gyur med 'gag med gsal stong 'od// ma bris dkyil 'khor rdzogs che'o// rang 'od rang snang yig 'bru la// 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i yig 'bru
8a5(1): la// ma rtogs sems can rang rgyud sbyang // rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor gdeng ldan nyid// 'khor lo ye nas rdzogs pa'i don// dug lnga ye shes rdzogs pa che'o// 'byung ba lnga 'dus phung pa nyid// longs spyod rdzogs pa
8a6(1): lha yi sku// ngang dang yid kyang de bzhin no// e ma ngo mtshar yang chen po// sku la bgres rgud mi mnga' gzhon// gsung la 'gag pa med pas bde// thugs la skye 'gag med pas gsal// 'phel 'grib med de
8b1(1): grol ba che// thog med bkag med rdzogs pa che'o// de dag yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jam dbyangs rdo rje nyid gsal bas// rngam par snang bas mi 'gyur ba// thig le rdo rje sems dpar 'pho// 'khor ba'i smag
8b2(1): rum mun bsal nas// chos dbyings rnamad ga byang chub che// mkha' ltar dag pas sems nyid dngos// klad pa sku yi 'khor lo yi// bde chen 'khor lo chen po ni// ma ra tsa'i sku gsal bas// rnam par snang ba'i
8b3(1): sku ru 'pho// me long ye shes gsal ba che// mgrin pa gsung gi 'khor lo la// 'phags pa ma ru rtse gsal bas// snang ba mtha' yas sku ru 'pho// chags pa ma 'gag so sor rtogs// lte ba yon tan chen po'i
8b4(1): dkyil// myos byed 'bar bar sku gsal bas// yon tan rang byung rang rol bas// rin chen 'byung ldan sku ru 'pho// mnyam nyid ye shes zang thal che ho// gsang ba 'phrin las 'khor lo la// ral ba tshar dgu
8b5(1): gsal ba las// don yod grub pa'i sku ru 'pho// ma brtsal ye shes 'gro don rdzogs// skye med dbyings las sku gsal lha// gsal ba yengs med ting 'dzin srog/ dgongs pas klong du sgrol bas snying // snang la
8b6(1): rang bzhin med par rdzogs// gzhi la skye ba med pa'i dkyil// rang 'byung 'gag pa med par 'khor// stong pa byang chub sems nyid yum// rang 'byung rig pa shar gsal yab// zung du 'phel bar gnyis med
9a1(1): srog/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// don dam srog gi spros bral te// rnal 'byor nyams la 'byor pas thob// kun rdzob sku gsung thugs gsal te// ting 'dzin ye shes
9a2(1): rdzogs pa ho// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas dpal 'bar chen po la// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad
9a3(1): zhus// kye ho dpal 'bar khro bo'i bdag/ bsam pa mya ngan 'das gyur kyang // don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// don de dkrug pa'i dgra byung na// de la ji ltar gsal ba las// de nas yang dag bshad
9a4(1): bya ba// ting 'dzin gsang sngags drag po'i rdzas// 'byor pa rnam pa gsum du sdeb// skad cig bdag gam rim pa yis// 'jigs sku mthing nag me dpung 'bar// zhal gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// mthing nag
9a5(1): gyad kyi 'jigs tshul can// rigs lnga'i khro bo dbu la brgyan// thugs khar ye shes sems dpa' mthing // mgur nas zhabs kyi long bu ru// shes rgyud khro thung mtshon gang ba// me rlung las kyi 'khor lo
9a6(1): bsnams// de las sprul ba'i 'od zer gyis// mtshon cha 'khor lo'i me dpal sngags// rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// srid pa gsum yang 'gug par nus// ra las rak+ta ma hA las// snang srid khrag mtsho khol
9b1(1): mar bsam// badz+ra kro d+ha yak+ka ma ru rtse// 'jigs pa'i sku mdog dmar la gtum// be con 'khor lo phyag na bsnams// de nas sprul ba'i bse mo dang // gyad kyi dmag dpon la sogs bsam// chos kyi rgyal po
9b2(1): la sogs pas// nyi zla 'khor lo ltar bzhon nas// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// snang ba 'di dag rab tu bskor// lcags kyu khengs par rab bsgom ste// dza yi sbyor bas 'gug par 'gyur// kha kha ru lu
9b3(1): la sogs pas// 'jig rten rme dud thog pa yis// 'jigs rten khams rnams khengs bsam nas// phaT kyi sbyor bas byed par 'gyur// gang dag lha klu mi la sogs// gzir cing mnan par 'dod na yang // ri
9b4(1): rgyal rbab dang lcags thog 'dras// mgo 'gas lus la sher btab bsgom// trig nan sbyor bas gzir bar 'gyur// ri rab rgya gram dag dang ni// gling bzhi gling phran lha yi dpal// stong gsum gling bzhi ri rab
9b5(1): dang // 'phro 'du lha yi gzhal yas su// lha tshogs pho brang gtams pa dang // don yod grub pa'i pho brang dang // lam dang nan gyi sbyor ba yis// srid pa gsum yang non par 'gyur// rdo rje khro bo gsal ba
9b6(1): dang // mtshon cha 'khrig pa'i ga pu dang // rdo rje lcags kyu ldan pa yis// hur thums dza yi sbyor ba yis// dregs pa'i srog snying 'phrog par 'gyur// e ni 'bar ba'i spar lug dang // gdub rtsub 'khrig shing hom
10a1(1): khung du// dza la ram gyis sbyor ba yis// mngon snang dngos med sreg par 'gyur// ral gri spu gri 'khor lo dang // mar ya'i sbyor pa thams cad sgrol bar nus pa yin/ zhes gsungs so// de nas
10a2(1): yang dag bshad bya ba// bdag nyid lha ru gsal ba yi// thugs kha la sogs gnas gsum du// sku gsum yig 'bru de nyid sngags// rab tu mgal me 'khor lo'i tshul// dril bu'i sgra ltar rgyun mi 'chad// 'od
10a3(1): zer nyi ma lta bu ste// 'dod pa'i yon tan ma sprul te// bde gshegs mchod la byin brlabs lus// bdag dang sems can rtog sgrib sbyang // de nyid drag po'i las kyi dus// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo nyid du
10a4(1): bsam// de nyid ma ru rtse sogs la// khros pas rang rang 'khor lo bskor// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs la// rang rang yig 'bru bzhi bzhi ni// ya ni sngo nag dag la 'khor// de yis 'khor lo bsgyur ba yin/ zhes
10a5(1): gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bstan pa 'jig pa'i ru dra de// lus ni 'byung ba las grub pas// ci 'dra ci gsal bsgoms pa yis// snying khar yi ge ni dmar bsam// de la mtshon cha'i yi ge
10a6(1): ni// ma ra ya yis bskor bar bsam// rang gshed yin pas ral gri bsam// drag sngags 'khor lo 'phros pa yis// rang srog de nyid gcod par bsam// 'jigs byed las kyi gshin rje dang // dmar nag ma
10b1(1): mo mang po yis// sha rid dag la sbrang 'dus 'tshal// ha ba hab thun thun 'dus par bsam/ kha rlangs nad kyi rang bzhin gyis// rtsa rnams khengs te myos par bsam// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme
10b2(1): rgyud las// mtshan ma brjod pa rdzas kyi las bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas 'bar ba chen po des// drag po'i sngags kyis nges par bshad// 'phags pa'i nang nas 'jam dpal nyid// lha mo'i nang
10b3(1): nas 'od zer can// las byed nang nas dza ti ma// 'khor ni nag mo 'bum gyis bskor// bsnyen cing bsgrubs na gang yang 'grub// de bsgom de nyid bod rbad sngags// oM sa ma yA Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mu tra ya man ta
10b4(1): ka/ ban tsa te ro ni hUM dza/ oM a kro d+he ka ya man ta ka ka ma rU pa hUM phaT/ ta a/ nri ya man ta ka ka la rA pa nri drongs shig/ shrI te kro ha ha/ shrI ni dza ya khaM thums// nr-i dzA 'gal byed sod/ klag byed gtso khang
10b5(1): khang thams// oM sa ma ya ma 'dzu gug ta hUM/ a nu rA ga ya mA na ta ka hUM/ de phyi thams thams// he sra ha dam dam/ sa ma ya gu gu dul/ ya man bam rim rbad zad/ sod chod sod chod/ gtum mo ro langs
10b6(1): 'jigs pa'i gzugs// de nyid de bsgom bod rbad gsang // oM many+dza shriHya man ta ka u tsuSh+ma kra tra swe ta li/ muM kro d+hi shwa ri/ rag sha yag sha dzA dza/ snying kha rag b+h+yo/ nag mo snying rtsa ma b+h+yo/ khrag la mu sha ma
11a1(1): b+h+yo// nag mo ting lam b+h+yo/ nag mo ting ting kA la rag mo b+h+yo/ dum ru ma la dum pra/ tsa ru ra dum bu/ khra su kha kha zums// dam tsi ru// dus ya na rbad/ sgeg ma khro ma ral gcig ma// de nyid snying po
11a2(1): 'di dag go/ oM many+dzu shri ya mA na ta ka/ ma ma e ka dza ti dza dzA/ trag rag sha mu/ snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ nag mo kha li baM dza b+h+yo/ kha 'gram mu 'grum b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo ru tra rbad/ rag sha rbad/ snying rtsa rbad/ kha thun rbad/ tsi
11a3(1): ta rbad/ ma ra ya rbad/ thal phyung thal phyung // ma thun ma ma thun// rbad du rbad du/ du yaM/ tsi ta yang / ru thums sa ma ya raM thu/ bruM pu ru/ ru thu ya na rbad/ hUM du hUM phaT rbad/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang las sngags
11a4(1): dang // dmod pa'i sngags dang gsang sngags dang // ma lus de nyid yin pa ru// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs// oM a kro d+he ka ya mAn ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hUM phaT/ bye ba sngon du 'gro bar rigs// ri
11a5(1): rab rdul du rlag pa dang // rgya mtsho dag kyang skam par nus// gnam lcags ser ba dbab pa dang // bzlog pa dag kyang thog pa med// khros na bdud kyang brlag byed la// ltas pa tsam gyis dgra yang
11a6(1): rung // dga' na sems can gso ba dang // 'khor ba dong yang sprug par nus// sngags kyi don nyid lha yin te// lha yi yang bzhin sngags nyid do// des na bskyed pa med yang ni// lung las chu bur rdol ba
11b1(1): bzhin// snying pos yan lag rdzogs par gsal// de nyid bsnyen dang skyed pa ni// rig pa can gyis de shes bya// sgrub pa'i dus su sil bu 'am// yang na dril la bzlas par bya// yi ge rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo
11b2(1): ni// gshed po la sogs thugs la gnas// grangs dang mtshan ma dus las ni// mtshan ma mthong na de nyid yin// yab yum sngags kyi grangs thim yang // lha yi mtshan ma ma mthong na// sngags kyi dam tshig nyams
11b3(1): srid pas// lha lhums bsil la brgya gshegs bya// de tshe mtshan rtags mngon du ster// des kyang rtags rnams ma byung na// gsang sngags sil bur lto nas bzlog/ ru khug ru nyal ru nyal dang // ru bzlog drag
11b4(1): pos gnad la dbab// gzhug la dam tshig brdar la gzhag/ lha nyid gnad la dbab pa ste// kun gyis bya ba ma yin te// las rnams rdugs nas bya ba yin// mi 'gro 'gro bar bya ba yin// mi 'grub 'grub par
11b5(1): bya bar ba ru// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gtum khros 'jigs pa ya ma ra// drag po'i gsang sngags 'di dag go/ oM shrI many+dzu ya ma ra tsa sa do me ya/ yaM yaM zums//
11b6(1): gshin rje nag po snying po snying khrag la dun b+h+yo/ ma ru rtsa rtsa la hur bug la thums srog la ma ra ya/ tri ling shang ka du/ tri dza yag sha/ rbad phu/ phye ma kha bdar ru ru pra sgra dum dum shig/ dgra bo ni ma ra ya tsa tsa ra
12a1(1): rbad/ drag sngags gsang ba'i las dag yin// yag sha me dpal srog bdag che// sngags bdag 'khor los thugs la gnas// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgud
12a2(1): las// gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas dpal 'bar chen po la// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad zhus// he he dpal chen 'bar bdag khro// las kyi gshin rje'i srog sngags gang // de la
12a3(1): yang dag bshad bya ba// gtum khro mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs// yi dgas sha za'i ded dpon po// gdon gyi yang bdud ma gdon 'khol// sha khrag srog dbugs mnga' bdag po// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs
12a4(1): pa// mun nag 'khyil ba'i nang shed na// 'od phung nag po 'phros brjid pa// nyi zla 'khor lo zer zhon nas// srid gsum nyul zhing bla rtse 'phrog/ sprul pa bdun brgya nyi shu gcig/ dug mtsho mer ba'i nang na
12a5(1): gnas// pho gshed sum brgya drug cu gcig/ nyi ma'i rta la rab zhon nas// nyin dus rgyu zhing phung po 'joms// mi gshed sum brgya drug cu ni// mun pa'i glog dmar zhon nas su// mtshan mo rgyu zhing 'byung ba
12a6(1): 'joms// yang sbrul bye ba dgu khri gcig/ dug mtsho mer ba'i bar na gnas// chibs su klu glang nag po zhon// sku la lcags kyi shun khrab gsol// thod pa zhing chung sbrul gyis brgyan// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo phyag
12b1(1): na bsnams// de dag srog snying dam pa ni// 'phrul yig sum cu rtsa gcig la// bkod pa'i yig 'bru bcu bdun yin// bod pa'i gzung yig 'bru gcig ste// rnam shes ya ni sngo nag go/ ye shes lha dang 'jig
12b2(1): rten pa// de dag kun srog dam pa de// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yakle ya ts+tsha ni rA ma ya/ au hriSh+TiHwi kr-i ta na na hUM sa ma ya/ oM shrI many+dzu ya ma ra tsa ma ma e ka dza ti dza
12b3(1): dza/ tri ling shang ka du tsa tsa ra tsa rbad/ tri sa du tsa tsa rA tsa rbad/ 'bur khri gshin ni tsa tsa rA tsa rbad/ ba tri kha yang zhug tsa tsa rA tsa rbad/ 'dus tri tsa tsa rA tsa rbad/ ra khri chum tsa tsa rA tsa rbad/ p+la khri shig tsa tsa ra tsa rbad/
12b4(1): snying la ya tsa tsa ra tsa du rbad/ oM many+dzu shrI a kro d+he ka ka la rA pa/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ d+hi sti ye krin a ne a ne a ne/ ya ma me d+ha k+She/ ra dza sa do ru Na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ dun ting kha la ya dgra bo'i snying la ya/
12b5(1): drag sngags 'khor lo ya ma'i srog/ srid gsum bla tshe 'joms pa ru// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu bshad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// ya mAn ta ka yab yum las/
12b6(1): sprul pa'i sras ni lcam dral lngas// gdug pa sgrol zhing sku la 'khor// kun gyis las mdzad sgrol ba'i ging // de dag drag sngags bshad bya ba// rnal ma rnams te srog la rngam/ srog la mer mer/ dbris la
13a1(1): chums/ thu bis thu dgra bo nri ma ra ya tsa tsa ra tsarbad/ badz+ra kun d+ha ri dza dzA hUM/ badz+ra shu lan he ri dza dza hUM/ badz+ra kang ka d+ha ra dza dzA hAM/ badz+ra tsa mun ta ri dza dza hUM/ su tri pa ya badz+ra tsit+ta/ yo gi shwa ra/
13a2(1): ma tsi ta hAM/ ya ma tsi ta hUM/ kyi khrid ra khrid ku ru ma shwa ro la khrag 'thung ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ krang he krang he/ ru ru ro ru tsa pa la nag mo re ma ti b+h+yo/ badz+ra yi sha ma ru rtse dun dun/ badz+ra mahA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ 'khor lo rdzogs
13a3(1): pa'i thugs kha ru// sa bon rgyu dang yig 'brus spras// srid gsum gang ba'i sprul pa spros// rak+ta khrag gi klong dkyil nas// 'jigs byed me dpung 'bar 'dra'i sku// ra ga rak+ta dmar nag 'jigs// snang srid
13a4(1): dbang gi sprul pa 'gyed// rdo rje be con rab tu brdeg/ g.yon pa mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'phen// rdo rje bse mo snying zan ma// rgal mo gdug pa chen mo yang // sku mdog gsal bas sgro 'du bya'o// dpal gshin rje
13a5(1): dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ las kyi gshin rje bse gtor dang bcas pa'i drag sngags kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'jig rten gtso bo des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// kye ma
13a6(1): rab tu 'jigs byed che// gsang sngags 'di nyid bshad 'gyur na// las dang bya ba bka' stsol mdzod// ces zhus pas/ nyon cig 'jig rten skyong ba'i gtso// bstan pa dag la dgra dar ba// bsnyen bsgrub las
13b1(1): kyi mthar bya ba// dam sri gdug pa bsgral ba yi// sme phur bcas shing gdab ba dang // 'khor lo drag pos bsgral ba dang // zor thun drag pos bsgral ba'i phyir// mnan bsregs 'phang ba'i las mtha'
13b2(1): brtul// de la sme phur las bya ba// maN+Dal bcas rdzogs gong bzhin te// phur pa brgyad dang bcu bdun nam// yang na brgya dang rtsa gcig yin// de dag med na rgyud bcu'o// mgon po gshin rje'i lha ru
13b3(1): bsam// stod ni khro zhal 'jigs pa'i sku// smad ni drag por 'gyur ba'i dpal// de ltar bsam la gnas su dgod// byin brlabs dbang bskur skur gsal te// mi bzad phur pa nag po drug/ byin gyis
13b4(1): brlabs la ban d+har spung // sme phur bya ba sor bcu gnyis// ri rab ltar brjid zur brgyad pa'o// bdag nyid ya man ta kar bsgoms// phur pa sgrol ging bdag por bslab// zur brgyad las kyi gshin rje
13b5(1): brgyad// brgyad bdun dag la bse mo'i tshogs// dpal la phung byed ma mo gsum// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang // 'brub khung las kyi maN+Dal du// ling ga dngos su gsal ba dang // snying kha dag srog gi
13b6(1): gzhi// khrag gi dngas ma'i nang shed na// srog gi dngas ma yi ge ni// 'od kyi dngas ma yig 'bru gsum// de la nr-i nyid dza yi bar// dbug nyid bar bar khyibs khyibs gnas// de la dgongs pas phur ba
14a1(1): dril// de yang ting 'dzin 'di lta ste// dam tshig nyams pa'i sngags pa de'i// snying kar bla mas bstim pa yi// ye shes sems dpar zhugs pa nyid// dam tshig srog gi lha yin pas// dam tshig
14a2(1): bsrungs na dngos grub rten// nyams na snying khrag 'jib pa'i 'dre// de la dam bdar mchod bshags la// dam tshig nyams pa'i gshed du gtang // lcags kyi sdig pa mgo dgu pas// snying rtsa brgyad nas za bar
14a3(1): bsam// de la phur pa gdab par bya'o// yang ni 'od dang 'od zer las// 'go ba'i lha dang dbye bar bsam// tha ma lus sems rab phul la// bkrag dang gzi mdangs spug chu tshul// khong seng byang chub sems
14a4(1): pa'i lam don// ya ma rA dza'i spyi bor phyung // byang sems 'dra ba bdag la bstim// de yang dang po byin brlabs sems dpa' gshegs// gnyis pas 'go ba'i lha lnga dpral// gsum pas byang chub sems spyan
14a5(1): 'dren// 'byung ba 'dus pa'i phung po de// de nas phur bas dus gsum gdab// bdag dag dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyis// yab kyi sngags kyis snying la gdab// oM tsin d+ha tsin d+ha/ ha na ha na/ tib ta tsakra hAM
14a6(1): phaT/ oM badz+ra sa twa sa ma ya hUM phaT/ che ge mo shig a be ya sha oM oM/ dgra bo nr-i ma ra yA/ ma ra du yA ma snying / ya ma khrag/ tshal pa baM ri la/ dam pa dum bu dum bu hUM phaT/ dgra bo che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ mkhal rtsa
14b1(1): g.yon la ro langs gdab// ha sa nr-i sha rak+Sha ra se ta li hUM oM oM/ phaT ka ma ra ya phaT/ nag mo rak+Sha snying rtsa la ya/ dgra bo che ge mo nr-i ma ra ya rbad/ mkhal rtsa g.yas la dza ti mas// oM badz+ra ki li ki li ya/ ma ma
14b2(1): e ka tsa ti/ snying kha rag thum ri la rbad/ shrI many+dzu ya ma ra dza ma ma e ka ti hri d+ha ya na/ kro ti sha ri snying kha ra ka tsa la rbad/ dgra bo che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ sgrol ging bdag pos klad pa la'o// oM rnal ma rnal te srog
14b3(1): la rngam gshol la/ mer mer dbris la zums thums bris thums lcags kyi sgra/ tri ling shang ka du/ zi za yag sha rbad/ phu phye ma kha 'dar/ ru ru pra pra dum dum shig shig che ge mo ni mA ra ya rbad/ oM ta na pa na/
14b4(1): rbad na rbad na/ rbad na rbud rbad na rbud/ stong shos sha ya/ pri li pri li li/ ya ma snying la ya/ mgo la ya/ rtsa la ya/ dbugs la ya/ de nas bse mos gnas su gdab// pu tri sa ya/ dgra bo che ge mo ni shag rbad//
14b5(1): ba ra tsi ta che ge ni shag rbad/ ba ra tsi ta che ge ni shag rbad/ ya ma tsi ta che ge nra shag rbad/ ru ru pe ka tang ka te b+h+yo/ ni shag rbad/ ru ru pe dza ye bi dza ya b+h+yo/ ni shag rbad/ ru ru be a/ tsi ta b+h+yo/ ni shag rbad/ ru ru
14b6(1): be a pa ra tsi ta b+h+yo ni shag/ de nas blon mo rnams kyis gdab// oM badz+ra ud ka ra mu ti gri rna/ mu sri gri rna/ ka pi ra dza ya hUM phaT/ ni shag rbad/ A be sha ya phaT/ ni shag rbad/ a phaT me ri kun d+ha li baM zum/
15a1(1): ni shag rbad/ khrag ti ma rA ya phaT ni shag rbad/ lce spyang nag mo dag dang ni// bse yi sbrang mos gnas su gdab/ badz+ra ka li ma ma b+h+yo/ ni shag rbad/ badz+ra tsan d+ha ha la ha la hUM/ ni shag zad/ badz+ra
15a2(1): tsan d+ha tsan d+ha hUM nri shag rbad/ kro ma tsa la/ kro ma dza la hUM nri shag rbad/ ma ra dza tra ma ra ya dza tra hAM nri shag rbad/ de nas srin mo bzhi yis gdab// mun lo dan ti b+h+yo/ ni shag rbad/ phral na phral na/ hAM ni shag rbad/
15a3(1): phrag ni phrag ni hUM ni shag rbad/ phra mo kha phra mo ka ni shag rbad/ srog gi shan pa brgyad kyis gdab// trag rag sha ni shag rbad/ ma rag sha ni shag rbad/ ba rag sha ni shag rbad/ mo rag sha ni shag rbad/ bya rag sha
15a4(1): ni shag zad/ sug rag sha ni shag rbad/ he rag sha ni shag rbad/ mgrin rag sha ni shag zad/ snying rag sha ni shag rbad/ de'i rting shugs sgrol drag sngags gdab// badz+ra d+ha ra yi bshag zad/ zad na rbad mu khams
15a5(1): mug/ ni shag rbad/ d+ha ra ya ni shag rbad/ khaM ril rbad na ni shag rbad/ khug rngam ni shag rbad/ khro bo yang snying drag pos gdab// ha na ha na badz+ra ni shag rbad/ da ha da ha badz+ra ni shag rbad/ pa dza pa dza badz+ra ni shag
15a6(1): rbad/ ma tha ma badz+ra ni shag rbad/ dza la dza la badz+ra ni shag rbad/ su ru su ru badz+ra ni shag rbad/ mu ru mu ru badz+ra ni shag rbad/ ka ta ka ya badz+ra ni shag rbad/ dza ye bi dza ye ni shag rbad/ ma ra sa na pra mar ta na ye phaT
15b1(1): ni shag rbad/ 'bar ma bla nyul drag sngags brdeg/ he rag sha gre/ be rag sha me rag sha/ thibs su ril gnya' na thibs/ mug thibs/ phu brda' zan thibs san ting nan dun ting / dbang phyug la sogs sgrol
15b2(1): sngags gdab// ma nu rag sha si b+h+yo/ ni shig rbad/ bla rkun la brdeg cing khyi sbrang srog la rol// mung tra ma b+h+yo ni shag rbad/ raM pu ru la b+h+yo shag rbad haM ha ba trag na b+h+yo ni shag rbad/ a shug me/ ha na ha na ni shag
15b3(1): rbad/ a shug me mar ma ra na shag rbad/ a shug me dza la dza la che ge ni shag rbad/ ces pa lha yi phur pa yis// rdzogs par bskul zhing gnas su gdab// yang na yab yum sras dang bcas// bse mos phur ba
15b4(1): btab pa la// blon mos khrag 'thung yab rjes la// sngags rnams bzlas shing nyungs kar blug/ phur pa drug gis gnas bdun gdab// de yis 'grub par dpa' bos bshad// de nas ling thod par brub// phur
15b5(1): nag ral pa tshar dgu skrag/ gdug pa'i yul lam yi dgas grong // de lta bu ru gtad par bya// rdo rje sme 'thab 'byung ba na// skrag ni nag po khru gang la// rten 'brel snying pos rab tu gnas// bum par ya man ta
15b6(1): ka'i sngags// yab yum sras bcas sngags bris gzhug/ phur pa nag po de dag ni// kho yi snying khar bcugs la gzhag/ rang gnas dkyil 'khor 'og tu sgra// yang na mchod rten nang du gtad// rang la ngang gis
16a1(1): 'brub pa ru// dam tshig bdag pos yang dag gsungs// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ bse'i dme phur chen po'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas dpal 'bar chen po
16a2(1): des// 'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsungs// rdo rje nang sme byung ba'i tshe// sme phung srog gi spu gri bshad// dang por bsnyen pa rdzogs pa des// ban d+ha nag po bsgral ba'i phyir// 'brub khung nag po khru gang
16a3(1): bar// gzas pa po'i ling ga legs bcas la// phur pa nag po chas su gzhug/ ga 'khor lo yum gyi lto bar bcas// bdag nyid ya man ta ka yi// thugs kar ro sdud nag por bsam// phur pa'i 'khor lo rab
16a4(1): sngags la// ro langs drag po'i 'khor lo bskor// dmigs pa de nyid rlag par 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bdag nyid lha ru gsal byas la// sme phur nag pos ling ga gsad// nyungs kar nyungs
16a5(1): nag ske tshes brab// de la yang dag nges pa'i don// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te// ya man ta ka ha la lta// srid gsum zhabs 'og 'dus par bsgoms// zhing gi g.yang gzhi'i spyi tsar sgon// sbrul chun thur la
16a6(1): 'phyang bar bya// gzhis ste chas rnams mgo gzhug bzlog/ rus sbal stangs su zhing la 'dug/ seng ldeng 'khar ba hong tshugs bya// rngam pa'i nga ros mi snyan 'byung // gdug pa'i sngags bzlas skyugs glu
16b1(1): blangs// mtshon cha rtse nas 'dzin la sogs// bzlog pa'i dam par yang dag gsungs// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// oM sa ma yA/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ya man ta ka/ ya ma rA dza/ ma ma e ka ti dza dza ma ma srog la
16b2(1): baMbai ri la ri la/ ya ma baM ya ma chum thums ya/ ya ma srog thun snying baM ril b+h+yo/ ya ma kug thun ma ra ya thun thun/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta breng shag dza/ srog la breng shag ma ra ya rbad/ ces ni stong ni phrag brgya bzlas// de
16b3(1): la mtshon rtags ster bar nges// ling ka thod par 'brub// mchod rten nag pos gtad bya na// sngags pa nag po rlag par 'gyur// dpal gshin rje mar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ sme phur srog gi spu gri'i
16b4(1): le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas dpal 'bar chen po yis// 'khor lo bskor ba'i las bshad pa// gzhung dang mthun par yid 'thad gzung // dkyil 'khor gru gsum mthing nag la// zla gam dmar po
16b5(1): 'khor lo brgyad// phyi pa zla gam zod 'phreng can// rab tu mkhas pas bri bar bya// de steng dur khrod ro ras la// bag chus dkar rab sbyangs la// gong dang 'dra bar 'khor lo bri// ya ma brgyad kyi gsang sngags
16b6(1): bri// phyogs bzhir bse mo'i srog snying bri// mtshams su dgug pa'i 'khor lo bri// rabs chad mon gyi thod pa ru// dbus su yab la g.yas g.yon yum// dpral bar ya ma ra tsa'i sngags// mtha' ma bse mo
17a1(1): rje blon dang // yang snying rgyal po thams cad bri// ras kyi dkyil 'khor steng du gzhag/ dkyil 'khor steng du 'khor lo ni// be con ral gri rgya gram can// gsang sngags sbrel ba shri dang
17a2(1): bsam// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed por bsgoms// sgrol ging bdag po ma ru rtse// be con 'khor lo rab tu 'phen// mngag pa'i las byed gzhan ma brgyad// dmag sna 'dren pa'i gyad chen bzhi// dgug byed
17a3(1): dam can pho nya stong // de ltar gsal ba shin tu gces// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs brgyad// 'khor lo 'bru bzhi thugs la gnas// sngo nag ya ma 'khor ba'i tshul// nyams pa'i lus la 'khor lo 'phen// bstan
17a4(1): pa 'jig pa'i dam sri la// rang rgyud las kyi gshin rje bzhi// spyi bo mgrin pa lte ba snying // mig po che la kha yang gdangs// mchu dang so sen rab tu rno// phyi nas dmigs kyis bskul ba yis// nang nas rang srog
17a5(1): rang gis gcod// ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bdag nyid lha ru gsal ba des// ma ru rtse dang shan pa brgyad// sngags dang ting 'dzin 'od kyi btsun// dmigs pa nyid la 'khor lo
17a6(1): 'phang // bdud sngags rtsa bcad 'phrin las byas// nyi ma bzhi ru shes par bya// ya ma rA tsa sa twa me ya/ che ge mo a mo khaM pra mA ra ya/ ya ma rA dza dza la chum/ dza rtsa ra dza rbad/ ra tring chum rtsa rtsa ra tsa rbad/ ya me do
17b1(1): ru Na yo da ya/ che ge mo a mu kham rag ta dza ma ra ya/ tri ling shang ka du/ dza dza ra dza rbad/ p+la khri shig rtsa rtsa ra dza rbad/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ che ge mo a mu khaM mur dza ya 'du sa tri rtsa ra dza rbad/ kha tri kha yag zhung
17b2(1): rtsa rtsa rA dza rbad/ oM sa ma yA/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mu tra/ ya mAn ta ka/ pan dza de ro ni dza/ snying la ya rtsa rtsa rA tsa rbad pho nya las kyi ya ma brgyad// gdug byed gshin rje'i nyin par rgyu// dmar nag ma mo mtshan rangs
17b3(1): rgyu// de la drag po'i thun sngags drangs// ye shes lha rgyud gnas nas bskul// sa ma ya dang khrag skyug bzlas// ya ma snying 'di yang drag tu bzlas// oM tsi bi ri tsa tra ba na sa ma ya tshal ba/ a nri tri trig nan/ mA ra
17b4(1): ya/ a gu sha dza dza dzA nA ga mA ra dza tshal pa/ a rni tri/ trig sna mA ra ya a gu sha dza dza dza/ shu shu shu rag sha ya tshal ba/ a nri trig trig nan mA ra ya/ o gu sha dza dza dza/ a be sha ya tshal pa/ a ni trig nan/ ma ra ya/
17b5(1): a gu dza dza dza/ lha 'dre mi gsum dbang du 'dus// dus gsum dag tu de dag bzlas// de nas 'khor lo ling ga gzhag/ drag sngags rangs pa grangs pa yin// thun dang yungs kar bsngags cing drang // khrag thun
17b6(1): dbab cing pho nya gtang // phyir mi ldog pa'i las byas la// dur khrod gnas sam pho brang 'og/ yi dgas grong ngam klu yi khyim// mkhas pas gtad la bro yis gzir// rtsa rgyud yan chad rlag pa ru// dam tshig
18a1(1): bdag pos yang dag gsungs// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las// drag po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// shal
18a2(1): bsgrub drag po thun gyi las// mthing nag khro zhal lnga pa yi// zhal ni gru gsum gting du bru// mda' gzhu gsum bcas gtsang mar gzugs// rabs chad mon thod mu stu ra rA// drag po thun gyi rdzas bsags
18a3(1): pa// ra khrag mi khrag khri khrag dang // phag gi khrag dang mchin pa sbyar// ra dug btsan dug sbrang dug dang // sa dug shing dug sna dgu bsag/ 'bras dang gro dang til dang khre yi chang // de dag sbyar la dbus su
18a4(1): gzhug/ sa lu sa lu/ dug 'du khrag 'du/ bal phyur ba la phyur/ tshil tshil/ rug rug/ sab sab/ thod par brubs la dbang yang bskur// thod par lha tshogs snying po dgod// de la bzlas pa'i sngags bstan
18a5(1): pa// oM many+dzu shrI ya mAn ta ka hUM/ sa ma yA/ many+dzu kug hUM/ ha ha dam dam/ sa ma yA gu gu thul/ ya man bam ri la de phyi thums thums// rbad rbad sod chod oM kha bo sha/ ka tra pe sha be sha ru pe sha ka thun/ ra ga rag ta/
18a6(1): ma ra ya thun/ tsi pi ri thun/ bra a ni tri thun/ na ga ma thun/ shu gra ri thun/ ces nub re la stong stong khri khri rab tu bgrang // bud med mang po byung ba dang // mon dang zhub can mang po 'byung // khang ba 'tsheg dang
18b1(1): 'od dang sgra// thun ni khol dang rlangs pa dang // gnag dang lbu ba byung 'phar ba dang // sla dang nyung bar gyur pa na// bshags pa bya zhing ma nyes bgrang // de nas 'phang ba'i las bya ste// ye shes lha tshogs thugs
18b2(1): dam bskul// drag sngags de dag bzlas par bya// oM su tri sa mA ya thun/ ba ra tsi ta ma ra ya thun ya/ yo gi shwa ra mA ra ya thun ya/ ya ma tsi ta mA ra ya thun ya/ badz+ra ma hA yag sha mA ra ya thun ya mA ra ya thod pa/
18b3(1): snying la ya thod pa/ rnam shes ma ra ya thod pa/ gzugs phung mA ra ya thod pa/ 'khor bcas ma ra ya thod pa/ dun ting ma ra ya thod pa/ zhes ni gnas la 'phang bar bya'o// rtsa rgyud rlag par dpa' bos
18b4(1): bshad// dpal gshin rje mar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ drag po thun 'bebs pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'jig rten mgon po yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// kye kye srog
18b5(1): bdag 'bar ba che// 'khor lo'i srog gi ngo bo gang // de la bskor lugs du zhig yod// las ni gang byed dpe ni gang // zhes zhus pas// de la yang dag bshad bya ba// 'khor lo'i srog gi ngo bo de// don dam
18b6(1): brjod las 'das pa de// kun rdzob ming dang yi ge las/ gshin rje'i srog gi ngo bo yang // rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor los bya// gnam sa srid pa'i lha srin kun// ma lus 'khor bas 'khor lo yin// srid gsum
19a1(1): lto ba'i grong khyer yin// zhes gsungs so// bskor lugs bsam las 'das gyur kyang // bsgrub bya byin brlabs 'khor lo dang // drag po rang gshed 'khor lo bskor// bsgrub bya dag la phyi nang
19a2(1): gsum// bskor lugs bsam las 'das pa yin// de yang 'chi bdag thod pa'i bsgrub pa dang // ma dang gshin rje bsgrub pa dang // ro ras yi dgas bsgrub pa dang // srog bdag g.yang gzhi'i bsgrub par
19a3(1): gsungs// thod pa nag po ma ra ya// thod pa nag po gnas pa'i grong // 'chi bdag nag po gnas pa'i grong // drag sngags mtshon cha gdug pa'i dpal// dam nyams ru tra dmigs pa'i 'ben// rabs chad thod
19a4(1): pa gnyis rtsal la// 'chi bdag pho mo gnyis byas te// me rlung 'khor lo'i tshul du bya// 'khor lo rtsibs bdun nang du bstan// ral gri dgra yi 'bru bdun dgod// bsgrub sngags 'di dag rgyun du bzlas// oM a
19a5(1): kro te ka ya mAn ta ka/ ya ma me d+ha k+She/ ra dza sa twa/ ru na Na yo ni ra ya tsa ni/ de nas dgra bo'i 'khor lo bskor// drag sngags bdun pa 'di bzlas so// ya ma me d+ha k+She ni dza/ de yi mtshan mo mos sngags drangs// oM
19a6(1): sa ma ya many+dza shrI ya mAn ta ka ya ma ra dza/ ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza/ trag rag sha/ mu tra snying kha rag ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo// nyin mtshan dag la khri khri dang // sgra dang 'od dang 'tshub ma dang // me dang chu dang ri nyal dang // khyi
19b1(1): 'gyed pa dang ri dgas gshor// 'ded dang 'dzin dang 'ching ba dang // gsod dang brdeg dang bshad byed dang // khra dang spyang khu gdung ba dang // mon dang zhib can byung ba na// de tshe las rnams grub pa
19b2(1): yin// 'khor lo lnga la thun la gnyis// nyi ma bdun du las byas na// zla ba bdun na rlag par 'gyur// de la mngon du ma gyur na// sngags pas dam tshig nyams pa yin// phyis ni bsgrubs kyang rang la
19b3(1): ldog/ shi sa 'khor lo lan bdun bskor// hUM ya ma k+She d+ha me phaT/ srid pas 'dus pas sems can la// lus la 'khor lo gnas pa na// 'khor lo zhes ni de la bya// 'byung bas bsdus pas smos ci
19b4(1): dgos// dpal 'bar chen pos yang dag gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gtad pas gshin rje nyid la ste// dngos ni bye ba gung rings so// lha khang ro khung nag po yis// sbrul lce bsnol lam stag gi
19b5(1): kha// de ru gtad mnan thebs par bya// don yod grub pa'i pho brang gtad// de ltar byas na smos ci dgos// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ thod pa nag po 'chi
19b6(1): bdag gi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// de nas dpal 'bar chen po des// ma gtang zhing lpags bsgrub pa ston// ma gtang nag po sngags pa'i gshed// las rnams grub pas bya ba las// las 'di sngas
20a1(1): na rang la gnod// phyin ci log gi tsakra ste// zhing lpags mi ni rabs chad dam// mon pa nag po'i pags pa la// dug khrag dag gis 'khor lo bri// bdag nyid ro langs nag por bsgom// ling
20a2(1): ga khrag dang dug chur byug/ bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor des// gzir byed drag sngags mgo la drangs// nyin bzhi las kyi 'khor lo bskor// de ma grub pa g.yas kyi spog/ lha srin bkug la gnas su
20a3(1): gtad// de ltar bayas na rlag par 'gyur// de nas yang dag nges bshad pa// oM A kro te ka ya mAn ta ka kA la ru pa dza/ ya a hri/ ya ma ra ni dza yak+She ya/ yak+She ra ya ra ni yo da ya/ ya da yon ru do me ya/ ya me
20a4(1): do sa dza ra ma ya/ d+hI te e krin/ a ne a ne/ che ge mo snying khrag rtsa la ya mA ra ya phaT/ drag po ngan sngags klad du grang // ya ma d+ha k+She/ ma me d+ha k+She ya/ d+ha k+She ya me ma/ k+She ya ma me d+ha ya ma du ru ra/ tsa sha na ya/ mu
20a5(1): ka ye/ a pa ye ya ka pa ye/ d+hI d+ha ye/ ha la ye/ che ge mo myag baM ri la/ pra ma ya rbad/ nyi ma dang po'i sngags su shes// ra dza to/ dza sa d+ho ra/ d+ho ra dza d+ha ya/ ya ma du sha dza na ma/ mu ka ye/ a pa ye/ ka pa ye/ pri d+ha
20a6(1): ye ha la ye/ che ge mo myogs bam ri la/ mur dza ya/ rbad ya/ nyi ma gnyis pa'i las yin no// ru na yo ni/ na yo ni ru/ yo ni ru na/ ni tu na yo/ ya ma du ru ra dza sha na la/ mu ka ye/ a sa ye/ ka sa ye/ bri d+ha ye/
20b1(1): ha la ye/ che ge mo myags thums ri la rag ta dza ra ya rbad/ nyi ma gsum pa'i las yin no// ra ya dza ni/ ya dza ni ra/ dza ni ra ya/ ni ra ya tsa/ ya ma du ra dza na la sha/ mu ka ye/ a pa ye/ ka pa ye/ bri d+ha le/ ha la
20b2(1): ye/ che ge mo myags thum ril/ ma ra ya rbad ya/ nyi ma bzhi pa'i las kyi 'grub// bsnur 'gros rus sbal chen po la// rnams thus ru khug 'bru ded pa// ro langs nag po'i las su bshad// de nas yang dag
20b3(1): bshad bya ba// des kyang las la ma grub na// ro langs 'khrug byed g.yas nas bskor// mgo 'dren las sngags ming dang ni// spu gris bsdebs pas gcod par 'gyur// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las yin no// oM hriSh+T+rIHwi
20b4(1): kri ta ka la rU pa dza dza/ ya mak+She d+ha me/ ma kle d+ha ma ya/ k+She d+ha me ya ma d+ha me ma yak+She/ ra ni dza la ya/ ni dza ya ra/ tsa ra ya ni ya ra ni dza/ ra ni yo ni/ ni yo na ra/ yo ni ra ni/ na ra no yo/ ro to sa ya/ to sa dza ru/ sa
20b5(1): tsaru d+ho/ tsa ru to sa/ nyi ma bzhi pa'i las yin no// skra gri 'khor lo 'gro ba 'dra// che ge mo nri a mu khaM/ ma la yam/ da la ye/ kyi bo ye/ li hi ye/ snying khrag kyog zad/ snying khrag kyog rbad rak+Sha dza ya rbad/ sring
20b6(1): khrag myog/ mu ra dza ya rbad/ snying khrag myog ma ra ya rbad/ 'phrin las rdzogs dang lha srin dkrug/ ya ma dkrugs phyung 'jur shag/ ra dza dkrug phyung 'jur shag/ che ge mo klad pa dkrug ma ra ya rbad/ ling ka
21a1(1): 'khor lo bcas pa de// mchod rten khru gang 'og tu gtad// klu yi sa 'am dur khrod gnas// rtsa rgyud rlag par dpa' bos bshad// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ ma tang sme
21a2(1): nag las kyi 'khor lo ro langs nag po'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas dpal 'bar khro bdag rje// dur khrod ras la bsgrub pa bstan// dud khrod ras la 'chi bdag gzugs// kha bgrad mig
21a3(1): bzlog mche ba gtsigs// lag na dbyug pa nag po thogs// de 'dra lho ru 'khor lo bri// rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bya// 'khor lo rtsang mar kha la 'gram// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ya ma
21a4(1): gnas pa'i maN+Dal bri// chag chag thig dang tshon bkye la// gru gsum mthing nag zla gam dmar// 'khor lo nag po dpal kha dmar// bar khyams gnam la zla gam dmar// sgo rigs te ga rus pas bya// rig pa
21a5(1): can gyi lha bkod de// dmar nag 'chol ba'i las mchog yin// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'khor lo dmigs pas bskor ba'i tshe// yig 'bru sum cu rtsa drug la// nyin par 'gug dang rtsa rnam khro// mtshan
21a6(1): mo gsod dag sha khrag za// drag po 'khor lo'i drag sngags so// ra dza sa do ru na yo da ya/ che ge mo a mu khaM/ pra ma ya hUM phaT/ do ru Na yo ni ra yak+She ya/ che ge mo a mu khaM mur dza ya hUM phaT/ yo ni ra ya dza ni ra ma
21b1(1): yA/ che ge mo a mu khaM rag ta dza ra ya hUM phaT/ ya dza ni rA dza ra do me ya/ oM che ge mo a mu khaM ma ra ya hUM phaT/ mtshan ni bse mo'i drag sngags dang // sa ma ya dang khrag skyug bzlas// yang snying thugs kyi rgyal po
21b2(1): brdeg/ yang dag dpa' bos bla med gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya bas// nyin bzhi drag sngags 'di bzhin bzlas// 'jig rten dbang chen gshin rje dang // gdug byed shan pa mang po'i tshogs// btsan
21b3(1): gyi dzag pa 'chas pa ltar// 'jig rten khams kun khengs par bsam// mo 'khor g.yon nas 'khor nas ni// 'gug byed rlung nag 'khor lo yin// ra dza sa do ru Na yod ya/ d+he ru na ya ni ra yak+She ya/ yo ni ra ya
21b4(1): dza ni ra dza sa do me ya/ mtshan bzhi drag sngags 'di ltar bskor// gdug byed gshin rje nag po dang // sgrol ging srog bdag dmar po dang // dbang chen srid gsum ma mo dang // khram thogs gri thogs bdud dang
21b5(1): ging // bdud kyi shan pa srog gcod ltar// khrag dang sha la rol par bsgom// sngags kyang drag la 'dril ba dang // ri rgyal zab dang gnam lcags thogs// spu gri so dang 'dra bar bsam// ra ni dza ya ra ni yod
21b6(1): ya/ to sa dza ra na dza yak+She ya/ yo na ru to sa dza ra/ ya ma ya ra ni yo ni/ ru to me ya/ ming dang spu gri gdags yig ni// 'di ltar bzlas pa dpa' bos bshad// che ge a mu khaM/ snying baM ri la rbad ya/ che ge mo nri/
22a1(1): a mu khaM ru ta nan khaM ti rbad ya/ che ge mo nr-i a mu khaM/ ra ma ra ya khaM du rbad ya/ las rnams rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang // ling ga 'khor lo thod par brub// oM hri Sh+TiHbi kr-i tA mon dang dgra bo ma ra ya
22a2(1): du dza/ oM hriSh+TIHwi kr-i ta mon ta dgra bo ma ra ya nan/ gtad khram las ni 'thebs par bya// sgrol ging gshin rje dmar po dang // bse mo tshogs kyis thun yang brab// drang srong dmod pa rdzogs pa dang / 'phrin
22a3(1): las bro gzir pho brang dang // dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ yi dgas gshin rje ro ras nag po'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas dpal
22a4(1): 'bar khro bo yi// g.yang gzhi nag po'i las 'di bshad// sngags pa nang 'bras 'byung ba 'am// las rnams brkug pas bya ba yin// thog mar bsnyen pa rdzogs pa des// drag po'i las 'di mthar bya ba// drag
22a5(1): sa 'khor lo ma bris kyang // gshin rje nyid kyi thugs la gnas// mi 'jigs dpa' bo brtul zhugs kyis// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal bya// thig bzhi btab pas le tse dgu// phyi rim la tse bcu gnyis la// ye ge
22a6(1): mkhas pas dgod par bya// lcags sam shing nag phur pa dgod// dpal chen gtor ma dgod cing brlab// ya mAn ta ka la sogs pa// drag po'i gtor ma rgyun du dbul// thun gyi 'khor lo 'brub khung du// ra
22b1(1): rog pa 'gal kha la/ ming byang bcu gsum ra la gdags// ma nyes dpang gzugs cho nges btab// gshin rje ma mo bdud dang ging // dus bzhir bskal zhing pho nyas dgug/ lha dang dbye zhing rang la
22b2(1): bstim// dpra rtags rang dang nyams la brtag/ ma ra ya dang tsi bi ris// dus gsum dgug pa'i las kyang bya// khug pa'i drod rtags byung ba dang // gcer bu byung la skra yang rje// maN+Dal tha mar ra khrid
22b3(1): la// bskor ra bya zhing dam can bod// de nas ra des dgra bzlog bya// dmigs pa ra kha bstem la bsgral// g.yang gzhi ma bral bar bshus la// g.yang gzhi'i dbus su sgrub khung ni// ra khrag dug dang sbyar bas
22b4(1): bri// de yi mtha' mar 'khor lo yi// dbus su yi ge nr-i bris la// ra snying ling ga sbrel la bzhag/ drag po'i ngan sngags 'di dag go/ oM sa ma ya/ a r+ya many+dza shrI mu tra ya mAn ta ka san tsa te ro ni dza hUM/ dza ya ra ni//
22b5(1): yo na ru do/ sa rtsa ra ni/ k+She ta me ya ma/ ni ma ra ya/ ya ma snying / ya ma khrag tshal pa baM/ ril dam pa dum bu mA ra ya rbad/ g.yang gzhi drag sngags 'khor lo bskor// nyungs kar nyung nag ske tshe brab// thun dang
22b6(1): rtsang phur gdab par bya// de nas g.yang gzhi gril ba la// tshon sna lnga yi skud pas bdug/ gshin rje bdag gi sme gtor dang // phur pa nag po sor bzhi bsgrag/ gshin rje nag po la sogs pa// shan pa
23a1(1): gri thogs dmar pos khrid// rgya mtsho'i rlung gi bar dag tu// lcags kyi khang rom 'bar ba ru// sgrol bdag bdud la gtad par bsam// ri rab chen po nyid kyis mnan// ye shes lha tshogs bro
23a2(1): yis gzir// ces dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ gshin rje srog bdag g.yang gzhi'i 'khor lo nag po'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de
23a3(1): nas 'jigs byed 'khor gyi gtso bo des/ dpal 'bar chen po rngam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho dang la 'bar chen po lags// phyi rabs bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// dmod pa drag po'i gsang sngags
23a4(1): gang // zhes zhus pas/ legs so 'jig rten mgon po nyon// srog bsgrub gsang ba thugs kyi bcud// srog rten bca' zhing gnod sbyin sten// bla 'gug 'go ba'i lha dang dbye// be con rtsang phur thun gyis
23a5(1): gsad// srog gshed shan pa gri thogs rbad// sgrol ging bse yi gyad chen rbad// ban d+he bon po mu stegs dang // bud med sdig rtag 'khor ba na// gsad pa'i las drug las la sbyar// sgrol ging dmar po mched
23a6(1): bzhi la// gnod sbyin pho mo thams cad bskul// des kyang mi 'dul gang yang med// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dud khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// zla gam
23b1(1): gsum dang 'khor lo bzhi// zla gam dmar nag brgyad kyis mdzes// 'khor lo zla gam yig mtshon te// rig pa can gyi lha grangs dgram// phur ba la sogs lha rdzas dgram// bse 'khor bcas la mnga' yang
23b2(1): gsol// gtor ma gsum dang mtsho bzhi bca'// khrag 'thung gtor ma'i gzer yang bca'// sring mo gsum gyi rdzas kyang bzhag/ rol po lte kar dgra yi gter// so so'i srog gi rkang rdzas bya// nag po spyi
23b3(1): dkar gshin rje la// bya mo rdul thig ro langs ma// rgya mtsho gser zam ti la// ging la mi yi tsit+tas bskang // smug mo mon mgo spyang mun la// dmar mo sbrul mgo shu lan gyi// ser mo 'ug mgo tsa mun
23b4(1): gyi// dkar mo zangs mgo keg mun gyi// de dag srog gam mdangs kyis bkang // yang na smug po ba lag go/ zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ting 'dzin rim dang chu bur tshul// dbang chen
23b5(1): gzhal yas gdan steng du// bdag nyid ya mAn ta ka ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs drug brgad// sngo dang mthing dang ldang nag zhal// be con dgra sta ral gri dang // sdigs mdzub kha dang ban d+ha
23b6(1): dmar// bdud dang ma he'i gdan la bzhugs// k+She dang swa dang ya las ni// yum sras baM chen gdan la bzhugs// khang las mtsho bzhi yis// sku gsung thugs dang 'phrin las dang // de yi phyi rim b+h+yo dzi
24a1(1): las// blon mo dbang phyug sgrol ging tshigs// dpag tu med pas bskor bar bsams// chos nyid dang las sku bzhengs la// so so pho brang dam pa nas// spyan drangs phyag btsal bzhugs pa
24a2(1): dang // mchod bstod bshags pa la sogs bya// de nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya// gshed po la sogs thugs ka ru// rgyu las rang sngags 'khor lo tshul// oM za ma ya shrI many+dzu ya man ta/ ya ma ra tsa/ ma ma e ka
24a3(1): dza ti dza dzA/ trag rag sha mu tra kha mun ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ oM shrI many+dzu ya ma ra ra sa do me ya/ yam yaM thums thums// gshin rje nag po snying khrag la bdun b+h+yo/ ma ru rtsa dza la hur/ dbugs la thums/ srog ya ma yam dza
24a4(1): dzAdza/ oM su tri ba ya/ ba ra tsi ta yo gi sha ra/ ya ma tsit+ta hUM phaT swA hA/ rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bla med brtson// kri ling shang ka du/ dri za yag sha rbad su/ phye ma kha 'dar/ ru ru pra pra duM duM shig shig dgra bo ma ra ya/ rtsa
24a5(1): rtsa rA dza rbad/ kyi krid t+ta khrid ro la khrag 'thung // kang kang keng keng kying kying / tsin d+ha ma ro la khrag 'thung // kang kang keng keng kying kying / sha za ba'i/ snying 'byin pa'i/ khrag 'thung ba'i/ dbugs 'phrog pa'i//
24a6(1): srog gcod pa'i/ snying za'i tsa ta ya/ ma rag sha a tang par la to// sha la kyi spyang kra he kra he hUM phaT/ nyin mtshan ma nor drag po'i mda'// srog ni ting 'dzin bstan pa ru// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu
24b1(1): bshad// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ srog la shan pa dgye ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan dpal 'bar des// 'jig rten grags pa dbang bsdus
24b2(1): la// dgra bo khram la gdab pa'o// drag po las kyi gzer ka gzung // lha srin pho nya 'thab bzhin du// bya rog 'ug pa'i las bya zhing // lha srin dbang du sdud pa'i phyir// bdag nyid sgrol ging bdag po
24b3(1): bsgom// pho nya bkug la tsi bi ri// lha srin dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// oM ya mAn ta ka ya ma rA tsa badz+ra dun b+h+yo/ Ar+ya shri srig swa dza dza sa ma ya stom/ de nas gu gul la sogs pas// 'go ba'i lha rnams rim par
24b4(1): dbye// dbye ba'i sngags rnams bzlas pa'i tshe// thugs las sprul pa'i khro bo yis// snang srid bkang nas lha srin dkrugs// 'go ba'i lha rnams bkrag par bsam// gu gul dud pa drag po des// 'go ba'i lha
24b5(1): la phog par bsam// oM la du sa ma du/ hu lu li/ myos na dag la/ gzer na ya/ a ni trag rag sha ma ra ye phye// de nas pho lha la sogs pa// rdzas dang sngags kyi rim pa dbye// s+thi ru dbye na 'di ltar ro//
24b6(1): rog 'ug pa'i gong ru la// lha dang dgra yi ming bris gdags// ling ka'i mdun rgyab dag tu yang // bya rog 'ug pa'i mtshon gyis bkyig/ gu gul dud pa rgyun du gtang // de rjes pho nyas drag tu dgug/ bstim
25a1(1): dang gdung pa'i las dag bya// de nas ra sbrul ling ga snying // ra yi rdzas rnams chas dgos la// thun dang sreg dang mnan pa bya// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ drag po
25a2(1): shugs sgrol gyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje be con drag po che// 'di yi be shing 'khar ba la// yi dam lha tshogs sngags bris la// rtag tu lag tu mi 'bral bar// mi
25a3(1): rgod bya zhing bgrod dkar 'gro// dgra 'am bgegs kyi bar chad sel// snying po 'di dag drag tu bzlas// oM shriHmany+dzu ya ma rA dza/ u sha nan/ b+han d+ha nan/ gu trang gu trang / ba shan mu ti ma ra ya rbad/ khros na lha
25a4(1): yang rlag par byed// 'jig rten mgon pos yang dag gsungs// de nas yang dag nges bshad pa// shi shing nag po'i phur pa la// rme bdud sna tshogs bdud byas la// drag sngags bzlas shing gdab las
25a5(1): bya// gnan pa'i yang snying las la 'jug/ sgrol ging bdag po'i srog sngags yin// sngags pa nang 'gras byung ba'i tshe// gro gshog shog ras dag la// dgra bo de yi ling ga bri// gru gsum gting du kha sbub
25a6(1): la// drag sngags 'di dag khri phrag gsum// rdzogs sogs khri phrag btab la gzhag/ 'jam dpal dmar pos mnan par bsam// de yi steng mchod rten nag po mnan// oM badz+ra ki li ki li ya ha/ snying la tho
25b1(1): ram/ rag sha snying la rbad/ tsa pa la nan/ khrag zum ral rbad/ ro la rbad/ k+She la maM khug bruM ril rbad/ rol rmugs bruM ril rbad/ ni ma ra ya/ ma ra du/ snying tshal pa shag sha nan/ ha ra ha ra/ k+ShaM k+ShaM dgra bo'i srog
25b2(1): dbugs snying la ya/ nang khrol smad lnga la ya/ phung po rnam shes lnga la ya/ gang la dmigs pa rtsa rgyud rtsag/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rtsang dmar nyi shu rtsa gcig la// drag po'i rtsang dmar bdun 'grabs
25b3(1): la// dbang phyug la sogs sring mo yis// 'byung bshigs shing phung po 'joms// dgra bo'i ling ga bri zhing bsams// khrag rten mchin pa drod rten mcher// dbugs rten glo ba sa rten mkhal// de rnams snying
25b4(1): las gyes pa yin// lan bdun gdab cing rgyun du bzlas/ ling ga dong gi nang du gzhug/ he thums he thums ling ling sod sod/ byin tshig ling srod sod sod/ ku bying ling ga ling sod sod/ sa 'khor sa 'khor
25b5(1): ling sod sod/ thun phob sod sod/ sod sod/ shig shig/ rtsang gis gtsang la thod ngan blugs// drag sngags khri phrag drug bzlas brab// sri mo khros 'drar gtad pa na// rtsa rgyud rlag par dpa' bos bshad// de
25b6(1): nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ra rog bsgral ba'i snying khrag de// ra snying nang ngam ra thod blug/ nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshe la// sngags 'di bzlas te yul mkhar 'phang // tri ling shang ka du tri za yag sha rbad su//
26a1(1): phye ma kha 'da' ru ru pra pra dum dum shig shig/ dgra bo ma rA ya/ ting sa thun// ting ling shang ka thun/ 'bum khri k+She ni baM 'du sa tri/ ra tri chum/ bla tri shig/ snying khrag rbad/ las kyi khrag zun gsang
26a2(1): ba'i gter// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ yo ma thun gyi las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar ba des srog gshed
26a3(1): drag po'i las 'di gsungs so// brag dmar stag gzig 'dra ba'i gnas// nags tshal thug pa'i gnas phyin la// srog la chan pa gdab pa'i las// rabs chad thod pa nag po la// rgyab tu rdo rje rgya gram la// hri
26a4(1): stiste bzhi yi sngags kyis bskor// nang du 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// drag sngags bzhi pas mtshan par bri// dbus su gru gsum ling ga gzhag/ 'brub khung gru gsum sring srings la// skar khung btod la rtsang gis
26a5(1): skor// bdag nyid ya mAn ta kar bsgoms// khrag dang dug dang lcags phye dang // nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshes brab// oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA tsha ma ma e ka dza ti dza/ de la rgun gyi las rnams bya// de nas drag tu
26a6(1): las byed dus// drag sngags 'di dag bzlas shing brab// na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mo be sha ma ra se/ na tra gus ra se/ gu ha ka te sa te/ ta pa na ku pa ra ma ta sha mi/ a nu ru pa/ su ru pa/ na ta ku pa ra tsa tra kha na
26b1(1): dza khi he mo ha sa/ ku pa ra na/ he ma ha nan/ gu ha ka/ tsa la tsa la/ pa tsa pa tsa su lu su lu sa ha/ kri li sha ga du tri za yag sha rbad/ su phye ma kha 'da' ru ru pra pra duM duM shig shig/ dgra bo ni ma ra ya/ rnal ma rnal te
26b2(1): gsod la rngam/ gshog la mer/ sris la chums/ thu bi thu lcags kyi pra/ dgra bo ma ra ya/ bdud pra ma ya/ du ru du ru/ ha ra ti ha ra ti/ nag po dza pi dza ya/ dgra bo srog ma ra ya rbad/ ces pa'i drag sngags khri phrag
26b3(1): bzhi// rdzogs dang mchod rten rmang du gnan// srog rtsa zod bsgrub mnan pa'i las// drag sngags 'phrul thabs ma shes na// sngags pa'i srog la bar chad 'byung // dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud
26b4(1): las/ shan pa sgrol byed kyi las bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed dpal 'bar chen po des/ sgrol ging bse'i gyad chen po'i drag sngags 'di gsungs so// rdza klud
26b5(1): dmar nag 'jigs pa ru// gtso bo'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa des// 'brub khung nag po khru gang ba// dug khrag dag gis zhal zhal byas// ra sbyang thod pa rnag pa'i rdzas// 'khor lo bri bar shes par bya// dpa' bo
26b6(1): chen pos 'jig rten 'dod// nyi shu gcig gis sod par 'gyur// nyi zer zla zer skar zer la// rbad cing bla ni dgug par bya// grib so byung dang nyi ma nub// nam gyi gung la gsad par bya// las rnams rdzogs
27a1(1): par gyur pa dang // skya rengs dang po shar ba dang // dgra bo mchod rten rmang du mnan// las sngags dag ni gtad sngags bzlas// dug dang khrag skam nyungs kar gyis// dus gsum dag tu brab
27a2(1): par bya// ra dmar snying dang sha khrag la// gtor ma byas te dbul bar bya// 'od dang sgra dang rta pa dang // zhi ba chen mon pa mang po 'byung // sems can gsod dang rta rgyug dang // 'khrug pa'i rus skos byed pa
27a3(1): ni// gshin rje bsgrub pa'i rtags yin no// mtshon thogs pa dang ra khrid dang // ra dang ri dwags gshor ba dang // dngos grub byung na bla khug pas// de'i tshe gsang sngags gdags par bya// sha khur snying khyer byung
27a4(1): bab na// las rnams 'grub pas gtang rag gtang // oM ya he phaT/ ma ho phaT/ shu ho phaT/ ma ru rtse phaT/ nyi phaT/ hUM hUM phaT/ dzaM dzaM phaT/ dzaM dzaM dgra bo'i srog la dzaM/ nyi phaT/ hUM hUM phaT/ sa mu ye phaT/ oM sa ma ya/
27a5(1): phug phug/ rtog rtog/ tsit+ta phyung / snying la tshal pa kha raM tshal pa b+h+yo/ khaM khaM snying la khaM/ phyung phyung tsit+ta phyung / tsag shu baM ri la/ thum thum ril snying la ya/ snying khrag khong nas phyung la shog/ che ge mo mA ra ya/ bla rtags
27a6(1): byung nas zhag gsum du// ling ka dag la brab par bya// skabs su thun gyis brab pa'i las// oM ya ma shu tri ya dun/ ma ru ram pa sa la ya/ mug ni mug rbad/ rbad du rbad sa ya sni/ che ge mo rbad rbad/ sha la rbad
27b1(1): rbad/ rus la rbad rbad/ sog la rbad rbad/ dbugs la rbad rbad/ nyungs kar dug dang khrag gis brab// myur du rlag par gdon mi za// bsnyen dang bsgrub pas las sbyar la// gdug pa'i gnas su gtad khram
27b2(1): bya// 'jam dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ sgrol ging dmar po shan pa gsod byed kyi le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po des/ gshin rje
27b3(1): dmar po snying 'byin gyi las/ spu gri ngar mo 'di gsungs so// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i shan ma rir// sngags pa dam tshig ldan pa des// 'brub khung nag po khru gang du// dpangs su sum brtsegs dag tu bya// rtsang
27b4(1): dmar bdun gyis kha yang bskor// dur khrod mon thod nag po la// khrag dang dug gi lde khus byug/ nang du dgra bo'i ming bcug la// bdag nyid lha ru gsal ba des// lag phur sor brgyad pa la ni// 'jam
27b5(1): dpal dmar po gsal bsgom gdab// nyungs kar khro chung bsams la brab// sngags pa mi ngas mi tshig spangs// ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ gshin rje dmar po dgra bo'i snying po la// bruM bruM/ me ru ka/ srog la
27b6(1): hurur thums/ kri ling shang ka du rbad/ ma ra ya snying 'khril/ srog la ya hur thums rbad thums rbad thums/ rtse rang ru rtsa rtsa ra dza rbad/ drag sngags drag la 'gril bar blangs// nyi shu gcig la rlag par
28a1(1): 'gyur// dkar nag rdzas dang yungs kar brab// phung pa ling ka'i snying la gdab// phud dang gtor ma rgyun du gtang // zla ba bdun la rlag par 'gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'ba' ba'i rme
28a2(1): rgyud las/ gshin rje dmar po shan pa sgrol byed kyi drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar chen pos/ bsad pa srog gi las srin po dmar nag srog rtsa
28a3(1): nag po zhes bya ba'i drag sngags 'di gsungs so// dam tshig ldan pas dam can bod// lung pa nag po nags tshal can// shan pa khyi khrid rgyu ba'i sa// 'brub khung nag po khru gang 'bru// thod pa nag por ling ga
28a4(1): bca'// dam rdzas tshogs kyis mnyes par bya// nyungs kar la sogs rdzas kyis brab// bdag nyid lha ru gsal ba des// drag sngags spu gri 'dra ba yis// dmigs pa myal dmyal gsod par bsam// be con
28a5(1): rdeg cing sdigs mdzub sgreng // so bsgo bdam shing nyungs brdeg/ mi khyi'i sgra yang spang bar bya// rnal ma rnal te srog la rngam/ ha ba le ho ba le nan// du ru du ru/ tu tra ru tra dza/ b+hi sha d+ha ra/ che ge mo'i snying la khril
28a6(1): phril/ mA ra ya phaT rbad/ nyi shu gcig na ma ra na/ de dus gtang rag gtang ba gces// thod pa dur lung nag por gtad// mchod rten nag po khru gang bas// thod pa'i steng nas mnan pa bya// dpal gshin rje
28b1(1): dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ srin po dmar nag shan pa rngam byed kyi drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsad pa srog gi las/ gnod sbyin dmar
28b2(1): po mi kun gyi drag sngags 'di gsungs so// dur khrod la sogs gnas dag tu rnal 'byor dam tshig ldan pa yis// ya mAn ta ka gsal bsgoms la// rabs chad thod pa kha yel du// dug dang khrag gis gru gsum
28b3(1): bri// dbus su ling ga gan rkyal gzhag/ sdigs mdzub gtad cing nyungs kar brdeg/ phud dang gtor mas mnyes par bya// bdun gsum lon nas dur khrod du// dur g.yam dag la rgya gram bri// de nas drag
28b4(1): sngags 'khor lo bskor// ya ma ra dze hUM phaT/ mu mu mu hUM phaT/ khu khu hUM phaT/ cha cha hUM phaT/ rje ta ya rje ta ya hUM phaT/ dur dur dur hUM phaT/ mi khyi sgra yang g.yeng mi bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar
28b5(1): nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las// gnod sbyin dmar po srog zan gyi drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdud sgrol ging dmar po'i drag sngags 'di gsungs
28b6(1): so// 'chi bdag bdud kyi sde dpon ni// khram bdag 'bru'i snying stig las// 'brub khung nag po khru gang du// 'brub khung kha la rtsang dmar bskor// nang du ming dang rus bcug la// drag sngags 'di nyid bzlas
29a1(1): shing brab// bdud pra ma ya/ rag sha pa dza rbad/ mA ra ya she dza rgug pa kha'i// mur ta ya/ ru pa dza kha thums/ sne ling sha la sha dza/ ti la nag nyungs nag khrag gis brab// nyi shu gcig la ma ra
29a2(1): ya// ling ga ho la sreg la gtang // dgra bo ma ra ya ni ag ni dza la raM/ ma ra ya na sha sha phaT rbad/ ces btags la bsreg par bya// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ bdud ma ru rtse las
29a3(1): kyi shan pa'i drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ srog bdag ma ru rtse las kyi shan pa srog lan gyi drag sngags 'di gsungs so// srog gshed dmar po bse yi
29a4(1): gyad/ shugs sgrol drag po nye ba'i thugs// las kyi ging chen gsang ba'i bdud// srog rtsa sgril ma'i bar na gnas// de yi drag sngags bshad bya ba// oM tri ling shang ka thun// tri pa dza la tri dza pa la/ sad du ya ne//
29a5(1): shu me tri kar tri kar// hu ha ra hu ha ra/ dma' ra tse srog la chod chod/ che ge mo srog la 'drig sho 'grig sho/ rtsa ru thum ling / gug zum ling // mug dma' ra rtse rbad/ lha bsnyen gong du song ba des// ra tsa dkar
29a6(1): po gnya' nag la// dmigs pa'i ling ga bcu gsum gdags// 'brub khung nang du ra btags la// drag sngags bzlas shing yungs kar brab// rtsa ra sod dang dgra rtags 'byung // ra bshas gtang rag gtang
29b1(1): bar bya// yang na ra dkar snying nag du// dgra bo'i ling ga bcug pa yang // 'brub khung bcug la sngags rnams brab// 'od dang sgra dang khang pa 'tsheg/ srog gcod pa dang ra gsad na// dgra la rtags ni 'byung
29b2(1): bar 'gyur// yang na snying kar snying kas btum// 'byung bas dus la smos ci dgos// dpal gshin rje dmar nag gi rme rgyud las/ ma ru rtse shugs sgrol gyi drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug
29b3(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ sa bdag chen mo las kyi 'khor lo'i drag sngags 'di gsungs so// de yang dur khrod 'jigs pa ru// maN+Dal 'brub khung khrag gis byug/ dur
29b4(1): khrod ras la bcu drug rtsibs// dur khrod dbus su ming bris tha ma ru// thod 'phreng me ri la sogs bri// mon nag thod pa'i thun yang bca'// bskyed pa'i rim pa 'di lta ste// ya mAn ta ka gsal ba dag/ srog gi
29b5(1): snying po nyid kyis su// bskyed dang spyan drangs mchod pa phul// bsnyen 'di ltar dbul bar bya// oM su tri pa ya/ ba ra tsi ta/ ya gi sho ra/ ya ma tsi ta hUM phaT/ swAhA/ bsnyen pa rdzogs pas 'khor lo ni// nyin mtshan
29b6(1): brgyad du bskor byas la// thun las nyin gcig gnan las gcig/ nyi ma bdun gyis rdzogs par bya// oM su tri pa ya che ge mo nr-i ma ra ya rbad/ rtsa rtsa rA dza rbad/ ya ba kri su che ge mo mA ra ya rtsa rtsar
30a1(1): dza rbad/ ba ra tsit+ta che ge mo ni ma ra ya rbad rtsa rtsa ra dza rbad// ta tsi ra pa che ge mo ninri ma ra ya rtsa rtsa ra rtsa rbad/ yo gi sha ra che ge mo ni/ ra ma ya rbad rtsa dza ra dza rbad/ ra sha ki yo che ge mo ni ma ra ya rbad/
30a2(1): rtsa rtsa rA dza rbad/ ya ma tsi ta che ge mo ni ma ra ya rbad/ rtsa rtsa rA dza rbad/ ya ma tsi ta che ge mo ni ma ra ya rbad/ rtsa rtsa rA dza ya rbad/ ta tsi yo ma che ge mo ni mar ya rbad/ ces nyi ma bzhi ru bya// mon mo mang po cho nges
30a3(1): 'debs// me 'bar 'od dang rlung nag dang // shwa dang ser ba drag po 'byung // oM su tri a thod dmar ya/ che ge mo'i srog la thun/ ba ra ra tsit+ta thod dmar ya che ge mo'i srog la thun/ yo gi shwa ra zod dmar ya/
30a4(1): dgra bo'i srog la thun/ ya ma tsit+ta thod dmar ya che ge mo'i srog la thun/ thun ni ling ga dag la bstim// phud dang gtor mas mnyes par bya// so so'i dam rdzas dag gis bskang // las rnams bsdug na bya ba
30a5(1): las// kun gyis byas na rlag par 'gyur// dam can gnad la dbab pa las// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ bse mo las kyi 'khor lo'i drag sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu
30a6(1): bdun pa'o// // de nas 'jigs rten mgon po des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// rdo rje nang dme drag po 'am// las rtags bsgrub rtags med cing // las rnams 'gor na ji ltar bya// dur
30b1(1): khrod chen por rab bzung la// sngags pas brtul zhugs spyod pa'i tshe// ras dar nag po'i gos gon nas// dpral bar me long gdags bya zhing // mgo la dar sngon thod kyang bcings// yi dgas ro yi stan la
30b2(1): 'dug/ lho yi phyogs su kha bltas la// gshin rje'i sku la lta zhing bsgom// de nas langs nas spyod pa'i tshe// seng ldeng 'khar ba 'dom gang la// oM tsug bya zhing sdigs mdzub bsgreng // nga rgyal bya zhing zhe sdang
30b3(1): gis// snying po yi ge bcu bdun bzlas// de'i tshe mtshan rtags mang po 'byung // sku gzugs bzhad dam 'gul pa'am// lung bstan sgra 'am gzigs brnyan nam// rmi lam rtags rnams mang du 'byung // de nas
30b4(1): bstod cing 'phrin las brtsam// bsnyen pa'i sngon rtags ma byung na// sa ma ya la sel yod pas// lus ngag 'bad pa'i bshags pa bya// des kyang mngon du ma gyur na// las 'phro med dam bsod nams zhan// de
30b5(1): yis bya ba ma yin pa// kun gyis byas na rang la gnod// ces gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa bka' bzlog nag po zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// oM sa ma ya ar+ya many+dzu shrI mu tra/ ya
30b6(1): mAn ta ka pa na dza ta ro ni ruM dza/ oM a kro d+he ka ya mAn ta ka kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ ta a bri ya mAn ta ka ka la rU pa grongs shig/ shri te kro ha ha rbad/ shri d+he kro ha ha ni 'gal byed sod rbad/ 'gal byed gtso bos khang
31a1(1): khang thums/ sa ma ya man du kug ta hUM/ de phyi thums zums/ he ta ha daM daM/ sa ma ya gu gu thul/ ya man baM rim ram/ rbad rbad sod sod chod chod/ de dag sngags kyi 'khor lo ste// bskal pa'i
31a2(1): mtshon cha 'khrig la// 'gal byed nyal nyal gcod par bsam// yum sras la yang de shes bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// des kyang sgrol bar ma gyur na// sngags kyi 'khor lo lto nas
31a3(1): bzlog/ khram par ming dang rnam shes spel// rtsa rtsa ra dza rbad ces gdags// de yis khams gsum sgrol bar nus// yi ge gnad yig bzlog pa yis// lha nyid gnad la phab pa yin// de bzhin kun la shes par
31a4(1): sbyar// las nyid rang srog 'chad ces gsungs so// de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// bse mo'i srog snying bzlog zhabs la// dgug pa'i yang snying bzlas brtag ste// nyin gyi las su shes par bya// sgrol ging srog
31a5(1): sngags gto bzlog la// mtshon cha nag po gdags par bya// de lha'i las 'di 'byung 'gyur na// 'jig rten rlag par dpa' bos bshad// ces gsungs so// de nas yang dpal 'jigs byed chen po
31a6(1): des// gsang ba thugs kyi bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dur khrod rab tu 'jigs pa ru// sa cho ga gtor ma gtang nas kyang // dur khrod sa la maN+Dal ni// gru gsum mthing nag zla gam can// thod pa'i 'phreng bas
31b1(1): rnam par brgyan// bar khyams gnag la zla gam dmar// sgo rigs zla gam re res mtshan// dbus su hUM zhes bri bar bya// de nas yig mtshon dgod pa dang // lcags phur dag la gtso bo'i sngags// bzlas te
31b2(1): grol la dbus su dgod// rang rang phur bu rang sngags kyis// zla gam dag la yum sras dang / phyi rim bse yi lha mo dang // blon po 'khor bcas dgod par bya// sgra rnams bud bsgreng 'dud pa dang // skyug ma
31b3(1): tshigs ni lha ma la// khrag gis byugs te dbus btsugs la// bse mkhar chen por byin gyis brlabs// so so'i mchog ni bse phur du// mar khu sbrang rtsi khrag dang ni// 'o ma la sogs phyogs bzhir
31b4(1): bca'// mtshams su khrag ni gzhag par bya// bla mtsho chen po bsad du bsam// lho sgor mar me lnga brgya gtang // shar lho mtshams su ho nag bca'// lho nub gru gsum gnad thod bca'// nub byang 'brub khung
31b5(1): dag tu ni// sgro dang dug gi rgya mtsho la// rtsang la ling ga spring rtsang gzhag/ byang shar 'brub khung dag tu ni// phur ba'i tshogs rnams sbrang phur bya// pho nya rnams kyi rdzas la dgod// so so'i ling ga bcas la
31b6(1): gzhag/ dbus su mu su ra dag gam// mon thod nang du thun bcas la// lha rnams tshang ba'i sngags bkod la// dur khrod ras la bris pa yi// 'khor lo dag tu gtums la gzhag/ rgyun gyi rnag pa de la bya// dam
32a1(1): rdzas tshogs ni 'tshogs byas la// sngags pa gdeng ldan dpa' bo des// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin 'jug/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dang po sems nyid rnams dag
32a2(1): stong // nam mkha' 'dra ste 'di zhes bstan du med// de ltar ma rtogs sems can 'khor ba la// snying rje nyi zla 'od ltar snyoms par bya// rang sems skye med yi ge a ru bsam// skye med nyid las ma 'gags
32a3(1): dbang chen shar// dur khrod khyod shug a nyid gdan steng 'gro// hUM/ bskal ba'i me dpung 'bar bas brjid// khams gsum gdug pa dbang sdud bran du 'khol// spros 'dus mthing nag rdo rje dag tu
32a4(1): 'gyur// gsar rnying sa bon rgyu dang 'bras bu cig go/ oM a kro d+he ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hUM phaT/ gtum chen rab 'bar ha la'i gad rgyangs sgrogs// mthing nag ral pa kham nag gyen du
32a5(1): brdzes// spyan dgu stang thabs gru gsum mthing nag 'bar// rdo rje be con kha T+wAM rde'u dang // sdigs mdzub dgra sta dbyug to b+han d+ha dmar// rigs lngas dbu brgyan khro bo'i chas kyis brgyan// spyan nas me 'bar
32a6(1): smin mtshams glog stong 'gyur// spyan nas 'brug sgrogs shangs nas rlung nag 'tshub// zhabs gnyis gyad kyis bgrad pas gdug pa 'dul// de 'dra'i sku ni bdag nyid rnam par bsam// muM tro ti sho ri nag mo
32b1(1): rog sha dza dza/ lha mo'i nang nas ro langs me 'bar ma// spyan gsum khro gnyer 'jigs pa'i kha yang gdangs// zod sbrul lus brgyan sgra ma rdzes gsus po che// tri shul zod rlon khrag gis rab tu bkang // rlung nag
32b2(1): bcibs pa'i ban chen gdan la bzhugs// ma ma trag sha nag mo kha li baM dza b+h+yo/ sgrol bdag nag mo mche gtsigs rngam pa'i sku// sgeg mo ral gcig g.yu yi ral gcig ma// gser g.yu mu tig rin chen bai DA
32b3(1): r+ya// pu sha rag 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros// khrag mtsho mtha' nas skems shing lcags phur 'dril// spu gri tsit+ta 'bar ba phyag na bsnams// ra rag ta ma 'da' la hUM/ stong gsum bdal ba'i khrag gi rgya mtsho
32b4(1): 'khrug/ khrag mtsho mtha' med 'khyil ba'i klong yangs su// yi dwags dregs pa'i gdan la dmar nag bzhugs// hUM badz+ra kro d+he yag sha ma ra rtse hUM/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal ma ru rtse// dmar
32b5(1): nag gtum khro 'jigs pa'i me// gtum po'i tshogs kyis khams gsum khyab par spros// ma he smug nag bcibs shing stong khams rgyu// phyag g.yas rdo rje be con dregs pa 'dul// g.yas pa mtshon cha'i 'khor
32b6(1): los srid gsum sgrol// thugs las 'gug byed dza 'phros pas// dza las sprul pa'i pho nya ma// lce spyang nag mo khrag gi ral pa can// 'jigs byed kha gdangs mche ba zang yag gtsigs// gdug pa'i lce yis stong
33a1(1): khams brlab cing len// spyang mo 'jigs byed bzhi yis rab bskor te// gdug pa'i nga ros spyang ngus di ri ri// ru ru ro ru tsa pa la nag mo dun b+h+yo/ dza las sprul ba'i sa bdag bse mo bzhi// sku
