33a2(1): mdog phyag mtshan ma nges sprul pa mo// dbang gi cod pan dar nag cod pan can// pa tri pa ya/ ba ra tsi ta/ yo gi shwa ra ya ma tsi ta/ dza las srid gsum pho nya'i tshogs// kang ka mchu rings tshogs dang ni// li
33a3(1): 'du'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams// dpag tu med pas rab bskor te// dgra rnams sha la rol bar bsam// ye shes pho brang dam pa dang // rang gnas 'jig rten grong khyer gnas// gdug pa 'dul phyir spyan
33a4(1): drangs mchod// ces gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag gsungs so// oM sa ma ya/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mu tra/ ya man ta ka/ pan dza re ro ni hUM dza/ he la dza tra pan dza ru
33a5(1): pa ni/ ku lan dza sa ma ya/ nA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ gu gul thul/ mA ra ya/ ya man/ baM ri la rbad rbad/ sod chod sod chod/ oM many+dzu ya mA na ta ka u ts+tsha ma ma kro d+ha pe ta li/ muM kro d+hi shwa ri dza dzA/ rag sha yag sha snying la
33a6(1): ya shes/ dun ting dun ting mug/ ma ra ya/ sod chod sod chod/ oM many+dzu shrI ya ma ra dza/ ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza/ trag rag sha mu tra snying kha rag mo b+h+yo/ nag mo kha li baM dza b+h+yo/ kha 'gram mu 'gram za 'gr-i b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo
33b1(1): mA ra ya/ snying la ril ril du pa ya na rbad rbad/ oM shri many+dzu ya ma ra dza sa do me ya/ yaM tha yaM thums thums/ gshin rje dmar po dgra bo'i snying khrag la dug b+h+yo/ ma ru rtse dza la hur/ dbugs thums srog la yaM yaM dza
33b2(1): dza/ ku lan d+ha ri dza dza hUM/ tsa mun da ri dza dza hUM/ kang kang da ri dza dza hUM/ khyi khrid ra khrid ro la khrag 'thung / kang kang keng keng kying kying / tsan d+ha ma ril khrag 'thung / kang kang keng keng kying kying / sha za ba'i//
33b3(1): snying 'byin pa'i/ khrag 'thung ba'i// dbugs 'phrog pa'i// srog gcod pa'i/ ro za ba'i// tsi ta ma ra ya sha za/ a tang par la/ sha la kyi spyang / kra he kra he hUM phaT/ gshin rje dmar nag 'bum khri dang // sprul pa
33b4(1): bsam 'das ma tshogs dang // dregs pa lha srin thams cad kun// sprin phung bzhin du 'du bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// drag po las kying shan pa dgod// gsad pa'i drag
33b5(1): sngags drag po'i las/ de nas slob dpon khyed rengs gdon// g.yon la khrag byugs dbus ni nag po bya// lag pa khrag byugs sgra yang brdzes// dar nag zod bcings mi spags gon// rak+ta se ral me long
33b6(1): dpral// seng ldeng thogs la gshed po bsgom// bud med gdong pa nag por byug/ g.yas pa sle nag ming nas 'bod// g.yon pa lcags kyu 'dren tshul bya// khyo ga gdong pa rak+tas byug/ ska yi zhags pas ling ga
34a1(1): 'then// kun kyang zhabs ma nang rjes la// gshed po ral gcig sgrol ging bsgom// yang snying thugs kyi rgyal po zlo// ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag nges gsungs so// dgug pa'i sngags
34a2(1): rnams bzlas pa'i tshe// bdag gi sgra yi bu ga nas// lcags kyu zhags pa thogs pa yi// khro bo 'jigs pa 'khor bcas kyis// dgra bo dgug cing bstim pa yang // ling ga dag la gnas par bsgom// de bzhin
34a3(1): dkyil 'khor lha rnams la// rang rang lta ba'i sprul pa yis// 'jig rten gang zhing dgra bo dgug/ ling ga dag la bstim bzhin bzlas// ye shes lha rnams thugs dam bskul// sgrol ging bse yi lha mo dang // pho
34a4(1): nya mang po dran med gang // rig pa lha yi rdzu 'phrul can// srid pa gsum gyi bya ra ma// sku la ye shes 'od 'bar ma// srid gsum gsal byed pho nya mngag/ snang srid dbang du 'dul bya zhing // dgug dang dbye ba
34a5(1): snol mar rgyud// ces gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sme phur gyi yang snying 'di gsungs so// che ge mo nri ra dza/ 'gal byed brod/ rlag byed gtso bos khang khang thums// sa ma ya many+dzu kug ta hUM/
34a6(1): a nu ra ga ya mAn ta hUM/ de phyi thums thums/ he sta ha ma sa ma ya gu gu thul/ ya man baM rim/ rbad rbad sod chod sod/ tses bzlas pa bya'o// che ge mo ni ya man ta ga la ru pa grongs shig/ shriHte kro ha ha/ shriHpi
34b1(1): dza ya kham thums/ zhes pas drag tu bskul bar bya'o// che ge mo ni dum ru ma bu tsi tu ra dum gcig/ khrag dug kha kha zums thums/ ma du ma tsi/ ru ru sa ya na/ mA ra ya rbad/ des kyang rab tu gsad par
34b2(1): bya'o// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru tra rbad/ raka sha rbad/ ma ma snying rtsa zad/ kha thun rbad/ rA ra ya rbad/ thal phung zal phung / ma ma thun ma ma thun/ rbad du zad du/ sa du yaM/ tsit+ta ya/ ru bruM sa ma ya/ ma ra du thams sa rba
34b3(1): ru thums ya na rbad/ ces ni tun dang phur bus brab/ tri ling shing ka du ri za yag sha rbad/ phu phye ma kha 'da' ru ru pra pra dum dum shig shig/ dgra bo ma ra rtsa rtsa ra dza rbad/ gsad cing rlag par byed pa'i
34b4(1): sngags// oM ga ga ta ya ga ta ya/ sarba du saT na/ phaT phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba sa saM/ phaT phaT/ hUM hUM badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti sarba big nam/ ka ya waka tsit+ta ki la ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ drag tu bzlas shing
34b5(1): gnad du gdab// gnan pa dang bsreg pa'i las kyang bya// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ spre phur thugs kyi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// // de nas
34b6(1): yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po des sme phur gyi yang snying 'di dag gsungs so// oM a kro d+he ka ya man ta ka/ a mu khaM ya ma rA dza/ a mu khams sa do me ya/ a mu khaM/ ya me do ru/ a mu khaM/ Na yo ta
35a1(1): ya a mu kha/ ya da yo ni a mu kha/ ra yak+She ya a mu kha/ lak+She yats+tsha a mu kha/ ni ra ma ya a mu kha/ ma br-iSh+TiHwa kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sa ma ya/ che ge mo ni ki la ki la ya ma ra ya rbad zad/ phye rag
35a2(1): sha rag sha hUM/ nr-i mA ra ya/ staM pa ya nan/ mgal me 'khor lo bskor ba 'dra// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ra ya 'khor lo nag pos ru tra bsgral ba'i sme phur yang snying 'di gsungs
35a3(1): so// ya ma ra ni dza yak+She ya/ ya khye ya ra ni/ yo da ya/ na yo ta ya ru do me ya/ ya me do sa dza ra ma ya/ ming trig nan a gu sha dza dza/ ma ra ya hUM dza/ stam pa ya nan/ ma ra ya rbad/ ban d+he nang 'gras rlag par
35a4(1): 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ra ya 'khor lo nag pos ru tra bsgral ba'i las 'di gsungs so// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal bya// dbus ni gru
35a5(1): gsum mthing nag la// zla gam dmar po gsum gyis ston// 'khor lo brgyad ni nag por bya// rabs chad thod pa kha sbyar la// pho thod mtshon cha 'khor lor bsam// mo thod lcags kyi 'khor lor
35a6(1): bsam// 'khor lo pho bskor mo bskor bri// pho thod spyi bor bug pa dbug/ thod pa gri bo'i khrag gis byug/ steng gi 'khor lo'i phyi rol du/ ri rab 'khor lo bri bar bya// de ltar byas pa'i 'khor lo de// dbus kyi
35b1(1): mthing nag e la gzhag/ de yi nang du ling ga gzhag/ ro ras shing lo rgya shog la// ra khrag kho bo yag stag gis// legs par bris la gnan yig dgod// nyi ma bzhi ru 'khor lo bskor// khrag dang sdug rnams
35b2(1): rab tu bsdug/ de nas thod pa'i 'khor lo de// ro ras gtums la 'brub khung gzhug/ mchod rten nag po khru gang la// baM rim lnga ru yod pa yis// khong seng can gyi thod pa mnan// bum pa'i 'og tu skar khung
35b3(1): gdod// bum pa ya man ta ka'i sngags// lha tshogs du ma'i sngags bris gzhug/ rab tu gnas pa dag kyang bya// rtag tu de la bskor bya zhing // mchod pa dag kyang rgyun du dbul// pho nya mang pos gzir gnon
35b4(1): bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs so// oM sa ma ya/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ya man ta ya ma ra dza e ka dza ti dza/ ma ra dza sa do me ya/ ya me du ru Na yo da ya/ ya
35b5(1): da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She ya dza ni ra ma ya/ dgra bo tsit+ta la ma ra ya hUM phaT dza/ shrI mun dzu ya ma ra tsa dza dza/ ya man ta ka a ka tsi ta dzi/ che ge mo tsi ta khar rbad rbad/ che ge mo tsi ta khar rbad rbad/ gshaM du rtsi grug
35b6(1): ling rbad/ dgra bo ni hur thums dza/ oM shri many+dzu ya ma rA tsa be ta le snying kha rag sa ma ya thum ri la rbad/ ya ma ra dza sa sa do me ya/ khrag la do ru me ya dgra bo'i glad pa la ha/ hi ho re baM ri la rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa do
36a1(1): me ya/ ya me do ru k+Sha ye/ mgo tshod che ge mo glo snying snying bsnid ma ra ya/ do ru me ya byi tsa ye sing ga ye/ bri ta yo/ tsa ta ye/ byi tsa se/ ha la se/ che ge mo trig nan/ nri ma ra ya hur thums dza/ nri ma
36a2(1): ra tsi ta/ myag zum ril rbad/ che ge mo nr-i ma ra ya rbad/ gsang sngags ga'u nag po gsang ba'i 'khor lo rdo rje dme 'thab lcags kyi khang bu drag sngags snying po gsang ba'i rgyud ces gsungs so// de la yang ni
36a3(1): bshad bya ba// nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshe dang // bsnol khrag sme khra dug rdzas dang // lcags phye dag la sogs la bzlas// dus gsum brab shing gzir ba na// rtsa rgyud rlag par yang dag bshad// ces
36a4(1): gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sme phur gyi las gzhug gi chings 'di gsungs so// mdzo rtol de'u'i thod pa 'am// khams gshed brtsis pa'i thod pa la// spyi bor rdo rje rgya gram dang // ri rab gling
36a5(1): bzhis lam dar bcas// thod pa lcags kyi mun khang la// 'chi bdag ral ba tsar dgu bzhugs// sbrul nag stong gi gdan stengs na// gshin rje dbyug pa nag po bsnams// de la gzas pa gtad bya
36a6(1): ba// ral gri 'bar bas sa dral nan// ral pa tshar dgu gsal pa dang // kye ma 'di nas tod pa gshed kyi mun khang na// baM ri gtams pa'i dur khrod na// khrag 'tsho 'khyil ba'i gling dkyil na// gnod sbyin kun
36b1(1): gyi tshogs chen rje// klu srin kun gyi dmag dpon te// gson gshin gnyis kyi zam kha ba// dkon mchog spyi dgrar gyur pa ni// khyod la gtad kyi sho ra re// de skad bdag kyang rab tu brjod// bsgom zhing phyag rgya
36b2(1): rab tu gsal// ya rtag dam rdzas gtad cing dra ba// sngags brab drang srong dmod pas gdab// ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnan sngags dang khram la gdab pa'i sngags 'di gsungs
36b3(1): so// oM du sa tri k+She ya hUM/ oM hriSh+TiHwi kr-i ta mon ta dgra bo ma ra ya rbad/ staM b+ha ya hUM nan/ 'bri nan rtsa rtsi nan/ ha su sad b+h+yo/ bruM bying bruM bying / b+h+yo thum b+h+yo thum/ brum pa ra li nan/ seng s+tha seng s+tha sed/ k+Sha drad k+Sha
36b4(1): drad/ ni khang kha sa me sa he/ e ri le li ba shan shig shig/ e hri trad nan/ tri pa li le// shan bra ba mi// e re li le/ gshan/ he ha pa shi sha ra/ tsha tsha li li hi nan/ sha shi b+h+yo thums hu ru hu ru/ hUM ta ra ta ra/
36b5(1): tshal tshal/ mug mug mug/ myos myos myos/ rag sha tsi ta dza la hUM/ karma tsa ti dza la hUM/ ga ru ga ru/ ra ti ra ti/ gur ti gur ti/ 'am du 'am du/ tsan tri hri ka so pa ti kha gri sog ma ra rbad/ snyam pa ya srog snyam pa
36b6(1): ya srog snyam pa 'dir rbad rbad/ thod pa'i dbang po dag la gdab// ral pa tshar dgu'i lag tu gtata// don yod grub pa'i pho brang gdab// ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag nges bshad pa// shar lho 'brub
37a1(1): khung dag tu yang // gdug pa can gyi shing bu la// drug brtsegs dag gi baM po bsgreng // khrag dang dug chus bsku bar bya// de nas rnal 'byor lhor ltar 'dug/ gtor ma mar dang gung shing
37a2(1): dang // nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshe dang // ling ga la sogs bsag par bya// gzhan yang zangs phye lcags phye dang // rus bye rdo rje gtor ma dang // snying dang glo ba ming byang dang // mchin pa mkhal ma rgyu pa
37a3(1): dang // khrag dang rus pa la sogs dang // snying dang mkhris pa rje dar dang // mar khu sbrang dang 'o ma khrag/ bdag nyid khros pa'i gdug sems kyis// rag sha 'phreng ba se ral pa// lag tu lcags kyi gzar pu
37a4(1): yis// me lha'i tshogs dang lha tshogs la/ bskyed dang spyan drangs bstim byas nas// so so rtsa sngags kha raM khas// drag tu dam rdzas dbul bar bya// thugs kyi snying po'i zhabs dag la// lha tshogs so so'i rtsa sngags
37a5(1): dang // sreg sngags bsdebs la 'bul bya zhing // re re nyid la rtsa brgyad sngags// yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig yin// rdzogs dang thal ba klu la gtad// yang na rlung lha'i tshogs la dbul// de ltar rdzogs rje bsdu dang
37a6(1): gshegs// rnal 'byor sgrib sbyang bar chad sel// dmigs pa myur tu rlag par 'gyur/ dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ rdo rje dme phur dang / lcags sbur pu dang / gnan cing srog gcad
37b1(1): las kyi gzhug sdud pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// // de nas 'jig rten mgon po des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// he he dpal 'bar khro rgyal gdong // lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// bstan pa
37b2(1): gnas par mi 'gyur te// las kyi bdud chen khong nas 'khrug/ dam sri rang gi rgyud las ldang // rang gis rang gi bstan pa 'jig/ rang sha rang gis za ba'i dus// de lta bu yi dus byung bas// stong phrag brgyad cu'i
37b3(1): gdon rnams 'khrug/ nad dang mtshon ni skar ltar 'khrug/ bsgrub pa'i long med cing // bstan pa rang gis 'jig pas na// de dus bstan pa gang gis bsrung // zhes zhus pas/ nyon cig 'jig rten mgon po
37b4(1): khyod// khyod kyis dus gsum mkhyen gsal ba// nga la zhus pa legs so nyon// bskal pa snyigs ma byung ba'i tshe/ bstan pa rang gis 'jig pas na// srid pa lto nas bzlog kyang 'tshal// mtshon cha rtse nas gzung
37b5(1): yang 'tshal// lha 'dre'i srog nas gzung yang 'tshal// 'dus byas mi rtag bshad kyang 'tshal// rang gshed rang la bslab pa dang // mtshon kha nang du bstan pa dang // rang srog rang gis gcad kyang
37b6(1): 'tshal// bsnyen pa'i lha ni bdud du dbab// ces gsungs so// skye med rnam dag lhun gyis grub// ye shes dkyil 'khor chu zla'i tshul// mi rtog dbyings las thugs rje sgrol// phyogs dus lha yi dkyil 'khor
38a1(1): che// mchod pa bla med rgya ches mchod// chos nyid la ni chos nyid rol// snang srid ye sangs rgyas pa la// tshogs bsags dge rtsa'i byas med// don dam skye med ye shes lha// kun rdzob 'gag med
38a2(1): gdug pa 'dul// gzugs snang thams cad khro bo'i sku// bza' btung sha khrag ri bo mtsho// skye 'gro ma lus sgrol ba'i zhing // zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// srog dang srog gi gnad nas
38a3(1): ded// don dam zhes pa'i ming dang bral// brjod med nam mkha' dang 'dra// kun rdzob gzugs la gces pa// lha yi ting 'dzin gsal bas lta// rjes mi dang yi ge las// gsal ba'i srog dang yig 'bru
38a4(1): slaspang // zhes gsungs so// de nas yang 'jig rten mgon po des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// lnga brgya snyigs ma'i dus de ru// stong phrag brgyad cu'i gdon rnams 'khrug/ sngags pa nang 'gras byung
38a5(1): ba yis// dam sri 'jig rten lha 'dres byed// de la bgegs rigs du ma la// ded dpon ris su rtog pa gang // sngags pa nang 'gras byung ba'i tshe// rang gshed rang la slong ba gang // bzlog dang bsrung dang
38a6(1): bsad pa dang // bsreg dang mnan pa ji ltar lags// srog gi yi ge ji lta bu// gcod cing gzir dang rnam shes srog/ yang dag dpa' bos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol pas// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid
38b1(1): cang mi gsung bar dregs pa 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs nas yang 'di skad gsungs so// nyon cig 'jig rten mgon po khyod// bgegs rigs du ma de dag la// ded dpon nyi shu
38b2(1): rtsa lnga yin// de dag kun gyi rje bo ni// yi dgas gshin rje nag po yin// skos dang las kyi chos 'chad cing // srid gsum sems can tshe srog 'brel// ces gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang
38b3(1): sngags kyi rgyal po 'di zon to// oM sa mA ya ar+ya many+dzu/ oM shrI mu tra ya man ta ka pan tsa te ro ni hUM dza/ he la tsa tra rus ni/ ku lan tsa sa mA ya ra ya gu gu thul mA ra ya/ drag po nam mkha' thog dang 'dra// zhes
38b4(1): gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ rdo rje nang 'gras kyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'jig rten dregs pa'i srog snying rnam shes byung ba
38b5(1): 'di gsungs so// ya ma rag mo rag sha/ k+She ma badz+ra kri ta/ dun ting ki la ya/ ma ma rok+kha/ nyid du rngubs/ he sha rag krag/ dug brag/ dun ting 'bi la li/ a dun ti/ tri shan/ ra tsa ha ti/ tsa ra mu trag/ sha truM sti
38b6(1): sta/ ri ni ri/ tri nag a tri sa du/ tsa tri/ ra tsa/ rA tsa nA ga du sa pu tri/ kha rag/ k+She ma tri/ dun ting dun ting / tro srog mA ra ya/ ga na pa ti/ bi na ka ti/ ka la tu dbrag/ byi ru ra/ na ga mo ting / sa ga byi ru/ badz+ra
39a1(1): a gu sha dza/ trig nan/ dza la rim ram/ ma ra ya rbad/ snyam pa ya nan/ sa ma ya dam dam/ de dag spyi'i gzir byed do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten lha 'dre'i srog gcad pa 'di
39a2(1): gsungs so// oM ya ma ta da/ d+ha a tra na rA rak+She sha dza tsa sa ga ni tra tri me sri sa ma yA ma ru lu/ dun ting ki la ya/ tir ta ka/ ru tra de ba/ rag sha yag sha/ yag mo/ mun mun/ shu la/ ra tsa/ dun ting / badz+ra sa du/
39a3(1): haM shaM/ sa na ga/ ru gri/ sarba shad dr-i/ dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ rdo rje nang 'gras kyi 'jig rten dregs pa'i srog snying bstan pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan
39a4(1): 'das kyis rdo rje nang 'gras kyi las gnam lcags 'khor lo nag po zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// yid 'thad dur khrod ma ra yar// byang chub sems ldan rnal 'byor pas// maN+Dal zla gam gru bzhi'i bar// gru
39a5(1): gsum nag po dpangs su brtsigs// dur khrod ras la dug khrag gis// 'khor lo rim pas bskor byas la// dang por yab kyi gsang sngags bri// nang du rtse bstan mtshon cha bri// dbus su gshin rje nag po
39a6(1): yi// lto bar rang gshed 'khor lo bri// bdag nyid srog la ya man ta kar bsgom// 'brub khung kha la 'khor lo dgram// dang po bod pa ni/ mi 'ong 'ong bar bya ba yin// gshin rje gshed pos dbang du
39b1(1): bsdu// gnyis pa ri rgyal rbab lta bus// rang dbang med pas gzir myos bya// gsum pa srog snying thob par bya// bzhi pas ma ra tri dang bcas// lnga pas mnan cing bsreg par bya// de nas phyis ni log gnon
39b2(1): du// dam tshig mar bas bzhag pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas dpal 'bar nyid kyis rdo rje rang gshed kyi drag sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sa mA ya Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mu tra/ ya mAn ta ka ban tsa te ro ni hUM dza/ he
39b3(1): la tsakra pa na/ tsa ru pa ni/ ku lan tsa sa ma ya/ ma ra ya gu gul thul/ mA ra ya/ e ra ga re ba sha mo ha/ na ma i ri sha b+h+yo/ badz+ra sarba du stan/ ya ma trig na/ srog ni hur tums dza/ sa ma ya a gu sha dza dza/ ming
39b4(1): trig nan/ srog hur thums dza/ ya ma ya ma rA tsa/ ming tig nan srog hur thums dza/ ming srog staM pa yan/ sa ma ya dam dam/ gshin rje 'khor lo la sogs pa// bskor nas rang nyid rlag par 'gyur// bdag
39b5(1): nyid gsal ba'i go cha ste// drag sngags mtshon cha 'khor lo yis// dmigs pa sngags kyi gnas yin te// rang gshed yin pas yang dag gsungs// de la yang dag bshad bya na// ya ma trig nan/ ya che ge mo tsit+ta
39b6(1): mA ra ya rbad/ che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta ma ra ya sod/ tsit+ta gnad la bor ba'o// ya ma hur thums rbad ri la/ raM ni tsi ta ma ra ya rbad/ hUM badz+ra ma ru ni dza dza/ hUM ni hur thums ri la tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ ya ma snying
40a1(1): tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ srog long rbod/ gshin rje 'khor lo ma ra ya// dam tshig nyams pa'i sngags pa yi// srog la 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ 'khor
40a2(1): lo nag po snying la bskor ba'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nang dme'i las/ mtshon 'khrugs nag mo zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// dur khrod yid dang 'thad par 'gro// sa ma
40a3(1): ya dang ldan byas la// maN+Dal brub khung khru gang sar// khrag dang dug gis zhal zhal bya// dur khrod ras sam shog shog la// 'khor lo rim pa ldan pa la// tha ma gshin rje'i sngags kyis bskor// dug dang khrag tu
40a4(1): bsres pa yis// ma mo'i gzugs ni dbus su bri// lto bar gnad kyi 'khor lo bri// dbus su srog gi yi ge bri// ling ga bri ba zag pa zad// bdud bcas khro bo'i rgyu la bri// yi ge'i gnas su dgod par
40a5(1): bya// bdag nyid ya mAn ta kar bsgom// 'khor lo ma mo chen mor bsgom// ling ka gzas par gsal bar bya// gsad pa'i gzor kyang gong ltar bsgrub// 'khor lo non khar thun gyis brab// dam can 'bod
40a6(1): cing gtor ma gtang // brang brdung ma nyes dpang yang gzugs// de nas 'khor lo drag tu bskor// bdun nam gsum mam bcu gnyis 'grub// srid pa ma mo thams cad kun// khra spyang gzan la 'du ba
40b1(1): ltar// mnyam pa nyid la 'du bar 'gyur// oM sa mA ya/ he la tsa tra e rA ga/ ma ma ru lu trig nan/ ma hur thums dza/ ma ma ru lu trig nan/ ma ni hur thums dza/ ma ma ru lu staM pa ya yan/ ma ma ru lu trig nan/ che
40b2(1): ge mo tsi ta mA ra ya rbad/ che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta ma ra ya sod/ ma ma ru lu hur thums ri la/ baM tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ hUM badz+ra ma du ni dza dzaHhUM nr-i hur thums ri la/ tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ ma ru lu snying tsit+ta ma ra ya tri
40b3(1): srog long dbugs la yang rbad/ khrag dug nyungs kar nyungs nag dang // lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye dang brab// yug sa mo yi zhabs mas gdab// 'jug tu zhabs mar gums nas ni// dur khrod dag tu gnan par
40b4(1): bya// ma mo'i zor thun ma sa rbad ya/ 'khor lo 'di yi dbang du 'gyur// dam bdar rtags thon rag ta gtang // dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyus las/ srid pa gsum zor bzlog thun zor
40b5(1): bzlog/ thun dang gshed 'khor lo snying la gzer 'debs kyi le'u ste so gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po des/ rdo rje nang sme las rgya mdud nag po dang mgo mjug ma zhes bya ba
40b6(1): 'di gsungs so// dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// yid dang 'thad pa'i gnas bzung la// dug shing nag po tsher ma can/ yang na shir shing nag po la// mgo 'jug ma nor phur pa de// pog por nag po'i
41a1(1): @dud pas bdugs// rgya mdud nag por hUM nag gcig/ rdo sol nag pos bri bar bya// rgya mdud 'og mar gzir sngags bri// tha ma dpal ma ma ra ya// ldum zhog dag la bco lnga pa// rtsa ba'i yi ge
41a2(1): bri bar bya// 'khor lo gong dang rgyu 'thun te// 'dzo rta'i khrag dang dug bsres la// khro bo 'jigs pa'i gzugs bdar bri// 'brub khung gting du gru gsum bru// tha ma rtsang dmar dag gis bskor// de la ling ga
41a3(1): bri ba dag/ shog shog kar ri ka la bri// bdag nyid ya mAn ta kar bsgom// khros pas nga rgyal drag pos brgad// mdzo rta dre'u'i thod pa la// rdo rje rgya gram rab tu bri// oM laM snying po bris la gzhag/ yul gsum
41a4(1): 'di nyid gsal byas la// drag po rang gshed 'khor lo rang gshed bskor// phur bu'i dpal kha rang la ldog/ phur bu mda' ru 'phen par rmi// phur bu dpal nas 'dzin par rmi// oM sa ma ya he la tsakra/ e ra
41a5(1): rA ga badz+ra/ dun ting ka la ya tri nan// ta hur thums dza/ dun ting ka la ya/ aM gu sha dza dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ staM b+ha ya nan/ dun ting ki la ya krig nan/ dun ting la ya/ che ge mo nr-i hur thums badz+ra/ ta tri ma ra ya
41a6(1): rbad/ dun ting ka la ya krig/ dun ting ki la ya che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad nan/ dun ting ki la ya trig nan/ ta che ge mo tsit+ta la mA ra ya rbad/ ta che ge mo nr-i hur thums dzA/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/
41b1(1): dun ting ki la hu thums ri la/ raM bri tsi ra mA ra ya rbad/ hUM madz+ra ma du ni dza dza/ hUM nr-i hur thums ri la/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ dun ting ki la ya snying tsit+ta ma ra ya/ tri sog long dbugs la yang rbad// khrag dug nyungs
41b2(1): kar dag gis brab// phur pa nag po dril zhing brdeg/ de nas lha klu'i gnas dag tu// 'khor lo thod par rab brubs la// ling ka'i snying khar phur pas gdab phur bus btab kyang rang la 'debs so// rgyu ldog
41b3(1): phur gshed nag po yin// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ ki la ya khrag 'di nag po rang gshed 'khor lo'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'jigs byed chen po nyid kyis rdo/
41b4(1): rje nang dme'i las phung byed dug mda' nag po 'di gsungs so// ri nag mon nag khros pa 'dra// rtswa dang shing du skyes pa'i gnas// sngags pa dam tshig ldan pa'i mis// maN+Dal mthing nag gru gsum la// gri rgod
41b5(1): khrag gis zhal zhal bya// kha la rtsang mar dgram par bya// skyer pa'i mda' la sbrang kha'i sgo// mtho gang ba ni tshad yin no// dug dang khrag dang rtod nag byug/ khri khri khr-i la thob ces bri// dar nag yang dor bdud la
41b6(1): gtad// rtags thon gtang rag khas kyang blangs// bdag nyid ya man ta kar bsgom// 'khor lo bdud du rab bsgoms la// ling+ga gzas pa de la gtad// rang gshed rang la bskor bar gsod// oM sa mA yA/
42a1(1): he la tsakra/ e ra ge badz+ra ru tra trig nan/ rta hur thums dza/ ru tri d+ha a gu sha dza dza/ mA ra ya rbad staM b+ha ya nan/ ru tre trig nan/ ru tri che ge mo nr-i hur thums ma dza/ da ni ma ra ya rbad/ ru tri trig nan/
42a2(1): ru tri che ge mo hur thums rbad/ che ge mo ma ra ya rbad/ ru tri trig nan/ d+ha che ge mo tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ d+ha che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ ru dri hur zums ri la/ ru Ni tsit+ti mA ra ya rbad/ oM badz+ra ma du ni dza
42a3(1): dza/ hUM NaM hur thums ri la/ tsi t+ta ma ra ya rbad/ ru tri snying tsit+ta mA ra ya tri srog long dbugs la ya rbad/ skyer ba'i mda' nag dag la yang // bsngags shing ling dag la brdeg/ bdud kyi khram shing nag po
42a4(1): la// bdud kyi gzugs bri 'khor lo de// bdud du bsam la bdud du brdeg/ bdud kyi khram kha stong 'gyur na// mun pa'i zhags pa stong 'gyur dang // 'khor lo 'di yi dbang du 'gyur// dam tshig bdag pos
42a5(1): dbang du bshad// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ bdud rang gshed rang la dbab pa ru tra nag po srog len khram nag rang gshed kyi le'u ste so lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
42a6(1): nyid kyis rdo rje nang dme'i las me 'bar nag mo 'bru gcig pa/ shang ka'i rang gshed 'di gsungs so// ma la ya yi rtse mo 'am// sha sbrang 'du ba'i gnas dag tu// maN+Dal nag po khru gang pa// rim pa gsum dang
42b1(1): ldan pa la// zla gam ldang nag bri bar bya// rgya shog dag la 'khor lo bri// dbus su ldang nag gsha' bsams bri// ling ga rang gzugs rang gnad bri// 'bru gtor gser skyems phud gtor la// bdag nyid ya
42b2(1): man ta kar bsgom// gnod sbyin sngo nag 'bar ba la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dam sri la// mtshon cha'i char pa phab par bsam// de 'dar phye dang mtshon cha che// dug khrag ra'i ngar bskrad la// 'dud dang ling ga/
42b3(1): dag la bra ba/ ya man ta ka gsal bsgoms nas// oM sa ma yA/ he sa tsakra/ e ra ga/ badz+ra yag shri trig nan/ k+Sha hur thums dza/ yang sha k+Sha/ a gu sha dza/ mA ra ya/ stam b+ha ya nan/ yag sha trig nan/ yag sha che
42b4(1): ge mo nr-i hur thums dza/ k+Sha ni ma ra ya rbad/ yag sha trig nan/ yag sha che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo ma ra ya rbad/ yag sha trig nan/ yag sha che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ yag sha trig nan/
42b5(1): k+Sha che ge mo tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ yag sha hur thums dza/ tsit+ta mA ra ta rbad/ yag sha hur thums ri la/ ri ni tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad nan// oM badz+ra ma du ni dza dza/ hUM ni hur thums
42b6(1): ri la/ tsi t+ta mA ra ya rbad/ ya a snying tsit+ta ma ra ya tri/ srog ling dbugs la rbad/ tsham rngam drag po'i sngags brabs// myur du rlag par dpa' bos bshad// gnod sbyin sde dpon brgya rtsa brgyad// nyi shu rtsa lnga la
43a1(1): sogs pa// lag na rdo rje la sogs pa// 'khor lo 'di yi dbang du 'gyur// rbad kha stong dang brub shing stong // rang la rang gi mtshon char 'bebs// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud
43a2(1): las/ gnod sbyin rang gshed chen pa ngar ba'i le'u ste so drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje nang sme'i las gdug pa klu'i 'jigs thabs 'di gsungs so// na ga med pa me brtsegs
43a3(1): 'khyil// dur khrod ro sha bsgrub pa'i gnas// rnal 'byor dam tshig ldan pa yis// dur khrod sa 'am phungs la// 'brub khung byas la dug khrag byug/ ldong ros ro yi sol bas byug/ rus sbal nag po'i pags pa
43a4(1): la// shing shun dag la klu yi gzugs// sbrul nag gzugs la mgo gzugs bya// lto bar rang gshed kyi yi ge dgod// ling ka khro ba dag la bris// bdag nyid ya man ta kar bsgom// klu gnyen rang gshed rang
43a5(1): la dbab// oM sa mA ya Ar+ya/ he la tsakra/ ban tsa e ra ga badz+ra/ na ga trig nan/ phu hur zums dza/ sa na ga pu/ a gu sha dza dza/ ma ra ya staM sa ya nan/ na ga trig nan/ sa na ga che ge mo nr-i hur zums dza/ pu s+thi ma
43a6(1): ra ya phaT/ na ga trig nan/ na ge che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ na ga trig nan/ phu che ge mo tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ phu che ge mo sa hur thums/ dza ti mA ra ya rbad/ na ga hur thums ri la/ ri nri tsit+ta mA ra
43b1(1): ya rbad/ hUM badz+ra ma du ni dza dza/ tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ na ga snying tsit+ta ma ra ya tri srog long dbugs la rbad/ klu gnyen gnad la bor ba'i las// byad dang stong dang dug nad las// thar byed bstan pa'i bdud du
43b2(1): dbab// gzhan yang gtad mkhan dang 'gras// myur du kho nyid 'phung bar 'gyur// bsrung ba bya bar 'dod na yang // rigs dang drung gis thabs las dang // rtsol ba dang / byed kyi las gzhan chags las gyur
43b3(1): dug las thar/ ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ las kyi klu nag 'khrug pa rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i le'u ste so bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
43b4(1): kyis rdo rje nang sme las mtshon cha 'khrug pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// dza la mo rab srog gi bdag/ 'jig rten dregs can sgrub pa'i mis// ri gsum rtse la sogs pa ru// maN+Dal nag po khru gang la// gri bo'i
43b5(1): khrag gis bri bar bya// rgya gor dag la 'khor lo bri// dregs can mi yi lus po la// sems can g.yag gi mgo bo can// yang na sha ba'i mgo ru bya// sha ba'i ru la khro stod la// mtshal gyis g.yung drung bri bar
43b6(1): bya// ling ga bri ba shes byas la// 'khor lo 'brub khung kha ru dgram// dam can ya mAn ta ka'i sku// 'khor lo dmar nag g.yag mgo can// dza dmar srog dang bcas pa'i bsam// gzas pa dngos su gsal ba
44a1(1): gces// shod ka'i rde'u dkar nag dang // dug dang khrag la sngags bzlas te// sku la gtor zhing drag sngags drang // oM sa ma yA/ he la tsakra/ e ra ga/ badz+ra shu la trig nan/ dza hur thums dza/ shu la
44a2(1): dza dza/ a gu sha dza dza/ ma ra ya rbad/ staM b+ha ya nan/ shu la trig nan/ shu la che ge mo nr-i/ hur thums dza/ dza nr-i mA ra ya rbad/ shu la trig nan/ shu la che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo ma ra ya rbad/ shu la trig nan/ che
44a3(1): ge mo tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ dza che ge mo hur thums/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ shu lu hur thums ri la/ hUM badz+ra ma du ni dza dza/ hUM nr-i hur thums ri la/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ shu la tsit+ta sting tsit+ta mA ra ya tri srog long dbugs la ya
44a4(1): rbad// khrag tu shod rdi'u char phab la// sha ru'i khram la rab tu gtem// ling ga 'khor lo rab gtum la// ri gsum rtse la gnan pa bya// sha khyi gso dang dzag pa 'gyed// me 'bar chu yang 'khrugs pa
44a5(1): rmigs// 'byung ba lnga yi btsan dang ni// klu btsan yams shod la sogs pa// tha rabs sum brgya drug cu dang // shod ka stong dang nad ka 'bum// dmod mkhan yod na kho dang rlag/ 'jigs byed srog rtsa khrag gi
44a6(1): lung // dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ gri thabs 'bum 'gyur rang gshed kyi le'u ste so brgyad po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rdo rje nang dme'i las srog rtsa 'khor lo/
44b1(1): nag po zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// ri gsum rtse 'am ngo brgya'i brag/ bya rgod lding ba'i gnas su bya// sngags pa dam tshig ldan pa yis// lha yi ting 'dzin gsal byas la// maN+Dal gru gsum mthing nag
44b2(1): la// rtsang bskor thod pa'i 'phreng bar bskor// dar dkar dag la 'khor lo bri// ling ga dag la bri/ srog gi yi ge bkod byas la// 'brub khung kha ru dgram par bya// khyi dkar thod pa dag la yang // dpral bar
44b3(1): mtshal gyis g.yung drung bri// mtshon sna lnga yi skud pas gril// tsa dkar tsit+ta dmigs byas la// ya man ta ka gsal ba dang // oM sa ma/ he la tsakra/ e ra ga badz+ra/ ra dza trig nan/ tsa hur thums dza/ ra tsa tsa/ a
44b4(1): gu sha dza dza/ ma ra ya rbad/ stam b+ha ya nan/ ra tsa trig nan/ ra tsa che ge mo nr-i hur thums dza/ tsa ni mA ra ya rbad/ rA tsa trig nan/ tsa che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo ma ra ya rbad/ rA tsi trig nan/ rA tsa ge ge mo tsit+ta
44b5(1): mA ra ya rbad/ tsa che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ rA tsa hur thums ril/ raM tsi ni ta ma ya rbad/ hUM nr-i hur zums ril/ tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ t+ta tsa snying tsit+ta mA ra ya tri srog long dbugs la ya rbad/ rdzas
44b6(1): dang 'khor lo khyi yi thod par brub// lha khang sgo 'am mchod rten nam// gtad khram 'khor los kha bcad mnan/ rgyal po sde bzhi man chad nas// rgyal phran sum brgya drug cu yang // 'khor lo 'di yi dbang du
45a1(1): 'gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ ra tsa srog len rgyal po rang gshed kyi 'khor los bstan pa ste le'u so dgu pa'o// // de nas dpal 'bar chen po des/ rdo rje nang
45a2(1): dme'i las srin po mda' sha 'bri ba/ ling ga'i snying sngags rang gshed kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ gdug pa'i srog dang bral ba'i las 'di gsungs so// dur khrod gnas sam shing gcig drung // rab tu sa rtsub
45a3(1): gnas dag tu// maN+Dal drag po e dang ldan// e la ya yi 'dab ma la// srin po gdug pa'i 'khor lo bri// bdag nyid ya man ta kar bsgoms// ling ga 'khor lo dgram byas la// oM sa ma ya/ he la tsakra/ e
45a4(1): ga badz+ra/ rag sha trig nan/ ra hur thums dza/ rag sha ra/ a gu sha dza dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ staM b+ha ya nan/ rag sha trig nan/ rag sha che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta mA ra
45a5(1): rbad/ rag sha hur thums ri la/ ri ni tsit+ta ma' ra ya rbad/ hUM badz+ra ma du ni dza dza/ hUM hur thums ri la/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ rag sha tsit+ta mi tri srog long dbugs la ya rbad/ lang ka'i srin sngags thams cad
45a6(1): kyang // 'khor lo 'di la srog 'dus pas// rang dbang med pas las byed 'gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ srin po'i srog bdud rang gshed gsang khram nag po'i le'u ste bzhi bcu
45b1(1): pa'o// // de nas yang dpal 'jigs byed chen po des/ rdo rje nang dme las lha rgod kyi drag sngags rang gshed phab ste/ srog la 'khor lo bskor ba'i las 'di gsungs so// 'jig rten lha chen dbang chen
45b2(1): dang // bsten pa'i lha dang bsgrub pa'i lha// 'go ba'i sla la sogs pa ste// rang gshed phab la bdud du dbab// lha cig skyes pa'i lha lnga'o// rang las 'byung bas rang la dbab// lha yi gtar srog 'du ba
45b3(1): yis// rang 'thad gnas su maN+Dal bya// gru gsum mthing nag khrag tu byug/ sme rdzas rnams kyis me yang gtang // 'khor lo rgya shog dag la bya// yi ge gnad la dgod par bya// 'go ba'i lha lnga dag kyang
45b4(1): bri// ling ga bris la 'khor lo brub// ya man ta ka gsal ba dang // oM sa ma ya/ he la tsa kra/ e ra ga badz+ra/ de ba pa tsa trig nan/ a hur thums dzA/ de ba a pa a gu sha dza dza/ de ba tsan tsa trig nan/ de ba ban
45b5(1): tsa che ge mo nr-i hur thums dza/ a ni ma ra ya rbad/ de ba pe na/ tsa trig nan/ a de ba che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ de ba pan tsa trig nan/ a che ge mo tsit+ta ya ma rbad/ a che ge mo hur thums
45b6(1): dza/ tsit+ta ma ma ra ya phaT/ de ba pan tsa hur thums ri la/ raM tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ hUM badz+ra ma du ni dza dza/ hUM ni hur thums thums ri la/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ de ba pan tsa snying tsit+ta ma trig srog long dbugs la ya rbad/
46a1(1): @'khor lo kho bo'i khang 'gram mam// yang na lha rten gnas dag gam// rigs gsum gnas su gnas gyur na// bsten pa rang gi bdud du 'bab// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rlung
46a2(1): las/ bsten pa rang la gshed du dbab pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje nang dme'i las gdon thams cad rang gshed du dbab pa// srog bdag 'khor lo nag po 'di
46a3(1): gsungs so// lang ga grub pa'i gnas dag tu// brag dmar logs la bsgrub par bya// srid pa'i srog bdag gnad la bor// ban d+he bon po dmangs dang rje// mgo nag yongs kyi rje dpon de// rang gshed
46a4(1): bskur la srog la rbad// dur khrod mchod pa'i sa dag la// 'brub khung brtsigs la gtsang mar dgod// lag pa li'i lo ma li// ka ri ka la 'khor lo bri// ling ga bris la 'khor lo dgram// ya mAn ta kar
46a5(1): gsal bar bsgom// oM sa mA ya/ he la tsakra/ e ra ga ba ra/ badz+ra sa du trig nan/ kra hur thums dza/ badz+ra sa du dza/ a gu sha dza dza/ mA ya rbad/ stam pa ya nan/ badz+ra sa du trig nan/ badz+ra sa du che ge mo nr-i
46a6(1): hur thums dza/ tra ni ma ra ya rbad/ badz+ra sa du trig nan/ badz+ra sa du che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ badz+ra sa du hur zums ri la/ baM tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ badz+ra ma du ni dza dza/ hUM ni hur thums ri la/ tsit+ta
46b1(1): mA ra ya rbad/ badz+ra sa du snying tsit+ta ma tri srog long dbugs la ya rbad/ lha rten gnas sam ri zur gnan// sten pa bdud du babs par gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las dgra bla gshed
46b2(1): kyi le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nang dme'i las dmu bdud srog mnga' byed kyis sos chus la/ gdug pa khram la 'debs pa 'di gsungs so// brag po che yi rtsang phyin
46b3(1): la// maN+Dal gru gsum rtsang gis bskor// 'khor lo bris la gnad yig dgod// ling ga lto bar bcug nas kyang / ya man ta ka gsal bar bcug gam// oM sa ma ya/ he la tsakra/ mun mun trig ta nan/ @
46b4(1): hur thums dza/ mun mun pa/ a gu sha dza dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ staM pa ya nan/ mun mun trig nan/ mun mun mun che ge mo nr-i hur thums dza/ sa ni ma ra ya rbad/ mun mun trig nan/ mun mun che ge mo nr-i hur thums dza che
46b5(1): ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ mun trig nan/ ba che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ mun mun hur zums ri la/ raM ni tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ oM badz+ra ma du ni dza dza/ hAM ni hur thums ri la/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ mun mun snying
46b6(1): tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ trig srog long dbugs la ya rbad/ brag nag 'og tu mnan byas la// rang srog rang gis gcod par 'gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ gdug pa khram 'debs kyi
47a1(1): le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nang dme'i las khram nag dmig 'og phyin ci log 'di gsungs so// dug shing skye ba'i sa dag tu// ro bsregs sa dang g.yul
47a2(1): bkye'i sa// 'brub khung brtsegs ma dag tu bya// sbal pa nag po'i pags pa 'am/ ra rog gi rog pags pa la// sme khrag dag gis 'khor lo bri// ling ga 'khor lo'i ltor brubs la// sa sna rdo phye sna tshogs
47a3(1): dang // dug dang khrag gi char pa dbab// rag ta bzang zhing skyug pa bod// ya man ta ka gsal bsgoms la// sa ma ya/ he la tsakra/ he la tsakra/ e ra ga badz+ra/ tir ti ka trig nan/ dur hur thums dza/ tir ti ka
47a4(1): du/ a gu sha dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ staM pa ya nan/ tir ti ka trig nan/ tir ti ka che ge mo hur thums dza/ du ni mA ra ya rbad/ tir ti ka trig nan/ tir ti ka che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad// ti ra ti ka
47a5(1): trig nan/ du che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ du ba che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ du che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ tir ti ka thums ri la/ raM ni tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ hUM badz+ra du ni dza dza/ hUM hur thums ri la/ tsit+ta mA ra ya
47a6(1): rbad/ tir ti snying tsit+ta mA ra ya srog long dbugs la ya rbad/ ri nag rtse la mnan byas la// rang srog rang gis gcod par 'gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ mu stegs ngan
47b1(1): sngags thams cad 'khor lo'i dbang du bskor la// gdug byed khram la 'debs pa'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nang dme'i las bgegs dang log 'dren sna 'dren dang /
47b2(1): sdong par bcas pa rang gshed 'khor lo 'di gsungs so// phug bdag dang ni 'gong po dang // gnod sbyin mo dang srin mo'i tshogs// rang gshed rang la bslang la gsad// gnod sbyin srin mo bud med
47b3(1): tshogs// rang gnad yi ge 'khor lo bya// 'gong po dag la bu chung 'dra// dam sri phag gam rnga mo bya// klu bdud mo ni bud med 'dra// 'khor lo bskor zhing nyungs kar brab// phur pas btab la hom la
47b4(1): bsreg/ yang na gzir cing mnan pa bya// oM sa ma ya/ he la tsakra badz+ra/ rag mo trig nan/ ra hur thums dza/ rag mo ma ra ya rbad/ rag mo trig nan/ sha hur thums dza/ haM shaM trig nan/ sha hur thums dza/ du ma
47b5(1): trig nan/ me hur thums dza/ ru tri trig nan/ sri hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad rbad/ srog staM b+ha ya nan/ mi srog ag ni sha trung dza la raM/ 'jig rten dregs pa thams cad ni// snying 'gas srog dang 'bral bar
47b6(1): 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ 'jig rten dregs pa'i srog 'phrog cing rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o// // de nas 'jig rten mgon po
48a1(1): des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// 'jig rten dregs pa 'di dag la// rdo rje nang 'gras las dag tu// rang gshed 'khor lo gshad pa na// 'khor lo bskor dus gang la bya// stong srog
48a2(1): 'du na gang du 'du// mchod cing bsten pa ji ltar lags// rtags kyi rim pa ji ltar 'byung // zhes zhus pas// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyin cig 'jig rten
48a3(1): mgon po khrod// dregs pa rang shug pa yi 'khrug pa yis// mtshan rtags ngan na 'khor lo gzir// sngags pa nang 'gras byung ba'i tshe// skrod gtong stobs ni 'gran pa'i tshe// gzig yag rtags kyi me
48a4(1): long lta// gang byung de la 'khor lo bskor// rtags rnams 'khrugs par byung ba na// snying srog gcig tu bsdus la gtang // stong srog gcig gis gcad par bya// yang na 'di ltar shes par bya// pho srog gcig tu
48a5(1): shes par bya// mo srog gcig tu shes par bya// gdug pa gsum po gcig tu shes// mu stegs ngan sngags gcig tu shes// bgegs kyi ru log che ba na// srog gi bu gte'u gzung bar bya// phyis kyi log mnon
48a6(1): byung ba na// dam tshig mna' yis bsgag par bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sra ba'i cho ga bgo bar bya// brdeg pa'i mtshon cha brdung bar bya// 'ben gyi bca' lugs bca' bar
48b1(1): bya// gsal ba'i me long rab blta zhing // stong sde dmangs su gcad par bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong srog thams cad gcig tu gsad/ gdug pa can gnad la phab pa// srog la
48b2(1): ma ra yas gdab ba 'di gsungs so// oM sa ma ya/ Ar+ya many+dza shri mu tra ya man ta ka pa na tsa te ro ni tsa hUM dza/ he la tsakra pan tsa rU pa ni lan tsa sa ma ya/ ma ra ya gu gu thul/ mA ra ya e ra ya ga de ba sha mo ha na ma
48b3(1): i ru sha b+h+yo/ badz+ra sarba du saT na/ yak+She na yab rag mo/ ra gsha'/ gshe ma/ badz+ra kro d+ha/ dun ti ki la ya/ ma ma rag mo/ nyid du rngubs/ ha sha rag tra/ du phrag dun ting / 'bing la ni/ a dun tri/ tri sha na/ ra dza
48b4(1): ha ti/ ra dza mu trag/ sha trung sti sta/ ra ni ro trig nan/ a tri sa du/ tsa tri sa du/ tsa tri/ rA dza/ rA dza na ga/ de ba ru tri kha rag k+She ma tri/ dun ting dun ting tri srog ma ra ya/ 'ga' na sa ti/ 'phi na ka ro/ ka la du
48b5(1): phrag/ byi ru ra/ na ga mo tri/ na ga byi du/ sarba sha trung nan/ e ni hur thums dza/ e ni che ge mo mA ra ya/ sarba sha trung trig nan/ e ni che ge mo'i dbang du tsit+ta mA ya rbad/ e ni che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta mA ra ya
48b6(1): rbad/ sarba sha trung snying tsit+ta mA ra ya srog long dbugs la ya rbad/ de yis stong snying 'dus pa yin// rang srog rang gis gcod par 'gyur// las rnams 'gor na ru log bya// gsad pa'i nang nas mchog tu
49a1(1): bshad// gang dag bsrung bar 'dod na yang // kla du mgo 'dren shes pa la// tshig gsum bzlas pas bsrung bar 'gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ stong srog bsdu
49a2(1): gsad kyi 'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// mchod rten gyi gtang rag gtang ba'i las 'di gsungs so// dam bcas rnam pa gnyis yin te// mchod pa 'thun
49a3(1): pa'i rdzas rnams yin// rin chen rnam lnga dri ma lnga// sman dang 'bru yi gtor ma gtang // 'bru skyems la sogs gtang par bya// mi sha rta sha khrag chen dang // ba dmar glang dmar sha khrag snying // 'bri rog g.yag
49a4(1): rog sha khrag gzugs// seng ge dkar mo sha khrag snying // nya sbrul sbal pa'i sha khrag dang // tsa ra khaM brgya'i sha dang khrag/ lug nag sha khrag til nag dang // mkha' lding shel nag smug mo yi// sha khrag snying dang
49a5(1): bcas pa dang // chu gtsang khrag gtsang bsres pa dang / ra dmar sha khrag snying la sogs// phag pa rog po'i snying khrag dang // rta yi sha khrag la sogs dang // gzugs la sogs pa so sor mchod// 'jig rten
49a6(1): dregs pa de rnams la// dgra rtags byung ba'i dus su mdzod// 'jig rten lha 'dre'i srog shes na// sprin dpung bzhin du 'du bar 'gyur// gang 'dod dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// rje bor mthong nas nges par
49b1(1): 'khur// ma nor nges pa'i lam yang ston// ces gsungs so// mi mthun gnad kyis rdzas bstan pa// mi rta bya gsum tsil bu dang // nya sbrul sbal pa gsum gyi sha/ khyi phag sbyang ki'i rtug pa dang // mdzo rtol
49b2(1): 'dre'u'i spug zhob dang // rta rmig glang ru bzhogs pa dang // ra dug sbyang dur bung dug dang // thar nu la sogs dug sna dang / dud pas 'dugs na grong chen yang // snying 'gas srog dang bral bar 'gyur// mi
49b3(1): mthun log 'dren 'byung ba na// dmigs la dud 'dug 'khor lo bskor// da lta nyid du rlag par 'gyur// yul bdag yod pa'i gnas dag tu// rdzas su 'dug ste yul bdag gzir// da lta nyid du grog por
49b4(1): 'byung // rgya tshil thang khrom nag mo dang // zha nye gnad rdzas bsregs gyur na// yul khams phung ba'i da la yams phab// drag po gnad kyi las thabs yin// dam tshig bdag por rab tu gsungs// dpal gshin
49b5(1): rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ drag po rdzas kyi le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtags kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di gsungs so// bsnyen bsgrub las la sbyar ba yi// 'bod stong sme
49b6(1): stobs 'gran dus su// rtags rnams 'khrug par ston pa dang // rang rang rtags su 'byung 'gyur te// rgod gtong bzlog pas kho rang brlag/ me 'bar ba dang 'od shar ba dang // nyi zla shar dang nam langs
50a1(1): dang // ban d+he mon dang rgya gar dang // rang byung dang ni mon mo dang // rdo rje slob dpon byung ba na// ye shes lha tshogs nye ba yin// mkha' la 'phur nas rtsa phur 'debs// mtshon cha brdung dang
50a2(1): 'debs pa dang // lus shugs che la sems yang yol// des ni rab tu grub pa yin// mda' dang mde'u char pa 'byung // de dang kho yi rbod gtong yin// rtags ni gang dang gang byung yang // phar la gsod dang
50a3(1): 'dzin pa bzang // tshur la gnod par byed pas na// de tshe drug sngags rab tu bzlas// mdze po zhib chen mon dang btsun// gshin rje'i rtags su shes par bya// de rje nyams dga' sems gsal na// drag po
50a4(1): sngags kyang bzlas mi dgos// nyams 'jigs ngu bro snying mi dga'// lus ni gti mug chen por 'gyur// de tshe lha yi sku gsal bas// drag sngags phyogs su 'phangs pas grub// mun sros pa dang rgya mtsho
50a5(1): 'khyil// g.yag dang ra yis khengs pa dang // bud med gcer bu mthong ba dang // btsun pa btsad po a tsa ra// rta pa mang po byung ba dang // brag dmar 'jigs dang brag nag dang // sbrul dang sbal pa nya dang
50a6(1): lcong // ba glang mang po byung ba dang // rkang mangs mang po byung ba dang // lha khang chos bskor ston pa dang // mi red skya bo byung ba dang // bon po ral pa can yang 'byung // ban d+he mang po byung ba dang // ra lug byung
50b1(1): dang byis pa dang // khyi phag mu sbrang byung ba dang // rje dpon dang ni rigs 'dzin dang // 'bring nag mang po byung ba dang / khra spyang mang po byung ba dang // mon pa sbrul zhags khyer ba 'byung // gang byung rtags gzung
50b2(1): drag sngags gnad// nyungs kar la sog bzlas la gtor/ de yi rang gshed phebs par byed// dregs pa de dag 'khor bcas kyis// ded dpon bsdongs la grogs dang ni// pho nya las la 'phang ma dang // bar
50b3(1): chad byed pa'i log 'dren yin// srog gi yi ge gnad dag ni// shes pas gdug pa yang dag ni// shin tu 'khrugs na 'khor lo bskor// rtags rnams 'khrug na byi srog gcad// rang gshed gang mos gang 'gro/
50b4(1): lta// bsrung dang bzlog dang gsad dang mnan// me la sreg dang dam bdar la// dregs pa bzhi dang dngos grub 'du// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ rdo rje nang 'gras
50b5(1): rtags kyi le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar chen pos srog gi snying gzer chen po 'di gsungs so// 'jigs byed rngam chen gtum chen 'bar ba'i sku// 'od dpung stug po
50b6(1): bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar// phyag drug mtshon chas dgra bgegs log la sgrol// ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs gsal dang // thugs kyi ye shes sems dpa' bsam// de las thugs ka chos kyi 'khor lo/
51a1(1): las// dbus su yi ge hUM nag bsam// pad+ma brgyad la 'bru brgyad 'phra mo las// yi ge 'khor tshogs mgal me bzhin du 'khor// ro langs khro mo me 'dag 'phungs 'dra yis// thugs khang k+Sha las
51a2(1): 'bru brgyad 'khor ba'i tshul// sgeg ma ral gcig me dpung 'bar 'dra'i sku// thugs kar sa las 'bru brgyad 'khor lo la// snying po bskor bas rab tu bskor bar bsam// ma ru rtse ni dmar nag gtum po'i
51a3(1): sku// thugs khar ya las 'bru brgyad phyag rgya 'bar// snying pos 'khor lo'i tshul du bsgoms byas te// dza bzhis bse mo'i thugs kar 'bru bzhi bsam// ye shes me dpung 'od 'bar 'khor lo'i tshul// ye shes
51a4(1): lha mchod sems can sgrib sbyangs te// 'jig rten dregs pa'i gdug pa rab btul nas// byang sems dbang gis 'od 'bar a yu de// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs a yur 'gyur// ting 'dzin sems la
51a5(1): stim pas 'od du zhu// dam tshig sems dpas sku gsung mi sti s+t+waM// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// thugs kha'i sngags kyi sa sbrul las// lcags kyu'i dbyibs su 'phros pa yis// ye shes lha
51a6(1): dang 'jig rten pa// srog dang srog nas rab bskul te// thams cad dbang du bsdu bar bya// dmigs pa gang yin sngon bkug ste// rngam pa'i zhal gyi rngub par bya// las kyi rlung gis rab ded nas// dmar nag
51b1(1): tshogs kyis lus la rub// sngon dmar nad kyis rtsa rnams khengs// 'o na dong mig rtsa rig rig bsam// dbye dgu pa las kyi drag sngags gdags// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bdag dang
51b2(1): dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyis// dmigs pa nyal thag chad par bya// pho nya shan pas bdud dang ging // phye sa dmag tu 'khrugs pa yis// gzas pa rngub brlag par 'gyur// dur khrod brgyad dang mkha' 'gro
51b3(1): mas// gshog dang 'thub dang longs spyod dang // rngam pas srin gyi tshul bzung bsam// 'jig rten snang grags thams cad kyang // sha za'i tshogs te 'phra rab rngub// ces gsungs so// srog gi yang snying ting
51b4(1): 'dzin bcud// khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i zhing // don dam chos sku'i ngang du gcig/ ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ srog gi snying zer gdab pa'i le'u ste zhe dgu
51b5(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal chen rngam pa chen pos rdo rje nang dme'i las khram kha rang gshed kyi sgom pa 'di gsungs so// stong nyid dang las sku sprul pa// khro rgyal rngam pa'i gshin rje
51b6(1): gshed// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// khams gsum srid pa thams cad kyang // byad kyis 'thor thangs 'og tu brdzis// thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' nyid// kham nag ral pa zur gsum
52a1(1): brdzes// yang na mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bsdams// de yi zur gsum rtse mo nas// hUM nag sol dum bcag pa 'dra// thugs kha lcags kyi rus sbal la// mtshon cha'i sgra la nyi ma'i mig/ sder mo
52a2(1): lcags kyis 'khrig pa 'dra// yan lag mgo dang gzhug ma drug/ rang 'byung mchod rten drug tu gnas// lto na lcags kyi sa ru de// mtshon cha sna tshogs pa na// srid pa gsum gyi bla rtse 'khyams// dmigs pa gang
52a3(1): yin drug po'i srog/ rus sbal rngam pa'i shugs kyis 'dren// de 'dra gsal ba'i hUM nag la// 'khor lo lta bur yig 'bru spros// dmigs pa gang yin gnas su spros// ri rgyal rbab dang gnam lcags thog/ mgo
52a4(1): bkas lus la gsher btab nas// lcags kyus drangs te rdzas la bstim// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gang dag log 'dren bzlog pa'i dus// de nyid rab tu gsal brten la// drag
52a5(1): sngags mtshon cha me dpal// dgug cing gzir nas srog snying phrogs// rang srog rang gis gcad nas kyang // drag sngags mtshon cha 'khor lo yis// myal myal gtubs shing gcad par bsam// zhes gsungs
52a6(1): so// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// ru dra bsgral bar 'dod na yang // gang yin ling ga 'khor lo sgyur// bstan pa 'jig pa'i ru dra de// 'byung ba 'dus pa'i lus nyid la// nyon mongs bag chags sems su
52b1(1): chags// de yi dkar nag snying dkyil na// dngas ma rang 'byung 'od lnga dang // snyigs ma'i dngas ma khrag mtsho 'tshal// sbal pa lta bu'i dbus na nr-i// dang po'i srog nyid chags pa'i gzhi// de las 'byung ba'i rtsa
52b2(1): bzhi chags// 'byung bzhi nus pas phung po 'grub// de bskyed pa yi lha bzhi 'byung // de las rang 'byung bdud bzhi gnas// de ltar 'byung bzhi gnas pa des// bdag gi rdzas la skyed pa la// dregs pa rang
52b3(1): dbang med par bkug/ de nas gzir te dbang med bskul// rang 'byung gnas pa'i dregs pa dang // dmigs nas rbad pa'i dregs pa gnyis// de'i tshe me dang shing 'dres tshul// 'byung ba'i phung po rlag par
52b4(1): 'gyur// rang srog rang gis gcod par 'gyur// de yis lus srog phyed par 'gyur// des kyang gsod par ma gyur na// tsit+ta gnad la phab la gtang // srog ni rab tu bskur bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas
52b5(1): yang dag bshad bya ba// de nas sreg par 'dod na yang // rang 'byung me dang 'byung ba me// me dang shing 'dres tshul du bya// las 'jug dam tshig 'dar bar bya// drag sngags 'khor lo nag po des// bka' las
52b6(1): 'das na gcod par bsam// mi 'da' mna' yis bor bar bsam// de nas dregs pa srog bral nas// chos nyid stong pa nyid las zhi// yang na rang rang gnas su 'khod// 'bru dang rdzu 'phrul phrogs byas
53a1(1): la// dngos grub blang ba'i las kyang bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ gshed 'khor lo la dgongs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas
53a2(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis ri rab mnan pa'i mchog bya ba 'di gsungs so// srin po gdug pa'i thod pa la// mnan pa'i 'khor lo bri bar bya// rdo rje rgya gram sngags dang bcas// gang yin rdzas bcug mnan pa
53a3(1): bya// dur khrod ras sam rgya shog la// rdo rje rgya gram ri rab gzugs// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi lam dang bcas// de la yi ge bkod pa yang // oM hri sti byi b+hi kri ka na na hUM phaT/ nan che ge mo sas stib/ chus khyer//
53a4(1): mes tshig/ rlung g.yengs mkhas ga/ rna ri tshi ri ti'i/ oM laM hUM laM/ staM b+ha ya nan/ de dag bris shing bzlas te mnan// mi srogs snyam pa ya nan// de ni mnan pa'i yang snying yin// dur khrod g.yam pa sngon po
53a5(1): la// dug khrag bag chus sbyar byas te// mnan na srid pa gsum yang mnon// ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sreg pa'i las 'di gsungs so// ma traM snying kha gru gsum du// bang rim gsum
53a6(1): gyis mdzes pa la// dbus su rdo rje rgya gram gyi// lte bar raM las rwa la yang // phyi rim rdo rje phyed ma dang // mtshon cha sna tshogs bri bar bya// de nas drag po'i rdzas rnams dang // ling ga dag ni rab spungs
53b1(1): nas// bdag nyid ya man ta kar bsgom// oM sa ma ya/ Ar+ya many+dza/ e la tsakra/ e ra ga badz+ra/ ming trig mnan/ srog la hur thums dza/ ming srog mA ra ya/ ag ne dza la raM raM/ zhes ni rab tu khros pas
53b2(1): sreg/ thal ba mchod rten 'og tu mnan// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ mnan sreg drag po'i le'u ste nga gcig pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin
53b3(1): las kyi rim pa 'di gsungs so// rab tu ri zlum sa dkar du// maN+Dal zlum po zla ba 'dra// 'khor lo ga'u'i sbyor ba dang // bzhin dang chas dang lha phyogs kyis// phur bu rtse mo zlum byas te// rtsa ba dag las shan
53b4(1): ting gis// 'jigs pa brgyad las yang dag skyob// rdzas dang gtor ma mchod pa rims// de phyir sa gtsang gser ri la// gur kum dag la bsten pa yi// ling ga'i 'khor lo bcas rdzogs nas// bzhin dang
53b5(1): phur bu rgyan chas phyogs// ma ning pus ting ku ru yis// sbyor ba drug dang ldan par 'gyur// ri dmar brag dmar gnas dag tu// ga'u 'khor lo bcas rdzogs par// rgya skyegs dag gis bri bar bya// phur gdab
53b6(1): bzhin dang rgyan chas phyogs// ma nor pa shang ku ru yis// mos pa rnam bzhi thob par 'gyur// dmar nag gru gsum zla gam 'dra// ro bsregs sol ba rdo sol khrag/ khros pas sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang // phu
54a1(1): gdab bzhin bzlog chas bsgyur nas// la phyogs ma nor ma ra ya// 'jig rten mngon spyod 'grub par 'gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i le'u
54a2(1): ste nga gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'jig rten mgon po des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// kye ma 'jig rten mgon po lags// bstan pa dam pa bsrung ba las// bsgrub dang gdab pa'i las
54a3(1): rdzogs pa// 'jig rten mgon pos ji ltar gdab// ces gsol pas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dmod pa'i yang snying 'di gsungs so// gnod sbyin dmar po sha zan gyi// dmod pa'i yang snying dam pa
54a4(1): de// sngags pa nag 'gras byung yang rung // snying po bcud len 'bru la 'du// de don snying po mchog gyur pa// oM a kri rA tsa dur na/ sa du snying la sril sril// a kro rA tsa tsi ta ni sha la rbad rbad/ ya ya rnal ma tri
54a5(1): dza/ snying la kha thun ma ra ya rbad/ 'gul khug dag tu nyungs kar la// drag sngags bsnyen pas grangs gyur na// gang la bya ba thogs med ces// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu bshad// de nas gnod sbyin dmar
54a6(1): po rus sbal spu gri'i drag sngags 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bri// rtsibs drug mchod rten drug dang sbyar// dbus su rnag pa'i ming rus bri// thod pa nag po'i nang du brub// thod pa rgya gram lam
54b1(1): dang bcas// nyungs kar khrag dang til nag gis// ling ga dag la bri bar bya// tro ma ri na sha trag thun/ tsi ta mA ra ya tri rbad/ tsi ta s+tha ma yag sha rbad// srog te tri ma sha dza/ tsag re kha tri/ yag sha dza/ tsi ta ma Ni
54b2(1): ya ya dza/ dgra bo'i tsi ta dza la raM shag sha rbad rbad/ de dag bris dang bzlas byas te// zhag bdun nub mo las la sbyar// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ las 'phrang dog
54b3(1): drag po ljang nag khros pa gnod sbyin dmar po'i dmod sngags kyi le'u ste nga gsum pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi srin po khyi khrid yab yum gyi drag po'i dmod sngags 'di gsungs so// dur khrod
54b4(1): mon gyi mgo bo la// dug dag khrag gis rab byugs la// rta khrag ra khrag mi khrag dang // chang la sogs pas rab bsgyur nas// rnal 'byor sngas su gzhag par bya// grub pa'i rmi rtags byung ba dang // rnal
54b5(1): gri'i thod par thun b+h+yo la// thod par gzas pa'i ling ga bri// de nas thun dbang rdzas dgod brdeg/ drag sngags sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang // shar phyogs brag dang chu 'thab tu// ling ga thod pa bcas la gzhag/ rtsa
54b6(1): rgyud rlag par yang dag bshad// yag sha 'gri na mA ra ya dza dza/ yag mo ging kha rag ma b+h+yo/ badz+ra kha d+ha kha d+ha ya/ mA ra ya rbad/ tsit+ta rbad snying subs/ tri a 'gu sha/ ha na ma tha/ ka ki d+ha ha/ rag sha lu kha/ gar rdza
55a1(1): ya ma ra ya phaT phaT/ ces pas 'grub par yang dag gzung // dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ srin po khyi khrid mar po bse'i gyad kyi dmod sngags kyi le'u ste nga bzhi
55a2(1): pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gshin rje dmar po las kyi shan pa bse gdong gi drag sngags 'di gsungs so// dur khrod gnas su sa gzung la/ nyungs kar rgyal po dag dang ni// mdo'i phye
55a3(1): ma rab bsres la// gshin rje khrag skyug snying po bzlas// a mu ka yi rdzas blangs brub// lus la thun gyis thebs pa dang // khrag skyug sbrid cing brgyal nas su// 'gul mi shes par sa la lhung // ta na bi yo da ya
55a4(1): pan tsa hUM che ge mo hUM phaT/ pa tsa b+hI tra sa ma ya/ btsan thabs 'di la las sbyar na// dgra 'am bgegs la sogs pa brlag/ gzhan yang khrag dang chu dang gangs// gang la bya ba thogs med ces// dam tshig bdag
55a5(1): sa rab tu gsungs// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme gyud las/ bse gdong gshin rje dmar po khrag skyug gi ngan sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nga lnga pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
55a6(1): bdud kyi gyad chen srog len dmar po'i phung bshig 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ched du dben pa ru// lha bsnyen sngon du song ba des// daN+Dal gru gsum mthing nag tu// khyi nag dom bu'i thod pa ru// khri khrag khyi yi
55b1(1): klad pa dang // ra khrag ra yi klad pa blugs// gang la bya ba'i ming yang gzhug/ bzlas pa drag la gril bar bya// bdud kyi khram la thebs pa dang // bdud po nag po snying du 'jug/ sems kyang bar snang khams la
55b2(1): 'phyo// ri'u nag po gon pa rmi// rta nag po ni zhon pa dang // mi nag 'bod dang khyi nag za// bya nag mang po dngos su lding // ltas ngan de rnams byung ba na// phung shig las rnams 'grub pa yin// tsa kha mu tsa kha mu
55b3(1): snying rtsa che/ chom sa ya chom sa ya/ ruM ruM thul yang yang sod/ yuM yuM thul/ snying la tsho tsho/ srog rtsa la thob ya ya/ dza dza thum la/ snying la chom chom/ srog rtsa la tho ba ya ya/ dza dza thum laM/ snying la chom chom/ srog rtsa la
55b4(1): ya thob ya ya/ trag trag snying la ya/ ra tri ru tri ru mA ra du sod/ tha pri tha pri tha pri/ mA ra ya sod sod/ ces pa drag tu bzlas gyur na// blag bas dam rdzas gtang rag gtang // dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar
55b5(1): ba'i rmi rgyud las/ bdud srog len nag po'i le'u ste nga drug pa'o// // de nas 'jig rten mgon po des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// kye ma bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed che// rgyud kyi rgyal po
55b6(1): de nyid ni// ji ltar byung zhing ji ltar gnas// rgyud kyi ming ni ji ltar gsal// yongs su gzung zhing bca' ba dang // tha ma rdzogs dang gtad pa ji lta bu// zhes zhus pas/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal
56a1(1): gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye ma 'jig rten mthu chen nyon// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyid ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med
56a2(1): pa'i// srog gi ngo bo shar ba'i rgyud// dus gsum bud+d+ha bla med rgyud// thugs rje che la thabs mkhas pas// gdug pa 'dul phyir bstan pa 'di la dgongs// thar pa'i lam log las kyis mnar ba
56a3(1): rnams// bstan pa 'jig cing rnal 'byor sku la bsngo// de yi 'bras bu dmyal khams 'khor bar rgyud// de dag thar lam bstan phyir ngas// don dam spros med to med mnyam nyid dang // rtags kyi gdug pa ma
56a4(1): lus 'dul phyir bshad// drag po thugs rjes gdug pa 'dul phyir bshad// rgyud kyi ming ni dmar nag 'bar ba'i rgyud// nag po chos nyid mi 'gyur stong pa'i don// dmar po bsgral ba ma bkag sgrol ba'i
56a5(1): rtags// don bzhin rtags rnams 'brel pa'i rgyud du bshad// lnga brgya tha ma dus kyi bstan pas nyen// rang sha za zhing rang khrag 'thung dus su// sangs rgyas bstan pa mi gnas dus de ru// rang gis rang gi
56a6(1): bstan pa 'jig dus su// rdo rje rgyud sme 'di yis bstan pa bsrung // rdo rje mtshon cha gcod pa'i rgyud du zung // dregs pa'i srog snying rang la 'dus pas na// snying 'khor myos byed chen po'i rgyud du zung // rgyud kyi
56b1(1): bca' thabs bstan pa yang // rgya mtsho'i gting du rdo ba bor ltar bca'// chu srin gre bar rin chen lta bur bca'// ma snyed dbyings su rtog spyod 'das ltar bca'// kun la spel na bstan pa 'jig par
56b2(1): byed// mtshon cha'i 'khor los rang la gcod par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos rang gi snying khrag 'jib// rtag tu gshin rje'i khang par 'khyams par 'gyur// legs par nyon la yid la zung // dpal 'bar dbang
56b3(1): phyug 'jig rten skyong ba'i gtso// lha klu mkha' 'gro 'khor dang bcas pa yis// rgyud 'di gzung zhing bca' bar bya// rdzogs ldan gnyis ldan bstan pa mar 'grib la// bstan pa mi gnas rang gis 'jig/ de'i
56b4(1): tshe bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir// chos nyid skye 'gag med pa'i klong dkyil nas// nyon mongs gdug pa 'dul phyir rang nyid khro// dpal 'bar chen po ya man ta ka yis// byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshul du
56b5(1): don las rtags// sdud pa 'jig rten mgon po dang // lha klu gnod sbyin la sogs du ma'i tshogs// phyogs kyi yab yum sprul pa dpag med dang // bdun brgya nyi shu gshin rje'i tshogs rnams la// lha srin gnad
56b6(1): phebs srog gi rgyud chen gtad// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las// rgyud 'byung ba dang / ming dang / bca' thabs dang / yongs su gsung ba dang / rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste
57a1(1): bdun pa'o// // de nas 'jig rten skyong ba'i gtso bo dang // ye shes kyi gshed bzhi dang // phyogs skyong ba'i khro bo dang / gdug byed kyi gshin rje bdun brgya nyi shu dang / sprul pa bye ba dgu khrim
57a2(1): mo dang bcas pa dang / gdug byed bse'i lha mo dang / bse'i gyad dang / bdud ging dang / sgrol ging dang / shan pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang / gshin rje dang / srin po dang / gnod sbyin dang / nam
57a3(1): mkha' lding dang / thams cad pa'i 'khor dag dga' mgu yi rangs te mgrin gcig tu bstod pa/ mi gnas mi dmigs chos sku dag pa la// bdud 'dul khro bo mchog gi skur bstan pa// thugs rje gzi ldan
57a4(1): gdug pa thabs kyis 'dul// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha// nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od 'bar zhing // gdug pa'i mtshon cha mang po phyag
57a5(1): na bsnams// rab brjid gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// ta na ga ta dbyings su 'khril ba'i yum// dbang phyug chen po'i sku la nyer gnas pa// rdo rje ro langs ma dang ral gcig ma// gdug pa 'dul
57a6(1): mdzad yum la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod de me tog rab tu gtor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar chen po nyid de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur to// de nas yang 'khor mang po rnams 'dus te/ dpal
57b1(1): 'bar chen po'i 'khor na/ 'jig rten pa du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor skyong zhing dregs pa can thams cad kyi gtso bo mdzad pa dang / sgrol ging bdag po la bstod pa/ dpal 'bar dbang phyug 'jig rten
57b2(1): pa'i gtso// zhes bstod do// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rmi rgyud las/ lha srin gyis rjes su yi rangs te bstod pa'i le'u ste nga brgyad pa'o// // de nas lha dang mkha' 'gro rnams kyis/ 'jig
57b3(1): rten 'di ru mi la ma gtad par/ yul u rgyan gyi yul rgya mtsho chen po la brten pa rdzu 'phrul gyis bgrod pa las/ gzhan gyis bgrod par mi nas pa/ dur khrod chen po dbus 'gyur gyi tshal/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro/
57b4(1): ma 'du ba'i gling / ri zo mo pu ri byang chub kyi tshal bya ba de na/ rang 'byung gi mchod rten chen po gnas pa la/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis grub ste/ bstan pa bsrung ba'i don du rin po che gser gyi glegs bam la/
57b5(1): bai DUr+ya zhun mas sbrus bris pa tsam du rang nan du bris nas/ bse dang lcags kyi sdig par bcug/ rus pa sna tshogs pa'i sgrom bur stsal te sbas so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud rdzogs
57b6(1): so// // de nas slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas rdo rje zod 'phreng rtsal/ dbu rgyan slag sha sha'i lung pa phug khong seng chen bya ba de na dgongs pa mdzad pa las/ lha srin rnams kyis nyin bzhin du bskor ba
58a1(1): mdzad de/ mkha' 'gro mas lung bstan pa yin no// de nas bod yul dbus su/ rje byang chub sems dpa' khri srong lde btsan gyis bsam yas bzhengs su gsol bas/ lha srin gyis rtsig tu ma gter
58a2(1): nas/ ji ltar bya zhus pas/ slob dpon bo d+hi sa twa'i zhal nas/ u rgyan pad+ma bya ba rgya gar na bzhugs te/ spyan 'drongs na lha srin thul lo gsungs nas spyan dren gtang bas/ slob dpon gyi mngon par shes pa la
58a3(1): shar nas/ bsam yas byon pa dang lam khar mjal nas/ der dregs can btul/ bsam yas lhun gyis grub ste/ 'jam dpal dmar nag ni 'ching phu'i brag phug rke'u'i ya thog tu/ u rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma
58a4(1): 'byung gnas dang // lo tsa ba dge slong nam mkha'i snying pos bsgyur ba'o// rdo rje zod 'phreng gis/ rdo rje dbang phyug bde chen rtsal/ des rdo rje dbang chen 'byam pa rtsal/ zhal dri med zla shar rtsal/ spu ngan rdo rje
58a5(1): yang dbang gter// kun la yod na khyad par med// rgyud lugs 'di dang 'grogs nas gter du mchis// las dag dam tshig can dang phrad par shog/
58b1(1): rgya gar skad du/ ya ma rA dza karma bi shi tan tra/ bod skad du/ gshin rje'i rgyal po las sna tshogs pa'i rgyud/ 'jam dpal gshin rje 'joms byed drug po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas mgon po gshin
58b2(1): rje gshed// shi tu drag por khros nas kyang // yang dag gsang ba'i nges don las// sdig can gang zhig 'das byed pa// de dag chad pas gcad pa'i phyir// drag po sngags kyi las 'di gsungs// dam tshig nyams
58b3(1): pa'i dgra bo la// zor dang thun gyis bsgral ba'i phyir// dben pa'i dur khrod gnas song nas// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// gus pas de la phyag btsal nas// gshin rje'i dgra ni spyan drangs te// ya ma rA dza
58b4(1): gdul bar bya'o// ya ma rA dza spyan drangs te// gang la bya ba gdul bar bya'o// maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dam rdzas lnga yis chag chag btab// dkyil 'khor dbus su bri ba ni// mthing nag gru gsum bri bar
58b5(1): bya// mgo bo rang gi phyogs su bstan// ya mAn ta ka yab yum dgod// ya ma rA dza stangs dbyal dang // lcags kyi sbrang mo mang po dgod// bdag nyid drag po rab yum bsgom// gshed ma ya rA dza sgom// phonya
58b6(1): 'joms pa'i las byed ma// lcags kyi spyang mo ral gcig sgom// dam rdzas yo byad tshang bar bsags// rnam shes dbang po dgug bya'i phyir// dgra bo dgug pa'i nyo nya gtang // khug cig pho nya mi bzang
59a1(1): ma// lcags kyi spyang mo ral gcig ma// mig nas khrag gi tsha tsha 'phro// kha nas skad 'don tser re re/ ral pa sprugs pa'i sgra gseb nas// khro chu khol ma'i sbyin thang 'beb// rkang lag lcags kyi
59a2(1): sder mo las// gnam sa med par sbar gyis 'debs// ri klungs med par rjes kyis 'gengs// zas su sems can gson po za// bang gis gnas su yud kyis phyin// gang la bya ba'i dgra bo de// ma thogs myur
59a3(1): du khrid la shog/ dang po zhe sdang pha yi skyed// bar du 'dod chags ma yi mngal// de nas dri za lte bar 'khor// tha mar nyon mongs lnga yi gzugs// lnga phung rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// gshin rje ma mo phonya
59a4(1): rnams// thogs med 'jigs pa'i sku ru sprul pa la// mgo bo'i dkyil du khrag zor ya// lta ba'i mig la khrag zor ya// nyan pa'i rna la khrag zor ya// snom pa'i sna la khrag zor ya// smra ba'i lce la khrag zor
59a5(1): ya// dran pa'i snying la khrag zor ya// 'gro ba'i rkang la khrag zor ya// yul mkhar khyim la khrag zor ya// nor gyi dbyig la khrag zor ya// 'og gi rta la khrag zor ya// bu dang chung ma bu mo dang // 'khor bcas ma
59a6(1): lus rdul du rlog/ khrag zor 'phang ba'i sngags/ thod khrag smros shig tsiSh+Na gu lu nan/ snying khrag smros shig tsakra raM/ rnam shes smros shig sha na raM/ ngag rnams smros shig so ting kha ram/ gzugs phung chings shig su
59b1(1): tri ni/ yan lag cings shig dza tri dza traM/ zhes brjod la seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa zor dang bcas pa 'phang ngo // bal mo nag mo mi sring gdug pa'i sngags kyis 'phang ngo // bram ze lce dgu'i dgug pa'i
59b2(1): ngan sngags kyis gdab cing 'phang ngo // de nas dam nyams dgra bo de// 'chor ba med par bya ba'i phyir// bdud mo mi zan nyid la gtad// ma bdun dpon g.yog gsum la gtad// ya ma rA dza nyid la
59b3(1): gtad// gdab pa'i sngags la/ i u e sa ma ya thibs thibs/ ling shar yang nges so// oM sa ma ya tiSh+Tha haM/ ma ma mA ru thibs thibs/ thab bru bur kha sha paM/ rbad thum ri li li/ thig nag gcig med//
59b4(1): gnyis drug brgyad bcad// mnam mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi reng sod/ badz+ra ne phaT/ badz+ra ra ra de phaT/ badz+ra dza ra de phaT/ badz+ra da de phaT/ badz+ra i ting na ga le/ nA ga le/ sum pa le tsin yang tsin
59b5(1): yang / len yang len yang // dgra bo che ge mo/ ma rA ya dza/ drag po kun 'joms ngan sngags 'dis// btab na lha yang rlag par 'gyur// dgra la btab na zhag gsum na// rdul cha tsam yang med par
59b6(1): byed// brnag pa bcud kyi nying khu 'di// snod ngan phal pa bstan pa min// gshin rje nag po las sna tshogs pa'i rgyud las/ khrag zor 'phang ba'i le'u ste dang pa'o// // de nas mgon po ha la skus// zhe sdang cho
60a1(1): gzod 'di yis// skye bo chos nyid ma rtogs pas// rnal 'byor sku dgra byed pa la// bstan pa bsrung phyir 'di gsungs so// mi mgo ma rnams kyis thod pa ya mtshan can yang rung / rje rigs yod
60a2(1): na legs/ de med na skye bo drag rtsal can gyi thod pa blangs la/ de yang rlon pa rnyed na legs/ na skam po la zor snod byas la/ de yi nang snying khrag dang phud gtsang mas bkang la/ nam phar phyed tshur la langs la/ dgra
60a3(1): bopo'i phyogs la kha bltas la/ ting nge 'dzin gsal la ma mo 'bum sde'i sngags 'di brjod do// oM ya mA ya/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha mo rbad/ rbad mo phaT/ raka sha ma rbad phaT/ ti sha ma phaT/ rbad bruM phaT/ ma mo rabs gcod mo
60a4(1): phaT/ ma ma snying kha rag mo rbad/ snying khrag 'thung pa'i ma mo ha ha ba/ ces grangs 'bum yan chad bzlas la/ thod khrag 'di dgra bo'i dur la 'phangs la// gang du phyin pa'i sar dbang bskur la gzhag/ de gtor
60a5(1): ma cha gcig dgra bo'i dur du sbas na dgra bo rabs 'chad do// sngags yang rnam gcig la/ yungs kar dang khrag bsres la gdab pa/ oM shag shag rbad thum ri la li li/ thum ri la li da dza/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad
60a6(1): bzlas so// de yang brdeg thabs rnams gcig la/ dgra bo'i khyim la brdeg pa'i thabs kyis thabs dang sba thabs su brdeg ste/ ma tshor bar gdung sna la brdeg/ tshor na mi rung ngo // ma mo d+hi ti ma b+h+yo/ ma mo shi kri ma b+h+yo/
60b1(1): ma mo sha len ma b+h+yo/ ma mo khrag 'thung ma b+h+yo/ ma mo rus 'cha' ma b+h+yo/ ma mo srog gcod ma b+h+yo/ ma mo dbugs len ma b+h+yo/ ma mo mdangs len ma b+h+yo/ ma mo yid 'phrog ma b+h+yo/ ma mo tshe 'phrog ma b+h+yo/ dkar nag
60b2(1): snying gi mtshams su rgyob// sems 'di ma bzung yang bar thong // sha khrag rus pa'i mchod pa 'bul// dug gsum mchod pa 'di bzhes la// sdig can 'di yis 'gal byed de// dam tshig can gyi bka' gcod
60b3(1): pa// dben rigs gnyen po bshig bshig pa// lha rigs dkor la 'bag 'bag pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' bslu ba// nams kyang gtang bar mi bya ste// ma gzhag bsgral na bde chen po// dza dza shig
60b4(1): shig se khog bzhin du shig/ phyogs mtshams med par gtong cig rlung la phyor// oM na mo b+hu thA/ pra man ti pra man ta dze dza ko sha ri sho ka ri phaT/ mi shu pre phaT/ phung shi shu he phaT/ snying khrag khong nas khar
60b5(1): 'thung la/ khong khrag kha nas skyug tu chug/ na mo kha se me/ kha se me phaT/ dgra bo'i snying rtsa drang ba 'di skad do// phrig phrig kub kub ig ig aM g+hu sha dza dza/ 'dren pa'i sngags so// tsit+ta nr-i ma ra ya dza/ so na
60b6(1): sha ba le/ tsod pa le hUM hUM/ yaM ti/ su tri ni/ ma mo gnam gyi dpal mo btsan b+h+yo/ bskyed tri b+h+yo/ da rod a da ro/ kha kha le le dza dza/ u shu u shu skyes de ur mo/ skye ro skye ro ma ma lha dza dza dza/ ra lu ru lu/ kha cher mi
61a1(1): shig/ tsin d+ha tsin d+ha/ rbad rbad/ ha ha ho ho/ yan lag bsnol cig/ d+hing d+hing dgra bo'i sgal tshigs chu shig phaT phaT/ dges par rol cig/ ha ha ho ho/ mi khyim phung bya gdangs phung du thogs
61a2(1): shig/ mA ra ya mA ra ya dgra bo phung du chug shig sho ra re/ b+ha ri ha/ bal ka b+h+yo/ bal ka b+h+yo/ za ro sho ha/ ha kha'i ha kha'i/ dpa' bo khyed rnams kyis thal bar lhogs shig/ ha ba ha ba he ba he ba/ ma mo chen mo khrag
61a3(1): 'thung ma la/ lag na dgra bo'i tshe dang dbugs 'chang ba/ drongs shig khug cig dgra bo nr-i dza nr-i dza/ tshal da shag tshal da shag/ baM bruM baM bruM/ mugs mugs/ myogs myogs/ rab 'bring 'asum las lo zla ba dang
61a4(1): zhag dus so// dza na hi dza na hi/ na ya man d+hi rbad/ shes pa la ya/ smra ba'i lce la ya/ snying tshig tsit+ta la ya/ snang shes lus la ya/ tsit+ta d+ha tsin d+ha b+h+yo byed shes phaT/ tsin d+ha tsin d+ha hUM phaT/ khal te khal te hUM phaT/
61a5(1): rgyud du hUM/ ya ma ye hUM phaT/ dgra bo'i snying dang srog tsa la b+h+yo/ zhes sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ zod pa'i nang du spyang khu'i mche ba gnyis btsal/ btsal ba'i dus su dgra bo'i ming nas byung la bri/ sngags su hA
61a6(1): ha he he/ mche ba gnyis la btsal la sbas te/ ho ho he ha/ zhes bya sha zan gang yang rung ba'i mgo bo btsal la gzhug/ krid bya krod byo khyi rgya bo'i mche ba la dgra bo'i ming rus bris la btsal/ ha ha zhes 'ug pa'i
61b1(1): mgo la mig rus bris la btsal/ mchu la ming rus bris la btsal/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ zhag dus sna tshogs btsal la/ khyad par du gu gul nag po med du mi rung ngo // zhag gsum du bsnyen pa gzugs shing bden
61b2(1): pa bdar/ gser skyems gcig bshams la bsrung ba'i lha 'dre dang phyed par byed// mchod pa len du ma 'tshal na/ gzod bdag nyid chas su zhugs la/ ting nge 'dzin gsal la drag po'i las bya'o// de nas
61b3(1): sngags gong ma gtang ngo // bdag gi gung mo la khrag phyung la dpral ba'i dbyings su bsku'o// 'o dod bod bdag gis mnyes byas la/ rang gi sna la khrag phyung la dpung mgo g.yas g.yon du bsku/ lag ngar g.yas
61b4(1): g.yon du byug/ thod pa'i mig gi bug pa'i nang du nas zhing ras kyis btags la/ zhing ras kyis ma so nas kyang btags la/ dgra bo'i phyogs su bstan la las bya'o// zag nye na dgra bo'i khyim dang mkhar la
61b5(1): 'phang ngo // ring na phyogs su 'phangs so// gshin rje las sna tshogs pa'i rgyud las/ zhe sdang gi cho ga zo zor nag po'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de ma grub na thod pa mo'i zor gtang na/ nyi ma bzhi pa'i sngags
61b6(1): 'bum bzlas te/ nyi ma dang po'i sngags kyis mgo 'khor bar byed/ nyi ma gnyis pa'i sngags kyis khrag 'thor bar byed/ nyi ma gsum pa'i sngags kyis rab tu brgyal bar byed/ nyi ma bzhi pa'i sngags kyis ma ra
62a1(1): ya gdon mi za bar 'grub/ de la mgo 'khor bar byed pa'i sngags la/ ma b+h+yo ri dzi praM ma ra ya dza/ steng 'dren cing smos par byed par sngags la/ kho ra pra phaT/ phod phod/ mA ra ya dza/ kha nas rba
62a2(1): 'bod zer zhing yan lag sa la brdung ba'i sngags la/ duM duM bruM bruM kha rag sha thum ri li li dza/ lus la bya ba'i sngags la/ kha sha baM ra ka sha traM/ rbad bruM ri li li/ 'gro ba'i stabs la bya ba'i sngags la/ kug bruM
62a3(1): bruM/ hri hri dul dul sod sod/ des 'chor mi srid do// yid la brnag pa chen po byed na/ rdzas kyi rnam grangs ni/ rnal dri mo'i thod pa dang / ra rgya bo'i snying khrag dang / byi la ga pa'i 'jug bu dang / bla rdo'am 'og
62a4(1): sa blangs la 'brus te/ gro ga 'am shing shun la gzugs bcas te/ tshon skud sna lngas bcing / dkyil 'khor mthing kha gru gsum du bris pa'i nang du gzhag/ ling ga'i mgo gshin rje la gtad/ rkang pa byang shar gyi
62a5(1): 'byung po la gtad la/ dgongs pa lcags kyi lcang mo ral gcig ma sgom/ de las bsdus te bsgoms pas khrag gi rgya mtsho me long tsam du sgom/ de las 'od 'phros slar 'dus pa las/ dpal gyi bka' nyan khrag
62a6(1): gi dri snom ma/ phyag brnyan pho nya rnams thugs ka nas bskyed do// de rnams kyis dgra bo'i snying dkar nag gi mtshams nas rnam par shes pa'i sems yud tsam gyis khugs par bsam mo// de la 'di skad bskul
62b1(1): lo// dgra bo dbugs pa'i pho nya btang // dpal gyi phyag brnyan khrag gi dri snom ma/ khrag mdog dmar mo bse yi lan phran can// spyan mig nyi ma'i zer dang 'dra zhing rno// lcang mo lcags kyu'i rtse la bskal pa'i me
62b2(1): chen 'bar// dgra bo nyams pa'i snying 'byin chang par bcug la gsol// khros pa'i kha dog dmar po khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag/ skad ni nam mkha'i 'brug pas che// bang ni bar snang glog pas mgyogs// zangs sder
62b3(1): dmar po lag pa na// bye phrug sha chen 'dzum pa ltar// 'gal byed 'byung po'i don snying sbar gyis 'debs// phung po rdul phran bzhin du rlogs// gzugs la phung po ma yin par// rnam par shes pa khyer la
62b4(1): shog/ ces nyungs kar gyis pho nya lan gsum bkye bas/ rgyab rten dang dbral lo// yid kyis mngon sum du zhugs par sa la dmigs la gzugs la phab la gu gul nag po dang / til nag pos bdug
62b5(1): go/ mtshams drag tu gcad do// de nas seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer du brdeg go/ gnyis snying khar brdeg go/ gnyis parla gnyis la brdeg go/ gnyis dpung mgo re rer brdeg
62b6(1): go/ de nas yang yungs kar gyi rgyal po thogs la bram ze lce dgu'i sngags kyis brdeg go/ dgra bo'i snying dkar nag mtshams su gdab bo// i yu a sa ma ya thibs thibs/ dgra bo ma ra dza/ zhes btab na mi
63a1(1): 'chor ro// nges so// 'chor mi srid do// yang mon nam rabs chad nag mo'i thod par dgra bo'i ming byang stsal la/ chu mig nya lcibs can mis ma tshor bar btsal te/ bal mo'i ngan sngags kyis
63a2(1): gdab bo// oM sa ma ya triSh+Tha maM/ ma ru mA ra ya thibs thibs/ zab bra bur kha sha yaM baM maM/ rbad zum ri li li/ mA ra ya dza dza/ sngon bal mo kun chen dang bal mo rdo rje gnyis kyi mthu 'gran pas/ nags kyi spyang mo
63a3(1): la me 'chad pa la/ ming pos sngags btab cing g.yag lpags rlon pas brdabs nas rog rog btang ngo // sring mos sngags rang gis btab pas sol bar rog gis btang ngo // sngags 'di ci la btab kyang mi
63a4(1): 'chor ro// oM rmag shag rmag shag rbad/ thum ri li li rbad/ mur mo shang / sed ya sems/ ba b+ha ya mA ra ya zhes gtogs shig/ rgyus pa rtsa nas phyung zhig/ mig sgyu nas drongs shig/ lce skam par drongs shig/ de
63a5(1): nas bdud mo mi zan la gtad pa'i thabs la/ thig nig gcig ched/ gnyis drag brgyad bcad/ gnam mthong phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi rang sod/ des 'chor mi srid do// de nas ma bdud dpon g.yog la
63a6(1): gtad pa'i sngags la/ badz+ra ne ne phaT/ ma le dum dgra bo la phaT/ mA ra ya dza/ g.ya' ma skyol la gtad pa'i sngags la/ badz+ra ra ra de phaT/ bal ma dre'u sna ma la gtad pa'i sngags la/ badz+ra dz+wa ra te phaT/ khri sman/
63b1(1): la gtad pa'i sngags la/ badz+ra e hi e hi/ nA ga le nA ga le/ dum ba le/ sum pa le/ zhes brdeg go/ de nas yang dgra bo dgug pa'i pho nya btang la 'di skad do// hUM sku yang thu lum chen mo la// zhal kyang thu
63b2(1): lum chen mo ste/ phyag kyang thu lum chen mo la// zhabs kyang thu lum chen mo la// mche ba thu lum chen mo la// bar bar ral ba char du 'bebs// mche ba thu lum gtsigs pa yis// gnam lcags zhun ma'i ser
63b3(1): chen 'bebs// lag pa g.yab mo brdabs pa yis// khro chu khol ma'i sbyin thang 'bebs// gdug pa'i rkan sgra gtogs pas kyang // srid pa'i ri rab rtse nas snyil// drag po'i rgya mtsho gting nas skems// 'di ni
63b4(1): gdul byed chen mo ste// zhal gyi ngom zum nag mo yis// khro chu khol ma'i mdog 'dra ma// ral pa'i sprin dmar glog ltar 'gyur// 'di ni dpal gyi pho nya ste// 'jig rten khams rnams za ba mo// drongs shig khug
63b5(1): cig pho nya mo// sdang ba'i dgra bo khrid la shog/ oM rbad bu rbad bu/ thal ba thal ba/ phye ma phye ma/ rdul phran rdul phran/ ma ra ya dza/ zhes brdeg go/ sa gzhi gnon pa'i dus su byi brun gyis brdeg go/ sa tshon thebs
63b6(1): nas rang gi chu dang bud med kyi zla mtshan gsum bsres la gdab bo// de'i sngags la/ le byin da re/ ya phye dpal rem/ se gyong se man hi tsi li zhong ngo // thog thog dpal sod/ ma me chu me/ pu ye pu ma/ mur ma
64a1(1): ti ha ra na sod/ long glo gser gyi bdag mo la btang ba la mo rkang phran gyi sngags la/ mo tsin yang tsin yang len yang len yang / nri mA ra ya dza/ glog sbur mang po na mo b+hu thA ya brdeg go/ dkyil
64a2(1): 'khor khrag gi rgya mtsho me long tsam cig sgom mo// de'i steng na lcags kyi sbrang mo me stag tsam 'phro ba 'am// mgar ba'i tsha tsha 'phro ba tsam cig sgom mo// de'i ce stong khams khyab par sgom mo// dus ni gnam stong
