129b1(1): zor nag po'i rgyud las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
129b2(1): rgya gar skad du/ shrI ya mAn+ta ka ya ma ra dza ka ya kro d+ha tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje gshed po ya ma rA dza sku khros pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
129b3(1): skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ lho phyogs gshin rje'i 'jigs rten gyi// gshin ri phyin ci log gi rtsa// gshin gyi bla mtsho mer ba yod// dug mtsho khol ma'i nang gshed na// dug gi sdig pa nag po
129b4(1): gnas// kha rlangs dug tu 'phros pa las// nag po gel ba 'jigs pa'i gzugs// lho chen mgrin pa yangs la rngam// thugs ni rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas// tshe srog kun gyi mnga' bdag mdzad// gsung gi nga
129b5(1): ros 'jigs rten g.yo// srog dbugs kun gyi mnga' bdag mdzad// sku ni ri rab ngos la brten// 'chi bdag bdud kyi bdud chen po// gshin rje nag po zhes kyang grags// bdud mo khrag gi ral pa
129b6(1): can// srid gsum zas su za byed pa// las kyis btun pa'i yum du gnas// mgo 'khor khrag skyug brgyal ba dang // gsod par byed pa'i gshin rje yis// gnod cing 'khrug la bsteg cing 'thor// nag po
130a1(1): @bkrag med bdud kyi gtso// srog gcod shan pa ging gi gtso// khrag skyug zor thogs ma mo'i gtso// zhe sdang gdug pa gtum po'i tshogs// phung po lnga la dbang sbyar ba// pho gshed sum brgya drug cu
130a2(1): yis// gsod par byed pa'i gshin rje byed// 'byung ba lnga la dbang sgyur ba// ma gshed sum brgya drug cu yis// bla srog 'gug pa'i gshin rje byed// ya ma bdun brgya nyi shu yis// nyin dang mtshan mo'i 'khor lo
130a3(1): bskor// srid gsum sems can thams cad kun// 'khrig dang 'gugs dang gnas dang gsod// 'jigs byed gshin rje'i lto na gnas// zhal nas gdug pa'i nga ro yis// khams gsum 'khrugs par gyur pa
130a4(1): las// 'jam dpal khros pas gshin rje gshed// ya ma rA dza khros pa des// sprul pas 'jig rten dbang bsdu'i phyir// gsang ba yum dang gnyis med las// sprul pa ye shes khro bo'i tshogs// nam mkha' khyab
130a5(1): par gar byed cing // khro bo gyad kyi dor stabs kyis// tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon// nag po gyel ba gtum po'i tshogs// rab tu gzir te 'phrog pa yis// las kyi ya ma gtum po des// gus dang lus
130a6(1): gnyis gdan du phul// zhal gyis dmod pa drag po'i thun// srog gi snying po dril te phul// dkyil 'khor chen po bsrung ba yi// las dang bya ba khas blang ste// snyigs ma lnga yi dus nyid du// gshin rje mthar byed
130b1(1): gang sgrub pa'i// rnal 'byor can gyi 'phrin las rnams// myur du sgrub par khas blangs nas// las kyi bdag por dbang bskur te// dmod pa kha thun drag po de// dug gi mtshon char byin gyis brlabs// sgrol
130b2(1): ging bdag por mtshan gsol to// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// 'jigs byed sku la 'di skad gsol// 'jam dpal khro bo rngam pa'i sku// 'bar byed 'jigs pa'i gtum bag can// gdug pa 'dul ba de lta/
130b3(1): na// gshin rje dpa' bo sgrub pa dang // 'chi bdag shan pa bkol ba dang // las rim rdzogs pa ji ltar bgyi// de nas 'jam dbyangs khro bo yis// 'khor la nges par bka' stsal pa// skye med dbyings las rol
130b4(1): pa yis// bstan pa'i snying po gsang don 'di// lus dang yan lag spu gri so// las kyi thus ka gsang ba yi// zhal gyi dmod pa dug gi ngar// rnal 'byor can la gnas bya'i phyir// bsnyen bsgrub rdzogs pa'i las
130b5(1): mtha' ru// rnal dang bzlog dang lto dkrugs kyis// 'chi bdag bsnyen cing bod pa dang // lus srog dbye dang ma grub spogs// gshin rje bdun brgya nyi shu yi// yang snying dril ba'i dmod pa yis// drag po spangad
130b6(1): smad ar la gtad// gnan pa las kyi thus ka ru// klu bdud sbrul nag lto bsdebs bya// bskyod pa zor gyi mde kha ru// bdud kyi lcam mo khrag mig gdags// ya ma rA dza sku khros pas// gsang ba'i bka' rgyud
131a1(1): snying po'i bcud// gsang ba don gyi snying po 'di// bgrod thob tshul khrims ldan pa yis// stobs ldan phyag rgya gsal ba yis// dmod pa'i rgyal po las kyi mchog/ thabs kyis grol ba'i lam can
131a2(1): de// nye bar gyur pa'i don du bshad// dpal gshin rje ya ma rA dzA'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas rdo rje snying po yis// 'jigs byed sku la 'di skad gsol// 'jam dbyangs khro bo rngam
131a3(1): pa'i sku// bsnyen cing sgrub pa ji lta bu// de nas 'jam dbyangs khro bo yi// ye shes lha dang las byed dang // bsnyen pa'i don du gsungs pa nyid// dur khrod chen po ma la ya// shan dmar ri dang ri nag spungs// lho
131a4(1): yi phyogs su kha bltas pa'i// brag dang sa phug dag dang ni// ri mo spungs pa'i sa phyogs dang // nags khrod stag dred 'grim pa'i gnas// nyams dga' sa phyogs dben pa ru// lta spyod gdeng ldan rnal 'byor
131a5(1): gyis// dpa' brtul dpa' bo'i grogs khrid la// grub pa'i nyi ma brtsis la 'jug/ sa phyogs zhi bar byas nas ni// mi ro spungs pa'i sa blangs la// stegs bu brtsigs la khrag gis byug/ mchod pa lnga dang b+hi
131a6(1): lam gsum// dgos rdzas tshogs par byas nas ni// sngon du bsod nams tshogs khas gas nas// de nyid ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs// dur khrod ro yi gos blangs la// char sprin nag po 'dra ba yi// yab yum
131b1(1): sras dang bcas pa bri// lho phyogs dmigs pa'i rten du dgram// rang gi rim pa byang chub sems// skye med sems nyid don gyi lha// ngang la rdzogs pa khro bo'i sku// 'khor ba mi gnas mya ngan 'das// ma bcos
131b2(1): rnal 'byor ngang la gnas// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma yis// 'jig rten 'jigs rten 'das pa'i rigs// dgos pa'i don ni gang yang rung // bsnyen na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bzlas pa'i yi ge bcu
131b3(1): bdun po// khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa dag/ mi smra mi yur mi 'khyams par// 'bum phrag lnga gnyis tshig rdzogs bya// de tshe mtshan ma yul la 'bar// 'od dang sgra dang lung ston dang // rmi lam rtags ni du ma
131b4(1): 'byung // gal te grub par ma gyur na// bsgrub rdzas gtar la bsnyen pa spogs// gtso bo'i bsnyen pa grangs thim nas// lha yi mtshan ma ma mthong na// bsnyen pa'i yi ge lto nas bzlog/ lha nyid gnad la dbab pa
131b5(1): ste// de rtags sngon du gter ba yin// lha rtags mngon du gyur pa'i tshe// dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga bya// rgya che sa yi maN+Dal la// rak+ta chen pos byug par bya// dpal dang ma mo'i gtor ma bshams// gshin rje
131b6(1): pho mo'i dam rdzas dang // snang srid ma mo bsdu ba'i phyir// rak+ta dmar gyi arga dgram// dngos grub dam shis blang ba'i phyir// bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa dang // tshe dang gal phyi la sogs pa// spyad pa'i yo byad
132a1(1): sna tshogs dgram// sngags pas chas gos legs gyon la// ku sha'i stan la 'dug nas ni// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas la// rnam par rtog med chos kyi dbyings// de yi ngang las snying rje'i
132a2(1): shugs// rtog med kun tu brdal khyab 'od// de las rgyu yis rnam par ldan// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba las// 'byung lnga ye nas dag pa yi// lhun grub gzhal yas pho brang du// dregs pa'i gdan la brjid
132a3(1): pa'i sku// rdo rje sku la khro bo'i gzugs// rang gi tshig gis bskul ba yis// nga yi gzugs su grub par byos// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// mthing nag 'jigs pa gtum bag can// mthing nag zhal
132a4(1): gsum phyag drug la// kham nag sku la spyan dgu bgrad// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs ljags slob cing // smin mtshams rlob cing 'od du 'phro// 'brug glog tshub ma 'thor zhing 'byin// ni dbyug dgra sta ral gri
132a5(1): g.yas// sdigs mdzub mdung dang zod khrag thogs// rigs bzhi'i rgyan mdzes dpal chas brgyad// zod sbrul nyi zlas sku la spros// ma he smug po'i khri stengs na// gyad kyi 'jigs tshul brjid par gnas// rdo rje
132a6(1): sku yi byin rlabs las// skye med chos dbyings sbyor ba'i yum// gyen du skra brdzes gsus mo che// tri shul ban dmar thogs nas kyang // gtso la 'dud pa'i tshul du bzhugs// dug gsum rtsad gcod khros pa'i
132b1(1): yum// mthing nag me dpung nang na bzhugs// mi snying spyang mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rab tu khros pa'i tshul du gnas// 'jigs byed thugs kyi byin rlabs las// 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza dang // nag mo khrag
132b2(1): mig khro gnyer can// brnag pa las kyi pho nyar bsam// gzhan yang sprul pa yang sbrul tshogs// dpag tu med pas bskor ba yis// bdag nyid rnam par gsal ba ni// yang dang yang du bsgom par bya// 'jam
132b3(1): dbyangs rdo rje'i hUM sgra yis// sku rgyan gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bstod cing gsal gdab sprul pa yis// gdug pa'i dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir// drag po sngags kyi tsham rngam brjod// gru gsum
132b4(1): mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// ya mAn+ta ka spyan drangs nas// mchod cing bstod pa dag kyang bya// rtag pa chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du// sngags kyi yi ge rim par bya// dngos grub chen po bsgrubs byas la// ji
132b5(1): ltar 'dod pa bzhin du blang // gsang sngags yi ge'i 'phreng ba la// gsod pa'i spu gri'i sngags btags la// nyi ma bzhi ru las la sbyar// thun gyi kha gso rgyun du bya// zhes gsungs so// gshin rje ya ma rA dza sku
132b6(1): khros pa'i rgyud las/ gshin rje dpa' bo bsnyen cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'jigs byed chen po de// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yi// sngags kyi nges pa bshad par bya// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu
133a1(1): tra ya man+ta ka pa tsa te ro ni hUM dza/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI ya man+ta ka/ ya ma rA dza/ ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza/ trag rak+ta mu tra snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ rak+Sho te kuM dza dza/ kha la ma hi b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya ya lon tsin dan ma la
133a2(1): b+h+yo dza/ snying kha rag srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ 'phags pa'i nang nas gshin rje gshed// rdo rje khros pa 'jigs pa che// 'chi bdag gshin rje shan pa'i tshogs// 'khor ni nag po 'bum dang bcas// bsnyen cing bsgrubs na
133a3(1): gang yang 'grub// skye med dbyings las sprul pa yi// shes skyob las rnams grub pas na// gsang sngags yi ge'i rim pa bya// oM shrI many+dzu ya mAn+ta ka/ ya ma rA dzA sa to mi ya/ ya me to ru na ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She
133a4(1): ya/ yak+She yata tsa ni ra ma ya hUM phaT/ ye shes lha yi bsnyen pa ste// 'jig rten dregs pa kun gyi srog/ ma lus 'dus pa'i stobs dpag med// rang bzhin stong ba spros dang bral// ye shes rigs pa'i klong du
133a5(1): brdal// smin cing grol ba'i thabs mchog ste// spros bral rnal mas shes skyob nyid// sngags ni gang yin ming yin la// mtshan dang dpe byad yongs rdzogs pas// phyag rgya chen po shes skyob nyid// 'di dag bde
133a6(1): ba'i lam can yin// nam mkha' rin chen rgya mtshos// rnam rtog seng ge khyung chen me// kam pa kyob so sa ma ri// raM yaM baM laM tsa ma ri// nA ga de ba ra ka sha dang // a dang khyab ho bu bu ta// ya ma ka li bde ba'i
133b1(1): klong // yid bzhin 'phreng ba lta bur bshad// yon tan mtha' yas shes skyob nyid// dregs pa'i srog dang 'gro drug sems// dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba'i thugs// dngos gzhi ma bcos rnal ma yis// rtsa
133b2(1): pab mi 'gyur byang chub sems// gcig ni kun gyi rang bzhin yin// khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa yi// thugs kyi snying po gsang ba ste// dug pa'i yi ge mtshon ste// yid dang dbang po rang grol gyis// ri mo la ni
133b3(1): sems gzhag ste// myur bul yi ge 'dres spangs te// rgyun gyi spyod lam thams cad kun// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yis// yan lag ma nyams bde bar bzlas// phyag rgya brtan dang dmigs pa thob// bde
133b4(1): ba'i ye shes skye ba ste// grol ba'i phyag rgya yang dag lam// 'di de bde dang smin pa'i mchog/ bgrod dang phyag rgya stobs med cing // bla ma'i bka' lung ma thob na// ji srid bzlas brjod brtson pa dag/ sun
133b5(1): 'byin grol med 'chi ba'i gnas// sngon med 'gro ba'i lam mchog bral// bde med rang 'ching mnar med spyod// de bzhin skyon spangs yon tan ldan// yid sbyin nor bu lta bu ste// ma lus dgos pa kun don
133b6(1): sgrub// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje gshed po sku khros pa'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje snying po yis// gsang sngags rim pa de ltar na// drag po'i
134a1(1): 'phrin las sbyor ka yi// brnag pa'i kha thun ji ltar bca'// las kyi 'khor lo ji ltar bskor// 'jam dbyangs khro bos nges gsungs pa// snyigs ma lnga yi dus nyid du// sangs rgyas bstan pa
134a2(1): 'jig pa yi// nyams pa bdun po bsgral ba'i phyir// dur khrod ma lings gnas mchog tu// stobs ldan mchog tu gyur ba yis// byed pa 'ching ba gsum spangs shing // dman pa'i snyigs ma gsum dor na// bde/
134a3(1): ba'i rigs pa gsum rnyed de// drug dar gsum dang ldan pa'o// rnal 'byor bde ba'i lam can des// mi 'jigs seng ge lta bur bya'o// dur khrod chen po'i sa bdag la// rtags kyi tshad ma thob pa des// maN+Dal
134a4(1): mda' gang gru bzhi la// sme khrag sna tshogs byug par bya'o// dbus su drag po'i 'brub gnas la// dug dang khrag gis byug par bya// kha khyer gdug pa'i rtsang gis bskor// yi dgas kyi ni gos dag la// nyams
134a5(1): pa'i gzugs brnyan bri bar bya// rnam shes gnad kyis 'gugs pa yi// dza yi bar du yi ge nr-i// bod cing 'grogs par byed pa nr-i// ming dang rus kyang bri bar bya// gdug pa'i khram la 'debs pa'o// mtshon cha'i
134a6(1): yi ges bskor bar bri// sngags dang ting 'dzin pho nya yis// rnam shes bkug la gzugs la bstim// gu gul sbyar ma'i dud pa yis// lha lnga myos shing 'tshubs par byed// lha lnga bskrad cing zhabs mas
134b1(1): bsdam// sngon dmar skud pas ske nas gdags// dur khrod gnas nas 'khor lo'i rgyud// rabs chad mon dang mu su ru// nag po mi shes mgo blangs la// gug rgyal dri dang chu yi bsad// ma nor thod pa gzhag
134b2(1): par bya// stag pa'i phyogs na gnas pa yi// srid pa rang grub gshin rje btsal// nag po gyel ba'i seng ge'i tshul// zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs pa ste// srid gsum zas su za ba'i tshul// brtag pa'i 'chi bdag
134b3(1): zhal dbye'o// nag po gyel pa 'jigs pa che// dngos ni bye ba gung rings so// de yi snying khar yi ge'i ya// rdo sol nag pos bri bar bya// zhal nas kha thun ngan sngags ni// 'chi bdag mtha' ma 'khor bar
134b4(1): bri// khrag gi gzugs kyi kha nas bri// zhal gyi dmod pa drag po ste// 'khor lo thun bsdebs bsgral ba'i las// thod pa'i nang du ro langs bri// lto 'am yang na 'khor lo bri// khams gsum srid gsum grong khyer
134b5(1): gsum// yum gyi lto na yod pas na/ khang khyud rim pa gsum du bskor// thod mkha' lnga dang btson khang bzhi// lcags khang bcu gnyis bcu drug tu// mkhas pas gshin rje'i grong khyer bya// dbus su 'phel byed
134b6(1): mu la ya/ khang pa'i phyogs bzhi 'byung ba bzhi// gshed kyi yi ge dgod par bya// bcu gnyis med dpal yi ge la// bcu drug kha gnon gsang sngags bri// mun dang nang du dgug pa yi// klu yi 'khor lo bri bar
135a1(1): bya// de yi phyi rim dag tu yang // dmod pa dug gi spu gri ste// 'chi bdag dmod mo zhes su grags// de nas thod pa kha sbyar la// rdza rnga brdung zhing gshin rje bod// tshil chen me dang gsur dud
135a2(1): gtang // khur ba bus te skyugs glu blang // rak+ta dmar gyi arga dang // smug chen smug chung snying la bod// 'chi bdag bskyed dang spyan drangs bstim// dbang du bsdus la 'phrin las bcol// mchod bstabs
135a3(1): 'phrin las gshed dmar bskul// dur khrod ras sam rgya shog la// gcod pa nam mkha'i 'khor lo bri// rim pa gsum ldan mtshon cha dag/ thod dbyug ral gri be con dang // rgya gram la sogs sna tshogs
135a4(1): bri// rtsang bzhi ho khung kha la dgram// rnam shes gcod cing 'gugs ste// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo zhes kyang drangs// rabs chad dang ni mon zod du// sme khrag gsum dang dug sbyar la// drag po'i sngags ni bstim
135a5(1): shing bsag/ gsang ba thun gyi 'khor lo yin// de nas 'khor lo bskor ba dag/ phyi nang gsang ba'i las rim gyis// tshogs brgyad 'joms pa'i ya tshogs brgyad// dril gtor sngags kyi mtshon cha ste// phyi yi
135a6(1): 'khor lo yin par 'dod// gnad dgu 'joms pa drag po'i 'bru// gzer dgu 'debs pa mtshon cha'i so// gnan bzlog gnad kyi 'khor lo nang // bcu bdun drag po rus sbal 'gros// gsad pa'i sngags su
135b1(1): de ltar bshad// yang gsang drag po gnad kyi gcod// rnal ma bzlog pa lto dkrug pa// yang gsang thugs kyi mtshon cha bshad// ngan sngags dug gi mtshon cha ste// rtsa ba spu gri gcod pa'i ngar// mtshon cha las kyi
135b2(1): nges par bshad// ya ma ra ya dza sa to me ya/ ya me do ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ che ge mo zhig a mu kaM pra ma ya oM phaT/ rak+ta tsa ra ya hUM phaT/ mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ ma ra ya hUM phaT/
135b3(1): rA dza sa to ru na yo ta ya/ ra ni tsa ya/ ra ni yo tsa ya/ to ru na yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ to sa tsa ra ni tsa ya k+She ya/ yo ni ra ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ yo na ru to sa tsa ra ma ya/ sa tsa ni rA dzA sa twa me ya/ ya ra ni yo na ru to me ya/
135b4(1): che ge mo a mu kaM/ snying baM ru la rbad ya/ ya tra sa la mu tra rbad/ ru sa ta nan khr-i ti rbad ya/ mA ra ya khr-i du rbad ya/ ya ma me tak+She/ rA dza sa twa/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ ka ba bzhi yi 'khrul 'khor gyis// nyin dang
135b5(1): mtshan mor las bya ba// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bshad pa yin// yang gsang snying po'i bcud dang 'bru// ya ma me ta k+She/ ni ra tsa sa/ to ru na yo/ ni ra dza/ drag po dug gi 'bru brus te// 'chi bdag las la bod pa
135b6(1): yis// rnal ba'i las su bshad pa yin// ya ma k+She ta me/ dza ra ni dza/ ya ra ni yo/ na ru to sa/ drag po gnad gcod dug gi mtshon// gtad pa'i las sngags te// dkrugs pa'i sngags su yang dag bshad// mA rA
136a1(1): ya yi so gdags sam// yang na nyin bzhi'i go rims bzhin// drag po'i 'khor lo bskor bar bya// che ge mo a mu kaM/ srog la trig shag rbad/ tsiSh+Na breng sha ka dza/ srog la thums mugs rbad/ tsiH
136a2(1): breng shag dza/ srog la thun shag rbad/ nr-i tsit+ta breng hur thums dza/ srog la gzir shag rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag dza/ srog la breng breng dza/ nr-i srog la dun dun rbad/ khaM shag tsa la rbad/ srog la myos rbad/ khyer
136a3(1): phung mugs ti ling shag lo dza/ srog rtsa khrag ti snying phyung thum ri la raM shag rbad/ gsod pa spu gri'i mtshon cha ste// lus srog 'byed pa'i sngags su bstan// zla ba tha chung mar ngo la// drag po'i las la sbyar bar
136a4(1): bya// 'khor lo'i mtshon cha me dpal gyis// rtsa srog shes pa 'brel bar byed// sngags kyi bstod tshigs bar bar du// spyi rgyugs sngags kyi phu sbugs bya// dgongs kyi ro longs rub dus su// drag po kha thun
136a5(1): sngags kyis gdab// rgyun gyi 'dzab kyis khog phub la// gshin rje nag por khram la gdab// nyungs kar sngags kyis bla dgug cing // dug khrag thun gyis bsnun cing gsad// 'khor lo gcod pa'i grogs su
136a6(1): 'gyur// las kyi sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang // tshes gcig dag tu brtsis pa yi// nyi ma sa 'og song ba la// dur khrod gnas sam klu yi grong // 'byung po'i gnas su gnan pa bya// gnan pa'i las rnams rdzogs pa
136b1(1): dang // zor gyi kha gso rgyun mi gcad// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje gshed po ya ma ra dza sku khros pa'i rgyud las// kha thun nag po 'khor lo gcod byed kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje snying po
136b2(1): yis// kha zus 'khor lo nag po yi// las kyi rim pa de lta na// 'chi bdag las kyi gshin rje rnams// gshed ma srog la rbad pa dang // drag po thun gyis gsad pa yi// thun gyi ngan sngags ji lta bu// 'jam
136b3(1): dpal khros pas nges gsungs pa// gdug byed gshin rje pho mo rnams// 'di nas byang phyogs ri bo'i rmang // dpag tshad brgyad khri mar 'das na// rgya mtsho'i gling gi bar dag na// thod pa lcags kyi mun khang
136b4(1): na// gshin rje yongs kyi sde dpon po// ma mo kun gyi tshogs rje bo// klu bdud yongs kyi srin po ste// gson gshin gnyis kyi zam kha pa// gson pho brkos la 'debs par byed// shi ba kun gyi gshin bu
136b5(1): rje// gshin rje nag po dgra bo'i gshed// bdud po mi zan skye 'gro'i bdud// bye ba gung ring sus mi zlog/ me lce klog gi 'phreng ba can// lag na be chen 'khor lo thogs// zas su dam nyams srog dbugs
136b6(1): za// ma he nag po zhon nas rgyu// thog dang ser ba zhal nas 'bebs// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo 'di// khram la thob la ltong la rgyus// be chen rgyob la 'khor lo skor// bdud mo khrag gi ral pa can// srid
137a1(1): gsum lhon 'chang ba mo// sha khrag srog dbugs bdag mo ste// las kyi rlung dmar zhon nas ni// lag na thod pa'i khrag spro zhing // 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad gtong ma// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra tha
137a2(1): 'di// khram la thob la stong la rgyus// khram mda' bu yug char ltar phob// sprul pa gshin rje nag po'i tshogs// pho brang lcags mkhar glong dgu nas// 'chi bdag gshin rje las la rgyu// gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po
137a3(1): ni// mthing nag ma he sngo nag chibs// lag na ral gri zhags pa thogs// bka' nyan gshin rje phya sangs ni// dkar skya zla ba'i 'khor lo zhon// lag na tshe srog bum pa thogs// mgo 'khor byed pa'i gshin rje
137a4(1): dang // tshe srog sdud pa'i gshin rje yis// tshangs pa'i rtsa chen gcad pa'i phyir// khram la thob la stong la rgyus// mtshon chas gtubs la 'khor los skor// gshin rje'i rgyal po ya ba ti// sngo nag chu glang sngon po
137a5(1): zhon// lag na ral gri dgra sta thogs// bka' nyan gshin rje rtol pa ni// nag po rnga mo rlung la zhon// lag na gsod byed mda' gzhu bsnams// khrag tu skyug pa'i gshin rje dang // srog dbugs len pa'i gshin
137a6(1): rje dang // mgrin pa'i rtsa chen gcad pa'i phyir// khram la thob la ltong la rgyus// mtshon chas chod la 'khor los skor// gshin rje a ba glang mgo ni// dud kha dre rta rkang gsum zhon// lag na lcags kyu zhags
137b1(1): pa thogs// bka' nyan gshin rje smigs pa ni// sngo nag rlung sha rA bcu zhon/ lag na ber kha zhags pa thogs// rgyal bar byed pa'i gshin rje dang // bla srog len pa'i gshin rje yis// lte ba'i rtsa chen gcad pa'i
137b2(1): phyir// khram la thob la ltong la rgyus// mtshon chas gtubs la 'khor los skor// gshin rje ral ba tshar dgu ni// ljang nag gdug pa sbrul la zhon// lag na zhags pa dbyug pa thogs// bka' nyan gshin rje
137b3(1): mig dmar ni// dmar po lkug la zhon// lag na spu gri zhags pa bsnams// gsod par byed pa'i gshin rje dang // srog rtsa gcod pa'i gshin rje yis// snying gi rtsa chen gcad pa'i phyir// khram la thob la stong la
137b4(1): rgyurgyas// mtshon chas gtubs la 'khor los skor// gshin rje'i khri khri khr-i la thob// gsod byed gshin rje'i chung ma ste// nag mo ral ba 'bebs pa mo// bdud kyi lcam mo khrag mig ma// mon mo gser gyi rna cha
137b5(1): can// nyams pa'i dgra bo bsgral ba'i phyir// khram la thob la ltong la rgyus// myos pa khrag gi thun phob cig/ gsod pa dug gi thun phob la// gsod byed gshin rje'i gnas su khrid// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo'i
137b6(1): rtsibs la skyon// gshin rje'i khri khri khri la thob// gdug byed gshin rje pho mo rnams// gshed dmar srog la bskul bar bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngan sngags 'di dag gsungs so// oM ya ma rA dza
138a1(1): sa to me b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ bai ri li ri li rbad nan/ oM dub nur dub nur/ che ge mo tshal pa tshal pa nan/ oM snying gshogs snying me kha la mu lo b+h+yo/ rtsa thun nan/ oM sa sti ru ru gong tra ra dza nan/
138a2(1): che ge mo mA ra ya nan/ oM mun ya mugs ti subs/ che ge mo la cho cho/ bal hu bal hu/ bal yu bal yu/ snying gong rtsa thun nan/ rtsa thun nan/ che ge mo nan/ khrag thun khong khrag che ge mo'i khong khrag la thum ril
138a3(1): ril b+h+yo/ myos pa khrag la gsod pa dug/ gdug pa'i mda' la dri la brdeg/ zhal gyi dmod pa dug mda' ste// 'khor lo'i kha ni thun gyis gcad// dpal gshin rje gshed ya mararA dza sku khros pa'i rgyud las//

138a5(1): na// gsad pa las kyi thus kha ru// 'chi bdag gshin rje spang smad kyi// dmod pa'i drag sngags ji ltar bsgrub// 'jam dpal khro bos nges gsungs pa// 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po yi// gsad pa las kyi thus
138a6(1): kha ru// drag po sbrad smad ar la gtad// zhal dang 'khor lo'i dmod pa yis// ma grub spogs dang shi sa bstan pa yis// gsang ba'i drag sngags bstan pa yin// thog mar byang chub sems ldan pas// dur
138b1(1): khrod dgon pa de dag tu// mi bsad g.yul gyi phungs la// maN+Dal mda' gang gru bzhi la// dbus su gru gsum chag gang rtsig/ bang rim gsum ldan nag po byug/ gtor ma bdud rtsi rak+ta dang // gshin rje pho
138b2(1): mo'i dam rdzas bsag/ mon dang snrel dri'i thod pa la// mkhas pas gshegs la 'chi bdag bri// pho dang mo yi drag sngags ni// g.yas dang g.yon du ma nor bri// beb sa ti sang ha'i mgo/ bskyed la spyan drangs
138b3(1): dbang bsdu mchod// lho ru a mu rni dza gzhug/ chos ldan dar nag re bas gtum// 'brub khung bcug la ro lam brgyad// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim pa las// gshin rje gshed po gsal bar bya// las kyi gshin
138b4(1): rje gsal bar bya// bskyed dang spyan drangs mchod pa dbul// gshed dmar srog la rbad par bya// de nas nyin mtshan dmod par bye// dgongs kyi grob so byung ba dang // ro langs las la rub dus su// dmod pa
138b5(1): sngags kyi phu sprug bya// las rdzogs brag dang chu 'thab bam// 'on te 'byung po'i srang du gnan// thod sbrul drag po'i las su bshad// gzhan yang pho mo'i thod pa'am// dur khrod ro ras de dag la// mkhas pas
138b6(1): 'khor lo bris byas la// pho mo gzhan gyi dmod pa dgod// nyi ma bzhi ru las sbyar na// las rnams grub par dpa' bos bshad// nyin mo gdug pa pho yi sngags// mA ra ya yis dgra bo sgrol// mtshan mo gdug pa
139a1(1): mo yi sngags// mA ra nr-i dza'i sgra las drang // gsang ba sngags kyi spu gri las// rno dpal sngags kyi so brdar la// dmod pa nyin mtshan bsnol mar drang // spyi rgyugs sngags kyi char phab la// bla
139a2(1): dgug khram la gdab par bya// myos pa'i thun gyis rab skyugs la// gdug pa can nam shi sar gtad// gzhan yang dmod pa'i las bya na// rab chad thod par gru gsum e// dug khrag ldan pas bris byas
139a3(1): la// drag po'i dmod pa dril ba'i mchog/ bzlas shing gzugs la trag tu brab// las rdzogs lung dang mthun par gnan// drag po sngags kyi grangs rdzogs kyang // lus srog mngon du ma phye na// sngags kyis yi

139a5(1): mA rAdza gshin rje kha to yaM/ ya ma rA dza gshin rje snying to yaM/ ya ma rA dza gshin rje khrag ti yaM/ ya ma rA dza kha thun dus bsdus/ ya ma rA dza sum b+h+yo/ gshin rje nag po dun b+h+yo/ kring kring ma ra tsa ma ni/ snying shad shad
139a6(1): nr-i dza/ klad pa go ro tsa na gshogs// snying kha rag snying kha rag/ rag sha dug thun du ru shag/ rag sha ma tang ni dza b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu/ sdang ba'i dgra bo la/ ma mo las kyi thun phob/ khrag nad rim nad phob/ dmod pa
139b1(1): spu gri'i sngags su bshad/ oM many+dzu shrI ya ma dza sa to me ya/ ya ma snying to me ya/ ya ma khrag to me ya/ ya ma mu to me ya/ nag po ya ma ri dza/ nag po d+ha ri dza/ nag po rag sha dgra bo mA ra ya baM ri la rbad ya/ traka raka

139b4(1): ma thal chen spar khab gtang // thod ngan ro ras ga 'u la// drag po sbrad smad 'khor lo bri// thod pa'i nang du a mu kam// thod pa bya rog rjes can du// gtor ma bshams la 'chi bdag mchod/ 'od dang sgra dang
139b5(1): rdo 'phen dang // dkar shal ma dang nyi zla dang // mkhar la mi gzugs 'phungs pa'o// de la 'jigs pa'i sems spangs te// 'chi bdag drag sngags bzlas shing brdeg/ kram ha ra/ byi sha ya ma/ ma rag tra ya/
139b6(1): b+h+yo ru lu ru lu he ya me/ san tsa ya kro ti/ ya ma ma ra ya snying kha ra ka tra/ sha sha me sen tsa/ ya ma ma mA ra ya snying kha rag/ ra ka tra ya su ma ti/ ya ma ma ka li/ hUM tra la ra ya tsa dang / kha rak+ta ya/ ma ma
140a1(1): ka la/ ko ta mA ra ya tsit+ta du ha ma dza dza/ 'chi bdag rgyu ba'i dus su brdeg/ rdzogs dang gnan gtad rim par bya// zhes gsungs so// ya ma rA dza sku khros pa'i rgyud las/ drag po spad smad ar la

140a3(1): ma// srin mo 'jigs byed re ma ti// srog thig gsang ba'i thun sgrub brtsam// ri gsum rtse 'am chu gling du// dug las sbrus pa'i maN+Dal bya// mthing nag gru gsum thod 'phreng mdzes// rgya gram thod pa gru chad
140a4(1): ldan// sgo bzhi dur khrod ldan par bya// dbus su bse mkhar dar 'phen can// bya na bzhi dang tsit+ta brgyan// ma mo dre zhon mdung zung 'dzin// dur khrod rgyan ldan ral pa can// spyi gtsug rgya gram nyi ma can// thod
140a5(1): 'phreng zhing chen g.yang gzhi dang // re lde sbrul nag khro chung 'bar// phyogs bzhir gsod byed srin mo bzhi// seng ge stag chen glang dang 'brug/ kun kyang snying 'byin thod khrag 'dzin// dkyil 'khor lho nub 'brub
140a6(1): gnas su// mtshan ngan ban d+har dug khrag bsres// nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshe bstim// thod ngan ling kha bcas la brab// sngags pa gshin rje gshed bsgoms la// thugs kha'i snying po sngags bcas
140b1(1): pas// gtso bo'i thugs khar bzlas pa 'am// bzlas pa'i sngags kyis srog phrogs la// 'phrin las bdag mor de mngag go/ gtor ma rak+ta bdud rtsis mchod// srog snying bzlas shing dam rdzas btab// dkyil
140b2(1): 'khor dbus su nag mo'i sku// khro gnyer 'jigs par bshad pa dang // me yi phung po 'thor ba dang // khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil dang rlom// lci 'thob 'od sgra sgrub khang 'tsheg/ 'dod pa mthong nas gsad pa

140b5(1): ma hi b+h+yo b+h+yo/ snying kha raka srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ oM tad+ya tha/ rak+Sho trag rak+ka/ ma hi srog la dza dza/ ma mo rak+Sho ki li srog la dun dun dza// trag rak+ka ma hi srog la breng breng / zum ri li li b+h+yo/ trag sha ma hi dun b+h+yo/ re ma ti

141a1(1): mugs bla rtsa la dza dza/ rtsa bo che la dun mugs/ nang khrol smad lnga la rtsa bo// thun baM thun ri ri li li rbad/ bla srog 'gugs shing gsod pa ste// 'bar ma nyungs thun sngags su 'dod// khram sngags
141a2(1): nag mo 'dis kyang gdab// oM ya mAn+ta ka k+ShaM/ Ar+ya a rtsa la khram ma dug tsa tsa tshal pa tshal pa rbad rbad/ ma dug k+ShaM/ che ge mo srog rtsa la mugs ti rbad/ tsa tsa ra tsa rbad/ ma mo khrag la dun ti rngubs// srin po rus
141a3(1): la tsho tsho tshol/ gshin rje'i khram la lhan lhan thob/ dgra bo khri kha ri li li nri dza rbad/ phur pa ya mAn+ta ka'i sku// khrag mig ma dang bcas pa bsam// nyin mtshan dus drug dag tu 'am// dus ni 'brug sgras tshub mas
141a4(1): gdab// rtsa dang lus srog 'brel bar bshad// dpal gshin rje nag po ya ma rA dza sku khros pa'i rgyud las/ bdud kyi lcam mo sgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje snying po yis// bskyod pa'i
141a5(1): zor kha de ltar na// gnan pa las kyi thus ka ru// klu bdud nag po ji ltar sgrub// 'jam dpal khro bos nges gsungs pa// gnan pa'i las kyi thus kha ni// 'chi bdag klu bdud nag po yis// nyin bzhi'i 'khor
141a6(1): lo rdzogs byas nas// gnyis ra gdug pa'i sa phyogs gnan// klu gnas grong ngam dur khrod du// sngags kyi tshad ma thod pa yi// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin ldan pa des// dur khrod ras la sme khrag byug/ tsha ba gsum
141b1(1): ldan dug chus byugs// pad+ma rak+tas 'khor lo bri// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// bcu gnyis bcu drug mu khyud gsum// dbus su sbrul gyi ra bar ldan// gshed bzhi'i gnas su thod pa sbrul// btson khang
141b2(1): rus sbal lto ru ming // bcu gnyis rgya gram sbrul dang me// bcu drug mtshon cha rgya gram sbrul// na ga klu yi sngags kyis bskor// gshed bzhi'i gsang sngags tshan bzhi la// spu gri gsad gnan nyin mtshan
141b3(1): bsnol// skabs su thun sngags spyi rmugs bzlas// rdzogs dang mdze can thod pa 'am// klu mkhar sbrul nag lto ba ru// dmigs pa 'khor lo dril te gzhug/ dar nag gtums la rgya yis gdab// gnyen ra gdug
141b4(1): pa'i sa phyogs ni// byang phyogs gdol ba'i gnas su gnan// klu sbrul nag po'i ting 'dzin gyis// lho yis gzir la rgya yis gcag/ klu bdud ya ma'i pho brang gdab// steng du ri rab 'khor lo bskyed// rdo rje rgya

142a1(1): tsa ya rbad/ ya ta me ma k+She/ dgra bo rak+ta tsa ra rbad/ ya k+She ma ye ta/ dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ ya ma me ta k+She/ nA ga khams thums myags/ dgra bo nri s+phur rbad/ ya me ta k+She ma/ nA ga khams thums myags/

142a3(1): bzlas// thun sngags drag pos skabs su brab// nag po baM tsi tsi rgyas/ trag thur snying 'gul myags myags/ rtsa bzhi bskum/ shan shan srog la shan sbur sod swA hA/ drag sngags sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang // klu la nges

142b2(1): rdzogs pa khro bo'i sku// 'bar byed khro bo gtum bag can// rang rgyud gshin rje sgrub pa'i lugs// 'khor lo tun bsdebs bsgral ba'i las// gsang ba don gyi snying po 'di// bgrod thob phyag rgya rtogs ldan

144a1(1): tshogs pa mang po byung / zhal nas 'jigs pa'i gsung sgra phyung ste/ spyan 'bar ba sdang mig tu bdud kyi rgyal po la gzigs te/ gsang sngags drag po 'di dag gsungs so/ sha ri b+h+yo/ ma ri b+h+yo/ khrag

144a6(1): gsol pa/ kye 'joms byed rgyal po bcom ldan 'das// ma 'ongs pa yi dus nyid na// lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bdud dang bar du gcod pa la// dpa' bo thugs rje thabs mkhas pas// mi 'jig rdo
144b1(1): rje lta bu yis// phas kyi rgol ba 'joms pa yi// byol sngags thabs dang bcas pa yis// nyid kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i don// rol pa mchog gis bshad par mdzod// ces gsol pas/ bcom dan 'das rdo rje
144b2(1): khros pa'i rgyal po 'joms byed 'bar ba des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thub pa chen po dgongs pa yi// bdud kyi dpung chen gzhom pa dang // dgra yi dpung chen bshig pa'i phyir// 'joms byed 'bar ba de/

151b6(1): swAsAhA/ sgrub pa'i sngags so// ka sha ka sha khrag thol shag/ ma thal shig snying chod ya ya/ lha dang dpral zhing rtsa ba gcad pa'i sngags so// pra bra zhung zhung ril ril rbad rbad ya ya/ byad du gzhug pa

152a5(1): rog bya nag khri nag dang // mon bu nag po'i tsit+ta bzhi// dam rdzas btab pa'i rim pa'o// sha khrag mdos dang gtor ma phud// sman chen la sogs ci 'byor ba// bskang ba'i rdzas kyi rim pa'o// dmar nag skud

152b1(1): rog thod pa'i nang // sreg pa lugs kyi gong bu'i nang // 'phang ba ra dom nag po'i nang // las gzhug snod kyi rim pas so// bsags pa rdzas kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad par

152b6(1): po srog thun bi sha swA hA/ oM ma hA ka la ya bon bo nag po srog thun bi sha swA hA/ oM ma hA kA la ya zhang blon nag po srog thun bi sha swA hA/ oM mahA kA la ya mon pa nag po srog thun pi sha swA hA/ de nas lha
153a1(1): bzhi sgrub pa yis// zhi snying gcig tu dril ba'i sngags// rtags la thug par bzlas pa bya// de yang sgrub pa gnyis yin te// rten gyi 'khor lo legs par bca'// rtsa sngags 'bor len byas te

156b1(1): dmar dang / a ba glang mgo dang / lcogs pa mgo dgu dang / ya ba ti dang / rtol pa dang / phya sangs dang / stag mgo nag po dang / ro langs ma dang / e ka dza ti dang / lha mo nag mo dang / bdud mo nag mo dang /

157a5(1): sogs te ye shes kyi ma mo bcu bzhi dang / ye shes rol ba la sogs pa las sprul pa e ka dzA ti la sogs pa srid pa'i sman mo rnams dang / 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa ma mo nag mo'i tshogs

157b4(1): rgyas dang sems can thams cad kyang bde ba chen pa'i ro myong ba la ma g.yos pa kho nar gnas so// de ltar de'i ngang las 'di skad ces bya ba'i sgra rang byung bar gyur to// gnas dang ston pa 'khor bstan dus//

158a1(1): rang byung gi ye shes rol pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas/ thal mo sbyar te mi g.yo ba las bslang ba'i phyir gsol ba/ e ma ho/ ye nas ma skyes chos sku dag pa la/ kun gzhi rnam dag ngang

158a3(1): khro chen 'bar ba'i skur bzhengs te gsang ba'i rtsa rnams g.yos te/ drag po gtum rngam seng ge zil gnon zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku phyag rgya chen po'i gar bsgyur te/ gsung rngam
158a4(1): ba'i nga ro 'di bsgrags so// hUM hUM hUM dz+nyA na dz+wa la/ e ha la ha la/ a kro te ka phaT phaT/ dza hUM baM ho hring hring / zhes 'brug gi sgra dus gcig ldir ba tsam bsgrags pas/ 'og min gyi gnas dang de bzhin gshegs

158a6(1): dma' bar gyur/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur te/ ldeg cing 'jigs la khad par gyur to// 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad kyang brgyal te lus sa la rdebs par gyur to/ de nas yang gshin rje'i rgyal po
158b1(1): sprul pa'i sku yis/ 'khor rnams pa rgyal ba las bslang ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lhun grub rdo rje la gsol ba btab bo/ kye ho lnga nyid lhun grub rdo rje 'chang / bde chen thig le spros bral dag pa las/ ye shes
158b2(1): rol pa'i rdzogs skur bzhengs nas kyang / cho 'phrul 'jigs par bstan pa ngo mtshar che/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam 'das dpag tu med/ 'jig rten khams rnams 'ur 'ur chem chem g.yos/ 'khor rnams
158b3(1): khams nas lus kyang sa la rdebs/ dbugs dang ma bral dran pa'i dbang po nyams// de phyir 'khor rnams srog dang ldan par mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs lhun gyis
158b4(1): rdzogs pa'i rdo rje des/ 'khor rnams brgyal ba las bslang ba'i phyir/ dbugs dbyung ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// skad cig ma de nyid las 'khor thams cad brgyal ba las langs so// de nyid du
158b5(1): rang rang gi de kho na nyid mthong ste/ ye shes rnyed par gyur to// de nas sprul pa'i sku phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs te/ 'khor 'dus pa'i tshogs phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i dregs pa
158b6(1): can de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la mgrin gcig tu gsol ba/ kye ho rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin gshegs/ thig le ye shes rol pa las// khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs shing
159a1(1): rngam// khros pas 'khor rnams dran pa nyams// rdzu 'phrul rmad byung ngo mtshar cha// bdag cag 'khor du 'dus pa yi// rang dam srog gi snying po rnams// bstan pa srung phyir las dang bcas// rdo rje
159a2(1): khros pa'i spyan sngar 'bul// dpa' bo chen po khros nyid kyis// rnam shes srog snying 'di bzhes la// dbang bskur byin rlabs stobs ldan mdzod// bdag cag dregs pa'i 'khor rnams kun// snang srid 'jig/
159a3(1): rten khams 'di ru// mun par 'thibs dang bsregs pa dang // lo thog 'joms dang gnam lcags 'bebs// skyo 'bog yams nad srog gcod dang // mdze shu sna tshogs 'dus pa'i nad// bdag cag rnams kyi
159a4(1): rang las lags// dpa' bo chen po ci la skyon/ cho 'phrul chen po ci la ston// bdag cag gdug byed dregs pa rnams// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sprul pa bgyid// ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das sku
159a5(1): gsung thugs mi bzad pa'i rdo rje de dges pa chen por gyur te/ zhi ba dang / khro bo dang / gshin rje dang / ma mo dang / bdud pho mo dang / rgyal po dang / gza' rgod dang / srin po pho mo dang / mon pho mo dang / ging
159a6(1): pho mo dang / dmu dang / btsan dang / srog bdag dang / lha gdon dang / sa bdag pho mo dang / klu dang / gnyen dang / mkha' 'gro dang / de dag la sogs te lha ma srin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i srog gi snying po rang
159b1(1): dam gcig tu dril nas bsdus so// de yang ji ltar bsdus shes na/ la las ni bsnyen bsgrub rnam pa bzhi ru phye ste phul lo// la las ni yan lag rnam pa gsum du phye nas phul lo// la la ni rgyun gyi drag sngags su
159b2(1): phul lo// la las ni dmod pa'i drag sngags su phul lo// la las ni bsgrub pa'i drag sngags su phul lo// la las ni tshig chod kyi drag sngags su phul lo// la las ni tshad can gyi ngan sngags su phul lo// la las
159b3(1): ni tshad med kyi ngan sngags su phul lo// la las ni gdab pa'i ngan sngags su phul lo/ de nas gcom ldan 'das kyis srog dang las thams cad gcig tu dril te/ dbang du bsdu ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
159b4(1): zhugs so// nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan pa dang dam bca' ba 'di gsungs so// he he/ 'khor tshogs zhi khro sprul pa kun// nga nyid rdo rje kun bzang ni// chos sku skye 'gag med pa las// longs spyod chen po'i skur
159b5(1): bstan te// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ nga nyid lhun rdzogs khro bdag che/ sku lnga yang dag rdzogs pa yang / lnga nyid lhun grub ye shes ni// brtan g.yo kun la brdal cing khyab// thams cad nyid gsal chos
159b6(1): sku'o// sems nyid ye shes rang gsal ba// ma sangs zab med bsod nams kyang // rang snang longs spyod chen po'i sku// thams cad nyid la lhun grub ste// ma btsal nyid la nyid rdzogs pa// mngon par byang chub
160a1(1): sku ru bshad// snang stong gnyis su mi phyed phyir// gdul bya 'joms pas rdo rje'i sku// gdul bya rnams kyi ngo bo la// zhing khams bsam yas thams cad du// cir yang snang phyir sbrul sku'o// de dag
160a2(1): nga nyid rdo rje 'chang // gsung lnga lhun gyis grub pa yang // spros pa thams cad brjod med phyir// brjod bya'i ngo bo gzhan na med// sgra tshig thams cad las 'das te// brjod bral bsam brjod kun gyi gzhi// skra
160a3(1): rnams ma spang rang snang phyir// don nyid brjod bya kun snang bas// de mtshon byed pa'i yan lag ni// snang la sogs pa'i don ston pa'o// dngos nyid sgra rnams sems nyid phyir// 'dzin med snang brjod mi gos
160a4(1): yangs// sgra kun sems nyid bdag gsung gsal// grags stong gnyis med mi phyed pa'o// sgra gcig lan gcig spros phyir// ston pas de bzhin nyid du gsungs// sgra yi bye brag kun rdzogs pas// gdul bya'i ngo
160a5(1): la so sor thos// ma brjod ye shes rig pa yis// thams cad gsal bar brda sprod phyir// rig pa spros med brjod bral de// thams cad khyab pas dgra rnams kun// bdag tu lhun grub cir yang rol// gdul
160a6(1): bya'i yid bzhin dus gcig gsal// de dag rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs// ye shes lhun grub thugs nyid kyang // mtshan ma kun bral ngang gi stong // sgrib med nyid du lhun rdzogs gsal// dbyings nyid brda khyab
160b1(1): gnyis dang bral// chos rnams ma 'dres kun tu ston// yon tan lhun rdzogs rol bsam yas// de nyid rdo rje nga yi thugs// 'khor 'das dregs pa rngam chen kun// srog dang nus pa dbang bsdus te// dregs pa'i
160b2(1): tshul du las ngo long // dbang po bkrag mdangs nga dbang bsgyur// zhes gsungs pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang srog gi snying po thams cad nus pa dpag tu med pa'i mthur byin gyis brlabs te bsdus
160b3(1): so// las thams cad sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi mthu dang bcas par byin brlabs te bsdus so// de yang ji ltar bsdus shes na/ yi ge gsum gyi brda ru dril nas srid pa'i khyabs khang du dbang du bsdus so// de nas
160b4(1): 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis ngag mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho rdo rje 'chang chen dpal/ bdag cag 'khor du 'dus pa rnams// dpa' bo chen po'i spyan snga ru// rang dam srog gi snying po
160b5(1): phul// bdag cag rang las bsgrub par bgyid// bstan pa srung zhing chos 'khor bskyang // log par lta ba'i dgra dang bgegs// skad cig yud la bsgral bar bgyi// gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga ru// dam bcas
160b6(1): bzhin du ma bgyis na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying // tshal pa brgyar gas sreg par shog/ ces bro bor nas dam bcas so// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri
161a1(1): drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyi nang nas gshin rje'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rngam pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ kye
161a2(1): ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor dang // las las grub pa'i gnas mchog dang // gsang ba drod kyi 'khor lo gsum// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas//
161a3(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba gsum gyi don rgyas par bshad do// 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyon// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du// rang bzhin gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag/ phyi nang snod bcud dag pa
161a4(1): ru// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag/ de yi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab/ dur khrod chen po gtum pa yi/ gdug pa can dang ldan pa ru/ las las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // yum gyi b+ha ga yangs
161a5(1): pa ru// gsang ba drod kyi dkyil 'khor brtag/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa yi// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa 'di lta ste// gru bzhi rin chen rgyu dang ldan// thod pa keng rus bcag par bcas// sgo bzhi gru chad par
161a6(1): khyams 'gram// rta babs bzhi dang tA ra Na// lhun po bzhi dang ldan pa'i gnas// nor bu rin chen keng rus kyis// ka ba brgyad dang de bzhin gdung // tshangs pa'i dral phyam zhing rus bcas// thod pa rgyu ma zhing
161b1(1): chung gis// bla 'og thams cad spras pa'o// stag gzig seng ge ma he glang // chu srin gnam lcags sgo la mdzes// 'dod yon lha mo dur khrod brgyan// yid 'ong mchod pas gang bar spras// rin chen pha gu thod pa
161b2(1): zhing // dra ba dra phyed dril bu dang // zhing chung rgyan gyis mdzes pa'o// rdo rje me 'od shin tu 'bar// dbus ni gru gsum mthing nag la// gsang mdzad rtsibs bzhi phyogs dang lcags// rdo rje ra ba le tse dgu// thod
161b3(1): rlon 'phreng ba rtsibs bcu lcags// gos ras khrag mtsho thod skam bskor// phyi rim 'khor lo dgu gnyis g.yu// gos ras gser bcas rdo rjes gsor// gru chad khrag mtsho dmar nag bzhi// bar khyams bzhi dang
161b4(1): sgo bzhi phyogs// phyi yi bar khyams sgo bzhi ldan// dbus su gshin rje bdud mo bsnol// ma he nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// gshed bdag gtso bo me klong dbus// g.yas g.yon sbyor sgrol gsang ba'i dbus// gru
161b5(1): gsum gdan la dregs pa'i tshul// mdun na srin po'i gdan stengs su// thugs mchog yab yum rngam zhing bzhad// rtsibs bzhi rang rang gdan stengs su// gshed po bzhi rnams yum dang bcas// rtsibs bcur
161b6(1): phyogs skyong yab yum la// rtsibs mtshan bdud po yab yum gnas// phyi rim sgrol ging bco brgyad la// rtsibs mtshan ging mo de bzhin te// gru chad ro langs lce sbyang gnas// nang gi bar khyams thar byed
162a1(1): brgyad// yum dang bcas te gnas pa'o// sgo bzhir sgo ma sgrol byed bzhi// phyi yi bar khyams mon pho mo// las kyi gshin rje bdun gnyis gnas// sgo bzhir bse yi lha mo bzhi// rang rang gdan la
162a2(1): rdzogs par gnas// phyi khyams khor yug sde brgyad gnas// 'bum phrag g.yog dang yang g.yog bcas drug khri drug stong 'khod pa'o// rang sngags srog gis 'brel ba yis// dkyil 'khor bdag por gnas pa
162a3(1): ni// 'khor du sngags pa kun 'dus pa'o// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad// dur khrod las grub dkyil 'khor ni// lho yi phyogs na gshin rje'i gnas// dur khrod chen po'i gtum drag tshal// zhes bya rgya
162a4(1): khyon dpag tu med// rmang logs gser dang g.yu ru snang // rtse mo gnam lcags ur mo la// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i bad gtams pa// 'khor lo gnam lcags mtshon cha yis// 'od zer bzhir 'phro rab tu
162a5(1): 'khrug/ mchog chen mchog phran dra bas gtams// bam chen chu srin 'khor lo yi// ka ba ka zhu ka gdan bcas// gnam lcags thog gi tsha tsha 'phro// thod pa brtsegs pa'i 'bur chung zhing // zhing chen bla re 'phan
162a6(1): dang gdugs// chu srin rgyal mtshan dpa' ngar bkram// tsit+ta mang po sprin ltar btibs// rtse nas rtsa bar zhag 'dzag khol// bskal ba'i me ri sna tshogs 'bar// ke rus sha khrag dur khrod 'dam// gnam lcags
162b1(1): khang pa zangs me ru 'bar// 'khor lo'i gzhal yas ro myags 'dam// dur khrod gnas chen khri stong yod// nyi zla 'phra men mthongs yod pa// gza' dang skar mas yongs su brgyan// mtshon gyi brlabs dang rlung
162b2(1): nag dri ba so dang // keng rus ri rab mtha' ma lcags ris bskor// de lta bu yi gnas de na/ ro yi tshogs rnams gnas pa ni/ rlon dang skams dang rul pa dang // gsar dang rnying dang phyed dal dang // bam dang
162b3(1): dpungs dang mnam pa dang // rangs pa dang ni stod smad dang // rengs dang rnam par rengs pa dang // 'khums dang bub dang 'gyel ba dang // langs pa dang ni 'greng ba dang // lha rdum mgo dang phyed ma
162b4(1): dang // keng rus brul dang tshal bu dang // khrag dang rnag dang chu ser dang // zhag dang lha rkang nang rol dang // rgyu ma dri zhen pags pa la// ro la 'brad dang gshog pa dang // 'thung shing 'tshong dang longs spyod
162b5(1): byed// de lta bu yi dur khrod na// 'jig rten yi dwags srog la za ba dang // stag gzig dom dred bya rog kang ka dang / byan lag sbyang ki kha 'ug lin du kha// srin 'bu la sogs de dag thams cad kyang // sha za
162b6(1): khrag 'thung rus pa 'cha' ba dang // ldag nyog byed dang lha dang rgod pa dang // ngu dang cho nges 'debs dang khu cos 'don/ 'phyong dang rgol dang srog la 'jab pa dang // mig bsgrims lag rjes brgyug pa
163a1(1): dang // rngam dang srog len bla rgu bdud kyang bcod// mo la sems 'byor 'jug cing mngal kyang skems// drag po'i rkan rdebs ltas ngan sgra sgrogs dang // gzugs mi sdug dang 'dzum pa'i mdangs
163a2(1): ston dang // 'khor lo'i bro brdung lcags kyi mda' 'phen dang // sprugs pa'i glu len mgo yi dung 'bud dang // dar gyi g.yab 'dor rang la rang 'khro dang // sha za khrag 'thung snying 'byin srog gcod dang // lag
163a3(1): pa gar bskur rdo rje'i thog 'phen dang // gti mug ma sa'i dur khrod ri ltar spungs pa dang // 'dod chags rak+ta'i dur khrod rba glo 'khyil ba dang / zhe sdang keng rus dur khrod brag ltar gtam pa dang / rab tu
163a4(1): 'jigs shing shin tu skyi g.ya' ba/ las las grub pa'i dur khrod chen por bshad gsang ba'i dur khrod kyi dkyil 'di ltar ste/ rang rgyud dkyil 'khor drug dag srog shing gsum/ thig le bcud ldan yi ge'i rnam
163a5(1): ldan// rang rang rtsa dang kha dog ye shes gsal// yum gyi b+ha ga mkha' dbyings dag pa ru// rnam bzhi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor nyi zla'i gdan// thig le'i ye shes rol ba'i bde chen sku// snang srid ka dag lhun
163a6(1): gyis grub par bzhugs// de nyid gsang ba bde chen dkyil 'khor bshad// ces gsungs so// des 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad mgu bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la ngag 'thun par 'di skad ces bstod
163b1(1): do// e ma ho/ mnyam nyid ngang las dreg pa'i skur sprul nas// gdug pa can rnams ma lus dbang du bsdus// bstan pa gnas phyir 'khor du sprul nas 'gyed// don gyi dkyil 'khor chen po ngo mtshar che// rdo rje
163b2(1): 'chang chen khro bo'i rgyal// rnam dag chos sku gnyis med mkha'// ye shes rol pas 'jigs pa'i sku// cho 'phrul thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad// ces bstod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye 'gag dang bral
163b3(1): ba'i don 'di bstan to// skye 'gro ma lus chos sku bde ba'i ngang // ye shes thams cad de yi ngang la rdzogs// 'khor ba'i skyon bral bsam yas dpag med sku// 'dul ba'i dbang gis sna tshogs sprul pa
163b4(1): bstan// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la ngo mtshar brjod de/ 'gro ba las kyis rmongs pa la// 'dul ba'i sku yis las rim bstan// bstan pa gnyis med mnyam
163b5(1): sbyar bas// gdug pa thabs bsgral ngo mtshar che// zhes brjod do// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// dkyil 'khor don gyi le'u ste gsum
163b6(1): pa'o// // de nas nyid kyi thugs las sprul pa'i sku gshin rje'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad to// e ma ho/ chos sku byang chub sems kyi ngang nyid las// 'phags pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'chang rgyal
164a1(1): po// 'gro ba'i don du khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// sku gsung thugs kyi 'phrin las mchog bsdus pas// mi dge mtshams med dman pa kun bsgrol ba'i// las kyi rgyal po sbyor ba smin pa'i
164a2(1): mchog/ mchod chen gdug pa gnad tshul dregs pa yis// yan lag brgya gnyis bzhi dang yang bzhi dang // gzer thun nag po'i dmod pa rgyas par mdzod// ces zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan nas
164a3(1): bka' bstsal pa// snying po byang chub sems bsdus nas// byin rlabs ldan pas gsang bcud bstan// 'jig rten khams na 'dul ba yis// 'gro ba ma lus dregs pas myos// bstan pa rin chen rgya lam
164a4(1): cig/ snying po 'phrul gyi sbyor ba gcig/ lus kyi las sbyor brgya phrag brgya// yan lag nyis brgya stong bcu drug/ 'phra bsgyur bye bas khri phrag gcig/ bsgrub pa'i dngos gzhi lnga dang gcig/ bgrod pa'i rim pa drug
164a5(1): phyed ldan// yan lag sngon dang bcas pa bzhi// rten gyi sbyor ba las bcu gnyis// 'dren pa'i gsang lam bcu gnyis ldan// sgo dgu gsang bcud e ka'i thog/ drag po'i sbyor ba bzhi dang stong // dbang gi rim
164a6(1): pa lnga dang bcas// phyi nang gsang chen dril// rang bzhin sbrul dang sgrub byed las/ ye shes ya ma pany+tsa ti/ las mchog thabs mchog gnyis dang tsa// dkar nag las gsang brgya dang bcu// gshin rje ma mo mkha'
164b1(1): 'gro ging // bdud dang srin po sha za klu// smyo byed rgyal po dkar srungs gza'// sa bdag sde brgyad srog gcod gnyan// rlag byed chu srin mu stegs sri// log 'dren 'byung po dur khrod bdag dri za lha gdon drang
164b2(1): srong 'byung // gnod sbyin gnon po grib gnon shan// smyo byed skem byed brjed byed bshed// mdangs 'phrog khrag 'thung gtum po rgod// dbugs len drod nyul sha za rngam// khyung khra dur bya dur bya 'ug kha rgod
164b3(1): lce sbyang stag dom wa// khyi sbrul bung ba sdig sdom 'bru// 'jig rten dregs pa srog dbang 'phrog/ thams cad sregs shing las la myos// 'khor dang yang 'khor bcas pa yis// gshin rje gshed kyi dge 'dun
164b4(1): kun// rgyud 'dir bstan pa kun 'byung ba// sbyor ba du ma'i bcas gzhir bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ sbyor ba du ma'i bcas gzhi
164b5(1): bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba yongs su rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'brel ba'i don 'di bshad do// bde dang rang bzhin 'brel ba yis// snod
164b6(1): dang ngang tshul yul du brtag/ bde lam gsang sgo dregs pa yis// gter sgo yang thog sha za'i srog/ mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khor lo can// rten dang grol ba sems dpag med// dri med sems kyi rgyan ldan mchog/
165a1(1): 'joms byed ya ma za yi lus// myos par dug gi spu dri can// dbang po brtan dang rdo rje ma// ya ma brtan ma lus srin mo// rdo rje snying po stobs dpag med// me chu 'byung bzhi brtan dang
165a2(1): 'pho// las kyi 'dren pa'i srog lus brgyan// dregs pa dbang phyug bde ba'i gnas// 'pho ba gsum gyi bdag nyid can// gsang lam yang thog mi 'gyur 'phel// bde byed ya ma'i zhing khams nas// 'joms
165a3(1): byed ya ma ka li'i srog/ 'dren pa stobs kyi lam las gzung // rkyen gsum lus gcig brda yis sbyar// shes pa gsum bsdus gcig la rten// dbye ba'i las ni bcu gnyis brgyad// rgyal mtshan rgyud kyi 'phrul
165a4(1): dbang bcas/ rig pa stobs kyi lam dang ldan// 'phen pa'i sbyor ba stobs dang sdud// rdo rje srin po sbyor ba gcig/ 'khor lo rin chen sgyu ma'i gter// dbang can bran dang las dbang g.yog/ mun khang mtsho/
165a5(1): gling ya ma'i gnas// nam mkha'i rgyal po khams dang chu// lo yi dgra dang rang dbang 'joms// gsang mchog rlung khams yan lag lus// gcod pas mtshon cha gshed dbang sgyur// me yis 'jigs pa yang dag
165a6(1): skyed// las kyis sprod pa'i snying po sa// don dang ldan pa'i las sbyangs la// las chen thig le nam mkha'i khongs// rig pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i stobs// snying po gsum la yang dag sdud/ khams lnga'i dbyibs su
165b1(1): bde ba bcud// sangs rgyas kun bdag lnga yi dang // lnga nyid stobs bdag rang gnas mchog/ gsang ba'i ri gcan rin chen mdzod// mchog gi las dang sbyor ba'i las// 'khor lo rgyal po bde ba'i
165b2(1): gnas// 'phrul gyi snying po gsang ba'i gter// gsang ba dbang gis rang rgyas btag/ mi mthun lus la gnod byed gdon// dus dang len pa'i khams su sbyar// yul dang dbang po skye mched la// dbab pa'i
165b3(1): sbyor ba gcig dang bcas// gshin rje nag po bdud dang gshed// rang lus phyag rgya'i stobs dang ldan// che ba'i thig les dregs pa 'khol// zil gnon phyag rgyas kun dbang sdud// las kyi phyag rgya dbang rim
165b4(1): brtsegs/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can ni// dug lnga'i nad kyis gdungs shing 'khyams// de la sngags kyi dmod pa dbab// lus la gnag pa'i sdig pa gzhug/ gsum bsdus dril la yul dbang
165b5(1): dbrog/ las kyi 'khor ba las la mngag/ lam sbyangs yul bgrod gnas dang sprad// phyag rgya'i lus la gsum gyis brlab// sku gsung thugs kyi bde gnas su// chos sku 'od zer 'bar bcas 'khyil// 'phro
165b6(1): 'du dang bcas rang dbang sgyur// dri ma gsum dang drug la smin// nus pa'i stobs kyis dbang po sdud// gcig gi khams dang thams cad sbyar// 'du ba nad kyis lus la smin// b+ha ga bde ba'i pho brang du// byang
166a1(1): chub 'khor ba'i lam sbyangs nas// bde ba chen po'i gnas phab la// sems dang dri ma gnyis bsdus la// sa bon dag pa'i dbyings su 'phangs// bde ba dang bcas gnas su 'khyil// sngags dang
166a2(1): mchog las gzi brjid 'bar// zhing khams kun spros sbyang bgrod bsdu// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bde gnas ldan// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo 'od 'bar gang // ye shes 'khor lo thig ler 'khyil// 'khor lo khro chung
166a3(1): stong dpag med// dkrugs pas phyag rgya gzhan dbang sgyur// lus bcud dngas ma sems dang bral// pho brang sgo ru rten bzhi dpral// dbus kyi pho brang e la bsdu// rdo rje snying po brda yis dkru// bde lam bde
166a4(1): gnas dgu thog dang // gsang lam rdo rje bgrod lam 'phang // tshul gsum sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan// stobs bzhi yan lag bzhi dang ldan// be bag ta yi khu ba dang // rdo yis mtsho gling ka 'phangs dang // bde ba
166a5(1): gsang mchog rgyal lam bskyed// ya ma ka li'i zhing khams nas// ya ma rak+Sha 'bar ba'i tshogs// dbang po snyings ma yul la rol// dngas ma'i srog mdangs bde gnas gsal// rnyig pa thod pa'i snying por
166a6(1): bsdu// gsang gsum bde ba'i yul dang sprad// don gsum thabs kyis bgrod par bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// brda
166b1(1): gsum thabs kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas ya ma rA dzAs gsol ba// bde chen gsang ba'i 'khor lo mchog/ bgrod cing lta ba ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rngam pa'i rgyal
166b2(1): pos// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bgrod pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so// rig pa sems kyi lta ba ni// bde ba'i 'khor lo ye shes can// 'khrug byed tsit+ta'i 'khor lor bcas// myos pa rten dang dprabral ba nyid// srog
166b3(1): gi dbang po kun bsdus la// tshe gnas rdo rje'i lam du sbyang // dbang po rdo rje yul la bstim// srog gi rdo rje dbang bsdus la// rdo rje srin po'i stobs la bstim// rdo rje thig le stobs ldan la// 'phra man rdo
166b4(1): rje'i sprul pa 'gyed// nyi ma'i rdo rje las dbang dkrug/ brtan pa'i rdo rjes gzir byas nas// tshe 'das srog rten rdo rjes 'joms// gnyis ldan rdo rje'i brda yis dbye// don gyi rdo rje phyag rgya'i sku// dbang po
166b5(1): mchog gi rdo rjer 'gyur// don ldan rig pa chos sku'i klong // rdo rje'i rgyal po'i bcud sdud dbab// rang gnas tshe yi lam du gzud// 'jog po bde lam gyen bzlog 'phang // yul gyi dmigs pa rang la
166b6(1): gzud// phyi nang snod bcud 'od du 'bar// ye shes 'phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyis// rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang chen 'gyur// gsang rgyal 'phrin las dngos grub 'di// b+h+yAM/ ya hi/ raM/ ga ka/ ka tra/ b+ha ga sha dz+nyA na b+ha la d+hi//
167a1(1): sa h+ye/ r+d+ha yA mA ra ka sha'i 'bru/ la 'aho/ g+hA s+thi rA/ ba ha hI// shah+ni/ tri/ hUng lAM na na'u sti ru tra/ san+d+hi/ kah+yi/ b+hU b+hu d+hA b+hi wAM/ sta sh+li// k+Sha gra/ nyashra hi/ lha b+ha ska ya d+he d+ha la d+h+waM/ a ts+yai// ya I// sa
167a2(1): ga'i sbyor ba tshul gsum sbyar/ 'phrul gyi 'khrul mig skabs kyis sbyar// las kyi 'khrul 'khor gnyis dang gcig/ ye shes 'khrul 'khor gnyis dang gcig/ rnal 'byor can la gnas bya'i phyir// 'khrul mig/
167a3(1): drag po 'khrul 'khor gyi// rgyu dang tshad dang gzer dang gnad// bsnyen dang bsgrub dang las dang gzer// dus dang gnas dang rdzas dang thabs// phyogs dang blang dang rgod dang 'pho// ldog dang 'khyams 'bral
167a4(1): gcod dang 'bigs// rdzas dang gnas dang rgyu dang thun// rnal bzlog gzir gnan blang // las dang dngos grub thun mong mchog/ lus dang yan lag thabs gnad dang // bde ba smin byed dbang bsdu
167a5(1): 'phang // sangs rgyas kun mnyam mthu stobs bdag/ rin chen rdo rje sa ma ta// ut+pal ljon shing myu gu'i 'bru// me tog mdog ldan bcud phyung ba// rtsi thog ma sbyar len dang 'khyams// rtsa ba dbang gi 'grod ba'i
167a6(1): mchog/ mdangs bcas bsgrol ba thabs ldan blang // bcu drug rkyang pa bzhi ldan gcig/ mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bde dbang sbyar// 'bigs dang gcod la sogs pa'i las// bsrungs dang skyob pa kun byed
167b1(1): pa'o// 'khrul mig drag po gnyis dbang gcig/ 'khor lo mi 'gyur brtan pa yi// phyag rgya rdo rje sngags kyi gzer// mtshon cha'i lo ma spu gri'i gnas// 'phrul gyi 'khor lo gsang chen thabs// gnyis med mthun
167b2(1): pa'i las nyid las// 'khor lo chos sku phyag rgyar gsal// zla ba shar ltar brtan brjid la// nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i 'od stong 'bar// sbyor ba'i 'khor lo du ma 'phro// mtshon cha'i 'khor los rtsa lam
167b3(1): gcod// sngags kyis 'khor los sreg cing sdud// ting 'dzin 'khor los bskul zhing 'byed// rdo rje 'khor lo bde mchog gsal// gsang ba'i 'khor lo gsang bcud len// sems pa'i 'khor los rang dbang
167b4(1): 'bebs// shugs kyis 'khor los rang dang ldan// bag chags 'khor lo rten la sdud// nag po 'khor lo rten la sdud// nag po 'khor lo'i lto bar gzhug/ 'byung ba'i 'khor lo stobs kyis mnan// gnyis
167b5(1): ldan 'khor lo gcig gi ngang // bskul ba'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gcig zhing 'bar// dmigs pa'i 'khor lo bde bas gang // bcud kyi 'khor lo sdud cing 'phel// bde ba'i 'khor lo rtsa lam brgyud// gsang
167b6(1): paba'i 'khor lo bde bas gang // sa bon 'khor lo las kyi dbab// 'khor lo sgra dang bcas nas 'khyil// 'od zer 'khor lo phyag rgyar dbab// thugs kyi sbyor ba bsam yas mchog/ chos sku phyag rgya'i 'os ldan
168a1(1): gsal// 'khor lo'i gnas su 'khor lo bca'// gsang ba tshe yi 'khor lor 'bar// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan la// las kyi 'khor lo sa ra pa// gshin rje nag po 'joms pa yi// bde
168a2(1): ldan 'khor lo brtsegs pa yi// pho brang gnas dang sbyar ba'i lus// zhi ba'i gnas su las dang sbyar// gnyis med sbyor ba'i 'khor lor bshad// don gyi snying 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me
168a3(1): long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i 'khor lo lta ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khros pas rang rgyud kyi thig le 'di bshad do// bde ba'i sbyor ba bgrod pa'i mchog/ rang
168a4(1): rgyud thig le mchod pa'i phul// ye shes rol pa mnyes pa'i rgyan// bde ba rgyan gyi mchod pa dang // yid 'ong glu yi dbang phyug rtsal// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o// las chen sbyor ba'i yul dbang
168a5(1): sgrol// ting 'dzin shugs 'gro rgyun dbang sgyur// 'phrin las sna tshogs 'gag pa med// byin rlabs mchog ldan mchod pa'i mchog/ rig pa rang dbang rgyun mi 'chad// g.yas nas bde lam bskul lam
168a6(1): dbab// tshangs pa'i gnas su mchod rgyun 'khril// bde chen mchod rgyun lhun mnyam gsal// sngags kyi stobs kyi rlung bskul la// drod kyi dbang po rtsa lam bzhu// rkyen dang ldan pas mchod rgyun
168b1(1): 'bebs// g.yas nas bskul nas g.yon nas 'bebs// rak+ta chags pa'i mchod pa yi// g.yon nas bskul nas g.yas nas 'bebs// g+hu b+hin dri yi mchod pa yin// g.yas g.yon gnyis nas bskul nas
168b2(1): su// dbu ma'i thig le rgyun shar ba// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa yin// rtsa gsum bskul nas gang zhing 'bar/ sna tshogs b+ha ling mchod pa yin// rtsa rnams bde bas mdzes gang ba// me tog rgyan gyi mchod pa
168b3(1): yin// ye shes rang gnas 'od gsal ba// snang gsal 'od 'bar mchod pa yin// bskyed pa ha si cir yang g.yo/ bde ldan sgra yi mchod pa yin// thams cad gnyis med ro mnyam gcig/ kun tu bzang po'i
168b4(1): mchod pa yin// ye shes thig le gcig tu 'khyil// sbyor ba dbang gi mchod pa yin// shes pa gnyis 'dzin rtog bral ba// stobs chen shugs bsgrol mchod pa yin// rdo rje 'od ldan phyag rgya yis// ye shes chen
168b5(1): po rang nyams gsal// rang gnas thig le'i mchod pa yin// lnga rdzogs bde ba gcig tu 'khyil// lhun gyis grub pa'i mchod pa yin// bdag dbang rdo rje brtan pa'i sku// rang byung lnga dang mdzes pa'i ro// 'chi
168b6(1): med bdud rtsi mchod pa yin// mtshan mar mi gnas dbyings su thim// gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa yin// mchod rgyun don ldan 'grod pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid bdag la rol zhing mchod// tshangs pa gser gyi
169a1(1): sgo gnyis nas// ye shes nyi zla thig le dgug/ phyag rgya'i lus la bstam zhing gnas// gang yin dbang po legs bskor gzhug/ sgo gnyis rtsal sbyangs thig ler bstim// yang dang ma la dngas ma
169a2(1): bsdu// ya tshogs brgyad dang lnga drug gnyis// stobs gsum rdo rje'i lam bskyod nas// yang dag bde ba'i gnas su spro// bde bas gang nas shes rab bskyod// gnyis med phyag rgyas rang gang gsal// rgyun dang
169a3(1): bde ba'i mchod par rol// rdo rje rgyal po bskyod pa yis// shri pany+tsa raM bde ba'i/ de ba gu h+ya rA dzA la/ brtan pa'i thig le bzlas pa bya// bde ba chen po'i sku la gsal// nyon mongs bde ba rang gnas
169a4(1): 'bar// sgrol ba'i ye shes rang 'bar rtsal// sbyor ba sgra yi thig le dbab// gshin rje sku yi dbyings su thim// ngam gling dgu 'dus rdo rje'i rtse// b+ha ga brtsegs pa'i pho brang du// 'bru yi dngas ma dril bsdus
169a5(1): la// phyag rgya chen po'i bstan pas bzung // byin dbang rdo rje ngang gi rdzogs// sbyor ba du ma'i skabs kyi brtsam// gang 'dod las la thog med 'jug/ thun mong mchog gi dgongs par ldan// gsang ba'i phyag rgya
169a6(1): bgrod par bshad// tra tan garba tsakra ma Ni rat+na ke du a ta ra she u tra tan tra/ gsang ba'i thig le lta ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // gsang ba'i don gyi skabs so// de nas yang 'khor gyi nang nas sprul pa'i sku
169b1(1): gshin rje'i rgyal po rang gi stan langs te/ bskor ba lan brgya phrag stong du byas te/ thal mo sbyar pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ rdo rje 'chang chen po la gsol ba/ kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / sku
169b2(1): gsung thugs kyi longs spyod rdzogs// 'jam dpal nag po khro chen gyi// bsnyen pa'i gleng gzhi sngon 'gro gang // dngos nyid las rims bya thabs tshul// 'khor la rgyas par mdzad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ de
169b3(1): bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje snying pos bka' bskul pa/ ye shes bsnyen pa'i gleng gzhi ni// bgrod pa'i rim pas sngon 'gro brtsams// zhi ba'i ting 'dzin sbyor ba las// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje
169b4(1): gshed// myos par bya ba'i lus la gdon// 'khor lo brgya phrag sbyor ba gcig/ rim pa du ma las kyi gnad// yan lag rgyan gyi 'khor lo gsum/ rdo rje srin po las mon gshed// khro ba'i rgyal po yang dag
169b5(1): gzud// dbang gi gnas su phyag rgyar 'bar// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// sku gsung thugs khro mi bzad pa// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi yab// zhi khro rab 'byams rang bzhin dpal// gdul bya drag phyir
169b6(1): shin tu khros// che btsan drags pa bran du 'khol// tshe yi dngos grub thob 'dod pas// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// bgrod pa'i rim pa rdzogs par bya// sems nyid ye shes 'od gsal zhing // rang bzhin lhun
170a1(1): grub bde ba che// chos sku chen po'i rol bsam yas// nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid la// gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas// 'jam dpal gshed kyi gnas mchog ni// ngam ri brag nag gnam lcags
170a2(1): 'dar// sog po khros 'dra srin mdung rtse// ngam grog g.yang sa skyi g.ya' 'jigs// gu 'dus mi ro gsar rnying yod// sha zan srog gcod 'dab chags ling // gcan gzan gdug pa 'drim zhing gnas// 'jig
170a3(1): rten lha 'dre'i gnas bcas sa// mkha' 'gro ma lus 'dun sa rgyu// lho ru kha ltas gnag la gzir// gnas der gshin rje gshed po gnyen// sems kyi chos nyid ma bcos la// de bzhin nyid kyi blo bzhag
170a4(1): ste// gnyis med rtsol bral dang nyid dang // dpa' bos yun ni ring du gnas// de ma yin pa'i gang zag gis/ dus gsum phyogs bcu'i bdag nyid can// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yis// thun mong ma
170a5(1): yin mtshan dper ldan// nyi zla'i tshul sgom thig le grang // shes rab pha rol phyin ma yis// gsung gi thig le yang dag bsgrags// 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba yi/ glu yi mtshan rnams yang dag brjod// de
170a6(1): sogs mdo sde ci nus bgrangs// sku yi phyag rgya sna tshogs bzhengs// srog gdon skyabs dang sbyin pa bskye// sbyin gtor phyi mchod dag par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi las rdzogs nas// sa blang sbyang brtsig dngos
170b1(1): la 'jug/ 'don yon mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma gsum// chang phud rin chen sman dang 'bru sna tshogs// bshams la dkon mchog gsum po dang // rgyal po bzhi dang gtsang rigs sde brgyad 'khor// sa bdag sa
170b2(1): srin yi dwags dang // lha mo bstan ma bgegs kyi rigs// 'gro ba rigs drug spyan drang 'bod// mnyes shing mgu bar bya ba'i phyir// 'dod yon gtor ma mchod par 'bul// byin gyis brlabs te tshim gyur
170b3(1): na// gnas mchog chen po'i sa phyogs 'dir// rnal 'byor dam ldan dpa' bo bdag/ gshin rje gshed chen khro rgyal gyi// gsang ba'i dngos grub len byed pa// lha klu bgegs chen khyed rnams la// sa slong las
170b4(1): kyi grogs 'chol gyis// 'dod yon mchod sbyin 'di long la// bar chad ma byed grogs stong gyis// sangs rgyas bstan pa yun du srung // dam las ma 'da' zhes brjod do// bdag nyid khro chen zugs kha
170b5(1): nas// thig le ye shes rol pa las// 'byung ba'i snying po rnam gsum gyis// 'phros pas sa gzhi bsregs stor dkrug/ don dam stong nyid ngang du gnas// de nas rgyud la maN+Dal rtsig/ khro bo'i nga rgyal phyag rgya
170b6(1): che// rdo rje 'gros dang gar gyi bskor// de nas mtshams gsum dang po gcod// rgyang grags phyogs mtshams bzhi gnyis su// mtho brgyad rang rang gtsang rigs mgon// de nang phyogs bzhir zo chen bzhi// rgyal
171a1(1): chen sde bzhir mnga' yang gsol// mchod yon gtor ma byin nas kyang // bar chod byed pa'i dam sri kun// mtshams kyi nang du shor ra re// phyogs mtshams srung ba'i las mdzod cig/ nang nas
171a2(1): dngos grub nyams pa re// zhes brjod las kyi gnyer gtad bya/ de nas nang du ra sogs sam// khyi sogs sa 'dzul sogs pa la// bar chod dam sri logs 'dren gyis// ming gzugs snying po stobs bcus
171a3(1): bri// phag thod dang bcas them 'og dang // lam chen rgya gram srang du mnan// khro rgyal gshed kyi stobs kyis gzir// sngon du 'gro ba'i rim par bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i snying po khri drug
171a4(1): stong pa'i rgyud las/ sngon du 'gro ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang bdag gnad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ting
171a5(1): 'dzin sbyor ba'i nyams ldan pa// rang rig sems kyi sgron ma 'bar/ phyi rol yul la rten mi gzung // dbang phyug khro bdag gshed kyi gzo// dbyings phyug ro langs gsang ba'i yul// thugs khar thugs mchog/
171a6(1): yab yum gnas// yan lag gshed po yum dang bcas// de bzhin gnas su phyogs skyong 'bar// bu ga thar byed yab dang yum// stod smad tshigs la sgrol ba'i ging // ba spu bu ga las grub mon// sprul pa yang
171b1(1): sbrul dpag tu med// mdun rgyab lta zur sgo srungs ma// ye shes stobs ldan rol pa 'phro// gsang gnas khyams dang sbu gu dang // za ma tog dang ge sar la// phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal// ha si
171b2(1): bde sgra sngags kyi tshig/ thig le 'phro 'du byin dbang sdud// bde ba'i ye shes mchod pa'i phul// sman pa rang gi dbang po la// rim pa las kyi gnad chen bskor// bdud sgor rten zhal 'chi bdag
171b3(1): gshed// tshangs pa'i gnas su chos rgyal rngam// dran po'i dbang po 'chi bdag rgyal// dregs pa'i ngag lam lto pa nag/ srid pa'i rten tsar me dpal gcod// gsang ba dgu khri sa ta las// de bzhin gnas su sha
171b4(1): za bdud// ba spu bu ga me mtshon 'bar// bdag nyid chen po'i dkyil 'khor la// ye shes 'khor lo de nyid dbab// thabs dang shes rab sprul pa 'gyed// rol pa rjes mthun cho gar ldan// rang 'byung ye shes
171b5(1): lha bsnyen mchog/ thig le rol pa me mtshon thogs// sreg gcod sgrol ba'i ngar dang ldan// dbugs kyi rta zhon yul la bskyod// bskyod bskul las kyi bsnyen pa mchog/ dman pa dngos nyid ling ga la// dregs
171b6(1): pa gtum chen mtshon dpal ngar// shing sring bzhin du bsad pa'i mchog/ las gsum rdzogs pa'i thugs su bshad// ta tan ga rba tsakra ma ni rat+na ke d+hu a ta ri sha u kram tan tra las/ gsum thabs kyi le'u ste
172a1(1): dgu pa'o// // sngon 'gro thabs kyi skabs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen pa dngos kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rten gyi gnas der las gzugs pa// rabs chad nag po'i khang pa
172a2(1): dang // g.yul bkye sa dang mi phung shul// ri rgod 'gram dang thal chen dang // de dag rgyu la maN+Dal cig/ khru bzhi rgya la dbangs khru gang // mi rta'i snying khrag btsan dug dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag
172a3(1): gdab// ba su srad bu rak+ta'i tshal// gsang ba yum gyi mkha' las dgye// thig g.yon mtshan ldan bar nas dra// thig gdab byin ldan rdul tshon bri// ni rangs su yi sbyor ba yis// rak+Sha dug shing nyung lim lo/ kha
172a4(1): dog lnga ldan ye shes brlab// gzugs brnyan 'bar ba yongs la snang // gsang mdzod dgu ldan pho brang mchog/ dbus mthing zla khams bzhi 'khor lo// de bzhin 'khor lo dmar nag sngo// gru chad mtsho gling ngam
172a5(1): gling khrag/ sgo khyud bzhi yi 'khor lor bcas// phyi yi bar khyams de bzhin sgo// phyogs kyi kha dog rab tu 'bar// rdo rje zod 'phreng me rir 'bar// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo bzhi ste// sprul pa'i 'khor lo dgu gnyis
172a6(1): ldan// bar khyams gru chad sgo khyud gnyis// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bzhi ldan bya// bam chen ma he nyi zla dregs// rtsa ba'i gdan stengs gzhan ro rkyang // zhing rgyan bla re thod sbrul bcas// 'phreng ba g.yer ka dra phyed
172b1(1): dar// 'dod yon lha mo don rnams bsam// dbus la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// gshed bdag gtso bo yab dang yum// gshed pho bdud mo bzhir ldan bcas// mu khyud dang
172b2(1): por dgod par bya// gnyis pa 'khor lo'i rim pa la// phyogs skyong yab yum bcas pa dgod// bar chod gshed kyi bdud rnams kun// gong nas 'dus pa'i tshul du dgod// gsum pa 'khor lo'i rim pa
172b3(1): la// sgrol ba'i ging chen bco brgyad dang // ging mo bco brgyad bka' nod tshul// khrag mtsho ro langs lce spyang rngam// bar khyams nang gi 'khor lo la// thar byed yab yum brgyad gnyis rngam// sgo khyud skrod byed
172b4(1): 'khor lo la// ya ma bstan ma la sogs dgod// phyi yi bar khyams snam bu la// mon pa mon mo las kyi gshed// bdun bdun gnyis gnyis gnyis bcu brgyad// yang sbrul drug khri drug stong gnas// sgo bzhi sgo
172b5(1): srungs bse mo bzhi// rten bzhi gnas kyi 'khor lo la// rten pa lha yi 'khor lo brtan// ye shes byin rlabs stobs ldan bya// rjes su mthun pa'i chos gar ldan// rten rdzas gnyis dang mchod rdzas dgram// rgyan
172b6(1): rdzas rol rdzas gtor ma khrag/ dur khrod rdzas la rdzas dgus byug/ gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya bzhengs// rab gnas byin ldan lha tshogs dgram// sa gsum la sogs bdud rtsi khrag/ sbyong bgrod dang ldan phyag
173a1(1): rgya'i sku// dbang bskur mchod bstod lho ru dgram// dmug chen dmug chung bdud rtsi bcud// mtshan dang ldan pa'i ka pA lar// steng 'og phyag rgya'i yab yum dgod// sku gsung thugs kyi thig ler
173a2(1): ldan// mthing nag dang bcas ru sprod gdab// phyi yi mchod pa go rims bzhin// nang gi mchod pa bdud rtsi phung // rak+ta sna mangs thod par sbyar// dpal gyi gtor ma sna tshogs dbul// sras mchog gtor ma sha
173a3(1): khrag lho// las kyi ya ma'i gtor ma shar// ma mo mkha' 'gro drug gtor byang // ging bdud mon gyi gtor ma nub// zhing chen zhing chung bla ri 'phan// rgyu ma'i zhags pa thod pa'i 'phreng // mchog chen gling bu ltag/
173a4(1): sprod rnga// ban d+ha'i cha lang keng rus rgyan// bsur chen dud pa sha chen cal// tsit+ta'i pho long khrag gi mtsho// phyogs bcu khor yug sprin du gtibs// gri lcags mchog dang seng ldeng skyer// phur pa rtsang bcas rang
173a5(1): rang grangs// dbus la sogs pa'i gdan la 'god// zla ba dgun 'bring nya la gdams// yang na gshin rje gshed nyid kyis// zla ba zhag dus snying la rab// de bzung yon tan 'phel bar bshad// don gyi snying
173a6(1): po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ bcas bzhi rtsa ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// de nas yang rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos sngon du 'gro ba'i don 'di gsungs so// mnyam
173b1(1): nyid dag pa'i ye shes las// mkha' dkyil nyi shar brdal pa bzhin// bdag nyid gshed chen gar gyi sku// thugs kyi snying po ring du bskul// 'od zer las byung 'bar ba'i sku// snang srid bde 'chang de bzhin
173b2(1): nyid// sprin ltar rngam sgra phyogs bcur g.yo// de bskul me ri mtshon char 'khrigs// khro bo 'bar bcas gtum rngam bltams// log 'dren dam sri rdul du brlag/ skrag cing bar mtshams phyogs bcu
173b3(1): bsrungs// chos rnams stong nyid rtogs dang bral// dmigs med rang bzhin byang chub sems// mkha' ltar mnyam pa chos kyi dbyings// skye 'gag bral ba'i ngang nyid las// yod pa ma yin med pa min// stong pa
173b4(1): nyid las cho 'phrul byung // de nyid ye shes rol pa'i dbyings// sems nyid ngang las g.yo ba med// sems kyi rol pa snang nga yang // sprin dang 'ja' tshon khu rlangs bzhin// ye shes sgyu ma'i rang bzhin
173b5(1): las// dngos po skye ba nyid kyis stong // chos rnams thams cad thig ler 'dus// thig le rol ba'i byin rlabs las// dug gsum sbyong ba'i 'phreng ba gsum// sreg sbyangs sel ba'i rang bzhin las// thabs
173b6(1): dang shes rab mtshan mar 'bar// gnyis med ga bur nyon mongs lnga// gnas bdag yon tan lhun grub pa'i// 'phreng ba rin chen rim par brtsegs// rkyen dang ldan pas 'byung ba'i rim// ye shes phyogs bzhi
174a1(1): dbus brtags te// rang shar mtshan ma gzhal yas khang // gdan stengs thig le 'phro 'du las// rjes mthun cho gas rdzogs pa'i sku// rkyen ldan yab yum phyag rgya che// rgyas pa'i 'phro 'du bskyod
174a2(1): byas pas// thig le dbyibs ldan mkha' la 'phro// de las dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang // bdag nyid thig le'i rnam pa de// gtso chen thugs kyi sgo nas zhugs// sku yi dbyig tu bdag gyur te// dkyil 'khor
174a3(1): ye shes 'od du 'bar// cho 'phrul gsum ldan phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor bdag nyid sras mchog nyid// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bcas// dbyings nas rang bzhin shugs kyis bskyod// rang snang
174a4(1): dkyil 'khor dbyer med mnyam// ye shes rol pa'i rang nyid las// mtshan ma lha yi phyag rgyar 'bar// snang srid 'dod yon dkyil 'khor nyid// gnyis med tshim rgyas par rol// dkyil 'khor nyid la dkyil
174a5(1): 'khor thim// dges shing mnyes pa'i las rdzogs nas// bdag nyid gtso bo phyag rgya'i sku// thugs khar nyi zla snying po sngags// rang nyams 'od 'bar snying po gso// skad cig sngags dang 'od 'bar gsal// mi
174a6(1): g.yo brtan pa'i shugs kyis drang // 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba gzi mdangs sdud// bde ba'i dum bu sems las blang // de yang dgongs pa'i don dang sbyar// sems kyi rdo rje brtan thob nas// ye shes phyag rgya drod la
174b1(1): dbab// snying po dang dang shugs kyis grang // nyi ma rdo rje chu rlung dang // pad+ma rin chen so ma ta// nam mkha' 'khor lo gsal dang bcas// dur khrod rten dang gzhal yas bcud// snying po gsum gyi brda dang
174b2(1): sbyar// ya ma ka la'i bsnyen par bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'khrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ 'phrin las rtsa ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang
174b3(1): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rngam pa'i rgyal po des/ phyi rtags nang du bsdu ba 'di bshad do/ bde ba'i gnas su sngon 'gro brtsams// rdzas dang dkyil 'khor ldan par bya// dam rdzas kha gsang mchod pa 'bul// de
174b4(1): stengs khyad par rdzas bdun bsags// sman sna ga bur la sogs pa// nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu bsag mtshan ldan pad+ma'i khrag sogs pa// bdun dang bcas pa dngos grub rdzas// snying po lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga// 'o
174b5(1): ma sna lnga spos sna lngar// rin chen sna lngar bcas pa de// rje rigs la sogs ma nor pa'i// thod pa mdzes ldan pho mo gnyis// gu gul chu yis zhen par byug/ tshil chen byugs la phyag rgya dgod// gnas gsum
174b6(1): snying po gsum dag bri// 'phreng ba rnam gsum sku yi mthar// ye shes rigs lnga'i snying po la// 'bras bu lnga yi 'phreng bas bskor// de la rten bca' ga bur sbyar// dkar dmar dur khrod ba stims la
175a1(1): blang // dgongs pa'i drod ldan nang rtags 'byung // ye shes dngos grub rdzas su bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// phyi
175a2(1): rtags nang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nang rtags gsang bar bsdu ba 'di bshad do// dngos grub thod pa'i ga bur de// ye shes lhun grub gzhal yas khang // phyag
175a3(1): rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bstan// ye shes rang snang dkyil 'khor la// dus gsum bde gshegs thugs kyi bcud// zhi khro rab 'byams gzi brjid mdangs// ye shes gshed kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// ma
175a4(1): lus gnyis med rdzas la thim// 'od kyi 'phro 'du bdag dang der// lus la ye shes 'khor lo gsal// sgra dbyangs snying po'i thig ler ldan// 'od zer sprul pa phyag rgyar 'phro// mchod bskangs bstod cing dngos
175a5(1): grub bsdus// nyi ma'i 'od bzhin rten la bstims// ga bur me 'bar ldeg sgra 'gul// gsang rtags yul du mthong bar 'gyur// 'dren pa'i khyad par gnyis ldan bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po
175a6(1): che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// nang rtags gsang bar bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang rtags mngon du phyung ba'i don 'di bshad
175b1(1): do// khyad par dngos grub rdzas chen de// gshin rje gshed kyi thugs nyid de// ri lu dkyil 'khor lha yi grangs// yab yum snyoms zhugs thugs kyi bcud// ye shes nyi zla'i 'od zer gyis// bdag gi sgrib pa nyon
175b2(1): mongs sbyong // rnam rtog bag chags thams cad sreg ye shes lnga yi bde dbang bskur// bkrag dang gzi mdangs ye shes rgyas// rnam shes las thabs dngos grub 'beb// phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa
175b3(1): yi// dkyil 'khor kun gyi sku gsung thugs// bdag la byin gyis brlabs nas kyang // 'jam dpal nag po'i sku gsung thugs// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor grub// spyod yul kun kyang phyag rgya'i
175b4(1): tshogs// gzugs su snang ba thams cad sku// sgra sgrogs stong pa thams cad gsung // gnyis med dran shes thams cad thugs// de ltar gsang rtags mngon du 'byung // rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa yi// 'jam
175b5(1): dpal gshin rje gshed po zhes// rnal 'byor de la nga yis bshad// gsang rtags mngon du dbyung ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis// las kyi gshin rje dbang du bsdu ba 'di
175b6(1): bshad do// gnas mchog tshang bar dkyil 'khor bri// rdzas dang sbyor ba gong bzhin bca'// phyi nang gsang ba'i drod gzung la// drod rtags tshad mas gtan la dbab// phyi nang gsang ba'i drod rnyed de// ye shes
176a1(1): lus la tshud nas kyang // las kyi ya ma'i bsnyen pa bya// rang nyid phyag rgya chen po la// lus kyi 'khor lo bstan byas la// khro bo'i dka' thub ldan pa yi// rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs byas te// thugs
176a2(1): kyi 'od zer lcags klu'i tshul// lho phyogs dur khrod rol pa nas// las kyi gshin rje rngam pa'i tshul// sna tshogs me rlung 'khor lo can// sha za khrag 'thung rngam sgra sgrogs/ kha nas nad da la dmod pa
176a3(1): 'bebs// 'bum phrag rang dbang med par dgug/ dbang du bsdus la las la mngag/ las kyi gshin rje dregs pa kun// dbang du bsdus pa'i drod dang ldan// de nas bzlas sbyar ya tshogs bzlas// las la
176a4(1): tshuchud pa'i drod la rtag de yang 'chi bdag gshin rje yi// las la sbyor ba'i bsnyen pa yin// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong ba'i rgyud las// las kyi ya ma
176a5(1): bsnyen pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas yang gshin rje'i rgyal pos// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// kye ho bde gshegs gsang ba'i sku// drag po las kyi sbyor ba dang // 'khrul 'khor don gyi snying po
176a6(1): rnams// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po des// gshin rje gshed kyis gsad pa drag po'i las 'di bshad do// dngos grub gnyis dang bde ldan
176b1(1): na// drag po las kyi sbyor ba brtsams// dur khrod gnyen ra gdud pa ru// brnag pa thun dang 'khor lo'i rdzas// 'brub khung ling kha'i rgyud rten bcas// dong gzhug mtshon cha 'khor lo bca'// de dag rgyas pa 'di
176b2(1): lta ste// phung sa'i stegs bu dug khrag byug de stengs gru gsum rtsegs la// khru gang rgyal mtho mjug chag thod pa rtsang phur phyir bar nang // rgya sol dug dang rak+ta byug phyi sa chu rjes dri ma dkru// rten bcud shun
