176b3(1): bcas drug gnyis tshad// dbang po dod pa gcal thabs gcer// ming rus dug khrag snying kha mgo/ rabs chad thod par e nang gnag tsher ma'i stan la gan kyal bsgyel// khrag gsum dug gsum phye gsum
176b4(1): 'bru// khra ma thod sar skam thun bca'// 'khrul 'khor drag po'i las bshad pa// ye shes las kyi bye ba gnyis// rnal 'byor drod kyi tshad dang sbyar// yab kyi 'khrul 'khor las kyi bdud// bca' ba'i rim pa
176b5(1): 'di lta ste// dur khrod gnas nas dpa' bo yi// ka la ka pa ma ni tog gos su bcas pa'i chu blangs la// zod pa'i snying por bcud snga bya// de la gcod pa'i tsakra pri// dur khrod ras la bam chen gyi// sme ba lnga
176b6(1): yi thang ba bya// ni ra su yi thal ba yis// mtha' ma brgya dang rgyang bcad la// mchog phran rkyang ngam bya rog sgo// bam skra rgyus pas pir byas te// bam chen don gyi khrag dug gis// gcod pa'i 'khor lo rjes su
177a1(1): bri// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo ngar dang bcas// rdo rje 'chang chen dregs pas myos// 'jam dpal nag po gshin rje gshed// khro rgyal kun gyi stobs dang sbyar// mthu stobs bdag po dbang phyug gi ya
177a2(1): ma rA dzas yang gsol pa// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po// zab cing rgya che'i chos nyid ni// gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sras mchog byang chub
177a3(1): sems// zab cing rgya chen sgra sgrogs pa'i// chos nyid nga yis rgyas bshad do// sems can bsam pa tha dad pas// chos kyi bye brag thams cad kyang // mdor bsdus bshad tshul rnam pa gsum// sangs rgyas rnams
177a4(1): kyi dgongs pa yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rgyu yi theg chen tshul bshad dang // gsang sngags rnal 'byor tshul bshad dang // bla med dgongs pa'i tshul bshad pa'o// rgyu yi theg pa chen po yi// tshul du bshad pa
177a5(1): 'di lta ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos bstan pa// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// rgya chen kun rdzob bden pa dang // zab pa don dam bden pa'o// kun rdzob bden pa rnam pa gnyis// yang dag pa dang
177a6(1): log pa'o// dang po rtog bcas rtog med pa'i// shes pa yul dang yul can te// mtshan nyid bzhi dang ldan pa'o// gnyis pa snang la don byed ni// mi gnas pa de mi srid chos// yang na kun rdzob bden pa
177b1(1): gsum// brtags dang shes dang brjod pa'o// don dam bden pa'ang rnam pa gnyis// zab mo gtam gyi don dam dang // 'jig rten grags de'i don dam mo// dang po skye med brjod dang bral// dngos med mngon
177b2(1): par 'dus ma byas// spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad bral// blo dang dngos po ma rig pa// gting zab brtag dka' stong pa nyid// rang bzhin med pa'i de kho na'o// gnyis pa yang dag shes pa ni// yul dang yul
177b3(1): can bcas pa'o// de nyid gzhan du brjod med pas// rgya che de bzhin zab pa nyid// rang bzhin gcig phyir de kho na// so so ma yin tha mi dad// spros dang bral ba'i chos nyid do// yang na don dam bden pa
177b4(1): gsum// don dang bsgrub dang thob pa'o// dang po chos rnams de bzhin nyid// cir yang mi gnas stong nyid do// gnyis pa sgrib med ye shes te// gang dang dbyer med dag pa'o// gsum pa rnam par byang ba
177b5(1): yi// 'bras bu ye shes dam pa'o// de dag rang bzhin tha dad min// des na rgya che zab par bshad// gsang sngags rnal 'byor theg pa yi// tshul du bshad pa 'di lta ste// snying po rang rig dngos med de// cir
177b6(1): yang snang zhing cir yang 'grub// rol pa ma 'gags sna tshogs snang // 'khor ba phyi nang snod bcud dang // mya ngan 'das pa sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor lam dang 'bras bu'i chos// phyi nang gsang ba sna
178a1(1): tshogs su// mi 'gags rang snang cir yang byung // rgya che ba zhes bshad pa yin// de dag sna tshogs cir snang yang // mtha' rnams ma spangs bral ba'i phyir// dngos med stong nyid rang bzhin
178a2(1): med// skye med dngos med phyogs dang bral// cir yang ma grub brtag tu med// zab pa zhes su bshad pa yin// dngos po med nyid ma 'gags snang // ji ltar snang yang dngos med nyid// gcig las ma g.yos sna
178a3(1): tshogs 'byung // sna tshogs rang bzhin gnyis med cig/ phyogs med phyogs kyi dngos gzhi ste// rigs can rigs dang bral ba yin// zab dang rgya che gnyis med pa'o// ya ma ra rdzas yang gsol pa// bla med
178a4(1): dgongs pa'i tshul bshad nyid// gang lags pa de bshad du gsol// zhes gsol bas/ bka' stsal pa/ bla med dgongs pa'i bshad tshul la// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// dpe yi zab cing rgya che dang // don
178a5(1): ci zab cing rgya che dang // rtags kyis zab cing rgya che ba'o// gsol pa/ dpe yi mtshan nyid bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ dpe ni nam mkha' yin pa ste// sna tshogs snang ba thams cad la// nam mkha' ma
178a6(1): khyab gcig kyang med// 'byung ba gling bzhi'i rnam pa dang // nyi zla gza' skar gzha' sprin rnams// nam mkha' nyid kyi cho 'phrul te// sna tshogs snang ba rgya che bas// ji ltar snang yang dngos ma grub// rgyu med rkyen
178b1(1): med skye 'gag med/ kha dog dbyibs med rang bzhin med// gzung du med cing brtag tu med// zad pa med cing 'gro 'ong med// klong yang sa gting rings zab par bshad// gsol pa/ don gyi mtshan nyid bshad
178b2(1): du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ don gyi chos nyid yin pa ste// chos nyid rang bzhin dag pa las// chos can dngos po sna tshogs snang // 'khor ba gnam ri sa brag dang // rtsi shing gling bzhi ri rab bcas// mtshan
178b3(1): ma'i cho 'phrul cir yang snang // mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams kyang // zhing khams sna tshogs gzhal yas khang // gdan rgyan longs spyod du mar snang // rgya che ba zhes bshad pa yin// sna tshogs snang yang rang bzhin
178b4(1): med// ma byas ma bcos 'gyur ba med// gting zab brtag dka' spros med pa// blo dang dngos pos ma rig pa// mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i ngang // chos dbyings rang bzhin stong pa nyid// rtog med dmigs
178b5(1): med mu mtha' med// des na zab pa zhes bshad do// gsol pa/ rtags kyi mtshan nyid bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ rtags ni sems nyid yin pa ste// sems nyid rang bzhin dngos med las// rol pa'i
178b6(1): cho 'phrul cir yang snang // 'khor ba 'gro drug sems can gyi// lus dang bag chags las dbang sogs// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // rten 'brel bcu gnyis chu bo bzhi// sna tshogs ma rtogs ngo la
179a1(1): snang // myang 'das dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku dang ye shes mdzad pa dang // rigs dang dkyil 'khor yon tan dang // stobs dang mi 'jigs zad par dang // zil gnon skye mched sna tshogs
179a2(1): snang // lam dang 'bras bu theg pa'i rim// rang snang bas na rgya cher bshad// rang 'byung snying pos kun la khyab// dngos med rang rig ngo bo nyid// ma bcos lhun grub 'gyur ba med// sems nyid rang gsal
179a3(1): 'dus ma byas// skye 'gag med cing mtha' dbus med// rtog med zab pa zhes su bshad// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa yi// sna tshogs snang yang dngos ma grub// gnyis med rang bzhin rdzogs par
179a4(1): bshad// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs khri drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po las/ lta ba zab pa rgya che ba'i le'u ste nyis brgya drug pa'o// // de nas gshin rje gshed
179a5(1): rgyal pos/ rdo rje 'chang chen dpa' bo la// pus btsugs thal sbyar gsol ba btab// kye ho rdo rje 'chang rgyal po/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// mtshan rnams brjod pa'i rim pa la// sngon 'gro yan
179a6(1): lag brjod pa'i thabs// de yi 'bras bu ji ltar lags// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// zhus don ngas bshad legs par nyon// rang bzhin spros med chos nyid de// rnam
179b1(1): rtog zug rngu med pas nas kyang // rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// zhus don ngas bshad legs par nyon// rang bzhin spros med chos nyid de// rnam rtog zug rngu med pas 'jam// de rtog thugs rje 'byung bas
179b2(1): dpal// sgrib med ye shes 'od gsal ba// rang rig rang gsal rnam dag sems// nyon mongs rnam rtog bdud 'joms pa// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ste// de yi mtshan nas brjod pa la// sngon 'gro
179b3(1): lam ni yan las brgyad// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ phyag 'tshal mchod 'bul sdig pa bshags// yi rangs 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba dang // skyabs 'gro dge rtsa bsngo ba'o// de dag
179b4(1): rnam par dbye ba ni// chos dbyings 'og min phyogs bcu'i zhing khams na// skye mched chos sku longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// sbrul sku chos nyid dge 'dun sras bcas la// lus ngag yid gsum dang bas phyag
179b5(1): 'tshal lo// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod sprin rgya chen po// dngos sbyor yid kyi rnam srul 'jig rten bkang // sku gsum lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas thams cad du// byang chub sems sogs kun la rgyas par
179b6(1): 'bul// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs dbang gis na// lus ngag yid kyis sdig pa ci bgyis pa// thams cad sku gsum rdo rje'i bde gshegs dang // byang chub spyan sngar ma lus bshags par
180a1(1): bgyi'o// phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad du// byang chub sems dpa' dag dang 'gro ba yi// rgya chen rab zab bsod nams dge ba'i tshogs// de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi
180a2(1): rangs// phyogs bcu 'jig rten bsam yas dpag med na// sku gsung rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig/ bzhugs shing mnyam bzhag 'gro 'dul de dag la// chos kyi 'khor lo bla med bskor bar
180a3(1): bskul// dus gsum bde gshegs mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa// de dag kun la bdag gis thal sbyar te// 'gro ba'i don du bskal pa dpag med du// bzhugs shing thugs rjes don mdzad gsol ba 'debs// skye
180a4(1): med ngang las ye shes skur ston cig/ thugs rje chen pos kun la khyab mdzad pa'i// dpa' bo bdud 'dul sangs rgyas thams cad la// byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi// phyag 'tshal mchod dang sdig pa
180a5(1): bshags la sogs// dge ba gzhan gyis de dag thams cad kun// bla med byang chub chen po thob bya'i phyir// bdag gis yang dag yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// de ltar sngon du 'gro ba yis// lam gyi yan lag
180a6(1): brgyad rdzogs bya'o// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' rtog pa'i rgyal po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po las/ yan lag brgyad kyi le'u ste sum brgya tham pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos// lam gyi sbyor
180b1(1): ba 'di bshad do// nga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes yin te thugs la gnas// de yi mtshan gyi gdon thabs la// gang zag mos pa tha dad phyir// bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod kyang // mdor bsdus rnam
180b2(1): pa gsum yin te// dbang po rab kyis brjod pa ni// mi rtog ye shes bltas te gdon// dbang po 'bring gi brjod pa ni// gsang sngags tshul du bltas te gdon// dbang po tha mas mtshan brjod pa// che ba'i yon
180b3(1): tan bltas te gdon// de gsum thabs gyi sngon du ni// khrus bya ba dang sems skyed dang // dam tshig sdom pa gzung bar bya// de dag rgyas pa 'di dag ste// khrus la phyi nang gnyis yin te// phyi khrus chu gtsang dri zhim
180b4(1): btsas// dang po'i sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gyis// chu nang zla stengs a dkar bsam// bdag thugs 'od 'phros a la thim// 'od du zhu bas dri ma'i tshogs// ma lus par ni dag par gsam// lhag ma dzam+b+ha la la
180b5(1): sbyin// nang khrus bdag med rnam dag la// lhag par mos pa'i bsam pa'o// sems skyed pa yi sbyor ba ni// ye shes lnga dang snying rje gsum// bsgoms pas mngon par byang chub pa'o// 'khor 'das la sogs
180b6(1): sna tshogs par// snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus kun// snang ba rang bzhin med pa yi// sgrib med ye shes chen por gsal// dper na me long gzugs brnyan bzhin// sna tshogs snang yang dngos ma grub// ma yengs
181a1(1): 'dris par rab tu blta// de ltar chos kun dngos med pas// gcig dang du mar bral ba yis// rang bzhin stong nyid chen po la// mtshan mar grub pa yang dag med// dper na nam mkha' dngos
181a2(1): med bzhin// skye med rtag dka' 'dus ma byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i chos de la// bzang ngan che chung ye nas med// phyogs dang ris med mtha' dbus med// mngon sum mi gnas kun la snyoms// mnyam pa
181a3(1): nyid kyi snying po la// rim par bkod pa ye nas med// de ltar rab tu gsal bar bsgoms// chos rnams so so'i mtshan nyid kyang // ma 'dres sna tshogs rnam par snang // de yang sgrib med rang gsal ba// thams
181a4(1): cad mkhyen pa'i rig pa nyid// bye brag sna tshogs rnam pa yang // rtags na rig pa'i ye shes nyid// de las gzhan pa'i chos med bsgoms// lam dang 'bras bu la sogs te// yon tan bya ba'i 'dod don
181a5(1): rnams// ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa yi// rang rig snying po sgrib med de// 'gro don shugs la grub par byed// ma 'khrul rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin bsgom// de ltar ye shes lnga bsgoms nas// snying rje rnam par
181a6(1): gsum bsgom pa// ma rig rgyu la log rtog rkyen// des bskyed sdug bsngal phung por smin// mgon med 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor phyin// sems can de dag sdug bsngal las// thar par bsgral te don bya sbyor// chos
181b1(1): rnams bdag med stong pa nyid// rang bzhin dag pa'i mtshan nyid las// chos kun gzhan med de bzhin nyid// de rtogs mnyam pa nyid du sbyor// bdag dang gzhan du dbyer med pas// don bya snying rje'i yul
181b2(1): dngos med// dmigs med rang bzhin yongs dag pa'i// rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid bsgoms// sdom pa bzung ba'i rim pa ni// sku gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' chen por
181b3(1): bcas// dus 'di nas ni dgongs su gsol// bdag ni byang chub snying po la// nam zhig gnas kyi bar dag tu// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed kyi// rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid de// dngos po med pa'i ngo
181b4(1): bo nyid// stong nyid de bzhin nyid dbyings las// de bzhin rigs mchog sdom pa gzung // 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub sems// skye 'gag med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// dbyer med rnam rtog kun 'joms pa// rdo
181b5(1): rje rigs mchog sdom pa gzung // mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las// yon tan thams cad lhun rdzogs pa'i// blang dor med pa'i byang chub sems// rin chen rigs mchog sdom pa gzung // chos gang dri ma med
181b6(1): pa'i ngang // skyon gyis ma gos 'od gsal ba'i// rang gi mtshan nyid ma 'dres rdzogs// pad+ma rigs mchog sdom pa gzung // bla med byang chub sems kyi mchog thugs rje thabs rol cir yang snang // pha rol phyin
182a1(1): sogs chos thams cad// las kyi rigs mchog sdom pa gzung // mtha' yas sems can kun don phyir// byang chub mchog tu bdag sems bskyed// sdom pa ma lus gzung bar bgyi// ngan song
182a2(1): bdag gis bsgral bar bgyi// 'khor ba bdag gis grol bar bgyi// rgyu yis sa las dbugs dbyung bgyi// sems can ma lus thams cad kun// bdag gis byang chub mchog la dgog/ ces ni sdom pa gzung
182a3(1): bar bya// gzhan gyi bzhad pa dag gis kyang // sdom pa rab tu gzung ba'o// dam tshig thun mong khyad par gyis// thun mong dam tshig dran pa ni// nyams na gso bar khas blangs te// spyi yi dam tshig bzhin du
182a4(1): srung // khyad par dam tshig rnam bzhi ste// phyi nang khrus dang bya ba dang // ming tshig dag gis bar ma bcad// gzhan gyis mi zos klag pa dang // sems ni ma yengs gsol ba'o// de dag sngon 'gro'i yan lag
182a5(1): go/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// sngon du 'gro ba'i le'u ste sum brgya gcig pa'o// // lam gyi yan lag gi skabs so// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// ya ma rA dzas gsol btab pa// gang zag
182a6(1): dbang po rab don du// mtshan ni mi rtog ye shes su// bltas te gdon pa ji ltar lags// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gshin rje gshed kyi sras// sngon du bya ba'i las rdzogs nas// stong pa
182b1(1): nyid kyi ngang las kyang // dang po'i sangs rgyas bdag nyid bskyed// thugs khar nyi zla kha sbyor gyi// bar du a ni dkar po bsgom// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// don dam skye med brjod dang bral// ye
182b2(1): shes spros bral rang bzhin bsgom// de las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// chos nyid byang chub sems su sbyangs// bsdus te thim pas bdag nyid kyang // ye shes sgyu ma'i sku ru
182b3(1): bsgoms// skye med yi ge shel ltar dag shin tu gsal la dri med bsgom// rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog don chen yi ge dam pa yin// khong nas 'byung ba skye ba
182b4(1): med// dngos po dag la mtshan brjod pas// thugs kha'i skye med yi ge de// tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste// stong pa nyid kyi rang sgra 'byung // brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog des ni stong gsum stong chen po// 'jig
182b5(1): rten khams ni mtha' yas su// stong nyid rang gsal sgra bsgrags te// tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// bdag dang 'khor dang chos thams cad// stong nyid rang sgra rig pa des// skye ba med cing 'gag pa
182b6(1): med// brjod du med cing tha snyad med// brtag tu med cing btung du med// thog ma med cing tha ma med// 'gyur ba med cing dngos po med// mya ngan 'das med 'khor ba'ang med// ngo bo nyid med bdag gzhan
183a1(1): med// yongs su shes par bya ba'ang med// rnam par rtog med mi rtog med// g.yo ba med cing mi g.yo med// gting zab brtag dka' ma bcos pa// blos ma rig cing sgrib med pa'i// rang gsal
183a2(1): dngos med dbyings su gsal// de ltar bsgom zhing brjod pa ni// nyin mtshan dus gsum rgyun du gdon// skyo ba mtshan gyi yang snying gis// stong nyid dang po'i sangs rgyas su// byas te langs la rjes thob
183a3(1): la// dngos po thams cad ye shes brgyan// chos nyid rol pa rang snang ba// bde stong dbyer med klong na gnas// de ltar bsgoms zhing lta byas na// tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu thob// chos sku rnam dag thob gyur
183a4(1): na// longs spyod rdzogs sku ye shes kyis// rol pa'i rang snang sprul pa'i sku// bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dang // sems can rnams la mngon snang ngo // 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// mtshan
183a5(1): mi rtog pa'i ye shes su bltas te gdon pa'i le'u ste sum brgya gnyis pa'o// // sras mchog gshin rjes yang gsol pa// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// mtshan ni zab mo gsang sngags kyis// don du bltas
183a6(1): te gdon pa zhes// bgyi ba gang lags bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// zhus don bshad kyis legs par nyon// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa yi// dngos med stong nyid ngang las
183b1(1): kyang // sgyu 'phrul lta bu'i tshul gyis ni// nam mkha' dbyings kyi rang bzhin bsgoms// gsal ba skar ma lta bu yi// ye shes 'od zer las byung ba// hUM ni sngon po 'od zer gyi// tshogs dang ldan par rab tu
183b2(1): bsgom// de las 'od zer dpag med pa'i// rtse mo la ni sangs rgyas sku// mang po rab tu 'phros pa yi// sems can rnams kyi don byas nas// slar 'dus hUM la thim gyur pas// 'od du zhu bas rdo rje che/ kha dog
183b3(1): drug ldan rtse drug gyur// khro zhal drug gis rab mdzes pa'o// bum pa'i nang du b+h+rUM dkar las// rin po che yi mchod rten ni// stong gsum stong chen tshad tsam bsgom// mchod rten de yi bum nang du// yi ge hri la
183b4(1): chos 'byung bsam// de nas sna tshogs rdo rje yi// lte bar b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang // gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// rin chen lnga yi rtsig par bcas// 'don yon mchod pa'i lha mos 'khrigs// rin chen pha
183b5(1): gus rnam par mdzes// dra ba dra phyed dril bur bcas// dar bu kha dang pad+ma dang // rin chen ka ba za ra tshags// ta ra na da 'khor lo gdugs// rdo rje ye shes me rir ldan// de lta'i nang na srog chags
183b6(1): gdan// seng ge glang chen rta mchog dang // rma bya shang shang pad+ma yi// gdan rnams rab tu gsal bar bsgom// de nas dbus kyi gdan stengs su// a ni dkar po yongs gyur las// rnam par snang mdzad gangs
184a1(1): chen mtsho// sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can// ral pa'i dbu brgyan rgyan med bsgom// de yi thugs kha zla stengs su// d+hi las dang po sangs rgyas bsgom// zhal lnga
184a2(1): phyag bzhi skyil krung bzhugs// sku mdog dkar po rgyan gyis brgyan// g.yas bzhi ral gri g.yon bzhin// shes rab po ti bzhi yang bsnams// 'od gsal shin tu 'bar bar bsgom// de yi thugs khar bsgom
184a3(1): pa na// rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pa ni// pha rol phyin pa bcu gnyis mtshon// sangs rgyas bcu gnyis bgrod pa yi// rang bzhin las byung shes rab kyi// 'khor lo lte mthar mu khyud bzhi// rtsibs drug kha dog
184a4(1): drug dang ldan// lte bar a dkar 'phro 'du las// a nyid las thim de stobs kyis// mu khyud nang la rtsa sngags dgod// rtsibs drug dang po nas brtsams te// sngags drug rang rang kha dog bzhin// phyi bskor mu
184a5(1): khyud nang ma la// yang snying 'phreng sngags dag gis bskor// phyi la sgra yig gsal byed sgom// de dbus ye shes thig le yi// a ni dkar po yongs gyur las// bcom ldan ye shes sems pa'i sku// zhal drug phyag
184a6(1): gnyis sprin dkar mdog zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs// phyag g.yas ut+pal dmar po la// phyag g.yon ut+pal sngon po'o// steng na shes rab po ti bsnams// yod pa zhi ba'i ngang tshul can// in+ta ni
184b1(1): la'i gtsug phud mdzes// nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od zer 'bar// rgyan rnams rdzogs par rab tu bsgom// de yi thugs khar zla stengs su// don dam yi ge a dkar bsgom// de las 'od zer rab 'phros
184b2(1): pas// sems can kun gyi sgrib bsal nas// tshur 'dus bdag lus snang bar bya// zhag drug dag nas 'od 'phros te// stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten khams// ye shes 'od kyis snang bar byas// de nas rdo rje
184b3(1): sgo drug nas/ kha dog drug gi 'od byung ste// sangs rgyas zhing khams thams cad kun// ye shes 'od kyis snang byas na// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kun// mchod dang don byas slar 'dus te// ye shes rdo/
184b4(1): rje de nyid la// lan gsum dag tu bskor byas nas// de nyid la ni rab bzhugs pas// bdag med chos nyid rtogs par byas// zla ba la gnas snying po dang // sngags dang gcig tu gyur par bsgom// des ni
184b5(1): sgrib pa ma lus pa// dag cing byang nas ye shes gsal// de ltar rgyun du ma yengs pa// bsgom zhing brjod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// tshe 'di ring por mi thogs par// sku dang zla ba a gsum gyi// sgo nas chos sku
184b6(1): longs spyod sku// sbrul sku rnam gsum thob par 'gyur// thun mong dngos grub sangs rgyas kyi// sku dang zhing khams bsam yas mthong // spyan lnga mngon shes drug la sogs// phan yon ji bzhin thob par
185a1(1): 'gyur// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' rtog pa'i rgyal po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ rigs bsdus pa'i le'u ste sum brgya gsum pa'o// // de las gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rigs ni so
185a2(1): sor dbye ba yis// gdon thabs rnal 'byor rim pa ni// rnam par mi rtog ye shes kyi// phyag rgya rdo rje dbyings kyi dal// byang sems rdo rje bsgom pa ni// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gdan stengs su// a ni dkar po
185a3(1): yongs gyur las// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// dkar po gzhon tshul skyil krung bzhugs// rigs lnga'i dbu brgyan dang ldan cing // rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu mdzes// phyag g.yas rdo rje gsor ba'i
185a4(1): tshul// phyag g.yon dril bu 'dzin par bsgom// de yi thugs khar dang por yi ge brgya// sangs rgyas gzhung bzhin bsgom par bya// snying khar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bsgom// mu khyud sngags la sogs snga ma
185a5(1): bzhin// rtsibs la a ra pa tsa dgod// lte bar a dkar gyur pa la// a ra pa tsa ye shes sems// dkar po gzhon nu zur phud lnga// rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs ldan// g.yas pa ral gri po ti
185a6(1): g.yon// skyil krung bzhugs pa'i thugs khar a// dkar po las ni ye shes kyi// 'od zer 'phro 'du de bzhin bya// de ltar gsal bas mtshan brjod pa// 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// shes pa dag
185b1(1): nas rab brtsams te// theg pa chen po tshul gyi mchog/ ces pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de las gzhan yang bshad bya ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi// sgo nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi// dkyil 'khor la
185b2(1): bstod rnal 'byor gyis// a ni 'od du zhu ba las// rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can// rdo rje skyil mo krung dang ldan// thugs khar dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom// de thugs
185b3(1): 'khor lo rtsibs bcu dkar// rtsibs la dz+nyA na mu rti dgod// lte bar a las ye shes sems// shes rab ye shes zhes bya ba// dkar po gzhon nu rgyan gyis mdzes// phyag g.yas ral gri 'khor lo g.yon// thugs
185b4(1): khar zla stengs a dkar po// ye shes 'od zer 'phro 'du ni// de bzhin byas te mtshan brjod pa// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// zhes pa dag nas rab brtsams te// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// zhes
185b5(1): pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de las gzhan yang bshad bya ba// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi// sgo nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// dkyil 'khor dag la bstod pa ni// hUM 'od du zhu ba las mi bskyod pa sngon po sa
185b6(1): gnon phyag rgya can// de thugs dang po sangs rgyas bsgom// thugs khar 'khor la rtsibs brgyad sngo// rtsibs la du kha rtse sogs dgod// lte bar hUM las ye shes sems// rdo rje ral gri zhes bya ba// sngon po gzhon
186a1(1): nu zur phud lnga// g.yas g.yon rdo rje ral gri 'dzin// thugs khar zla ba hUM sngon po// 'od zer 'phro 'du bya zhing brjod// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// ces pa dag nas rab brtsams
186a2(1): te// sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ ces pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis// sgo nas snang ba mtha' yas kyis// dkyil 'khor la bstod rim pa
186a3(1): ni// dbus su hri ni dmar po las// snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar// ting 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya bsgom// thugs khar dang po'i sangs rgyas nyid// snying khar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dmar// badz+ra ti k+Sha Na
186a4(1): 'bru brgyad dgod// de dbus hri dmar 'od zhu las// rdo rje non po ye shes sems// na bza' rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes// zur phud lnga pa skyil krung bzhugs// ral gri pad+ma g.yas g.yon 'dzin// thugs khar
186a5(1): dal hri dmar po// 'phro 'du bya zhing mtshan brjod pa// yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid// ces pa dag nas rab brtsams te// ye shes me lce 'od 'bar gsal// zhes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de las
186a6(1): gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi// sgo nas rin chen 'byung ldan gyis// dkyil 'khor dag la bstod pa ni// de 'od zhu las oM ser po// gyur pa rin chen 'byung ldan ni// ser po mchog sbyin
186b1(1): phyag rgya can/ dang po'i sangs rgyas de bzhin bsgom// shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser// bA gI shwa ra 'bru brgyad dgod// lte bar oM ni ser po las// ngag gi dbang phyug ye shes sems// sha za rgyan rdzogs
186b2(1): zur phud lnga// phyag g.yas ral gri rin chen g.yon// thugs khar zla ba oM ser las// 'phro 'du sbar zhing mtshan brjod pa// 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste// zhes pa dag nas rab brtsams te// nor bu chen po
186b3(1): rin chen tog/ ces pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// sgo nas don yod grub pa yis// dkyil 'khor la bstod rnal 'byor ni// de 'od zhu bas a
186b4(1): ljang khu// de las don yod grub pa sku// ljang khu mi 'jigs phyag rgya can// thugs khar dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom// shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ldang // dz+nyA na kA ya 'bru brgyad dgod// lte bar a ni ljang khu
186b5(1): las// ye shes sku can ye shes sems// ljang khu rgyan rdzogs zur phud lnga// phyag ni g.yas g.yon ral gri dang // rdo rje rgya gram bsnams par bsgom// thugs khar zla stengs a ldang las// 'od zer 'phro 'du bya
186b6(1): zhing brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs bya ba'i// zhes dag nas ni rab brtsams te// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog ces pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de ltar rgyun du bstod byas nas// yon tan
187a1(1): 'bras bu bsam mi khyab// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' khri drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po las// rigs so sor phye
187a2(1): ba'i le'u ste sum brgya bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sngon du bya ba kun rdzogs nas// rnam snang chen po la sogs te// rigs bsdus nyid du bsgom byas na// don dam skye med snying po las// ye
187a3(1): shes 'od zer rnam drug 'phros// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// 'od zer mthing kha ye shes sems// zhal nas mthing kha dag nas byung // 'khor lo rtsibs mthing nas brgyud te// dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal mthing
187a4(1): byung // shar phyogs stong chen 'jig rten khams// dpag tu med par rab 'phros pas// sems can kun gyi zhe sdang sbyangs// sdug bsngal sgrib pa dag par byas// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi// 'od zer ser po
187a5(1): de bzhin 'phros// zhal ser nas su rtsibs ser brgyud// lho phyogs stong gsum stong chen po// 'jig rten khams kyis dpag med khyab// sems can kun gyi nga rgyal sbyangs// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi// 'od
187a6(1): zer dmar po de bzhin 'phros// zhal dmar nad byung rtsibs dmar brgyud// nub phyogs stong gsum stong chen po// dpag tu med par khyab pa yi// sems can kun gyi 'dod chags sbyangs// bya ba nan tan ye
187b1(1): shes kyi// 'od zer ljang khu dpag med 'phros// zhal ldang nas byung rtsibs ldang brgyud// byang phyogs stong gsum 'jigs rten khams// stong chen dpag tu med par khyab// sems can kun gyi phrag dog
187b2(1): sbyangs// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi// 'od zer dkar po dpag med 'phros// zhal dkar nas byung rtsibs dkar brgyud// 'og phyogs stong chen dpag tu med// 'jig rten khams rnams kun khyab pas// sems
187b3(1): can kun gyi gti mug sbyangs// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi// 'od zer dkar po tshad med 'phros// zhal dkar nang byung rtsibs dkar brgyud// steng phyogs stong gsum stong chen po// 'jig rten khams ni
187b4(1): dpag med 'phros// sems can theg tshogs sdug bsngal sbyangs// nyon mongs bag chags rtsad nas sbyangs// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag/ 'gro don yid bzhin byas nas kyang // slar 'dus rdo rje chen po
187b5(1): la// lan gsum bskor te rang rang gi/ rang gi sgo nas nang du 'dus pa las// ye shes 'khor lo rtsibs drug la// thim pas shes rab 'khor lo dang // drag cing myur du 'khor ba yis// bdag gi chags sdang
187b6(1): nyon mongs ku// bcad cing thal ba bzhin dang rlag/ sgrib pa bag chags bcad nas sbyangs// ye shes sgrib med lhun gyis grub// nyon mongs gcod cing 'khor ba sbyong // ye shes sgrib med 'khor lo yin// de
188a1(1): ltar rgyun du gsal ba las// mtshan rnams rdzogs par brjod par bya// yang na 'dud tsho sngags rings gdon// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis/ tshe 'dir ring po mi thogs par// dngos grub la
188a2(1): sogs byin rlabs ni// phan yon bzhin du nges par 'byung // bzhi dang dang po'i sangs rgyas dang // shes rab 'khor lo ye shes yin// a dang zla ba 'phro 'du yis// chos sku sbrul sku longs spyod rdzogs// rdo rje'i
188a3(1): sku dang longs spyod rdzogs// ngo bo nyid sku thob par 'gyur// the tshom med de slu med nges// de bzhin gsang ba'i mchog tu bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad thugs yang dag pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i
188a4(1): rgyud chen po khri drug stong pa las gsang sngags kyi le'u ste sum brgya lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba'i// zab mo gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bshad// rang bzhin rnam
188a5(1): par dag pa yi// 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid ni// gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can// rdo rje mchod rten gzhal yas sogs// rigs bsdus bzhin du bsgom par bya// shes rab 'khor lo'i lte ba la// nyi
188a6(1): zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// skye med dag pa'i snying po las// rigs bsdus ye shes sems dpa' bskyed// de yi thugs kyi snying po las// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// rtsibs drug 'bru drug rab 'phros
188b1(1): pas// shar rtsibs sngon por hUM sngon 'phros// nub rtsibs dmar por hri dmar 'phros// byang rtsibs ljang khur a ldang 'phros// 'og rtsibs dkar por a dkar 'phros// steng rtsibs dkar por a dkar
188b2(1): 'phros// 'bru drug yongs su gyur pa las// shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje'i rigs// rdo rje ral gri ye shes sems// me long ye shes phyag rgya bsgom// lho yi rtsibs la rin chen rigs// ngag gi dbang phyug ye shes
188b3(1): sems// mnyam nyid ye shes phyag rgya bsgom// nub kyi rtsibs la pad+ma'i rigs// rdo rje rnon po ye shes sems// kun rtog ye shes phyag rgya bsgom// byang gi rtsibs la las kyi rigs// ye shes sku can ye shes
188b4(1): sems// nan tan ye shes phyag rgya bsgom// 'og gi rtsibs la de bzhin rigs// shes rab ye shes ye shes sems// stong nyid ye shes phyag rgya bsgom// steng rtsibs byang sems rdo rje'i rigs// a ra pa tsa ye
188b5(1): shes sems// chos dbyings ye shes phyag rgya bsgom// de dag rang rang sngags kyis skyed// dbus kyi thugs kyi snying po las// ye shes drug gi 'od zer byung // ye shes sems dpa'i zhal mthing nas// me long ye
188b6(1): shes 'od sngon byung // rdo rje ral gri'i thugs la brgyud// de 'phros dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi// zhal mthing nas byung gzhal yas khang // rdo rje po yi shar nas 'phros// 'od zer mthing kha'i rtse mo la// mi bskyed
189a1(1): sangs rgyas sku bzhugs pa// phyogs bcu 'jig rten bsam yas khyab// sems can kun gyi sgrib pa sbyangs// khyad par zhe sdang dag par sbyangs// de bzhin ye shes sangs rgyas kyi// zhal mthun sgo
189a2(1): dang phyogs mthun 'phros// mnyam nyid ye shes 'od zer byung // ngag gi dbang phyug thugs la brgyud// 'od zer lhor 'phros rtse mo la// rin chen 'byung ldan sku bzhugs pa// phyogs bcu kun khyab sems can
189a3(1): rnams// khyad par 'dod chags dag par byas// nan tan ye shes 'od ldang byung // ye shes sku can thugs la brgyud// phyogs bcu kun khyab sems can rnams// khyad par phrag dog dag par sbyangs// stong nyid ye
189a4(1): shes 'od dkar byung // shes rab ye shes thugs la brgyud// 'od dkar 'og 'phros rtse mo la// rnam par snang mdzad sku bzhugs pa// phyogs bcu kun khyab sems can rnams// khyad par gti mug dag par
189a5(1): sbyangs// chos dbyings ye shes 'od dkar byung // byang sems rdo rje'i sku bzhugs pa// phyogs bcu stong gsum stong chen po// 'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas su// skra dang 'od zer dpag med khyab// de nas
189a6(1): sems can thams cad kyi// sgrib pa nyon mongs bag chags kun// ma lus dag cing byang bar 'gyur// yid bzhin bde thob don byas te// de nas 'od zer tshur bsdus nas// rdo rje chen po lan gsum
189b1(1): bskor// rang rang sgo nas tshur zhugs te// rang rang ye shes sems la bstims// shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs drug gi/ rtse la yi ge 'bru drug gnas// steng rtsibs a gnas 'og rtsibs du// shar rtsibs nri la lho
189b2(1): rtsibs su// nub rtsibs hri gnas byang rtsibs bri// nyon mongs drug gi snying po ste// 'gro ba drug gi sa bon yin// rang rang kha dog ldan par bsgom// de las 'od 'phros lus kun khyab// bdag gi nyon mongs
189b3(1): rnam pa drug yig 'bru drug la bsdus te bstim// de nas shes rab 'khor lo de// shin tu drag cing myur bar 'khor// yig 'bru drug bcad rdul phran tsam// brlag cing ze shul med par byas// de ltar rgyun du
189b4(1): gsal bsgom te// 'od zer dbus kyi snying por 'dus// chos sku byang chub sems su gsal// rtsa sngags ye shes snying po dang // ye snying sbrel te rgyun du bzlas// 'dud tshe nyi shus bstod pa bya// yang na mtshan ni
189b5(1): rdzogs par mdzod// bdag don gzhan don gnyis 'grub ste// yang gsang shes rab 'khor lo ni// bskor ba'i lam shes rnam par bshad// thun mong thams cad thugs khar bsdu// yang snying sngags kyi stong pa
189b6(1): nyid// dang po'i sangs rgyas spyod lam bya'o// 'dis ni thun mong mchog nyid kyi// dngos grub myur du 'thob 'gyur ro// thun mong dngos grub phan yon las// 'byung ba bzhin du thob par 'gyur ro// tshe ring nad
190a1(1): med longs spyod 'phel// rigs brgyud dar zhing ci bsam 'grub// chos skyong mkha' 'gro la sogs te// mthu stobs can rnams las byed sbrul// bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon du
190a2(1): mthong // gzhan yang sangs rgyas sras bcas mthong // mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug/ spyan lnga dbang phyug stobs bcur ldan// mchog ni mi tshe 'di nyid kyi// skye med spros bral chos kyi sku// yon tan kun
190a3(1): rdzogs longs spyod sku// sna tshogs rang snang sprul pa'i sku// 'dus ma byas pa rdo rje'i sku// lhun rdzogs mngon par byang chub sku// snying po ngo bo nyid kyi sku// thob nas sangs rgyas sar bzhugs te// 'gro ba rnams la
190a4(1): mngon snang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i rgyud chen po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ yang gsang bsgom pa'i le'u ste sum brgya drug pa'o// // ya ma rA dzas
190a5(1): yang gsol pa/ kye ho rdo rje 'chang chen dpal// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// mtshan ni che ba'i yon tan du// bltas te gdon pa bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// mtshan ni che ba'i
190a6(1): yon tan du// bltas te gdon pa bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje'i 'chang chen gyis// mtshan ni che ba'i yon tan tu// bltas te gdon pa 'di bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho// yon tan ldan
190b1(1): zhing yon tan shes// de brjod bla med byang chub thob// de don rgyas pa 'di lta ste// rang bzhin stong chen ngang nyid las// dang po'i sangs rgyas gsal bar bskyed// sa gzhi rin chen sna lngar grub// shar phyogs
190b2(1): bai DUR+Ya las grub// lho phyogs rin chen gser las grub// nub phyogs pad+ma rA gar ldan// byang phyogs ljang khu dbyig las grub// dbus ni man shel dag par gsal// de dkyil rin chen las grub
190b3(1): pa'i// dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste// dpangs mtho g.yur za sdong por 'brel// yal ga lo 'dab me tog 'bras// thams cad rin po che las grub// 'od 'phro byang chub shing de yi// dkyil stod seng ge
190b4(1): bsnol ba'i khri// nyi zla pad+ma dar gyi gdan// rgyu yi theg pa chen po'i lugs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mtshan dper ldan// btso ma'i gser mdog rgyan bltams ldan// g.yas pa mchog sbyin ut+pal g.yon// de
190b5(1): ltar 'khor dang ldan par bsgom// 'bras bu gsang sngags lugs nyid kyi// sku mdog ston ka'i zla ltar dkar// dri med ye shes 'bar ba'i 'od// zhal drug mthing zer dmar ldang dkar// phyag gnyis rdo rje
190b6(1): bsdams pa yis// ut+pal sngon dmar rtsa nas bzung // ut+pal snyan gyi thad kar bslebs// steng na shes rab po ti bsnams// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan// ye shes
191a1(1): 'od zer 'bar zhing 'phro// sku ni lta bas chog mi shes// zhi ba'i tshul bcu ldan par bsgom// steng phyogs shing chen yal ga la// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs na// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
191a2(1): 'das// chos 'chad pa yi phyag rgyar ldan// mtshan dpe rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs// 'khor gyis yongs bskor 'od 'phro bsgom// g.yas phyogs shing chen yal ga la// pad+ma zla ba'i gdan stengs su// sa la gnas
191a3(1): pa'i byang chub che// sems dpa' sems dpa'i skyil krung bzhugs// mchod sbyin phyag rgyar ldan pa la// rgyan rdzogs 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom// g.yon phyogs dpag bsam yal ga la// 'phags pa nyan thos
191a4(1): rang rgyal tshogs// phyag gnyis thal mo snying khar sbyar// 'jam dpal la ni 'dud par bsgom// 'og gi phyogs na 'jig rten lha// tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs te// thams cad dpag bsam yal ga la// 'jus
191a5(1): nas bskor te rgyan du blta// de ltar bskor te bzhugs par bsgom// dpag bsam shing gi mtha' bskor nas/ khams gsum pa yi lha yi bu// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// phyag na mchod pa sna
191a6(1): tshogs thogs// mchod pa'i spos sprin dud pa las// zag med char ni zim bur 'bab// de ltar zhing khams chen po cig rab tu gsal bar bsgom byas te// de yi dbus na bzhugs pa yi// 'jam dpal ye
191b1(1): shes sems dpa' de// yon tan bdag po'i gzhir bzhag ste// mtshan ni brgyad brgya bcu gnyis kyi// yon tan sgo nas bstod byas pas// dper na brjod pa tsam gyis ni// me bus sma ra 'tshig pa bzhin// phar
191b2(1): stod tshur ni dngos grub 'byung // rje btsun dbu yi dpral ba nas// ye shes 'od zer dkar po byung // bdag gi dpral bar thim gyur bas// lus kyi sgrib pa dag gyur nas// sku yi dngos grub thob par
191b3(1): bsam// rje btsun mgur gyi bum pa nas// ye shes 'od zer dmar po byung // bdag gi mgrin par thim gyur pas// ngag gi sgrib pa dag gyur nas// gsung gi dngos grub tho par bsam// rje btsun thugs kyi
191b4(1): dpal be'u nas// ye shes 'od zer sna tshogs 'phros// bdag gi snying khar thim gyur nas// sems kyi sgrib pa dag gyur nas// thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bsam// de ltar rtag tu bsgom bya zhing // dus
191b5(1): gsum mtshan ni brjod byas na// zag med bde ba rgyud la skye// dper na me long 'od zer gyis// smra ba la sogs 'tshig pa bzhin// 'jam dpal dpa' bo ye shes kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// ye
191b6(1): shes 'od zer gsum 'phros pas// lus ngag yid gsum mtshan ma dang // sgrib pa ma lus kun sreg sbyangs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bstims// rdo rje mchog tu byin brlabs te// lus ni ye shes sgyu ma'i
192a1(1): lus// chu zla 'am 'ja' tshon ji bzhin du// snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// ngag ni sgrib med gsal ba'i ngag/ khrag cha'i rnam pa ji bzhin du// grag stong dbyer med dag par bsgom// yid ni
192a2(1): gsal la rtog sgrib med// sprin med nam mkha'i nyi ma bzhin// rang rig byang chub sems su bsgom// de ltar rgyun du bsgom bya zhing // mtshan ni yang dag brjod par bya'o// de nas skyo 'am thun gtong na// mtshan
192a3(1): ni yang snying brjod byas pas// stong pa nyid kyi nga rgyal bya// de nas bdag nyid dang po yi// sangs rgyas nyid du langs nas kyang // spyod lam rnal 'byor dam pa brgyad// rtag pa rgyun du nus tshad bya'o// de lta bu yi
192a4(1): rnal 'byor gyis/ thun mong mchog go dngos grub kyang // mi ring ba ni thob gyur te// gdon bgegs la sogs 'tshe mi byed// chos skyong rnams bsrungs skye bos 'khur// tshe ring nad med longs spyod
192a5(1): 'phel// bsod nams che zhing ci bsam 'grub// rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma ru// bsgom pa'i de nyid zhing khams mthong // gzhan yang bde gshegs sems dpa' 'ang mthong // lung ston chos 'chad thob par
192a6(1): 'gyur// bla med byang chub rab kyis thob// 'bring gi 'jam dpal zhal mthong ste// phyir ni 'khor bar ldog mi 'gyur// tha mas lha mi khyad par med// chos spyod skal ldan byang chub thob// tshe 'di nyid la thob
192b1(1): 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' rtog pa'i rgyal po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// mtshan che ba'i yon tan du bltas te gdon pa'i le'u ste sum brgya bdun no// // rang bzhin gyi skabs so// de
192b2(1): nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// ya ma ra dzas yang gsol pa// rang bzhin rnam dag ye shes sku// bde chen yon tan mchog gi sku// sna tshogs 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sku// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' dang // dpa'
192b3(1): bopo gcig pa'i bsgom pa nyid// rnam par bkod pa ji ltar lags// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// sras mchog gshin rje rgyal po khyod// dpa' bo'i bsgom pa zhus pa
192b4(1): na// skye med chos sku byang chub sems// 'gag med ye shes rol par shar// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa las// ngo bo phyag rgya chen por gsal// thugs rje phyogs med nyi ltar khyab// de yi sgom rim rnam par
192b5(1): dgod// dbang thob dam tshig 'du 'dzi spongs// bla ma mnyes mchod dang ldan pas// dben cing nyams dga' byin che ba// bkra shis bar chad med gnas su// rnam dag sngags chus phyi khrus bya// stong nyid lhag
192b6(1): mos nang khrus bya// bde ba'i stan la skyil krung 'dug/ phyi nang snod bcud dag par sbyangs// dang po'i sangs rgyas rnam par bsgom// thugs khar zla stengs hUM bsam la// khro bo dpag med spros byas la// gdug
193a1(1): pa can rnams tshar bcad de// 'dus pa zhe sdang rdo rjer bsam// thugs khar rdo rje rtse gsum rdengs// nyi ma la gnas hUM gis mtshan// des ni bdag nyid srung ba'o// de nas lta byed g.yas g.yon
193a2(1): la// ma dang a las nyi zlar gyur// nub byang mtshams nas bskor bltas pas// nyi mas kun bsregs zla bas so// oM badz+ra yak+Sha hUM phaT brjod/ lus sems ngag gi las bya'o// phyogs mtshams rdo rje ra ba
193a3(1): dang // dra bar brlabs cing mtshams bcad do// de ltar bgegs rnams tshar bcad de// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya// dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs kha yi// zla stengs a las 'od 'phros te// sangs

193b6(1): las// ral gri d+his mtshan yongs su gyur// de las gser mdog gzhon nu'i tshul// rin chen brgyan mdzes ldem bag can// gsal 'tsher rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs// rigs lnga'i dbu brgyan zur phud
194a1(1): lnga// g.yas g.yon ral gri po ti bsnams// ye shes sku ste gzha' ltar gsal// gzhi yi sangs rgyas ting 'dzin gyis// mdun mthing g.yas ser rgyab dmar po// g.yon ldang dbus steng dkar po'i
194a2(1): zhal// g.yas bzhi ral gri 'debs pa'i tshul// g.yon bzhi shes rab po ti bzhi// sna tshogs brgyan mdzes dbu rgyan lnga// dang po'i sangs rgyas ting 'dzin bsgom// thugs khar a yongs gyur pa las// shes rab
194a3(1): 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi// rtsibs drug lte bar yi ge a// rtsibs la ye shes sngags drug gnas// dmar po dkar ljang ser dkar drug/ brti tig Sha Na nas brtsams te// a ra pa tsa'i bar du dgod// sngags dang

194b2(1): 'khor lo gsung yin no// a dang yig 'bru drug la thim// 'od du zhu bas sku ru gyur// de bzhin lte ba'i a la thim// yongs gyur ye shes phyag rgyar gsal// sngags drug rkang thon brjod pa las// dbus su

195a1(1): kyi rigs kyi sangs rgyas bsgom// oM las ngag gi dbang phyug ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// phyag na ut+pal sngo dmar la// ral gri rin chen 'bar ba bsnams// mnyam nyid ye shes
195a2(1): rang snang sku// rin chen rigs kyi sangs rgyas bsgom// a las a ra pa tsa ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar la gdangs// phyag na ut+pal sngo dmar la// ral gri shes rab po ti 'dzin// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye
195a3(1): shes sku// byang chub sems kyi sangs rgyas bsgom// de dag ye shes bye brag ste// byang chub sems las gzhan med do// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgya pa las// 'khor lo bskyed pa'i le'u ste
195a4(1): sum brgya bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// bsgom rim sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rang bzhin skye med snying po las// ye shes sgrib med 'od 'phros pas// chos dbyings rnam dag pho brang
195a5(1): nas// de bzhin ye shes spros med sku// snang la rang bzhin med par gsal// phyag rgya bzhi yis spyan drangs la// bdag mdun gsal bsgoms mchod pa dbul// oM shri many+dzu Ar+ya dz+nyA na sa twa ya/ oM AHhUM hri aM a/
195a6(1): zhes pa dag la mchod sngags gdags/ gtor ma dag ni rgyun du btang // sgra snyan bdud rtsi nyi shus bstod// dzaHhUM baM hos bstim par bya/ sngags rings bar du sngags drug ldeb/ thun mgor brgya stong rgyun du
195b1(1): bzlas// rgyun sngags drug po rtag tu bzlas// dus gsum dag tu mtshan yang brjod// 'khor la 'khor zhing rnam rtog gcod// ye shes 'od zer nyon mongs sbyong // de la ma yengs gsal bsgoms bzlas// byin
195b2(1): rlabs dngos grub thams cad 'byung // skye med thugs kyi yi ge las// 'od 'phros rigs drug thugs khar thim// 'dus nas ye shes sku gsal byas// nyon mongs rtog sgrib ma lus bcom// de thugs drug nas
195b3(1): ye shes 'od// snying po las ni thun 'phros pas// dang po bzhi yi sangs rgyas sku// gsal byas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams// kun khyab 'gro drug sgrib pa sbyangs// chos dbyings gting mtha' med khyab
195b4(1): pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs khar thim// mchod phul rgyud bskul dngos grub bsdus// slar 'dus rim par thim zhing bsdu// ye shes skye med thig ler thim// bdag sgrib nyon mongs kun sbyangs te// sku
195b5(1): gsum rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // ring por mi thogs myur thob 'gyur// gdul bya rnams kyi don mdzad do// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste sum brgya bcu gsum
195b6(1): pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos// rdzogs rim mtshan med bsgom pa bshad// de nas a las 'od 'phros te// sangs rgyas zhing khams kun khyab nas// ye shes bcud blangs tshur 'dus te// gzhi yi
196a1(1): sangs rgyas la sogs rnams// rim pas ye shes 'od du zhu// a nyid thig le phra mor gsal// thig le stong nyid byang chub sems// bde ba chen po thams cad 'dus// chos sku rang rig dag par
196a2(1): gsal// yul la mi rtog g.yo ba med// gsal la rtog med 'dzin dang bral// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// sna tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams kun// chu zla bzhin du rang bzhin med// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
196a3(1): nyid// nam mkha' bzhin du spros dang bral// ma nor spros med rtag yul med// med nyid sna tshogs rang snang bas// de las gzhan pa'i chos med do// de lta bu yi rang bzhin la// shes pa bying rgod med pa
196a4(1): yis// ma yengs rtag tu gnas par bya// sems nyid rang bzhin yin zhes na// chos nyid dang gnas shes bya// de ltar yun rings gnas pa dang // du ba smig sgyu gzugs brnyan dang // srin bu me khyer mar me
196a5(1): 'bar// mtshan ma rnam drug 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar mthong ba'i yon tan ni// thun mong dngos grub kun 'byung ste// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// dbang bskur byin gyis rlob par byed// chos
196a6(1): skyong mgon po srung ma rnams// bsrung skyobs la sogs las kun byed// mkha' 'gro rnams dang ma mo rnams// dge ste dngos grub byin rlabs ster// 'jig rten dregs pa sde brgyad rnams// gang bcol las
196b1(1): rnams thogs med sgrub// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// lha dang khro bo thams cad kun// de yi dgos pa sgrub par byed// tshe ring nad med longs spyod 'phel// ci bsam thams cad nges par
196b2(1): 'grub// phyi mar 'bras bu rab 'bring mtha'// rab kyis chos sku thob par 'gyur// 'bring gis ye shes sgyu ma'i lus// snang la rang bzhin med par thob// mtha' mas lha mi khyad par can// bde gshegs 'byung
196b3(1): dang nges par 'phrad// de tshe 'phes nas mngon sangs rgyas// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste sum brgya bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// bsrung
196b4(1): bzlog yang dag lam 'di bshad// sngon du bya ba'i rim pa rnams// rdzogs nas rang bzhin stong pa nyid// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid las// b+h+rUM ni yongs su gyur pa las// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu dmar ser
196b5(1): bsgom// de yi lte bar b+h+rUM las ni// gzhal yas khang ni gsal bar bsgom// de dbus rang rang snying po las// dang po sangs rgyas 'khor lo dang // ye shes sems dpa' rab tu bsgom// thugs khar nyi gdan hUM
196b6(1): mthing bsam// rtsibs bcu nyi ma pad+ma'i gdan// steng du hUM las hUM bcu 'phros// de las rang rang skur bskyed pa// shar du gshin rje thar byed mthing // lho ru shes rab mthar byed dkar// nub tu pad+ma mthar byed
197a1(1): dmar// byang du bgegs ni mthar byed sngo// lho shar 'dod pa'i rgyal po mthing // lho nub dbyug pa sngon po sngo// nub byang stobs chen sngo nag la// byang shar mi g.yo sngo ldang ba// steng du gtsug
197a2(1): tor 'khor lo ser// 'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po nag/ tho ba lcags kyu dbyug pa dang // dbyug sngon pad+ma kha T+wAM ga rdo rje kha gdangs ral gri dang // rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas na bsnams// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub
197a3(1): zhags pa can// sgeg dang khros pa rgyan gyis brgyan// hUM las 'od zer rab 'phros te// 'od las rigs kyi khro bor 'thon// rang la gang gnod thams cad kun// rang dbang med par dgug byas te// rang gi cha
197a4(1): lugs mtshan mar bcas// 'khor lo'i rtse la rab tu dgod// yang na bdud bzhi de bzhin las// 'khor lo drag tu 'khor ba yis// 'od zer me lce'i mtshon cha ni// sna tshogs tsha tshwa ltar 'phros pas// dmigs
197a5(1): pa thal ba rdul du rlags// thed shul tsam yang med par gyur// de ltar rab tu gsal bar bsgom// gzhan yang srung ba'i rim pa ni// gang la bsrung bar bya ba de// gzhal yas khang ni nang du bsam// 'khor lo
197a6(1): drag tu bskor gyur pas// 'od zer khro tshogs gtams shing 'khrigs// nad dang bgegs dang rbod gtong sogs// gnod par byed pa gang yin rnams// bcad cing gtubs te thal bar rlags// ming
197b1(1): rus thugs kyi snying por sba// de ltar gsal bar bsgom byas na// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rjer 'gyur// rbod gtong drag po phyir zlog cig mngon spyod 'phrin las 'grub par 'gyur// 'jam dpal khri drug stong
197b2(1): pa'i rgyud las// khro bo bcu'i bsrung bzlog gi 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum brgya bco lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rang bzhin stong pa'i ngang nyid las// b+h+rUM las 'khor lo rtsibs chen bcu// mtshon
197b3(1): cha sngon po 'bar bar bsgom// lte bar gzhal yas khang sogs bsgom// de nas dang po'i sangs rgyas dang // 'khor lo ye shes sems dpa' bsgom// thugs kha'i hUM ni mthing nag pa// rtsibs bcu'i gdan la hUM
197b4(1): bcu spro// de dag yongs gyur sku ru bskyed// shar du rdo rje 'jigs byed bskyed// lho ru gzhon nu gdong drug pa'o// nub tu stobs ldan spyan drug pa'o// byang du rdo rje mche gtsigs skyed// shar lho rdo rje rgyal po
197b5(1): bskyed// lho nub rdo rje drag po bskyed// nub byang rdo rje snying po bskyed// byang shar rdo rje 'bar ba bskyed// 'og tu rdo rje 'bebs pa bskyed// steng du gshin rje gshed chen po// rang rang rgyan dang chu lugs
197b6(1): dang // phyag rgya can de dpa' sgeg khro// gtum rngam dus mtha'o me ltar 'bar// de ltar rab tu gsal bsgoms nas// hUM las 'od 'phros khro bo'i tshogs// sprul pa dpag med rab spros te// bsgrub byar rang
198a1(1): dbang med par dgug/ mtshon cha drag po'i 'khor lo de// shin tu myur zhing drag 'khor bas// gang gi dang rig sngags sogs// gcad cing gtubs te thal bar rlag/ des ni gang yang nges par
198a2(1): sgrol// de bzhin gnod byed gang yin la// bskor bas bdag 'khor la sogs kun// cis kyang mi shig rdo rjer 'gyur// rdo rje khros pa'i 'khor lor bshad// 'jam dpal gshin rje kyi gsang ba khri drug stong pa'i
198a3(1): rgyud las// rdo rje khros pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum brgya bcu drug pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// yang dag de bzhin nyid las ni// b+h+rUM ni ljang nag yongs gyur pas// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rtsibs
198a4(1): bcu bsgom// lte bar gzhal yas khang dbus su// sangs rgyas 'khor lo ye shes sems// rang rang rnam pa gsal bar bsgom// hUM las rtsibs bcu'i gdan stengs su// hUM bcu spros la skur bskyed pa// shar du
198a5(1): kong rtse brag gyon rje// shar lhor a ba glang mgo rje// lho ru ya ba yang rting rje// lho nub khro bo gcod sbyong rje// nub tu khro bo dmigs pa rje// nub byang khro bo te ba rje// byang rdo rje bdud 'joms rje// byang shar chos
198a6(1): kyi rgyal po rje// 'og tu khro bo thod dbyug rje// steng du khro bo nag 'joms rje// kun kyang rgyan dang cha lugs dang // dpa' sgeg khro gtum rngam zhing 'jigs// phyag rgya sna tshogs gar dang ldan// dus mtha' bskal
198b1(1): pa'i me ltar 'bar// sprul pa dpag med 'gyed par bsgom// thugs kyi ye shes khros pa las// ye shes 'od zer sna tshogs spros// dmigs pa gang yin sngon bkug ste// 'khor lo shin tu drag 'khor
198b2(1): bas// bsgrub bya ma lus gcod cing 'thub// me lce mtshon cha sna tshogs dang // thog zer tsha tsha ltar 'phros pas// rdul phran tsam du brlag par 'gyur// phyir zlog ces byar gyur pa yin// gzhan yang dmigs pa
198b3(1): gang yin rnams// de bzhin 'khor lo rab tu bskor// bdag dang 'khor yul dbus nyid de// nyen rnams cis kyang tshugs mi 'gyur// 'jam dpal gshed po'i 'khor lor bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong
198b4(1): pa'i rgyud las// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum brgya bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa las// smug nag b+h+rUM ni yongs gyur las// 'khor lo rtsibs
198b5(1): bcu sna tshogs mdog/ gzhal yas khang ni gdan bcas su// dang po'i sangs rgyas 'khor lo sems// gsal bar bsgoms pa'i snying po las// rtsibs bcu'i gdan la snying po dgod// shar du hUM ni sngon po
198b6(1): bgod// lho ru a ni ser po dgod// nub tu hri ni dmar po dgod// byang du a ni ljang khu dgod// steng 'og a dkar re re dgod// shar lhor k+She ni dkar po dgod// lho nub ma ni ser po dgod// nub byang me
199a1(1): ni dmar po dgod// byang shar ta ni ljang khu dgod// de dag yongs su gyur pa las// hUM las rdo rje ral gri bsgom// oM las ngag gi dbang phyug bsgom// tri las rdo rje rnon po bsgom// a las ye
199a2(1): shes sku gcig bsgom// a las byang sems rdo rje bsgom// a las shes rab ye shes bsgom// k+She las gti mug rdo rje bsgom// ma las ser sna rdo rje bsgom// me las 'dod chags rdo rje bsgom// ta las phrag
199a3(1): dog rdo rje bsgom// rang rang cha lugs rgyan rnams dang // dpa' sgeg byams khro gtum rngam bskyed// 'od zer 'gyed 'phro me dpung 'bar// sprul pa dpag med 'phro 'du byed// thugs kyi snying po las 'od
199a4(1): 'phro// bsgrub bya mngon du dgug pa ste// 'khor lo drag cing myur 'khor bas// dmigs pa gcod 'thub thal bar rlog de bzhin nyid rnams ma lus kun// rdul phran tsam du rlag par byed// gang yang myur du
199a5(1): 'joms par nges// ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor lor bshad// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i bshad rgyud khri drug stong pa las/ ye shes sems dpa' 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum brgya bco brgyad
199a6(1): pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// gsang ba'i man ngag 'di bshad do// 'khor lo gsang sngags thams cad la// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// phyi ni gzugs brnyan 'khor lo dang // nang ni ting
199b1(1): 'dzin 'khor lo dang // gsang ba ye shes 'khor lo'o// dang po gsang sngags rnam pa de// rgya shog la sogs legs bris te// rten 'brel rdzas dang nus mthu ldan// dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs byas
199b2(1): te// gsang srung rten la rab sbyar na// yul gyi sbyor ba ma lus kun// 'joms shing sgrol bar rab tu bshad// gnyis pa de bzhin bsgom byas la// mchod pa la sogs mngon byas nas// don rnams sngon du
199b3(1): 'grub par 'gyur// gsum pa gsang sngags yig 'bru las// ye shes mtshan mas nyon mongs gcod// de ni yid kyi sbyor ba 'joms// thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings nyid
199b4(1): las// ye shes rol pa'i phyag rgyar snang // spyan drangs gnyis su med par bsgom// dri dang gzugs rdo rje la sogs pas// mchod pa'i rnam pas rab tu mnyes// gtor ma la sogs de bzhin du// bshags dang
199b5(1): bstod dang dngos grub blang // de nas 'khor lo rnam gsum bskor// gdul bya sgrol ba'i 'khor lo'o// bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i 'khor lo dang // nyon mongs gcod pa'i 'khor lo'o// ngos zin dgra dang
199b6(1): bgegs la sogs// dngos dang lha srungs rig sngags dang // nyen dang mi mthun phyogs rnams kun// gang yin de nyid bcad par bya// ngos ma zin na bdud bzhi'i gzugs// phung po nyon mongs lha yi bu// 'chi/
200a1(1): bdag bdud rnams bcad par bya// rang gi nyon mongs chags sdang gzhi// gti mug phrag dog 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang dag gi rnam pa ni// maM dang aM dang raM dang traM// de dag gsad cing bsgral
200a2(1): bar bya// phyi bskor nang bskor g.yas g.yon bskor// gsad bzlog bsrung ba'i las bya ste// 'byung ba'i rgyun kyang phyir la zlog gzhan lta kun la smos ci dgos// rang bdud rang gshed dbab ces
200a3(1): bshad// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa bcad// bla med byang chub yang dag thob// des na 'khor lo'i dam par bshad// de dag gsang sngags 'di lta ste// oM badz+ra ti ka Sha ya te na ma/ du kha tse ta/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na/ dz+nyA na
200a4(1): kA ya/ bA gI shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa na/ many+dzu shri ku ma ra ya ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha nir ma ya/ ya man+ta krid/ pra dz+nyA ta kra ti/ pad+ma ta kra ti/ bag+hi nan ta krid/ bi dza ya ni la daN+Da/ ma hA bA ba/ Ar+ya a tsa la/ tre lo kya bi dza ya/ a
200a5(1): pa ri dza ta hUM phaT/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha badz+ra rak+Sha/ badz+ra yak+Sha/ badz+ra dza la/ badz+ra kro d+hi/ badz+ra tsan d+ha/ badz+ra b+he ra/ badz+ra ki li/ badz+ra ma tha/ ya man ta ka hri sti wa kri ta a ra na hUM phaT/ a badz+ra kro d+ha s+thi hi hUM phaT/ badz+ra kro
200a6(1): d+ha di ba sti/ badz+ra kro d+ha smig sha badz+ra kro d+ha rak+Sha/ badz+ra kro d+ha te ke ni/ badz+ra kro d+ha rak+Sha/ badz+ra kro d+ha a k+Sha ra/ badz+ra kro d+ha kri ra/ badz+ra kro d+ha kun Ta mi/ ya ma me ta k+Sha/ ra tsa sa ro/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ dzi na dzig
200b1(1): rat+na d+hika a ro lig pradz+nya d+hika oM shri many+dzu a kro/ te ka ya man ta ka hUM phaT/ ha na ha na/ ma tha ma tha/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ tshon d+ha tshin d+ha/ b+hi na d+ha b+hin d+ha/ b+hin daM sa ya bi da sa ya/ bi tsuR+sha ya bi
200b2(1): tsun+da ya/ ma ra ya ma ra ya/ pra taM ki tsa ka warti/ ma ra na ku ru hUM hUM phaT/ de ltar gsang sngags brjod bya ste// mchod dang gtor ma la sogs bya// rdo rje 'chang gi mtshan rnams kyang // nyin mtshan rgyun du brjod par
200b3(1): bya// 'dud tsho nyi shus bstod par bya// gsang sngags rgyal po rtag tu brjod// ting nge 'dzin la ma yengs bsgom// dbang thob dam tshig ldan par bya// de ltar btson 'grus rab bskyed na// dngos grub tshe 'dir
200b4(1): nges par thob// thun mongs dngos grub phan gnod kyi// las rnams gang brtsams 'grub par 'gyur// bsrung bar 'os pa ma lus kun// mi thub pa ni gcig kyang med// gsad pa phyir zlog rang gshed
200b5(1): kyang // rang la nges par 'bebs byed sgrol// khyad par dngos grub mchog thob ste// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa kun// ma lus yongs su byang gyur nas// ye shes rang snang phyag rgya'i tshogs// yi ge 'khor lo
200b6(1): tshogs chen sa// tshe 'di nyid kyis nges par thob// des na lam gyi dam par bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' khri drug stong pa'i rgyud
201a1(1): las// man ngag gi le'u ste sum brgya bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu yis// rdo rje 'chang chen la gsol pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid dpal// rdo rje 'chang chen de
201a2(1): bzhin gshegs// stong gsum 'jig rten rab 'byam gyi// sems can ma rig mun 'khor bas// ye shes sprul pa'i sgron ma rnams// rnam par bkod pa'i dgongs pa mchog sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rje
201a3(1): pab// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// ji ltar lags pa rgyas bshad gsol// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal la sogs 'khor 'dus rnams// ma rig mun pa'i sems can la// ye shes
201a4(1): sgron ma rnams bkod pa'i// dgos pa yang dag nges pa'i don// rgya chen pos ni zhus pa nyon// ces gsungs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid/ dpal rdo rje
201a5(1): 'chang chen pos/ thugs ye shes kyi 'od zer phyogs bcur bkye/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa grangs med pa 'dus pa'i pha rol na/ de kho na nyid yang dag pa la mngon par
201a6(1): dgongs pa'i gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'gro ba'i don du dgongs pa mngon par bskul ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag nyid kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa de kho na nyid yang dag pa rnams ched du
201b1(1): brjod do// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdog dang ldan pa na bzhugs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang
201b2(1): chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la/ nyid kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa 'di ched du brjod do// dngos med chos nyid rnam dag las// sgrib med ye shes rang shar pas// byang
201b3(1): chub sems nyid rang gsal rgyun// skye 'gag med pa chos kyi sku// snying po thig le yang dag pa// rtog med rig pa ma 'gags gsal// rang bzhin ye nas shes pa la// ngos bzung med par kun tu khyab// rang
201b4(1): byung snying po rnam dag dang // de kho na nyid nges don no// zhes gsungs so// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stobs thams cad kyi shugs dang ldan pa na bzhugs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par
201b5(1): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kun tu rnam par langs pa zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la/ nyid kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa 'di ched du brjod do// rang byung
201b6(1): rig pa rtsol bral ba// kun gzhi snying po byang chub sems// rang gsal bde ba chen po'i ngang // ma bcos 'gyur med chos kyi dbyings// rang bzhin sdong po chen po nyid// 'dzin pa rang bral spros med dag/ gdod
202a1(1): nas lhun rdzogs ji bzhin gsal// dngos po med cing brjod dang bral// bsam bral skye med rang byung sems// de bzhin nyid las ma yengs pa'o// zhes gsungs so// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten
202a2(1): gyi khams spos thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa na bzhugs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab mar me'i rgyal po zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i
202a3(1): sems ldan la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la/ nyid kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa 'di ched du brjod do// snang ba med pa'i ye shes ni/ rgyu rkyen ma bskyed rtsol sgrub med/ sems nyid rang rig chos skur gsal// rnam
202a4(1): rtog bdag 'dzin gdod nas dag/ rig pa rang lugs de kho na// ci yang mi dmigs rtog med dang // rang gsal 'du shes 'dzin med grol// ye shes zang thal sgrib med pa// ma bcos rang bzhin gnas pa
202a5(1): ste// de nyid yang dag snying por bshad// ces gsungs so// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig rgyal mtshan na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rjes rab tu
202a6(1): 'dul ba zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i goms pas rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la/ nyid kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa 'di ched du brjod do// dngos med mu med chos kyi
202b1(1): dbyings// skye med rig pa gsal la mtha' dbus med// drag rtog rnam dag ye shes thugs// sgrib med 'od gsal byang chub sems// nam mkha' lta bur go 'byed yangs// skye 'gag med pa sang nge byung // rang
202b2(1): rig ye shes chos kyi sku// snang srid gsal la 'dzin pa med// rang byung snying po ye shes rdzogs/ zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i snying po mchog gi rgyud las/ phyogs bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi
202b3(1): dgongs pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya bdun no// // byang shar gyi 'jig rten gyi rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba na bzhugs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa'i spyan
202b4(1): rnam par dag pa zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med par shin tu sprul pa la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la/ nyid kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa 'di dag ched du brjod do// yul la mi rtog ye shes
202b5(1): ni// 'khor 'das kun la brdal cing khyab// rang rig ma bcos 'gag med gsal// rang byung ye shes de kho na// ye shes rang la gnas pa'i don// snang gsal phyi la mi rtog pa// 'gyur med rtog 'joms rdo rje
202b6(1): nyid// skye 'jig med pa'i 'dus ma byas// ched du mi dmigs rang gsal ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yin// zhes gsungs so// shar lho'i 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer rab tu snang ba na bzhugs
203a1(1): pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi mar me gsal ba zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po la sogs
203a2(1): pa'i 'khor rnams la/ nyid kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa 'di dag ched du brjod do// skye med 'gag med dngos med pa'i// yang dag ye shes 'od gsal ba// 'dzin med rig pa de nyid la// rang gzhag spros med/
203a3(1): byang chub sems// chos nyid gnas lugs rang sems te// lhan cig gnas pa'i ye shes gsal// de nyid snying po mchog la gnas// rig pa'i ye shes rtsal ma 'gag 'khor 'das kun la brdal cing
203a4(1): khyab// dngos bzung med cing spros bral ba'o// zhes gsungs so// lho nub kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar snang ba na bzhugs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgo
203a5(1): kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyings zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' me tog gi 'od 'phro bas gtsug phud rab tu ldan pa la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la/ nyid kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa 'di ched du
203a6(1): brjod do// chos rnams snying po'i ngo bo nyid// de don chos sku 'gyur ba med// rang gsal ma bcos 'dzin med pa// don gyi tshad ma ma 'khrul bar// snang med rig pa kun tu shar// 'gag pa med pas cir yang
203b1(1): snang // sems nyid phyogs med kun tu grol// rang sems sgrib med ye shes ni// phyogs med phyogs kyi dngos gzhis gnas// ched du ma bsams lhun gyis grub// ces gsungs so// nub byang gi 'jig rten gyi
203b2(1): khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i snying po na bzhugs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od ces bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' lus
203b3(1): kyi 'od zer thogs pa med pa gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la/ nyid kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa 'di ched du brjod do// rang sems snying po byang chub sems// chos rnams kun gyi gzhi nyid
203b4(1): de// ma bcos dbyings nas ye shes gsal// mngon par 'dus ma byas pa nyid// rang sems 'dzin med snying po'i mchog/ brjod med rtog med g.yo ba med// sems nyid rig pa'i ye shes rgyun// rang bzhin
203b5(1): lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang // rnam par dag pas mun med gsal// de nyid sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// ces gsungs so// 'og phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng ge 'bar zhing snang ba na bzhugs
203b6(1): pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su snang ba zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos dbyings 'od 'phro snang ba'i blo gros la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams
204a1(1): la/ nyid kyi dgongs pa yang pa 'di ched du brjod do// rang snang ma bcos chos kyi dbyings// sgrib med ye shes ngang gis gsal// rang rig ye shes byang chub sems// skye med 'gag med cir yang
204a2(1): snang // gar yang rtog med zab cing 'phra// thig le snying po 'od gsal ba// rig pa rgyun gsal rang grol ba// rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med// mtha' dbus spros med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi
204a3(1): gzigs so// zhes gsungs so// steng phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtshon gyi 'od rnam par snang ba na bzhugs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan 'gags pa thogs pa
204a4(1): med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa'i blo gros la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la/ nyid kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa 'di khong du
204a5(1): brjod do// 'khor 'das mtshan ma cir snang yang // dgag bsgrub med pa'i don rtogs na// rang bzhin dag pa'i dbyings su gsal// cir yang snang la ngos bzung med// med nyid sna tshogs rang snang ba// rang
204a6(1): byung ye shes dngos med khyab// yul la ma zhen rtog med gsal// ma bcos sgrib med mtha' dang bral// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs snying po nyid// zab cing rgya cher rang shar ba'o// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal
204b1(1): khri drug stong pa'i snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ phyogs bcu sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang tsan dan dri ldan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i/ bcom ldan
204b2(1): 'das 'od snang rdo rje zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' mtho btsun dpal gyi rgyal po la sogs pa la nyid kyi dgongs pa gsungs pa/ rang sems ma bcos chos kyi sku// rgyun du ma yengs rig pa gsal// rtog
204b3(1): med ye shes snying po'i thugs// de nyid ye shes rang snang ba// 'dzin med rig pa phyogs med shar// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa yi// chos nyid dbyings la mu mtha' med// thog mtha' med pa'i sems nyid
204b4(1): la// ma yengs rang gsal ngang la gnas// de yi sangs rgyas dgongs pa yi// zhes gsungs so// spos dri ngad ldan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das 'od bzangs rin chen dpal zhes
204b5(1): bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge rab snang la sogs pa la nyid kyi dgongs pa gsungs pa/ sems nyid rnam dag rang rig pa// ye shes rgyun chad med par gsal// rang bzhin dngos med chos nyid ni// ma
204b6(1): bcos mu mtha' med pa'i dbyings// skye 'gag med pa'i snying po yis// 'khor 'das kun la khyab cing 'dus// de nyid yang dag byang chub sems// shes brjod 'dzin rtog yul las 'das// ma btsal lhun
205a1(1): rdzogs bde chen po// sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i snying po yin// zhes gsungs so// pad+mo bde ldan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das 'od snang rin chen pad+ma zhes bya bas/
205a2(1): byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gtsug tor snang ba la sogs pa la nyid kyi dgongs pa gsungs pa/ brjod med ye shes gdod nas gsal// mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la// 'dus ma byas pa'i rig pa
205a3(1): gsol// gnyis med dang las dngos po med// thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// spros med rnam dag stong chen po// ma bcos byang chub snying po'i sku// gnyis med thig le byang chub chen por gsal/ stong
205a4(1): gsal gnyis med mnyam pa nyid// ma btsal don bzhag sangs rgyas thugs// zhes gsungs so// gser gyi 'od ldan 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes 'od snang zhi ba zhes bya
205a5(1): bas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mtha' yas la sogs pa la nyid kyi dgongs pa gsungs pa/ rang sems snying po 'od gsal ba// de nyid ma bcos rang rig pa// ma btsal lhun grub cir yang snang // rang
205a6(1): bzhin rnam dag ye shes nyid// yang dag dbyings la 'gyur ba med// 'dus ma byas la skye 'jig med// sgrib med gsal bas phyogs ris med// 'dzin med rig pa mnyam pa nyid// 'dus ma byas pa'i rang
205b1(1): bzhin la// skye 'gag med pa sangs rgyas thugs// zhes gsungs so// mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes mi g.yo rgyas pa zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dang
205b2(1): dri med stobs ldan la sogs pa la nyid kyi dgongs pa gsungs pa// 'khor 'das chos rnams cir snang yang // rtsa ba sems nyid cod po'i don// rang bzhin rnam dag ye shes las// snang ba mi 'gog thams cad
205b3(1): gsal// ye nas dag pa chen po la/ ched du bya byed bsgrub tu med// rgyu rkyen ma btsal bdag med pa// ma bcos ma slad rang sor gnas// ji bzhin nyid de mi 'gag pa// ma skyes ye shes 'od gsal pa// gdod
205b4(1): nas ma btsal sangs rgyas thugs// zhes gsungs so// shin tu brtan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i// bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi seng ge 'od ces bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od rgyal po la
205b5(1): sogs pa la nyid kyi dgongs pa gsungs pa/ rang rig kun khyab mtha' dbus med// dngos por ltar med tha snyad med// rtog 'das bsam med mtshon du med// thams cad mkhyen pa'i rig pa gsal// ma
205b6(1): bcos ji bzhin cir yang snang // dngos med 'gag med rang byung sems// mu mtha' med cing mnyam pa nyid// skye med ye shes rang shar ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ste// 'gro kun khyab pa'i snying po
206a1(1): yin// zhes gsungs so// me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das blo gros rnam dag zla ba zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' dri med 'od
206a2(1): dpal la sogs pa la nyid kyi dgongs pa gsungs pa/ rgyu rkyen ma byas rang 'byung ba// dngos po ma yin rtag chad med// rtog spyod bral bas sgro skur med// rgyu 'bras gcig min tha dad min// mtha' dang dbus
206a3(1): med kun la khyab// rang byung gcig la thams cad rdzogs// 'khor 'das snying po yang dag pa// dngos med skye med thog mtha' med// thams cad rang rig snying po'i dbyings// ma nor de nyid yang dag
206a4(1): pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rin chen dpal ldan ngang gis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dpal zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' dpal
206a5(1): mgon bla ma la sogs pa la nyid kyi dgongs pa gsungs pa/ skye med rig pa phyogs med gsal// 'gag med rig pa cir yang snang // ma btsal lhun grub de bzhin nyid// 'khor 'das rgyu gcig gnyis su
206a6(1): med// ye shes rnam dag ma bcos pa// phyogs 'dzin med pas mnyam pa nyid// bde ba chen po'i mchog gi ngang // kun 'byung go 'byed gong yangs pa// kun la khyab pa'i rig pa gsal// thig le chen por rang
206b1(1): gnas so// zhes gsungs so// me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' lhun po rdzogs rtse 'dzin gzhon
206b2(1): nu la sogs pa la nyid kyi dgongs pa gsungs pa/ dngos med rnam dag ngos bzung med// rang gsal stong nyid ye shes te// gsal la rtog med ma 'gags pa// sgrib med me long ye shes nyid// bdag gzhan
206b3(1): med cing blang dor med// dbyer med mnyam nyid ye shes so// thams cad ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs// rang gsal kun rtogs ye shes rdzogs// phyogs med rtsal 'char yon tan rdzogs// mthar phyin bya grub ye
206b4(1): nas so// zhes gsungs so// rgya mtsho rlabs nang gi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje ldan snying po zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dri med dpal 'bar la sogs pa
206b5(1): la nyid kyi dgongs pa gsungs pa/ rtog bral dngos med ma bcos pa// skye 'gag med pa chos kyi sku// yon tan yid bzhin rin chen gter// ma btsal lhun grub longs spyod rdzogs// gdul bya ji ltar mos pa
206b6(1): ltar// sna tshogs 'char bas sprul pa'i sku// 'dus ma byas nyid sprul pa'i sku// rnam rtog kun 'joms rdo rje sku// de dag kun rdzogs 'khor 'das gzhi// mi 'gyur mngon par byang chub sku// zhes gsungs
207a1(1): so// rin chen sna tshogs rgyas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog 'byung gnas dbyangs ldan zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gtsug tor dbyangs kyi
207a2(1): da zer la sogs pa la nyid kyi dgongs pa gsungs pa/ 'gyur med sems nyid 'dus ma byas// rtog 'joms mi 'khrugs rdo rje sems// chos nyid rnam dag 'khor 'das thams cad du// rang snang dmigs
207a3(1): med snang mdzad do// sangs rgyas so zhes yon tan lhun rdzogs ldan// kun 'byung rin chen 'byung ldan no// sems nyid cir yang ma 'gag par// rang snang dmigs med snang mtha' yas// gdod nas sangs rgyas
207a4(1): nges pa'i don// bya btsal med rdzogs don grub grub// ces gsungs so// rtsi 'bras rang 'khrungs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes zla rgyas dbang phyug ces bya bas/ byang chub
207a5(1): sems dpa' me tog snying po snang ba la sogs pa la nyid kyi dgongs pa gsungs pa/ 'khor 'das chos rnams snying po ni// rang 'byung rig pa byang chub sems// de nyid rnam par dag pa'i dbyings// mtha' dag
207a6(1): dbus bral mnyam pa nyid// yang dag ye shes 'dus ma byas// ma nor ma bcos de kho na// rang bzhin skye med cir snang ba// yon tan btsal med lhun gyis rdzogs// thams cad gnyis med bde chen po// sangs
207b1(1): rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de la sogs te sangs rgyas sku/ bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad kyis/ rang rang dgongs pa kun gsungs so// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying
207b2(1): po spyi rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ sangs rgyas dgongs pa bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid/ dpal rdo rje 'chang
207b3(1): chen pos thugs kyi 'od zer phyogs bcur bkye ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa grangs med pa 'dus pa'i pha rol na/ 'bras bu la dgongs par gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs
207b4(1): pa rnams la/ 'gro ba'i don du dgongs pa mngon par bskur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis/ de nyid kyi dgongs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa rnams 'di ched du brjod do// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
207b5(1): khams na ma rdzogs dag pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs pa'i/ sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal po dpal snang zhes bya bas nyid kyi dgongs pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad kyi// ye nas rang
207b6(1): bzhin ma bcos pa// rang lugs ji bzhin mnyam pa nyid// de kho na yi mtshan nyid ni// cir yang ma 'gags gsal ba'i phyir// chos thams cad du rang 'char ba// sgro skur ye nas bral ba'i phyir// 'di yin
208a1(1): dngos su rtag tu med// ngo bo bstan du med pa'i phyir// 'di lta bu zhes bzung du med/ blo yi dbang du rtags pa'i phyir// rnam pa sna tshogs bzung ba'o// gang yang ma spangs pa yi phyir// cir yang
208a2(1): yin zhing snang ba la// gar yang ma nges pa yi phyir// gang yang ma yin pa zhes bya// tha snyad chos rnams rang snang phyir// 'di ltar bstan du 'dod pa la// gdod nas rang bzhin med pa'i phyir// dngos po 'di yin/
208a3(1): bstan du med// ye nas bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir// shin tu brtag par sla ba la// yul du brtag par dka' ba'o// sngar ma mthong ba'i phyir gom pa byar yod// blo yi spyod yul min phyir med// thams cad chos
208a4(1): nyid grub zin phyir// da lta rtog spyod byar med de// sngar ma mthong phyir byar yod pas// ji ltar rtags pa ltar byung phyir// chos rnams sna tshogs rang snang ba'o// ngo bo nyid ces ma grub phyir// dngos po gang yang
208a5(1): gnas pa med// mtshan nyid snang phyir ma nges la// ji bzhin gzhi nyid phyir nges pa'o// thams cad nyid las ma g.yos phyir// gdod nas ngo bo nyid du gcig rol pa phyogs med 'char ba'i phyir// du ma'i rnam
208a6(1): par snang ba yin// de dag la sogs gtan tshigs kyis// ji ltar bshad kyang rtag dka' 'o// ci'i phyir brjod pa mtha' yin te// brjod du med pas yin zhe na// brjod yod ltas na mtha' ru 'gyur// mtha'
208b1(1): dang bral ba yin zhe na// ma bral ltos pa'i mtha' ru 'gyur// des na tha snyad thams cad skyon// rang gi rig pas brtags par bya'o// ched du ma brtags rang rig gsal// 'khor 'das la sogs chos thams
208b2(1): cad// dngos por med las blo ngor yod// yod la med pa nyid du bshad// de nyid sangs rgyas dgongs pa ste// de rtogs bla med sangs rgyas thob// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
208b3(1): las// sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal po dpa' snang gi dgongs pa mngon bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya bcu pa'o// // de nas lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen rgyal po'i 'od ldan ces bya ba na bzhugs pa'i//
208b4(1): sangs rgyas yon tan dpal gyi 'od zer zhes bya ba las nyid kyi dgongs pa 'di ched du brjod do// kun la khyab kyang snang ba med// gar yang ma sbas mthong ba med// ye nas ma bral ngo ma shes// brtags na ma
208b5(1): mthong cir yang snang / sna tshogs snang yang dngos po med// dngos po bskal par gnas kyang rgyun chad med// stong pa nyid las sna tshogs 'byung // sna tshogs rang snang dngos po med// dngos gzhi med par cir
208b6(1): yang snang // kun bral nyag gcig ji ma spangs// sna tshogs sgo yang 'gyur ba med// dngos med cir yang ma 'gags snang // phyogs med phyogs kyi dngos gzhir gnas// gzugs med ji ltar bltas par
209a1(1): snang // ji ltar snang yang 'gyur ba med// gcig las ma g.yos tha dad snang // mtha' yas byung yang mu mtha' med// mtha' dbus med pa kun la khyab// rang byung nyid pas rgyu rkyen bral// rnam par
209a2(1): dag pas dri ma med// ma btsal rdzogs pa lhun gyis grub// nyid las gzhan med gnyis su med// rtag chad med pa mtha' dang bral// bcos slad med phyir ji bzhin nyid// ma byas ma rtags bdag med pa// mi
209a3(1): 'gyur mi sgyu ma nir nges// rgyu 'bras med cing bdag gzhan med// rgyu rkyen med pas skye ba med// cir yang snang bas 'gag pa med// skye 'gag med par 'dus ma byas// sgrib med rang gsal phyogs ris
209a4(1): med// dus gsum 'gyur med thog ma med// bdag gzhan med pas mnyam pa nyid// mi 'gyur nges pas ma nor ba'o// mtha' dang dbus med sgro skur med// sna tshogs rang snang ngos ma 'grub// 'dus ma byas
209a5(1): shing dbyer mi byed// rang byung rig pa rang gsal ba// dpag med bsam med bsam mi khyab// don gyi snying po ma bcos pa// gsal la mi rtog ngos bzung med// ma bcos mi g.yo phyogs cha med// thig le chen
209a6(1): po bya btsal bral// 'dzin med rang gsal dngos med dag mi g.yo mi dmigs gnas pa med// gnyis med rang byung rang snang ba// mnyam nyid 'od gsal gzhi nyid gnas// cir yang ma g.yos pa la gzhag de
209b1(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs par bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying po'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas yon tan dpal gyi dgongs pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya bcu
209b2(1): gcig go/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma 'od can bde ldan tshal na bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas dri med me tog ye shes dpal zhes bya bas nyid kyi dgongs pa 'di ched du brjod do// gnas lugs don
209b3(1): gyi gzhi nyid ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// kun 'byung kun khyab kun 'dus pas// snying po yang dag dngos med yin// rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa// ye nas gnas pa'i rang 'byung yin// dngos por
