240a5(1): yis// mchod pa gtor ma tshogs 'khor bya// ri rgod byin can lhun po dang // rin chen yod dang zhabs kyis bcags// drag po dur khrod sa rnams la// rmu bdud can chus 'jim pa bya// khru gang mchod rten byang
240a6(1): chub cher// dur khrod tshon rtsis kha dog bsgyur// khri 'phang bzhi po dkar dmar sngo// ser po bad la gdan khri dmar// dbu ni nag po bum rten zer/ khong stong gdan 'og gru gsum du// gang dmigs rgyud rten
240b1(1): ling ga brnag/ ming rus srog snying spyi snying lte// byad du bcug la mon zod brnag/ dur khrod ras la tsha ba gsum// tsha ba'i rgyal po sme ba lnga// byugs la dug chus 'khor lo bri// lte ba rtsibs la hUM nyid dang // cha
240b2(1): byad spu gri drag sngags dgod// rtsibs grangs spu gri'i sngags 'bras sbyar// rtsibs mtshan ming byang rdzogs par bri// mtha' ma'i sreg byed me dpung 'bar// khro bo khro mo'i lto bar bri// g.yas bskor steng nas
240b3(1): gcod pa ni// rtsa yi 'khor lo me dang 'dra// gcod cing bsregs pas thams cad sgrol// g.yon bskor 'og nas gcod pa ni// mo yi 'khor lo chu klung 'dra// skom zhing g.yeng bas srog sdud 'joms// mon nam
240b4(1): gri thod dmar mchod du// nyungs kar nyungs nag skye tse dang // gri khrag rims khrag bsnol khrag dang // ra dug spyang dug dug rgod dang // rdo phye lcags phye zangs phye dang // thal chen la sogs skam thun bca'// de
240b5(1): nas rnam dag chos nyid kyi// ngang las bruM ljang yongs gyur pas// mchod rten dur khrod gzhal yas khang // bum par dpal chen he ru ka/ bang rim dang por hUM las kyang // gshin rje gshed sogs khro bo bcu// khri
240b6(1): 'phang gnyis par sprul pa yi// khro bo rnams ni gsal bar bskyed// khri 'phang gsum pa la sogs su// rang gi lha srungs rnams kyang bskyed// gdan 'og dgra bgegs gang yin bsam// b+h+rUM las drag po'i 'khor
241a1(1): lo ni// lte ba rtsibs dang ldan par bsgom// lte ba gtso bo rtsibs la 'khor// hUM las rang rang snying pos bskyed// rtsibs grangs lha yi grangs dang sbyar// dbang bskur byin brlabs ye shes
241a2(1): bstim// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul// bstod cing bskul te 'phrin las bcol// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang // drag sngags sgra gcad bzlas par bya// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo drag po dang // myur
241a3(1): du sgra dang bcas par 'khor// gang dmigs mchod par gcad cing gtub// drag sngags brgya'am stong stong na// thun brdeg khro chung mtshon cha thogs// bsam yas me lce thog gzer gyis// dmigs pa lus srog/
241a4(1): rdul phran brlag/ de ltar gsal bas drag tu bzlas// thon nas 'khor lo ling ga bcas// bzlog na rgyun srang 'gram la gnan// bsrung gzir bka' rten mgon pos gnan// gsad na gdug pa'i gnyen la
241a5(1): gtad// nya stong kha gso drag tu bya// 'di lta bu yi drag sngags kyis// mthu stobs bdag po nyid kyang 'joms// gzhan bdag kun la smos ci dgos// mchod rten 'khor lo ting 'dzin thun// drag sngags spyi rgyug
241a6(1): sbyor ba yin// a a a/ oM badz+ra shri he ru ka ma hA kro d+ha tsan d+ha hUM/ a ne a ne a ne/ dz+nyA na ma ha kro d+ha rA dza sa man ta naM/ ka ya badz+ra kro d+ha shri many+dzu a kro te ka ya man ya gnan ta bA ga badz+ra kri taM ya/ kA la ru pa ni
241b1(1): sha ku ru/ tsit+ta badz+ra tsiN+Da/ hriSh+Ta biHkri ta/ u ne u ne u ne/ ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya dza ni/ e yaM raM paM laM/ u u u/ badz+ra yak+Sha rak+Sha kro d+ha ma hA pa la stim pa ya ka pa ye/ a A/ i I/ u ma?/
241b2(1): e e/ o o/ aM aHsing nga ye/ bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ u ne u ne u ne/ tsit+ta ye/ b+hi ta ye/ ha la ye/ u u u/ da lo ye/ ma la ye/ ki po ye/ ni shi ku ru/ a kar Sha yA/ trig nan/ staM b+ha ya/ baM baM laM nan nan/
241b3(1): myags thugs ri la mA ra ya nri dza rbad nan/ chos sku so ba klad gnon khro bo'i rgyal// dbyangs yig ye shes khro bo sku gsung thugs// gshin rje gshed po skyes bu 'khub med dbyangs// rgyab ri dmag bcas 'byung ba
241b4(1): lnga yi stobs// rdo rje khro bos brdung rtag dbyangs kyis stobs// yang snying dbyangs ldan rno dpal yi ge dgu/ brnag pa srog 'phrog zir gnon sbyor spyod// me lce 'bar ba reg chod sdebs chen yin// chos kyi sku
241b5(1): las rang byung khro bo'i rgyal// ye shes rol pa'i 'od zer nyi ltar 'phros// gdul bya kun sgrol byang chub lam la dgod// rtsa ba'i snying po ye shes lhun grub gces// des ni gang brtsams las rnams thogs med
241b6(1): 'grub// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ reg chod me lce 'bar ba'i sdebs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu gnyis so// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la/ ya ma ra dzas yang gsol pa/ khro
242a1(1): rgyal gshin rje gshed po yis// bsnyen dang bsgrub dang drag po yi// ting 'dzin rim pa bshad du gsol// zhes gsol rdo rjes yang bshad pa// zhus don ngas bshad legs par nyon// 'jam
242a2(1): dpal gshin rje gshed po yis// 'dzab dgongs bstan pa'i snying po ni// gang na gnas pa'i sa de na// dam can yongs kyi srog kyang gnas// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// chos nyid dbyings ni skye med las// ye
242a3(1): shes lhun grub rol pa ste// skye ba'i cho 'phrul du mar bstan// snying po byang chub sems nyid ni// ye nas kun la snyoms khyab gnas// 'khor 'das kun gyi gzhi ma ste// ma lus srog gi rtsa ba yin// de phyir dus
242a4(1): gsum sangs rgyas rnams// kun gyi thugs kyang de ru gcig khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi// lus ngag yid gsum de ru gcig/ byang chub sems dpa' mkha' 'gro rnams// byin rlabs snying po de ru
242a5(1): gcig/ lha srin sde brgyad dregs pa can// srog gi snying po de ru gcig/ des na snying po byang chub sems// bstan pa'i snying po zhes bya'o// kun gzhi byang chub snying po sems// yid ni rang rig ye shes
242a6(1): gsal// kun gzhi dbyings te yid ye shes// kun gzhi shes rab yid ni thabs// kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo la// yid ni kun tu bzang po yin// kun gzhi chos kyi dbyings nyid de// yid ni chos kyi sku nyid
242b1(1): de// yid ni 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// kun gzhi sbyor yum pe ta li// yid ni dpal chen he ru ka/ kun gzhi kro d+hi shwa ri yum// yid ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste// kun gzhi nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma// des
242b2(1): las dbyings dang ye shes dang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// byin gyis brlabs las rang byung ba'i// ye shes rol pa'i 'od zer spros// 'gro ba kun khyab don mdzad pa'i// gnad gsum dgongs
242b3(1): pa'i don gsum dang // dgongs pa'i rtsal gsum man ngag gsum// gnad gsum snang srid thams cad kun// sku gsung thugs te ci phyir na// gzugs khams sku ste 'dod khams gsung // gzugs med khams
242b4(1): ni thugs su 'dus// man ngag rnam pa gsum zhes bya// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa sbyong // dgongs pa'i don gsum zhes bya ba// chos sku longs sku sbrul sku yis// gti mug zhe
242b5(1): sdang 'dod chags gsum// skyong zhing rnam dag rtsa nas gcod dgongs pa rtsal gsum zhes bya ba// bsnyen pa dang ni bsgrub chen dang // drag po las kyi dgongs pa'o// dang po bsnyen pa'i dgongs pa ni// bdag
242b6(1): nyid chos sku'i ngang nyid las// ya man ta kar gnas pa yis// mgur gyi bum pa zhabs kyi long bu'i bar// khro chung ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis
243a1(1): rngam// g.yas pa be con g.yon pa sdigs mdzub bsgreng // me dpung 'bar ba'i glong nas mchongs la khad// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro// bye'u khrag chags bzhin du gtams shing 'khrig
243a2(1): par bsgom// khro rgyal bdag nyid tsit+ta'i gzhal yas khang // rin chen gur phub 'dra ba'i nang nyid du// rang rig ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i rtags// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang gsal bar bsgom// de
243a3(1): yi thugs khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa// ye shes lnga rdzogs nyi ma'i gdan stengs su// snying po mthing nag hUM yig gsal bar bsgom// de mthar bzlas pa'i snying po sngags kyis bskor// rang rig ye shes gnas su dag
243a4(1): pa'i rtags// chos dbyings gting mtha' med pa'i bde gshegs nas// skye 'gro gzugs kyis bsdus pa thams cad kun// khro bo mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// phyag g.yas kun na 'khor lo be con
243a5(1): dang // ral gri dbyug tho kha T+wAM ga bsnams shing // g.yon pa kun nas khro bo'i sdigs mdzub bsgreng // dur khrod chas rgyan rdzogs par kun la brgyan// me dpung 'bar ba'i glong na 'jigs par bzhugs// ye
243a6(1): shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro// til gyi gang bu bzhin du bzhugs par bsgom// bdag nyid ya man ta ka'i zhal nas sngags bzlas pas// sku gsung thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// don ni ye shes lnga
243b1(1): 'od kha dog lnga// nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin du 'dom gang nas// gshin rje gshed kyi skur gyur gang la phog pa kun// gshin rje gshed gyur de dag zhal kun nas// gsang sngags 'brug gi sgra ltar zlog par
243b2(1): gyur// bdag nyid gshin rje'i gshed kyi thugs kha nas// ye shes 'od zer bsam yas nyi ltar spros// chos kyi dbyings nyid gting mtha' med par khyab// 'od zer thams cad mchod pa'i lha mor gyur// phyogs
243b3(1): bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad thugs khar thim// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod phul thugs dam bskul// 'od zer stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten khams// mtha' yas mu med kun tu khyab pa las// sems can
243b4(1): lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// las kyi gshin rje dregs pa thams cad kyi// srog gi snying po bkrag mdangs rdzu 'phrul mthu// las dang nus pa thams cad dbang du bsdus// sde brgyad lha srin ma mo mkha'
243b5(1): 'gro la// thang cig 'dug dbang med pa'i bka' nyan cing // gang bcol las rnams thogs med byed par bsam// 'od zer de dag bdag la tshur 'dus thim// bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa
243b6(1): spasbyangs// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bdag la 'dus te thim// sgo gsum sgrib sbyangs dbang bskur byin brlabs bsam// las kyi gshin rje ma mo mkha'
244a1(1): 'gro kun// bdag gi dbang du gyur nas las byed bsam// de ltar 'gal me'i 'khor lo lta bu ru// rgyun mi 'chad par gsal bar rab bsgoms te// bsnyen pa'i drod rtags mthong mthong drang bar
244a2(1): bya'o// des ni ye shes lha dang las byed la// mngon du 'grub par 'gyur zhes rdo rjes bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags mthar thug gi rgyud las// bsnyen pa'i 'dzab dgongs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya
244a3(1): bdun cu gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// bsgrub pa'i 'dzab dgongs 'di bshad do// bdag nyid chos sku rnam dag ngang las kyang // khro rgyal ya man ta ka'i sku ru gsal// dbang bskur byin
244a4(1): brlabs ye shes khro rgyal bstims// gshed bzhi phyogs skyong bcu dang ma mo dang // ging bdud sha za mon rnams gsal bar bsgom// bdag thugs ye shes lnga'i 'od zer 'phros pas// lho phyogs 'byung ba brtan
244a5(1): bzhi rngams 'og nas// las kyi gshin rje'i grong khyer thod mkhar lcags mkhar nas// las kyi gshin rje 'chi bdag dregs pa can// skye 'gro kun gyi tshe srog bdag dbang bskur// 'khor ni 'bum phrag bcas
244a6(1): pa'i snying khar thim// tshe srog dbang bsdus bdag mdun bka' nyan cing // ci bgyi gsung stong thang cig kyang // 'dug dbang med par las byed bsam// de ltar sum cu rtsa gnyis dril la gzhag/ drod thob las
244b1(1): kyi gshin rje bsgrub pa yin// bdag nyid ya man ta ka'i thugs kha nas// mthing nag ya las ye shes 'od zer 'phros// sngags bzlas nyi zer lta bu'i 'od zer dang // gang la phog pa'i skye 'gro thams cad
244b2(1): kun// las kyi gshin rje sku mdog sna tshogs pa// shin tu 'jigs shing gtum rngam khros pa'i gzugs// sha za khrag 'thung srog gcod rus pa 'cha'// phyag g.yas kun na gong gi mtshon cha dang // me yi 'khor lo
244b3(1): lcags kyu zhags pa bsnams// g.yon pa kun na rlung gi 'khor lo dang // lcags kyu zhags pa 'gug pa'i mtshon cha bsnams// dur khrod chas kyis brgyan cing rngam sgra sgrogs// kun gyi zhal nas drag po sngags kyi
244b4(1): sgra// thog dang lce 'bab bzhin du thog chen sgrogs// stong gsum 'jig rten khams kun gang bar bsam// bdag nyid ya man ta kas sngags bzlas pa// thugs kha'i sngags las ye shes 'od 'phros
244b5(1): pas// gshed po gzhi yi thugs dam rgyud kyang bskul// gshed bzhi rang dbang med par las byed do// de bzhin gshed bzhis phyogs skyong bcu rnams bskul// phyogs skyong bcu yis bdud po mthar byed
244b6(1): dang // las kyi gshin rje mon pa bdud rnams bskul// des ni ma mo mkha' 'gro ging pho ging mo dang // gnod sbyin sha za srin po pho mo bskul// skad cig 'dug dbang med par las byed do// de dag kun gyis
245a1(1): sa bdag klu gnyen bskul// rang dbang med par drag po'i las byed do// de rnams dmigs pa'i gnas su sprin ltar gtibs// dgra bo du yod skye nas zhags pas bzung // dkar nag snying nas
245a2(1): lcags kyus bzung nas drangs// rgyab nas rlung gis 'phul zhing me yis 'khor lo bsreg/ rtar mtshan rtsi sbur mi chags pa bzhin du// bkrag dang gzi mdangs nyams sreg sol ba gzhog tu song // lus po 'dar
245a3(1): zhing sgra g.yengs gnag la rid// 'on thong skad ngan 'dzer zhing mig rtsa rig rig nyams// de lta bu de las kyi gshin rjes yis// rang dbang med par bkug ste 'khrul 'khor gyi// gsang mdzod bzhi ru bcug cing
245a4(1): ling gal thims bsam// de lta bu yi las mkhan tshogs rnams kyis/ kho yi bsrung skyob byed pa'i lha bzhi po// rlung gi 'khor los phral zhing bskyod g.yeng nam mkhar bskul// me yi 'khor los bsreg cing thal
245a5(1): bar brlag de ltar gsal bas dgug bstim lha dbye ba'i// drag sngags drod rtags mthong nas bzlas// des ni sred med bu yi bla yang khugs// don po'i bla tshe srog khugs the tshom med// 'jam dpal khri drug
245a6(1): stong gsang sngags snying po'i rgyud las// las la sbyor ba'i le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// drag po las kyi 'dzab dgongs bshad// bdag nyid ya man ta kar gnas pa
245b1(1): yi// thugs kha'i rdo rje snying po yi ge ya// sngo nag gsal la 'tsher ba me lce 'bar// mtha' mar nyi ma bzhi pa'i sngags kyis bskor// me lce 'bar zhing tsha tshar 'phro bar bsam// bdag gi zhal nas gsad pa'i
245b2(1): sngags zlas pas// 'od zer 'phros pas rno myur glog ltar 'gyu// 'od zer dang ni 'gro ba thams cad kun// las kyi gshin rje sku mdog mthing nag khros// sku che yan lag rags pa mtshon cha sna
245b3(1): tshogs thogs// shin tu gtum rngam 'jigs pa dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// me dpung 'bar ba'i glong na mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gar// de las ye shes lnga yi 'od zer 'phros// 'od zer gtum rngam 'jigs pa
245b4(1): dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gar// de las ye shes lnga yi 'od zer 'phros// 'od zer mtshon cha rnon po sna tshogs 'gyur// zhal nas drag po gsang ba'i
245b5(1): ngan sngags ni// spu gri sos gcod lta bu 'brug gi sgra ltar sgrogs// de lta bu yis stong gsum 'jig rten khams// gting mtha' med dbyings thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin/ khengs par bsams te de
245b6(1): dag thams cad kyis// brnab pa'i lus la sngags kyi 'od zer dang // mtshon cha rnon po sna tshogs char du phab// me lce'i kha la sbrang bus mi chags bzhin// don po'i snying kha dkar nag mtshams de ru// drag
246a1(1): sngags 'od zer rtsa bzhi nas zhugs te// sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi po de// rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa'i nad gzhir bslang // sha rus drod dbugs 'byung bzhi dkrugs// chos nyid ye shes yon
246a2(1): tan rab rgyud kyi// dngas ma'i rtsa bzhi bcad nas srog gi me mar gsod// lus ni rdul phran tsam song shes pa dngas snyigs phye// srog dbugs phyi ru phyung ste lus srog phye mar bsam// sha khrag phung po thams cad
246a3(1): las kyi gshin rje dang // sha za srin po srin mo khrag 'thung dang // rdo rje ging pho ging mo la sogs tshogs rnams kyis// btod cing zos te ze shul med par bsam// dmas ni tshangs pa lha yi tshe yod kyang // skad
246a4(1): cig yud la 'chi 'gyur gzhan dag smos ci dgos// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa las sngags drag po'i rgyud las// gsad pa'i 'dzab dgongs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu lnga'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen
246a5(1): pos// nyi ma bzhi pa'i sbyor ba bshad// 'khrul 'khor lcags mkhar sgo med de// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'bar ba yis// brnag pa gcod cing rlag byed bsam// dbus kyi lcags mkhar ya las kyang // 'chi bdag
246a6(1): gshin rje'i sku ru bskyed// phyogs gzhi'i ya me tak+She las// srog gshed bzhi yi sku ru skyed// phyi rim lcags mkhar 'khrul mig gi/ ra dza la sogs bcu gnyis so// phyogs skyong gshin rje'i sku ru bskyed// mtha'
246b1(1): ma'i spu gri nyin bzhi po// mtshon cha sna tshogs me dpal bskyed// bar gyi snying po sku gsung thugs// ye shes 'od zer stobs chen gyis// pha rol stobs 'joms las mkhan bskul// nyi ma bzhi pa thams cad
246b2(1): kyi// skya rengs dang po shar ba la// 'chi bdag gshin rje 'khor bcas la// gtor ma byin te pho nyar dgye// rbad cing bla dgug lha dang dpral// ling ga'i rten la bstim par bya// de nas nyi ma dang po yi// nyi ma
246b3(1): rtse la shar pa la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma bca'// bdag nyid gshed chen skur gsal ba'i// thugs khar nyi gdan yi ge ya// sngo nag gsal 'tsher me 'bar bsam// de mthar drag sngags 'bru bdun
246b4(1): bskor// me lce 'bar zhing 'od zer 'phro// 'od zer 'phros pas las byed bskul// bde bshegs thugs rje'i thugs las kyang // khro rgyal ya man ta ka bskul// de yi ye shes 'od zer gyis// gshed po ya ma ra
246b5(1): dza bskul// de yis kong rtse brag 'joms dang // rdo rje bdud 'jom a ba glang mgo bskul// de yi bdud po brang dkar rngam pa dang // nag po bkrag med ma ha srog bdag bskul// de yis gshin rje mthar byed
246b6(1): log 'dren mthar byar bskul// de yis rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro dang // ma mo dkar mo'i tshogs dang ging pho ging mo bskul// de yi klu gnyen sa bdag gdug pa bskul// de yi brnag pa gang yin klad pa'i
247a1(1): rgyas// gti mug rmongs pa'i gnas nas byol song rgyal po ste// 'thoms pa'i gshed bskul tshangs pa'i gtsug rtsa gcad// sha rus sa yi khams las bad kan blang // klad pa dar nyams mgo 'khor
247a2(1): las byed do// be con phyag rgya brnag pa'i spyi bor brdeg/ dgongs ka'i nyi ma dmar thag chad pa la// gshed po ya ma rA dza la sogs lnga rnams la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma dgra bor dmigs te dbul// drag
247a3(1): tu bskul zhing gtor ma dgra phyogs btang // de bzhin nyi ma kun la shes par bya// khro rgyal gshed pos myos byed 'bar ba bskul// de yis ya ba ya ti phya sangs bskul// de yis nag po 'dzub med mi dur sa
247a4(1): 'dar bskul// de yis byol song thar byed yi dwags thar byed bskul// de yi shugs kyis mkha' 'gro mon mo'i tshogs// ging pho ging mo klu gnyan sa bdag bskul// de yis brnag pa gang yin lte ba yi// 'dod
247a5(1): chags zhen pa'i gnas nas dmyal ba'i dbang po ste// gsol byed sdud bskul srid pa'i rten rtsa bcad// dbugs ni rlung gi khams las rlung nad bslang // lus rgyal myos blangs yid 'khrug las byed do// ral
247a6(1): gri phyag rgya brnag pa'i lte bar brdeg dgongs ka nyi ma dmar thag chad pa la// myos byed 'bar ba la sogs gtor ma dgrar dmigs dbul// de bzhin nyi ma gsum pa dag la yang // khro rgyal gshed pos Ar+ya
247b1(1): dmar po bskul// de yis gshin rje dmigs pa mig dmar bskul// de yis sra 'dar 'khrigs pa tho yo 'joms pa rje// bdud pho thod bdag thod pa rje rnams bskul// de yis srin po mthar byed klu dbang
247b2(1): mthar byed bskul// de yis chags pa'i mkha' 'gro ma mo dmar nag tshogs// ging pho ging mo klu gnyen sa bdag bskul// de yis brnag pa gang yin mgrin pa yis// nga rgyal dregs pa'i gnas nas lha min
247b3(1): dbang po ste// srog gi gshed bskul ngag gi rgyun rtsa gcad// khrag gi chu yi khams las khrag nad bslang // lus zungs khrag skyug khong khrag 'dzag pa'i las byed do// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya brnag pa'i mgrin par
247b4(1): brdeg nyi ma dmar thag chad na Ar+ya dmar po dang // ging bdud ma mo rnams la gtor ma dgrar dmigs dbul// de bzhin nyi ma bzhi pa'i las la yang // khro rgyal gshed pos ras pa tshar dgu bskul// de yis
247b5(1): chos kyi rgyal po lha mchog rtel pa bskul// de yis ral pa spyi bcings rngam pa klu 'dul rje// sa to nag po mtshal bdud dregs pa bskul// de yis gnod sbyin mthar byed dmyal ba mthar byed dang // dam sri
247b6(1): mthar byed dbang med las la bskul// de yi las kyi mkha' 'gro ma mo sngon mo'i tshogs// ging pho ging mo klu gnyen sa bdag bskul// de yi brnag pa gang yin snying kha yi// zhe sdang gtum pa'o gnas nas mi rgod
248a1(1): shan pa ste// srog gcod gshod bskul dngas ma'i rtsa bzhi dang // srog pa rtsa bcad dbugs de phyi ru phyung // drod ni me yi khams las mkhris nad langs// spu gri'i phyag rgya bcas te snying khar
248a2(1): brdeg/ srog gi me gsad srog gcad sha khrag rnams// las kyi gshin rje sha za srin po'i tshogs// ma mo khrag 'thung ging pho ging mo dang // srin mo la sogs tshogs kyis bstod cing sha khrag zos// rjes shul tsam
248a3(1): yang med cing brlag par bsam// srog gi me mar gsad nas shes pa drangs snyigs phye// drangs ma 'bring gis phyag rgya gcig par bskyed// rab kyis skye ba chos kyi dbyings su bskul// mtha' ma bdag nyid lus
248a4(1): kyi go char bya// srog gi snyigs ma thod pa'i rten la bstim// sa bdag kla gnyen la sogs gdug pa can la gtad// des ni mi 'gyur nag po'i bdud kyang gsod// srog chags mi la sogs pa kun la smos ci
248a5(1): dgos// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa don gyi snying po'i rgyud las// nyi ma bzhi pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu drug go// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// 'khrul 'khor don rnams rgyas bshad do// drag po mtshon
248a6(1): cha'i 'khrul 'khor la// man ngag don dang ma ldan na// 'khor lo bskor kyang las mi 'grub// des na don rnams rgyas bshad pa// 'khor lo'i ka bzhi ma tshugs na// 'khor lo kha sbyor gnad mi tshugs// 'khor
248b1(1): lo'i gdung bzhi ma 'dres na// steng 'og sngags kyi ka ba rdib// las kyi gshin rje mun khang 'khor// las mi 'grub pa'i skyon du 'gyur// 'khor lo'i gzer bzhi ma thebs na// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo lto dral
248b2(1): nas// sngags pa'i 'khor du rkyen byung ngo // btsun phur bzhi dang ma ldan na// las kyi gshin rje gnas 'khyams nas// bsgrub pa'i las rnams don med 'gyur// ka ba bzhi yi don ni rtsa ba'i yi ge bzhi// don ni
248b3(1): yid la yi ge'i gzugs su gsal ba dang // ngo bo gshin rje gshed po bzhi ru gsal ba dang // rang bzhin mtshon cha'i rnam par gsal ba dang // nus mthu 'byung ba nang gcod gshed// nang 'thab rang gcod
248b4(1): gsal ba'o// gdung bzhi tshangs thig bzhis mtshon nas// rtsa bzhi'i sbubs nas 'byung ba'i dngas ma bzhi gnas pa// phyi nang snod bcud kun gyi gzhi rten byed// de la nyi ma bzhi po las gnyer gtad pa'o// yang
248b5(1): na spyi bo mgrin pa snying lte yi// 'khor lo'i don gsal sngags bzlas las rdzogs pa'o// 'khor lo'i gzer bzhi'i don ni 'di dag ste// bsnyen pa drod rtags thob pa byin rlabs lha yi gzer// rdzas rnams
248b6(1): tshogs pa rten 'brel sbyor ba'i gzer// bcu drug khang pa'i gzer dang 'phro bdun dgongs pa'i gzer// 'khor lo'i bcun phur bzhi ni rnal 'byor dbang rnams rdzogs// man ngag gdeng thob dgongs ldan
249a1(1): sems kyi btsun phur dang // bsnyen pa bya ba tshad sgrol phyi nang gsang rtags ldan// gshin rje ma mo las la chud pa ni// rtsol ba ting nge 'dzin gyi btsun phur dang // ye shes lha yi stobs kyis las kyi
249a2(1): gshin rje dang // ma mo dbang med las la btsud de khu zlog mi nus pas// ye shes lha yi byin rlabs bcun phur dang // de dag srog nas bskul zhing las bcol te// drag sngags bzlas na dgra bo dbang med
249a3(1): par// bla 'brel srog gcod drag po'i btsun phur ro// gsad pa drag sngags don bzhi shes bya ba// 'phen byed skyes bu lta bu ma shes na// bsgrub bya dmigs pa'i yul la mi bskyed do// skyed byed rkyen gzhu lta bu ma
249a4(1): shes na// bsgrub bya'i yul la sngags kyi gzer mi 'phro// 'phang bya mda' 'dra'i drag sngags ma shes na// dmigs pa'i srog yul rgyud la mi 'phrog go gcod byed mde'u 'dra'i drag sngags ma shes na// dmigs
249a5(1): pa'i rtsa dbugs srog gzugs mi chod do// de dag don rnams gsal bar bya ba ni// 'phen byed dbus yig ya las drang bskor 'phen pa'o// skyod byed rkyen gyi ting 'dzin 'phro 'du gsal ba'o// mda' ni las
249a6(1): sbyor drag sngags bcu drug pa'o// gcod byed spu gri'i drag sngags mtshan pa bzhis// drag po'i rtsa dbugs srig gzungs gcod pa'o// de dag rab tu gces pa'i sngags kyi sdebs brgyad do// srog gzungs gcad
249b1(1): cing lus srog 'byed lugs ni// 'grod stabs brgyad kyis gsad pa dang // bcu gnyis tshul gyis gsad pa dang // gnad dgu sdebs la gsad pa'o// 'gros stabs brgyad ni gang zhe na// 'bur nag thog
249b2(1): 'gros 'bur 'gros mgo mangs dang // 'khril pa sbrul 'gros stag mchongs drag po'i 'gros// srin bu ka ta ring 'gros bi bag rta yi 'gros// rta lam nag po'i 'gros dang rus sbal 'phye bo'i 'gros// bcu
249b3(1): gnyis tshul gyis gsad pa ni// rgyu bzhi bsdus te gsad pa dang // dug gsum ar la gtad de gsad pa dang // 'byung ba lnga po rtsad gcad gsad// phung po lnga yi stobs gzhom dang // nang grol smad lnga gtub pa
249b4(1): dang // tshogs drug sgo rnams dag pa dang // dngas ma bdun gyis rtsad gcod dang // dbugs kyi lam dgu dgag pa dang // rnam shes tshogs brgyad sgo dgag dang // lus ngag yid gsum mthu bsdu dang // shes
249b5(1): pa dwangs snyigs dbye ba dang // rten gcig me mar gsad pa'o// gnad dgu phab la gsad pa ni// gzas pa po yi rang rgyud la// bla gnas sa dgu bla rten mtshan ma dgu/ de 'jom drag sngags dgu dang skyod byed
249b6(1): ting 'dzin dgu sngags rtag thun rdzas dgu dang sngags 'jug sgo dgu dang // bag chags bsreg pa'i ye ge me 'bar dgu/ gnad dgu bsdus nas 'joms pa'i man ngag dgu/ shes pa dwangs snyigs phye la bskyod
250a1(1): pa'i tshul dgu'o// de dag 'khrul 'khor spyi ru dgos pa ste// spyi rgyug ces pa thabs kyi man ngag go/ 'khor lo bskor thabs 'bum yod dang // bcu bdun 'bum bskor ma shes na// mtshon cha med
250a2(1): pa'i dpa' bo 'dra// spyi rgyug drag sngags bcu bdun pa// 'di yi drang thabs bskor shes na// bsgrub dang dmod dang gdab pa yi// drag sngags thams cad 'di la tshang // des na gsang sngags kun gyi
250a3(1): mchog/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags mchog gi rgyud las/ 'khrul 'khor man ngag gi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu bdun pa'o// // ya ma ra dzas yang gsol pa// rdo rje 'chang chen khro rgyal
250a4(1): gtso// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sgrub pa'i// spyi yi gdam ngag bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal gdul dka' 'dul phyir khros// mche gtsigs khros tshul bsgyings pa
250a5(1): lta// 'jigs tshul rngam pa'i sku yis ni// gshin rje dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa// gshin rje gshed bsgrub man ngag 'di// ngas bshad legs par nyon las zung // 'jam dpal khro bo bsgrub 'dod
250a6(1): pa'i// sngags pa dpa' brtul ldan pa des// dang por dam tshig gzhung bzhin bsrung // dam tshig bla ma mched dang sngags// phyag rgya gsang bcu rtsa ba dang // spyad dang mi spang dang du blang // bsgrub dang shes bya sku
250b1(1): gsung thugs// thun mong ma yin yan lag dang // thun mong bdag gzhan rnam grangs dang // mdo lung rtsa ba chen po rnams// dang blangs ma nyams gzhung thub bsrung // des ni dngos grub gang 'dod
250b2(1): rnams// myur du 'byung zhing 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig ma bsrungs gzhung nyams na// bsgrub kyang mi 'grub brlag par 'gyur// des na dam tshig srog bzhin bsrungs// khyad par rdo rje slob dpon la'o// dam
250b3(1): ldan phyi nang gsang dbang nod// phyi na dur khrod rgyan gyi dbang // nang dbang rgyal thabs spyi lugs dbang // gsang dbang bam chen brtul zhugs dbang // bum pa gsang ba shes rab ni// ye shes bde chen dbang
250b4(1): bzhi nod// dbang rdzogs byin rlabs dngos grub 'byung // de ldan sngags pa dpa' bo yi// gzhung dang mthun pa'i bde gnas der// ri bo dgu 'dul ri bran 'dud// shar gyi dngas 'phrog nub zer len// rtse mo
250b5(1): gnam stog sked pa lhun// rtsa ba sham ring dur khrod gnas// rtswa shing me tog ri dgas bya// spos kyi sprin chags chu bo gangs// byin che bkra shis nyams dga' ba'i// gnas der dge spyad bsnyen bsgrub
250b6(1): bya// bsnyen dang nye bsnyen bsgrub pa dang // bsgrub pa chen po rnam pa bzhi// bsnyen pa dag la rnam gsum ste// sbyor ba goms dang sngon du 'gro'o// nye ba'i bsnyen pa dngos grub blang // sbyor goms pa yi bsnyen pa
251a1(1): ni// sa la phyag rgya bzhengs pa dang // mchod sbyin gtor ma rgya chen dang // phyag 'tshal mchod bshags la sogs kun// 'jam dpal nyid kyi gzhung bzhin bya// 'jam dpal mtshan ni yang yang
251a2(1): brjod// 'jam dpal mtshan mchog brgya rtsa brgyad// gzungs sngags rgya chen bstod la sogs// ma nyams dag par rgyun du gdon// sbyor ba goms pa'i bsnyen pa'o// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa la// dang por
251a3(1): gnas pa de nyid la// rtsa ba'i chus sbyangs maN+Dal rtsig khru gang 'dom gang rgya dang dpangs// yang na gnas kyi rgya tshad sbyar// dri dang khrag sna bdud rtsis byug/ zhing gi srad bu byin brlabs thig tshangs thig
251a4(1): zur thig cha chen chung // phyed 'gres sum cha bya rog rjes// legs btab rdul tshon byis gyis brlab// rus chen kha dog ma ru dbye// khrag sna dur khrod sol ba dang // skyer pa me tog ut+pal rams// de dag byin
251a5(1): gyis brlabs la bri// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// dbus mthing rtsibs bzhi phyogs dang bstun// de phyir 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa// sngon po rtsibs mtshan khrag mtsho spug zod skam rlon pa'i 'phreng bas
251a6(1): bskor// gru chad khrag mtsho bar khyams phyogs// sgo bzhi lnga rtsibs 'dod yon dmar// pha gu dra phyed dar bu kad// rta babs brgyad rtser 'khor lo gdugs// ri dgas zla phyed rdo rje sgo// rdo rje rgya gram lte ba
251b1(1): la// rdo rje thod skam me ris bskor// pho brang rang gzhung bzhin du'o// de la dgod pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su gri thod lcags phur dgod// g.yas g.yon mchog chen seng ldeng dgod// 'jam dpal gshed chen
251b2(1): khro rgyal dang // sbyor sgrol gsang ba'i yum gnyis su// rten 'brel dbang bskur byin gyis brlabs// de mdun shen shing tsher nag phur// thugs mchog yab yum byin gyis brlabs// rtsibs bzhir seng ldeng skyer
251b3(1): ba dang // sher shing 'jo bo'i phur pa bzhi// gshed bzhi yab yum byin gyis brlabs// rtsibs bcur shing lcags mchog phur dgod// phyogs skyong yab yum byin gyis brlabs// gru chad lha snam sgo bzhi ru// de
251b4(1): bzhin rtsang phud gdug pa'i shing // ro langs las kyi gshin rje dang // lce spyang kang ka mon pho mo// ging bdud sgo bzhi las mkhan rnams// rang rang gzhung bzhin byin gyis brlabs// de ltar dkyil 'khor rdul
251b5(1): tshon bzhengs// de nas rdzas kyi rim pa lnga// rten rdzas dam rdzas mchod rdzas dang // rgyan rdzas drag po sbyor ba'i rdzas// dung chen dmu lugs gling gsum pa// mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA lar// bdud rtsi grub sman
251b6(1): bsil chen dang // g+hi haM gur kum khrag sna tshogs// gla ba spos sna chu gtsang sbyar// tshon rtsi sbyar te steng thod la// khro rgyal nyid dang thugs mchog dang // gshed po bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu// 'og thod de bzhin
252a1(1): yum rnams bri// yab yum phyag rgya gsal rdzogs bri// mtha' mar sku gsung yon tan thugs// 'phrin las sngags kyi 'khor lo bskor// phyi ru spos sna gla rtsi dang // tshil chen dri ldan sman gyis byug
252a2(1): de ni rten rdzas zhes bya'o// smug chen sar pa ma rul skams// gong gi rdzas kyi sngags rnams bri// rtse mo bcud bdun hUM rnams dgod// smug chung la sogs snying sna tshogs// bdud rtsi grub sman khrag sna
252a3(1): tshogs// 'bru sna spos sna sman sna tshogs// sbyar lugs mthing nag dar gyis dril// ru sprod rgyas btab dal bus bzhag de dag dam rdzas zhes bya'o// 'bru sna tshogs kyi gtor ma ni// dpal bshos sha chen rnam lnga
252a4(1): sogs// sha khrag sna tshogs brgyan pa gnyis// khro rgyal dpal chen he ru ka'i// gtor ma rgyan ldan nub tu bzhag/ 'jam dpal gshin rje'i 'khor bcas kyi// gtor ma rgyan ldan lho ru bzhag/ ma mo yul rnams
252a5(1): mkha' 'gro yi// gtor ma nal bu dre'u mdze// gtor ma byang shar mtshams su bzhag spos dang me tog mar me dang // dri chab gtsang bshos phyi mchod bsham// zhing chen ma nyams gzugs kyis mchod// rkang chen
252a6(1): gling bu thod pa'i rnga// mi mgo'i dung 'bud sgra yis mchod// tshil chen gsur dang dri chen spos// khrag chen sha chen spos dris mchod// 'bru sna'i lha bshos tshil chen brgyan// sha rus sna tshogs ro yis mchod// zhing
252b1(1): chen glang chen stag lpags gos// reg bya'i mchod pa bla med bsham// phud rgor rak+ta bdud rtsi bsham// de dag mchod pa'i rdzas zhes bya// zhing chen bla re zhing chung 'phan// rgyu zhags dra ba keng rus bcal// sha
252b2(1): chen lhu rdum lho phyogs dgram// brten rdzas skyes bu bu don te// gzhan la mi bstan mthong mi rung // gzhan yang drag po sbyor ba'i rdzas// 'khor lo ling ga thun rdzas dang // sbyin sreg 'brub khung mnan pa'i
252b3(1): rdzas// thams cad ma chad rdzogs par bsham// bsgrub pa la 'jug dus tshod ni// gshin rje'i lo dang zla ba dang // zhag dang dus tshod snying bzhi'am// dgun zla gsum spyir dbyar ston gyi// rab 'bring tha chungs
252b4(1): mar ngo la'o// gza' sbyang phur pa mig dmar lag bra nye nam gru rta thogs skag de dag dus la 'jug par bya'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// sngon 'gro rdzas dang dus tshod kyi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun
252b5(1): cu brgyad do// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs bshad// dang po phyi nas gsang mtshams gcad// bdag nyid khro rgyal skur bskyed la// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir mtho brgyad
252b6(1): gzugs// gtsang ris phyogs skyong brgyad du bskyed// de nas phyogs bzhir mtho bzhi gzugs// rgyal chen bzhi ru byin gyis brlab// de la gtsang gtor mchod pa dbul// gtsang ris mgon po chos skyong
253a1(1): khyed// bde gshegs spyan sngar dam bcas bzhin// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i bar dag tu// phyi nang dam sri shor ra re// nang nas dngos grub nyams pa re// zhes brjod phyi mtshams bsrung las bca'//
253a2(1): de nas ra sogs khyi sogs la/ gang gnod dam sri'i ming gzugs bri// de la sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// bkug cing bstims la brab cing gzir// them 'og mnan la sgo byang gdags// nang mtshams mnan pa
253a3(1): zhes bya'o// de nas sngags pa chas gos ni// nag po zhing chen skrag pa bgo/ khro rgyal gshin rje gshed por bsgom// thugs las ye shes 'od zer 'phros// me lce mtshon cha khro bo yis// gsang mtshams dam du
253a4(1): bcad cing bsrung // gshegs dang byin dbab mchod pa brlab// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang // rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom// dbang chen 'byung ba rims brtseg bsgom// gzhal yas khang bskyed gdan
253a5(1): rnams gdings// rgyu nyid rtsa ba'i snying po las// cho ga gsum gyi 'phro 'du yi// bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags brjod pas// khro rgyal ya man ta ka bskyed// sgrol sbyor gsang ba'i yum gnyis bskyed// rdo rje pad+ma byin
253a6(1): brlabs te// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa'i// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las// rgyu yi snying po hUM nyid 'phros// phyogs mtshams rtsibs kyi rang gdan la// bskyed pa'i sngags kyis gshed po
253b1(1): bzhi// phyogs skyong bcu dang thugs mchog sras// yab yum rdzogs shing gsal bar bskyed// dbang bskur byin brlabs nga rgyal bskyed// lha rnams gru chad zhing tshogs rnams// pho mo las byed pho nyar
253b2(1): bcas// gong nas 'dus pa'i tshul du bskyed// sgo bzhir rgyal chen sgo ma bzhi// dbang chen dkyil 'khor gsal rdzogs bskyed// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbyings nas bzhengs// spyan drangs phyag btsal gnyis
253b3(1): med bstim// phyi mchod lnga dang kun bzang mchod// phyag rgya ye shes mchod pa 'bul// nang mchod rnam lnga bdud rtsi sman// mchod pa dbul zhing dngos grub blang // bdud rtsi rak+ta mchod 'bul bstab// gsang ba
253b4(1): sbyor sgrol mchod pa dbul// za byed chen po lhag pas mchod// 'dod yon gtor mas thugs dam bskang // dam tshig sgrib sbyang bshags pa bya// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor thugs dam bskang // gshin rje gshed la
253b5(1): bstod pa bya// de nas sngon 'gro 'dzab drang ste// dam tshig ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom// thugs kyi rdo rje snying po sngags// 'dzab dgongs 'phro 'du rim pa ni// bstan pa'i snying po bzhin du bya// grangs rtags
253b6(1): dus kyi bsnyen par bya// grangs ni bye ba sa ya 'bum// ting 'dzin ma yengs bsgrims te bya// rtags ne go chas bdag lus brgyan// rdo rje 'khor lo lag babs gsor// mchod rten la 'dzeg mgo la skyes// mon
254a1(1): pa zhib can lho bal rnams// la sogs gcan gzan bdag go bsrun// gru dang glang chen seng ge zhon// nyi zla lag babs gdan la 'dug lus las 'od byung thams cad gsal// mi bying chu
254a2(1): bopo'i thog nas 'gro// ri rab rtser phyin ging bzhi lta// nam mkha' la 'gro sngags sgra sgrogs// 'brug sgra me 'bar rlung nag 'tshub// phyag byed lha srin bdag khur ba// rmi nyams mngon sum phyi nang gsang // de
254a3(1): las sogs te gzhan dag kyang // mtshan rtags mang po mthong mthong bzlas// de dag sngags kyi bzlas lugs ni// dang por zhi ba khro bo yis// 'phrin las gzhung srang mchod pa dbul// bstod dang 'jab drang
254a4(1): dgongs pa bya// de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// thugs kyi 'dzab drang man ngag ni// dang po sku yi sngags sdong bzlas// de nas gsung thugs yon tan sngags// rang rang rkyang par lnga brgya bzlas// de
254a5(1): nas dril ba stong du bzlas// thun 'gor de bzhin thun 'jug tu// sku yi snying po brgya brgya la// gsung thugs yon tan bcu bcu gdags// de bzhin stong la brgya gdags so// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na
254a6(1): ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ oM ya man ka ka la ru pa hUM phaT/ oM shri ste bi kri ta a na na hUM phaT/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shri mu tra ya man ta ka pa tsa te ro ni hUM dza dza/ bstod dang mchod pa sum yar dbul// tshogs kyi 'khor lo nya
254b1(1): stong brgyad// nyi shu gnyis sogs dus la bya// yang na rgyun du byas na rab// za tshogs sum yar mchod pa dbul// de nas lhag ma'i gtor ma yis// ging dang mkha' 'gro mchod las bcol// tshogs la dang po
254b2(1): rab mtha' ru// mchod dang bshags dang drag po'i las// bstab pa bya zhing 'gugs 'dren bya// gtor ma phud spro phyis kyi rta// gzhan gsum rang rang phyogs su btang // sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa'o// de nas
254b3(1): rdzas dang gtor ma gsum// dkyil 'khor de bzhin bris byas te// khyad par dngos grub blang ba'i rdzas// bdud rtsi grub lnga sman sna lnga// spos lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga// snying po lnga dang snying sna'i phye// phud rgod thod
254b4(1): pa mtshan ldan sbyar// 'brub khung 'khor lo ling ga thun// bcas la 'dzab dgongs gsal ldan pas// thun bzhir sgra bcad ma yengs bzlas// dang por zhi khro'i las gzhung bsrang // mchod pa gsum par tshogs
254b5(1): mchod dbul// rak+ta sbreng zhing mchod bshags bstod// gsur chen dud pa rgyun mi bcad// bsgrub khang g.yo dang lha sku ston// 'od 'bar sngags sgra sgra chen sgrogs// mon dang zhib can las la chos// sa g.yos
254b6(1): nam mkha' grub pa skad// go chas lus brgyan mtshon cha 'bar// de rtsogs rmi nyams mngon sum 'byung // gsang rtags lus yang sems gsal zhing // lha sku mngon mthong lung ston dang // snga na med pa'i rnam pa
255a1(1): myong // nyon mongs shes pa yul la 'bar// rang dbang med par khro gtum 'tshig lha srin sde brgyad bskor phyag 'tshal// rang sems sgrib sbyangs mngon shes 'byung // de nas ting 'dzin thabs ldan
255a2(1): pas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang // des ni bdag dang yi dam lha// gnyis med ngo bo gcig par 'gyur// de dag gsang sngags bzlas lugs ni// sku yi snying po bcu bdun pa// rgyun du ma yengs
255a3(1): bzlas par bya// gsung dang thugs dang yon tan sngags// stong la brgya gdags brgya la bcu// de la nye bar bsnyen pa gdags// mtshan ma gsum gyi 'gugs sngags 'dis// ye shes lha tshogs mngon du
255a4(1): 'gyur// ya ma snying sha sha dza dza dun// ya ma snying ru pa sha ya// ya ma snying a kaR+Sha ya dza dza hUM// zhes bzlas nye ba'i bsnyen par bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa dang nye
255a5(1): 'i bsnyen pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu dgu'o// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// bsgrub pa las la sbyor ba bshad// dkyil 'khor gtor ma dam rdzas bzhin// gtor ma mchod pa la sogs pa// gong du mi
255a6(1): btang skabs 'dir btang // dkyil 'khor zhal sbyar de bzhin no// rabs chad ro bsregs g.yul bkye ba// dur khrod ro bsregs gong gsum pa// bzhi mdo shan pa'i rten sa la// drag po'i chus sbyar 'brub khung
255b1(1): ni// khru gang rgyal mtho gang dang // sor bzhi nang dpangs mdzub khrid de// bar dang phyi ru shes par bya// dang por tsher rtsang srin mo 'gros// bar la thod rlon mtha' mar sbrus// nang du shi khrag sna tshogs byug/ phyi
255b2(1): ru dug sna sol chen byug/ gting du gru gsum nyis 'gyur bzhi// hUM dang phaT dang dza dang rbad// gsum gsum thems la ne blangs dgod// logs la b+h+yo gsum kun la'o// rjes sa phyi sa dri ma gcin// skra shad
255b3(1): gos dum zhing khang sa// ling ga sor bcu dbang po dod// skra bsil gsar bu khong stong pa// snying khar mi bring dpral bar rus// lte bar bla la bla dag khams// gro ga la bris khong par gzhug pha mes bu tsha spun
255b4(1): zla'ang gzhug nad rims gri khrag sna tshogs dang // dug sna tshogs kyis nad phyir byug de bzhin sga sgog pi pi ling // tsha ba gsum gyis phyi nas byug rgyu rkyen nye bar gsod pa'i rkyen// mkhar rgongs srin can bad
255b5(1): mkhris slong // bong bu'i sa bon nad rnams 'du// sa dmar lus la tsha ba bskyed// nad khrag de bskyed dug snas gsod// drag po thod par byad du gzhug bdag la rgyab bstan gan gyal dang // spyi tshugs skabs
255b6(1): sbyar dong du brnag/ drag po thun gyi rdzas rnams ni// nyungs kar srog gcod myur du gsod// nyungs nag sngags mda' bla tshe 'joms// skye tshe me 'bar tsha ba bskyed// rdo phyes sgro 'bog gsad pa 'grub// zangs
256a1(1): phyes shan dmar myur du gsod// lcags phyes srog gcod myur du 'joms// mi yi nad khrag sna tshogs kyis// rang rang nad 'bebs gsod par byed// gri khrag sna tshogs de bzhin gsod// rta khrag
256a2(1): dri dang glang thabs gsod// khyi khrag sha zan srog la 'bebs// ra khrag sri can dur nas gsod// dug chen myur du srog gcod gsod// ba spu smyo 'bog 'chal pas gsod// ra dug me 'bar tsha bas gsod// sbrang
256a3(1): dug nad slong 'dus pas gsod// de dag la sogs thun rdzas rnams// rten 'brel mthu yod kun kyang bsog/ mon nam rabs chad thod par blugs// sha za mtshon char byin gyis brlab// rten pa sa yi 'khor lo/
256a4(1): yi// dbus dang mtshams bzhir 'brub khung lnga// ling ga bcug la thun dbab cing // 'khor lo bskor zhing phur pas gdab// dur khrod ras sam zhing lpags pa// yi dwags klad gzhungs dri chen chu// khrag
256a5(1): sogs rme ba lnga sbyar te// rus chen dkar pos dung phyis bya// bdag nyid khro bo'i skur gsal bas// lho bltas sngags bzlas khro sems kyis// skra shig tshol chen lus byugs te// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo gsod byed
256a6(1): bri// bya rog sgra rtsa'i sbu gu yis// snag tsha sga sgog pi pi ling // shing shags sa bon tsi tra ka/ dur khrod sol ba na le sham// lan tshwa nag po nyungs na nag mar// dug sna tshogs dang khrag sna tshogs// de dag sbyar la
256b1(1): 'khrul 'khor bri// dbus su thig bskor rim pa bzhi// 'du ba bzhi yi nad slong yin// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// lcags mkhar lnga dang gsang mdzod bzhi// rtsa ba drag po'i 'bru lnga dgod// mu la rtsa
256b2(1): ba'i 'khor lo yin// phyi rims lcags mkhar drug gnyis la// rten 'brel lus 'joms 'bru bcu gnyis// me dpal gshed kyi 'khor lo yin// yang logs 'khrul mig bcu drug la// sku gsung thugs kyi snying
256b3(1): po gsum// gnas mthun lto sbyor gsum sbag dgod/ kha gnon stobs kyi 'khor lo yin// mtha' ma mtshon cha'i nyi shu'i rtsibs// gsad pa srog gcod yig 'bru gnas// gcod byed mtshon cha'i 'khor lo yin//
256b4(1): kha sbyor yab yum lto bar bri// g.yas bskor steng nas gcod pa ni// pho yi 'khor lo me dang 'dra// gcod cing sreg pas thams cad 'joms// g.yon bskor 'og nas gcod pa ni// mo yi 'khor lo chu klung
256b5(1): 'dra// skyom zhing g.yeng bas rims dal 'bebs// dug khrag ngar glud thar byas te// khyams khang rtsibs mtshan ming rus dgod// dbus su rtsang phur kha la lding // mi rgyus mkhar nag shur par bcom// bdag
256b6(1): gshin rje gshed po yi// thugs las 'od zer drag sngags 'phros// 'khor lo las kyi gshin rje yi// mtshon cha'i khang par byin gyis brlab// sngags 'bru las kyi gshin rje bdud// mtshon cha sna tshogs
257a1(1): srogs gcod bsam// 'brub khung gshed kyi khyams khang ste// srid gsum bla srog khyams khang ngo // zod pa lcags mkhar sgo med du// rtsang phur las kyi gshin rje dang // ma mo sha za'i tshogs su
257a2(1): bsam// ling ga brnag pa dngos su bsam// de la mthu gzhug byin gyis brlab// de ltar rten 'brel sa sna la// rigs ngan chus sbyar gshin rje'i gzugs// 'jigs tshul lto 'phyangs khong stong bya// rgya sol
257a3(1): khrag sna dug chus byug/ de nas ting 'dzin dgongs ldan pas// las la sbyor ba'i bsgrub sngags bzlas// rgyun rings brgya brgyas mgo drangs te// sum cu rtsa gnyis bcu bdun pa// nyin dang mtshan mor bsgrims
257a4(1): te bzlas// stong tshig 'khugs bcas don dbul mchod// bstod dang las bcol drag tu bskul// thun bzhir sgra bcad bar mi gcad// bsgrub khang g.yo zhing sa 'gul dang // rlung nag tshub ma gnas sa
257a5(1): khengs// me chen 'bar dang chu chen 'khrug/ bdag nyid khrab gon mtshon cha thogs// mon pa mi nag rigs mi gcig mtshon thogs dgra la dmag 'dren dang // sgra chen gnas sa 'brum pa skad// gcan gzan
257a6(1): bying med a tsa ra// mang po'i dpon byas dgra la chas// gzhan yang dud 'gro 'ching zhing 'khyig dgra dngos btson 'dzin skye shi gcod// khyi ra rngan byed phyugs gsad bshas// brnag pa de bzhin sha bgos
257b1(1): na// las la tshud de las rnams 'grub// de nas dgug dang dbye ba dang // gsang ba'i 'khor lo nyi ma bzhir// bskor zhing gsad pa'i las rnams bya// las kyi gshin rje bsgrub pa dang // dung ting ka yis las
257b2(1): la rbad// bla srog bkug la lha bzhi dbye// ling ga la bstim dgra dngos bsam// nyi ma bzhir gsad las rdzogs bya'o// rnal ma bzlog dang lto dkrugs kyis// 'gros stabs brgyad kyis 'khrul 'khor
257b3(1): bskor// 'bru ded drag sngags bdun pa rnams// bdun bzhi nyi shu brgyad du bskor// ru khugs ru khugs chen po dang // g.yu yi sbrang mo dgu phrugs dang // bya rog khu 'khrig ces bya dang // g.yas bskor g.yon
257b4(1): bskor stag mchongs dang // ro langs stag chen 'jug brnams sogs// bcu gnyis tshul gyis gsad par bya// de dag bsgrub pa chen por bshad// gsad pa gshin rje nyid la ste// gzir ba stobs kyi bdag
257b5(1): pos bya// dbang ni btsun mo'i lho ru'o// dgu pa dre'u seng ge'i ltor// dbye ba rta dang ma he gnyis// bskrad pa rnga mo'i rgyab tu'o// rengs pa gyen pa'i shing la bya// rgyas pa nor lha'i gzugs su bya// zhi ba zla ba'i
257b6(1): dkyil 'khor te// smyo ba spre'u shan dmar ro// gnan pa ri rab 'og tu'o// yams dal dred mo ral can la// mdze shu rus sbal chen po'i ltor// gri rgod shan pa khan dmar la'o// bzlog pa gnam sa 'khrug byed
258a1(1): la'o// de ltar 'khrul 'khor las rdzogs bya'o// mtshan mo chun dril thun du dbab// sha za srog gcod pho mo'i ging // nad dang mtshon cha thog ltar 'bebs// bya dang gcan gzan sna tshogs
258a2(1): kyis// brnag pa rdul phran tsam du brlag/ nyin bzhir drag sngags 'khor lo bskor// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo srog lus gtubs// de bzhin rdul phran tsam du brlag de ltar las rdzogs rtags mthong nas// bsreg
258a3(1): dang mnan dang zor 'phang ba// mtha' brgya rnam gnyis gzhung bzhin bya// spogs pa ro langs stag mchongs so// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shri ya man ta ka ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza/ trag rag+na snying kha rak+Sha b+h+yo b+h+yo/
258a4(1): rag mo te kuM dza dza/ kha la ma ti b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya ya yon tsin dan ma la b+h+yo dza/ snying kha rag ma srog rtsa la b+h+yo b+h+yo dza dza/ ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya dza mu tra ni/ gshin rje nag po dun ting ka/ dgra bo'i
258a5(1): snying la ya ya b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She ya dza ni ra ma ya/ nri a kaR+Sha ya AM gu sha dza dza/ de ba b+hid dam sha ya pra be sha phaT/ hUM stam pa ya dza nan/ hri ti pra
258a6(1): ma ya/ mur dza ya/ rak+ta ra dza ya/ mA ra ya/ nri sha ku ru nri rbad ya/ de dag las kyi rim pa yis/ thun mong mchog gi dngos grub 'byung / 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa dang bsgrub pa chen po'i
258b1(1): le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu tham pa'o// // de nas 'jam dpal rnon po yis// rdo rje 'chang chen la gsol pa// 'jam dpal gzhon nu gdong drug pa'i// lha bsgrub rgyas par bshad du gsol// de skad gsol
258b2(1): pas bka' stsal pa// zhus don ngas bshad khyed nyon cig/ chos nyid rnam dag ye shes spros bral 'jam// thugs rje zhor 'byung 'gro don mthar phyin dpal// rig pa'i ye shes bgres rgud med pas
258b3(1): gzhon// rigs drug ye shes drug ldan nyon mongs 'joms// de mtshon phyag rgyar snang bas zhal drug pa// 'gro ba'i dpal mgon legs sbyin phan byed lha// dngos grub byin rlabs 'byung bas bsgrub pa'o// de
258b4(1): nyid mngon du bya ba'i bsgrub pa ni// ri rgyal lhor ltas dur khrod byin can du// sngags pa dbang thob dam tshig ldan pa yis// sku gdung sbyin gtor 'jam dpal mtshan rnams brjod// gnas kyis dang gshin rje'i
258b5(1): gnas sa la// stegs bu ngos re khru do dpangs khru gang // dur khrod sol chen na rings skyer rtsi khrag/ 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus gnag dmar dang ldang // gru chad sgo bzhi phyogs mtshon par khyams khrag/ zod
258b6(1): pa skam rlon 'phreng ba me ris bskor// de dbus thod pa dmu lugs smug chen chung // bdud rtsi rak+tas sngags bris gtso bo'i rdzas// rtsibs brgyad pad+ma 'dab brgyad gang rung la// shar du tri shul lho ru ral gri
259a1(1): dgod// nub tu dgra sta byang du shag ti mtshon// mtshams bzhir be tshon gru chad me ri zhing // bar khyams dur khrod sgo bzhi be tshon dgod// de ltar rdul tshon dkyil 'khor legs par bri// dur khrod
259a2(1): ras la ri bong khrag chen rtsogs// bdud rtsis bris sku lho ru dgram// 'bru sna gtor ma cha gsum mi rta la sogs kyi// sha khrag bcas pa bdud rtsi rak+ta dang // phyi mchod rnam par sgrib pa sbyang phyir bsham// tshil
259a3(1): chen mar med gsung chen dud pa dang // zhing rkang gling bu thod pa ltag sprod rnga// zhing lpags bla 'phan dur khrod rgyan rnams dgram// sngags pa lhor bltas zhing chen chas gos bgo/ rak+ta'i thig le gdong gdab
259a4(1): 'jam dpal dpa' bo la// rjes su yi rang dbul zhing dad pa bskyed// spyi gtsug smug nag bruM gsal nyi ma'i gdan// mthing nag ya yi 'phro 'dus 'phags mchod 'gro don byas// slar 'dus bdag thim ya
259a5(1): man ta kar bskyed// dpal chen de kho na nyid glu blang ngo // de ba la hri/ de ba la hri/ ting khro ting khro ru pa ti ho/ go ro tsa na bdud rtsi'i ril bu mur/ lha ni thog ma'i mtshan mo rang nas nye'o// maN+Dal steng du 'bru
259a6(1): sna'i lha bshos bca'// tshil chen zhab ma ut+pal sngon pos brgyan// lha la sum yar tshogs dbul rang yang rol// bdag ni yi dam lha mchog khyod bsgrub ces// dam bca' phyag rgya lu gu rgyud du sbrel// gshin rje
259b1(1): gshed la dam bca' 'di skad brjod// ho/ bcom ldan dpal chen khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// tshe rabs sngon nas las dang thugs rje dang // smon lam rgyun gyi rnam 'byor pa dag dang 'brel// thugs dam 'brel
259b2(1): ba'i lha mchog gshin rje gshed// srog la bab kyang lha mchog khyod mi gtong // thugs rje rtse gcig rgyun gyis bdag la dgongs// lha mchog bdag la dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos
259b3(1): grub stsal du gsol// byams pa'i zhal bzangs bdag la bstan du gsol// zhes brjod dam bca' mang du bya// tshil chen gsur chen klad pa rten// ka ra bI ra'i me tog mchod// mtshams ni dam bcad ma
259b4(1): yengs bya// de ltar sngon du rdzogs bya'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// sngon 'gro bca' thabs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu gcig go// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa
259b5(1): bshad// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin// rnam dag chos nyid stong par gsal// kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin// chos rnams snang la rang bzhin med// tshad med bzhi bsgom ting 'dzin rgyu// bdag nyid lus med
259b6(1): ting 'dzin rgyu// ma las nyid ma'i da la dbus su// rang sems mthing nag hUM du gsal// de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'phags pa 'jam dpal thugs
260a1(1): khar thim// thugs dam rgyud bskur mchod pa phul// stong gsum 'jig rten khams su 'phros// sems can ma lus sgrib sbyangs te// don byas slar 'dus hUM la thim// bdag gi sgo gsum sgrib pa
260a2(1): dang // bag chags ma lus bsregs sbyangs te// bdag lus 'od zhu hUM nyid las// gser gyi rdo rje lngar gyur// de bzhin 'phro 'dus rdo rjer zhu// gser zhun lta bu'i byang chub sems// de las sku bskyed sngags
260a3(1): brjod pas// bdag nyid khro rgyal dpal chen po// ya man ta ka'i sku ru gyur// sku mdog mthing nag stang zil 'dra// zhal drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis la// zhabs drug g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bzhugs// rtsa
260a4(1): ba'i dbus la mthing nag khro// g.yas zhal dkar po zhi ba 'dzum// g.yon zhal dmar po brjid pa bzhad// de stengs dbus zhal zhi ba ser// de yi g.yas zhal ljang khu gdangs// g.yon zhal sngo skya mche
260a5(1): ba btsigs// zhal re'i dpral bar rigs lnga'i zhal// zhal kun ljags 'dril mche btsigs rngam// dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes// thod skam ser khra sbrul gyis bsgyings// bcu gnyis phyag na bsnams pa
260a6(1): ni// g.yas pa drug na go rims su// gser gyi rdo rje rgya gram dang // chos sbyin phyag rgya tri shul la// be tshon ral gri lcags kyu dang // sti ra'i zhing chung zur du brkyang // g.yon pa drug na go rims su// khyung khra
260b1(1): sdigs mdzub me 'bar ba// ban d+ha khrag bkang shag ti'i mdung // gnam lcags mda' gzhu rgyu zhags bsnams// sku stod glang chen ko rlon gsol// stag gi sham thabs mchog tshar brgyan// thod rlon 'phreng
260b2(1): ba'i se ral kha// phyag gdub zhabs gdub rigs bzhi'i sbrul// dpral bar rak+ta zla gam thig le// mkhur 'dzum thal chen tshom bur mtshan// kos ko zhag gi zo ris can// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil
260b3(1): na// ma he'i gdan la brjid par bzhugs// de 'og gshin rje pho mo brdzis/ kha bub gan kyal byi chings gdan// thugs khar nyi ma'i gdan dkyil na// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku// sku mdog dkar
260b4(1): ser 'dzum zhi bzhad// phyag g.yas rdo rje ut+pal g.yon// dbu rgyan rin chen brgyan gyis mdzes// thugs khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa// lte bar nyi ma hUM mthing nag/ mtha' ma snying po sngags kyis bskor// thugs kyi ye
260b5(1): shes 'dus ma byas// gzung 'dzin skye 'gag spros bral ba'i// hUM las g.yon du hUM 'phros pas// 'phro 'du la sogs de bzhin bya// bskyed pa'i sngags brjod shes rab yum// ro langs khro mo pe ta li// zhal
260b6(1): gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// phyag g.yas dang po yab la 'khyud// bar pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa// yab kyi thugs khar bsgrengs nas 'dzin// mtha' ma yab
261a1(1): kyi lte bar 'khyud// g.yon pa khro mdzub phyag rgya bsgreng // ban d+ha rak+ta yab la stob// za ma tri shul bsgreng ba'o// rgyan dang cha lugs yab dang 'thun// khro rgyal ya man ta ka yi// thugs las 'od
261a2(1): 'phros sngags brjod pas// dbyug tho las ni mthing nag ya// de las sprul pa'i khro bo sras// ya ma rA dza khye'u chung sngo// spyan dmar mche gtsigs 'jigs tshul rngam// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil// zhing gi ko/
261a3(1): rlon stag lpags bsnams// g.yas g.yon be tshon sdigs mdzub bsgreng // gtso bo'i pho nyar bka' sdod pa'o// lha rnams dal gyi pho brang na// thod pa skam rlon gzhal yas na// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na
261a4(1): bzhugs// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor// sku las ye shes me dpung 'bar// nyon mongs dug gsum mun khang 'joms// sbrul sku sems can thams cad la// dus gsum ji ltar mos pa bzhin// gang la ci
261a5(1): 'dul der ston pa'o// b+h+yAM las gzhal yas khang bskyed de// de dbus khro rgyal yab yum bskyed// 'khor du gshin rje ma mo'i tshogs// sprul pa'i las mkhan ma lus bskyed// de thugs ye shes 'od
261a6(1): 'phros pas// phyogs bcu chos kyi dbyings nyid nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bstim// phyag mtshan phyi nang gsang mchod 'bul// dngos grub blang zhing thugs dam bskang // bshags dang tshogs kyi
261b1(1): 'khor lo byo'o// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ oM AHhUM pe ta yi rak+ta rak+ta man hUM phaT/ oM bI pa sa ta dz+nyA na phaT/ ya ma sa ma ya dza/ oM bud d+ha d+harmA seng ge b+hu/ e ha hi b+ha ga ba na/ ya man ta
261b2(1): ka kro d+ha shwa ri ya ma rA dza sa ma ya dza hUM baM ho/ ya ma ye ma ha su ka ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM tiSh+Tha lhan/ oM ya man ta ka e ka ba ri/ shri badz+ra d+hU be du/ puSh+pe pu/ A lo ke hri/ ga na d+he a/ ma hA mu tra pu tsa ho/ sarba pany+tsa a mri ta shri
261b3(1): b+ha na kha ra ma kha hi/ ma hA ma sa kha hi/ ma hA rak+ta kha hi/ ma hA tsit+ta kha hi/ ma hA gau ro tsa ni kha hi ma hA ba su ta kha hi/ ma hA pany+tsa a mri ta kha hi/ ma hA b+ha ling ta i dam grih+Na grih+Na/ kha hi kha hi/ rak+ta pi pa to/ ma hA ba
261b4(1): d+hi tsit+ta su ka ho/ ma hA mam sa rak+ta ke ma ni ri ti pan tsa ba ri ye swA hA/ oM shri badz+ra ru pa ka ya hUM/ pra ti a ra li hUM/ du pa du hUM/ b+ha ling ta hUM/ tsan d+ha li hUM/ s+pha ra na kha hUM/ pany+tsa a mri ta hUM/ oM ma hA kro d+ha shri ya
261b5(1): man ta ka a la la ho/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa mchog gi rgyud las/ las rim bsgom pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor 'di bshad
261b6(1): bdag nyid ya man ta kar gsal ba yi// thugs khar ye shes sems dpa' bsgom// de thugs rdo rje'i snying po sngags// de las sngags kyi 'phro 'du bya// bdag nyid chen por bsgrub pa'o// mdun du dkyil
262a1(1): 'khor dbus su bsgom// de bzhin 'phro 'du ma yengs bzlas// yi dam lha yi bsgrub pa'o// bdag thugs snying po 'od 'phros pas// 'dom gang phan chad khro bo'o// skur gyur sngags zlos stong
262a2(1): gsum gyi// stong khyab sems can sgrib pa sbyangs// mu mtha' med pa'i chos dbyings khyab// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'jam dpal khro bo tshogs chen gyi// thugs thim mchod phul thugs dam
262a3(1): bskul// tshur 'dus bdag thugs snying por thim// bdag nyid sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'dus// de ltar gsal bas ma yengs par// dus der rtags dang grangs su bzlas// bye
262a4(1): ba bdun dang bdun 'bum khri// dus ni gnyen zla'i nya stong bsgrim// rtags ni mngon phyung bar du bzlas// sum yar mchod pa dbul zhing bstod// srod 'jing rtags byung dam sri 'dre// yin pas mtshams bcad
262a5(1): mnan gzir bya// nam phyed tho rangs rtags byung na// lha yin mchod dbul dngos grub blang // ban d+ha dmigs can phyag rgya bcas// sbas la lan dgur sngags glu blang // oM sa ma ya many+dzu shri mu tra ya man ta ka pa
262a6(1): tsa te ro ni hUM dza dza/ oM sa ma ya a nu ra ga na pa ti/ ya man ta ka ha ha he/ oM ya man ta ka hUM/ ka la ru pa hUM/ oM hriSh+Ti bi kri tra a na na hUM phaT/ oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma thA b+hany+dza hU~M phaT/ ya ma me ta k+Sha ra
262b1(1): tsas to/ ru ni yi na ra ya dza ni/ hUM dza/ khro rgyal ya man ta ka yi/ thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// lho phyogs dur khrod ma la ya// las kyi gshin rje'i grong khyer nas// skye 'gro kun srog dbang sgyur
262b2(1): ba'i// gshin rje'i rgyal po 'chi bdag gnag/ 'khor bcas srog drangs mdun du bkug/ nag po 'jigs tshul tshe srog bdag/ khro rgyal bka' sdod las bcol byed// 'phro 'dus rgyud bskul las byed
262b3(1): bsam// ma yengs rtags byung bar du bzlas// sku gzugs g.yo 'gul sngags sgra sgrogs// snang srid nyi zla'i 'od kyis gang // nyams la lho sgo byed snyam byed// gza' skar mang po thang la lhung // gcan gzan
262b4(1): mche btsigs bdag sgo bsrung // bdag nyid nyams dgu rang sems gsal// rlung nag 'tshub ma sa g.yos dang // 'brug sgra chen po skar mda' lhung // yi dam lha mchog mngon gshegs nas// sku mdog nag po
262b5(1): gdong pa gzur// mche ba ring la dmar ba gtsigs// zhal bgrad spyan rtsa dmar po bsgrigs// dur khrod chas ldan lho bal 'dra// me dpung nang na bzhugs par ston// bdag nyid las kyi 'phro ngan na// rigs
262b6(1): kyi bu khyod ci 'dod zer// klad du ral gri brdeg tshul ston// sran chung 'jigs na nyen che'o// mi 'jigs sran tshugs phyag rgya sngags// bdag gi 'phags pa dam pa'i mchog grub pa khyod kyi thugs dam
263a1(1): ste// bsrung ba 'di lta bu zhig 'tshal// gang 'dod pa yi dngos grub blang // tshig mangs mi smra sems brtan pas// dbyangs snyan dam pa'i glu 'di blang // u tra ra sa dar ma ka/ a a ni ka na ga na
263a2(1): d+ha yed/ e e pa ta pa ta pa tan/ dz+nyA na si d+hi phra ma ya a tha/ zhes brjod dngos grub nges dam bca'// des ni gang 'dod las 'grub 'gyur// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa yang dag gsang ba'i rgyud las/
263a3(1): sgrub thabs rim pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor bshad// dus kyi mtha' ma shar ba'i tshe// bstan pa gnyen po bsrung ba'i
263a4(1): phyir// mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khrul 'khor bskor// des ni gdul bya sgrol zhing gcod// zhing chen dur khrod ras dag la// sme ba lnga yis thang ba bya// ni rangs dung phyis rkyang bcad la// dug khrag rgya sol zhun ma
263a5(1): yis// lhor bltas bya rog sgro rtsas bris// dbus nas thig skor rim pa bzhi// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// 'khrul mig lnga dang gsang mdzod bzhi// phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu gnyis ldan// de phyir rlung
263a6(1): ri stong pa la// mtha' ma rtsibs chen dgu gnyis ldan// de la gnas shing dgongs pa ni// rtsa ba gshed kyi 'bru lnga dbus// lcags mkhar me dpal 'bru bcu gnyis// rlung ri sku gsung thugs kyi stobs// rtsibs
263b1(1): la gcod byed mchod dpal 'bru// gsang mdzod rtsibs mtshan brnag pa'i ming // g.yas skor steng gcod yab kyi ltor// 'jigs tshul be con sdigs mdzub bsgreng // g.yon skor 'og gcod yum gyi
263b2(1): ltor// 'jigs tshul tri shul thod khrag bsnams/ kha sbyar dong rtsang brnag pa'i steng // dgug dang dbye ba'i las rdzogs phyir// mtshon cha'i 'khrul 'khor bskor zhing gcod// brnag pa rdul phran tsam du
263b3(1): 'gyur// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha gzhi gcig la// bskor bas nyin bzhir las drug 'grub// 'jam dpal zhal drug nyin nas 'byung // bzhi skor re res las 'grub 'gyur// de dag rgyas pa'i rim bshad
263b4(1): 'di'o// steng gi dbus zhal zhi ba nas// smyo 'bog srog gcod 'khor lo 'phros// yak+She ni rA dza sa to me/ ya ma sa to ru na yo ta/ ya me na yo ni ra yak+She/ ya ta ra ya dza ni ra ma/ steng gi zhal g.yas ljang khu
263b5(1): nas// rdo rje rtse gsum chu 'khyags dbab pa 'phros// ya ta ya ma ni ra tsa/ yak+She ya ma ya to ru/ ra ma ye ta na yo ni/ to me ya ta na yo ni/ steng gi g.yon zhal mthing kha nas/ gnam lcags ur mo thog dbab
263b6(1): 'phros/ rak+She yo ya yo k+She ru/ to ma ya ya yo ma to/ yo k+She ra ya rak+She yo/ ya ma to ya to ma ya/ 'og gi dbus zhal mthing nag nas/ srog gcod gshed nag 'khrul 'khor 'phros/ ya ma me ta k+She ni ra tsa/ ya me te k+She
264a1(1): ma sa to ru/ ya ta k+She ma me na yo ni/ yak+She ma me ta ra ya dza/ 'og gi g.yas zhal dkar po nas/ gdug pa srog len mdze nad gtong ba 'phros/ ya ma ni ra tsa ta yo/ ya me sa to ruk+She na ya/ ya ta na
264a2(1): yo na mar/ ya k+She ra ya dza me to// 'og gi g.yon zhal dmar po nas/ dmar po srog gcod dri rbod gtong ba 'phros/ ya ma ra yo ta yo tsa/ ya me to ya k+She ya ru/ ya ta yo ya ma ra ni/ ya k+She ya ya me to dza/ pra ma ya/
264a3(1): mur dza ya/ rak+ta tsa ra ya/ ma ra ya/ nag ku ru nri rbad ya/ ra tsa a sa ma la tri/ ud ma hA pra tsa le rbad/ dud kar phrom shu ti phro ma ya ma phrom/ ya ma hur shar b+ha ri sha ra ya shar pho ba/ badz+ra dza la raM shar
264a4(1): phob/ thog thog chem chem srog la zum rbad b+h+yo/ ya ka shi bi sha tsi ru ka la ru tra sha trun sog la mA ra ya dza/ tsi ri dza la rak+Sha tsa ra ya na g+ha hu ma ya ba sti sha trun snying khrag baM ri la rbad/ rak+Sha khram ti mA ra ya rbad bu
264a5(1): nan/ tsit+ta tshal pa khram khram mA ya rbad/ de dag gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor te// drag po'i las kun 'grub par bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang ba mchog gi rgyud las/ 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste lnga brgya
264a6(1): brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// thun drug gsad pa'i sbyor ba bshad// phung sa gsum gyi 'brub khung ni// gru gsum dpangs khru mtho gang tshad/ kha khyer thod 'phreng tsher rtsang
264b1(1): bskor// phyi nang dug sna khrag snas byug/ de nang mon pa'ang gri thod du// rten drug ling ga ming rus bcas// tsha ba nad khrag byugs la brnag/ gri bo dmar chod thod pa ru// mi rta ra khyi dri nad khrag/ mon pa la
264b2(1): byung thod pa ru/ dug rgod ra sbyang ba spu dug/ mdze can dmar chod thod pa ru// mdze khrag sbal sbrul chu bya'i khrag/ mi phyugs gang rung smyon thod du/ de khrag nyungs kar nyungs nag 'bru// 'brong chen khrom gyi 'thom
264b3(1): nag tu// gcan gzan sna tshogs sha zan bya'i// khrag snying mchu sder mche ba bsham// dbang drag phur pa dug ngar blud// bdag nyid khro rgyal gdong drug pa// ling ga brnag pa dngos su bsam// 'brub khung
264b4(1): gshin rje'i khyams khung nas// thun rdzas nad dang mtshon cha'i dpal// yab kyi las kyi gshin rje 'khol// yum gyis ma mo bdud mo 'khol// kun 'dus thun gyi mtshon cha yis// brnag pa'i lus srog rdul du rlog

264b6(1): ya man ta krita ma ma e ka dza ti ta ka ni sha trum ma na ha ra ud ma ta nr-i mA ra ya dza/ steng gi zhal g.yas ljang khu nas// snying gzer dbab sngags 'phros pas brdeg/ ya man ta ka tri sha ra krA pe ta li kro d+hi ru lu b+h+yo
265a1(1): tsit+ta tshal pa kham shag rbad/ steng gi g.yon zhal mthing kha nas// mdze nad thun sngags 'phros pas brdeg/ ya ma kA la hA ya na ga ragra ti ku la phu ta ya/ ma ma kro d+hi tsi ti dz+wa la ha na ya snying khrag bam
265a2(1): ril rbad/ 'og gi dbus zhal nag po nas/ klad gzer dbab sngags 'phros pas brdeg/ ya ma tsa na d+ha kro d+ha nir ka mo shan pa mA ra ya ro tsa na mun thibs shag ti rbad// 'og gi g.yas zhal dkar po nas// rgyu
265a3(1): gzer thun sngags 'phros pas brdeg/ ya ma rak+Sha dza ma ya snying kha rag ba su ta ro myags khrag ti rbad/ srog ta gi rbad/ snying tig rbad/ 'og gi g.yon zhal dmar po nas// dri rgod dbab sngags 'phros pas
265a4(1): brdeg/ ya ma rak+Sha ya ma khrag/ ya ma tri ta ha la ya khram ti rbad/ ha ri zum ril ram shag rbad/ 'bru yi thun gyi smyo 'bog gtong // mdze khrag thun rtsogs mdze nad 'bebs// khrag thun dmar po dri rgod
265a5(1): 'bebs// dug thun nag pos rgyu gzer 'bebs// bya gcan thun gyis klad gzer 'bebs// phur thun nag pos snying gzer 'bebs// thun rtags me 'bar me stag 'thor/ khol dang lud dang rlangs pa
265a6(1): 'byung // sgra dang 'phrad zhing 'thor ba 'byung // sngags pa dam ldan dbang rdzogs na// des ni brag la brgyab na 'gas// srog chags rnams la smos ci dgos// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// thun
265b1(1): drug gi le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'di bshad do// sangs rgyas rang sde sngags pa dang // mu stegs gzhan sde'i byad sngags kyis// sbyor ba
265b2(1): drag po gnod byed na// de bzlog rang bsad 'khor lo ni// rang bzhin rnam dag stong pa las// bruM yig sngon po yongs gyur pas// gnam lcags 'khor lo rtsibs drug la// rno la rgya che me 'bar bsgom// dbus
265b3(1): kyi lte bar hUM yig las// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// gzhon nu gdong drug gsal bar bskyed// thugs kyi rdo rje snying po las// ye shes drug 'od zhal nas 'phros// rtsibs drug sprul pa'i gshin rjer
265b4(1): gyur// 'og gi dbus zhal nag po nas// shar rtsibs 'od nag 'phros pa las// khro bo me 'bar bdud 'dul sprul// mthing nag rdo rje dgra sta bsnams// 'og gi zhal g.yas dkar po nas// shar lho dkar po

265b6(1): po pad+ma rgyu zhags bsnams// steng gi g.yas zhal ljang khu las// nub byang ljang khu'i 'od 'phros pas// khro bo yon tan 'bar ba sprul// ser po gsal zhing dgra sta bsnams// steng gi g.yas zhal ljang khu
266a1(1): las// nub byang ljang khu'i 'od 'phros pas// khro bo stobs ldan bzhad par sprul// ljang khu be tshon khram bam bsnams// steng gi g.yon zhal mthing kha nas// byang rtsibs mthing nag 'od 'phros
266a2(1): pas// khro bo khams gsum zil gnon sprul// mthing nag ral gri rgyu zhags bsnams// kun kyang zhing chen gdan la bzhugs// me dpung klong na dur khrod chas// ye shes 'khor los byin brlabs bya// mchod pa
266a3(1): la sogs kun rdzogs bya// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bskor ba yis// gdul bya kun gcod rdul phran brlag/ gsang sngags par chad med par bzlas// oM shrI many+dzu ya man ta ka/ ka ya ru pa sa ma ya/ badz+ra kro d+ha rA dza
266a4(1): ya/ badz+ra ra dza mu ha na/ ya ma rA dz+ra kro d+ha ya tsa kra tiSh+Tha warti/ pra taM ki ra ha na ha na/ tha ma tha ma/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka shrI many+dzu ka la ru pa/ badz+ra kro d+ha ya ma ye sa ma ya hUM/ du na du na pa tsa pa
266a5(1): tsa/ tshin+na tshin+na/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ ya ma sarba bud+d+hA na ka ya raka sha ra ka sha sa ra sa ra/ dgra bo mA ra ya phaT/ ya ma ra dza sa twa me ya mar kang sha phung to me/ ya ma ti sha khrag to me/ ya ma yak+ka mug to me/ ya ma
266a6(1): tsan d+ha snying to me/ ya ma tri ta srog to me/ myags thums ril rbad/ bsreg pa me yi las rim gyi/ zhi ba rgyas pa dbang drag po/ ri lum dkar po rtsi chags pa/ me thab zlum po dngul chus byug/ yam shing tsan dan
266b1(1): dkar po dang // be dkar 'dzag dkar mtshar bu'i shing // ga bur shu dag cu gang dang // ming byang gu gul dkar po bsreg/ lha yang dkar po shel ltar dag/ bsgoms la rgya spos bre gu spos// spang spos rtsi mar
266b2(1): me tog dkar// shing thog g+hi hang bsreg byas na// drag po smyo pa'ang zhi 'gyur na// gzhan dag kun la gdon mi za// nyon mongs khong khro gdon bgegs dgra// byang sngags nad dal sdang sems can// ma lus
266b3(1): rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// ri rgyal lhun po rtsi shing sar// me thab gru bzhi gser gyis byug rtsi shing sna tshogs 'bras bu can// skyer pa'i yam shing ming byang dang // rtsi mar spos dang shing mngar dang // pad+ma ge sar star
266b4(1): bu dang // shug 'brum ku sha yung ba dang // gser gyi me tog sna tshogs bsreg lha yang btso ma'i gser ltar bsgom// longs spyod rigs brgyud tshe dang nor// bsod nams dbang thang dpag med 'phel// shin tu
266b5(1): rgyas pa'i las 'grub 'gyur// lhun po dgu 'dus brjid che'i sa// me zab zla gam pa la shas// byugs la yam shing tsan dan dmar// pa la sha dang gser shing la// khre dang je tse mo na sran dang // g+hi hang pad+ma me
266b6(1): tog dang // gur gum ming byang bcas pa bsnams// pad+ma dmar po'i me tog bsreg lha yang dmar po brjid tshul bsgom// rgyal blon sngags pa stobs can dang // yul khams dang ni bud med dang // 'dre gdon
267a1(1): pho mo sdang byed ma lus pa// nges par dbang sdud bran bzhin 'gyur// dur khrod brag nag mtho la gzar// me zab gru gsum sol chen byug/ dur khrod shing dang tsher ma can// dug dang dri sprod shing
267a2(1): me sbar// sha sna tshogs dang tshil chen dang // khrag sna 'bru mar ming byang rgyu// gtor ma gu gul nag po bsreg lha yang mthing nag khros par bsgom// dgra bgegs ma lus sgrol 'joms gsod// gzir bzlog
267a3(1): rlag par byed 'gyur ro// de dag gsang sngags sgra bcad bzlas// shan ting ku ru swA hA/ puSh+Ti ku ru s+tha pha ra na/ pa shang ku ru hri dza/ mA ra ya ku ru phaT// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo sbyin
267a4(1): sreg gi le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// gnan gtad sbyor ba 'di bshad do/ ling ga 'khor lor bcas pa de// 'khor lo dur khrod gnas su gnas// ling ga thod
267a5(1): chen mi shis bcug dur khrod tsha sgo dmyal chu khol// khu rlangs ngam grog lhor ltar dmar// las kyi gshin rje de gnas gtad// myos nas glang zabs nad kyis 'chi// ya ma pa tra ha sha na b+h+yo// ya ma rA dza khrag to
267a6(1): me ya// ri nag ri mgo mdud pa 'dra// brag nag mtsho nag 'khyil cing 'khol// byang bltas bdud nag gnas pa'i sa// der gtad 'thibs nad lkugs pa'i gsod/ rak+ta pra ka mo ni b+h+yo/ ka la ru ta b+ha ti
267b1(1): ya// gangs ri brag dkar yang rtse na/ mtho rtse rgod lding rtsang yul na// lha rgod dreg pa 'khor bcas gnas// der gtad zer thun blang thabs gsod// de ba yak+ka pra thun b+h+yo// a sa pa ya de ba pra// ri brag rko chu
267b2(1): dmar po la// rang gzhan 'bros 'dra sa rtsub na// sha za srin po gnas pa'i sa// der gtad po gzer thun med gsod// rag sha pra ka mo ni b+h+yo// rak+Sha bi sha tsa thun// lcags ri chu srin kha gdengs 'dra// chu 'thab
267b3(1): gdug shing rkang gcig nas// gnod sbyin drag po gnas pa'i sa// der gtad blo bur hur thums gsod// yak+ka kha rag dun b+h+yo// ya ka sha u kra ya/ ri brag thang dmar rkang gcig shing // chu mig sna tshogs lu ma
267b4(1): na// klu bdud nag po gnas pa'i sa// der gtad zha grum nad kyis gsod// nA ga hu ya tan ye b+h+yo/ nA ga yag sha phu ta ya/ chu mig byang bltas rlung nag 'tshub// dgun gsum nyi ma mi 'char ba// de na klu nag
267b5(1): gdug pa gnas// der gtad mdze shu nad kyis 'chi// nag po bam ril nA ga b+h+yo// nA ga b+ha ti ta ku la// thang skam srin rdo dregs pa can// rtswa med pra ma shing yod pa// sa bdag nag po gnas pa'i sa// der
267b6(1): gtad 'bras nad phol gyis gsod// be sa khe rin tra b+h+yo// gur lang be sa snying khas// mtsho nag gting rings brag nag rtsar// gting gi mtsho bdud nag mo gnas// der gtad smyos nas myos pas 'chi// dun
268a1(1): ting du med dun b+h+yo/ du la ya dza/ du la ya dza/ dur khrod brag phug gting rings na// ma mo srog zan shan pa gnas// der gtad rims dal nad kyis gsod// ma ma snying khar ka b+h+yo/ ma rak+ta ru lu
268a2(1): dza/ sa ri dmar po gong gsum 'dus// brag dmar yul btsan kha dmar gnas// der gtad dri rgod nad kyis gsod// tsa ra tri shaM dun b+h+yo/ shu la tsa ra ya ka sha dza/ nr-i ha ra hur zums/ staM pa ya/ snyam pa ya/
268a3(1): lam nan/ sngags rnams kun gyi 'jug la gdags// 'di ltar gtad pa'i las byas na// dmigs pa gang gtad don po de// myur du gsod byed rlag par 'gyur// thabs 'di 'jig rten lha srin rnams// dgra
268a4(1): srog la dbab ces bya ste// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// drag la mthu rtsal drag ldan pas// de mtha' na ni khro bo gzhan// thams cad kun gyi lag cha 'chor// de la 'khor gyis rab bskor ba// mche ba
268a5(1): gtsigs shing bsgyings pa ste// 'jigs pa'i tshul gyi sku yis ni// gshin rje'i dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa// 'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor gyis de ltar bstod byas so// 'jam dpal khri drug
268a6(1): stong pa'i rgyud las// 'jam dpal gzhon nu gdong drug pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// gshin rje gshed la bstod bskul gsungs// hUM chos sku byang chub
268b1(1): sems kyi ngang nyid las/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i thugs rje yis// gdul dka' 'dul phyir khro bo sku sprul pa// bcom ldan dpal chen khro rgyal gshen rje gshed// rnam dag chos kyi dbyings nas
268b2(1): bzhengs su gsol// gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// hUM/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal sprul pa'i sku// khro bo'i ming ni gshin rje gshed// me lce 'bar ba'i mtshon cha 'khrug khams gsum lha
268b3(1): chen thams cad dang // bdud dpung rdul du brlag mdzad pa// khro rgyal ya man ta ka'i sku// zhal drug phyag rgya bcu gnyis te// zhal gcig dkar la zhal gcig dmar// zhal gcig sngo la zhal gcig
268b4(1): ser// zhal gcig ldang la zhal gcig mthing // zhal gcig hUM phaT sgra sgrogs pas// zhal gcig zhi la zhal gcig khro// zhal gcig bzhad cing zhal gcig gdangs// zhal gcig mche ba rab tu
268b5(1): gtsigs// zhal gcig brjid la gnon pa'i zhal// a a ha la'i sgra sgrogs pas// zhal re spyan gsum 'dzum bzhad khros// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs ljags 'dril ba// smin ma mun rum glog ltar 'gyu// sma
268b6(1): ra ag tshoms me ltar 'bar/ kham nag dbu skra gyen du 'khyil// dbu la thod skam 'phreng bas mdzes// sku yang mthing nag chen po la// sku lus che la yan lag rags// lto che khams gsum lto na 'phro// na
269a1(1): bzar glang chen ko rlon gsol// stag lpags g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs can// zod rlon 'phreng ba'i se ral ka/ sbrul nag stong gi gdengs kas klubs// zal chen khrag zhag zhal la brgyan// tshom
269a2(1): bu zo ris thig le can// bcu gnyis phyag rgya 'jigs par ldan// g.yas kyi phyag drug dang po na// gser gyi rdo rje rgya gram rnams// chos nyid skye med rol pa'i rtags// phyag drug g.yas kyi gnyis pa na// sbyin
269a3(1): pa'i phyir na phyag brgyad pas// bsgrub pa po la dngos grub gsol// g.yas kyi phyag drug gsum pa na// tri shul phyag mtshan bdud dpung 'joms// log 'dren bdud dpung rdul du rlogs// g.yas kyi phyag drug
269a4(1): bzhi pa na// be con phyag mtshan dgra dpung 'joms// sdang ba'i dgra bo rdul phran gtong // g.yas kyi phyag drug lnga pa na// nyon mongs rgyun gcod ral gri bsnams// g.yas kyi phyag drug tha ma na// rdo rje lcags kyu
269a5(1): sngon po dang // sti ra'i zhing dbyug lhan cig 'dzin// dgra bgegs snying 'byin srog rtsa 'dren// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad nas sbyong // g.yon gyi phyag drug dang po na// khyung gi khra chen lding ba bsnams// dam
269a6(1): nyams kun gyi gshed mar gtong // g.yon gyi phyag drug gnyis pa na// sdigs mdzub rtse la me 'bar bas// nyon mongs dug gsum mun khang bsreg/ g.yon gyi phyag drug gsum pa na// ban d+ha rak+tas bkang ba
269b1(1): 'khrug cing gsol// 'khor ba'i bag chags sdug bsngal zad par mdzad// g.yon gyi phyag drug bzhi pa na// shag ti sngon po mdung thung bsnams// bdud dang bgegs dang 'byung po dang // dgra bo'i g.yul ngo
269b2(1): bzlog par mdzad// g.yon gyi phyag drug lnga pa na// lcags gzhu lcags mda' nag po 'phen// dgra bgegs snying la gzir cing 'bebs// g.yon gyi phyag drug tha ma na// ba su ta yi zhags pa bsnams// dgra
269b3(1): bgegs dbang sdud 'khor ba thugs rjes 'dren// zhabs drug rgyud drug mgo nas gnon// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang tshul du bzhugs// phyag dang zhabs gdub thams cad kun// gdug pa'i sbrul nag mang
269b4(1): pos brgyan// bcom ldan 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// chibs su ma he sngo nag chibs// ma he gdan gyi sgrom 'og na// gshin rje pho mo gdan du bting // khro rgyal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod// sdang
269b5(1): dgra gnod bgegs thal ba rdul du rlog/ hUM/ g.yon na khro mo nyer gnas ma// yum chen ro langs pe ta li// khros pa'i cha lugs yab dang 'thun// zhal ras 'bar ba gzi yang cha// spyan gsum gdong yang khro
269b6(1): gnyer can// rab tu 'jigs pa'i zhal gdangs shing // gyen du skra brdzes gsus mo che// gtum mo dug hrul gos gyon ma// de byin tri shul phyag na bsnams// gzi chen rab tu 'jigs par mdzad// sku yang me
270a1(1): lce 'bar ba can// gdong dang mig ni khros pa'i tshul// phyag dang zhabs gnyis 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing
270a2(1): zhal// phyag g.yas dang po yab la 'khyud// bar pa rdo rje thugs khar gsor// mtha' ma yab kyi lto bar 'khyud// g.yon gyi dang po khro mdzub phyag rgya bsgreng // bar pa ban d+ha rak+tas bkang pa yab la stob// mtha'
270a3(1): ma tri shul dug gsum 'joms// bde gshegs sras kyi bka' sdod ma// yum chen ro langs pe ta la// yab kyi sku la dgyes par 'khril// rtse gcig bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa'i lha// dbang dang byin rlabs dngos
270a4(1): grub gsol// sdang dgra gnod bgegs thal bar rlog/ hUM/ 'jam dpal thugs las sprul pa'i sras// ya ma ra dza 'jigs pa'i sku// mthing nag spyan dmar mche ba gtsigs// na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa
270a5(1): gsol// dbu skra kham nag gyen du bsgreng // phyag na be chen sngon po bsnams// sdang dgra gnod bgegs thal bar rlog/ thod pa skam rlon 'phreng bas brgyan// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// gtso bo'i
270a6(1): bka' nyan las rnams byed// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad pho nyar 'gyed// dgra dpung shig la bdud dpung choms// 'di skad bstod bskul las rnams 'grub// ye shes lha rnams chos kyi dbyings nas
270b1(1): bskul// byin dbab dam tshig gnad nas bskul ba ni// hUM/ nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam pa'i dbyings nyid na// bcom ldan rdo rje khro rgyal gshed chen yab yum dang // rgyal ba'i sras bcas srungs ma dam tshig
270b2(1): can// mkha' 'gro tshogs dang bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal mchod// bdag ni rgyal srid mtho ris longs spyod dang // 'dod pa'i yon tan sgrub pa ma lags te// 'gro ba rnams la snying brtse sangs rgyas bstan pa
270b3(1): bsrungs// bstan pa 'jigs byed bsgral bar don brtson pa// ye shes sgrib med khyed kyis sa le mkhyen// bcom ldan 'jam dpal khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// tshe rabs sngon nas smon lam 'brel ba'i

270b5(1): rtse gcig rgyun gyis bdag la dgongs// bdag lus dum bu stong du gtubs gyur kyang // yi dam lha mchog khyod ni gtan mi gtong // mi srid srid pa'i dgra dang bgegs byung yang // khro rgyal mthu chen khyod

271a1(1): kyi dngos grub gsol// dus kyi bskal pa me chu rlung 'khrug kyang // khro rgyal khyod nyid gcig pus thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ nad mtshon mu ge'i bskal pa 'joms mdzad pa// gshin rje gshed chen

271a3(1): nas bskul// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po mchog gi rgyud las// gshin rje gshed la bstod cing dbyings nas bskul ba'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// ya
271a4(1): mA ra dzas 'di skad gsol// spyi yi don bshad klu nag po// de la gtad pa ji ltar lags// de skad zhus pas bka' stsal pa// zhus don rgyas bshad khyod nyon cig 'khor lo'i spyi don rgyas bshad pa// rnam pa
271a5(1): brgyad dang ma ldan na// 'khor lo bskor kyang don mi 'grub// spyi yi don brgyad gang zhe na// 'khor lo'i ka bzhi ma tshugs na// steng 'og sngags kyi ka ba rdi ba// las kyi gshin rje mun nag 'khor// las mi 'grub
271a6(1): pa'i skyon 'byung ngo // 'khor lo'i gdung bzhi ma 'dres na// 'khor lo kha sbyor gdung 'khrul te// gnad kyis mi tshugs skyon du 'gyur// 'khor lo'i gzer bzhi ma thebs na// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo lto bral
271b1(1): na// sngags pa'i 'khor du rkyen 'byung ngo // mtshon cha'i 'khor lo drag po yi// btsun phur bzhi dang ma ldan na// las kyis gshin rje gnas 'khyams nas// las byas don med rang 'khor 'gyur// de bzhin 'khor
271b2(1): lo spyir gces pas// 'khor lo'i don bzhi shes bya'o// de dag gang dang gang zhe na// ka ba bzhi zhes bya ba'i don// rtsa ba'i yig 'bru bzhi yin te// de don yid la gsal bya ba// rnam pa yi ge'i gzugs su

271b4(1): shes yon tan dang // rang rgyud rtsa ba'i sbubs nang nas// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // 'byung ba'i dngas ma bzhi gnas pas// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kyi// gzhi rten snying po byed pas na// de ni nyi ma bzhi
