272a1(1): ni// rten 'brel sbyor ba'i gzer zhes bya// 'khrul mig lcags mkhar gshin rje yin// bcu drug khang pa'i gzer zhes bya// drag po'i ting 'dzin rdzogs gsal ba// 'phra bdun dgongs pa'i gzer
272a2(1): zhes bya// 'khor lo'i bcun phur bzhi zhes pa// rnal 'byor dam ldan dbang rdzogs na// man ngag gdeng ldan rang nyams kyi// dgongs ldan sems kyi bcun phur ro// bsnyen pa bye ba tshad skyol te// phyi nang gsang
272a3(1): ba'i rtags ldan pas// las kyis gshin rje ma mo rnams// dbang med las la chud pa ni// rtsol ba ting 'dzin bcun phur ro// ye shes khro rgyal gshed stobs kyis// las kyi gshin rje ma mo rnams// rang dbang
272a4(1): med par las la tshud// 'khu ldog mi nus las byed pa// ye shes byin rlabs bcun phur ro// las kyi gshin rje ma mo rnams// srog nas bskul zhing las bcol te// dmod pa drag po'i sngags bzlas
272a5(1): pas// dgra bo rang dbang med pa ru// bla dang 'bral zhing srog gcod pas// drag po las kyi btsun phur ro// drag po gsad pa'i las dus su// drag sngags don bzhi shes par bya ba ni// 'phen par byed pa skyes
272a6(1): bu lta bu yi// drag po sngags don nges par ma shes na// bsgrub bya dmigs pa'i rgyud las mi bskyod do// myur bar 'gro skyon gzhu rgyud lta bu ma shes na// gzas pa'i yul la sngags kyi gzer mi 'phro// 'phang bya
272b1(1): drag po mdo 'dra'i drag sngags ma shes na// dmigs pa'i yul dang rgyud la mi 'phog go/ gcod byed mdo 'dra'i drag sngags ma shes na// don po'i rtsa dang srog gzungs mi chod do// de don gsal bar bshad de
272b2(1): zhes bya ba// 'phen byed skyes bu yi ge ya yin te// dbus kyi snying po ya las drangs nas bskor bas 'phen par 'gyur// skyod byed gzhu 'dra rkyen gyi ting nge 'dzin// 'phro 'du bying rgod ma song gsal ba'o// 'phang

273a1(1): dang / dug gsum ar gsad gtad pa dang / 'byung ba rnam lnga rtsad gcad dang // phung po lnga yi stobs gzhom dang // nang grol smad lnga gtub pa dang // dbang po tshogs drug sgo dgag dang // dwangs

273b1(1): drug po'i sbyor ba 'di// gshed kyi sgrub sngags thams cad kyi// spyi rgyug las kyi mtha' rgya yin// stag pa'i shing ngam ro ras la// sme ba lnga yis thang ba bya// sbu gu bya rog sgro rtsa yis// dug sna gdug pa'i khrag dang

274a1(1): sna dgu gtong // mig nas mtshon cha'i char pa 'bebs// kha rlung nad kyi bskal pa gtong // ro smad sbrul nag 'khyil ba la// shin tu 'jigs shing rngam par bsgom// klu bran thams cad pho nyar
274a2(1): 'gyed// phu dang hu yi'i sngags skra sgrogs// der bsgoms khro rgyal thugs kha nas// ye shes sngags kyi 'od re 'phros// klu yul rgya mtsho'i gling chen nas// klu rgyal 'khor bcas bkug la bstim// klu rgyal nag

274a6(1): skusbuskrags/ he he nA ga 'dus/ khram bam ba ru na tsi tsi rgyas/ kha khrag snying la rgyas/ bA ga ru pa ru pa/ hUM yaM ya phaT/ nA ga rA dza sa ma ya/ snying khrag dun dmugs dum dza dza/ mA ra ya myog rbad/ ces bzlas bye ba

275a1(1): sha rbad/ ka la sha pa ti bi ta rbad nan/ pa ru na be shan nA ga rbad/ na ga be sa be/ a kri ya nA ga dgra bo nan/ de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ gang yang myur du gsod byed do// gzhan yang mdze nad dbab

275b1(1): shun pa la'o// de nyid klu rgyal nag po'i sku// 'chi bdag nag por bskyed la bstim// mnga' gsol ngan sngags drod ldan 'das// gdug pa chen po'i gnas su sba// rang gis ma nyes dpang gzugs shing / kho
275b2(1): yis nyes pa'i dmod pa bor// klu rgyal gdug pa rnams la'o// lha yi ting 'dzin gsal bar bsgom// 'dis ni nag po'i bdud kyang gsod// srog chags mi rnams smos ci dgos// zla bzhis lus rul srog
275b3(1): 'chad nges// de dag drag sngags me dang 'dra// ting 'dzin ma yengs sgra gcad bzlas/ oM ka la ti pa tsa nA ga rak+ta rak+Sha rA dza/ tsan d+ha ma hA ba khre pa ya/ ti kra la ya/ ka la baM ri la tsi ti dza la rgyas/ tra ga thur tsi ta dzA
275b4(1): la khrag skyugs/ sha tru da ra da ra/ dgra bo tsit+ta tshal pa tshal pa/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ nA ga rak+ta rA dza/ sha truM snying khrag thum ri la/ mA ra ya rbad/ drag po'i las sbyor gang byed dang // snying bzhi ma nor
275b5(1): las byas na// las rnams 'grub par the tshom med// klu rgyal mdze nag 'khor lo 'dis// gang la bskor kyang rlag par byed// sngags pa dam nyams dbang ma thob// rdo rje slob dpon thugs ma mnyes// drag
275b6(1): sngags ma grub man ngag med// rang la ldog pa'i rtags byung na// log pa'i 'phar gnon sbyor ba bya// sbal sbrul sdig pa kha gdangs dang // ba dmar glang dmar ru 'dar 'bu// sbrul chen brang brdung ngu pa
276a1(1): dang // 'khor lo 'bar ba mthong na bzlog de dus log pa 'phar gnon bya// bdag nyid khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// dbu la bya rgyal khyung chen lding // gser lus 'khor lo mtshon gshog pa// rdo
276a2(1): rje'i mchu la gnam lcags sder// thugs khar rdo rje gsang bdag bsgom// mthing nag rigs drug sbrul gyis brgyan// khros tshul rdo rje sbrul zhags bsnams// thal chen phag tshil lus byug bdug/ spu dang bla ba'i
276a3(1): go bgo brab// klu rgyal 'chi bdag nag po ni// 'khor bcas bka' nyan las byed mngags// klu yi dug gsum shing lcags brab// srid pa'i klu gnyen gdug pa can// ma lus khro rgyal gshed po yis// sprul pa'i
276a4(1): khro chung bsam mi khyab// skar ltar 'khrug pa rnams kyis dkrug/ nyin mtshan pho mo lto dkrug bya// klu rnams dbang med las la bcug/ gnas sa dkrug nas dgra srog gcod// rang la ldog pa dgra la 'gro// des
276a5(1): na log pa 'phar non no// drag sngags me lce gong ltar brdeg/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// klu la gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya dgu bcu tham pa'o// // de nas ya ma rA dza yis// rdo rje 'chang chen
276a6(1): la gsol pa// 'jam dpal thugs kyi 'od zer las// spros pa'i khro bo dregs pa can// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// cha bzung sprul pa de dag gis// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// chu
276b1(1): 'khyags dbab pa bshad du gsol// de skad gsol bas bka' stsal pa// zhus don ngas bshad khyed nyon cig/ khro rgyal gshin rje gshed po yis// ya ma rA dza myos byed 'bar// dmar po ral pa tshar dgu
276b2(1): ste// drag po gshed chen bzhi rnams bskul// de ni las kyi gshin rje bzhi// chos kyi rgyal po ya ba ti// a ba glang mgo bdud 'joms rje// rang dbang med par las la bskul// des ni tshangs pa drag po
276b3(1): dang // nye dbang khyab 'jug las la bskul// des ni lha bdud ma mo klu// dmu btsan la sogs sde brgyad kyi// dregs pa can rnams las la 'jug/ de yang ji lta bu zhe na// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed po
276b4(1): yi// thugs las sprul pa'i gshed chen bzhi// ya ma rA dza las mkhan sbrul// gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po yin// de yi sprul pa tshangs pa lha// myos byed 'bar ba las mkhan sbrul// gshin rje a ba glang mgo
276b5(1): can// de yi sprul pa drag po yin// ar+ya dmar po las mkhan sbrul// gshin rje ya ba ya ti rje// de yi sprul pa nye dbang po// ral pa tshar dgu'i las mkhan sbrul// gshin rje rdo rje bdud 'joms rje// de yi sprul
276b6(1): pa khyab 'jug yin// de dag las mkhan sprul pa ni// gling bzhi kun la dbang sgyur ba'i// lha bdud rgyal po gnod sbyin dang // dmu btsun srin po klu sa bdag las kyi mkha' 'gro ma mo dang // srin mo bdud mo
277a1(1): stong khri 'bum// sde brgyad pho mo thams cad do// gshin rje gshed pos gshed bzhi bskul// gshed bzhis las kyi gshin rje bskul// las kyi gshin rjes lha bzhi bskul// lha bzhis snang srid wA
277a2(1): 'dre bskul// srid pa gsum gyi rtsi 'bras la// chu 'khyags bskal pa'i skyi 'dang 'bebs// tshangs pas sum cu rtsa gsum nas// tshangs ris man chad 'khrug par byed// dbang phyug chen po rgyal chen bzhi// ri

277a5(1): dregs pa'i lha rnams ni// smin ma khro gnyer glog ltar 'gyu// zhal gyi rngam sgra 'brug sgrogs pa// spyan nas khrag gi thog gzer 'bebs// shangs nas rlung nag tshub mar 'khyil// tshems nas gnam lcags bu
277a6(1): yug 'bebs// zhal gyi ngang rlangs sprin du 'thibs// ljags dang gzi mdangs glog tu 'gyu// gnam nas bskal pa'i 'brug chen sgrogs// zhal chab chu 'khyags skyi 'dang 'bebs// srid gsum thog ser
277b1(1): bskal pas 'gengs// de ltar thog ser 'bebs byed pa// gzhi ni klu yis rting pas klu gdug bsdigs// dmag dpon gshin rjes byed pas gshin rje bsgrub// dbang ni lha yis byed pas lha rgod
277b2(1): gdul// g.yos ni ma mos byed pas ma mo brten// rgyab nas bdud kyis byed pas bdud rnams dkrug/ rgyab ni gza' yis byed pas gza' rgod bskul// sna 'dren gnod sbyin byed pas gnod sbyin rbad// byad
277b3(1): mkhan lha ma yin gyis byed pas lha min bkol/ kha lo dri zas sbyar bas dri za mngag/ phung bar srin pos byed pas gzan la dbab// de ltar drag po'i lha rnams kyis// gang la dmigs pa'i yul khams su// chu
277b4(1): 'khyags thog ser bskal pa 'bebs// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung phyir ro// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud kyi snying po las// lha ngos bzung ba'i le'u ste drug brgya lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen
277b5(1): gyis// de dag mngag pa'i sbyor ba bshad// dben la nyams dga'i dur khrod dben// lha srin thams cad 'du gnas su// rten 'brel sa la maN+Dal rtsig/ gang 'bebs yul gyi rdzas kyis byug/ de stengs thod pa
277b6(1): mtshan ldan du// 'bru sna tshogs dang sha chen dang // sha sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bca'// mon pa'i rabs chad nag po'am// thod pa mtshan ngan gling bzhi'i bar// gshin rje bzhi yi rten pa'i rdzas// las byed
278a1(1): bsregs pa'i rdzas dgod de// gling gcig la ni tshangs pa'i rdzas// khri dkar sna dmar snying la dgod// gling gcig la ni khyab 'jug rdzas// tsa ra rog po'i tsit+ta dgod// gling gcig dbang phyug

278a4(1): pa dkar po be con thogs// drag po mgo dgu dud ka ba// zor ba zhag pa ro smad sbrul// nye dbang dmar nag thod khrag 'phen// khyab 'jug nag po ral gri thogs// gnam lcags thog gi bu yug ma// nag mo

278b1(1): cing skon pas 'phyag/ lo thog thams cad rlag par byed// de ltar bsgoms la drag sngags bzlas// drag sngags sgra bcad bzlas lugs ni// dang por yang snying rtsa sngags drang // de nas bsgrub pa'i drag
278b2(1): sngags drang // mtha' mar dbab pa'i drag sngags drang // de grub rtags kyi rim pa ni// chu rdzing chen por bskyil ba dang // 'khyags pas gtams dang chu chen 'brub// mi nag mang po bud med mang // skya shar

278b6(1): badz+ra ma hA tsaN+Da d+ha sarba duSh+Tan ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ ru tra phrom/ dud kar phrom/ shu ti phrom/ yu ma phrom/ badz+ra kha rin tra b+h+yo/ ya ma pa tra ha sha ma na b+h+yo/ d+harma d+hA du b+h+yo/ de ba yak+Sha pra dun b+h+yo/ rag sha pra ka mo na b+h+yo/
279a1(1): nA ga hu ya sta na ya b+h+yo/ yag sha kha rag dun b+h+yo/ hri yag sha shag tra b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu dun b+h+yo/ oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya dza ni ra

279b1(1): gdab// 'khrul mig lnga dang gsang mdzod bzhi// phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu gnyis ldan// yang log drug gnyis chu ri'i mkhar// de la gnas shing dgod pa ni// dbus su skyi 'dang rlung chen 'bru// gshed

279b6(1): 'joms// chu ri kha la nub phyogs su// gshed chen Ar+ya dmar po dang // ya ba ya ta'i snying po ste// ha las skyi 'dang 'bru gsum 'phros// shu dang ti dang phrom dang gsum// dbang phyug nye dbang mtshon cha
280a1(1): ste// nub phyogs thog dang bcud la dbang // nub phyogs lo thog 'joms par byed// chu ri kha la byang phyogs su// gshed chen ral pa tshar dgu dang // rdo rje bdud 'joms snying po ste// k+Sha las spyi
280a2(1): 'dang 'bru gsum 'phros// ya dang ma dang phrom dang gsum// khyab 'jug nag po'i mtshon cha ste// byang phyogs lo thog bcud la dbang // byang phyogs lo thog 'bras bu 'joms// tha ma'i chu ri zlum po la// dbab
280a3(1): pa'i drag sngags grangs med bskor// rtsibs mtshan ser srun yul ming bri// sngags bdag bzhi yi 'phang bar gzhug/ 'khor lo byin rlabs rta dmar gzhug/ rta thod zor gyi thod pa la// dbab sngags 'khor lo

280a6(1): pho mo thams cad kun// rang dbang med par las la bskul// lo thog thams cad rlag byed bsam// chu rgod 'khyags pa'i 'khor lo las// chu 'khyags bskal pa'i ri bstims nas// lo thog rdul du brlag par
280b1(1): bsam// bdag nyid ya man ta ka yis// las kyi gshin rje gshed bzhi bskul// des ni dregs pa rnam bzhi bskul// lha chen tshangs pa'i thugs kha nas// raM las me yi 'khor lo 'phros// dregs pa gza'

281a1(1): rgod rgyu dus la// klu yi chu mig gnyen po ru// klad la gsum bskor 'o dod 'bod// gtor ma dang ni zor rgyab na// 'bros long med par yul khams kun// skyi 'dang rlung gis khyer bar

281b2(1): phob/ dang por bsnyen pa rtsa ba'i sngags/ grub par bzlas te las byas na// chu 'khyags bskal pa'i spyi 'dang 'bebs// rnal 'byor dbang dang ldan pas spyad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa yang snying gsang ba'i

281b6(1): rtsibs brgyad ljang khur bya// ra rog pad+mar snying la brten// thod pa mtshan ldan gling bzhi par// sha rus khrag rus btsos dang rjen// la phug til sman gtor ma bsham// 'khar gzhong dkar gsum mngar gsum
282a1(1): dang // gu gul klu sman 'bras bu gsum// 'bras chen po yi gtor ma bsham// rabs chad la sogs thod pa ru// mi rta ra khyi mngal khrag sogs// dug dang sngo sna yungs kar gnag/ zi ra skye tshe
282a2(1): zor thun rdzas// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad la// sngags bris dug khrag ngar blud la// gru gsum mthing nag dbus su gzugs// dus brgyad rang rang rdzas brgyad bca'// yul ming dbyibs dang lha klu
282a3(1): dang // ser srun ming dang lo thog sngo// bsnol gri'i thod par sngags dang bcas// de ltar dam rdzas 'tshogs par bya// bdag nyid khro rgyal chen por bskyed// rtsa ba'i snying po 'bum drang bstod// gru gsum dbus
282a4(1): su hUM las kyang // gza' bdud chen po mgo dgu pa// dud kha zor ba chu srin zhags// mgo lus mig khengs ro smad sbrul// glog 'byin 'brug sgrogs bu yug 'tshub// rlung nag chu 'khyags skyi gdangs

282a6(1): bstim// rtsa sngags zhabs la mchod sngags btags// gtor ma sha khrag mchod pa 'bul// nyin mtshan gnam sa gtor ma btab// yang na mchod pa'i las gzhung bsrang // khyab 'jug snying po rab sngags
282b1(1): bskor// bdag nyid thugs kyi 'od zer gyis// 'phro 'dus mchod phul thugs dam bskul// bkrag mdangs mthu stobs bdag dbang 'dus// de ltar sum yar mchod dbul bzlas// sgra bcad drod rtags tshad
282b2(1): mas dbab// mi nag zor thogs rlung nag 'tshub// me 'bar sha rgal chu chen 'khrug/ dngos su mthong ba chu dri bya// de bzhin stong tshogs mchod pa dbul// dgra yul la sogs 'bras bu btab// dgra yul nam
282b3(1): mkhar skyi 'dang gi/ chu 'khyags 'khor lo 'khyil cing 'phro// lha nyid gsal bas drag tu bzlas// lug khyu ser po dngos su 'bab// mi nag zor thogs lo thog rnga// skya shar ber thogs g.yul byed dang // skyi
282b4(1): 'dangs sha rgal mang po yis// lung pa dmar zangs bkrus pa 'byung // 'khyag pa rgya mtsho rba rlabs 'tshub// rtags de byung nas dbab par bya/ oM ra hA la a kro ya ra la shag ti hril hril shig shig dun b+h+yo/ oM pa
282b5(1): sha mi ki du ru ma shi ki dza la ti a ta swA hA/ o tsa pa ti ra hA la ma hA kro d+ha ka ta sha ra/ sha wA sha ra hUM phaT/ ya ma snying ya ma khrag ra hA la thil thil shig shig phen ya thil b+h+yo/ su badz+ra yak+Sha ke ta/ badz+ra yak+ka pr-i pr-i/
282b6(1): drag po dbab pa'i las dag ni// bdag nyid ye shes khro rgyal sku// las byed gza' rgod bka' sdod pa// gang byed kho dang sdongs la dbab// gang 'bebs yul gyi rten rdzas la// thun dang drag sngags brdeg cing
283a1(1): dbab// tshes bzhi'i sod la nub phyogs nas// shar du kha bltas drag sngags bzlas// nyungs nag thog lcags phur pas brdeg/ nam mkha' dpangs stod kham nag sprin// nag mo 'jigs tshul
283a2(1): ral pa can// thod pa'i khrag 'thor ma mor sprul// rlung khrag thog dang rdzi kha sgyur// ma ma sa ma ya tra ga rak+Sha ma tri ga na sa kha ya ku ru/ te tse b+ha la a yu ta ra ha ra da ra/ un ma naM ni sh+tsa truM na sha ya ni dza dza phob//
283a3(1): ljaldang sngon chen po'i drag sngags so// tshes brgyad nyi dros shar lho nas// nub byang kha bltas drag sngags bzlas// nyungs kar bya rgod gshog phur brdeg sngo skya gri thogs 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rlung zhon skyod byed
283a4(1): dgra blar sbrul// lto tshil sprin 'dra ser pa sgra// tri dkar dul dul// snying khrag la ri la ril// chom chom rtsal thun shig lo thog mA ra ya dza pho ba// drang srong khros pa'i drag sngags so// bcu gcig 'jing la byang
283a5(1): phyogs nas// lho ru kha bltas drag sngags bzlas// nyungs nag gri lcags phur pas brdeg/ nag po ri nag zhags pa thogs// rta nag zhon te bdud du sbrul// sems can gzugs 'dra shing lo'i sprin// dus min
283a6(1): mtshan ma mang po byung // ru tra tri ni ra tri ran tri ya/ ma tri ya b+h+yo/ khaM khaM so baM rbad/ lo thog la thun dza ni dza/ pho ba/ rog ti bdud nag drag sngags so/ bco lnga nyi phyed lho nub nas// byang shar kha bltas drag sngags
283b1(1): bzlas/ sha rul khrag rul mchog phur brdeg/ sngo skya mche gtsigs sdang mig bgrad// 'jigs byed za tshul mda' gzhu thogs// mdug shing g.yag 'dra'i sprin 'byung zhing // rlung nag 'tshub mar bcas te
283b2(1): 'ong // ma hA tsan d+ha rag sha/ tri tha tri mA ra ya thA/ ru tri mA ra ya/ lo thog la tri b+h+yo phob/ pi ti pa ta'i drag sngags so// bco brgyad nam phyed yol ba la// shar nas nub tu kha ltas bzlas// ngar khrag seng ldeng
283b3(1): phur thun brdeg/ dmar po khrag thig dgra sta thogs// 'jigs tshul gang zhon dmu ru sbrul// phying ba brkyang 'dra sprin nag 'khrug/ rmu tri tsan d+ha dum bu dum bu/ kha la rak+ka thum ri li li/ kha sha baM ra ka sha staM bruM ri
283b4(1): li li phob/ ha li ka li drag sngags so// nyi shu gnyis kyi nyi ma bsnur// nub byang mtshams nas shar lhor bltas// sngags bzlas skye tshe rkang phur brdeg/ nag po 'jigs tshul 'khor lo thogs// dregs pa'i gtso
283b5(1): bo gshin rjer sbrul// srin mdog dmar nag hral hral po// glog dang 'brug sgra ches te 'ongs// ya ma rA dza yaM raM/ ya ma tsan d+ha ri da dza la tsakra d+ha ra na sha ya/ dgra yul ni du mA ra ya phob phob chom chom shig b+h+yo/
283b6(1): du ba mjug rings drag sngags so// nyi shu lnga yi skya rengs la// lho nas byang du kha bltas bzlas// tsa ra dmar po'i khrag thun dang // bya mtshal pu yi gshog phur brdeg/ dmar po sbrul zhags thogs pa
284a1(1): 'jigs// sbrul nag 'khyil ba zhon nas rgyug/ sprin dmar hral thibs glog dang bcas// na ga rA man Ni na ya ya Ni na ta nA ga dza sha ti sa na d+ha ra shu na tsi ta b+hasmi ku ru dgra yul du b+h+yo phob/ khyab
284a2(1): 'jug chen po'i drag sngags so// nyi shu dgu yi nyi ma mdung gang na// byang shar mtshams nas lho nub kha bltas zlas// sha rul khrag rul ra mchin thun du brdeg/ dud kha mgo dgu ro smad sbrul// zor ba chu srin
284a3(1): zhags thogs sbrul// rlung nag 'tshub ma dud kha'i sprin 'brug 'byung // ma hA b+he d+he pa tra bi nu tsan d+ha ru pi ni ra hu la dgra bo'i lo thog la b+huny+dza ho kha hi he ka li ma hA tsan d+ha ma rA ya dza dza phob/ sgra gcan 'dzin gyi drag
284a4(1): sngags so// tsa ba ti ra hU la pho ba/ kri tI kro la sha phob/ ra dza thal ba ni phob/ hu ru hu ru pho ba/ ma ma raM raM ri la ri la phob/ sha ra sha lta nA ga phob/ nA ga li nA ga li pho ba/ dul nal dul na la phob/ ta ka ra dza ti pa
284a5(1): tsi ti phob/ rak+Sha dud phrom/ kar phrom phob/ li tsa rbad phrom phob/ drag po sngags kun spu gri yin// de ltar drag po'i sngags bstan pa// 'di ni tho zhes lung ston nam// mtshan ma bzang po byung ba na// rta ma yul
284a6(1): rten bcud la gzhug/ gzer gdab drag po'i gsum nyid do// gzer gdab lo la drag tu mdog/ dus brgyad drag sngags bsdebs la gtong // klu sogs lha btsan yul bdag la// gdug pa can gyi shing me
284b1(1): sbar// dkar dmar sngo thabs bskol la sbub// thal 'jim gtor zhing drag ru rbad// des ni chu 'khyags skyi 'dang 'bebs// srid pa 'jig pa tsam du 'byung // dam tshig dbang thob the tshom med// drag po'i skyi
284b2(1): 'dang sbyor ba 'dis// gnam sa thams cad 'khrug par byed// dus kyi bskal pa'i skyi 'dang 'bebs// ri rab bskul zhing rgya mtsho bskor// chu rgod 'khyags pa ra tir gtibs// gang dmigs lo thog rdul du
284b3(1): rlog/ rtsi thog bcud sdud rno dpal mtshon// 'phra men las kyi sbyor ba can// gang 'dod nges par 'grub par 'gyur// yang gsang brnag pa'i las su bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong gsang ba'i rgyud las/ chu
284b4(1): 'khyags drag po'i le'u ste drug brgya lnga bcu gsum mo// // de nas sprul pa'i rdo rje yis// khyab 'jug las kyi sbyor ba bshad// sbrul sngon dag gi shun pa yi// nang du rten 'brel rdzas blugs la// yul lha yul
284b5(1): srung ser srun gyi// ming rus klu gnyen la sogs gzhug/ thod pa kha sbyar ga'u ru// 'khyil ba'i tshul du btsugs byas la// yul rdzas maN+Dal steng du bzhag/ sha ru la nya rul khrag rul dang // ra mchin btsos rjen
284b6(1): gu gul gnag/ la phug til sgog pha dang 'thun// sngags bzlas mtshan mo gdab par bya// dkar gsum mngar gsum klu sman tshogs// gu gul 'bras chan ma dang mthun// sngags bzlas nyin zhing gdab par
285a1(1): bya// ra rog mi snying rang gi rdzas// sngags bzlas dgongs ka nam nangs gdab// gri zod 'khar gzhong nang du blugs// ye shes khro bo'i sku gnas te// khyab 'jug sde brgyad las la mngag/ dus
285a2(1): tshod brgyad la gtor ma sbyin// dmigs pa'i lo thog bsam la dbul// grub rtags mthong nas thun brab dbab// stong thon ga 'ur rdzas kyis brab// de nas lha srin sde brgyad kyis// sprul pa drag sngags brgyad
285a3(1): kyis brdeg/ zla gcig dus brgyad phyogs nas gdong // ling ga gang rgyu'i gdong phyogs bzhag thun rdzas brab cing phur pas gdab// tshes grangs thim nas grub rtags 'byung // sngags par mchod cing gtor ma
285a4(1): dbul// traka ra ka sha ra ka mo hril shag rbad/ ser hril shar b+h+yo/ nal bu dang ni da me sha'i gtor ma sbyin/ ma mor sprul pa'i drag sngags so// oM a le ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma ma trag rag sha hril shar b+h+yo/ rgya tshos rtsi
285a5(1): mar ra lug dkar// sha khrag 'o ma'i gtor ma sbyin// dgra lha'i rgyal mo'i drag sngags so// oM pa sha mi ki ra hu la hUM shag shar shar hril b+h+yo/ ra lug nag po'i sha khrag dang // 'bru nag po yi gtor ma
285a6(1): sbyin// bdud nag sprul pa'i drag sngags so// oM ser shar khrag la mu sha gtubs sA hA rak+kha se b+h+yo/ sha chen sha sna'i gtor ma sbyin// srin po sha zan drag sngags so// oM raM taM thun/ shag thum ri la raM shar b+h+yo/ ra rgya
285b1(1): lug spug smug bya yi/ sha khrag 'bru sna'i gtor ma sbyin// sprul pa dmu yi drag sngags so// ya ma rA dza raM raM hri la hri shar raM b+h+yo/ mi sha rta sha bdud rtsi khrag/ sbyar ba 'bru sna'i gtor ma sbyin// sprul pa gshin rje'i drag
285b2(1): sngags so// oM nA ga hril shag sen shag sang dun sa ma ya hril b+h+yo/ klu sman dkar gsum mngar gsum dang // ra dmar sha khrag gtor ma sbyin// klu btsan sprul pa'i drag sngags so// oM ya ma snying ya ma khrag ra hu
285b3(1): la hril hril shig shig sen se na ya ya b+h+yo b+h+yo/ raM raM hril hril b+h+yo/ rdzas kun 'tshogs pa'i gtor ma sbyin// bgegs kyi rgyal po'i drag sngags so// de ltar drag sngags rdzogs pa dang // sbrul sngon zhing dbul klu la
285b4(1): gzhug/ gnam gzer sa gzer bar gzer gsum// rtse bskyed dbus dang kha 'dren tshul// dmar ring dus la zor 'phang dbab// dkar zab dmar zab sngo zab gsum// gsum du bcas la gcig tu
285b5(1): dbul// 'dis ni chu 'khyags skyi 'dang 'bebs// pha ni srin po'i drang song ste// ma ni klu mo ha sham tri// bu ni nag po ra hu la// yab ni yag sha glog 'phreng can// yum ni sbal mgo khrag mig ma// bu ni gza'
285b6(1): bdud ke'u kang bdag/ gnam lcags lce 'bab rmu rdo dang // chu 'khyags mi phyugs nad 'bebs so// dug sna khrag sna gu gul gnag/ zangs 'khar thog lcags phye ma la// bsngags te yul gyi lha rten dang // chu
286a1(1): mig gnyen po la sbas na// yul de ring po mi thogs par// skyi 'dang rlung gis 'khyer bar 'gyur// rdzas de dag la ril bur byas// sngags bzlas dgra yi khang 'gram sba/ khang thog sbas te zor
286a2(1): brgyab na/ khang pa 'jig cing 'gas par 'gyur// rdzas de dag la sngags btab ste/ chu mig byang bltas nang sbas na// gang 'dod shra dang ser ba 'ong // srin rdo mkhar ba thog lcags la// sngags bzlas dug
286a3(1): rgod sna sbyar te// brag nag byang bltas gseb sbas te// rdzas zor don po'i mkhar la brde ba// drag po'i thog chen 'bebs par 'gyur// chu srin sder mo 'bru sna tshogs// 'brug rus khrag sna la mngags
286a4(1): te// 'og tu sbas te phyogs bcur gtor// ser pa khrag tu 'bab par 'gyur// dred zhab mang ga ya ti la// sngags bzlas gtor na thog bzlog 'gyur// nyungs kar rdzas sbyar sngags bzlas te// gtor sha rgal
286a5(1): dang ser ba bzlog/ de dag sbyor ba'i las yin no// gzhan yang gnam lcags 'bar ba yi// drag sngags sbyor ba bshad pa ni// rtsa ba'i bsgrub pa gong bzhin du// bsnyen pa'i drod rtags thob pa des// khyad par
286a6(1): gnam lcags dbab pa ni// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa dang // mon thod srubs drug kha sbyar te// gri khrag dug snas drag sngags bri// mi phyugs thog grir shi ba yi// snying dang khrag sna khrag sna tshogs// thog/
286b1(1): lcags gri lcags khro chu dang // gser zangs 'khar ba lcags phye rdul// 'brug skyugs glog rjes ra rog khrag/ thog grir shi ba'i sha rus khrag/ dug sna tshogs dang gri khrag blugs// thod pa'i dkyil du sde brgyad
286b2(1): dbab sngags bri// mtha' mar dgra bo'i ming rus lo khams bri// rgyu drug ling ga ming byang thod par brnag/ nyungs kar nyungs nag skye che'i thun gyis brag/ ling ga sbyar zhing sde brgyad sngags thun brdeg/ zhing chen
286b3(1): pags la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// dbus su brnag pa'i rtsibs la sde brgyad sngags// bkod la sngags bzlas rtags 'di 'byung // rdzas la me 'bar rdzas zhu me stag 'thor// cog sgra dngos su byung na 'khor
286b4(1): lo thod par bcas// thog rta brnag pa'i mkhar gyi 'gram la sba// ki kang rgyu dus brgyad la thog zer dgra la 'phang // gri mda' 'ug srin khra yi sgro yis sgron/ gri zod mde'u bcug la mda' zor thod zor 'phang //
286b5(1): lha dang sprul pas thog chen bskal pa 'babs// dgra bo lus sogs rdul phran tsam du brlag/ 'dis ni gnam lcags thog chen nges par 'bebs// 'ur chem mA ra ya nis nis kha la rbad du dza dza/ badz+ra dz+wa la raM mA
286b6(1): ra ya rbad/ ra hA la ma hA kha la rag sha hril hril 'brug 'brug thog thog rum thog ram thog chem chem shad shad nal na la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ke'u kang b+h+yo/ drag por pho ba/ thog thog tshal tshal/ thum thum/ ri la li li rbad rbad/
287a1(1): srog la nal la nal shig shig mA ra ya phaT/ gnam lcags thog chen sbyor bar bshad// gsad pa'i drag sngags sbyor ba ni// gong bzhin bsnyen bsgrub rtsa ba yi// bca' thabs la sogs
287a2(1): rtags thob bya// khyad par phung sa'i 'brub khung la// dug sna shi khrag sna tshogs byug/ de na rabs chad gri thod du// rgyu rten drug gi ling ga ni// sor brgyad dbang po yan lag rdzogs// snying khar ming bris dpral
287a3(1): bar rus// lte bar bla dgas snying khar nr-i// shi khrag gro ga la bris gzhug/ sngags pa ye shes khro bo'i sku// khyab 'jug las mkhan sdongs la brdeg/ ling ga dgra bo dngos su gsal// thun rdzas nad mtshon tsha tshar
287a4(1): 'phros// lus srog rdul phran tsam du brlag/ gsal bas ling ga bsgyur zhing bzlas// drag sngags brgya na thun brdeg cing // gtor ma gsum yar dgra bo yi// sha khrag dngos su dmigs la dbul// srog chags
287a5(1): bsad bcing sha dgos na// grub pa'i rtags de sbyor kha bya// zla gcig dus tshod brgyad la brdeg/ thon nas ling ga 'khor lor bcas// khram zod dregs bcing gdugs pa yi// lha 'dre mi bzad pa la
287a6(1): gtad// zhing chen shun la dug khrag gis// rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo dbus su ming // rtsibs brgyad drag sngags chen brgyad dgod// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo srog gcod bsam// dus brgyad kha gso zor 'phang
287b1(1): bskul// des ni gang yang srog gcod 'gyur// srog la hu la bruM ril tsit+ta shag rbad ma ra ya dbugs la thums thums// snying tshal pa mA ra ya rbad/ thum ri li li b+h+yo/ laM suM baM snyam pa ya nan/ lha yi tshe dang ldan pa
287b2(1): yang / skad cig yud la gsod 'gyur na/ srog chags gzhan la smos ci dgos/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ khyab 'jug chen po drag sngags kyi le'u ste drug brgya lnga bcu bzhi
287b3(1): pa'o// // de nas sangs rgyas spyi dpal mchog/ bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen la// gsang bdag rdo rjes yang gsol pa// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags bdag/ chos sku'i ngang las gzugs sku bzhengs// khro
287b4(1): rgyal dpal chen he ru ka'i// thugs kyi snying po mchog 'dus pa'i// drag sngags sbyor ba bshad du gsol// de skad gsol bas yang gsungs pa// rdo rje gsang bdag la sogs nyon// dpal chen he ru ka la
287b5(1): sogs// khro bo 'dus pa'i drag sngags ngas bshad do// chos nyid skye med rnam par dag/ rang byung ye shes rang gsal dang // mu mtha' dngos med ma bcos pa// chos kyi dbyings nyid skye 'gag med// gdod nas
287b6(1): gnas pa'i bde chen po// de nyid ngang las rang shar ba// gdul bya thugs rje gdul dka'i phyir// zhi dang khros pa'i sku ru snang // de nyid gdul bya'i sems can la// thugs rje chen po gnyis su skyes// theg
288a1(1): pa thun mong thugs rje gsum// 'gro drug sems can thams cad kun// sdug bsngal dang bral ba de la dgod// sems can la dmigs thugs rje'o// bdag med gnyis su dag par gsal// chos
288a2(1): la dmigs pa'i thugs rje'o// chos kun rang bzhin dngos po med// dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje'o// thun mong ma yin thugs rje bzhi// rtag pa rgyun du skye ba ni// chu bo chen po'i gzhung dang 'dra// rang bzhin

288a4(1): ltar thugs rje cher skyes nas// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i mdzod// rab 'byams bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs// de dag snying po don dril ba// sangs rgyas khro rgyal kun 'dus pa'i// drag sngags don
288a5(1): kun 'grub byed 'di// thun mong gang brtsams las rnams 'grub// khyad par bla med byang chub thob// dbang thob dam tshig ldan pas spyad// de ma yin na dngos mi 'grub// de dag sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// ri bo
288a6(1): dgu 'dus ri phran 'dus// shar gyi mdangs 'phrog nub zer len// ljon shing me tog dur khrod gling // rtse mo gnam rnyog lhun rdengs che// nyams dga' byin che'i gnas mchog der// dge bcu spyad cing sbyin
288b1(1): gtor btang // mdo sde gsung bsgrags tshogs 'khor bya// gnas sa de nyid maN+Dal bya// chu gtsang sman spos bdud rtsis byugs// nir ba kha dog lnga phyis la// rigs lngar byin brlabs dkyil 'khor bri// 'khor
288b2(1): lo rtsibs bzhi rtsibs bcu la// dbus mthing phyogs mtshon bzhi mtshams mdzes// rtsibs bcu dmar ser rtsibs mtshan ljang // bar khyams sgo bzhi phyogs bzhin te// shar dkar nub dmar lho ser po// byang
288b3(1): ljang rtsig pa lnga dang ldan// 'dod yon pha gu dra phyed dang // rta babs lugs bzhin rdo rje ma// lte ba thod rlon rtsibs bzhi skam// rtsibs bcu rdo rje'i ra bar ldan// dbus su thog lcags mchog phur dgod// he ru
288b4(1): ka dpal yab yum bskyed// rtsibs bzhir gri lcags shi shing dang // seng ldeng mchog phur bzhi dgod de// rigs bzhi'i he ru ka ru bskyed// rtsibs bcur seng ldeng skyer pa sogs// phung po khro bcu yab yum
288b5(1): bskyed// dur khrod rgyan 'gram bris sku 'gram// dung chen mtshan bzangs nang nyid du// steng du che mchog he ru ka/ 'og tu kro d+hi shwa ri yum// sku dang sngags dang bris rab gnas bya// nang du don chen sngags bris
288b6(1): dang // bdud rtsi rin chen sman sna tshogs// gsang ba'i dam rdzas dbus su gzhag/ 'bru sna tshogs kyi gtor ma la// sha chen la sogs sha sna tshogs// brgyan pa snod bzang bskang mchod rdzas// bdud rtsi rak+ta phyi
289a1(1): mchod lnga// gzhan yang phungs gsum la sogs// ri rgod sa la klu chus sbyar// 'brub khung gru gsum sum brtsegs pa// khru gang rgyal mtho gang dpangs/ kha khyer dang po thod pas bskor// bar pa
289a2(1): rtser tsang srin mo 'gros// mtha' ma rigs bzhi sbrul gyis bskor// nang du dug sna khrag sna bsku// phyi ru dur khrod sol bas byugs// gzhan yang dri thod mon thon dang // sbrang khu phag pa'i thod pa ru// yungs kar
289a3(1): yungs nag skye tse dang // gri khrag mi rta khyi khrag sogs// dug rgod dar dug spyang dug sogs// rdo lcags zangs phye tsher ma'i tshogs// thod pa re ru ma 'dres bsham// dgra bsad rgyu rten drug la bya// bgegs
289a4(1): gzir sa chu rtsa shing rdo// de la ling ga dbang po dang // ming byang snying po snying khar brnag/ mdze thod bcug la dong du brnag 'khor lo drag po bskor zhing bca'// de nas sngags pa dbang bgrod pas// dam srungs
289a5(1): gdan bas na brtan par bya// chos nyid ma bcos skye med dbyings// sems nyid 'od gsal dag pa'i las// yi ge hUM dang rdo rje nyid// yongs su gyur las sku bskyed pa// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i
289a6(1): sku// khro rgyal che mchog he ru ka/ chos nyid ma bcos 'gyur med pas// sku mdog mthing nag rngam zhing brjid// dbu dgu theg pa dgu don ldan// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing rtsa// g.yas ser g.yon
289b1(1): ljaldang sngo skya dbus// dbus ldang g.yas smug g.yon dud kha// g.yas gsum 'dzum bzhad mche ba gtsigs// g.yon gsum tshems bsdams rngam pa'i gdong // dbus gsum zhal gdangs 'jigs tshul
289b2(1): can// kun kyang spyan gsum sma ra ser// dbu skra kham nag thod skam brgyan// sangs rgyas chos nyid ma 'dres pa// bco brgyad stong nyid mtshon pa'i phyir// phyag rgya bco brgyad phyag mtshan ni// dang po rdo rje dung
289b3(1): dmar 'khrug/ gnyis pa zhing chung snying sbram bsnams// gsum pa zhing dbyug ril med bsnams// bzhi pa be con rgyu zhags bsnams// lnga pa zla ba nyi ma bsnams// drug pa khyung dang 'ug pa bsnams// bdun pa
289b4(1): me dpung rlung 'khor lo// brgyad pa ri rab rgya mtsho khol// dgu pa rin chen ga'u bsnams// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa phyag rgya bzhi// rnam thar brgyad ldan zhabs brgyad bgrad// thod rlon 'phreng ba'i do shal
289b5(1): brgyan// rigs bzhi sbrul dang rin po ches// dbu dang phyag zhabs snyan char brgyan// glang chen ko rlon zhing chen stod// stag gi sham bu rus pa'i brgyan// tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug che// khyab 'jug pad smad
289b6(1): gdan du mdzad// nyi zla pad+ma gdan du 'bar// rdo rje gshog pa nam mkhar ldengs// me dpung klong na rngam brjid khro// snying po phyag rgya 'os du 'bar// chu las nya 'phar bzhin du bsgom// g.yon na shes rab yum
290a1(1): chen mo// dpal 'bar kro d+hi shwa ri ni// mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug ma// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing khro// dang po kha T+wAM dung dmar
290a2(1): stob// bar pa 'khor lo rgya gram bsnams// tha ma spu gri gsal shing 'dzin// btud de dge sbyor tshul du gzhug dpal chen bla med he ru ka'i// dbu la kun tu bzang po bzhugs// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs
290a3(1): na// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // zhi ba'i tshul ston rgyan dang bcas// mnyam gzhag rdo rje'i skyil krung bzhugs// thugs kar badz+ra he ru ka/ rdo rje'i rigs mchog badz+ra he ru ka/ g.yas dkar g.yon
290a4(1): dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje be con dgra sta g.yas// dril bu thod 'phreng dung dmar g.yon// bla med khro rgyal he ru ka/ phyag gi dpung pa g.yas pa la// de bzhin rigs mchog bud+d+ha he ru ka/ g.yas ser
290a5(1): g.yon ldang dbus smug nag/ 'khor lo dbyug pa tri shul g.yas// zhing dbyug me dpung sdig mdzub g.yon// he ru ka yi dpung g.yon du// rin chen rigs mchog rat+na he ru ka/ g.yas mthing g.yon smug dbus
290a6(1): ser nag/ rin chen ri rab sbrul zhags bsnams// nyi ma zla ba tho ba g.yon// he ru ka yi bla g.yas su// pad+ma'i rigs mchog pad+ma he ru ka/ g.yas sngo g.yon ser dbus dmar nag/ pad+ma rgyu zhags lcags kyu
290b1(1): g.yas// zhing dbyug khyung khra ril mid g.yon// he ru ka yi bla g.yon du// las kyi rigs mchog karma he ru ka/ g.yas smug g.yon dkar dbus ldang nag/ rgya gram ral gri gsal shing g.yas// rlung ri dgra sta
290b2(1): sdigs mdzub g.yon// dur khrod sbrul rgyan rdzogs par ldan// dpal chen bla med he ru ka'i// mgur gyi mgrin par khro rgyal po// rdo rje gzhon nu mthing nag rngam// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir
290b3(1): bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// dang po rtse dgu med dpung 'bar// bar pa rtse lnga kha T+wAM ga tha ma ri rab phur pa 'dril// dur khrod rgyan cha rdzogs par ldan// nyi zla pad gdan me dpung
290b4(1): 'bar// rdo rje srin po zhes bya ste// 'phrin las mdzad pa'i lha ru bshad// dpal chen bla med he ru ka'i// phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis sta zur gnyis// byin pa gnyis dang lte gsang du// ye shes khro bo chen po
290b5(1): bcu// hUM mdzad mthing nag rdo rje bsnams// gshin rje sngo nag be con bsnams// stobs chen ser nag 'khor lo bsnams// rta mchog dmar nag pad+ma bsnams// mi g.yo ljang nag ral gri bsnams// bdud rtsi
290b6(1): sngo nag rgya gram bsnams// dbyug sngon mthing skya dbyug pa bsnams// 'dod rgyal dkar po dgra sta bsnams// phyag rdor ljang nag rdo rje bsnams// gnod mdzes dud kha rdo rje bsnams// kun kyang dpa' sgeg rgod
291a1(1): gshe 'jigs// glang chen thugs rje khyab pa'i gos// zhing lpags phyi nang gsang bar sdud// stag sham thabs mkhas 'phrin las gos// dur khrod chas brgyad sbrul rigs brgyan// nyi zla pad+ma'i
291a2(1): gdan stengs na// me dpung klong na brkyang bskum bzhugs// he ru ka nyid thugs ka ru// rdo rje snying po 'od 'phro 'bar// de ltar gsal zhing 'dres bsgoms na// thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// chos nyid
291a3(1): dbyings kyi pho brang nas// ye shes khro bo de bzhin nyid// spyan drangs phyag 'tshal bzhugs gsol dang // phyi nang gsang mchod la sogs bya// de nas drag sngags rtsa ba'i 'dzag drang zhing dgongs pa ma yengs
291a4(1): bya// rdo rje snying po 'od 'phros pas// ye shes khro rgyal spyan drangs bstim// ye shes 'od 'phros chos kyi dbyings// gting mtha' med par khyab gyur pas// sangs rgyas rdzogs longs sprul pa'i sku// phyogs bcu kun
291a5(1): dang byang chub sems// kun la mchod sbrul dngos grub bsdus// bdag gi sgo gsum sgrib sbyangs dag/ dngos grub byin rlabs 'dus par bsgom// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dregs pa pho mo mthu
291a6(1): stobs can// ma lus rang srog dbang bsdus te// rang dbang med par las la bcug/ de ltar gsal zhing 'dres par bsgom// rtsa ba'i drag sngags sgra bcad pas// de nas ring po mi thogs par// sa chu me rlung
291b1(1): nam mkha' sogs// zad par skye mched lnga yang mthong // dam tshig gtsang zhing dbang rdzogs na// phyag rgya'i sku nyid mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku dang zhing khams dang // nyi zla dbang byed chos 'khor
291b2(1): bskor// nam mkha' bdag 'dug 'od zer 'bar// mchod rten la 'dzeg rdo rje gsor// de sogs mtshan ma bzang po 'byung // bla ma slob dpon lung ston rab// rmi nyams mngon sum phyi nang gsang // sems
291b3(1): gsal mngon shes che phra 'byung // bde ba'i ro myong nyams dga' ba// de btson mtshan ma bzang po 'byung // des ni byin rlabs dpag tu med// bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus
291b4(1): pa yi// gsang sngags rgyal po spyi 'dzab 'di// phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin// byin gyis brlabs shing dbang bskur pa// de ni nga yis bshad par bya// oM
291b5(1): a a a/ d+har+m+ma kA ya dz+nyA na/ d+hA 'du badz+ra tsit+ta pa tra pa tra sa man ta sarba ta thA ga hri da ya garba/ d+harmA sam po ni ra ma ka ya ba ga tsit+ta badz+ra d+ha du a/ hUM sarba bud+d+ha ka ya mahA kro d+ha shri he ru ka tsan d+ha kro d+ha ya badz+ra ma hA pa
291b6(1): pra u kra ya/ bo d+hi tsit+ta kro d+ha rA dzA ya shrI he ru ka a ne a ne a ne/ ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha bo de sa twa ya kro d+ha ni/ hUM ka ra/ ya man ta ka ma hA ba la ya ha ya gri ba/ badz+ra shrI he ru ka bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka rat+na shrI he ru ka pad+ma shrI
292a1(1): he ru ka karma shrI he ru ka badz+ra ki li ki li ya/ badz+ra rak+Sha ma hA kro d+ha shrI badz+ra ku ma ra ya hUM/ a rgya a rtsa la/ a mri ta kuN+Da li nI la daN+Da/ Tak+ki rA dza/ badz+ra pA Ni/ suM pa rA dza/ u ne u ne u ne/ badz+ra dz+nyA na
292a2(1): tsakra maN+Dal kro d+ha/ pra dz+nyA d+ha du pa mi ta ya/ kro d+ha shwa ri pa pra ya/ badz+ra ma hA sho ro sarba du kro d+hi ma ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu/ sarba ma ha kro d+ha kro d+hi tsan d+ha hUM b+h+yo dza dza/ chos sku longs sku sprul pa'i sku// thabs dang shes rab
292a3(1): kun 'dus pa'i// ye shes lhun rdzogs gsang sngags 'di// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// khro bo khro mo thams cad dang // ma mo mkha' 'gro rigs 'dzin dang // chos skyong mgon po bdun cu
292a4(1): gnyis// 'jig rten dregs pa'i gtum po dgod// gang gis thos par gyur pa rnams// rab dga' shin tu yi rang mos// phyag 'tshal bskor dang las rnams byed// rnal 'byor gtsug khur ci bcol nyan// thal
292a5(1): sbyar sbyangs ldan gnod pa sel// de yis dgra bgegs thal bar rlogs// chos kyi dbyings na bzhugs pa yi// rdzogs sku rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang // zhing khams kun na bzhugs pa yi// sbrul sku'i sangs
292a6(1): rgyas thams cad dang // sa gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang rgyal thams cad kyis// gsan nas dgyes nas mnyes 'gyur te// gdug pa dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// thun mong mchog gi
292b1(1): dngos grub 'bebs// byin rlabs mthu stobs dpag tu med// de nas ring po mi thogs par// bla med byang chub yang dag thob// yi ge 'khor lo'i sa chen non// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa don gyi snying po'i
292b2(1): rgyud las// rtsa ba'i le'u ste bdun brgya bcu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// khro rgyal las kyi dngos grub bshad// sangs rgyas sku gsum thams cad kun// gdul dkar drag po gdul ba'i phyir// khro
292b3(1): rgyal sprul pa kun 'dus pa'i// drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba la// las kyi dngos grub rnam pa gnyis// thun mong dang ni mchog nyid do// thun mong byin rlabs rnam pa bzhi// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i
292b4(1): phyir// gsad pa me lce lta bu dang // bsrung ba rdo rje lta bu dang // phyir bzlogs ri lta bu dang // dbab la skyi 'dang lta bu'o// dang po gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// 'brub khung thun la ling ga bca'// sngags pa khro rgyal
292b5(1): 'dus par bsgom// 'brub khung srid pa'i khyams khang du// ling ga dgra bo dngos su bsam// bdag thugs 'os 'phros thun la thim// 'bru gsum khro tshogs 'jigs par bsam// dug sna sha za mtshon thogs
292b6(1): bsam// khrag 'thung ma mo nad 'bebs bsam// klad pa gti mug rmongs pa'i gnas// byol song rgyal po 'joms pa'i gshed// bskul bas klad rtsa gcad de myos// nyi dros nyi phyed khrag thun dbab// mgrin pa
293a1(1): nga rgyal dregs pa'i gnas// lha min dbang po gsod pa'i bdud// bskul bas ngag rgyun mgrin rtsa bcad// nyi phyed yol mthar dug thun dbab// snying kha zhe sdang gtum pa'i gnas// mi rgod shan
293a2(1): la srog gi gshed// bskul pas rtsa gcad dran pa nyams// lte ba 'dod chags zhen pa'i gnas// phyed yol dgongs par phyed thun dbab// dmyal ba'i dbang po gsod pa'i gnas// bskul pas srid pa'i rten rtsa
293a3(1): gcad// mtshan mo srod dang nam gung dang // gung yol tho rangs par dag tu// de bzhin rim pa thun bzhi dbab// ye shes lnga yi rang 'od 'bar// thun gyi rta skyon yul la bskyod// 'od kyis dug lnga gnas su
293a4(1): 'joms// 'od de sgo dgu'i srog rtsar gzhug/ me rlung snying po dmar nag dbus// srog de 'phrog gcod yig 'bru bdun// phyogs bzhi steng 'og srog rtsar gnas// dkar nag snying dkyil zhu zhing khol// hUM gis
293a5(1): 'phrog rtsa thums kyis gsod// dza yis 'gugs shing ya yis 'phul// ra yis sreg cing ma yis gsod// rbad kyis srog gcod me 'bar gsod// sku lnga ye shes lnga ru smin// de dag drag sngags can dug 'dra// hUM
293a6(1): a ne a ne a ne/ sarba d+harma d+ha du bi shu d+d+he ga ga na a b+ha wa/ d+harma ka ya shu n+ya ta gar+b+ha/ saM b+ho ka ya rat+na a ti saM ba haM/ nirma ka ya b+hi sha de a hUM sa man ta pa tra kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra naM/ badz+ra sa twa/ ni ra ma kA ya badz+ra
293b1(1): shrIshrI he ru ka ba ka ba ga to badz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA ya/ ka ya kro d+ha/ bka kra ti/ tsi ta tsan d+ha badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ badz+ra rak+Sha kro d+ha hUM/ bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka ta thA ga ta kro d+ha hUM/ rat+na shrI he ru ka tsan da kri kro ta hUM/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka mahA pa
293b2(1): shang kro d+ha hUM/ karma shrI he ru/ badz+ra yak+ka kro d+ha hUM/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha/ hUM ka ra sa twa ya/ ya man+ta ka hri ti ka la ru pa ya/ ma hA pa la sti pa ya/ ha ya gri ba tsan d+ha ya/ ar+ya a tsa la ro Sha na ya/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li rak+Sha ya/ nI
293b3(1): la dan Da akra ya/ Tak+ki rA dzA tsa pa la ya/ badz+ra pA ni badz+ra rak+Sha ya/ sum pa ra tsa ha la ha la/ badz+ra kI li kI la/ shrI ri badz+ra ku ma ra hUM/ ma hA kro d+ha u tshus ma kro d+ha badz+ra rak+Sha/ dz+nyA na kro d+ha da sha pa la ti hUM/ pradz+nyA sa
293b4(1): man+ta b+ha tra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri ma ma dz+nyA na ta ki ni/ dza la sam ba ri/ kro ti raka sha/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo/ sa man dza/ ma ha kro d+hi nir ma badz+ra/ ma hA kro d+hi karma kri ta da kri ni b+h+yo dza hUM/ sangs rgyas thams cad sprul pa
293b5(1): yi// ye shes khro bo thams cad dang // dbyings kyi ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// kun 'dus snying po rtsa ba yi// gsang sngags rgyal po lhun rdzogs 'di// gang gis thos pa dbang du 'du// mos gus dad pas ci
293b6(1): gsung nyan// bsad pa drag po'i ngan sngags 'di// me lce'am tsan dug khol ma 'dra/ badz+ra rak+Sha thun ya rbad/ yag sha la thibs thums rbad/ kro d+ha raM shag snying rtsa rbad/ ru tra ra tsa srog rtsa la rbad/ ma ma trag rak+ta
294a1(1): srog pa la thums ril rbad/ yag mo ka li thang thang snying khrag la rbad/ raka mo kro d+ha thun rmugs rbad/ karma Ta ki ni shan pa dgra bo mA ra ya dza dza/ sha truM snying khrag la bi ri la rbad/ tsit+ta tshal pa baM ri la
294a2(1): rbad/ dbugs la subs ya thum ri la rbad/ srog la hur thams rbad/ srog la hur long rbad/ rak+ta mugs thibs rbad/ dbugs la subs thums rbad/ tsit+ta brang shag rbad/ che ge mo mA rA ya yaM/ myogs
294a3(1): myogs/ thums thums/ rbad rbad/ dza dza/ sod sod/ gsang ba ngan sngags sgra gri 'dis// rnal 'byor dam ldan dbang thob cing // rtsa ba'i snying po rdzogs gyur na// brag la brgya pa dang 'gas gyur na// srog chags
294a4(1): dag la smos ci dgos// dud 'gro gsad pa la sogs te// drod rtags mtshan ma byung ba na// gdug pa can la sogs par mnan// thun 'phang lo dus bzhin du sgrol// gsad pa rgod kyi sbyor ba yin// 'jam
294a5(1): dpal khri drug stong pa bstan pa'i snying po'i rgyud las// bsgral ba'i le'u ste bdun brgya bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// phyir bzlog so ri lca bu bshad// dus ngan tha ma'i 'jig rten
294a6(1): la// mu stegs can dang sangs rgyas nyid// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dregs pa pho mo'i rig sngags kyis// gnod byed sngags pa de nyid la// phyir la bzlog ste rang gshed dbab// de nyid gsad
294b1(1): pa'i 'khor lo ni// dbang thob dam tshig ldan pas spyad// rtsa ba'i snying po thems rdzogs nas// chos nyid rnam dag ngang nyid las// dmar nag b+h+rUM nyid yongs gyur las// badz+ra tsa kra b+h+rUM brjod pas/ mtshon cha'i
294b2(1): 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// steng 'og rtsibs gnyis bcu bzhi ste// dbang drag stobs ldan dmar nag pa// shin tu rno la rgya cher bsgom// de nyid dbus kyi lte ba la// mthing nag hUM yig yongs gyur
294b3(1): pas// bskyed pa'i snying po sgra dbyangs kyis// bla med khro rgyal he ru ka/ yab yum gsal la rdzogs par bskyed// dbu la kun tu bzang po nyid// thugs khar badz+ra he ru ka/ mgrin par rdo rje gzhon nu
294b4(1): bskyed// thugs las rtsibs la 'od 'phros pas// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan du gyur// de stengs thugs kyi snying po las// ye shes rang gsal 'od 'phros pas// snying po hUM yig bcu bzhir gyur// de dag yongs gyur rang
294b5(1): sngags kyis// shar rtsibs bud+d+ha he ru ka lho rtsibs rat+na he ru ka nub rtsibs pad+ma he ru ka byang rtsibs karma he ru ka steng rtsibs rdo rje hUM mdzad de// 'og rtsibs gnod mdzes rgyal po'o// nub stod nub byang rtsibs
294b6(1): gnyis la// rta mchog dpal dang mi g.yo ba// byang stod byang shar rtsibs gnyis la// phyag na rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil// de ltar rab tu gsal rdzogs nas// dbang bskur byin brlabs skye mched rlab// thugs las
295a1(1): ye shes 'od 'phros pas// chos kyi dbyings nyid pho brang nas// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs bstim// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na'i// mchod pa dbul zhing bdud rtsi blang // bdag nyid gtso bo'i snying
295a2(1): dbus su// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dmar ser bsgom// lte bar badz+ra he ru ka rtsibs bzhir hUM bzhi kha dog bzhin// rtsibs kyi kha la chags sdang bzhi// gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang yig
295a3(1): 'bru bzhi// a dkar ma ser raM dmar po// haM ni nag po bzhin du brtags// phyi yi 'khor lo'i kha rtsibs la// nyon mongs phung po lha yi bu// 'chi bdag bdud bzhi dkar ser dmar// nag po'i mdog ste dngos
295a4(1): su na// dga' rab dbang phyug lha sbyin dang // nags kyi rgyal po mu khyud bzang // de nas phyi dang nang nyid du// yig 'bru bdud las rang 'od 'phros// chags sdang gnod byed bkug bsdus bstim// mtshon cha'i
295a5(1): 'khor lo rnon po de// drag tu sgra dang bcas par 'khor// de dag rdul phran tsam du bcad// byad sngags rbod gtong dgra dang bgegs// nad dang rims dang gnod byed rnams// gcad bya rdul phran tsam du rlag de
295a6(1): ltar drag sngags sgra bcad bzlas// 'di lta bu yi 'khor lo yis// 'byung ba'i rgyun dang zlog 'gyur na// dam can rbod gtong smos ci dgos// rang srog rdo rje bzhin du 'gyur// nad bgegs rkyen gyis tshugs mi
295b1(1): srid// nyon mongs chags sdang kun bcad nyon mongs gcod// don kun 'grub byed 'khor lo yin// bsad na rten drug gzugs la brdeg bsrung gzir rdzas kyi ling ga la'o// mthar ni rgyun srang mgon pos
295b2(1): mnan// des na stobs chen rgyal po'ang 'joms// gnod byed rnams la smos ci dgos// gzugs can dgra la ngos su gnas// gzugs med bgegs la bag chags tshul// dbang thob dam ldan sngags pa
295b3(1): yis// rtsa ba'i snying po drod thob bya// de nas las sbyor gang brtsam 'grub// de ma yin na don mi 'grub// he ru ka dpal la sogs te// ye shes khro bo thams cad 'dus// de dag drag sngags 'di lta ste// sarba
295b4(1): ta thA ga ta ya ni ra ma/ badz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA ya/ ma hA pa la ti/ tsan da kri ta ya/ sarba sha tAM/ man+ta pra yo ga po ta ya sa ma ti/ sarba duSh+kaN/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ bi tsurna ya bi tsu rna ya/ nA sha ya/ nA sha ya/ staM

296a1(1): drag sngags rgod chen 'di'o// badz+ra mahA kro d+ha shrI he ru ka sarba bud+d+ha ma hA pa la/ bud+d+ha baM bud+d+ha/ ha sa ha/ sarba bi s+thAn/ badz+ra kro d+ha u kra ya/ myag zum ril rbad nan/ badz+ra ma rak+Sha kro ta nA sha ya sbyar nan/
296a2(1): badz+ra ma ha kro d+ha ya trig nan/ sarba ta tha ga ta/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra ma hA bo la staM pa ya nan/ badz+ra yak+ka sarba dush+tsan rtsa khrag tsi ti thums ril nan/ e na na u nan suM laM baM raM nan/ badz+ra yak+Sha sarba duSh+Tan big+ha nan/
296a3(1): ha ra ha ra dza/ aM ku sha ya dza/ A kar sha ya dze/ da ra na ya dza/ da ra na ya dza/ hur thums dza/ badz+ra tig sna rak+ka kro ta tsit+ta breng shag rbad/ srog la ro myag rbad/ na sha ya rbad/ tsurna ya rbad/ tsit+ta khaM shag rbad/
296a4(1): myaphyag thum ril rbad/ mA ra ya rbad nan/ zhi khro dag nas the brang bar/ gzir na mi 'joms gang yang med/ thams cad gan 'bub myos brgya la rlam/ rang 'khor rdo rje ltar du 'gyur/ bsrung gzir kun gyi mchog tu
296a5(1): bshad/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying po'i rgyud las/ phyir bzlog gi le'u ste bdun brgya bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// dbab pa sbyin thang lta bu bshad// sangs rgyas bstan
296a6(1): pa bsrung ba'i phyir// sdang byed bsnag pa'i lo thog la// chu 'khyags sbyin 'dang dbab pa ni// gong gi thun rdzas gcig tu bsre// thun snod gzhal yas khang nang du// ye shes sprul pa'i khro bo tshogs// kun kyang
296b1(1): mthing nag 'jigs tshul can// phyag na ral gri zor ba dang // be con gtun shing ber ga bsnams// dgra yul lo thog bcud rnams kyang // rnga zhing 'thub cing brdung bar bsam// bdag nyid khro rgyal 'dus par
296b2(1): bsgom// 'dru ba khung dgra yul rdzas la bya// de nang yul ming ser bsrung gtso// ming bris bcug la zor gdan bya// drag sngags par chad med par drang // gnam gzer dgra yul nam mkha' la// chu 'khyags
296b3(1): 'khor lo'i gdan stengs na// de ltar sprul pa'i khro bo rnams// pho brang btab ste chu 'khyags kyis// bskal pa'i sbyin 'dang 'bebs par bsam// 'og nas khyab 'jug gza' rgod kyi// dmag 'gros dgra yul
296b4(1): rlag par bsam// de ltar lha rnams thams cad kun/ kha rlangs na bun sprin du gtibs/ spyan mig gzi mdangs glog tu 'gyu// rngam sgra nga ro 'brug tu sgrog/ zhal chab skyi 'dang chu 'khyags 'bebs// ye shes khro
296b5(1): rgyal 'dus pa yis// khro bo las la bcug des ni gza' rgod dbang med bskul// des ni yul gyi lha klu bsnyungs// ma mo mkha' 'gro'ang de bzhin na// 'dod khams gnas ris lha yul nas// gling bzhi lcags
296b6(1): ri'i nang tshun chad// gdug pa klu yi yul yan chad// 'khrugs te chu 'khyags sbyin 'dang 'bebs// rta ma yul dbus rten la gzhug/ khyab 'jug dus brgyad zor 'phang dbab// spogs na dur khrod rtsub mo
297a1(1): btang // dgra yul lo thog sngon bsreg/ gsur chen zor khrag zab kyang bya// thal 'dzing gtor zhing dbab sngags bsdus// 'dis ni chu 'khyags bskal pa 'bebs// badz+ra yak+ka kro d+ha pra ba sa ra ya
297a2(1): phrom phob b+h+yo/ badz+ra rak+ka dud kar phrom phob b+h+yo/ badz+ra tsan dar thu tri ya ma phrom phob b+h+yo/ su badz+ra ya k+ka ke ta phrom shar pho ba/ badz+ra rak+Sha ga te shar ra sha lta drag tu pho ba/ ra hu la rak+kha se tri dud kar phrom shar phob/ rag
297a3(1): mo khrag la mu sha ma b+ha ri sha sad drag tu pho ba/ a ya du ra tsa shan pa u kra ya phrom hril shar b+h+yo drag tu phog da sha lo ka pa la ti ta ki ni nA ka li de ba a su ra tsa ra ti shaM ma ma raka mo/ thog la 'ur 'ur thug thug
297a4(1): shar shar hril hril ru tra b+h+yo b+h+yo phob phob/ rnal 'byor dbang rdzogs dam ldan na// chu 'khyags skyi 'dang bskal pa 'bebs// khro rgyal thams cad 'dus pa yis// drag sngags 'khor lo'i sbyor ba ni// gsad dang
297a5(1): phyir bzlog 'khor lo ni// ro ras zhing lpags dag la bri// bsrung gzir 'khor lo rgya shog la'o// ser ba'i 'khor lo chu dar la// bri ba'i rdzas kyi rim pa ni// phyir bzlog gsad pa'i 'khor lo ni// dug sna skye
297a6(1): tshe lan tshwa dang // khrag sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya// bsrung ba ga bur gi hang dang // gur kum pad+ma'i rak+tas bris// ser ba gang 'bebs yul de yi// sngo na lo thog chu sna bri// nyi phyed kha ni lhor bltas
297b1(1): bri// gsum ka 'thun par bri lugs ni// thig bskor rim pa bzhi ru bskor// dbus kyi lte bar hUM bzhi bri// phyi rim rtsibs bzhir hUM bzhi bri// de phyir rtsibs bcur hUM bcu bri// tha ma'i mu khyud stong pa la// sad
297b2(1): dang ser ba dbab pa dang // bsrung dang gzir dang phyir zlog pa dang // chu 'khyags ser ba dbab pa yi// spu gri'i drag sngags gang byed bskor// bsrung ba yig mgo phyi ru bstan// gsum po'i yig mgo nang du
297b3(1): bstan// sprul pa'i khro bo sngo nag pa// zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs tshul rngam// g.yas g.yon ral gri lcags kyu thogs// ro gdan bzhugs pa'i lto bar bri// 'khor lo bar snang bdun bkram ste// bdag
297b4(1): nyid lhar bskyed byin gyis brlab// hUM badz+ra tig sha pa kra kaM pa la hUM// zhes mtshon cha yi 'khor lo ni// rno drag gang la bskor ba rnams// thams cad gcod par byed pa bsam// hUM las rang rang rtsa sngags
297b5(1): kyis// khro bo rnams su gsal bar bskyed// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs bstim// mchod pa'i rim pa rdzogs par dbul// de nyid dong rtsang kha la lding // ting 'dzin ldan pas drag sngags bzlas// mtshon cha'i
297b6(1): 'khor lo myur 'khor bas// don po gang yin dbang po lus// rdul phran tsam du gcod cing 'thub// rtsibs las 'od zer tsha tshar 'phros// dmigs pa thal bar rlag par byed// ser ba 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi
298a1(1): la// chu 'khyags sbyin 'dang bskal bar 'phros// lo thog rdul phran tsam du rlag/ bsrung na bdag nyid lte ba la'o// gsad dang bzlog dang dbab pa la// rtsibs mtshan dgra bgegs yul ming
298a2(1): bri// drag sngags sbyor ba thob pa dang // drag po mtshon cha'i 'khor lo de// gsad na la btsas gdug par mnan// phyir zlog 'khor lo'i rgyun srang du'o// dbab na yul dbus mu ma la// bsrung na rang lus dpung
298a3(1): pa g.yon// des ni gang brtsams las rnams 'grub// don kun 'grub byed 'khor lo yin// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa don gyi snying po'i rgyud las/ chu 'khyags kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste bdun brgya bcu gsum
298a4(1): pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// 'phrin las rang bzhin bshad do// hUM/ ma rig nyon mongs las dbang gis// nag po gdug pa srid gsum bdud// bsgral zhing log rtog rnam sbyang phyir// sangs
298a5(1): rgyas thams cad khro bor mdzad// hUM/ chos nyid rang bzhin rnam par dag ye shes dngos med rang snang bas// chos rnams snying po byang chub sems// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po nyid// dbang chen lnga yi rim par
298a6(1): gnas// snang ba ma bcos chos kyi dbyings// ye shes dkyil 'khor phyag rgya'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang // hUM/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// chos sku'i ngang las ma g.yos
298b1(1): kyang // gdul bya rnams sbyangs mthar bsgral phyir// ye shes rol pa rang snang ba'i// khro rgyal gzugs skur bzhengs su gsol// hUM/ ye shes khro rgyal 'bar ba'i sku// thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor
298b2(1): tshogs// thugs rje thabs kyis spyan 'dren na// dbyings nas bskyod med gshegs su gsol// hUM/ skye med chos sku dag pa las// ye shes khro mchog rngam pa'i sku// thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor la// sgo
298b3(1): gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes rang snang dkyil 'khor la// rang bzhin brtan par bzhugs su gsol// hUM/ ye shes khro dpal dkyil 'khor la// bdug mchog me tog mar me sgron// dri chab gtsang
298b4(1): bshos mchod par dbul// thugs rje bzhes te dngos grub stsol// hUM/ snang srid ye shes rang shar ba'i// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bsam mi khyab// mdzad pa 'phrin las grub pa'i rtags// ye shes gar gyi mchod
298b5(1): par bzhes// hUM/ rang byung rnam dag dug lnga sel// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i sman// bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod pa 'di// ye shes khro rgyal dkyil 'khor la// mchod par dbul lo bzhes su gsol// sku
298b6(1): gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// hUM/ chos kyi sku las rang shar ba'i// ye shes khro rgyal 'bar ba'i sku// bcom ldan dpal chen he ru ka/ kro d+hi shwa ri dbyings kyi yum// gshin rje gshed po la sogs te// khro
299a1(1): bo'i rgyal po shes rab thabs// gtso 'khor yab yum sprul pa dang // pho nya phyag brnyan bran g.yog bcas// khro bo 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bla med mchod pa 'bul ba ni// snang srid mchod
299a2(1): pa'i longs spyod mchog/ ye shes 'dod yon sna tshogs snang // phyogs bcu'i rab 'byams rnam dag zhing // rin chen gzhal yas dpag bsam shing // 'gro drug lha dang lha mo'i tshogs// snang srid kun bzang
299a3(1): mchod pa'i sprin// gzugs mdzes sgra snyan bsam mi khyab// dri zhim zhal zas ro mchog tshogs// reg bya mdzes sdug sna tshogs rnams// ye shes khro rgyal dkyil 'khor la// mchod pa 'bul gyis bzhes su
299a4(1): gsol// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// hUM/ snang srid rtsi bcud zhal zas tshogs// sha khrag sna tshogs 'bru bcud chang // ro mchog brgya ldan bza' btung mchog/ 'dod yon lha mos mdzes par
299a5(1): brgyan// stabs byed gar bsgyur glu dbyangs len// snang srid rnam dag mchod pa 'di// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor tshogs la 'bul// thugs rje che dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// hUM/ khyad par rmad du byung ba
299a6(1): yi// 'bru thog longs spyod gtor ma dang // sha chen sna tshogs khrag sna tshogs// sa yi snying po ra sa yan// zhal zas mchog gi mchod pa 'di// ye shes rang shar sprul pa'i sku// khro rgyal 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor
299b1(1): du// mchod pa 'bul lo zhes su gsol// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub stsol// ma rig lus ngag yid gsum gyis// nyams shing 'khrul pas nongs bgyis rnams// ye shes khro rgyal spyan lam du// gnong zhing
299b2(1): 'gyod pas mthol lo bshags// tshangs pa bzhes la dngos grub gsol// e h+ye hi b+ha ga wa na/ ma hA shri he ru ka badz+ra kri ta rA dza ya/ ma hA ka ru ni/ ka tri sha ho/ sa ma ho/ sa ma ya ste/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ dza
299b3(1): hUM baM ho/ sa ma ya mu tra kra b+han tsakra hUM phaT/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri badz+ra TA ki nI/ hri da ya/ sarba badz+ra kro d+ha/ A gadz+dza ya/ A gadz+dza ta ya/ b+han d+ha ya/ b+ha na d+ha ya/ to sha ya/ to sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ dza hUM baM ho/
299b4(1): sa ma ya/ maN+Da la hUM dza/ ma hA su ke a ti pu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ tiSha Tha lhan/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ni maM kA ya/ ma hA kro d+ha rA dzA ya/ dza hUM baM ho/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sa ma ya/ mu tra ma rang pra pan tsakra dz+nyA na
299b5(1): badz+ra ma hA pA la kro d+ha rA dzA ya/ he b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+nya na Da ki ni pradz+ha ru badz+ra d+ha ra/ oM ru lu ru luhUM b+h+yo b+h+yo/ bag sha ya/ bag sha ya/ bi taM sa ya/ bi taM sa ya/ bud+d+ha k+She tri staM pa a kas+t+wam pa ka sarba ma hA
299b6(1): badz+ra kro d+ha/ ka ya badz+ra tri ta ya/ bAka badz+ra u tra ya/ tsit+ta badz+ra tsan d+ha ya/ dza hUM baM ho/ na maHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yo/ bi shra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khang ud khang he/ s+pha ra Na i maM na/ ga ga na khaM swA hA/ oM shri badz+ra ra ga du pe du/
300a1(1): puSh+pe pu/ A lo ke hri/ gan d+he a/ ne wi dra a/ pra tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra na sa ma ye swA hA/ mu tra pu ho/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pany+tsa a mri ta shri ban kha raM kha hi/ ka ya badz+ra sid+d+ha au/ wak+ka badz+ra sid+d+hi hUM/ tsit+ta
300a2(1): badz+ra sid+d+hi hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bu tsa me ga s+pha ra na/ badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko haM/ sa ma ye swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ ma hA pA tsa/ badz+ra sa ma ye/ ma hA maM sa/ ma hA rak+ta/ ma hA pa su ta/ ma hA tsit+ta/ ma hA go ro tsa na/
300a3(1): ma hA me tha/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ khA hi khA hi/ shar laM gats+tsha mi/ spros med snying por rdzogs bsgoms pa// khro rgyal bla med he ru ka'i// thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// phyi snod rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// rnam
300a4(1): dag mu mtha' med par gsal// nang bcud rnam dag chos kyi sku// ye shes sgrib med rang rig gsal// gnyis med byang chub sems su gnas// 'od 'dus phyag rgya thugs la rdzogs// de nyid snying po byang chub
300a5(1): sems// rang byung ye shes rang nyid du// rdzogs gsal ma bcos thig le che// der gnas chos sku nyid du grol// rdzogs sku sbrul sku shugs las byung // zhes gsungs so// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// ya ma rA
300a6(1): dzas gsol btab pa// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// chos sku rnam dag dngos med las// longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dper ldan// sbrul sku khro bdag 'gro ba 'dul// rdo rje 'dus ma byas pa'i sku// lhun
300b1(1): grub mngon par byang chub sku// phyi dus lnga brgya tha ma la// sangs rgyas bstan pa gnyen po 'di// rnal 'byor can la gnas bya'i phyir// gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud rgyal 'di// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi sbyor ba
300b2(1): la// bskor ba'i thabs dang rnam grangs dang // thun mong khyad par yang gsang mchog/ snying po don dang las tshogs grangs// nyi ma bzhi pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul// de dag sngags kyi tshad ma rnams// 'khor la rgyas par
300b3(1): bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang // bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// 'khrul 'khor rim pa rgya bshad do// nyon cig gshin rje rgyal po mchog/ gshin rje gshed chen khro rgyal po// yab yum
300b4(1): 'khor dang sprul par bcas// gdul dkar drag po 'dul ba'i phyir// ye shes rol pa las byung ba'i// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi rim pa rnams// rgyas par dbye ba 'di lta ste// 'khyil pa sbrul 'gros drag sngags
300b5(1): bdun// sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bru ded kyis// drag sngags nyi ma bzhi pa ni// dbus nas rdo rje'i phyogs bskor te// rin chen phyogs nas dbus nyid du// 'bru ded bdun du grang bar bya// de bzhin dbus nas rin
300b6(1): chen phyogs// pad+ma'i phyogs bskor dbus su dril// pad+ma'i phyogs nas 'bru ded bskor// las kyi phyogs nas dang po'i sar// las kyi phyogs nas rdo rje ya/ phyogs bskor dang po'i gnas nyid du/ ya ma rA dza sa
301a1(1): to me ma rA tsa sa to me ya/ ra tsa sa to me ya ma/ tsa sa to me ya ma ra/ sa to me ya ma rA/ to me ya ma rA dza sa/ me ya ma rA tsa sa to/ ya me to ru na yo ta/ me to ru na yo ta ya/ to ru na yo ta ya me/ ru na yo
301a2(1): ta ya me to/ na ya ta ya me to ru na/ ta ya me to ru na yo/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She/ ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yo ni ra ya k+She ya ta/ ni ra ya k+She ya ta yo/ ra ya k+She ya ta yo ni ra/ yak+She yo ta yo ni ra/ k+She ya ta yo ni ra ya/ yak+She
301a3(1): ya tsa ni ra ma/ k+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ ya tsa ni ra ma ya k+She/ tsa ni ra ma ya k+She ya/ ni ra ma ya k+She ya tsa/ ra ma ya k+She ya tsa ni/ ma ya k+She ya tsa ni ra/ gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor rin po che rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me
301a4(1): long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rnal ma 'bru ded drag sngags bdun pa'i le'u ste bdun brgya gcig go// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// bzlog pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// dbus nas rdo
301a5(1): rje phyogs bskor te// las kyi phyogs bskor dbus su dril// de bzhin 'bru ded dang po'i rtsar// de bzhin dbus nas las kyi phyogs// pad+ma'i phyogs bskor 'bru ded bskor// de bzhin dbus nas pad+ma'i
301a6(1): phyogs// rin chen phyogs bskor 'bru ded dbus// rin chen phyogs nas rdo rje phyogs// bskor te 'bru ded dang por bskyal// ya ma ri ni tsa ya k+She/ ma ra ni tsa ya k+She/ ra ni tsa ya k+She ya ma/ na tsi ya k+She ya ma ra/
301b1(1): yak+She ya ma ra ni/ yak+She ya ma ra ni tsa k+She/ ya ma ra ni tsa ya/ ya k+She ya ra ni yo ta/ k+She ya ra na yo ta ya/ ya ra ni yo ta ya k+She/ ra ni yo ta ya k+She ya/ ni yo ha ya k+She ya ra/ yo ta ya k+She ya ra ni/ ta ya k+She la ra ni yo/ ya
301b2(1): ta yo na ru to me/ ta yo na ru to me ya/ yo na ru to me ya ta/ na ru to me ya ta yo/ ru to me ya yo ni/ to me ya ta yo na ru/ me ya ta yo na ru to/ ya me to sa tsa ra ma/ me to sa tsa ra ma ya/ to sa tsa rA ma ye/ sa tsa ra ma
301b3(1): ya me to/ tsa ra ma ya me to sa/ ra ma ya me to sa tsa/ ma ya me to sa tsa ra/ gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor rin po che rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud kyis rgyal po chen po las/ bzlog pa'i 'bru
301b4(1): ded drag sngags bdun pa'i le'u ste bdun brgya gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan che mchog gis// las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// 'khyil pa sbrul gyi 'gros stabs kyis// dang po bsad pa'i nyi ma
301b5(1): bzhi// ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ de bzhin g.yon bskor drag sngags ni/ bsad pa gshin rje nyid la ste/ ya me ta k+She ma/ to ru na yo/ ni ra ya tsa/ ni ra sa tsa/ dbang ni btsun mo'i lho
301b6(1): ru'o/ ya te k+She ma me/ yo ni ra ya/ tsa ni ra tsa/ sa to ru na/ lto thog gzhom la lto 'phye'i gzugs/ ya k+She ma me ta/ ya tsa ni ra/ tsa sa to ru/ na yo ni ra/ de bzhin bzlog pa sbrul gyi 'gros/ rgyas pa nor lha'i
302a1(1): gzugs su'o// ya ma k+She ta me/ ra ni tsa ya/ ra ni yo na/ ru to sa ta/ zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de/ ya k+She ta me ma/ ya ra ni yo/ na ru to sa/ tsa ra na tsa/ dbye ba rta dang ma he gnyis/ ya ta me ma k+She/
302a2(1): yo na ru to/ sa tsa ra ni/ tsa ya ra ni/ lkugs pa lug gi khong du bya// ya me ma k+She ta/ to sa tsa ra/ ni tsa ya ra/ ni yo na ru/ gzhan yang stag mchongs sbyor ba ste/ 'bog pa shan dmar rgyab tu'o/ rlung sa reg bya
302a3(1): mkha' reg sgra// chu ro lus me gzugs mig sna/ yid lce dri dang dus su sbyar/ ya ma ta k+She me/ to ya yo ra/ ni tsa sa tsa/ tsa na ru ni/ smyo ba spre'u'i rgyab tu'o// rlung sgra nam mkha' sa reg bya// lus med ro chu lta byed
302a4(1): lce// dus yid sna dang sna ba dri dang gzugs// ya me k+She ta ma ta/ yo ta ya to/ tsa ru ni tsa/ sa na ra ni/ myos pa srog dang bral ba'i lus/ rlung reg sa sgra nam mkha' dang / ro chu dri lus sna me lce/ dus mig gzugs
302a5(1): dang rna ba yid/ ya ta ma me k+She/ ya to ra yo/ sa ra ru ni/ tsa ni na tsa/ rengs pa gyen pa'i shing la bya/ rlung dang nam mkha' sgra reg bya/ me lus chu ro sna dri yid rna ba/ lta byed gzugs dang lce dus sbyar/ ya k+She me ta
302a6(1): ma/ ra yo to ya/ sa ra tsa na/ tsa ni ru ni/ gzir ba stobs kyi bdag pos bya'o// rlung sa reg bya sgra nam mkha'/ chu ro lus me dus dang rna ba dri yid sna/ gzugs dang lta byed lce ru sdebs/ ya ma ta me k+She/ to ya yo
302b1(1): rar/ ni na ra tsa/ sa ni tsa ru/ sa ni tsa na/ dbang po gzhom la chu srin te// rlung reg sa sgra nam mkha' chu/ ro me lus dus rna ba dri/ sna yid lce gzugs lta byed sbyar/ ya ta ma me k+She/ to ya ra yo/ ni na ra sa/ tsa ru ni
302b2(1): tsa/ yi dgas lus kyis longs spyod gzhom/ rlung dang nam mkha' sgra reg pa/ lus me chu ro sna dri dus/ rna ba gzugs mig lce dus sbyar/ ya k+She me ta ma/ yo ra to ya/ sa ra ni na/ ni tsa ru tsa/ bskrad pa rnga mo'i rgyab
302b3(1): tu'o// rkang pa'i 'bru lnga g.yas g.yon gnyis/ bdun bdun dag tu bsdeb par bya/ ra ma ya ta yo me khe/ to me ya k+She ya ta ma/ yo ta ya ma rak+She me/ ya k+She ya me to ma ta/ khams gsum gzhom la me yi gzugs/
302b4(1): dang po g.yas g.yon rkang lnga bzlog k+She me yo ta ya ma ra/ ma ta ya k+She ya me to/ me k+She ra ma ya ta yo/ ta ma to me ya k+She ya/ lus gzhom pa la sbrul gyi gzugs/ ro chu sa rlung rlung me gnam// lus rlung ro reg chu rlung
302b5(1): lus/ sgra dang dri ru rnam par sde ba/ ya to ma ya ya ra k+She yo/ ya ya ta to ya yo me ra/ lo thog gzhom la 'phye'i gzugs/ rlung me'i gzugs yi nam mkha' ro/ dus reg lus sna lce sgra chu/ sna mig sa ru rnam par sbyar/
302b6(1): ya ra ni tsa k+She/ ya ra ni ta/ yo na ru me/ to sa tsa ma/ gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sbyor ba du ma'i le'u ste bdun brgya gsum
303a1(1): mo// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ sbyor ba'i 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad de/ tshogs drug sgo dgag nyi ma bzhi/ nang gi dang po 'brur bar/ sbrul gyi 'gros bzhin dbus su dril/ ra tsas tam
303a2(1): ya/ to ru na yo ta ya/ yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ phung po lnga ni rtsad bcad nas/ de bzhin gong du 'bru gnyis por/ tsa sa to me ya/ ru na yo ta ya/ ni ra ya k+She ya/ tsa ni ra ma ya/ dug gsum ar la
303a3(1): gtad pa ni/ rkang bzhi mtha' nas dbus su dril/ ra ma ya/ to me ya yo ta ya/ yak+She ya/ 'byung ba rgya bzhi nad du bslang / rlung sa ro me rlung sgra dri/ chu rlung reg bya chu lus rlung / nam mkha' lus dang ro ru sbyar/
303a4(1): ma ya ra/ ya me ra to// ya ta to yo/ ya k+She yo ya/ mdze nad dbab pa'i sbyor ba ni/ nam mkha' g.yon bskor sbrul bzhin dbus// chu nas g.yon bskor 'bru bzhin blang / k+She ta me ma ya/ to sa tse ra/ ni yo na ru/ ni
303a5(1): tsa la ra/ rims nad dal yams dbab pa ni/ dus mig yid sna me sa rlung / sna mig lce sna chu sgra rlung / rna ba lce gzugs dri lus reg rlung dri gzugs yid dus ro gnam/ rlung dang rnam par bsdebs par bya/
303a6(1): tsa tsa pa ra ma ya/ sa tsa ru na to me ya/ na ru ni ra yo ta ya/ ra ni tsa ni ya k+She ya/ blo bur gzer thabs sbyor ba ni/ me sgra lus rlung chu reg ro/ rlung lus nam mkha' me rlung ngo // sa chu rlung du sbyar bar bya/ ra me yo
303b1(1): ya/ to ta yA ya/ yo k+te ra ya/ ya ma to ya/ gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ sbyor ba gnad kyi le'u ste bdun brgya bzhi
303b2(1): pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ khyad par 'khrul 'khor rgyas bshad do// dbang du bya ba'i nyi ma bzhis/ lhun po rgyu bzhi dbang gyur na/ srog chags rnams la smos ci dgos/ ya ma me ta k+She tsa ni ya/ ya
303b3(1): me ta/ k+She ma sa tsa ra/ ya ta k+She ma mi ru na to/ ya k+She ma mi ru na to/ ya k+She ma me ta ni ra yo/ gzhan yang bskrad pa'i nyi ma bzhis/ rgyal po'am blon po'am gzhan sde sogs/ nag po gdug pa'i sems 'chang
303b4(1): kun/ tha bor 'phar ma'i yul du bskrad/ ya me k+She ma/ ya ta k+She ma me ni tsa ra/ ya k+She ma me ta sa ru to/ ya ma me ta k+She na ni yo/ gzhan yang 'bog pa'i nyi ma bzhis/ sgrib med sems dang ldan pa na/ 'bog cing
303b5(1): dran pa 'chal nyams na/ gzhan lta kun la smos ci dgos/ ya ta k+She ma me ru na ya/ ya ma me ta k+She ni ra ra/ ya me ta k+She ma tsa na ni to/ ya ta k+She ma mo tsa sa yo/ gzhan yang dbye ba'i nyi ma bzhis/ rigs gcig rgyud
303b6(1): dang 'byed nges na/ mi mthun rigs 'byed smos ci dgos/ ya k+She ma me ta ni ra ya/ ya ma me tsa k+She tsa ni ra/ ya me ta khe ma tsa sa to/ ya ta k+She ma me ru na yo/ gzhan yang gzir ba'i nyi ma bzhis/ stobs kyi rgyal po
304a1(1): mchog nyid kyang / gzir na gzhan la smos ci dgos/ ya k+She ya tsa ni ra tsa sa to me ya/ de bzhin nyi ma bzhi ru bskor/ gzhan yang spro ba'i nyi ma bzhi/ dran pa gzhan gyi dbang 'gyur te/ ya ma ra tsas
304a2(1): to du na yo ta ya/ gzhan yang lkugs pa'i nyi ma bzhi/ cang shes smra la hri ti yang / lkugs 'gyur gzhan la smos ci dgos/ ya me to ru na yo ni ra ye k+She ya/ gzhan la rengs pa'i nyi ma bzhi/ 'phrul dga'i lus g.yo
304a3(1): lta bu yang / rengs 'gyur gzhan la smos ci dgos/ ya ta yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ de dag drag sngags mgo drangs la// de dag bzhin du nyi ma bzhi ru bskor// gzhan yang spogs pa'i sbyor ba ni// bzlog pa'i
304a4(1): las te g.yon bskor ro// dbang du bya ba'i rim pa ni// ya ni tsak+She ta me ma ya// de bzhin gzhan yang shes par bya// bskrad pa la sogs g.yon bskor ni// ya tsa ra ma k+She ta me ya// de bzhin 'bogs pa la
304a5(1): spobs pa// ye na ru me ma k+She ta ya/ dbye ba dag la spogs pa ni/ ya ra ni ta/ me ma k+She ya/ gzir ba'i las la spogs pa ni/ ya me to sa tsa ra ni tsa ya k+She ya/ smyo ba'i las la spogs pa ni/ ya ta yo na ru to sa tsa ra
304a6(1): ma ya/ lkugs pa'i las la spogs pa ni/ ya k+She ya ra ni yo na ru to me ya/ rengs pa'i las la spogs pa ni/ ma ya ra ni tsa ya ra ni yo ta ya/ de ltar mgo drangs nyi ma bzhir/ bskor na las kun nges par 'grub//
304b1(1): gzhan yang ser ba dbab pa la// spogs pa'i g.yon bskor nyi ma bzhis/ sbyin 'dang chu 'khyags 'bebs par nges/ k+She tsa ni ra ya/ ta ni ra ya/ me ru na yo/ ma tsa sa to/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rtog pa'i
304b2(1): rgyal po 'khrul 'khor gyi rgyud chen po las/ las kyi rim pa'i le'u ste bdun brgya lnga pa'o// // gzhan yang 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba ni/ tshogs drug sgo dgag dag la yang / spogs pa'i g.yon bskor nyi ma bzhi/ ya
304b3(1): me to sa tsa ra/ ya ta yo na ru to/ yak+She ya ra ni yo/ ya ma ra ni tsa ya/ phung po lnga yi rtsad gcad la/ spogs pa'i g.yon bskor bzlog pa ni/ ya me lto sa tsa/ ya ta yo na ru/ yak+She ya ra na/ ya ma ra ni tsa/ rgyu bzhi nad
304b4(1): du bslang ba la/ bzlog cing spogs pa'i g.yon bskor ni/ ra ya ma ya/ to ra me ya/ yo to ta ya/ ya yo k+She ya/ dug gsum ar la gtad pa la/ spogs pa'i g.yon bskor sbyor ba ni/ ya ma ra/ ya to me/ ya ta yo
304b5(1): yak+She ya/ gzhan yang stag mchongs dkrug pa yi/ spogs pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste/ tshogs drug sgo dgag drag sngags ni/ ya ra sa me tsa to/ ya to na ta ru yo/ ya yo rak+She ni ya/ ya ya ni ma tsa ra/ phung po lnga yi rtsad
304b6(1): gcad ni/ ya tsa to sa me/ ya ru yo na ta/ ya ni ya rak+She/ ya tsa ra ni ma/ 'byung ba rgyu bzhi nad du bslang / ya ya ra ma/ ra ya to me/ to ya yo ta yo ya ya k+She/ dug gsum ar la gtad pa ni/ ya ra ma/ ya to me/ ya
305a1(1): yo ra/ ya ya k+She/ gzhan yang khyad par drag sngags ni/ tshogs drug sgo dgag nyi ma bzhi/ bla rtags dag dang sbyar la brdeg 'od dang sgra dang dung pa sprin/ rlangs dang na bun byung na brdeg ra sa me ma
305a2(1): tsa to/ to na ta me ru yo/ yo ra k+She ta ni ya/ ya ni ma k+She tsa ra/ phung po lnga la brdeg pa yi/ drag sngags khyad par bzhi/ sku gzugs shing chen ri dang lha/ che phyugs bla rtags byung na brdeg ya ra sa me ma/ ya to na ta
305a3(1): me/ ya yo rak+She ta/ ya ya ni ma k+She/ chu bzhi 'byung ba'i bla rtags ni/ sa chu me rlung byung na brdeg ma to ru ya/ me yo na ya/ ta yA tsa ya/ k+She ra tsa ya/ dug gsum rtags bya phag sbrul/ byung na ar gtad drag sngags
305a4(1): brdeg ya ra to/ ya to yo/ ya yo ya/ ya ya ra/ gzhan yang khyad par drag sngags ni/ nyi ma dang po shar dus ni/ sa yi khams las bad kan bslang / nyi ma gnyis pa drod nyid ni/ me yi khams las mkhris pa slong /
305a5(1): nyi ma gsum pa khrag nyid ni/ chu yi khams las khrag nad slong / nyi ma bzhi pa dbugs nyid ni/ rlung gi khams las rlung nad slong / ya ra tsa ni ma tsa sa/ ya ro tsa sa me ru na/ ya yo ru na/ ti ni ra/ ya ya ni rak+She tsa
305a6(1): ni/ rlung gis khrag 'khrug dang po'o// khrag gis bad kan 'khrugs pa gnyis/ bad kan dag gi mkhris 'khrugs gsum/ mkhris pa rlung 'khrugs bzhi pa'o// ya ra k+She ni ya tsa ma/ ra to ma sa tsa me/ to yo me na ya ru
305b1(1): ta/ yo ya ta ra ya ni k+She/ chos nyid rtsad bcad nyi ma gcig yon tan rtsad gcod nyi ma gnyis/ ye shes rtsad gcod nyi ma gsum/ rang rgyud rtsad gcod nyi ma bzhi/ ma tsa sa ni tsa ra ya/ me tsa na sa ru to ya/ ta ru ra
305b2(1): na ni yo ya/ k+She ni ni ra tsa ya ya/ drod kyi dwangs ma me la thim/ khrag gi dwangs ma chu la thim/ dbugs kyi dwangs ma rlung la thim/ sha rus dwangs ma sa la thim// ya ru ra na ni ma ra/ ya ni ni ra tsa me to// ya tsa sa ni
305b3(1): tsa ta yo/ ya tsa na sa ru k+She ya/ 'byung ba bzhi yi dngas ma de/ snying po thig ler thim gyur te/ lus srog dbye ba'i nyi ma bzhi/ tsa sa ra ma ya sa to me ya/ ru to me ya na yo ta ya/ ni yo ta/ ya ra ya k+She/ tsa ya k+She ya ni
305b4(1): ra ma ya/ dgra bo dngos su byung ba na/ skye mched bcu gnyis la brdeg pa'i/ drag sngags sbyor ba'i rim pa ni/ ya ma ta me k+She ra to yo tsa ru ya na/ ya me k+She ta ma to/ yo ya ru ni na ra/ ya ta ma k+She me ni tsa yo ya ra ra
305b5(1): ni/ ya k+She ma ta tsa tsa ya ra to ni sa/ sha ba la sogs yang sbrul ni/ bcu gnyis dag gi rtags byung na/ rten 'brel bcu gnyis rtsad bcad pa'i/ drag sngags sbyor ba'i rim pa ni/ sa ni to ra ya tsa tsa ta ma me k+She ya/ ni
305b6(1): ra ra ya yo tsa ni me k+She ma ta ya/ ra na ni ru ya yo to ma ra k+She me ya/ na sa ru tsa yo to ra k+She me ta ma ya/ pha gu la sogs bla yi ni/ sprul pa brgyad kyi rtags byung na/ brdeg pa'i drag sngags sbyor ba ni/ ya na ma sa ta ru
306a1(1): me tsa ya ra me na k+She ni ta ru/ ya ni ta ra ma ra k+She ya/ ya sak+She ni me to ma ra/ chu chen blugs dang me chen 'bar/ rlung chen 'chub dang rin chen skyil/ bla chen bzhi yi rtags byung na/ brdeg pa'i drag
306a2(1): sngags sbyor ba ni/ k+She yo ra to/ ma ya to yo/ me yo ni tsa/ ta ya tsa tsa/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'khrul 'khor gyi rgyud las/ bsad pa drag po'i le'u ste bdun brgya drug pa'o// // rdo
306a3(1): rje 'chang chen gyis yang gsungs pa/ bsad pa las kyi drag sngags bdun/ gcig por gcig blangs sbyor ba ni/ ya ra sa me ma tsa to/ ma tsa to ya ra sa me/ ra sa me ma tsa to ya/ tsa to ya ra sa me ma/ sa me ma tsa to
306a4(1): ya ra/ to ya ra sa ma me tsa/ me ma tsa to ya ya ra sa/ ya to na ra ma ru yo/ me ru yo ya to na ta/ to na ta me ru yo ya/ ru yo ya to na ta me/ na ta me ru yo ya to/ yo ya to na ta me ru/ ta me ru to ya to na/ ya yo rak+She ta ni
306a5(1): ya/ ta ni ya ya yo rak+She/ yo ra k+She ta ni ya ya/ ni ya ya yo rak+She ta/ rak+She ta ni ya ya yo/ ya ya yo ra k+She ta ni/ k+She ta ni ya ya yo ra/ ya ya ni ma k+She tsa ra/ k+She tsa ra ya ya ni ma/ ya ni ma k+She tsa ra ya/ tsa ra ya ya ni ma k+She/
306a6(1): ni ma k+She tsa ra ya ya/ ra ya ya ni ma k+She tsa/ ma k+She tsa ra ya ya ni/ gzhan yang lo thog gzhom pa yi/ chu 'khyags dbab pa'i sbyor ba ni/ dkrugs pa'i man ngag nyi ma bzhi/ k+She ya ra tsa ni/ ta ra ni ya/ me na ru yo/ ma
306b1(1): sa tsa to// sprin dang 'brug dang glog dang ni/ 'byung ba bzhi yi nus pa dril/ lo thog 'joms shing sbyin 'dang 'bebs/ drag sngags bdun pa'i sbyor ba ni/ ya ra ya k+She ni tsa/ ya to ra me ma sa tsa/ ya yo to ta me na
306b2(1): ru/ ya ya yo k+She ta ra ni/ 'bur nag thog 'gros drang sngags kyis/ rdo rje thog chen gnam lcags dbab/ ni ma khye ta ni/ sa me k+She tsa/ na tsa me ma tsa/ rak+She ta me ru/ gzhan yang khyad par drag sngags bdun/ dbang
306b3(1): du bya ba'i stag mchongs ni/ ra ma yo ta sa tsa ya/ ya k+She to me ni tsa ya/ yo ta ra ma ra ni ya/ to me ya k+She na ru ya/ gzhan yang bskrad pa khyad par gyi/ drag sngags bdun pa'i sbyor ba ni/ ya ma ra ta yo tsa ya/ ya ma ti
306b4(1): k+She ya ru na/ ya ta yo na ma ra ni ra/ ya k+She ya me to tsa ni/ gzhan yang 'bog pa khyad par gyi/ drag sngags bdun pa'i sbyor ba ni/ ya ra to me yo ta k+She/ ya to yo ra ya k+She ma/ ya yo ya to ra ma me/ ya ya ra ra yo to me ta/
306b5(1): gzhan yang dbye ba'i khyad par gyi/ drag sngags bdun pa'i sbyor ba ni/ ma ra tsa me to sa ya/ me to ru na yo na ya/ ta yo ni k+She ya ra la/ k+She ya tsa ma ra ni ya/ gzhan yang gzir ba'i khyad par gyi/ drag sngags bdun
306b6(1): pa'i sbyor ba ni/ ya me ra to sa tsa/ ya me to ta yo na na ru/ ya ta k+She yo ya ra ni/ ya k+She ra ya ma ni tsa/ khyad par spro ba'i drag sngags bdun/ ya se me ma ra to tsa/ ya na ta me to yo ru/ ya ra k+She ta yo ya ni/ ya ni ma k+She
307a1(1): ya ra tsa/ khyad par lkugs pa'i drag sngags bdun/ ya ra ya ni ma tsak+She/ ya ya yo rak+She ni ra/ ya yo to na ta ru me/ ya to ra sa me tsam/ khyad par rengs pa'i drag sngags bdun/ ra ma ya ta yo tsa ni/
307a2(1): to me ya k+She/ ya tsa sa/ yo ta ya ma ra ru na/ ya k+She mi to ni ra/ dbang po lnga yi sgo dgag cing / nang grol smad lnga gtub pa ni/ ya ma ni ra tsa/ ya me sa to ru/ ya me ta na yo ni/ ya k+She ra ya tsa/ phung po lnga yi stobs
307a3(1): 'joms shing / sgo lnga rnams shes rgyun bcad pa/ ra ma me ya k+She/ to me ta ya ma/ yo ta k+She ya me/ ya k+She ma ya to/ gzhan yang ltas ngan cho 'phrul gyi/ drag sngags thod pa rgyug shes ni/ ya tsa ni ra tsa ma/ ya tsa sa to
307a4(1): ru na/ ya ru na yo ni ra/ ya ni ra ya tsa ni/ gdug pa klu yi ltas ngan dbab/ ni tsa ya ra ni ya/ ya ni yo na ru ya/ na ru to sa tsa ya/ dud 'gro'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs dbab/ sa ya tsa tsa ra ni/ na ya ru tsa to sa/ ra ya
307a5(1): ni ru yo na/ ni ya tsa ni ya ra/ gzhan yang rdo rje thog dbab pa'i/ drag sngags 'bru drug sbyor ba ni/ ra to me ya k+She ya/ to yo ta ya ma ra/ yo ya k+She ya me to/ ya ra ma ya ta yo/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rtog pa'i
307a6(1): rgyal po chen po 'khrul 'khor gyi rgyud las/ sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi le'u ste bdun brgya bdun pa'o// // bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ 'khrul 'khor khyad par sbyor ba bshad/ bsad pa'i las rnams thams
307b1(1): cad la/ rtags med 'gor zhing zag ring na/ khyad par lo langs drag po 'dis/ gshin rje ma mo gnad la 'bebs/ bcu bdun drag sngags nyin bzhin bskor/ ya ma ta k+She me ra ya to ra sa na ni ru tsa ni tsa/ ya me
307b2(1): k+She ma ta to ya/ ra yo ni na ra sa ni tsa tsa/ ya ta ma me k+She yo ra to ya sa ra ni na ni tsa tsa ru/ ya k+She me ta ma ya to yo ra na ni sa ra tsa tsa ru ni/ bon po 'am mu stegs la sogs te/ gzhan gyi lha srungs dbang bsdu ba'i/
