329b1(1): gzhan gyi stobs can gzir ba dang / mkha' 'gro gzas kha dgra la dbab/ sngags kyi dug mda' phab pa dang / srog gcod yi ge rgyud las bslangs/ rang gshed dbab cing lus srog dbye ba'o// zhes gsungs
329b2(1): pa'o// yang gsol pa/ drag sngags las drug ces bgyi ba/ ji ltar rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ drag sngags las drug ces bya ba// nam mkha'i dkyil du mthing nag gi/ phyar
329b3(1): ba sprin bkram bshigs pa dang // bar snang khams su nyi zla yi// 'od zer spros la bzung ba dang // ri rab rtse la gnam lcags kyi// mtshon dpal bdar la bcad pa dang // ri dang mtshams su zhe sdang gi/ gzhu de
329b4(1): bcag la gzir ba dang // me rlung 'obs su srid pa yi// ri bo bsgyel la gsad pa dang // rgya mtsho'i gting du mun pa yi// dmag rnams bsdus la gnan pa'o// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// dang po khro rgyal spyi bo
329b5(1): ru// bya khyung gsal bsgoms gshog pa yi// phyi nang 'og chud zil gnan pa'o// phyi snod gru gsum mthing nag 'bar// nang bcud khro bo bsam mi khyab// de ltar thams cad sgrol zhing 'joms pa'o// gnyis pa bya
329b6(1): khyung spyan gnyis las// nyi zla'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros// gzas pa'i tshe srog bzung bsdus nas// rus sbal srid pa'i ltor 'chang ba'o// drag po sngags rgod bzlas byas pas// 'od zer me lce thog ltar
330a1(1): @'phros// gzas pa'i bla srog bsdus shing bzung // 'brub khung rten la bstim zhing bsad// gsum pa bya khrung gshog pa dang // sgra dang sder mos mchu dpal gyis// rtsa srog sbyor ba gcod pa'o// drag
330a2(1): po'i thun rdzas byin rlabs can// thog gzer tsha tsha ltar 'phros pas// dmigs pa dngul chu glag byed pa'o// bzhi pa lha rnams mthu stobs kyis// gnod byed don po'i tshe bkrag phral// gzir zhing rang 'khor
330a3(1): bsrung ba'o// bdag nyid khro rgyal dpal chen gyi// zhabs 'og gdan du kun 'dus pas// gnod byed srog snying gdan 'og bsdus// rang dbang med par gzir ba'o// lnga pa 'khor lo'i thems bar de// thod
330a4(1): mkhar nang dang rus sbal lhor// gnod byed bla srog tshe bkrag bsdus// gzugs kyi ri bo bshig pa'o// drag po las kyi 'brub khung ni// srid pa bla yi khyams khang du// don po'i bla srog ling gar bsdus// mtshon
330a5(1): cha drag pos bsad pa'o// drug pa bsad dmigs srog bsdus te// 'byung ba brtan gzhi rngams 'og tu// rang dbang med par mnan pa'o// brnag pa'i tshe srog bag chags bla// snying po yig 'bru nr-i la
330a6(1): bsdus// gang dmigs gdug pa'i sar mnan pa'o// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ mkha' 'gro gzan la dbab lugs gsum/ zhes gsungs rgyas par bshad du gsol/ ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal
330b1(1): pa/ mkha' 'gro gzan la dbab lugs gsum// rang gnod lto dkrug drag pos dbab pa dang // sbyor ba thun sreg drag pos dbab pa dang // drag po gzir thabs dag gis dbab pa'o// dang po phas kyi bsrung
330b2(1): ma gang yin pa// rang gi snying pos gnas su dbang med dgug/ drag po stobs kyi gzir te kho yi gsad sngags dang // drag sngags rang gi 'khrul 'khor la btab ste// dug shing dud pas bdugs la sngags
330b3(1): rnams dkrug/ rang dbang med par gzas kha dgra la 'pho// gnyis pa rgyu rten ling ga zod par gnag/ thun bzhi'i sbyor bas kho yi lha srungs dang / ling ga drag po'i gnad kyi rdzas kyis bdug/ thun brag sreg
330b4(1): mthar zor 'phang mnan pa'o// gsum pa rus sbal lto bar 'khor lo dbus// drag po'i gnas su kho yi srungs ma sngags// snying po ming bcas dgra yi ming rus dgod// drag sngags stong gis gzir zhing gri yis
330b5(1): bsad// tshes gcig dag la dbu btsugs bcu drug gdon// yang na bcu drug dbu btsugs gcig la gnon// 'khor lo dgra yi sgrub khang gnan byas par// rang dbang med par gzas kha dgra la 'pho// zhes
330b6(1): gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ gsal ba gsum zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ lha gsal sngags gsal yul gsum zhes pa/ lha gsal bdag nyid lha yi sku ru bsgoms// don
331a1(1): rtags ldan par lus dang rtog gnas dang // snying po chos kyi 'khor lor lha rnams bsgom// sgrib sbyang don mtshon 'bras bu thob par gsal// sngags gsal bdag nyid khro bdag zugs kyi
331a2(1): rtser// mthing nag hUM gsal gshin rje gshed la yang // phyag na rdo rje la hUM yum la ma// bya khyung khrom ste dam mthar rtsa ba'i sngags// gar bzlos pa yis bskor bar gsal ba'o// sbrul gsal ba ni gzas pa'i
331a3(1): dgra bgegs kyis// rnam pa gsal byas drag po'i sngags bzlas pas// lha rnams pa spu las ni me rlung 'khor lo phyung // dgra bgegs lus srog dbang po'i nang grol blang // rang dbang med par dkrug nas
331a4(1): gsang mdzod 'jug/ thog zer mtshon chas myos brgya la srog gcod gsal// de dag gsal ba gsum zhes bshad/ ces bka' stsal pas/ yang gsol pa/ gdul thabs gsum zhes gsungs pa ji ltar lags//
331a5(1): sa gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ gdul thabs gsum zhes bya ba'i don// yi dam lhas 'dul dregs pa sdes 'dul dang // ma nyams rang gis rang 'dul gsum du bshad// dang po ye shes khro rgyal gnyen po'i
331a6(1): lha// gang rung bsgoms bsgrubs drag sngags bzlas// de yi stobs kyis gang dmigs 'dul ba'o// gnyis pa srog snying drag po sngags gnad kyi// gang gnod gdon chen rang sde mthun pa yis// gcig la kun
331b1(1): log 'dul zhing gzir byed pa'o// gsum pa gdon chen rang srog snying po de// drag sngags ting 'dzin gnad kyi byin rlabs kyis// me ltar 'bar te spyi gtsug bu gar mched// lus srog thal bar gnas nas
331b2(1): 'dul ba'o// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ drag sngags sbyor ba smin dus lnga/ zhes gsungs rgyas par bshad du gsol/ ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ drag sngags sbyor ba smin byed pa'i// dug lnga khyad
331b3(1): par 'di lta ste// stag sku kha rlangs 'don dus dang // gnod sbyin rta rgu'i dus rnams dang // srin po lto la 'brub dus dang // rus sbal khong du yan dus dang // chu srin rnga ma 'khyog dus so// dang po drag sngags
331b4(1): 'od zer 'phro// tho rangs skya rengs dang pa'o// gnyis pa drag sngags 'od zer gyis/ srog sdud nam gyi gung la'o// gsum pa dgra yi phung po la// sha za drug khri bstod cing rol// de nyid srod li dbyings
331b5(1): la'o// bzhi pa rus sbal lta ba ru/ skye ba bdun brgyud che srog 'chang / nam phyed yol na las byed do// lnga pa srod dang tho rangs kha/ tshe srog sdud byed pho nyas 'gugs/ chu rnams skra shar dus la'o// zhes gsungs
331b6(1): so// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa kun 'dus rig pa'i rgyud las/ rtsa ba don gyi le'u ste bdun brgya sum cu so gnyis pa'o// // ya ma rA dzas yang gsol pa/ yi ge'i don gsum ji ltar lags// de skad gsol
332a1(1): pas yang gsungs pa// yi ge'i don la rnam gsum ste// rang rgyud gnas pa'i yi ge dang // srog dang rgyan gyi yi ge dang // las dang sbyor ba smin pa'i yi ge'o// rang rgyud gnas pa'i yi ge
332a2(1): ni// bdag nyid dpal chen khro bo'i rgyal// ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i sku// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo la// rtsa chen bzhi dang rtsa bran brgyad// dngas ma'i rtsa la rtsa ba'i sngags// drag sngags ye nas rang grub
332a3(1): tu// ye shes 'od kyis rnam par gnas// des ni bdag gi lus srog tshe// srung skyob go char gyur pa ste// lha yi sku ru gsal phyir ro// drag sngags mthu stobs dgra bgegs la// bskyod cing bskul bar byed rkyen
332a4(1): ni// brnag pa rang rgyud rtsa dang 'khor lo la// drag sngags spu gri mtshon cha'i rnam par gnas// de dag dbus na khrag gi sbal pa ni// bye'u lan cha'i mgo bo tsam cig gnas// de yi lto na steng sgo ye nag po// 'og
332a5(1): sgo me dmar 'dod chags zhe sdang dngos// bar na gti mug bskyed pa'i la nag mo/ khongs na srog gi ngo bo nr-i ljang khu// de yi tshul ni sprin dang zhun thab dang / khrag khol lta bur gnas la drag sngags dmod pa
332a6(1): bzlas/ sngags kyi 'od zer nyi ma'i zer ltar 'phros// brnag pa'i bu ga spyi bo snying ltar zhugs// rang rgyud gnas pa'i sngags las mtshon char 'bar// nang nas rang gcod mtshon chas rang rtsa bcad// mar mo'i
332b1(1): 'og gi ya las me 'bar bas// steng gi nag po ye de khrag tu bzhu// khrag gi mar mo ya srog me 'bar gsad// khrag dang bag chags skams mas shes pa dwangs snyigs phye/ dwangs pa tshangs pa gser gyi bu ga nas//
332b2(1): hUM gis rnam pa bton nas rab 'bring tha ma yis/ ye shes bla ma'i sa dang lha yi sku rgyan pa/ rang gi lus kyi go cha tshe yi grogs su byas/ don po srog gi snyigs ma nr-i ni ljang khu ste/ 'phrog byed yi ge 'bru
332b3(1): gsum thems la blangs// seng ge sbar bas srog chags bsams ltar gnas// ze la khab 'du'i tshul du rang dbang med par 'du// rus sbal lto bar ling ga ming la thim// dregs shing gdug pa can gyi lag tu
332b4(1): gtad// des ni brnag pa gang yang 'chor mi srid/ srog dang rgyan gyi yi ge ni/ srog ces bya ba rtsa ba'i sngags/ lha rnams srog snying rang bzhin no// rgyan gyi drag sngags spu gri ste/ skabs kyi du mar sna tshogs bsgyur//
332b5(1): des ni gsang dbab bsrung gzir bzlog las rnams du ma 'grub pa ste/ mtshon cha'i rgyal po me rlung sbyin 'dang gi/ 'bru rgod dug rar blud pa'o// las dang sbyor ba smin pa'i yi ge ni/ rang rang sbyor ba sgyus
332b6(1): bzhin bcas/ drag sngags rtsa ba spu gri yis/ bar du bsgrub bya bcug cing bzlas/ bsad gzir dbab bcad bsrung bzlog rnams/ rang bzhin shugs kyis 'grub byed cing / gang 'dod 'bras bu smin pa'o// zhes
333a1(1): gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ 'pho ba gsum zhes bya ba'i don/ ji ltar gang lags bshad du gsol/ ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ 'pho ba gsum zhes gang bshad pa// rnal 'byor pa yi
333a2(1): lus ngag yid// lha yi sku gsung thugs su 'pho// dgra bgegs dmigs pa gang yin gyis// lus ni sha za'i tshogs su 'pho// ngag gi sna tshogs mtshon char 'pho// sems ni ye shes gsal bar 'pho// ci phyir
333a3(1): drag sngags ting 'dzin dang // sbyor ba'i byin gyis brlabs phyir ro// yang na rnal 'byor dgongs ldan pa'i// lus ni snang la rang bzhin med// chu zla yid kyi lus su 'pho// ngag ni grag stong gnyis su med// brag
333a4(1): cha lta bu'i gsung du 'pho// sems ni sgrib med rnam par dag/ nyi ma lta bu'i ye shes 'pho// gdul bya dmigs pa gang rung gi/ gzugs phung dregs pa gtum por 'pho// ngag ni rang gcod sngags su 'pho// yid
333a5(1): ni dngos med stong par 'pho// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa kun 'dus mchog gi rgyud las/ mngon par rtog pa'i le'u ste bdun brgya sum cu so gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen
333a6(1): pos// las kyi gshin rje'i sbyor ba bshad// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i phyir// las kyi gshin rje nag po la// don po btang ba'i sbyor ba ni// dur khrod lam mdo chu 'gram dang // shing gcig mtshan ma gcig
333b1(1): pa dang // grog mkhar ri rgod rtse mo dang // ma mo'i khyim dang lha khang dang // las kyi gshin rje'i gnas sa la// btsan dang li yi khyi chu dang // chu rgod gnyan chu gri khrag gis// sbyor te gshin rje nag po'i
333b2(1): gzugs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis khru gang tshad/ kha gdangs mche gtsigs gsus ldir che// mig bsgribs sma ra smin ma ser// sgra ni kham nag rgyan du 'khyil// gsus pa thung shal khong stong pa// gcer bu zhing
333b3(1): chen stag sham can// thod rlon 'phreng ba'i se ral kha// thod skam lnga yi dbu brgyan can// g.yas na be con g.yon sdigs mdzub// shin tu 'jigs la khro bag can// dgra bo'i gdan la brkyang bskum
333b4(1): bzhugs// sku mdog mthing nag yan lag rags/ de lta bu yi sku bzhengs te/ maN+Dal rak+ta byug pa yi/ steng du sku de bzhugs su gsol/ gtor ma phyi nang mchod pa bsham// bdag nyid rtog med chos sku
333b5(1): las// khro rgyal ya man ta kar bsgom// las gzhung bsrang zhing mchod pa dbul// 'dzab drang bstod cing thugs dam bskul// de nas gshin rje gshed po yi// thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// lho phyogs
333b6(1): dpag tshad brgyad khri'i gnas// ma la ya yi dur khrod nas// lcags mkhar thod mkhar khyams khang ste// las kyi gshin rje'i grong khyer nas// las kyi gshin rje nag po ni// skye 'gro kun gyi tshe srog bdag/ de yi
334a1(1): snying khar 'od zer thim// las kyi gshin rje 'khor bcas kyi// srog snying rang dbang med par bsdus// ze la lcags 'du ji bzhin du// 'khor bcas bkug ste gdan la bstim// bcu bdun
334a2(1): sngags bzlas yang yang bstim// mtshan ma la sogs byung gyur na// de la dbang bskur byin gyis brlabs// bdag thugs ye shes 'od 'phros pas// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// gshed bzhi gtso bo yab
334a3(1): yum bcu// spyan drang sbyor ba'i byang chub sems// spyi bor dbang bskur ye shes lngas// dbang thob khro rgyal dbu brgyan ldan// ku lan a b+hi ShIny+tsa mi/ zhes pa la sogs sngags dbang bskur/ sku de'i spyi bo mgrin pa
334a4(1): ru/ oM dang AHdang hUM bkod de/ 'od zer dkar dmar mthing 'phros pas// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// ye shes khro rgyal thugs khar thim// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa phul// sku gsung thugs kyi byin
334a5(1): brlabs bsdus// sku de'i yig 'bru gsung la thim// 'od zhu sgrib byang byin brlabs thob// mthu stobs dpag tu med par 'gyur// de ltar lan grangs mang du bya// de nas gtor ma la sogs te// mchod pa dgra
334a6(1): yi sha khrag dmigs// sku de nyid la mchod par dbul// las kyi gshin rje 'khor bcas kyis// dgra bo dngos su gsal bar bsam// thugs khar snying po sngags bcas gsal// 'od zer 'phro 'du 'khor lo
334b1(1): bskor// 'dzab dang bar chad med par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po yis// sku de byin brlabs ldan par bya// de ltar yang nas yang du bya// de ltar byin brlabs rdzogs pa de// las kyi gshin rje dngos yin
334b2(1): te// las rnams gang la sbyar kyang 'grub// dgra bo'i rgyu rten gzugs ming rus// sku de'i zhal dang lto bar gzhug/ 'od zer rno myur lcags kyu 'dras// don po bkug ste gzugs la bstim// las kyi gshin rje'i
334b3(1): zhal du gsol// lhor chud 'chor mi srid par bya// drag sngags bzlas shing gsad par bya// sngags thon gdan 'og zhing chen gyi// lho ru gzhug cing mnan par bya// gdon bgegs gnod na'ang de bzhin no// phyi
334b4(1): ru gdug pa can la mnan// des ni dgra bgegs gang yin kun// 'chor mi srid par gsod cing gzir// de ltar rgyun du ma yengs na// gang brtsams las rnams thogs med 'grub// gshin rje drag sngags
334b5(1): gang rung bzlas// sku de gang gis mthong mi rung // 'og tu mi btang 'goms mi bya// ye shes khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// las gzhung gang rung 'jug nyid la// de la gong ltar mchod pa dbul// tshig gis gang
334b6(1): 'dod las rnams bcol// dam tshig ma nyams mngon du 'grub// las kyi gshin rje'i rgyal po nyid// mngon du bkol pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ las kyi gshin rje
335a1(1): bkol thabs kyi le'u ste bdun brgya sum cu so bzhi pa'o// // 'jam dpal gzhon nus yang gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dpal rdo rje 'chang / nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba/ mngon rtog rim pa
335a2(1): bshad du gsol/ de skad gsol pas yang gsungs pa/ zhus don ngas bshad legs par nyon/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun// gshin rje gshed du sku sprul pa'i// dkyil 'khor mngon rtog rim pa
335a3(1): ni// mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms// gti mug gshin rje'i bdud 'dul ba// stong nyid ye shes rang shar sku// de bzhin gshegs pa rigs kyi gtso// gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed// sku mdog mthing nag
335a4(1): khros pa la// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// dang po 'khor lo dril bu 'khrol// bar pa be con zhing dbyug rdebs// tha ma seng ge rgyu zhags
335a5(1): 'phen// gti mug gshin rje'i gdan la zhugs// oM ta thA ga to dzi na dzig badz+ra nir ma kro d+ha ya man ta ka hUM/ khro bo chen po sgra che ba// zhe sdang gshin rje'i bdud 'dul ba// me long ye shes rang shar sku// rdo rje
335a6(1): rigs kyi sangs rgyas gtso// zhe sdang rdo rje gshin rje gshed// sku mdog sngo nag 'bar ba la// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus sngo zhal// dang po rdo rje dung dmar
335b1(1): bsnams// bar pa rgyal mtshan spu gri 'dzin// tha ma gsal shing lcags kyu bsnams// zhe sdang gshin rje'i gdan la bzhugs// oM badz+ra sa ha ya/ d+hi ge kri ra badz+ra ra ka sha ya man ta ka hUM/ rgyal pa sgra rgyal rnam par
335b2(1): rgyal// nga rgyal gshin rje'i bdud 'dul ba// mnyam nyid ye shes rang shar sku// rin chen rigs kyi sangs rgyas gtso// nga rgyal rdo rje gshin rje gshed// sku mdog ser nag rngam pa'i gdong // dbu gsum phyag
335b3(1): drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ser zhal// dang po rin chen rgyal mtshan 'phyar// bar pa be con phur pa 'dril// mtha' ma gzhu dang mda' bo che// nga rgyal gshin rje'i gdan la
335b4(1): bzhugs// oM badz+ra rat+na swa b+ha ba rat+na d+hi ka gu na sa ka ya man ta ka hUM/ 'jig rten sgra ste rab kyis mchog/ 'dod chags gshin rje'i bdud 'dul ba// kun rtogs ye shes rang shar sku// de la rigs kyi sangs
335b5(1): rgyas gtso// 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje gshed// sku mdog dmar nag brjid pa la// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus dmar zhal// dang po pad+ma kha T+wA~M kha// bar
335b6(1): pa dgra sta sgyu zhags 'phen// mtha' ma lcags kyu ril mid bsnams// 'dod chags gshin rje'i gdan la bzhugs// oM badz+ra a ro li ga ra ga bun du a mi de ba hri ya man ta ka hUM/ dpa' bo bdud sgra bdud
336a1(1): 'dul ba// phrag dog gshin rje'i bdud 'dul ba// bya grub ye shes rang shar sku// las kyi rigs kyi sangs rgyas gtso// sku mdog ldang nag gtum pa la// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir
336a2(1): bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ldang zhal// dang po rgya gram ral gri bsnams// bar pa zod 'phreng khyung khra 'gyed// tha ma gtun shing zo ba bsnams// phrag dog gshin rje'i gdan la bzhugs// oM
336a3(1): badz+ra pra dz+nyA d+h+rig I mo ka sid+hi karma ma ya man ta ka hUM/ kun kyang me dpung klong na bzhugs// dur khrod chas brgyad mdzes par ldan// spyan gsum zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs// dbu skra kham nag gyen du
336a4(1): 'khyil// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu brgyan can// shin tu dpal sgeg 'jigs tshul bzhugs// nam mkha' rdo rje'i ro langs ma// mthing nag rdo rje dung dmar bsnams// 'chi bdag bdud kyi gdan la bzhugs// oM
336a5(1): badz+ra pradz+nyA d+ha du shri mu ma/ sra brtan rdo rje dbyangs can ma// sngo nag 'khor lo dung dmar bsnams// nyon mongs bdud kyi gdan la bzhugs// oM pradz+nyA badz+ra de sha ra ti lang // gnyen sdud rdo rje mdzod ldan ma// ser
336a6(1): nag rin chen dung dmar bsnams// lha yi bu bdud gdan la bzhugs// oM pradz+nyA badz+ra mo hA ra ti maM/ 'od gsal rdo rje phag gdongs ma// dmar nag pad+ma mdung dmar bsnams// phung po bdud kyi gdan la
336b1(1): bzhugs// oM pradz+nyA badz+ra ra ga ra ti byaM/ yang bskyod rdo rje tsa tsi ka/ ljang nag ral gri dung dmar bsnams// bdag 'dzin bdud kyi gdan la bzhugs// oM pradz+nyA badz+ra ra ta taM/ kun kyang khro mo 'jigs tshul
336b2(1): rngam// dpa' sgeg byams pa'i mdangs kyis bzhugs// rtag par 'dzin pa gshin rje'i sgra// rdo rje ral gri mthing nag khros// oM badz+ra kha D+ga d+h+rig chad par 'dzin pa gshin rje'i sgra// rdo rje be con ser nag
336b3(1): rngams// oM badz+ra daN+Da d+h+ri ga bdag tu 'dzin pa gshin rje'i sgra// rdo rje pad+ma dmar nag brjid// oM pad+ma d+h+ri ga mtshan mar 'dzin pa gshin rje'i dgra// rdo rje tho ba ljang nag gtum// oM badz+ra mud ka ra d+h+ri ga kun kyang
336b4(1): gshin rje'i gdan la bzhugs// spyan gsum mche gtsigs khro bo'i sku// me dpung klong na brkyang bskum bzhugs// dur khrod chas kyis rab tu brgyan// yab yum gtso 'khor thams cad la// rus pa'i chas kyis
336b5(1): mdzes par spras// de 'khor las byed gshin rje'i tshogs// 'chi bdag drug khri drug stong gis// bskor te las byed pho nyar mngags// gang la bya ba'i gdul bya de// sgrol zhing byang chub sa la 'god// rang bzhin
336b6(1): nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor te// chos kyi sku las mngon shar ba'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu'o// // de nas rdo rje
337a1(1): 'chang chen pos// mngon rtogs las rim 'di bshad do// oM/ gdod nas rnam dag byang chub sems// bde gshegs snying po'i rang bzhin las// bdag 'dzin log rtog dbang gis 'khor// snying
337a2(1): po mchog tu sems bskyed do// nyon mongs dug lnga 'khor ba'i gzhi// dngos med stong gsal mnyam pa nyid// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs lhun grub pa'i// sgrib med ye shes dag par gsal// hUM/ ma rig rtog pa'i
337a3(1): las dbang gis// srid gsum rlag byed bdud du smin// gshin rje dregs pa gdul ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun// khro rgyal dpal chen rdo rje mdzod// hUM/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i
337a4(1): dbyings// skye med dngos med mtha' las 'das// ma bcos ma slad mnyam pa nyid// rtog med spros bral chos nyid dang // oM ma hA shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ hUM rgya chad phyogs lhung med pa yi// ye shes sku
337a5(1): ma cir yang snang // snang la rang bzhin med pa ste// thams cad gzhi'i tshon bzhin du gsal// oM d+harma d+hA du wa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ hUM/ chos rnams snying po byang chub sems// ye shes rol pa rang shar las// khro
337a6(1): rgyal gti mug rdo rjer snang // oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ ye shes rtsal shar khyad par las// me rlung chu yi snying po yis// 'jig rten khams rnams bsregs sbyangs dkrug/ raM yaM khaM/ steng 'og nam mkha' sa gzhi
337b1(1): kun// 'khor lo pad+ma shes rab thabs// oM sarba d+harma bun da tsakra At+ma ko& haM/ rdo rje thugs kyi snying po yis/ zad par lnga yi skye mched 'phros/ e yaM raM laM khaM suM b+h+rUM/ e yi ye shes rol pa las/ nam mkha' go
337b2(1): 'byed kun khyab yang / yaM gyi ye shes rol pa las/ dngos med kun khyab 'degs byed rlung / raM gyi ye shes rol pa a/ 'od gsal smin sreg me dpung 'bar/ khaM gyi ye shes rol pa las/ gnyen sdud dag pa chu
337b3(1): yi khams/ lam gyi ye shes rol pa las// sra brtan 'degs byed rin chen sa// sum gyi ye shes rol pa las// rin chen ri rab yon tan rgyas// b+h+rUM gyi ye shes rol pa las/ chos dbyings mtha' dbus med pa
337b4(1): yi// phyi dang nang med gzhal yas khang // rdo rje rgya gram mu khyud bcas// gru chad sgo bzhi rdo rje me/ dur khrod chen po me rir 'bar/ de nas rang rang gdan stengs su/ phyag rgya chen po gsal bar bskyed/ e badz+ra shu
337b5(1): n+ya ga ga na hUM/ yaM ba yu maN+Da la karma hUM/ raM dza la maN+Da la hUM/ khaM sa mud ta maN+Dal hUM/ laM sarba ti sha maN+Da la hUM/ suM badz+ra rat+na maN+Dal la hUM/ b+h+rUM bi sha bi shud d+he/ dz+nyA na badz+ra karma da du maN+Dal hUM/ gshin rje nyi zla pad+ma'i
337b6(1): gdan/ phyogs bzhi la sogs dbus su gding / rdza ma ru tra ta ri baM/ dza ma tri pa ti ra baM/ dza ma ra ka baM/ dza ma ra ka sha ti ra baM/ dza ma ya krA ti ra baM/ ma sur+ya maN+Da la/ a tsan+na maN+Da la/ pa pun da maN+Da la/ ya ma me
338a1(1): ta k+She/ ya rtsa ni ra dza sa to dran mo ni ra s+pha ra na phaT/ sa ha ra na r+thaM/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ rdo rje rgya gram ste dbus su/ ya yi ye shes rol pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi
338a2(1): bopo nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi// khro rgyal gti mug rdo rje'i sku// shin tu khro gtum sgeg par gsal// ya yi ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje dbyings phyug ro langs ma// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med
338a3(1): pas// thugs kyi snying po 'od 'phros pas// sku gsung thugs kyi cho 'phrul las// ye shes khro bo'i dkyil 'khor snang // ma yi ye shes rol pa las// shar du zhe sdang rdo rje nyid// dza yi ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje
338a4(1): tsa tsam ka gnyis gsal// me yi ye shes rol pa las// lho ru ser sna rdo rje nyid// sa yi ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje phag gdong gsal bar bskyed// ta yi ye shes rol pa las// nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje
338a5(1): dang // rdo yi ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje dbyangs can gsal bar bskyed// k+She yi ye shes rol pa las// byang du phrag dog rdo rje dang // ru yi ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje mdzod ldan
338a6(1): gsal bar bskyed// ya yi ye shes rol pa las// shar du rdo rje tho ba bskyed// tsa yi ye shes rol pa las// lho ru rdo rje be tshon bskyed// ni yi ye shes rol pa las// nang du rdo rje pad+ma bskyed// ra yi ye shes rol
338b1(1): pa las// byang du rdo rje ral gri bskyed// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bar bskyed// na yig 'dus pa'i gshin rje gshed// ga sha na ti zhes bya'o// ra yig ma yig ma 'ongs gshin rje gshed/ dga' ba'i rgyal po
338b2(1): zhes bya'o// bdag nyid dbus kyi sangs rgyas ni// gti mug rdo rje khro bo sku// ni yig de ltar gshin rje gshed// stobs mchog rgyal po zhes bya'o// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed chen dang // rdo rje dbyings phyug khro rgyal
338b3(1): ma// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med par// sbyor bas byang chub sems su zhu// rtog med ye shes 'od du gyur// chos sku rnam dag ngang du gsal// tsa tsi ka sogs lha mo bzhis// dkyil 'khor bdag po sangs
338b4(1): rgyas gtso// gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed// khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje la// snyan pa'i glu dbyangs kyis bskul ba// kye/ chos sku byang chub snying po a// 'gro ba thugs rjes gzung ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun bdag
338b5(1): khro bo'i rgyal// dpa' bo chen po'i sku mchog bzhengs// thugs rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig/ zhes bskul gnyid log sad pa bzhin// ngo mtshar rdo rje'i sku ru bzhengs// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa ste// rgyan dang cha
338b6(1): lugs rdzogs par snang // thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas nam mkhar bsam// rigs mthun lha mo bsam mi khyab// ye shes bdud rtsi'i bum chu yis// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs
339a1(1): dbang bskur bya// ye shes rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sku// dbus su rnam par snang mdzad de// shar du rdo rje sems dpa' 'o// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan no// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas so// byang du
339a2(1): don yod grub pa'i gtso// dbus su de bzhin rigs lngas brgyan// gnas gsum yi ge 'bru gsum las// dkar dmar mthing kha'i 'od zer 'phros// sems can sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// sangs rgyas sku
339a3(1): gsung thugs rdo rje// dngos grub gsum bsdus thim gyur pas// lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs// rgyan gyis rdo rjes byin gyis brlab// gnas gsum rtog pa pad+ma gar// mi 'khrugs sangs rgyas sku ru
339a4(1): gyur// k+She traM hri dzI me b+h+r-i/ sa snying nam mkha' spyan ras gzigs/ phyag na rdo rje byams pa dang / sgrib sel skye mched rnam drug brlab/ oM ma hA shA dz+nyA ta dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA a ta ri sha dz+nyA na/ oM ma hA
339a5(1): sa man ta dz+nyA na/ oM ma hA pra ta pe sha dz+nyA na/ oM ma hA krit+ta a nu ta dz+nyA na/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bak+ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba
339a6(1): At+ma ko&haM/ de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bar bskyed/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i rgyud las/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu gcig go// / de
339b1(1): nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ mngon rtogs rim pa rgyas bshad pa/ hUM/ chos kyi sku las ma g.yos kyang // ye shes rang shar rig pa'i sku// gshin rje gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir// rngam brjid khro bo'i rgyal por
339b2(1): sbrul// phyogs bzhi dbus kyi rdo rje las// gti mug mun ltar gtibs pa yi// 'chi bdag gshin rje'i gdan stengs nas// gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa// gti mug rdo rje rnam snang
339b3(1): mdzad// nam mkha'i dbyings phyug shes rab yum// thugs rje shugs kyis gshegs su gsol// zhe sdang me ltar mched pa yi// srog gcod gshin rje'i gdan stengs nas// zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms
339b4(1): mdzad pa// zhe sdang rdo rje mi bskyod pa// rdo rje tsi tsa shes rab yum// thugs rje byams ldan gshegs su gsol// nga rgyal brag ltar gtams pa yi// tshe 'phrog gshin rje'i gdan stengs nas// nga rgyal tshul gyis nga
339b5(1): rgyal 'joms mdzad pa// nga rgyal rdo rje rin chen dbang // rdo rje phag gdong shes rab yum// thugs rje kun snyoms gshegs su gsol// 'dod chags chu ltar 'khrug pa yi// khrag 'thung gshin rje'i gdan stengs
339b6(1): nas// 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// 'dod chags rdo rje snang mtha' yas// rdo rje dbyangs can shes rab yum// thugs rje dbang gis gshegs su gsol// phrag dog rlung ltar
340a1(1): 'tshubs pa yi// dbugs len gshin rje'i gdan stengs nas// phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa// phrag dog rdo rje don yod grub// rdo rje mdzod ldan shes rab yum// thugs rje
340a2(1): 'dul mdzad gshegs su gsol// shar phyogs rdo rje'i rigs las sprul// rdo rje tho ba gshegs su gsol// lho phyogs rin chen rigs las sbrul// rdo rje be con gshegs su gsol// nub phyogs pad+ma'i rigs
340a3(1): las sbrul// rdo rje pad+ma gshegs su gsol// byang phyogs las kyi rigs las sbrul// rdo rje ral gri gshegs su gsol// bde gshegs rigs lnga sprul par bcas// gdul dka' 'dul phyir khro bo'i sku// ma
340a4(1): lus spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// hUM/ rnam dag chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan lhun rdzogs sku la phyag 'tshal lo// sna tshogs rang snang sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rang byung mi shigs sku la phyag 'tshal
340a5(1): lo// ma chags mi g.yo'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// chos dbyings ye shes rang shar sku// phyag 'tshal gti mug rdo rje la'o// me long ye shes rang shar sku/ phyag 'tshal zhe sdang rdo rje la'o// mnyam nyid ye shes rang shar
340a6(1): sku/ phyag 'tshal ser sna rdo rje la'o// kun rtogs ye shes rang shar sku/ phyag 'tshal 'dod chags rdo rje la'o// bya grub ye shes rang shar sku/ phyag 'tshal khrag dog rdo rje la'o// nam mkha' go 'byed kun khyab
340b1(1): ma// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dbyings khrug ma'o// sa brtan mi 'gyur brtan ldan ma// phyag 'tshal rdo rdza rtsa ci la'o// bsnyen sdud rnam par dag byed ma/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje phag gdong la'o// sgrib med kun gsal sprin
340b2(1): byed ma/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje dbyangs can la'o// thogs med khyab byed yang bskyod ma/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje mdzod ldan la'o// rdo rje tho ba be con dang / rdo rje pad+ma ral gri ste/ ye shes sprul pa'i lha tshogs la/ sgo gsum
340b3(1): dang bas phyag 'tshal lo// hUM/ rigs lnga bde gshegs shes rab thabs// sangs rgyas khro dpal gshin rje gshed// sgrib sbyang dngos grub rtsal ba'i phyir// gnas 'dir brtan par bzhugs su gsol// e h+ya hi
340b4(1): b+ha ga wa na shrI ya man ta ka ma hA ka ru ni kri sna ya ma ri sha hUM sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya stau/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ a ti pu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ ma hA su ka sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya stau/ triSh+Ta badz+ra ho/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal
340b5(1): 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ spyan drangs phyag 'tshal gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ mchod pa'i rig pa 'di bshad do// hUM/ bde bar gshegs so khro rgyal gshin
340b6(1): rje gshed// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes bsam mi khyab// srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas brjod mi lang // kun bzang mchod sprin rgya mtsho mchog tu rol// hUM/ dri mchog sman sbyor chu gtsang bde gshegs khrus// khro rgyal
341a1(1): gshin rje gshed po 'khor bcas la// mchod pa phul lo thugs rjes dngos grub gsol// dri zhim rgyas pa'i gu gul spos kyi sprin/ kha dog dbyibs legs me tog pad+ma'i mdangs// sgrib med 'od
341a2(1): gsal dug sreg sgron me 'di// ro mchog brgya ldan gtsang ma bdud rtsi bshos// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+ha pa tra pu tsa me ka sa man ta swA ha/ oM shri badz+ra gan de a ha ra swA hA/ shri badz+ra du pe du/ shri badz+ra puSh+pe
341a3(1): pu/ shri badz+ra a lo ke hri/ shri badz+ra gan te a/ shri badz+ra ni bi te hUM/ hUM chos kyi sku las rang byung ba/ khro rgyal bdud 'dul gshin rje gshed// shes rab khro mo yum dang bcas// snang srid ye shes phyag brgyar
341a4(1): gsal// grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang // mdzad pa 'phrin las phyag brgya dang // bca' ba las kyi phyag brgya rnams// dbu gsum rnam par thar pa gsum// chos sku rdzogs sku sbrul sku gsal// phyag drug pha rol
341a5(1): phyin pa drug sgrib med ye shes drug tu gsal// zhabs bzhi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi// tshad med bzhi dang phyag brgya bzhi// rab tu rdzogs pa'i mchod par bzhes// ma hA mu tra pA tsa sa ma ye swA hA/ hUM/ rang byung rnam
341a6(1): dag bdud rtsi sman// ye shes lnga rdzogs dug lnga sel// byin brlabs grub mchog ra sa yan// khro rgyal gti mug rdo rje dang // rdo rje dbyings phyug yum chen la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// bzhes te
341b1(1): kun tu dgyes mdzod la// thugs rjes dngos grub dus 'dir gsol// sarba pany+tsa a mri ta shri ba na kha raM kha hi/ khro bo zhe sdang rdo rje dang // yum chen rdo rje tsa tsi la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// khro rgyal
341b2(1): ser sna rdo rje dang // yum chen rdo rje phag gdong la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// khro rgyal 'dod chags rdo rje dang // yum chen rdo rje dbyangs can la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// khro
341b3(1): rgyal phrag dog rdo rje dang // yum chen rdo rje mdzod ldan la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// ye shes thugs las sprul pa yi// khro bor 'bar ba bzhi rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod
341b4(1): 'bul// khro bo rdo rje tho ba la// khro bo rdo rje be con la// khro bo rdo rje pad+ma la// khro bo rdo rje ral gri la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// gzhan yang gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor// ma lus sprul par bcas
341b5(1): pa la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// hUM/ dpal chen khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// bde chen gar dbang sku gsung thugs// mi bzad rgyan gyi 'khor lo yi// dngos grub mchog rdzogs dus 'dir
341b6(1): gsol// ka ya sid+d+hi badz+ra au/ wAk+ka sid+d+hi A/ tsit+ta sid+d+ha hUM/ hUM/ oM ldan dri med dag pa'i sman// oM ldan chags mchog dbang gi rdzas// hUM ldan longs spyod phun sum tshogs// rdo rje tshogs chen snod gtams
342a1(1): @nas// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la// mchod pa 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// ma hA a mri ta pu tsa khA hi/ hUM/ rak+ta dmar chen chags pa'i bcud/ don khrag dngas ma pad+ma'i khrag khro rgyal
342a2(1): dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la/ chags pas gol ba'i mchod par dbul/ ma hA rak+ta pU tsa khA hi/ hUM/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// bde ba chen po'i byang chub sems// thig le'i 'phro 'du dgyes pa
342a3(1): che// dkyil 'khor tshogs mchog gnyis gyur cig/ oM gu ha rak+ta gu ha bu de tsit+ta ma hA su ka ho/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i zhing gyur rnams// gnyis med skye 'gag med par bskul// srog dbugs longs spyod
342a4(1): mchod pa 'dis// dkyil 'khor tshogs la 'bul lo bzhes su gsol/ oM sarba sha truM ma sa rak+ta pany+tsa ri yi swA hA/ hUM/ nga ni sangs rgyas kun gyi sku// nga ni khro bo kun gyi rje// nga ni dus gsum mngon pa'i lha// nga ni
342a5(1): srid gsum snying rje'i mchog/ nga ni khams gsum sgrol ba'i ging // nga ni gshin rje kun gyi gshed// nga ni ma mo mkha' 'gro'i yab// nga ni rang byung rdo rje'i sku// nga ni gdul dka' 'dul ba'i mchog/ nga ni tshe srog
342a6(1): kun gyi bdag khams gsum srog la rang dbang sgyur// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed pa'i// log lta dgra bgegs thams cad kun// byang chub sems su bsgral byas te// sha bza' rus 'char khrag 'thung
342b1(1): ngo// ma hA maM sa khA hi/ ma hA rak+ta khA hi/ ma hA tsit+ta khA hi/ ma hA ba su ta khA hi/ ma hA go ro tsa na khA hi/ ma hA me tha khA hi/ sarba sha truM khA hi/ hUM/ khyad par rmad du byung ba yis// 'bru bcud drangs ma'i gtor ma
342b2(1): dang // sha khrag bdud rtsi mchod pa 'dis// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa yi// thugs dam skong phyir bzhes su gsol// ma hA b+ha ling ta pu tsa khA hi/ ho/ bdag cag ma rig
342b3(1): dbang gyur te// ye shes blo dang ma ldan pas// nyams chag 'gal 'khrul ci mchis pa// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor spyan sngar ru// gnod zhing 'gyod pas mthol lo bshags// bzod par bzhes la dngos grub
342b4(1): gsol// sha ra la gats+tsha me/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor mchog gi rgyud las/ las kyi rim pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu gsum mo// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ 'dzab kyi dkyil 'khor
342b5(1): rgyas bshad do// sku gsung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thugs kyi snying po yang dag pa// hri ti sngags kyi rgyal po yin/ de bzhin chos nyid thams cad kyi// srog snying las rnams thams cad kyi// des na gsang
342b6(1): sngags mchog tu bshad// de yang gang du gang zhe na// a ni stong nyid rdo rje ste// skye med rnam dag byang chub sems// oM ni gti mug rdo rje ste// rigs lnga sangs rgyas sku lnga yin// shri zhe sdang rdo rje nyid// na zhes ye
343a1(1): shes rdo rje'o// b+hi zhes nga rgyal rdo rje bshad// hri zhes 'dod chags rdo rje la// kri zhes phrag dog rdo rje yin// ta zhes rdo rje tho ba ste/ Na zhes rdo rje be con no// hUM ni rdo rje pad+ma ste// phaT ni rdo rje ral
343a2(1): gri'o// de ltar ye shes snying po'o// de bzhin chos skyong snying po ni// oM zhes ye shes lnga yi lha// hri zhes dbang phyug lha dbang po// Sh+Ti zhes gshin rje srog gi bdag/ b+hi ni chu bdag kun tu g.yo// k+She ni gnod sbyin
343a3(1): lus ngan po// ta ni dbang ldan dbang phyug nyid// a ni drang srong me yi lha// na ni bden bral srin po ste// Na ni kun khyab rlung gi lha// hUM ni dri med zla ba ste// hUM ni 'od gsal nyi ma'o// phaT ni tshangs pa lha chen
343a4(1): po// phaT ni swa 'dzin sa yi bdag/ swa ni khyab 'jug drag po ste// ha ni log 'dren 'byung po'o// de ltar chos skyong mgon po nyid// de bzhin thar byed chen po dgu// oM ni khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// hri ni gshin
343a5(1): rje thar byed do// Sh+Ti zhes log 'dren thar byed do// b+hi ni byol song thar byed do// k+She ni gnod sbyin thar byed do// tra ni yi dwags thar byed do// Na ni dmyal ba thar byed do// na ni dam sri thar byed do// hUM ni klu
343a6(1): dbang thar byed do// phaT ni srin po thar byed do// de ltar thar byed dgu zhes bya// ye shes khro rgyal he ru ka/ dpal chen khrag 'thung dgu yin te// oM ni che mchog he ru ka/ hri ni pad+ma he ru ka/ hUM ni badz+ra he ru
343b1(1): ka/ ShI ni/ ra dan/ he ru ka/ b+hi ni bud+d+ha he ru ka/ phaT ni karma he ru ka/ kri ni rag sha he ru ka/ ta ni yak+ka he ru ka/ Ni ni gu h+ya he ru ka/ na ni sa byA he ru ka/ de ltar khro rgyal bcu zhes bya'o// gzhan yang yig 'bru bcu
343b2(1): bdun sa// gshin rje gshed kyi snying po yin// ya zhes gshin rje gshed chen nyid// ma ni ya ma ra dza gshed// me ni myos byed 'bar ba'o// ta ni ar+ya dmar ru rtse// ke ni ral pa tshar dgu'o// ra ni rdo rje bdud
343b3(1): 'joms// tsa ni phya sangs srid pa'i bdag/ sa ni kong rtse brag gyon rje// to ni a ba glang mgo rje// ru ni gshin rje ya ba ti// na ni gshin rje mig dmar yin// yo ni gshin rje smrig pa yin// ni ni gshin rje rtol
343b4(1): pa yin// ra ni gshin rje lha mchog yin// ya ni chos kyi rgyal po rje// dza ni gshin rje 'chi bdag yin// bi ni gshin rje thod dbyug rje// de ltar gshed chen bcu bdun no// de bzhin 'jig rten dregs pa
343b5(1): can// stobs kyi rgyal po bcu bdun yin// ya ni las kyi gshin rje yin// ma ni las kyi ma mo yin// me ni bdud mo nad kyi bdag ta ni dri za'i rgyal po yin// k+She ni rlung lha gnod sbyin no// ra ni bdud btsan
343b6(1): srog gi bdag/ sa ni sa bdag nag po yin// to ni bdud nag 'thoms pa'i gshed// ru ni srin po srog gcod yin// na ni klu rgyal gdug pa can// yo ni lha srin dregs pa'i gtso// ni ni dmu bdud nag po
344a1(1): yin// ra ni bdud btsan drag po yin// ya ni brag srin nad kyi bdag/ dza ni sha za dri bo yin// Ni na klu bdud nag po yin// de ltar thams cad 'dus pa ni// sngags kyi snying po zhes su
344a2(1): bshad// bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po mnyam bzhag ste// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bstim// ye shes sems dpa'i snying dbus su// rdo rje rab 'bar lte ba la// 'od 'bar gdan la snying po gnas// kun
344a3(1): 'dus gsang sngags 'phreng ba yi// 'khor lo bskor te ye shes 'phros// dbyings nyid gting mtha' med pa na// til gang bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rgyud bskul mchod phul dngos grub
344a4(1): bsdus// gnas thim sgrib sbyangs dngos grub thim// byin rlabs mthu stobs bsam mi khyab// de bzhin byang chub sems dbang po// chos skyong mgon po mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// dregs pa gtum po rgod la
344a5(1): sogs// ma lus mthu stobs bsdus te thim// gsal bas bar chad med par bzlas// 'od 'bar sku nyid mthong la sogs// mtshan ma bzang po byung gyur na// las kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya// dngos grub blang
344a6(1): zhing byin gyis brlabs// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub kun// ma lus thob cing 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor bsam gtan ni// bdag nyid gzugs kyi phung po nyid// gti mug rdo rje'i sku ru
344b1(1): gsal// rnam shes zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku// tshor ba nga rgyal rdo rje nyid// 'du shes 'dod chags rdo rje'o// phrag dog rdo rje 'dul byed do// nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// sa nyid rdo rje tsa tsi ka/ chu nyid rdo rje phag
344b2(1): gdong ma// me nyid rdo rje dbyangs can ma// rlung nyid rdo rje mdzod ldan ma// de ltar 'byung lnga yum gyi ngang // de bzhin dbang po skye mched la// las kyi sems dpa' bzhi nyid gnas// mig la rdo rje tho ba ste// rna ba
344b3(1): rdo rje be con no// sna la rdo rje pad+ma nyid// lce la rdo rje ral gri gnas// rtogs nas ye shes phyag rgyar gsal// des ni bla med byang chub thob// gang brtsams las rnams thogs med 'grub// gzhan yang bsam
344b4(1): gtan rim pa ni// chos kyi 'khor lo dkyil 'khor rdzogs// thig le gti mug rdo rje 'chang // chos nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste// ye shes ser sna rdo rje nyid// yon tan 'dod chags rdo rje'o// rang rgyud phrag dog rdo rje'i
344b5(1): sku// dngas ma lnga la yum lnga rdzogs// chos nyid rdo rje tho ba dang // rdo rje be con g.yas g.yon nyid// yon tan rdo rje pad+ma dang // rdo rje ral gri de bzhin no// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal rdzogs na// ma yengs rgyun
344b6(1): gyi ting nge 'dzin// ye shes rol pa de bzhin nyid// chu la 'ja' tshon rnam pa'i tshul// thig le byang chub sems su gsal// yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing // skye med rnam dag rang du gnas// de ltar
345a1(1): gsal zhing 'dres bsgoms te// snying po bar chad med par bzlas// phyi nang gsang ba'i bsgom pa'o// des ni tshe 'dis byang chub pa// ring po mi thogs non gyur te// bla med byang chub yang
345a2(1): dag thob// las rnams gang brtsams thogs med 'grub// rtsa sngags brgya stong sngon du ste// bcu bdun bcu pa nyin mtshan no// oM hriSh+Tha wi kri tA na na hUM phaT/ ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya dzA
345a3(1): ni/ thams cad kun 'dus snying po ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa don gyi snying po'i rgyud las/ rtsa ba'i bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu bzhi'o// de nas rdo rje 'chang
345a4(1): chen gyis// las kyi 'khor lo 'di bshad do// rtsa ba'i bsgrub pa rdzogs pa des// rang gzhung bde ba'i dben gnas su// gang 'dod rab sbyor 'khor lo bskor// gtsang ma'i ras la rdzas kyis byug/ thig bskor
345a5(1): rim pa bzhi ru bskor// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// gsang mdzod bzhi dang 'khrul mig lnga// phyi rim 'khrul mig drug gnyis la// yang logs lcags mkhar gnyen po bcu// de la gnas zhing dgod pa
345a6(1): ni// dbus su rtsa ba'i 'bru lnga dgod// gsang mdzod dmigs pa'i rnam pa'o// drug gnyis me dpal gshed kyi 'bru// bcu la thugs kyi snying po bcu// tha ma'i mu khyud stong pa la// gang dmigs las grub gsang
345b1(1): sngags dgod// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor kha sbyar la// sngags kyi bdag po'i lto bar dri'o// de ni spyi ru shes par bya'o// zhi ba las kyi 'khor lo ni// cong zi dkar dang sa zhag dkar// gtsang ma'i chus byugs
345b2(1): dngul chu dang // ga bur tsan dan dkar po dang // cu gang shing thog g+hi haM dang // lhang tser dkar pos 'khor lo bri// ri zlum snum la 'jam pa'i gnas// der bsgrub da sa'i ga 'ur gzhug/ ras kyi skud pa dkar
345b3(1): pos dkri// lha rnams man shel lta bur bsgom// me tog dkar pos mchod par bya// sbrang rtsi mar dkar sbyor ba'i byug/ byams pa dang ba'i sems ldan pas// 'od zer dkar po'i 'phro 'du bya// bsgrub bya gang
345b4(1): yin snying khar thim// sdang sems gnod sems zhi 'gyur te// byams sems dang ba'i sems ldan te// nyon mongs zug rngu dag cing zhi// der bsam ga'u 'khor lo de// tsan dan dkar po'i me la
345b5(1): bsro// sngags bzlas rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo de// bka' rten rab gnas byin can nam// byin ldan zhi ba'i sku gdan sba// des ni dgra sdang gnod byed gdon// nad dang mtshon cha gcan gzan sogs// gnod
345b6(1): byed nyon mongs thams cad kun// rab tu zhi zhing byams par gyur// drag po gtum po'ang zhi bar nges// 'di la the tshom med par bshad// sarba ma nu a a me tri shan ti baM la ha he shan ting ku ru swA hA/ a ho//
346a1(1): dbang gi las kyi 'khor mo ni// ri bo dgu 'dus chu klung 'gram// gnas der rgya skyegs can dan dmar// g+h+na ha pad+ma'i me tog dang // rak+ta mu la me tog dmar// khye'u dang rngu rtse mon sran
346a2(1): gyis// 'khor lo legs bris sngags rnams dgod// gnas sa de nyid ga 'ur gzhug/ skud pa dmar po stobs ldan dkri/ lha bsgom byi ru'i sdong po 'dra// sna tshogs me tog dmar pos mchod// sbrang rtsi mar dang
346a3(1): pad+mas byugs// chags pa dbang sdud sems ldan pas// 'od zer dmar po lcags kyu'i dbyibs// bsgrub bya gang yin snying khar thim// yid dang shes pa srog dbang po// rang dbang med par dbang du
346a4(1): 'dus// tshur 'dus bdag thim bdag dbang 'dus// de gsal ga'u 'khor lo de// tsan dan ser ldan pad+ma ka'i// me la bsro zhing sngags bzlas te// bdag nyid 'og tu sbas byas na// skye 'gro ma lus thams
346a5(1): cad kun// rang dbang med par bdag dbang 'gyur// gang sgrub lha gzhan rbad dang // 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// lha srin pho mo ma lus pa// nges par dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// lhug po rgyu bzhi
346a6(1): yang dbang 'gyur na// gzhan dag kun la smos ci dgos// pa shang a na ya b+ha sha ta/ pa shang wa shang ku ru hri hUM dza dza/ rgyas pa las kyi 'khor lo ni// ri bo lhun stug nags tshal dang // 'bras bu me tog rgyas pa'i
346b1(1): sar// ku sha star bu tsan dan dang // 'bras bu me tog rgyas pa'i sar// 'bras bu mar yod shing bcud dang // gser dang ldong ros ha ri ta// yu ba zangs lcags dngul dang spug/ 'o ma bi shas 'khor lo
346b2(1): bri// sngags rgod longs spyod rgyud ldan pa'i// ga'u skud pa ser pos dkri// lha rnams gser gtso 'dra bar bsgom// me tog ser po sna tshogs mchod// sbrang rtsi lan tshwa rtsi mar byug/ dga' ba yid bzhin rgyas pa
346b3(1): yis// sems dang ldan pas sngags bzlas shing // 'od zer ser po yid bzhin rgyas// sems dang ldan pas sngags bzlas zhing // 'od zer ser po yid bzhin rgyas// rgyal srid 'bru nor longs spyod
346b4(1): rnams// rab tu 'dus shing 'khol rgyas bsgom// ga'u 'khor lo ser po'i shing // byi thang tsan dan me la bsre// skyed mos tshal dang mdzod khugs na// de ni rigs brgyud nor bu 'bru// thams cad rgyas shing
346b5(1): 'phel 'gyur te// longs spyod rgyal chen bzhi dang mnyam// sdong gcig zha lag 'phel 'gyur na// gzhan dag kun 'phel the tshom med// rat+na gu na hri b+ha'u sha ta po// sha na ma de ba d+ha da de ya b+ha'u sha ta// puSh+Ti swa
346b6(1): ra ya ku ru ho// dgug pa las kyi 'khor lo ni// ri phrag phyag bdud ri bo bdud// rang byung khrag dang pa la sha/ mu la rag+ha g+hi hang gis// 'khor lo sngags bri hri dza spel// bud med thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug
347a1(1): skud pa rten 'brel dmar po dkri// lha rnams dmar smug chags pa'i mdog/ me tog dmar pos mchod cing bzlas// tso zi dmar pos ling ga byug/ gdungs shing dbang sdud sems ldan
347a2(1): pas// 'od zer lcags sku dmar po yis// bsgrub bya'i snying kha'i srog rtsa zung // mgrin pa zhags pa dmar pos bcings// rlung gi shugs bzhin myur 'ong bsam// seng ldeng tsan dan me la bsra// sngags pa
347a3(1): bzlas ga'u rang 'og gzhug/ rtag pa rgyun gyi ting 'dzin bya// shing lo skam po rlung 'das bzhin// bsgrub bya rang dbang med par 'gugs// shing skam rtse mo rtsar 'gugs na// shes ldan rnams la smos ci
347a4(1): dgos// ha ra ha ra dza/ A kaR+Sha ya dza/ A kaR+Sha ya hriH/ rengs pa las kyi 'khor lo ni// dur khrod ras la yung bas bri// lam dang ming spel sngags rnams dgod// nags ma shing gi thang chu dang // gar sprin tsha la
347a5(1): gu gul gnag/ de sbyar rin rab chen po yi// sa yi ga'u kha sbyar gzhug/ ri rab ri bdun bcas pa bri// ser po hUM baM laM gyis spel// rdo rje rgya gram dbus nyid mnan// ga'u skud pa ser po dkri// lha rnams
347a6(1): gser mdog 'dra bar bsgom// lhor bltas sngags bzlas 'od zer ni// ser po 'phros pas dmigs pa de// ser po ri yis mnan par bsam// ri rab rdo rjes mnan byas te// 'jigs pa'i me 'dris
347b1(1): bcings par bsam// 'khor lo rkang gcig shing gnyen nam// ri rab chen po'i 'og tu mnan// lcags kyi khyud mos bcings pa bzhin// dmigs rings gnas nas 'gul mi nus// laM sba sgra ne sba ba na laM laM
347b2(1): ya thA pra ra d+ha ka ra s+tha/ kri tra trang / staM b+ha ya/ nan ku ru laM/ bskrad pa las kyi 'khor lo ni// gro ga shing shun 'khor lo bri// bya rog rkang stug khrag gis bri// rlung gi dkyil 'khor ming byang spel// smyon pa'i thod pa
347b3(1): kha sbyar gzhug/ nim pa shing gi bcud dang sbyar// yugs sa mo'i skra'i skud pa nag pos dkri/ lha rnams sku mdog ljang sngon bsgom// brnag pa bdag 'dun gsal byas te// 'og tu yaM las rlung gi dal// sngon po
347b4(1): gzhu'i dbyibs ba dan bzhi// de stengs rlung gi rnga mo ni// sngon po kha ser de rgyab tu// brnag pa bzhag ste de rgyab tu// khro bo gshin rje sngo nag pas// dbyug thos brdeg cing lho phyogs su// rang dbang med par de
347b5(1): nas 'gro// bsam zhing bzlas pa'i sngags rdzogs nas// dur khrod ri mthon rtse la sba// bya rog skyer gdags rlung la spur// 'dis ni bsgrub bya gang yin de// rigs mi gcig gi yul du skrod// stobs chen gyis
347b6(1): kyang mi zlogs so// hUM phaT s+pha ra na ya phaT/ phaT u tsa ta ya u tsa ta ye yaM yaM hUM phaT/ b+ha ya b+ha u tsa ta ya hUM phaT/ dbye ba las kyi 'khor lo ni// rta dang ma he'i khrag gis bri// gnas bdun sa la de gnyis
348a1(1): gzugs// de yi snying khar 'khor lo gzhug/ gcig gi steng du gcig bzhag ste// de gnyis thod pa'i ga'ur gzhug/ skud pa rten 'brel sngon pos dkri/ bya rog 'ug pa rlung la 'thab// bsam
348a2(1): gtan ldan pas sngags bzlas pa// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed bsgoms te// mdun du rta dang ma he gnyis// steng du brnag pa zhon dmigs te// gnyis ka'i lag na mtshon cha thogs// gcig la gcig brdeg/
348a3(1): khro sems kyis// 'thab cing khro brdeg 'thab par bsam// sngags bzlas 'khor lo thod par bcas// nyi ma phyed na dur khrod sba// nyi ma dus tshod dgra gshed la'o// rgyud gcig gnyis su 'byed 'gyur na// lus

348a6(1): nim pa dang // dur khrod sol ba tsha ba gsum// d+ha du ra dang tsi tra ka/ tsha ba'i mar khu sme ba lnga// tsan da bi dza srin lag khrag/ ka na ka yi khu ba yis// nri rangs rgya dang skya bcad de// ldum bu thang phrom kha shog

348b5(1): mdog nag zhal gcig la// phyag gnyis 'khor lo lcags kyu thogs// de sogs mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// 'jigs khros tsha tsha ltar 'phros pas// bsgrub bya gang yin lus la thim// rnam shes dbugs
348b6(1): mdangs srog phrogs nas// 'brub khung rten gyi gzugs la thim// gong ltar khro bo 'jigs tshogs spros// bsgrub bya sna tshogs nad rnams kyis// gdungs shing mnar te rid la skams// gcer bu sdug bsngal
349a1(1): yid mug pa// shu bas lus khengs mig rtsa rig skad ngan khro tshogs sha zas bskor// ral gri phur pa 'khor lo mda'// mtshon cha tshabs che btab cing gtubs// rlung chen gyis g.yengs grang
349a2(1): 'khyags 'dar// mdangs med lus la me chen 'bar// tsha bas gdungs shing sreg par byed// chu bo 'jigs pa rba drag pa// rlabs chen po yis khyer zhing bying // nyam chung sas nub ri yis mnan// stobs zad

349b1(1): 'thub cing sha rnams za// khrag 'thung rus pa 'cha' bar bsam// de nas 'khor lo ling gar bcas// dregs shing gdug pa'i dur khrod du// gtad rtsang bsreg dang 'phang bar bya// spyod lam rgyun gyi ting 'dzin/
349b2(1): bya// ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She la/ ya k+She ya dza ni ra ma ya/ oM hri Sh+Ti bi kri ta/ A na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ stam pa ya/ staM pa ya/ nA sha ya/ nA sha ya/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ hUM hUM phaT/
349b3(1): phaT/ mA ra ya dza/ mA ra ya phaT/ mA ra ya hUM/ mA ra ya nan/ oM shrI pa ra ya k+She gu h+ya sarba ka la ru pa ma ra na phaT/ oM ya ma badz+ra tsan da hri sti badz+ra rak+She ya ma baM baM khA hi hUM hUM a mu ka pa shaM ku ru hri la hri la/ mA ra ya dza/

350a1(1): byed chen po yi// rtsa ba'i dngos grub bsgrub thabs la// sku yi phyag rgya chen po dang // de nyid sgrub thabs rnam grangs dang // rab tu sbyor ba'i rim pa dang // mthar thug drag po'i sngags rgod

351a1(1): pas ri sgeg mnan// brgyad pa'i zhabs kyis bzhad mnan pa'o// ral pa dmar ser gyen du brdzes// thod pa skam po'i dbu rgyan can// gcer bu gsus khyim che la brjid// zod rlon khrag 'dzag
351a2(1): do zhal can// keng rus dur khrod rgyan gyis mdzes// pho mtshan gyen bsgreng me dpung klong na bzhugs// ha ha phem mo'i sgra sgrogs pas// tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug che// khyab 'jug gzhon nu za bar byed//

351b2(1): dbyangs A li kA li ste// 'bru bcu sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // 'bru lnga 'bru drug btu ba yin// rtog pa bzhi pa bsgom pa ste// shin tu mnyam par gzhag bya ba// dpa' bo'i gnas la gnas pa'o// zhes bya ba ni

351b5(1): rtog pa bzhi pa nas// de kho na nyid sbyor ba las// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yi// sngags par rtag tu bsgom par bya// zhes pas rdzogs pa'i rim par bstan// rgya che zab dang zung 'jug go/ de dag rgyas par
351b6(1): bshad pa'o// rtog pa bdun pa zhes bya ba// bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud yin zhes// rgyud rgyal 'di las rgyas par bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgya che rol pa'i rgyud las/ rnam par dbye ba'i ste brgyad brgya
352a1(1): don gcig pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// rdo rje 'jigs byed sgrub thabs bshad// rdo rje 'jigs byed khro rgyal mchog/ bsgrub par 'dod pa'i sngags pa yis// rgyud chen 'di nyid
352a2(1): dbang bskur zhing // dam tshig ldan pas bsnyen pa bya// de nas bsad dang bskrad pa dang // dgug dang dbang bsdu dbye dang rengs// ral gri mig sman ril bu ro// bcud len 'byung po ro langs dang // sha za
352a3(1): gnod sbyin pho mo dang // ma mo mkha' 'gro klu sa bdag/ la sogs sna tshogs yid bzhin gyis// nor bu 'dra ba bsgrub par bya'o// dur khrod nang stong mtshan ma gcig/ chu 'gram shing gcig ri yi rtse// grong khyer
352a4(1): lha khang ma mo'i khyim/ khang stong bzhi mdo 'thab mo'i gnas// byin che bkra shis bde gnas su// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams bshad de// shin tu mnyam bzhag sngags pa yis// 'byung ba'i tshes ni bcu bzhi
352a5(1): mtshan mo yar phyed mar phyed na// gcer bu sgra gsil thal chen dang // rnam par snang mdzad tshil chen gyis// lus byug khrag chen thig le gdab// bdud rtsi rnam lnga sha chen bza'// cang te'u dkrol zhing dur
352a6(1): khrod kyi// gnas su ha ha zhes brjod cing // gar stabs bya zhing sngags bzlas bsgom// rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dges// ci 'dod pa la dngos grub ster// dur khrod gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro de// thams cad
352b1(1): rab dga' las byed khur// de nas sngags pa dpa' bo yi// g.yas pa rjes snang ral gri thogs// g.yon pa thod pa rlon pa thogs// dkyil 'khor lho phyogs gom pa bdun// bor ba'i sa der dong khru gang // gru
352b2(1): gsum bskor ba'i sa dag dang // gnas bdun grog mkhar sa rnams la// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed cing // g.yas g.yon gri gug thod pa thogs// byas la byang du kha bstan bzhag/ chos nyid rnam dag
352b3(1): sngags kyi sbyang // stong nyid hUM las gri gug gyur// de las las kyi 'jigs byed gyur// de las 'chi bdag mdung gi phug lce sbyang stag dom gcan gzan tshogs// ro la 'drad cing bya rog kha// kang ka 'ug pa sha
352b4(1): za bri// rnal 'byor gcer bu bsgrub pa po// skra bshig phyag rgya lnga dang ldan// thod pas dbu brgyan ha ha rgod// thod pa cang te'u kha T+wAM 'dzin// bcom ldan khros la rtse gcig lta// dur khrod gnas der 'jug pa
352b5(1): bri// gzhan gyis mi mthong rab gnas bya'o// dkyil 'khor rdzas kyi lho phyogs dgram// gzhan yang zhing chen zhing chung gi/ bla re 'phan 'phran rgyu zhags dang // mi rkang gling bu thod pa'i rnga// dur khrod keng rus
352b6(1): rdzas rnams dgram// khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// dam rdzas mchod rdzas rgyan rdzas yin// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ rdzas dang dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya don
353a1(1): gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed la// mchod pa'i las rim 'di bshad do// mo ma ha shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra sa ma ti rbA/ mo d+harma na swa b+hA at+ma ka&H/ a d+ha/
353a2(1): oM a ra pa tsa na d+hi/ oM ya man ta ka hUM phaT/ oM hriSh+Ti bi kri tA na na hUM phaT/ ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She ya dza ni ra ma ya/ dzaHhUM baM ho badz+ra sa b+ha ya dza/ oM shri badz+ra/
353a3(1): d+had+hAd+ha pe/ puSh+pe/ A lo ke gan d+he/ ni bi te swA hA/ i daM ba ling ti/ sarba sha traM/ ma hA maM sa/ ma hA rak+ta/ ma hA tsit+ta/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ gri h+na gri h+na/ pU dza sa ma ya swA hA/ sarba pany+tsa a mri ta ar+g+haM pra ti dza ho/ kha raM kha hi/
353a4(1): kAM ya badz+ra sid d+hi au/ bA ka badz+ra sid d+hi AHtsit+ta badz+ra sid d+hi hUM/ bla ma yi dam rdzogs sangs rgyas/ dbyings nas spyan drang phyag 'tshal mchod/ sdig pa bshags shing longs spyod tshogs/ bsgrub bya'i rnam par
353a5(1): spangs spel brlab/ mchod dbul mnyes bya mnyam bzhag ste/ dpa' bo'i gnas la rtag tu 'dug sngags bzlas ma yengs bsgom par bya'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ mchod
353a6(1): pa las rim gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya don gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// mnyam bzhag bsgom pa'i rim pa bshad// rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor lhor 'dug ste// snying khar a las nyi ma'i
353b1(1): dal// de stengs hUM las rdo rje 'chang // sngon po rtse dgu kha gyes gdengs// lte bar hUM yig sngo nag la// de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// bla ma dkon mchog rig pa'i lha// rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs
353b2(1): rnams// mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs te// phyag 'tshal bdun po rnam dag bya'o// de la sngar gyi tshig bcad kyis// 'dod pa'i don gyis gsol ba gdab// rjes su gnang ba byin bsams te// badz+ra mu yis
353b3(1): gshegs su gsol// de nas bsgrub par bya ba ni// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi tshad med bsgom// sdig tho mi dge'i chos rnams spangs// dge ba rnam par spyod pa ste// sems kyi rgyud cig yongs su dag/ sdug bsngal
353b4(1): rgya 'bras bral ba dang // bde ba'i rgyu 'bras phrad par ldan// de nyid mi 'bral rgyun brtan dang // thams cad kun snyoms chos brgyad bral// de ltar tshad med rnam bzhi bsgom// de nas sngon du chos thams
353b5(1): cad// bdag med spros bral ma bcos dang // rang bzhin rnam dag byang chub sems// de yi ngang las chos thams cad// snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// de nas raM las nyi ma'i dal// hUM la sna tshogs rdo rje
353b6(1): bsgom// lte bar hUM 'od zu ba las// rdo rje'i sa gzhi rwa ba gur// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings nyid du// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni// sngon po rgya gram ba dan mtshan// de stengs a las gyur pa yi// zla ba'i
354a1(1): dkyil 'khor dri med dmigs// de stengs dmar ser d+hi ru gsal// de las ral gri d+his mtshan pa// ral gri d+his mtshan yongs gyur las// 'jam dpal rdo rje gser mdog can// zhi ba'i tshul
354a2(1): 'chang rgyan gyis mdzes// ral gri ut+pal po ti bsnams// a las thugs khar nyi ma yi// dkyil 'khor gsal zhing 'dris par bsgom// de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa
354a3(1): yi// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' lha mo'i tshogs// ye shes khro bo spyan drangs la// nyi ma la thim 'jam dpal dang // de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems// thams cad ro/
354a4(1): gcig chos nyid gyur// sku yi zhing khams dag pa'o// de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i// dpag tshad stong phrag 'bum khyab las// gsang sngags byin brlabs kun bsdus
354a5(1): te// thim pas de nyid hUM du gyur// mthing nag 'od zer lnga ldan bsam// gsung gi zhing khams dag pa'o// de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems// la sogs phyag 'tshan/
354a6(1): bsdus te thim// rdo rje sngon po rtse dgu pa/ kha gyes 'od zer lnga ldan 'gyur// lte bar nyi ma'i gdan la hUM// rdo rje lte hUM sangs rgyas las// 'od 'phros sangs rgyas zhing yang dag/ sems can yongs su smin byas
354b1(1): pa// thugs kyi zhing khams dag pa'o// rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // ye shes khro mo lha mo rnams// nam mkha' til gyi gang bu ltar// gang ba nyi ma la gnas bsam// de
354b2(1): dag rnams kyi mchog bsdus nas// yongs su smin sbyangs byang chub bkod// 'dus nas rdo rje la rab thim// rdo rje de nyid yongs gyur pas// shin tu mi bzad gshin rje gshed// rdo rje 'jigs byed sku ru
354b3(1): gyur// shin tu khros shing rngam pa'i gdong // dus mtha' me ltar 'bar bar bskyed// de la ye shes rigs dbang bskur// rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan la// sku gsung thugs nyid byin gyis brlab// skye mched
354b4(1): drug kyang byin gyis brlab// gong bzhin gzhal yas khang nang bsgom// de bzhin rdul tshon dkyil 'khor du// ting 'dzin khro bo sems dpa' bsgom// thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// rang bzhin dbyings
354b5(1): kyi gnas chen nas// ye shes sems dpa' khro rgyal nyid// spyan drangs phyag 'tshal gnyis med bstims// sngon du byon la mchod pa dbul// yang na bdag nyid rab gnas pas// de la de bzhin mchod pa
354b6(1): dbul// mchod pa'i rnam pa de dag kun// lugs bzhin byin gyis brlabs la dbul// ser mo spos khang thogs la sogs// phyi yi mchod pa byin brlabs dbul// yaM raM a tra khang las ni// rang rang byin
355a1(1): brlabs sngags brjod pas// bdud rtsi rak+ta gtor ma gsum// stong gsum gang bar byin brlabs dbul// yang na 'dod yon lha mor dbul// de dag bsnyen pa'i skabs su'o// bsgrub dang drag
355a2(1): po'i skabs rnams su// snang mdzad tshil chen bdug spos te// bkrag mdangs yid 'ong me tog la// drod dang tshil chen mar me'o// dri chab de bzhin shes par bya// rak+ta de nyid srog gi khrag/ gtor ma sha rus
355a3(1): tshil la sogs// bdud rtsi bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// de ltar byin gyis brlabs la dbul// dngos su gsol mnyes tshims par bsam// de nas dkyil 'khor lho sgo nas// bdag nyid dpa' bo'i gnas 'jug
355a4(1): 'dug/ sngar gyi tshigs su bcad pa yis// ye shes 'jigs byed khros la gsol ba gdab// dpa' bo'i gnas la sngags bzlas bya// bdag nyid thugs khar nyi ma'i gdan stengs su// ya yig sngon po khong stong de
355a5(1): dkyil na// rdo rje sngon po rtse dgu kha gdengs pa// lte bar ya dkyil nyi ma hUM nag po// de la yig 'bru lnga drug bcu pa dang // bcu bdun sum cu rtsa gnyis sngags kyis bskor// bdag dang mdun gyi 'jigs byed
355a6(1): gnyis la bsgom// gsang sngags bzlas pa gang byed dus nyid du// bdag nyid ma he'i zhal nas sngags 'os 'phros// mdun gyi ma he'i zhal du 'od zer zhugs// mdun gyi ma he'i zhal gyi thugs
355b1(1): khar thim// dngos grub mthu bsdus bdag gi thugs khar thim// mthu stobs byin brlabs bdag la dngos grub 'dus// mdun gyis ma he'i zhal nas 'od zer byung // bdag gi ma he'i zhal du 'od zer
355b2(1): zhugs// bdag nyid khro bo'i thugs kha nas 'od byung // mdun gyi 'jigs byed rdo rje'i thugs kar zhugs// thugs dam rgyud bskul sgo gsum dngos grub bsdus// mdun gyi 'jigs byed thugs nas 'od zer
355b3(1): byung // bdag nyid rdo rje 'jigs byed thugs khar thim// bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// khro rgyal sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'dus// bdag dang khro rgyal mthu stobs gnyis med gyur// de
355b4(1): ltar gsal bar 'khor lo ltar bsgoms zhing // gsang sngags bar chad med par ma yengs bzlas// thun mtshams dus su me mar gcig las kyang // gnyis su mched ltar gnyis byas bzlas pa bya// nang du
355b5(1): 'jug dus gnyis po gcig tu thim// sngar bzhin bsam gtan ma yengs bzlas par bya// bzlas pa'i dus su bdud rtsi ril bu'am// me mar chen po kha ru bcug la bzlas// thun mtshams dus su tshogs kyi
355b6(1): 'khor lo bya// mchod dbul bstod bskul gang 'dod 'phrin las bcol// drod rtags mtshan ma byung byung bzlas// de dus dngos grub blang zhing gnyis med 'gyur// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor phyags la chu bor
356a1(1): dor// yang na sna tshogs nad zor dgra la 'phang // grangs kyi bsnyen pa bye ba tshig 'bum gsum// dus ni rlung nag 'brug sgra 'tshub nag g.yos// mtshan ma phyi nang gsang ba gsum du
356a2(1): 'byung // sngags pa dbang thob dam ldan pas// ma yengs rtse gcig bsgom bzlas na// thams cad las ni thogs med 'grub// 'di yi rnal 'byor la gnas na// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub rnams// ma lus
356a3(1): myur du thob par 'gyur// 'di la the tshom med par nges// de skad rdo rje 'chang chen gis bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying po'i rgyus las/ bsam gtan gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya don bzhi
356a4(1): pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// drag po bsgrub pa'i las rim bshad// mi bsad g.yul bkye ro bsregs dang // dur khrod mi phung khang sa la// 'brub khung gru gsum khru gang pa// tsher shing kha dmar
356a5(1): gtsang gis bskor// thod rlon 'phreng bas kha dgyer bskor// phyi nang dug sna khrag snas byug/ sngags pa'i g.yas phyogs de ltar bya// bsgrub bya'i dri chen dri chu dang // rjes sa skra shad ngar snabs gos// dri ma grog
356a6(1): mkhar sa rnams la// ling ga mtho gang dbang po dod// dpral bar rus bris snying khar ni// bla la bla gdags lto bar ming // dug dang khrag snas bris la gzhug/ gri mon rabs chad thod par brnag/ dong du
356b1(1): bcug la byad kyis bcing // gzhan yang dur khrod shing gcig dang // chu 'gram lam gyi bzhi mdo dang // grog mkhar mtshan ma gcig pa dang // rgyal po'i sgo dang ri rgod sa// las kyi gshin rje gnas sa la// chu
356b2(1): rgod shi khrag lngas sbyar te// gshin rje'i gzugs bya khru gang tshad// zhal gcig phyag gnyis gsus khyim che// gcer bu skra bsil mche ba gtsigs// g.yas g.yon ral gri zhags pa 'dzin// dur sol shing khrag
356b3(1): rams kyis byug/ snying khar gru gsum brnag pa gzhug/ de la dur khrod thod mkhar nas// las kyi gshin rje bkug la bstim// gtor ma byin te las rnams bcol// 'brub khung gzugs la kha bstan
356b4(1): bzhag/ de nas 'khrul 'khor gzhung bzhin bri// dkyil 'khor bri zhing gtor ma bsham// dkyil 'khor dbus su 'khor lo bzhag/ yang na 'brug khung steng du lding // ting nge 'dzin dang rab ldan pas// slob
356b5(1): dpon lho nas drag sngags bzlas// grogs gcig shar nas ling ga dang // drag po rdzas kyi sbyin sreg bya// byang nas ling ga gtor ma dbul// gcig gis nub nas tshogs mchod bya// thun mtshams bcol
356b6(1): bskul dgra la rbad// de yang dang po'i thun la 'jig rten dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i thun mong sbyin sreg bya// gnyis nas bzhi pa'i bar du ling ga rus chen dang // sha khrag tshil dang tsha ba'i mar khu
357a1(1): sbyar// bsnyen pa gang bskul sngags kyi sbyin sreg bya// mtha' ma'i thun la grogs po bzhi log ste// drag po bsad pa las kyi sbyin sreg bya// yang na rnal 'byor bdag nyid gcig pus bya// de nyid
357a2(1): dus kyi bsam gtan ting 'dzin ni// bdag nyid khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// zhabs brgyad g.yas nas nad brgyad spro ba dang // zhabs g.yon 'og nas 'phra men ma brgyad spro// thugs kha dag nas zhags
357a3(1): pa lcags kyu thogs// mtshon cha thogs pa'i 'jigs byed grangs med spros// brnag pa gang yin thal bar byas par bsam// de ltar rtags byung bar du bsgrub par bya// drag po bsad pa'i sbyor ba dang // dbang
357a4(1): drag la sogs las rnams bya'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ drag po bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgya brgya don lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// bsad pa drag po'i 'khrul
357a5(1): 'khor bshad// rnal 'byor rdo rje 'jigs byed skur gnas pa// thal chen lus byugs skra bsil ha har rgod// sha chen bdud rtsi ril bu kha ru mur// las kyi 'jigs byed dbang gzugs gtor me
357a6(1): btang // dpa' bo'i gnas 'dug da la bsgrub mchod pa bya// 'byung po'i nyi phyed yol nas lhor bltas te// drag po mtshon cha'i 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya// dur khrod ras sam zhing chen pags pa la// lan tshwa skye che
357b1(1): nim pa du ru sa// dug sna khrag sna tsha ba gsum// rme ba lnga dang ni ra su// sku bcad dung phyis legs bya te// ka ka ni rangs stug gu yis// le tshe bcu drug 'khrul 'khor bri// sum cu rtsa gnyis bcu pa yi// sngags
357b2(1): dgod hUM brgyad bri bar bya// de phyir spu gri drag po dgod/ kha sbyar bsgrub bya'i ming byang dgod// me gnyis dbus su bzhag la bsad// thod pa kha sbyar nang du bzhug yang na gzugs brnyan lto bar gzhug 'khor
357b3(1): lo bri ba'i rim pa'o// de nas 'khrul 'khor byin brlab pa// dbus kyi ya yig yongs gyur las// 'chi bdag gshin rje'i grong khyer bsam// 'khrul 'khor me gnyis bsreg pa de// 'gro ba rigs drug khang par
357b4(1): bsam// drag sngags me gnyis me dpung 'bar// sngags gzhan 'jigs byed pho brang 'jug/ sngags rnams las kyi gshin rje mtshon// gang la reg pa gcod par bsam// ming byang ling kha dgra bo dngos// tshe
357b5(1): srog las kyi gshin rje yi// mtshon cha'i khang par 'chang zhing gcod// de ltar bsam gtan sbyor ba bya// zab khung nang du 'khrul 'khor de// nim pa'i shing gi me la bsro// bdag nyid 'jigs byed khro bor
357b6(1): bsgom// rkang pa g.yon pas 'khrul 'khor mnan// drag sngags thang gcig bzlas byas te// dkyil 'khor dbus sam dong khar lding // sngags pa mnye bzhag dpa' bor 'dug/ gcer bu skra bshig kha lhor
358a1(1): lha// tsha ba'i mar gyis lus byugs te// snang mdzad thal chen rak+tas bsgyur// ma he gdong gi rnal 'byor gyis// 'khor lo rkang skyed gsum khar bzhag/ dur khrod me la rab tu bsro// shin tu khros
358a2(1): pas drag sngags bzlas// gtum po'i me la 'dug byas na// the tshom med par 'tsho bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// gshin rje mtshon cha'i 'khor lo de// bsgrub bya'i rgyu rten ling ga yi// snying khar
358a3(1): sngags dang 'khor lo brnag rabs chad mon thod ga bur gzhug las kyi gshin rje'i gzugs brnyan gyis// snying khar thod pa'i ga'u gzhug/ ma he gdong gi rnal 'byor gyis// gnas lngar mi rkang phur pa
358a4(1): gdab// tsher ma rnon po sna tshogs kyis// tshigs rnams kun la gdab par bya// drag tu sngags bzlas 'khor lo bskor// rdzogs nas nyin mtshan phyed dus na// dur khrod gnas sam ro bsregs par// shin tu
358a5(1): gting rings gru gsum brko// gzugs brnyan mgo bo lhor bstan te/ kha ni thur du phub la sba// slar 'ongs rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi// rnal 'byor shin tu gsal byas la// drag tu sngags bzlas ming byang spel// nyi
358a6(1): ma bdun gyis nges par 'chi'o// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// don po'i bshang gcis ling ga bya// ming byang dang bcas dug gis byug/ skra bshig bdag kha lhor bltas te// ma he gdong gi rnal 'byor
358b1(1): gyis// dur khrod me la mtshan phyed na// gzugs brnyan gtubs te bsreg bya zhing // ming byang dang bcas drag sngags bzlas// skad cig gis ni nges par 'chi// rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid kyis bshad// gzhan yang
358b2(1): rab tu sbyor ba ni// rdzas kyi 'khor lo sngon bzhin bri// rgyu rten drug la ling kha bya// de yi snying khar 'khor lo gzhug/ mar khu chen po dag dang sbyar// dur khrod gnas su bdag nyid kyis// lus la rnam par snang
358b3(1): mdzad byug/ bdag kha lhor bltas rnam par brtsigs// ma he'i gdong gnas drag tu bzlas// mtshon chas gtums la ro bsregs kyi// mer bsregs myur du 'chi bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rims kyi thebs 'dod
358b4(1): na// gshin rje'i 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha de// mi yi nya phyis ga 'ur gzhug/ dur khrod me la rab bsros te// de nyid kyis ni 'og sbas na// rims nad drag pos 'dzin par 'gyur// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba
358b5(1): ni// me long bcu drug 'khor lo la// sum cu rtsa gnyis bcu pa'i sngags// bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel bar bya// sngon gsungs rdzas dang lhan cig tu// bya rog zan gtogs lhag ma dang // rnam par snang mdzad rgyu
358b6(1): rten sbyar// dur khrod ris la byug byas la// sngon bzhin cho gas 'khor lo bri// de ltar sbyor ba tshang byas nas// dur khrod sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur// shing gcig drung sbas bskrad par 'gyur// mtshan ma gcig sbas
359a1(1): 'byed par 'gyur// chu yi nang sbas rengs par 'gyur// khyim du bzhag na zhi bar byed// phyung nas legs dkrus grol bar 'gyur// de dag rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// drag po bsad pa'i sbyor ba
359a2(1): bshad// de dag bsam gtan rim pa ni// rnal 'byor rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi// sbyor ba nyid la gnas pa yis// sngon du sbyor bas thams cad bya// raM las me dpung dkyil 'khor ni// kun tu gsal bar 'bar
359a3(1): bar bsam// gsal zhing 'bar la bsreg pa yi// de stengs bsgrub bya gcer bu ni// skra bshig bred par gyur pa de// bdag nyid mdun du gnas par bsam// bdag lus khro bo mang po spros// ral gri btab
359a4(1): nas khrag 'thung zhing // srog gcod sha za rgyu ma 'dren// 'di skad bsgo zhing kun kyang sgrogs// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed cing // bla ma la skur 'debs pa la// rgyob cig song cig ces bsam
359a5(1): bya// gzhan yang bdag las sprul pa ni// rnam pa sna tshogs sha zan spro// bya rgod bya rog 'ug pa dang // khyung khra kang ka ne le dang // sha zan bya gcan gzan sna tshogs dang // stag dom lce sbrang wa khyi dred// sha za
359a6(1): khrag 'thung rus pa 'cha'// btog cing the shul med par byas// gzhan yang bsgrub bya gang yin de// ri rab kyi mnan sa 'og nub// rgya mtsho'i gting dkrug rba rlabs g.yeng // me dpung gyis bsregs thal bar
359b1(1): brlag/ las kyi rlung nag tshub mas khyer// dpag tshad brgyar gnas skyes bu yi// sems shes gsal ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsam gtan rab tu sbyor ba 'dis// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yi// nyi ma bdun gyis 'chi
359b2(1): 'gyur na// srog chags gzhan lta smos ci dgos// des na 'di la bsam gtan bya'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying po'i rgyud la/ drag po sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad brgya don drug pa'o// // de
359b3(1): nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// drag po las kyi mtha' btal ba'i// rab tu sbyor ba'i sbyin sreg bshad// sngags pa dur khrod gnas phyin te// mtshan mo phyed na las 'di brtsam// lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas
359b4(1): pas// las ni thams cad bya bar gsungs// phung sa gsum gyi me thab ni// drag po dug khrag rgya sol byug tsher ma dug can shing sna la// dur khrod shing dang me sbar te// gang gi dri chen la sogs rdzas// ming rus
359b5(1): long kha sen mo skra// mi shi mi rus bong bu'i spangs// de dag mar khu chen pos sbyar// de nyid ma he'i zhal sbyor bas// shin tu mnyam par bzhag byas la/ kha ni lhor ltas ro bsregs kyi// me la gang gi ming bcas
359b6(1): pa// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg byas na// zhag gsum gyis ni 'chi bar nges// yang na phyogs gcig tu gnas la// me thab rdzas sbyor sngon gsungs bzhin// gtum po'i me sbar sbyin sreg bya// drag po'i sbyor ba de
360a1(1): nyid kyis// las de nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan yang 'brub khung me zab tu// gdug pa can shing ro shing la// gtum po dur khrod me sbar te// rgyu rten ling ga ming rus bcas// ma rti bya glang
360a2(1): shi mtshal dug mar khu chen po til nyungs nag/ bsreg cing brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// 'dis ni lha yi tshe yod kyang // myur du gsod par the tshom med// de dag bsam gtan rab sbyor na// ma he gdong khros rnal 'byor
360a3(1): gyis// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// raM yig yongs su gyur pa las// me yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar// dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar dbus su// bsgrub bya bred sngangs 'dar bar bsam// de la
360a4(1): bdag lus rnam sprul pa'i// ba s+phu las spros gshin rje rnams// srin po mi bzad 'jigs pa'i tshul// sna tshogs lus can ma rungs pa// shin tu gtum rngam mtshon cha thogs// mang pos sha za khrag 'thung
360a5(1): zhing // lus dbang thal bar gtong bar bsam// bya dang gcan gzan de bzhin no// rdo rje'i zhal du'ang de bzhin no// mtha' rgyar mnan gtad sbyor ba bya'o// rab tu sbyor ba 'di lta bus// gang yang gsod
360a6(1): sgrol the tshom med// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// ling ga 'brub khung 'khor lo bcas// ma he gdong khros skur bsgom ste// drag tu sngags bzlas 'khor lo bskos// thun rdeg mchog chen phur pa gdab// bsam
360b1(1): gtan ldan pas sbyor ba bya// rab tu sbyor ba'i bye brag 'di// su la'ang mi sgra sbyin mi bya// mi bstan gcig pu dben par bya// de ni las kun 'grub par nges// gal te mi gzhan mang dag la// bstan cing smras
360b2(1): dang byin gyur na// rdo rje sems dpas kyang mi 'grub// de nas gang la'ang bstan mi bya// shin tu sba gsang thabs kyis spyad// oM ya ma na ta hUM phaT/ oM hri Sh+Ti bi kr-i tA na na hUM phaT/ ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya/ ya me to
360b3(1): ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya kle ya dza ni ra ma ya/ sarba sha tAM/ staM b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ na sha ya/ na sha ya/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+ha smai ku ru mA ra ya hUM/ dza la raM raM/ ling ga
360b4(1): 'khor lo la sogs la// tsha ba gsum dang skye tshe dang // dug sna myos khrag byug par bya// ma he'i gdong can snying po ste// rdo rje 'jigs byed drag sngags so// re re la ni bzhi 'bum bdun// gcig la rgyun du

361a1(1): du ra snyoms btag pa'i phye// lus la sbyar na spro bar 'gyur// zang gnas bya bo'i ro tsa na// de khrag gong gi rdzas gsum sbyar// me tog rnams dang dri chen sogs// gzugs sbyar gang gi ming bcas
361a2(1): pa'o// sngags bzlas rgyal po'i rten sbyar na// des ni nges par smyo bar 'gyur// drag po sbyor ba'i me zab tu// bya rgod chen po'i tshang shing la// gang gi ming byang sha chen bsregs// des ni nges par skyo bar
361a3(1): 'gyur// drags sngags rtsa ba gong bzhin las// a mu ka ung ma ta ku ru ku ru mA ra ya hUM phaT/ drag po las sbyor nges par bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ drag po bsad
361a4(1): pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad brgya don bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// dbang du bsdu ba'i sbyor ba bshad// rdo rdza 'jigs byed khro rgyal gyis// bsgrub bya dbang du bsdu bya ba'i// rab tu

361a6(1): bya pho mo gang rung gi/ gzugs brnyan bcu drug sor tshad la// g+hi hang srin lag rak+ta yis// gro ga dag la gshin rje yi// 'khor lo legs par bris byas te// de yi snying khar bcug nas ni// mnyam bzhag kha ni
361b1(1): nub tu bltas// ming rus dang bcas sngags bzlas nas// me tog dmar pos dus gsum mchod// rang gi khyim du bcug byas pas// zhag gsum gyis ni brgya byin kyang // the tshom med par dbang 'gyir na// phra
361b2(1): mo rnams la smos ci dgos// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// gro ga'am pad+ma'i ras dag la// tsan dan dmar po rgya skyegs dang // g+hi hang srin lag rak+ta yis// ho dang spel ba'i 'khor lo gnyis// mnyam por
361b3(1): bris la sngags rnams dgod/ kham phor mar dang sbrang rtsis dgang / kha sbyar skud pa dmar pos dkri// nub tu kha bltas bsam gtan bya// me tog dmar pos dus gsum mchod// mnyam bzhag sngags bzlas
361b4(1): bsgrub bya de// gcer bu skra bshig myos gyur pa// rkang po'i drung du skyel bar bsam// gal te nges par ma byung na// dka' thub brtul zhugs ldan pa yis// seng ldeng me mdag du med la// ma spangs 'khor log
