366a6(1): lpags de la gzhag sdong bu byas te gang gang gi/ khyim du me de sbar ba des// phan tshun 'thab 'bras nges par 'gyur// gzhan yang 'byed 'bral sbyor ba na// bya rog 'ug pa'i rus pa la// lcags kyi tsher mas
366b1(1): sgrub bya yis// ming dang sngags rnams lhan cig bris// gcig pu gnas su mnyam bzhag ste// gang gi ming bcas sngags bzlas shing // de gnyis gcig la gcig brud na// nges par 'byed cing 'bral bar
366b2(1): 'gyur// gshin rje 'khor lo gro ga la// bud med skyes pa'i ming bris nas// sbal pa'i ltor bcug gang ming dang // bcas par tham pa'i 'og sbas de'i// yan lag mtshon gyis phug byas na// don pos yan lag
366b3(1): mtshon cha yis// nges par 'bug par the tshom med// gzhan yang 'byed cing 'bral 'dod na// gnas bdun sa la ma he rta// gzugs byas gcig la gcig zhon la// de gnyis khrag gis 'khor lo bri// snying khar
366b4(1): 'khor lo bcug pa gnyis// nam pa'i shing gi drung du bzhag ma he'i gdong bsgom sngags bzlas pas// gang dmigs rten pa sbas gyur na// zhag gsum gyis ni 'byed 'gyur nges// 'byed cing phral byed sbyor ba
366b5(1): na// drag po'i me zab bya rog dang // 'ug pa me bya don sgra sbrul/ 'bras phub ma he rta yi sha/ lhan cig gang gi ming bcas par// dur khrod mes bsregs 'bral 'gyur nges// yang na khyim gnas dur khrod
366b6(1): kyi// shing la gtum po'i me sbar te// gong gi rdzas de bsregs byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yang // nyi ma bdun gyis nges par 'byed// bya rog 'ug pa'i dang ru la// gnyis ka'i ming byang de khrag bri// shing
367a1(1): rings rtser gdags rlung kha 'thab// des ni nges par 'byed par 'gyur// gzhan yang 'byed 'dod ting 'dzin ni// rta dang ma he'i snying kha ru// bsgrub bya mngon gsum de gnyis ni// phan tshun
367a2(1): 'thab 'breg byed par bsam// bdag gi mdun du bsgrub bya gnyis// rta dang ma he la zhon te// mtshon cha thogs nas gcig la gcig/ brdeg cing 'thab par byed par bsam// ji srid rta dang ma he gnyis// phye
367a3(1): mar ma gyur de srid du'o// de bsam tsam gyis nyin bdun gyis// nges par 'thab 'byed 'bral 'gyur ro// che ge mo dang che ge mo// bi de sha ya pra bi sha phaT// ces bzlog 'khor lo phaT spel bri// thod pa kha sbyar
367a4(1): 'khor lo gzhug/ skud pa sngon po khrag bskus dkri// nyi phyed dur khrod gnas sbas na// gang yang nges par 'byed par 'gyur// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ 'byed pa'i rab tu sbyor
367a5(1): ba'i le'u ste brgyad brgya gya gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// rengs byed rab tu sbyor ba bshad// dben pa'i gnas su sngags pa yis// rte pa drag po'i lcags pa la// dug la sogs pa'i rdzas
367a6(1): rnams kyis// yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bris la// lcags pa de ni bsgrub bya yi// dri chu'i shul dang rkang rjes sa// bkang la de yi ska yis bcings// phyi nas bong bu'i dri chu dang // don po'i dri chen lhan cig
367b1(1): rdzas// blug ma dgos la dgang bar bya// de ru gshin rje'i 'khor lo gzhug/ de ni ro bsregs me la bsro// gshin rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pas// rkang pa g.yon pas de mnan la// shin tu khros pas sngags
367b2(1): bzlas na// zhag gcig gis ni rengs par byed// 'di ni nges pa'i sbyor ba'o// gzhan yang rengs bya'i sbyor ba ba ni// dur khrod ras sam g.yam pa la// ba bla yungs pa ldong ros kyi// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor
367b3(1): lo ni// gang gi ming dang ras bcas par// legs par bris te bzhag byas na// de ni nges par rengs 'gyur ro// bu mo rengs pa'i sbyor ba ni// ro bsreg thal ba dur khrod sas// gzugs brnyan mtho gang sol
367b4(1): chen byug kha gdangs mche gtsigs 'jigs par bya// dur khrod ras la gshin rje yi// sngags dang 'khor lo legs par ni// dug la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis bri// de yi snying khar de bcug de// ma he gdong gi sbyor
367b5(1): ba yis// rkang pa g.yon pas de mnan la// sngags bzlas smon lam btab gyur na// myur du rengs par nges 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rengs pa'i sbyor ba ni// dur khrod ras la yungs pa yi// lam dang ming spel
367b6(1): 'khor lo gnyis// bris la kham phor ser po rdzas/ kha sbyar ba yi nang du gzhug/ der ni ri bo bdun dang bzhi// kun tu mnyam bri de stengs su// ri rab rtse brgyad mnyam par bri// de stengs hUM baM laM nan spel// de
368a1(1): stengs dbang chen dkyil 'khor ni// sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan par bri// skud pa rten 'brel ser pos dkri// rab tu drag por sngags bzlas bya// myur du gang dmigs rengs 'gyur nges// de nyid
368a2(1): ting 'dzin sbyor ba ni// bdag nyid gshed chen ma he'i gdong // bsgrub bya ser po myos pa'i gzugs// rin po che dang ri rab kyis// mnan te rdo rje rgya gram dang // dbang chen dkyil 'khor kun tu
368a3(1): mnan// gshin rjes mnan te 'od zer 'phro// lho byang mngon phyogs drag tu bzlas// hUM baM laM nan rab tu rdzogs/ des ni myur du rengs par nges// gzhan la rengs pa'i sbyor ba ni// ba bla yung ba ldong ros
368a4(1): dang // g+hi haM bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi par byas rdzas de nyid// gang gi ming dang bcas pa yi// sbyin sreg byas te las kyi ni// rjes su 'brang ba'i lha bsgom nas/ kha ni byang bltas sngags bzlas
368a5(1): na// nyi ma bdun gyis rengs par 'gyur// gzhan yang rengs bya'i rab sbyor ba// tsher ma can gyi dug shing la// dur khrod me ni rab sbar te// dug dang skyer tsher bcas pa ni// rang gi khrag gis bsdus nas
368a6(1): su// sngags dang ming bcas bdas bya zhing // sbyin sreg stong bya smon lam gdab// rgyun gyi rnal 'byor la gnas pas// rab tu sbyor ba de dag bya// des ni nges par rengs 'gyur ro// de dag gsang sngags sbyor
368b1(1): ba ni// laM a mu ka swa/ ne s+t+waM ba na laM/ hUM baM laM nan/ 'di dag rengs par bya ba yi// rab tu sbyor bar bshad pa'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ rengs par bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad
368b2(1): brgya gyi gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos// bsgrub bya bskrad pa'i sbyor ba bshad// dkar po'i phyogs la sdang byed rnams// phyi mtha' thug par bskrad pa yi// rab tu sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// gnas
368b3(1): bdun sa la rnga mo'i gzugs// byas te rgyab tu yam ldang khu// yongs su gyur las rlung chen gyi// dkyil 'khor phyogs la sdang byed rnams// phyi mtha' thugs par bskrad pa yi// rab tu sbyor ba'i rim pa
368b4(1): ni// gnas bdun sa la rnga mo'i gzugs// byas te rgyab tu yam ljang khu// yongs su 'gyur las rlung chen gyi// dkyil 'khor zla phyed ba dan bzhi// de yi steng du bsgrub bya bzhag de yi rgyab tu gshin rje'i
368b5(1): gzugs// lag pas dbyug tho 'dzin pa gnas// rnga mo gshin rje'i kha lhor bstan// bsgrub bya der bskyon dbang med par// dbyug thos brdeg cing khrid nas song // de ltar bsam zhing 'khor lo de// tshul bzhin
368b6(1): ming sngags sbyor bris pa// de yis snying khar btsugs byas nas// drag tu sngags bzlas zhag bdun gyis// the tshom med par bskyod par 'gyur// gzhan yang bskrad pa'i sbyor ba ni// dur ras dur khrod mes
369a1(1): bsregs pa'i// thod par dud chags dregs pa dang // mar khu chen po sbyar byas la// bsgrub bya'i rkang lag bzhi po dang // lham la zhon par byug byas na// skad cig gis ni skrod par 'gyur// gzhan
369a2(1): yang bskrad pa'i sbyor ba ni// bya rog rkang pas gro ga la// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla kham phyed// sngon po ba dan bzhi pa bri// de dbus ming byang spel sngags bri// gtor ma za ba'i mgrin par gdags// de bzung
369a3(1): gshin rje gshed chen po// rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyor ba yis// sngags bzlas kha ni lhor bltas te// sbur nas btang na skad cig gis// bya rog bzhin du phyogs kun du// bskor skrod nges par 'grub 'gyur
369a4(1): ro// gzhan yang bskrad pa'i rab sbyor ba// nim pa'i shing la ske tshe til// mar khus bskus pa bya rog gi/ tshang rtsi nag na shing gi mes// bsregs pa'i thal ba de blangs te// gang dmigs bsgrub bya'i mgor
369a5(1): blugs na// skad cig gis ni skrod par 'gyur// gzhan yang bskrad pa'i sbyin sreg ni// gong gsum sa la zla phyed 'dra// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zab dbus su// dur khrod shing la me sbar te// gcer bu sgra brdzes lho
369a6(1): bltas nas// rnga mo'i brun dang bya rog dang // chang dang rgyu rten ming byang bcas// lag pa g.yon pas mtshan phyed nas// sbyin sreg lan stong byas gyur na// skrod par nges 'gyur gzhan ma yin// gzhan yang grong
369b1(1): khyer skrod 'dod na// rlung gi dkyil 'khor thab dbus su// gshin rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pas// nim pa'i shing la me sbar te// khyi sha sbal sha khyim bya'i sha rnga mo'i brun dang byi la'i khrag lhan cig sbrus la grong ming
369b2(1): dang // bcas te yig bcu sngags bzlas te// sbyin sreg stong phrag lnga byas na// grong khyer skrod par nges par 'gyur// gzhan yang bskrad pa'i sbyor ba ni// bya rog sha ni ma 'dres pa// gang gi ming dang lhan cig
369b3(1): tu// bcas par sbyin sreg stong byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yang // nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur// pho mo rnams la smos ci dgos// gzhan yang 'bras phug bya rog tshang // du ngu ra yi shing bu la// me sbar
369b4(1): ming bcas sngags bzlas bsreg/ nyi ma gsum gyis skrod 'gyur nges// gzhan yang bsam gtan sbyor ba ni// yaM las gyur pa'i rnga mo bsam// de yi rgyab tu yaM las ni// rlung gi 'khor lo zla phyed bsam// de
369b5(1): stengs bsgrub bya gcer bur bsam// de yi rgyab tu gshin rje gshed// dbyug zo 'dzin cing 'jigs par bsam// rnga mo kha ni lhor bstan btang // ma he'i gdong khros rnal 'byor gyis// gang gi ming bcas sngags
369b6(1): bzlas na// nges par skrod de zhag bdun no// gzhan yang kang ka'am bya rog gi/ rgyab tu bsgrub bya'i rnam pa bsam// de yi rgyab tu gshin rje gshed// nag po g.yas na thogs// g.yon pas bsgrub bya'i sgra gzung
370a1(1): nas// de la ma he'i gdong can gyis// khrid la rgyug ces bka' bsgobs// lho ru kha bltas khrid song bsam// 'di la rtse gcig mnyam bzhag na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang skrod 'gyur na// gzhan lta kun
370a2(1): la smos ci dgos// zhag bdun gsum 'bum sngags bzlas so// che ge mo dz+ha dz+ha u tsa ta ya u tsa ta ya/ phaT phaT/ yaM s+tha ra ya phaT/ 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba 'dis/ bskrad par nges par 'gyur ba ni/ sangs rgyas
370a3(1): kyis kyang mi bzlogs so// rab tu sbyor ba gsang ba'i spyad// dkon mchog don spyad gzhan du min// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rab tu sbyor ba'i rgyud las/ bskrad pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya gya bzhi
370a4(1): pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen spyi dpal la/ rdo rje 'jigs byed ma he'i gdong // gshin rje gshed kyis 'di skad gsol// rdo rje 'chang rgyal de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung
370a5(1): bapaba'i phyir// bdag nyid rab tu sbyor ba la// man ngag gsang ba'i rim pa ni// rang gzhung rdzas dang sbyor ldan pas// 'khrul 'khor rgyal po'i gnas gshad pa// bsad pa gshin rje nyid la bya// dbang ni btsun
370a6(1): mo'i lto ru'o// dgug pa dre'u seng ge'i ltor// dbye ba rta dang ma he gnyis// bskrad pa rnga ma'i rgyab tu'o// rengs pa gyen pa'i shing la bya// mnan pa ri rab 'og tu'o// rgyas pa nor lha'i gzugs su bya// zhi ba zla
370b1(1): ba'i dkyil 'khor te// spro ba spre'u shan dmar ro// gzir ba stobs kyi bdag pos bya// de ltar 'khor lo'i gnas nyid dang // las kyi sbyor ba ma nor bya'o// bsad pa drag po'i 'khor lo ni// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las
370b2(1): bshad pa// dang pos gti mug klad pa'i gnas// mgo 'khor tshangs pa'i gtsug rtsa gcad// gnyis pas nga rgyal mgrin pa yi// rtsa gcad drag tu skyug par byed// gsum pa 'dod chags lte ba'i gnas// rten rtsa
370b3(1): bcad de yid 'khrug byed// bzhi pas snying kha zhe sdang gnas// srog pa rtsa bcad gsod par byed// dbang du bsdu dang dgug pa ni// dang pos srog dang snying pos te// gnyis pas tshe dang ye shes la// gsum
370b4(1): pas bla dang sprul pa nyid// bzhi pas gzugs kyi phung po sdud// rgyas par spel ba'i 'khor lo ni// dang po tshe dang ye shes rgyas// gnyis pa bkrag dang gzi mdangs rgyas// gsum pa dbang thang bu tsha srid// bzhi
370b5(1): pas 'khor dang longs spyod nor// dbye dang bskrad dang rengs pa dang // mnan gzir la sogs de bzhin de// 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba thams cad la// nyi ma bzhi bzhir bskor bar bya// g.yas bskor rnal ma
370b6(1): g.yon bskor sgrogs// 'bru ded drag sngags bdun par bya// stag mchongs zhes bya 'grub nges pa'o// gzhan yang sngags kyi sbyor ba ni// oM hri Sh+Ti bi kri ta nan hUM phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'bru bcu pa'o// ya ma rA
371a1(1): dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She ya dza ni ra ma ya/ sum cu rtsa gnyis 'khrul 'khor sngags/ oM ya man ta ka phaT/ 'bru drug pa yi sngags so// rtsa ba'i sngags dang
371a2(1): las kyi sngags// snying po'i sngags dang gsum du bshad// pra ma ya/ mur dza ya/ rak+ta tsa ra ya/ ma ra ya/ sarba sha tuM/ nA sha ya/ nA sha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bsad pa'i gsang
371a3(1): sngags spu gri'o// bri ra sha ni dang po'o// A yu dz+nyA na gnyis pa'o// tir ya ni r+ya gsum pa'o// ru pa skan da bzhi pa ste/ dbang sdud dgug pa'i gsang sngags so// dang po A yu dz+nyA na ste/ gnyis pa o te tso ta/
371a4(1): gsum pas pir sha pu tra rnams/ bzhi pas da la sam po ste/ rgyas par spel ba'i gsang sngags so// gzhan yang las kyi 'khrul 'khor rnams// de bzhin bzhi bskor shes par bya// gang byed spu gri ma nor
371a5(1): gdags// rtsa ba'i sngags ni dang po ste// snying po'i sngags ni bar du'o// las kyi sngags ni tha mar sbyar// de bzhin drag sngags so so rnams// spyi dang sgo yi spu gri sbyar// 'di lta bu yi 'khrul 'khor gyis// las

371b1(1): nas rdo rje 'chang chen la/ rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po/ phyi dus dbang rdzogs dam ldan pa'i// sngags pa bdag nyid lus gnas te// sbyor ba rab tu ldan pa yis// bdag gi
371b2(1): drag sngags 'di bzlas so// tshangs pa'i tshe srog ldan pa yang // myur du gsod par gdon mi za// khro bo kun gyi rgyal po ni// 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed de// mi 'gyur mi shig dbang po'i mchog/ tshangs pa
371b3(1): brgya byin za zhig sgrol// 'das pa'i lha yang 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje lta bu'i lus 'jigs pas// mu stegs 'jigs byed 'jigs mdzad 'dul// khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// brnag pa'i gnas dgu
371b4(1): 'joms bdud bsgral// zhal nas sngags rgod dgu 'phros pas// srog chags thams cad sgrol bar mdzad// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// dbul zhal ma he'i gdong pa nas// drag po sngags rgod 'di 'phros
371b5(1): pas// snying la dngos sprul bla gnas 'joms// tsit+ta tshol par raka bruM ni mA ra ya phaT/ rA bar dmar po'i 'jigs zhal nas// drag po sngags rgod 'di 'phros pas// klad dkyil phag gi bla gnas 'joms// ya
371b6(1): ma kri sna dun b+h+yo ha na ha na ro tsa na khrag thib rbad/ de stengs 'jam dpal zhal ser nas// drag po sngags rgod 'di 'phros pas// lte ba byang shar bla gnas 'joms// ya ma many+dzu shri kro d+ha staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ baM ri la
372a1(1): rbad/ ra ni g.yas kyi zhal gsum ste// sngon po 'jigs zhal sngags 'phros pas// mgrin pa rta yi bla gnas 'joms// ya ma ro sha sha subs ril da sta da sta ha ku ru ku ru phaT/ dmar po 'jigs
372a2(1): zhal sngags 'phros pas// gsang ba ra lug bla gnas 'joms// ya ma nri ma ra du pa tsa pa tsa raM shad rbad/ ser po 'jigs zhal sngags 'phros pas// rkang pa ba glang bla gnas 'joms// ya ma ni thums rmugs mA
372a3(1): ra ya nA/ sha ya nA sha ya zad/ rA ni g.yon gyi zhal gsum ste// dkar po 'jigs zhal sngags 'phros pas// lag pas ri dgas bla gnas 'joms// ya ma kri ni sha truM mun thibs rbad/ dud ka 'jigs zhal
372a4(1): sngags 'phros pas/ kha yi nya sram bla gnas 'joms// kra na ya ma rak+Sha tsit+ta shag mar thums rbad/ nag po 'jigs zhal sngags 'phros pas// lus kun nye drung bla gnas 'joms// rus pa mA ra ya ha ra ti ya ma
372a5(1): ma kA la rag sha nri rbad/ phung pa'i 'brub khung dug khrag byug/ rten drug ling ga ming byang bcas// rabs chad mon pa srubs drug gnag/ yan lag gan rkyal byed du bzhug/ yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe dang // dri
372a6(1): rims khrag chen rak+ta khyi// ra dug sbrang dug dug rgod sbyar// da lo sgrol byed rab gnas bya// gshin rje srin po bya gcan tshogs// mtshon cha me 'bar gang yang sgrol// zhag dgu'i bar du sgra gcad
372b1(1): bzlas// bdag nyid rdo rje 'jigs byed gnas// rang rang bla rtags dang sbyar te// lus kyi gnas rer thun tshon dbab// thub kha re rdzogs mchod bstod bskul// kun rdzogs ling ga mtshon chas gtubs// drag
372b2(1): po'i sbyin sreg byas thal ba// ling ga byas mnan zor du 'phang // des ni myur du gsod par nges// de skad ma he'i gdong gis bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ gnad dgu
372b3(1): drag sngags kyi le'u brgyad brgya gya drug pa'o// // bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen la// khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// drag sngags mtshon cha 'di skad brjod// dur khrod la sogs bde gnas su// grub pa thob
372b4(1): pa'i rnal 'byor pas// drag po bzhi bskor las 'di brtsams// drag po'i gnas chen phung sas bya// dug khrag sol chen la sogs byug/ snang mdzad la sogs sbyor bas gzugs// rigs dang bod sgra khrag gis
372b5(1): gsal// mtshan mo'i rnam pa gsal bar ldan// gsum gnyis gling gi dung chen brnag/ gsod byed tsha ba la sogs byed// drag po'i gnas su gsod mgo bstan// bcu gnyis tshad de khru mtho gang // gsod byed
372b6(1): rgyal po la sogs tshogs// rkyen gyi rnam pa sna tshogs khrag/ thig le gnyis dang tsha ba'i 'bru// drag po myur bral dung chen du'o// gnam lcags drag po la sogs pa'i// sna tshogs ral gri gsod byed rgyal// sna
373a1(1): tshogs ngar glud de bzhin du// myos khrag rak+tas stobs bskyed bya// yu bor sa ba swa la sa// de dag dgug rgyal sgrol byed kyis// bsang dang byin brlabs mthu ldan bya// nyin bzhi mtshan bzhi
373a2(1): gnyis bsdebs pa// klad mgrin lte ba snying kha dang ste// rdzas bzhi rim par mtha' ma la// gcod byed gsod byed gnyis su'o// brgya stong grangs kyi de bzhi ste// rdo rje 'jigs byed khros pa yi// gnas las 'od
373a3(1): zer rab spros pa// de bzhin gyur te rten gnas bcas// des ni las kyi gshin rje gshed// sngo nag gcer bu mi bzad 'jigs// ral gri sdigs 'dzub ma he zhon// skra 'dzings kha gdangs mche ba
373a4(1): gtsigs// mig gsum sma ra khro gnyer can// rang gnas langs te de nyid la// ma he gdong gis bka' bsgo bas// klad pa'i rgya bshig rtsa bcad de// mgo 'khor klad 'khrugs myos par byed// mgrin rtsa kha
373a5(1): skyugs ngan rgyun gcad// lte ba yid 'khrugs srid rtsa bcad// snying srog rtsa gcad sha khrag tshogs// bstod cing zos te shul med bsad// de ltar mtshon chas rdul byed la// drag po'i mtha' btul las byas
373a6(1): te// de nas gzugs brnyan rdul de la// dur khrod la sogs gnas drag tu'o// rab 'bring tha mas bskyod cing dbab// rgyun gyi rnal 'byor la gnas bya'o// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha b+ha dza hUM phaT/ ro
373b1(1): tsa na ma ra ta ka pra ma ni thibs rbad/ hri ta ni pa tsa ha na rak+ta tsa ra ni shag rbad/ si ra thum ri la ru thums mur rdza ni hur rbad/ tsit+ta tshal pa ni mA ra ya ku ru ni rbad/ sngon du bsnyen pa grub rdzogs pas// gang yang
373b2(1): myur du sgrol bar byed// gzhan yang drag po sbyor ba ni// sngags pas gcer bur sgra bsil la// lus la thal chen la sogs byug/ dur khrod gnas su mnyam par bzhag/ sngon du bsnyen rdzogs las
373b3(1): 'di spyad// dur khrod chen po drag mchog du// dbugs dang bral ba'i dung chen du// 'chi rkyen sna tshogs khrag rak+ta// thig le dkar brab sngags rgod bzlas// drag po'i gnas su bsgrub bya brnag/ ma he gdong gi
373b4(1): rnal 'byor gyis// gnas la rab tu spros byas te// srin po mi bzad 'jigs khro rngam// sna tshogs gzugs can mtshon cha thogs// me lce thog zer tsha tsha 'phra// shin tu ma rungs grangs med 'phros// thim pas de
373b5(1): ltar gyur pa bsam// bya dang gcan gzan sna tshogs pa// sha za srog gcod de bzhin no// de ltar mtshan ma las rung bzlas// ling kha rgyu rten ming rus bcas// lan tshwa skye tshe myos khrag dug/ byug cing thun du
373b6(1): dbab par bya// sha za khrag 'thung srog gcod cing // lus rnams thal bar gtong bar dmigs// khram thod brnag dpag bsreg par bya// dur khrod la sogs mnan gtad bya// dang por byin brlabs mthar
374a1(1): bsad pa// 'dis ni nag po'i bdud kyang sgrol// srog chags mi la smos ci dgos// badz+ra b+hai ra ba hUM/ ya dun rmugs ta rbad/ ya ma tsit+ta thums ril mA ra ya hUM phaT/ rtsa ba la gdags bsnyen srog
374a2(1): bya'o// rdo rje 'jigs byed ma he'i gdong // gshin rje gshed khros drag sngags ni// dang po dbang thob bsnyen rdzogs bya'o// gnas bdun la sogs sa rnams la// gshin rje 'jigs pa ma he zhon// rdzas kyi sbyor
374a3(1): bas byug byas te// zhags pas ske bzung ral gris gdab// rgyu rten ling ga ming byang bcas// 'brub khung mi shigs khrag thod brnag/ dug sna nyungs kar khrag la sogs// gnam lcags byin ldan ral gris
374a4(1): gdag/ srog gcod las kyi gshin rje la// ma he gdong gis bka' bsgo bas// me tog mtshon gyi char phab ste// ral gris btab nas rtsa srog bcad// sha za khrag 'thung rdul du brlag tshe bla gshin rje'i lto bar
374a5(1): 'chang // 'chor mi srid de gsod par bsam// de nas bsgrub bya'i rnam pa de// las kyi gshin rje'i lto bar bzhag/ dur khrod gnas su lhor bltas sba// 'dis na gang lang gsod par nges// gzhan yang zhing
374a6(1): chen ras ma la// dug khrag skye tshe nim pa dang // tsha ba gsum dang sme bas byug/ kang ka'i sgro rtsas lhor bltas te// khros pa'i sems kyis gshin rjer bsgom// le tshe bcu bdun 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bzhi ldan
374b1(1): par bri bar bya// sngags dgong ming byang spu grir ldan// sngags bzlas gshin rje lto bar gzhug/ dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas gtad// des ni gang yang sgrol bar nges// mon pa'i rabs chad thod pa ru// rgyu rten
374b2(1): drug gi ling ga ni// ming byang dang bcas byad du gzhug/ gcan gzan dri bo'i thod pa ru// dug rgod la sogs dug sna tshogs// gri khrag la sogs khrag sna tshogs// yungs kar yungs nag skye tshe dang // gnam
374b3(1): lcags ral gri thun brab brdeg/ rdo rje 'jigs byed rnal 'byor gyis// las kyi gshin rje sha za bskul// sna tshogs nad mtshon dbab cing bsad// dgra bo'i pha mes dur chad du/ khams kyi dgra yi gza' skar
374b4(1): la// mon thod dbus la rabs chad shar// gri thod lho sba gcan gzan nub// byang du 'brub khung gru gsum bru// drag po'i sbyin sreg sbyor ba bya// de ltar phyogs bzhi dbus su mnan// las kyi gshin rje'i pho brang
374b5(1): gdab// gu gul nag po mu zi dang // mi rta khyi gsum brun dud btab// 'dis ni don po ma lus par// myur du phung gsod brlag par 'gyur// sngon du bsnyen rdzogs drag sngags bzlas// oM ya man ta ka badz+ra
374b6(1): b+hib+hai ra ba ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya mA sa to me ya/ ka la ru pa badz+ra b+he ra ma hA kro d+ha ya kro d+ha ya/ me to ra na yo ta ya/ hri Sh+Ti bi kri tA na na badz+ra d+he ra pa ma hA kro d+ha ro sha ba ya to yo ni kle ya/ karma rak+ta badz+ra b+hai ra ba ya ma hA kro
375a1(1): d+ha u kra ma kle ya dza ni ra ma ya hUM phaT/ ya ma ni mA ra ya dza/ ya ma nri mA ra ya zum/ ya ma ni mA ra ya phaT/ ya ma nri mA ra ya hAM/ ya ma nri mA ra ya nan/ de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ gang la btab kyang
375a2(1): gsod par nges/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa sbyor ba gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mthar thug drag sngags kyi le'u ste brgyad brgya gya bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// man ngag gsang ba'i gnas
375a3(1): rnams bshad// rgyud rgyal rdo rje'i tshig yin pas// tshig gcig sna tshogs spros par 'gyur// gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu tshang // des na gsung gcig don snang grags// sgo gcig dbye zhing lhag ma
375a4(1): bcad// dbang bskur slob bu gcig gzhug cing // slob bu gzhan ming mi gzhug pa'o// bsnyen dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid gcig pu 'jug grogs po gzhan dag mi 'jug pa'o// bsnyen bsgrub sngags bzlas
375a5(1): 'i zhal skra dbyung / zhal gzhan brgyad nas sngags skra mi 'byung ngo // 'khrul 'khor dbus kyi yang khongs ming byang bra// phyi rol re mig rnams la bri ba'o// gnyis pa rab tu sbyor ba nyi ma bdun zhes pa/ las
375a6(1): ma grub na sgrog pa'i sbyor ba bstan/ las dang ye shes gshin rje gnyis la sogs/ nyi ma dang por las kyi gshin rje'i gzugs/ gom pa bdun por lho ru kha bub mnan/ ye shes 'jigs byed bsgom la sngags
375b1(1): bzlas so// gnyis pa thab khung de ru ye shes 'jigs byed bskyed/ las kyi gshin rje rkang pa nas gtubs sreg gsum pa ye shes 'jigs byed la spogs gsum/ sbyor bas spogs pa rdul tshon dkyil 'khor gyi//
375b2(1): bdag nyid byang du bsdad de lho ru kha blta'o// sngags kyi spogs pa dbu zhabs log ste bzlas/ ting 'dzin spogs pa dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du/ khro bo rdo rje hUM mdzad skad cig gis/ mthing nag zhal gsum
375b3(1): g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba/ phyag drug rdo rje 'khor lo be tshon g.yas/ zhing dbyug lcags kyu sdigs mdzub g.yon zhags bzhi/ me dpung klong na khro gtum rngam sgra sgrogs/ bsreg rdzas ye shes 'jigs byed
375b4(1): bsam la sreg gsum pa ji lta'i cho gas sngags btu ba/ gzhi nyin nus mthu ldan pa'i yan lag sngags sbrul dang / gsang sngags dag pa'i yan lag sngags btu ba// nus mthu ldan pas byed pa'i yan lag byin
375b5(1): gyis brlab/ slob bu mthu ldan byed par rjes gnang sbyin/ dang po me long sman spos dri zhim byug srin d+hu ra 'am mtshal gyi phye mas btsag de la 'khor lo re mig dgu pa bri/ dbus su a bri re mig brgyad po la/ sgra
375b6(1): dbyangs yi ge mtshan brgyad tshan re bri/ de las 'od 'phros phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams/ dbyangs sgra'i yi ge bkug nas thim par bsgom/ sha chen la sogs pas ni mchod par bya'o// gnyis pa gzhung bzhin
376a1(1): btus la legs par bri/ me long steng du bzhag la sngar bzhin mchod/ gsum pa sngags las 'od 'phros 'jig rten khams/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thugs kha gnas pa yi/ zla ba'i 'khor lo la
376a2(1): 'od 'phros pas thim/ me mar gcig la gnyis su dbye ba ltar/ bkug nas sngags btus pa la thim par bsgom// snga ma bzhin du mchod pa rgyas par bya/ bzhi pa mdun gyi sngags de slon dpon gyis/ ma he'i
376a3(1): zhal nas bcu gnas snying kha yi/ bzlas pa'i 'khor lo'i sngags la thim par bsgom/ slob dpon rdo rjes lan gsum sngags brjod pas/ rjes su brjod de sngags bzlas pas/ slob dpon ma he'i zhal nas
376a4(1): sngags 'phreng byung / slob bu'i ma he'i zhal du rab zhugs te/ snying khar thim pas byin brlabs ldan par bsgom/ bzhi pa shin tu mnyam bzhag dpa' bo'i gnas/ lho phyogs gnas ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs
376a5(1): bzlas/ mchod pa rdzogs nas lho yi phyogs nas 'jug lho yi lag pa'i steng nas bzlas pa bya/ lnga pa bris sku bris don gsum ste/ 'tshogs par byin brlabs rgun ni brtan bya dang / de la rab gnas bya ba la
376a6(1): sogs pa'o// drug pa rje btsun drung du zla ba drug bsnyen bsgrub sbag ma rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis/ lha 'dre gnad la bor ba'i sbyor ba brgyad/ rdzas dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / sbyor ba gnyen po lha dang
376b1(1): las kyi lha/ rtog pa dang po nas 'byung gnyen po lha yi rdzas/ so tshas mal yin las kyi lha yi rdzas/ sngags kyi rtsa ba gsum ni gnyen po lha yi sngags/ de nyid dregs pa'i ngos 'dzin las kyi lha yi sngags/ gnyen po
376b2(1): lha yi ting 'dzin bdag dang bdun/ thab khung gsum du rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom/ las kyi lha yi ting 'dzin de gsum bya/ gdan gyi 'og tu 'chi bdag gshin rje bsgom/ gnyen po lha yi sbyor ba grogs dang
376b3(1): bcas// mtshan ma'i sum cha nam stong dang po'i sbyor ba rdul tshon nam/ lnga pa'i thang kha la brten bzhi pa'i bsgom pa dang / gsum pa'i sngags tshan gsum po bzlas pa'o// mtshan mo'i gung la dang po'i lnga pa la/
376b4(1): rten pa'i bsgrub pa bzhi bsgom pa/ gsum pa'i sngags bzlas pa dang ldan par bya'o// nam gyi cha smad sum cha gzhan kun sngar dang 'dra/ drug bdun gnyis kyi sbyin sreg mnan pa bya/ gnyen po lha yi sreg rdzas ma
376b5(1): he'i zhal du dbul/ las kyi lha yi sreg rdzas 'chi bdag zhal du dbul/ de dus gnyen po'i lha sngags ma he'i zhal nas bzlas/ las kyi lha yi sngags ni srin po'i zhal nas bzlas/ de ltar nyin mtshan thun gsum
376b6(1): drug tu bzlas/ dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan de bzhin zla drug bya'o// bdun pa'i snying rje chen po yid brlan gces/ mtshan ma gyen bsgreng rnal 'byor lam bsgom pa/ lha yi sku nyid 'ja' tshon bzhin du bsgom/ lte
377a1(1): ba khong stong nang du mthing nag hUM/ steng ngam 'og tu oM ni dmar po bsgom// ma he'i zhal gyi sna bug steng rlung thur la sdig 'og rlung bsdams nas rlung de yar log pas/ yi ge gnyis la thim pas
377a2(1): rlung de yar log pas/ yi ge gnyis la thim pas rlung de gyen la log sna bug gnyis nas dmar nag 'od zer 'phros/ snang ba rten 'brel thams cad gsal bar byas/ 'od zer sna bug gnyis nas tshur bsdus
377a3(1): nas/ yi ge gnyis la thim pas de gnyis gsal bar bsgom/ sa bon dag la sems dge zung ba'o// de la brten nas nad sems bzung ba// snang ba rten 'brel dmar nag som snang byas/ bsdus pas snang
377a4(1): ba thams cad rang la bsdu/ rang yang g.yas pa'o rwa zhal gsum la thim/ de gsum ma he'i sna bug g.yas nas zhugs/ g.yon gyi zhal gsum sna bug g.yon nas zhugs// sku de thams cad yi ge gnyis
377a5(1): la thim// yi ge gnyis zhu thig le dmar nag gyur// de yang na da shin tu cha 'phrar gyur// sems gtad pa ni na da sems bzung ba'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ man ngag gi
377a6(1): gnas bdun gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya gya brgyad pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// rdzogs rim byang chub snying po bshad// de kho na nyid sbyar ba la/ dpa' bo'i gnas la gnas zhes pa/ de la rnam pa gsum
377b1(1): ste/ zab dang rgya che zung 'jug pa'o// rgya che ba la sems gnas pa// dang po bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yi// thugs khar ye shes sems dpa' de thugs na// sngags kyi 'khor lo gnas pa'i hUM la
377b2(1): dmigs/ khrag rlung shas che hUM nyid dkar dmar ro// de gnyis snyoms na 'od du 'bar// de la dbugs drug bar du sems bzung ba/ de yi 'od zer gshin rje gshed la spro// de la dmigs te de nas hUM che
377b3(1): spro// de la sems brtan mtha' ma'i sngags la spro// de nas phyi ya yid dang nyi ma ye shes sems dpa' dang // dam tshig sems dpa' rnams la sngar bzhin spro// hUM la sems brtan bar du bsgom par bya'o// de
377b4(1): nas phyi yi gzhal yas zhing khams dang // snang ba rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kun la spro// 'od de bsdus la ma he'i zhal du bsdu// de la sems gtad gsal ba'i bar du bsgom// gnyis pa zab pa nyid la
377b5(1): sems bzung ba// hUM gsal snang ba rten 'brel kun la spro// lnga pa ltar spros snang ba bdag la bsdu// de bzhin rim par bsdus la hUM de nyid// na da'i bar du bsdus la na da'i cha phra ba// shin tu mi dmigs
377b6(1): gsal zhing brtan par bsgom// gsum pa zung du 'jug la sems gnas pa// spro dang bsdu ba thams cad sngar bzhin bya// rgya che'i dus su snang ba rang rgyud dmigs pa yin// zab pa'i dus kyi na dus gcal pa
378a1(1): yin// de nyid snang ba rang bzhin med par bsgom pa'o// de stengs a dmar lte bar hUM nag bsgom// steng sgo gnyis rlung mnan pa'o// sa bon dang ni thig ler sems bzung bas// sems de dngos
378a2(1): med byang chub sems su gsal// rang rig ye shes ma yengs gsal bsgom na// tshe 'dis sa bon byang chub thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni// de kho na nyid sbyor ba la// shin tu mnyam par
378a3(1): bzhag pa yi// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// pho mtshan gyen sgreng zhes pa la// gdams pa gsum yin te/ don dam kun rdzob dbyer med do// kun rdzob sems gnas rnam gnyis// hUM dang na da la gnas
378a4(1): pa'o// dang po lha yi sku nyid ni// snang la gsal ba rang bzhin med// 'ja' tshon lta bu'i rnam par bsgom// de yi lte ba'i gnas nyid du// hUM yig mthing nag gcig tu gsal// de stengs thig le dmar po
378a5(1): bsgom// de nas ma he sna bug ni// g.yas g.yon gnyis rlung mar bsdigs la// 'og sgo bsdams pas rlung de nyid// gyen la yar log hUM la thim// hUM las 'od zer dmar nag 'phros// dngos po thams cad
378a6(1): dmar nag gyur// tshur 'dus 'od zer hUM la thim// de la rnam par sems gtad gnas pa'o// na da la ni sems gtad gnas pa'o// dngos po kun 'dus rang la thim// g.yas kyi zhal gsum sna bug g.yas
378b1(1): nas zhugs// g.yon gyi zhal gsum sna bug g.yon nas zhugs// de dag sku gsum hUM la bsdus te thim// hUM nyid na da ra gyur te na da stong pa nyid// de ltar gyur te de la sems gnas pa'o// don dam dag la
378b2(1): sems gnas pa// de ltar hUM dang na da kun// snang la rang bzhin med pa ste// chu zla lta bu'i rnam par bsgom// de yang dngos med skye ba med// stong pa nyid du sems gnas pa'o// dbyer med dang la gnas pa
378b3(1): ni// de ltar don dam kun rdzob gnyis// ma 'gags ngos bzung med pa ste// yod pa ma yin med pa min// yod med rtag chad mtha' las grol// dngos pos ma rig 'dus ma byas// byang chub sems nyid dngos
378b4(1): med stong // stong la ma zhen sems gnas pa'o// des ni chos sku rang grol ba'o// gzhan yang gsang sngags bzlas pa yi// sems bzung ba yi lugs gnyis te// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa byed dus su// dbugs
378b5(1): gnyis par 'gro sngags bzlas pas// mdun gyi ma he'i zhal du zhugs// mchod phul rgyud bskul byin brlabs bsdus// tshur 'dus byin brlabs dngos grub bdag la thim// rgyun gyi bsnyen pa byed dus
378b6(1): su// dbugs nyid thub tshad mar bsdigs la// hUM la sngags rim gsum gyis bskor// de las 'od 'phros khams gsum gyi// sems can don byas sangs rgyas mchod// tshur 'dus rnam shes dngos grub
379a1(1): 'dus// de ltar rab tu gsal bsgoms nas// dngos grub chen po 'grub 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ de kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad brgya gya
379a2(1): dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos/ man ngag rig pa 'di bshad do// ye shes las kyi lha grub pa'i// rtags dang nyams kyi rim pa ni// dbang thob dam tshig mnyam bzhag sngags// rab kyis lha yi sku
379a3(1): nyid ni// rdo rje 'jigs byed sngon du mthong // ci 'dod gsung zhing byin gyis rlob// de la rnal 'byor bsgrub pa pos// 'jigs pa mi bya ci 'dod slang // gang 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// 'bring gis
379a4(1): gzugs brnyan 'dzum dang bzhad// lung ston rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur// tha mas zhin can mon pa dang // mi nag bya nag mchod rten sngo// rlung nag tshub ma 'brug sgra sgrogs// sna tshogs mtshan ma mthong bar
379a5(1): 'gyur// gzhan yang go chas lus brgyan dang // lag na mtshon cha 'bar ba dang // seng ge la sogs gcan gzan tshogs// bdag gi drung 'khor pho nyar byed// sems gsal ting sran tshugs shing // snang srid
379a6(1): phyag rgya 'bar la sogs// sna tshogs mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur// de dus dngos grub blang ba ni// grub pa'i rdzas dang bdud rtsi dang // snying po lnga dang sha chen lnga// bza' btung longs spyod sna tshogs kyis// dang
379b1(1): pos lha la phyag mchod bya// de nas dngos grub rdzas rnams la// oM A hUM gis byin brlabs te// ye shes las kyi lha rnams kyis// snying po bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs// rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor bar bya// bdag
379b2(1): gi spyi mgrin snying kha ru// yig 'bru dkar dmar mthing gsum 'phros// de las 'od zer gsum 'phros pas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems// khro bo khro mo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed chen
379b3(1): po yi// gnas gsum sku la thim gyur pas// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa phul// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bsdus// 'od zer rnam gsum tshur 'dus te// bdag gi lus gnas gsum du thim// lus ngag
379b4(1): yid gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob// spyi bor oM dkar 'od du zhu// sku mdog dkar po dri med 'od// khro bo zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// thugs khar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
379b5(1): dkar// snying po oM dkar shel 'dra bsgom// mgrin par aHdmar 'od du zhu// sku mdog dmar po dbang dang ldan// khro bo pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// thugs khar pad+ma 'dab brgyad dmar// snying po a dmar
379b6(1): dbang ldan sgom// snying khar hUM mthing 'od du zhu// sku mdog mthing nag drag po'i sku// khro bo'i nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs// thugs kar rdo rje mthing nag gdengs// rnal 'byor lus ngag yid dang gsum// gnyis
380a1(1): su med 'gyur mnyam par 'gyur// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub nyid// yang dag nges par thob par 'gyur// gang brtsams las rnams thogs med 'grub// oM ya man ta ka hUM ma hA kro d+ha badz+ra b+ha
380a2(1): ra ba kA ya badz+ra sid d+hi au/ oM kA la ru pa a ma hA kro d+ha b+he ra bA ka badz+ra sid+d+hi au/ oM hriHSh+T+rIHwi kro ta na na ma hA kro d+ha badz+ra b+he re ba tsit+ta badz+ra sid d+hi hUM/ sa ma ya ho/ de ltar dngos grub mchog thob bya'o// gzhan yang
380a3(1): drag po'i sbyor ba yis// las kyi mtha' brgya btul ba ni// ling ga 'khor lo thun dang gces// rabs chad nag po'i thod par bcug/ bdud nag drag po'i gnas gtad na// 'thibs nad lkugs par gsod
380a4(1): par 'gyur// mon pa las byung thod pa bcug/ dur khrod gnyen po'i sar mnan na// glo bur glang thabs gsod par 'gyur// mdze can dmar chod thod par bcug/ klu nag po la gtad byas na// mdze shul phol
380a5(1): 'bras nad kyis gsod// dri bo dmar chod thod par bcug/ yul btsan khan dmar la gtad na// gri rgod khram gyis gsod par 'byed// lugs sa mo yi thod par bcug/ klu bdud mtsho bdud mo la
380a6(1): gtad// rims da la nad kyis gsod par byed// 'byung ba'i lto gshegs dbang chen mnan// 'dis ni gang yang tshor mi srid// hri ti bzhi bskor sngags kyis mnan// gzhan yang thun 'phang sbyor ba ni// de
380b1(1): bzhin thod par thun gtor sbyar// nad kyi bskal ba sha za'i tshogs// nam mkha' gang bas dgra la gtibs// don po srog gcod brlag par dmigs// gong bzhin thun gyi sngags kyis 'phang // myur du gsod
380b2(1): par gdon mi za// de skad rdo rje 'chang gis bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ man ngag rim pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen
380b3(1): pos// 'phags pa ma he'i gdong can la// bstod cing las bcol 'di gsungs so// snang mdzad tshil chen spos btang ste// rdo rje 'jigs byed skur gnas nas// hUM/ 'phags mchog khros pa'i rgyal po 'jigs
380b4(1): byed ni/ skye med rnam dag kyi dbyings nyid las/ 'gag med rang byung chen po'i skur bzhengs shig/ bdud 'dul dpal chen phyag rgya 'di ston cig/ sku mdog mthing nag mi 'gyur drag por mdzad// dbu dgu
380b5(1): gab pa mtshon cha gnad dgu 'bebs// dbus zhal ma he'i gdong khros khrag 'thungs pa// spyi gtsug khro 'jigs dmar po srin po'i zhal// steng zhal 'jam dpal zhal ser 'dzum khro 'jigs// rwa g.yas zhal
380b6(1): gsum sngon dmar ser po khros// rwa g.yon zhal gsum dkar dud kha gnag/ spyan gsum mche gtsigs sma ra ag tshom ser// smin ma khro gnyer glog stong 'od du 'gyu// g.yas zhal gsum nas hUM sgra rngam
381a1(1): bsgrags pas// stong gsum dregs pa ma lus bran du 'khol// g.yon zhal gsum nas phaT sgra rngam bsgrags pas// gdug pa'i dgra bgegs thal bar rlog par mdzad// dbus zhal gsum nas
381a2(1): phepham mo'i sgra bsgrags pas// dur khrod ma tshogs thams cad dbang du bsdus// zhal dgus ha he khro gtum bzhad pa yis// stong gsum ma lus g.yo 'gul ldeg par mdzad// phyag gnyis glang po'i lpags rlon
381a3(1): 'dzin cing bsnams// bzhi pa chu gri mi yi rkang pa bsnams// lnga pa rdo rje rtse gcig zhags pa bsnams// drug pa sta re ha sta bsnam// bdun pa mdung thung rgyu ma bsnams// brgyad pa mda' chen 'od khung
381a4(1): bsnams// dgu pa lcags kyu thams cad tshal bsnams// bcu pa dbyug tho dur khrod ras// bcu gcig kha T+wAM gsal shing bsnams// bcu gnyis 'khor lo me thab bsnams// bcu gsum rdo rje dril bu
381a5(1): 'khrol// bcu bzhi rdo rje tho ba sdigs mdzub bsgreng // bco lnga ral gri 'phan rtse gsum// bcu drug cang te'u rlung bskyod pas// sna tshogs mtshon chas gdug pa kun 'dul zhing // dgra bgegs ma lus myur du
381a6(1): sgrol bar mdzad// bcu drug zhabs ni brkyang bskum tshul bzhugs pas// zhabs kyi dang po mi dang bya rgod mnan// gnyis pa'i zhabs kyis ma he 'ug pa mnan// gsum pa'i zhabs kyis glang po bya rog
381b1(1): mnan// bzhi pa'i zhabs kyis bong bu ne tso mnan// lnga pa'i zhabs kyis rnga mo bya khra mnan// drug pa'i zhabs kyis khyi dang khyung chen mnan// bdun pa'i zhabs kyis lug dang ri sgeg mnan// brgyad pa'i zhabs
381b2(1): kyis wa dang bzhad mnan pa'o// 'jig rten byad dang dud 'gro thams cad gdan du mdzad// pho mtshan gyen du sgreng bas 'jig rten gyi// bdud bzhi zil gnon mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud// gsang ba'i rdo rjes ma
381b3(1): mo re 'dod skongs// gcer bu mi 'gyur dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra// 'jig rten lha dang gnod sbyin dregs pa can// mgo gcad zod rlon 'phreng bas do shal mdzad// thod pa skam po'i 'phreng bas rab brgyan
381b4(1): mdzad// dur khrod keng rus mang po'i rgyan chas mdzes// ye shes me dpung 'bar bas sred gsum bsreg/ rdo rje'i sku mchog khro gtum rngam pa yis// bdud dang mu stegs 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// bdud
381b5(1): kyi bdud sde bdud rnams sgrol mdzad pa// rnga sgra nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba yis// 'jig rten dregs pa'i pho mo zil gyis gnon// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// shin tu mi bzad gtum rngam
381b6(1): gar stabs bzhugs// tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// khro bo'i gad rgyangs bsgrags pas snying khrag skyug/ ma mo mkha' 'gro bdud mo srin mo'i tshogs// dges pa'i gad mos dbang sdud bran du
382a1(1): khol// dur khrod sha za srin po ro langs dang // lce spyang stag dom kang ka bya gcan tshogs// sha za ma lus pho nya sprul par 'gyed// kun bzang 'jigs pa'i nga ro ha ha sgrogs// rngam pa'i rgyal po
382a2(1): khrag 'thung gshin rje gshed// rang byung 'gyur med thams cad 'joms mdzad pa// rdo rje 'jigs byed sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bstan pa bshig pa thal ba rdul du rlogs// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal
382a3(1): 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ rdo rje'i sku la bstod pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu go gcig pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// 'jam dpal gzhon nus yang gsol pa// dus ngan tha ma'i 'jig rten
382a4(1): la// rbod gtong ngan byed nang 'khrug tshe// phyir bzlog 'khor lo bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed po yis// 'di skad
382a5(1): gsungs pa ngas bshad bya'o// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // khro rgyal gshin rje gshed por snang // nga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes yin te thugs la gnas// nga ni dus gsum mngon pa'i
382a6(1): lha// nga ni bde gshegs kun gyi thugs// nga ni khro rgyal kun gyi rje// nga ni nyon mongs bdud 'dul dpal// nga ni dus gsum mngon du byung // rnam par gzigs la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas kun pas nga sngar
382b1(1): byung // 'das dus sgron me'i bskal pa ni// me tog 'od ldan bya ba ru// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i mgon// klu yi rigs mchog dbyangs zhes bya// nga ni dus gsum da ltar gsan// dus gsum dus med nga
382b2(1): yi dus// da ltar 'jam dpal dbyangs zhes bya// nga ni dus gsum phyis kyang 'byung // byams pa la sogs mos pa yis// bar gyi sgrol ma'i bskal pa ni// yon tan yid 'ong bya ba ya// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye
382b3(1): shes thugs// kun tu gzigs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya// de ltar sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs// ye shes sku nyid rang byung ba// gdul dka' drag po 'dul ba'i phyir// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed por mdzad// dus
382b4(1): ma'i 'jig rten snyigs ma la// byad sngags nus mthu stobs 'gran tshe// sngags pa stobs can rang gi sngags// rang la bzlos ste bsad pa yi// phyir bzlog 'khor lo drag po 'di// dbang bskur thob pas
382b5(1): bsgom par bya'o// rnam dag spros med mtha' bral chos nyid pas// b+h+rUM yig dmar ser yongs su gyur pa las/ mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu 'bar ba bsgom// de dbus mthing nag yongs gyur pas// khro rgyal
382b6(1): rdo rje 'jigs byed gsal bar bskyed// de yi thugs kyi rdo rje snying po las// phyogs bcu'i rtsibs las rang mdog hUM yig spro// de nas phyogasas bcu'i khro bo gsal bar bskyed// rdo rje drag po smug nag 'khor lo
383a1(1): shar// rdo rje snying po ser nag rdo rje lho// rdo rje rgyal po dmar nag be con nub// rdo rje gtum po ljang nag ral gri byang // de bzhin shar lho lho nub byang // byang shar rtsibs la gnas pa'i khro bo
383a2(1): ni// rdo rje rnon po dkar ser kha T+wAM kha// rdo rje 'bar ba dmar ser me dpung 'bar// rdo rje 'bebs pa dmar smug gsal shing bsnams// rdo rje stobs chen mthing skya dgra sta bsnams// de bzhin steng gi rtsibs la
383a3(1): khro bo mchog/ rdo rje 'chang rgyal mthing nag rdo rje gsor// 'og gi rtsibs la rdo rje nag po ni// nag po rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa bskyed// g.yon pa kun na sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// kun kyang spyan gsum mche
383a4(1): gtsigs khro bo'i sku// me dpung klong na mi bzad 'jigs tshul bzhugs// dbang bskur byin brlabs skye mched drug kyang brlab// ye shes 'khor lo dgug gzhug mchod pa 'bul// 'khor lo myur du 'khor bas
383a5(1): bsgrub bya gcad// thog gzer me lce 'phros pas thal bar brlag nyon mongs dug lnga bdud bzhi gcad par bya// ma yengs rgyun du bar chad med par bzlas// des ni byad sngags thams cad phyir la bzlog/ de
383a6(1): nyid rang la nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro// oM ya mA na ta ka hUM/ badz+ra b+hai ra ba ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/ hriHSh+TiHbi kr-i tA na na/ ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo na/ ra ra dza ni/ badz+ra u kra ya/ badz+ra gar+b+ha/ badz+ra rA dza/
383b1(1): badz+ra tsan to/ badz+ra khad ka badz+ra dza la/ badz+ra ba b+h+yo/ badz+ra pa li/ badz+ra ka li/ badz+ra d+ha ro/ sarba man ta pra yo ga ma la sarba bah+ni na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ staM pa ya staM pa ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ha na ha na/ tsakra we ra ti
383b2(1): tsakra wer ti/ pra taM ki ra/ pra taM ki ra/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ badz+ra b+he re ba ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/ bi dAn sa ya/ bi dA na sa ya/ bi tsuR+Sha ya/ bi tsu ra Na ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ zhing chen ras la dug khrag gis// mi rkang bya
383b3(1): rog sgro rtsa yis// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu hUM yig bri// mu khyud mtha' la phyir bzlog sngags// dug khrag ske tshe lan tshwas byug/ rtsibs mtshan gsang mdzod// sngags bzlas don po'i sgrub khang mnan// rang sngags
383b4(1): phyir ldog brlag par 'gyur// gtsang ma'i ras sam gro ga la// g+hi hang ga bur gur kum dang // ldong ros dza ti cu gang gis// gong bzhin 'khor lo legs bris la// sngags bzlas bdag nyid dpung par
383b5(1): gdags// bdag nyid rdo rje bzhi srubs 'gyur// lte ba chos sku spros med zlum// rtsibs rnams ye shes rol par 'phro// bdud bzhi nyon mongs dug lnga gcod// kun grub chos kyi 'khor lo 'dis// bla med byang
383b6(1): chub yang dag thob// 'jam dpal thugs kyi snying po las// sprul pa'i ye shes 'od zer shar// zhing bcu sgrol zhing rnam rtog sbyong // rigs can sems dpa' chen po la// 'khor lo rgyal po yun du
384a1(1): gnas// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying po rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi le'u ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu go gnyis pa'o// // bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen
384a2(1): la// rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis gsol ba// ril bu dud pa mig sman sogs// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yi// rab tu sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar brjod// kush+ma ce bog pri yang ku// sha
384a3(1): la ki la mu ra dang // de ba ta ru pa tsa dang // tsa rong dang ni ku du ru// skar ma rgyal dang tha skar la// zhib btags ril bu grib bskams bya// sngags ni khri 'bum brgya rtsa brgyad// btab ste yon tan bsam mi
384a4(1): khyab// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// sngags dang sman bcas bshad bya ba// ha ti du ra ba lang dang // shil bal sa bon spu shel rtse// gri ha ko li ma zan phal// u shi ra dang go shing ga/ sa na pa ta ku du ru// ha
384a5(1): rti yan lag mtha' dang bcas// de la sngags ni de bzhin bzlas// hri sti bskul tshig bcas pa'i mthar// rigs kyi rgyal po 'di nyid gdab// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ a ta te/ sa ra sa ra/ gra ha mu tsa bi sha swA ha/ oM
384a6(1): ta ta sa ra sa ra/ gri h+na gr-i h+Na/ gra ha gra ha/ mun tsa na mun tsa na/ ha ra bi sha swA hA/ lha sgom sngags 'od sman la bstim// grangs rdzogs rab tu sbyor ba bya// sman mchog yid bzhin nor bu 'dra// de yi dud pa
384b1(1): bdugs byas na// ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du 'grub// rims nad nyin gsum bzhi pa dang // lo dang zla ba'i rims nad dang // ma rungs drag po'i gdon rnams dang // brjed byed skem byed gnod byed
384b2(1): rnams// ma lus gdon mi za ba ru// zhi byed byams ldan gnod mi byed// rtag tu rang gi khyim 'dug na// 'bru dang longs spyod nor 'phel 'gyur// mi shis pa kun zhi bar 'gyur// shis pa rab tu thob par
384b3(1): 'gyur// 'bru nor rin chen rab tu 'phel// dgra bgegs thams cad zhi bar byed// ming ni gdon mi za zhes btags// gang du tshong byed khye 'tshol na// bdug sa phun sum tshogs pa 'dis// ci 'tshong ba yi zong
384b4(1): bdugs na// tshong 'don bdag rgyal phye mchog rnyed// rje sgor phyin na bkur sti thob// bsam pa 'grub ste bdag dgar 'gyur// gang la bdug pa 'dis bdugs na// 'byung po lha dang sha za dang // grul bum
384b5(1): hrul po smyo byed dang // brjed byed gnod sbyin sbrul gdug zin// kos sna'i sbrul gdug sdig pas zin// ka sha la dug rkang mangs dang // mda' dug brgyab dang dug 'thungs dang // khyi sogs zin la 'di
384b6(1): bdugs na// mthu chen rgyal po gdams pa 'di// rdo rje srin pos bcom pa bzhin// dug rnams thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// gang du bdug pa 'dis gdugs na// byis pa 'chi byed sri can gdon// 'dir
385a1(1): 'ong mi srid 'bros par byed// bud med rnams ni rtag tu bsrung // sbrum ma nad med bde bar bca'// drag po'i gdon gyis glags btsal kyang // gnod byed nus par bstan mi 'gyur// mo sham
385a2(1): la bdugs bu rnams 'chags// dug nad 'phra men thams cad 'joms// byis pa nu zho mi 'thung du// 'di bdugs nu zho 'thung mi du// nad rnams thams cad 'joms sel ba'i// mthu chen bdug pa dam pa
385a3(1): 'di// byin brlabs yon tan dpag med 'byung // rtag tu lha sgom bdugs byas na// lha dang bsrung ma rab tu dga'// khro tshig mi byed srung skyobs byed// bshags dang bskang ba'i mchog yin no// ma mo mkha'
385a4(1): 'gro dges nas srung // sgrib sbyong ma 'ongs ye shes thob// yi dam lha yi zhal mthong 'gyur// des na bdud rtsi mchog ces bya'o// gzhan yang yid rab sbyor ba ni// 'di bzhin rin chen zhes bya ba// d+hi man sa yi
385a5(1): ras sogs/ sa rdzi ra sa sra rtsi spogs/ ha ra hri dang ha ri tra/ ha ri ta la na la dang / byol song mu tig so tra dkar/ na la lce pog 'dre 'jigs rnams// cha snyam zhib btags ril bur bya// grib ma la ni
385a6(1): bskams byas nas// rgyal po'i pho brang nang song na// rgyal po dbang 'du mang pos 'khor// mig la bskus na mtshan mo zhing // khyim nag kun na gnas pa yi// nor dang 'bru rdzas thams cad mthong // mig bskus
385b1(1): sa 'og gter rnams mthong // dpral bar thig le gnyis byas na// sngar ma mthong pa'i sgo dang phugs// thams cad phyed cing mthong bar 'gyur// klu yi gnas su bdag song ste// klu mo kun la ci 'dod
385b2(1): blang // bdag la ster zhing dgos 'dod 'grub// ril bu klu yi gnas bzhag na// char chen po ni 'bebs par byed// ser ba 'beb tshe sman chen 'di// bdug pas bdugs na 'chad bzlog nges// dgra yi khyim
385b3(1): sbas 'byed par byed// mtshan mo ril bu mer bcug ste// thig le gnod sbyin gnas phyin na// de yi nub mo gnod sbyin la// dngos grub ci slong ster bar 'gyur// dug dang sbrul gdug zin pa la// 'o ma dang
385b4(1): sbyar blud na 'tsho// mi bzad gdon gyis zin pa la// bdugs na 'dre gdon chab pas gtab// 'bab cing sgyu bro gtong bar nges// bdugs na gang bdugs dgra de dag/ rab tu 'joms shing brlag par

385b6(1): par 'gyur/ chu bo che la'ang de bzhin no// au hi hUM ho phaT phaT/ a kar ri sha ya tha tha/ gzhan yang gang yin sbyor ba ni/ ku sma ba ti ha ri byi/ pa tsa kUsh+ma sen d+ha ba/ zi yan ha ti pi pi ling / a sho kan d+ha ma

386b1(1): gang 'dod 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// tri dang pu ru sha yis bcud// nyi zla 'dres pa de gnyis dang // pad ma'i me tog ro tra ka ku sma ba ti spos kyis gang // ho ti ro tsa na rnams

386b6(1): gdon rnams// gang gi sna yis dri tshor rnams// dbang du 'gyur bar smos ci dgos// mi dang lha 'dre la sogs kun// dri tshor dbang 'dus bka' bzhin byed// rab tu mthu chen gdug pa'i mchog/ sad+ya the dan//
387a1(1): dzad kyi man/ ki ka rang ma ha rang / gi a man// sho sha ni sarba ha pa ti/ sho d+ha ni/ go pa shu man tra mi yan te na/ mu shu shu the pa tsa/ yid bzhin rin chen sngags zhes bshad/ gzhan yang rab tu sbyor
387a2(1): ba ni// pa tsa ku shwa man ti ri/ ku sma ba ti ta ka ra/ ha ra te la ha ri ra/ u shi ra dang ro tra ka ka ru ka no hi na dang / thang shing seng gog hA rA byi/ na ga ge sar mi ta ka ka ti byi tang a ka ru/ tsha ba gsum dang ro/
387a3(1): tsha na/ cha mnyam gcig gi tshad kyi phyed/ byi shi bi gcin nang du bskol/ smin gyi bar du sa seb bzhag rak+ta'i ril bu zangs snod bzhag der bdag gang gi snar blug na/ sbrul gyis zin dang du 'thungs
387a4(1): dang // brjed byed 'byung pos btab pa dang // mda' ngan mo dang mo gsham dang // bu gcig las mi 'byung ba yi// des ni bu 'dzin gdon gdug sel// bu de gzhan gyis mi thub bo// khyim du rtag tu bzhag gyur

387b1(1): dza nang bcug phyir brubs la// shwa sha yi me la bsregs// rma bya tshig nas a rdze lus// lig phus mig dang bcas pa de// dngos grub 'byung ba zhes ku ku ka la ha sta tsa ri// sa la btsugs te rgya mtsho'i 'gram// dri
387b2(1): chu lde gu grib la bskams// sho na ka yi bal skud tsam// mig la bsku zhing skye mgul gdags// lha yi mig gis kyang mi mthong // bdag gi mig nad kun sel te// gzhan gyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan
387b3(1): yang rab tu sbyor ba na// sa 'dul brag gnas ro dag ni// ma rul bum pa sar par gzhug bzhi mdor sa rkos de nyid srung // sas g.yogs de stengs bdag 'dug la// gsang sngags nang du bzlas bya
387b4(1): zhing // maN+Dal steng du bum pa bzhag/ shar du kha lha rdo gtsang dgab// me tog rtsi thog snying por sbyar// ril bu bdun bya gser gyis dkri// sngags bzlas khar bcug mig sman bsku// mi snang gang gis mthong mi

387b6(1): la// sngags btab gong bzhin rten 'brel sbyar// dpral bar thig le mig bskus na// mi snang gang gis mthong mi 'gyur// bi sha rtsi yi khu ba dang // lig phu mig dang de bzhin no// sri ka la yi mkhris pa
388a1(1): dang // ha ti ro tsa nu dag dang // a dza na snas kha ma nyams te// sngags btab dpral bar thig le bya// gang gis de ltar byas gyur na// lha mig ldan pas kyang mi mthong // de dag gsang sngags sbyor
388a2(1): ba ni// oM A li ka li gyi ni swA hA/ mgo pi ta dang sen dra ba// 'bri ha ti pa la dang gsum// zhib btags lus la btab gyur na// lha yang nges par dbang du 'gyur// ka ko kan da b+ha'u dang // til 'bru dang ni
388a3(1): ma ti rtsigs// ro tsa na ma nyams zhib btags te// bud med skyes pa gang yang rung // lus sam sha la bskus gyur na// gzhan rnams gang la yang mi lta zhing // bdag la brtse rung bdag dbang 'gyur// b+ha 'u pa
388a4(1): tsa arga rnams// cha bsnyams tsur na byas pa de// su ta'i 'o mas sbyar ba'i phye// mi dang lha dang dud 'gro dang // gang gis brtse rung bdag dbang 'gyur// b+ha hu ku sha pa tsa dang // tsur da ni tsa'i thal ba rnams// ma
388a5(1): he g+he ri du dus sgra// tsur na gang gi lus dag la// btab na dbang du 'gyur bar nges// pa tsa kush+ma b+ha hU dang // dud 'gro 'dab can ro tsa na// rtsa ri cha bsnyams rgyu skar ni// ba ra na yi nyi ma la// phye ma mar ngo'i
388a6(1): brgyad dag la// rgyal po dmangs sam bud med la/ kha ru blud dam sha la bskus// des ni nges par skye 'gro'i rigs// rgyal po drag po'ang dbang du 'gyur// bdag la mi khro brtse gdung dran// gzhan yang ha ta ro//
388b1(1): tsa na// ku sgra ba ta ka ta na la// gsil chen spos glang ro ta ka dza ti li shi ka dan la// pad ma gser gyi ud pa la// cha bsnyams phye ma sbrang rtsis spu// min sman bdug pa thig le bya// de yi phan yon brjod mi
388b2(1): lang // mi dang mi ma yin rnams dang // sbrul gdug gcan gzan dud 'gro rnams// bdag gi dbang 'gyur bran bzhin byed// gnod byed bgegs la thar bar 'gyur// me chu mtshon cha dug la sogs// 'chi byed
388b3(1): kun las nges par thar// nad da la rims kyis thebs mi srid// ma mo mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin mo// bdag la dga' zhing gus phyag 'tshal// gnod pa'i bsam pa gtan mi rgyu// gang gis bdag mthong dga'
388b4(1): zhing byams// bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub// sgrib pa kun byang ye shes ldan// mig sbyar snang srid sal le mthong // des na rin chen rten 'brel 'di// rnal 'byor kun gyis nyams su blang // 'jam
388b5(1): dpal khri drug stong pa don gyis snying po'i rgyud las/ rten 'brel yid bzhin gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu go bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// gshin rje rdo rje 'jigs byed de// las mi byed cing
388b6(1): 'khu ldog na// mtshan ma ldog dang gong rkyen 'byung // nyams mi bde zhing snying mi dga'// de tshe rnal 'byor dam tshig gso// dbang bskur tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// rdo rje sems dpa'i 'gyod
389a1(1): tshangs ni// yi ge brgya pas mang du bshags// 'jam dpal mtshan ni yang dang brjod// sa tsha sbyin gtong mchod pa bya// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed
389a2(1): la// spogs par bya ba'i rim pa dang // ye shes 'jigs byed la sogs pa'o// gang byed gnyis la mthun pa ru// dam rdzas gtor ma dkyil 'khor dang // sbyin sreg mchod pa gsar pa bsham// de nas gzhung
389a3(1): bzhin bsgrub par bya// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// gnas bdun sa la byas pa yi// sngar gyi las kyi 'jigs byed dam// yang na gsar pa gcig byas la// sngags pa ye shes 'jigs byed kyis// thugs
389a4(1): las ye shes 'od spros la// 'chi bdag gshin rje'i grong khyer nas// las kyi 'jigs byed bkug la bstim// de la don po'i sha khrag sbyin// sngags bzlas las la bskul byas te// lho phyogs gom pa bdun por
389a5(1): gyis// sa ru gru gsum dong brus la// nang du kha bub mgo lhor bstan// sbas te de stengs ye shes kyi// rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis mnan bsgom// gdug pa'i shing la gtum me sbar// mi yi rus pa'i sbyin sreg
389a6(1): bya// des ni gshin rje las byed 'gyur// des kyang 'grub par ma gyur na// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed kyi// sngar bzhin gzugs la dgug gzhug bya// drag po'i me zab gru gsum du// dur khrod gdug pa'i
389b1(1): shing sna la// dur khrod gtsubs me sbar ba yis// rnal 'byor bdag dang me thab tu// ye shes rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed de// rkang pa gnyis nas gtub byas la// sha chen tshil
389b2(1): chen bsgrub bya yi// dri chen ming rus dang sgrags la// sbyin sreg rtsa brgyad la sogs bya// ye shes rdo rje 'jigs byed des// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed de// gsol te snam nas bton byas na// rang dbang
389b3(1): med par las la bskul// las kyi gshin rje 'chi bdag bdud// ma lus sbran te dgra bo yi// gnas su sprin ltar gtibs// dgra la nad mtshon char ba phab// srog gcod sha za khrag 'thung zhing // rjes shul
389b4(1): med par byed par bsam// des ni gang yang brlag par 'gyur// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed la// spogs pa zhes su bshad pa yin// des kyang 'grub par ma gyur na// ye shes rdo rje 'jigs byed
389b5(1): la// spogs pa'i thabs ni rnam pa gsum// 'dug thabs sngags dang sbyor ba'o// 'dug thabs byed nas lho ru blta// skra bshig thal chen lus thugs la// sha chen mur zhing zhing chen bgo sngags kyi spogs pa
389b6(1): zhes bya ba// drag po rtsa ba'i sngags gsum mo// mgo mjug bzlog la bzlas bya zhing // de la gcod pa'i spu gri gdags// sbyor ba spogs pa zhes bya ba// gnas bdun la sogs sa rnams kyi// gshin rje'i
390a1(1): gzugs de'i snying kha ru// dur khrod ras la khrag dug gis// ya brus gzugs de bdag mdun bzhag bdag nyid rdo rje hUM mdzad sku// zhal gsum phyag drug khro gtum bskyed// thugs ka'i hUM las
390a2(1): 'od 'phros pas// ye shes 'jigs byed gnas nas dgug gzugs brnyan de la yang yang bstim// sngags bzlas mchod pa gtor ma sogs// brnag pa'i sha khrag dmigs la dbul// drag po'i gru gsum
390a3(1): me thab tu// dur khrod shing dang tsher ma can// bse dri can dang dug can shing // tsaN+Da li yi gtsubs me'am// dur khrod gdug pa'i me sbar la// de dbus rdo rje hUM mdzad sku// sngags kyis gsal bar rab tu
390a4(1): bskyed// shin tu khro 'gying gtum par bsgom// ye shes rdo rje 'jigs byed gzugs// hUM mdzad ral gris rkang nas gtubs// zhal du gsol dmigs bsrog par bya// de lta ra bsreg grangs mtshan mas
390a5(1): dbab// sha chen tshil chen khrag chen dang // dmar nag skye tshe nyungs kar dang // don po'i dri chen ming byang bsregs// rdzogs nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi// sna nas ye shes 'jigs byed bton// drag po bsad pa la
390a6(1): sogs pa'i// las rnams kun la mngag par bya// thal bas gzugs byas ming byang brnag/ dur khrod gshin rje'i gnas su sba// des ni don po myur du gsod// log non drag po'i rab sbyor ro// oM badz+ra kro
390b1(1): d+hAd+hahAM/ ka ra dza phaT dza/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hAM/ ka ra ma hA ba la/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ rbad nan// rbad nan/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ rtsa ba swA hA'i sngags bar du/ brnag pa gang
390b2(1): yin gzhug par bya// 'di ltar log gnon sbyor ba yis// las dang ye shes gshin rje gshed// rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam pa gnyis// rang dbang med par las byed de// don po mngon du gsod par 'gyur// de
390b3(1): skad rdo rje 'chang gis bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa mchog gi rgyud las/ log non drag po'i le'u ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu go lnga pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyi gtso bo yis// che mchog dpal la yang
390b4(1): gsol pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag dpal// dpal chen gshin rje gshed rgyal po// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // 'phrin las 'khrul 'khor las rim dang // sbyor ba'i rnam grangs bshad du
390b5(1): gsol// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang // rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// 'khrul 'khor rnam lda ngas bshad kyi// legs par nyon la yid la zung // skye med chos sku'i rang bzhin las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul
390b6(1): gzugs skur bstan// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ bcom ldan gshin rje gshed chen gyi// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs// rdo rje las byung 'khor lo mtshon// gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba'i
391a1(1): phyir// dgug dang dbye dang bsad dang mnan// dbab dang 'phang ba'i sbyor ba 'phros// 'jam dpal thugs kyi 'od zer gyis// sprul pa rang byung ngos shar zhing // dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka'
391a2(1): ba'o// lte ba thig le spros med las// rtsibs rnams ye shes rtsal du 'phro// 'khor zhing gcod phyir 'khor lo'o// gdug pa drag sngags dpal 'bar gyis// nyon mongs sreg phyir nyi ma'o// zhing bcu bsregs pas
391a3(1): nyi ma ste// lus sems gcod pas 'khor lo yin// bsgrub bya'i bya ba gang yin la// mtshan nam nyi ma bzhi bzhi 'grub// de phyir nyi ma bzhi zhes bya// 'phrul gyi 'khor lo gsang chen thabs// 'dod pa'i don kun
391a4(1): 'grub byed pa'o// dbang gi gnang ba thob rdzogs nas// dam tshig la gnas rnal 'byor pas// sngon du bya ba'i las rdzogs nas// dur khrod dgu 'dus tshal chen rtsogs// gnas der dge bcu slob ma// sbyor ba
391a5(1): drag po'i 'khrul 'khor brtsam// dur khrod ras la bam chen gyi// sme ba lnga yi zad pa bya// ni rangs su yi thal ba yis// mtha' mar rgya zang skya bcad de// mchog phran rkang gis pir bya la// snag tsha dug chu zhun ma
391a6(1): dang // bam chen don gyi khrag rnams kyis// rjes su mthun pa'i 'khor lo bri// snying po rtsa ba'i 'khor lo dang // stobs chen mi 'bar 'khor lo dang // gcod byed mtshon cha'i 'khor lo gsum// re re la yang
391b1(1): rdzogs par bri// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor yab yum ltor// ma 'dres rang gsal kha sbyar la// dbang bskur dar rtsogs chos drug bya// nye bar gyur pa'i yan lag yin// de ltar bca' ba'i las rdzogs
391b2(1): nas// tig 'dzin dgongs pas nyams ldan bya// nyi ma bzhi ru bskor byas na// drag po'i las rnams gang yang 'grub// thun mong dngos grub thams cad 'byung // gzhan yang ye shes 'khor lo bskor// byang chub
391b3(1): sems kyi rtsal snang bas// dug gsum rnam rtog dra ba gcod// byang chub mchog gi dngos grub thob// 'di dag pha rol gnyis yod phyir// dam pa ye shes 'khor lo bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa 'khrul
391b4(1): 'khor chen po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bcu bzhi'i le'u ste dgu brgya bcu drug go// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ sku yi 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed po ni// 'gyur med 'dus ma
391b5(1): byas pa'i sku// rdo rje sku yi 'khor lo ni// dbus nas thig bskor rim pa gsum// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// 'khrul mig lnga dang gsang mdzod bzhi// phyir rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis ldan// tha ma
391b6(1): rtsibs chen bco brgyad ldan// de la gnas shing dgod pa ni// dbus su khro bdag dpal 'bru lnga// phyi rim sku yi 'phreng ba dgod// rtsibs la gcod byed spu gri dgod/ kha sbyar dong rtsang kha la 'dis// g.yon
392a1(1): bskor sbrul 'gros nyi ma bzhis// dgug pa dag gi las bya'o// g.yas bskor sbrul 'gros nyi ma bzhis// dbye ba dag gi las bya'o// g.yas bskor 'bru ded drag sngags bdun// gsad pa dag gi
392a2(1): las bya'o// g.yon bskor 'bru ded drag sngags bdun// mnan pa dag gis las bya'o// kun dril 'khyil pa sbrul 'gros kyis// mtshan mo mda' zor 'phang pa'o// de bzhin dbab pa'i sbyor ba la// g.yas
392a3(1): bskor chu bril rta sbubs g.yon// 'bru ded g.yas g.yon zor dang gzir// chu 'khyags dbab pa'i 'khrul 'khor ro// bsrung gzir gdon dgug sdong la phral// gzir dang mnan pa'i las rnams
392a4(1): kyang // g.yas bskor g.yon bskor 'bru ded sbyar// gal te sngags pa nang rgyas sam// spogs na ro langs dreg po yis// 'bru rgod gcig bor gcig blangs la// stag mchongs g.yas g.yon de bzhin
392a5(1): bskor// spu gri la sogs de bzhin gdags// thon nas 'khor lo ling gar bcas// rang rang mthun pa'i sa ru mnan// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang // skad cig tsam gyis 'chi
392a6(1): bar 'gyur// sbyin dang chu'ang 'bebs par nus// stobs kyi rgyal po nyid kyang gzir// gzhan lta kun la smos ci dgos// de dag gsang sngags sbyor ba ni// spu gri lnga char mthun pa yin// rtsa ba'i snying po 'di la
392b1(1): ste// oM a kro te ka ya mAn ta ka ha na ma tha badz+ra hUM phaT/ nri A kar+Na ma hUM dza dza/ a mu ka A yu dz+nyA na A kaR+Sha ya hUM dza dza/ A yu ka ti ra ya ni ra ya A kaR+Sha ya hUM dza dza/ a mu ka ru pa skan d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM dza dza/ dang
392b2(1): pos srog gi snying po 'gugs// gnyis pas tshe dang ye shes 'gugs// gsum pas bla dang shes pa 'gugs// bzhi pas gzugs kyi phung po 'gugs// srog gi lha de bshag bi de sha ya phaT// gnyis pa pho lha
392b3(1): gsum ma lha// bzhi pa dgra lha dag dang dbye// hri sti ka pa ye pra ma/ mur tsa rak+ta tsa ra mA ra ya/ shi sha ku ru ni/ rbad ya/ zum ri li li b+h+yo/ staM pa ya nan/ de bzhin dbab pa'i drag sngags ni/ phreM phreM hri la hri la yaM yaM

394a1(1): 'chang chen gyis// yon tan 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// bcom ldan khro bdag gshin rje gshed// 'gag med lhun rdzogs rin po che// rdo rje yon tan 'khrul 'khor ni// dbus nas mu khyud zlum

394b1(1): mu khyud rim pa gsum// dbus kyi lcags mkhar lnga po la// rtsa ba'i snying po 'bru lnga dgod// phyi rim lcags mkhar lnga po la// me dpal snying po bcu gnyis dgod// tha ma'i rab la gang rung sogs/ kha sbyar 'dod
394b2(1): pa'i sgrub bya dgod// g.yas g.yon 'bru dad dkrug la sogs// bsad dbab bsrung gzir ro langs sbyar// 'khor lo de dag mnan pa'i thabs// bsad pa drag po'i las byed na// klu'am mtsho bdud btsan la

394b4(1): rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sa 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ 'phrin las kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud las le'u ste dgu brgya nyi shu gcig go/ de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// drag po ngan sngags 'di bshad
394b5(1): do// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// ngan sngags bsad pa'i sbyor ba bya// dben la gnyan pa'i dur khrod du// phung sa'i gru gsum sol chen thug/ rgyu rten ling ga ming byang bcas// rab chad thod pa srubs
394b6(1): drug brnag/ dug dang tsha ba gsum gyis thug/ dkar nag thig le me 'bar 'brub// khrag chen myos pa gdug pa gsum// 'chi byed sna tshogs thod chen sbyar// dgongs pa ldan pas byin gyis brlabs// klu la
395a1(1): rdzogs pa'i chi bzhis sbyar// byin rlabs dang bcas drag tu bzlas// me 'bar khol lung rlangs pa dros// mthong nas brab cing srog rtsa bcad// nyi shu gcig nas gsod rtags 'byung // zon nas
395a2(1): ling ga gdug par mnan// zor thun dmigs pa'i 'khor la brdeg/ badz+ra kro d+ha ya man ta ka hri te ka la ru pa ya mAn ta ka nag po srog nan rtsa rbad dbugs khyer kri myags srog la mA ra ya rbad/ mi 'gyur nges
395a3(1): par dus bzhin gsod// de nas drag po mchog ces bya// de nas thugs mchog gshed chen gyis// rdo rje 'chang chen la zhus pas// dus ngan mtha' ma'i 'jig rten la// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig kha ru// skye bo
395a4(1): bden pas mi 'dul te// dam tshig gnyan po mi gnas pas// dus der nyams pa bsgral ba'i phyir// drag po ngan sngags mtshon cha rnams// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas
395a5(1): kyang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gshed chen 'khor gyi gtso// dus ngan mtha' ma'i 'jig rten la// dam tshig nyams pa bsgral ba'i phyir// ngan sngags rdzogs pa ngas bshad do// 'di
395a6(1): nas lho yi phyogs rol na// dpag tshad brgyad khri'i 'og rol na// dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas de na// lcags mkhar thod pa'i pho brang na// gshin rje rnams kyi grong khyer yod// las kyi gshin rje'i sde
395b1(1): dpon po// ro langs nag po zhes bya ste// smug nag mdog la shin tu 'jigs// ral gri sdigs mdzub rgyu zhags 'phyar// mig gsum mche gtsigs rtse gdengs pa// ral pa kham nag thod pas gdams// glang
395b2(1): chen zhing gyon stag sham can// thod rlon 'phreng ba'i do shal can// rgyu ma sbrul dang rak+tas brgyan// dur khrod me dpung glong na bzhugs// ro rlon stan la brkyang bskum tshul// las kyi gshin rje drug khri
395b3(1): gtong // mngag pa bran dang pho nyar rtsol// dur khrod kang ka lce spyang tshogs// yang sbrul ro la gtod cing za// de yi kha nas ngan sngags kyi// mtshon cha drag po'i dpal byung ste// skye 'gro thams cad sgrol zhing
395b4(1): zos// de lta bu yi dregs pa des/ dpal chen ya man ta ka yi// spyan sngar srog gi snying po phul// bstan pa bsrung bar bro yis bor// de lta bu yi ngan sngags mtshon cha de// nga yis da ltar bshad kyis
395b5(1): nyon// babs ni ro langs rag sha snying la dbabs// ya ma rA dza snying la khug thum ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza snying myags tshal pa byi ma ya/ 'ub zum ril snying mgo chod/ kha la zod/ tshal pa snying rtsa ro la baM ril zad//
395b6(1): ya ma rA dza/ che ge mo hri sti ya ma ta kri snying khrag la baM ri la rbad/ ya ma ra dza snying rtsol rtsa ri me baM ri la rbad/ ya ma rA dza glo rtsa la baM ri la rbad/ mchin rtsa rul snying la hri ting rtsa ro me baM ri la rbad/ rgyu rtsa khum/ snying rtsa
396a1(1): pra ma ya/ srog la de par rtsa snying la rbad/ rtsa rag sha khug snying ro la bai ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza snying la tod pa rak+ta ma ba ril rbad/ a ku sha dza/ snying la khug/ mchin rtsa bka' ba rtsa ro ma g.yas/
396a2(1): la gsha' bkra me baM ri la rbad/ khrag rtsa snying la bshos/ ro rtsa myogs/ dgra bo mA ra ya/ baM ri la rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ snying la to ru me ya/ ya k+She ya ta yo ni snying la to ru me ya/ ra ya k+She ya/ a kra me/ a
396a3(1): kra me/ snying la rtsa ro me baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza rtsa la rod pa khug zum ri la/ snying la rag sha me baM ri la rbad/ ya ma rA dza snying la rtsa rtsa nan nan/ srog srog rmugs rmugs che ge mo khung zum ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa
396a4(1): to me ya snying la ro sha baM ri la rbad/ che ge mo/ rtsa ba glongs glongs/ snying la khug bka' sa pa tshal pa/ snying la ro tsa baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza ni dza/ gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul
396a5(1): me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ lo rgyus drag sngags kyi le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu'o// // de nas rdo rje dpal chen gyis// sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di bshad do// ngan sngags de nyid bsgrub 'dod
396a6(1): pas// dbang thob dam tshig bla ma mchod// dge ba bcu yi las rnams bya// bsnyen pa drod tshad zon tshad bya// dben la gnyan pa'i dur khrod du// ra'i rgod pa la maN+Dal brtsig khru gang khru do rag tas byug phung
396b1(1): po'i gru gsum khru gang ba// kha la zod 'phreng nang logs sbrul// gdug shing rtsang ni nyi shu gcig/ zur gsum gri lcags mchog shing gis// phur pa sor brgyad pa re dgod// phyi ru dur khrod sol bas byug/ nang du
396b2(1): dug sna khrag snas byug/ de nang rgyu rten ling ga ni// sor brgyad dbang po yan lag dod// ming rus lo khams snying khar snag/ tsha ba gsum dang myos pas byug/ yugs sa mo'i skra'i zag pas bcings// bkra mi
396b3(1): shis pa'i thod chen brnag/ thig le dkar nag tsha ba'i 'bru// rdo phye lcags phye zangs phye dang // rgyal po g.yung zhing 'chi rkyen dang // ni ra la sogs gdug khrag bzhi// bkra mi shis pa'i ka pA lar// drag po gnas
396b4(1): pa'i mtshan ma dgod// gud du bsrungs la zhing chen dgab// bdag nyid phyag rgyar gsal rdzogs nas// g.yon du shes rab sgrol byed ma// mdun du las kyi gshin rje ni// ro langs nag po 'khor bcas
396b5(1): bsgoms// las kyi gshin rje sha za bzhi// khrag 'thung srog gcod drug khri stong // mtshon cha sna tshogs srog la rngam// 'bru drug sngags kyis gsal bar bskyed// bdag thugs ye shes 'od zer gyi// gnas nas
396b6(1): bkug la sngags kyis bstim// kha nas ngan sngags 'brug char 'bebs// gsal bas sngags gsum gtor las bzlas// gtor ma khugs bcas dus gsum bskul// bdun bdun nyi shu gcig tu bzlas// me
397a1(1): 'bar 'od 'phro me stag mthor// rmi lam sna tshogs sgra snyan 'byung // klu bdud dmu btsan myos pas sbyang // de bzhin thun nang ya las bskyed// dgug bstim gtor la bskul dang btab// 'od
397a2(1): 'phros dug nad rgya mtshor 'khyil// stong na thun brab dum dril bzlas/ khol dang sdud dang rlangs pa dros// zhing skra mchog chen pir gyis brab// srog rten khrag sbal me mar ni// nad mtshon dug dpal tsha tshar
397a3(1): 'phro// zhu bcad de sbal bar gyur// brgya brgyad tshad ldan gtor bstab bskul// dngos sam phyugs bshas dud 'gro sha/ gsod pa'i mtshan ma byung ba dang // ling ga zhing chen zhabs mas gril// thod pa dang
397a4(1): bcas gnas su mnan// mtshon nag 'khyil ba'i bdud mo la// mnan nas chur grir gsod par 'gyur// ri rul mtshan snying bdag po la// gtad khang rti bas dag tu gsod// byang bltas nyi ma mi 'char
397a5(1): zhing // rlung 'tshub chu mig klu nag la// gtad ma blo bur mdze grir gsod// yul btsan khang dmar gnyen po la// gtad na mtshon gri gzer zab gsod// lha khang 'dre can nang sbas na// smyo 'bog dran pa nyams
397a6(1): te gsod// kho rangs pha mes dungs kyi dkyil// mnan na kha phung nyal gyis 'chi// dus brgyad kha gso rgyun du bya// gzhan yang las kyi mchod chen ni// drag po las kyi 'brub khung de// ling kha 'bru gsum mi
397b1(1): rtar// sha tshil mi byang mar nag dug/ mjug ma la dza la raM gsum gdags// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg byas te// thal ba ling kha gong bzhin mnan// thun zor dmigs pa'i rten la brdeg/ 'dis ni tshangs pa'i
397b2(1): tshe ldan yang // lo dus tshun chad 'chi 'gyur na// srog chags mi la smos ci dgos// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ ro langs nag po'i le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga gcig

397b4(1): gshin rje re re dgod// de yang ji ltar yin zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dpal chen ya man ta ka dang // yum chen e ka dza ti gnyis// gnyis med rol
397b5(1): pa'i byin brlabs las// drag po gshin rje gshed gsum 'khrungs// 'gan dang pa ti stobs mchog dang // rkang pa'i rgyal po gsum du byung / khams gsum dus gsum sgo gsum la/ dbang sgyur tshe srog bdag
397b6(1): por byung // sha za khrag 'thung srog gcod cing // srid pa kun kyang 'jigs par nus/ kha nas ngan sngags 'brug char 'bebs// bstan pa bsrung ba'i mtshon char mngags// skye 'gro thams cad sgrol byed pa// de
398a1(1): ni nga yis 'di bshad do// badz+ra ki li badz+ra bi ga ta/ mi swa nya tu tra ba s+t+ri/ badz+ra 'grim ra nu na/ g+hen g+hen rbad rbad/ shag zum ril ri la/ shag pa s+t+ri mA ra ya rbad rbad/ badz+ra ki li badz+ra bi ga te/ 5
398a2(1): man ta ka hUM/ ku ka ta pu hi/ ki kaM rbad thu ri li ri li dza hi b+h+yo/ ka ma li shag snying kha ra ga ya ti Ta dza/ bi sna mA ra ya rbad rbad/ ardza na ki la ya hUM phaT/ mu ti pa tu snying khag rag rbad/ ka mu li shag snying rbad/ mgo
398a3(1): shag ga ba sni mA ra ya rbad rbad/ de lta bu yi drag sngags kyis/ srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod de/ 'khrul 'khor rin po che rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long gi rgyud las/ drag sngags byung khungs kyi le'u ste dgu brgya
398a4(1): lnga bcu nga gnyis so// // de nas dpal chen rdo rje khros// drag sngags sbyor ba'i thabs 'di bshad// 'brub khung gru gsum shar zur du// gzugs med khams la dbang sgyur zhing // 'gro ba'i yid la mnga'
398a5(1): mdzad pa// 'das pa'i gshin rje gshed rgyal po// ga na pa ti dgod par bya// gri lcags thog lcags phur pa gzugs// de bzhin gru gsum lho zur du// gzugs kyi khams la dbang sgyur zhing // 'gro ba'i lus
398a6(1): la mnga' mdzad pa// de ltar gnas pa'i gshin rje gshed// stobs mchog rgyal po dgod par bya// seng ldeng smug po'i phur ba gzugs// de bzhin 'brub khung bya zur du// 'dod pa'i khams la dbang sgyur
398b1(1): zhing // 'gro ba'i dag la mnga' mdzad pa'i// ma 'ongs gshin rje gshed chen po// dga' ba'i rgyal po dgod par bya// mchog chen phur pa dag kyang gzugs// rten drug grog mkhar bag phye la// ling kha ming rus
398b2(1): snying khar dgod// gan rkyal 'og rkang shar nub bzhag chags myos thig le gnyis thod chen// gtor ma rag ta gzhung bzhin bsham// dang po bdag nyid 'ga' na lta// sku mdog nag po dbus mthing ka/ spyan
398b3(1): rtsa dmar bzlog mche ba gtsigs// phyag g.yas gnam lcags phur pa bsnams// phyag g.yon lcags kyi 'khor lo bskor// gsal bsgom drag sngags sum khri bzlas// tho rangs skya rengs shar tsam na// dpral
398b4(1): ba'i sgra mtshams lcags phur gdab// ngan sngags phur bus mgo lus gzams// rtsa srog gcad de thal bar bsams// gnyis pa bdag nyid stobs mchog gshed// sku mdog sngon po dbus dkar po// mche
398b5(1): gtsigs spyan rtsa ser po bzlog/ phyag g.yas seng ldeng phur pa bsnams// phyag g.yon zangs kyi 'khor lo bskor// der gsal zhal nas ngan sngags bsgrags// rkang pa g.yon pa'i bol gong du// skya rings seng
398b6(1): lding phur bsngags gdab// mtha' mar bdag nyid dga' ba'i rgyal// sku mdog dmar po dbus nag po'i// spyan rtsa dkar bsgrigs mche ba gtsigs// phyag g.yas mchog chen phur pa bsnams// phyag g.yon
399a1(1): gser gyi 'khor lo bskor// des bsgom zhal nas ngan sngags bzlas// rkang pa g.yas la skya rengs gdab// nyi ma'i tshe la phur pa dbyung // thun la bsngags shing khung bur blug/ nyi phyed rgya tshil ma

399a3(1): kyis// rab 'bring tha ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// zhag bdun zla bdun lo dus na// thal ba'i ling ga gnas su mnan// 'chi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de nas shin tu gsang ste spyad// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul

399a5(1): shed chen zungs thar byed// ya ma chos kyi rgyal po ni// ma he nag po la zhon nas// brnag pa'i mgo 'khor rgyal sa 'dzin// bsal gshin nag po ya pa ti// bdag bting chu glang nag po zhon// khrag skyug byed
399a6(1): cing srid bzhi 'dzin// myos byed 'bar bas glang mgo can// dud kha rdo rje ro langs te// bran byas srid pa'i khog 'bubs byed// gshin rje gsod byed smug nag de// ral pa tshar dgu pho nyar gtong // sbrul nag
399b1(1): zhon nas gang dmigs pa'i// gsod cing srid pa'i phyag byed do// gshin rje phya sangs chos kyi rgyal po yis// 'khor lam rgyud lnga skos dbang byed// ded dpon tshangs pa kun 'dres ni// nyi zla'i 'khor lo la zhon
399b2(1): te// srid pa kun gyi skos 'debs so// gcod cing sbyor ba'i las byed do// rtol pa ya ba ta'i 'khor na// dbugs 'phrog dbang po ther shag ni// rlung gi rnga mo la zhon nas// srid pa kun gyi dbugs len
399b3(1): no// dam sri nag po gnod sbyin no// lcags kyi sbyang zhon glang mgo'i 'khor// dbang po 'khar byed dmigs pa ni// smyo 'bog sha ba la zhon nas// srid pa kun gyi bla rnams rku// mig dmar ral pa tshar dgu'i
399b4(1): 'khor// srog gcod dbang po ma ru rtse// lkugs pa lug la zhon nas kyang // gang la bya ba'i srog gcod do// de ltar sprul pa yang sbrul bcos// lha mchog ya man ta ka yi// bka' sdod pho nya mngag par
399b5(1): 'khol// chos kyi rgyal po bka' sdod 'khor// ya ba ya ti gdan du bting // a ba glang mgo bran du 'khol// ral pa tshar dgu pho nyar 'gyed// phya sangs srid pa'i skos 'debs so// rtol pa srid pa'i dbugs
399b6(1): len no// rmig pa srid pa'i bla rnams rku// mig dmar srid pa'i srog gcod byed// de ltar dpal chen gshed 'khor na// las kyi gshin rje mi zad pa// dregs pa can ni bsam mi khyab// skye 'gro thams cad srog
400a1(1): gcod cing // bla rku dbugs len tshe 'phrog cing // skos 'debs sha za khrag 'thung byed// ngan sngags mtshon chas nad 'bebs cing // sgrol byed bstan pa gnyen po srung // gshin rje gshed kyi
400a2(1): 'khrul 'khor khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ las byed tshul gyi le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje che mchog gis// drag sngags sbyor ba'i rim pa bshad// gzhung dang mthun pa'i bde gnas
400a3(1): su// sngon du bya ba'i las rdzogs nas// gru gsum 'bar bar ling kha brnag/ mchog phur seng ldeng gri lcags phur// 'bru dang 'chi med myos pa sbyar// dang po byin brlabs rtags la dbab// dgos pa dang
400a4(1): bcas brdeg cing gsad// 'bru thun spyang thod myos pa phag/ 'chi byed mi shis thod chen no// phur pa dang bcas dgongs ldan pas// spyi bo snying kha lte bar dbab// rus dang ming snying khams la bcad// drod dang
400a5(1): ldan nas bsreg par bya// brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs rten thal ba// de bzhin ling kha gnyen sar gnan// thal ba rlung chu thun rten ma'o// 'dis ni nag po'i bdud kyis gsod// gzhan srog chags smos ci
400a6(1): dgos// slob dpon la skur smad byas na// bskal par 'bad kyang mi 'grub pa'o// de nas bla ma slob dpon bkur// de dag drag sngags 'di lta ste// a kro te ka ya man ta ka a ba ye/ kA la ru ma mu kha la/ hri
400b1(1): steng a pa ye/ ya ma sa ma ya dza/ srog la gzir dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ oM hriSh+TiHbi kri ta A na na dgra bo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ shri many+dza dza mAn ra ra ka ya mA ra dza/ e ka dza ti/ pe ta li/ dgra bo mA ra ya sod/ 'jam
400b2(1): dpal khri drug stong pa rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rgyus las/ sku gsung thugs kyi gzer sngags kyi le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga lnga pa'o// // gzhan yang gsad thabs drag sngags ni// 'brub khung ling kha thod
400b3(1): chen brnag/ sha chen la sogs gtor ma bca'// srubs drug mi shis ka pa lar// sbyor ba btab la thun kyang bca'// zal chen bkram la byad rjes brtags/ khugs nas bdeg pa'i las bya'o// gshin rje

401a1(1): kha kha thun rnams// gtor ma mchod pa de bzhin bca'// khyad par gdong dmar sho na dang // gsod byed mkha' lding phag lding phag don sbyar// ting 'dzin ldan pas byin brlabs bsgrub// dbab
401a2(1): cing gdab dang gtub byas te// bsreg mnan 'phang ba'i las bya'o// ma nyams lo dus 'gyang mi srid// nyams na rang yang phung bar 'gyur// des na dam tshig srog ltar srung // gdug pa'i drag po sngags rgod
401a3(1): brdeg/ ya man ta ka hri sti sarba kA la ru pa hri myags dgra bo mA ra ya sod/ ni sha ku ru ni rtsa rbad/ u nan khyer b+h+yo yaM raM hUM rbad/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ las mchog 'dus pa drag sngags kyi le'u
401a4(1): ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga bdun no// // gzhan yang drag sngags sbyor ba ni/ dong thun ling ga mchod yon bsham// dug khrag snying thun phur pa 'bru// dgongs pa ldan pas tshad mas dbab// dag cing bsad las
