401a6(1): mAn ta ka kA la ru pa hri ti/ a pa ye/ ka pa ye/ du ru le/ dgra bo srog la thun rmugs mA ra ya rbad rbad/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ a ra la gtad de gsad pa'i le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga brgyad
401b1(1): do// // gzhan yang rno dpal gdug pa'i mtshon/ 'brub khung nang du ling ga brnag/ dug 'bru khrag phung snying thun brdeg/ srog dbugs me mar gsad cing rbad// shes pa drangs snyigs phye la rta// dngas ma rab

401b3(1): tshig dbang dang slob dpon bskur// rno dpal drag sngags sbyor ba ni/ hri sti ya mAn ta ka tsit+ta sham shaM ka la ru pa/ a ni a ni u ne u ne/ du ne du ne/ ma sha ya dgra bo rtsa la rbad rbad/ mA ra ya rbad/ 'jam dpal
401b4(1): khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ rang mnan drag pos bsad pa'i le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga dgu pa'o// // 'jam dpal gzhon nus yang gsol pa// sangs rgyas kun bdag de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'chang chen

401b6(1): gyis gsungs pa// zhus don ngas bshad legs par nyon// gdul dka' 'dul zhing 'gro ba rnams// bla med byang chub thob bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad khro bor sprul// de yi mngon rtogs rim pa
402a1(1): la// rnam grangs mang yang rnam bzhir 'dus// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // mthar zug de kho na nyid do// he ru ka dpal khro rgyal gyi// mtshan bcas mtshan med bskyed rdzogs lam// gang
402a2(1): bsgrubs bla med byang chub thob// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// ri rgyal lhun po dur khrod gnas// byin chen mdangs ldan par// sngags pa dbang bgrod dam ldan pas// phyi bsgrub sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// dur khrod la
402a3(1): sogs gnas sa na// stegs bu rgya dpangs khru do gang // khrag sna bdud rtsi spos kyis byug/ ba sus thig gdab ni rangs kyis/ dbus mthing rtsibs bzhi phyogs dang bstun// rtsibs mtshan mdzes ldan phyi nang
402a4(1): bskos// thod rlon rdo rje'i ra bar bskor// gru chad khrag mtsho dur khrod tshogs// de la gnas pa'i khro rgyal ni// dbus su bud d+ha he ru ka/ smug nag zhal gsum phyag drug rngam// g.yas dkar g.yon mthing dbug
402a5(1): smuskrag zhal// dang po 'khor lo ri rab bsnams// bar pa be con kha T+wAM ga mtha' ma dril bu sbrul zhags 'phen// bdud dang mu stegs gdan la bzhugs// sangs rgyas khro mo dbang phyug la// dur dmar
402a6(1): snying thogs stob cing 'khril// shar rtsibs badz+ra he ru ka/ mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug khros// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje dgra sta phur pa g.yas// dbyug tho me dpung ri la spyi
402b1(1): g.yon// dri za lha yi gdan la bzhugs// rdo rje khro mo dbang phyug ma// de bzhin yum kun 'thun par 'khril// lho rtsibs rat+na he ru ka/ ser nag zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar
402b2(1): dbus ser zhal// rin chen gri gu cang te'u g.yas// gtun shing sdigs mdzub nyi ma g.yon// grul bum gshin rje'i gdan la bzhugs// khro mo rin chen dbang phyug ma'o// nub rtsibs pad ma he ru ka/ dmar
402b3(1): nag zhal gsum phyag drug brjid// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// pad ma lcags kyu rgyu zhags g.yas// tho ba zhing dbyug mdung thung g.yon// klu dbang chu bdag gdan la bzhugs// khro mo pad+ma
402b4(1): dbang phyug ma'o// byang rtsibs kar ma he ru ka/ ljang nag zhal gsum phyag drug gtum// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ldang zhal// ral gri rgya gram gsal shing g.yas// 'jig rten shag ti zod 'phreng
402b5(1): g.yon// gnod sbyin 'byung po'i gdan la bzhugs// khro mo las kyi dbang phyug ma// kun kyang zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum bgrad// stod smad glang chen zhing chen stag/ thod pa skam rlon dbu rgyan dang // do shal
402b6(1): rigs bzhi sbrul gyis brgyan// khrag zhal thal ba me 'bar dbus// dpa' sgeg bzhad pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// shar lho nub byang rtsibs mtshan bzhir// ye shes khro rgyal chen po bzhi// shar lho gshin rje mthar
403a1(1): byed sku// mthing nag be con 'khor lo bsnams// lho nub shes rab mthar byed sku// ser nag dbyug pa spu gri bsnams// nub byang pad ma mthar byed sku// dmar nag zhing dbyug rgyu zhags
403a2(1): bsnams// byang shar bgegs mthar byed pa'i sku// ljang nag rdo rje kha sdengs gram// zhing chen gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// spyan gsum zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs// dur khrod chas brgyad rdzogs par
403a3(1): ldan// gru chad dur khrod rak+ta'i mtshor// ke ri brgyad dang 'phra men brgyad// gong nas 'dus pa'i tshul du gnas// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// gtor ma dam rdzas mchod pa'i rdzas// phyi nang gsang
403a4(1): ba rdzogs par bsham// dur khrod rgyan dang bu don dgram// zhing chen zhing chung bla re 'phen// ga 'u rgyu zhags thod pa'i rnga// tshil chen mar me gsur chen spos// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma dang // rak+ta bdud rtsi
403a5(1): phyi mchod lnga// de dag rdzogs par bshams pa ni// phyi sgrub rdul tshon brten pa yin// gzhan yang dung chen mtshan ldan pas// ging lnga pa 'am dmu lugs gnyis// rag ta bdud rtsi g+hi wang dang // spos sna tshogs
403a6(1): sman sna tshogs// bla ba shing kun chu gtsang sbyar// rang rang tshon rtsi kha dog gis// tshangs pa'i spug tu badz+ra he ru ka/ dpral bar bud d+ha he ru ka/ rna g.yas rang na he ru ka/ lhag par pad ma he ru ka rna g.yon kar
403b1(1): ma he ru ka/ mtshams bzhir khro rgyal mthar byed bzhi// mtha' ma rang rang sngags kyis bskor// gcig la de bzhin yum rnams bri// dung chen ga'u kha sbyar du// snying chen sar pa ma nyams par// rdzas des hUM 'bru
403b2(1): bzhi dang // ha he b+h+yo phaT 'bru rnams dgod// bdud rtsi thig le btab pa yis// dkar dmar dar gyis brgyan pa la// rdzas de maN+Dal dbus su bzhag/ ga'u gzhal yas khang nang du// lha bskyed ye shes sgrub
403b3(1): drangs bstim// de ltar rdzas bshams bsgom bzlas pa// nang bsgrub thod pa la brten yi// gzhan yang gzugs brnyan ma yin te// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo la// ye shes lha rnams rdzogs par ldan// dbus
403b4(1): kyi thig le spros med la// khro rgyal bud d+ha he ru ka/ khro mo sangs rgyas dbang phyug ma// mdun gyi chos nyid rtsa dkar la// khro rgyal badz+ra he ru ka/ khro mo rdo rje dbang phyug ma// g.yas kyi ye shes rtsa ser po// khro
403b5(1): rgyal rat+na he ru ka/ khro mo rin chen dbang phyug ma// rgyan gyi yon tan rtsa dmar la// khro rgyal pad ma dbang phyug ma// g.yon gyi rang rgyud rtsa gnag la// khro rgyal ka ra ma he ru ka/ khro mo las kyi dbang phyug ma// yab
403b6(1): yum rdzogs nas gsal bar bsgom// chos nyid g.yas su gshin rje gshed// g.yon du gzhan gyis mi thub pa// ye shes g.yas su rta mchog dpal// g.yon gyi rtsa la bdud rtsi 'khyil// sul dang bar
404a1(1): mtshams mdud pa la// ke'u ri sing+ga dbang phyug sgo// de bzhin gsal zhing rdzogs par gnas// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang bstim// de ltar gsal ba'i dgongs pa ni// gsang ba snying gi
404a2(1): 'khor lo bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyud las/ phyi nang gsang ba'i le'u ste dgu brgya gcig go// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// mngon rtogs rim pa 'di bshad
404a3(1): do// gtor ma mchod yon dam rdzas rnams// 'dod yon lha mo byin gyis brlabs// ye shes dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la// mnyes shing tshim par mchod pa dbul// phyi nang gsang mtshams dam du bcad// hUM/ ma
404a4(1): rig nyon mongs las dbang gis// nag po gdug pa srid gsum bdud// bsgral zhing log rtog rnam sbyang phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad khro bor mdzad// hUM/ chos nyid rang bzhin rnam par dag/ ye shes dngos
404a5(1): med rang snang bar// chos rnams snying po byang chub sems// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po nyid// dbang chen lnga yi rim par gnas// snang ba rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// ye shes dkyil 'khor phyag rgya'i
404a6(1): tshogs// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang // hUM/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// chos sku'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // gdul bya rnam sbyangs mthar bsgral phyir// ye shes rol pa rang snang ba'i// khro
404b1(1): rgyal gzugs skur bzhengs su gsol// hUM/ ye shes khro rgyal 'bar ba'i sku// thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor tshogs// thugs rje thabs kyis spyan 'dren na// dbyings las bskyod med gshegs su
404b2(1): gsol// hUM/ skye med chos sku dag pa las// ye shes khro rgyal rngam pa'i sku// thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor la// thugs rje thabs kyis spyan 'dren na// dbyings las bskyod med gshegs su gsol// hUM/ skye
404b3(1): med chos sku dag pa las// ye shes khro rgyal rngam pa'i sku// thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor la// sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes rab snang dkyil 'khor la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor brtan par
404b4(1): bzhugs// hUM/ ye shes khro dpal dkyil 'khor la// gdugs mchog me tog ye shes sgron// dri chab gtsang bshos mchod pa 'bul// thugs rjes bzhes mdzod dngos grub gsol// hUM/ snang srid ye shes rang
404b5(1): shar ba'i// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bsam mi khyab// mdzad pa'i 'phrin las grub pa rtags// ye shes gar gyis mchod par bzhes// hUM/ rang byung rnam dag dug lnga sel// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i
404b6(1): sman// dug lnga bdud rtsi mchod pa 'di// ye shes khro rgyal dkyil 'khor la// mchod par 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// hUM/ chos kyi sku la rang shar ba'i// ye shes khro rgyal 'bar ba'i sku// bcom ldan dpal chen
405a1(1): he ru ka/ kro d+hi shwa ri dbyings kyi yum// gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i// khro ba'i rgyal po shes rab thabs// gtso 'khor yab yum sprul pa bcas// gnas yul phyag rgya dbang phyug tshogs// po
405a2(1): nya phyag brnyan bran g.yog bcas// khro bo'i 'dus tshogs dkyil 'khor la// bla med mchod pa 'bul ba ni// snang srid mchod pa'i longs spyod mchog ye shes 'dod yon sna tshogs snang // phyogs bcu rab
405a3(1): 'byams rnam dag zhing // rin chen gzhal yas dpag bsam shing // 'gro drug lha dang lha mo'i tshogs// snang srid kun bzang mchod pa'i sprin// gzugs mdzes sgra snyan bsam mi khyab// dri zhim zhal zas rol mo
405a4(1): tshogs// reg bya mdzes pa sna tshogs brgyan// ye shes khro rgyal dkyil 'khor la// mchod pa 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol// hUM// thabs dang shes rab dgyes sbyor
405a5(1): ba'i// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'dul las// bde ba chen po rab gsal nas// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor mnyes gyur cig/ bo d+hi tsit+ta ma ha su ka pA tsa ho/ bud d+ha he ru ka hUM/ khams gsum bskul ba'i zhing gyur
405a6(1): rnams// khro chen sprul pa'i byin brlabs rnams// khro chen sprul pa'i byin brlabs kyis// bsgral te rnam shes dag par sbyangs// sha khrag lus po mchod pa 'bul// ma hA pany+tsa/ hUM/ snang srid rtsi bcud zhal zas tshogs// sha khrag sna tshogs
405b1(1): 'bru bcud 'chang // ro mchog brgyad ldan bza' btung mchog/ 'dod yon lha mo mdzes ldan brgyan// stabs byed gar bsgyur glu dbyangs len// ye shes khro rgyal dkyil 'khor la// mchod pa 'bul lo bzhes su
405b2(1): gsol// hUM/ khyad par rmad du byung ba yi// 'bru thog longs spyod gtor ma dang // sha chen khrag chen sna tshogs dang // sa yi snying po ra sa ya// zhal zas mchog chen mchod pa 'di// ye shes khro rgyal dkyil 'khor
405b3(1): la// mchod pa 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol// hUM/ ma rig lus ngag yid gsum gyi// nyams shing 'khrul pas nongs bgyis rnams// ye shes khro rgyal dkyil 'khor
405b4(1): du// gnong zhing 'gyod pas mthol lo bshags// tshangs pa bzhes la dngos grub gsol// e h+ya hi b+ha ga wan/ ma hA shri he ru ka badz+ra kro d+ha tsa ya/ ma hA ka ru ni/ kra ti sha ho/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM ru lu ru
405b5(1): lu hUM/ dza hAM baM ho/ sa ma ya mu tra b+ha na tsa kra hUM phaT/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri/ badz+ra Ta ki ni hri sta ya/ sarba badz+ra kro d+ha ta/ a kaT+Ta ya/ a kaT+Ta ya/ b+ha na d+ha ya/ b+ha na d+ha ya/ to sha ya/ tau sha ya hUM b+h+yo/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ dza
405b6(1): hUM paM ho/ sa ma ya man d+ha la hUM dza/ ma hA su ka a ti pu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ sa ma ya staM/ tash+ma lhan/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ ni ra ma kA ya/ ma hA kro d+ha rA tsa ya/ dza hUM baM ho/ shri he ru ka ma hA ban tsa badz+ra sa ma ya/ mu tra ma
406a1(1): rang pra ban tsakra/ dz+nyA na badz+ra ma ha ba la ti/ kro d+ha ra tsa ya/ he b+ha ga wan/ ma hA kro ti shwa ri dz+nya na d+ha ki ni prad nya da du badz+ra da ra/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hAM/ bAg k+She ya/ bi tong sA yA/ bi tong sA yA/ bud+d+ha
406a2(1): k+Shetra staM ba/ a ka taM ba ka/ sarba ma hA badz+ra kro d+hi/ ka ya badz+ra kri ta ya/ wAk+ka badz+ra a kra ya/ tsit+ta badz+ra tsan da ya/ dza hUM baM ho/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ bi sha mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khang ud ga te/ s+pha ra na i maM ga ga na
406a3(1): khaM swA hA/ oM shri badz+ra ra ga d+ha pe du/ puSh+pe pung / A lo ke hri/ gan de gan/ ne pi d+ye A/ pu tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye swA hA/ mu tra pu tsa ho/ sarba ta tha ga ta ma hA pany+tsa a mri ta/ shrI rba na kha raM hri ka sa badz+ra si
406a4(1): ti oM/ wak+ka badz+ra si ti a/ tsit+ta badz+ra si ti hUM/ oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA pu tsa me ka ya ra na/ badz+ra swa b+ha wa Ad ma ko&haM/ sa ma ye swA hA/ dza hUM baM ho/ ma hA pu tsa ho/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ ma hA ma sa/ ma hA rak+ta/ ma
406a5(1): hA ba su ta/ ma hA tsit+ta/ ma hA me thA ma hA pan tsa a mri ta/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ a li mu li/ ha la ta ba ti/ bi ba to/ sa ma ya kha ha ho/ i daM ma hA ba ling ta/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+na/ khA hi khA hi/ b+hu na dza ho/ pra ti dza ho/ sa ma ya
406a6(1): hUM b+h+yo hUM/ sha ra laM ga tsa me/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyud las/ 'phrin las rim pa'i le'u ste dgu brgya gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos rnal 'byor bsam gtan rim
406b1(1): pa bshad/ rang bzhin rnam dag chos nyid las// dpal chen khro rgyal he ru ka/ ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur zhing // sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// khro chung khrab chags bzhin du brtan nas// thugs khar
406b2(1): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dang // rdo rje rtse dgu kha gdengs dang // rin chen zur brgyad 'od 'bar ba// pad+ma 'dab brgyad dbang gi cho ga/ rdo rje rgya gram ljang khu gnas// ye shes sems dpa' rigs kyi
406b3(1): mdog/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro bo'i sku// mthu mar rang sngags 'phreng ba dang // bsgom dbyangs yi ge 'bru brgyad gsal// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer gyis// chos kyi dbyings nyid rab 'byams su// sangs rgyas
406b4(1): rnams kyi thugs la thim// mchod phul rgyud bskul dngos grub bsdus// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro don bskul// sems can sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// tshur 'dus rnal 'byor thugs sogs thim// lus ngag
406b5(1): yid gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rdzogs// mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bsgom// mchod dang bstod pa sum yar bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lo ci nus bskor// de ltar gsang sngags
406b6(1): bzlas tshur ni// rang rang sngags dang bsgom dbyangs brgyad// tshom bu thig le stong brgya bcu// gtso 'khor dag kyang de bzhin no// dril ba'i snying po kun la bsdeb// 'di ltar ma yengs bsgom bzlas na// de
407a1(1): nas ring po mi thogs par// ngo mtshar drod rtags nges par 'byung // sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang // yi ge 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid// tshe 'dis myur du thob par 'gyur// oM d+harma ka ya shu dz+nyA ta
407a2(1): dz+ha/ na mo ta na/ bud d+ha ma hA shri he ru ka ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ka ya a ta ri sha dz+nya na mo ta/ badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsan d+ha hUM phaT/ oM saM bo ka ya sa man ta dz+nyA na mo ta na/ rat+ta ma hA shri he ru ka ma hA u kra
407a3(1): ya hUM phaT/ oM bo d+hi ka ya pra ta ba sha dz+nya na mo ta na/ pad+ma ma hA shri he ru ka mahA kri ta hUM phaT/ oM ni ra ma ka ya krin da dz+nyA na mo ta na/ karma ma hA shri he ru ka ma hA rak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM bud d+ha zad ra pradz+nyA da du ma hA kro d+hi shwa
407a4(1): ri ni hUM phaT/ badz+ra rat+na pad+ma karma da ra pradz+nyA da du ma hA kro d+ha shwa ri hUM phaT/ hUM ya man ta krid pa tsa pa tsa phaT/ hUM pad mAM ta kr-id hu lu hu lu phaT/ hUM bi g+h+nAn ta krid tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM d+harma d+ha du dzI na ka ya ma hA
407a5(1): bi ra shri he ru ka badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/ prad dz+nya ma hA kro d+hi sho ri/ badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA pa la ti/ hUM he he phaT b+h+yo/ ma hA yo gi ni/ ma hA d+ha ka na/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ khro rgyal yab yum la sogs te/ thams cad
407a6(1): 'dus pa'i snying po sngags/ ye shes dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur/ byin brlabs dpag med sangs rgyas sa/ ye shes bla mnon par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa don gyi snying po'i rgyud las/ bsam gtan
407b1(1): gsang sngags kyi le'u ste dgu brgya gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ mthar thug de kho na nyid bshad/ oM ye shes lhun grub nyid/ a zhes chos dbyings ye shes te// rnam par snang mdzad de ni
407b2(1): rigs// khro rgyal bud d+ha he ru ka zla tshes mnyam nyid ye shes te// rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin rigs// khro rgyal rat+na he ru ka rna ru kun rtog ye shes te// snang ba mtha' yas pad+ma'i rigs// khro rgyal pad+ma he ru
407b3(1): ka/ thig le me long ye shes te// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje'i rigs// khro rgyal badz+ra he ru ka bya ba grub pa'i ye shes te// don yod grub pa las kyi rigs// khro rgyal karma he ru ka/ rang 'byung ye shes rang shar
407b4(1): ba'o// sa rus sangs rgyas spyan nyid de// bud d+ha kro d+hi shwa ri'o// khrag chu mA ma ki nyid ni// rat+na kro d+hi shwa ri'o// me dang drod ni gos dkar mo// pad ma kro d+hi shwa ri'o// rlung 'byung dam tshig sgrol ma ste// karma kro d+hi shwa
407b5(1): ri'o// rnam rig nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma/ badz+ra kro d+hi shwa ri'o// 'byung ba chen po ye sangs rgyas// de ni phung po skye mched khams// gdod nas sangs rgyas ye shes lha// rang gnas dkyil 'khor rtogs par
407b6(1): bya// rtogs mchog ma spangs gnas su dag/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis// snying po'i thig le gsang sngags kyis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// 'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// dpal
408a1(1): chen khro rgyal dpal chen he ru ka/ mtshan don lhun grub chos rnams rdzogs// he zhes dngos med byang chub sems// chos nyid ma bcos rnam dag dbyings// sgrib med ye shes rab gsal
408a2(1): bas// thams cad der rdzogs dgyes pa che// ru zhes thugs rje kun la khyab// rang bzhin thugs kyi mnyam nyid las// dmigs pa med cing phyogs rigs bral// chags med chags mchog rgyal po'o// ka zhes
408a3(1): rol pa cir yang snang // sna tshogs rang snang ngos bzung med// thabs mkhas 'phrin las rnam mang bas// 'gro don sna tshogs so sor mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs// dngos po rnam dag ma bcos
408a4(1): pa// dngos med mu mtha' med pa nyid// rang bzhin stong chen mtha' yas 'das// 'dus ma byas pa'i chos dbyings de// chos dbyings kro d+hi shwa ri ste// gnyis med bde chen byang chub sems// dbyings nyid ye
408a5(1): shes dbyer med pas// dpal chen ye shes mtshan rdzogs pa'o// oM ni 'khor 'das chos thams cad/ gnyis med byang chub sems su gsal// snying po byang chub sems nyid de// rgya ma chad cing phyogs ma
408a6(1): lhung // rang byung ye shes rang gsal bas// skye med 'gag med thog mtha' med// rang byung kun khyab 'dus ma byas// 'khor 'das ma lus snying po gnas// de nyid dpal chen he ru ka/ lhun grub rang rig ye
408b1(1): shes gnyis// ma 'gags rang snang gnyis med pa'o// 'khor 'das chos kun dngos gzhir shar// rig pa brdal khyab ma bcos pa// phyogs med rang snang snying po ste// 'khor 'das kun gyis sa gzhir
408b2(1): gnas// ru lu 'khor ba'i rnam shes brgyad// gnas kyi ma mo ki ri brgyad// ma spangs gnas dag rang bzhin te// chos nyid byang chub sems nyid gsal// ru lu yul brgyad snang srid chos// ye nas gnas dag
408b3(1): 'phra men brgyad// skye med rnam dag chos nyid de// mtha' la 'das pa'i chos nyid do// hUM ni yul sems rang snang kun// byang chub sems nyid rang snang bas// he ru ka dpal ngo bo nyid// gnyis med byang chub
408b4(1): sems su gcig/ b+h+yo/ sna tshogs rig pa'i rang bzhin te// rig pa stong gsal ma 'gags shar// de nyid dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad// sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro snang ba'o// hUM/ sna tshogs cir snang de bzhin nyid// ma
408b5(1): bcos rang snang ji bzhin nyid// phyag rgya bzhi ldan ye shes te/ rang rig rtsal ma 'gags pa'o// de nyid rang byung ye shes te// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po'o// de nyid rang gi sems nyid de// rang sems ma bcos
408b6(1): mnyam par bzhag/ rig pa brdal khyab ngos bzung med// cir snang ye shes ngo bor shar// ma yengs ji bzhin dang gnas na// mdzad spyod ma chags blang dor med// ma bsgrubs chos sku lhun gyis grub// rdzogs
409a1(1): sku sbrul sku shugs las 'char// 'gro ba las dag thams cad la// mngon par snang de don mdzad do// de dag tshe 'dis 'grub par 'gyur// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud
409a2(1): las/ mthar thug de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste dgu brgya bzhi'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ drag po las kyi rim pa bshad// phung sa gsum gyi 'brub khung ni// gru gsum rgya dpangs khru mtho gang // kha khyer
409a3(1): dang po thod rlon 'phreng // bar pa mtsher rtsa srin mo 'gros// mtha' ma gdug pa'i sbrul rigs bzhi// phyi nang dug khrag sna tshogs drug/ dgra la rgyu rten drug ling ga/ bgegs la gang gnod rdzas kyi
409a4(1): gzugs// mtho gang dbang po dod par bya// gro ga ming byang khong par brnag/ tsha ba gsum dang dug sna tshogs// nad khrag sna tshogs byug par bya// khram thod bcug la dong du brnag/ dug rgod sbyang dug ra dug
409a5(1): pa// 'ol mo re lcag ba sbu ba// mon pa kha byung thod par bsham// mi yi nang khrag sna tshogs dang // gcan gzan sna tshogs ra khyi rta// khrag sna snying sna gri thod sbyar// yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe dang // ji tse shang
409a6(1): tse rdo lcags zangs// phye gsum rabs chad thod par sbyar// gri thod lcags phur seng ldeng mchog phur pa dug khrag ngar blud bsham// bdag nyid dpal chen he ru ka/ las byed pho nya sprul pa'i tshogs// shin tu
409b1(1): rngam khros mi bzod pas// srog gcod sha za khrag 'thung bsam// des ni brnag pa gang yin pa// rang dbang med bkug rten la bstim// ling ga dgra bgegs dngos su bsam// dug thun bud med 'jigs tshul
409b2(1): rngam// khrag thun sha za srin po'i tshogs// 'bru phye mon dang mon mo'i tshogs// shin tu 'jigs khros mtshon cha thogs// nad kyi bskal pa 'bebs byed cing // dgra bgegs srog gcod sha za bsam// phur pa khro
409b3(1): bopo'i 'jigs tshul rngam// smad dpal lcags sa thog ltar bsam// drag sngags brgya thun stong thun dbab// srog lus rdul phran brlags par bsam// de nas phur pas gdab par bya// srog lus go cha phyag rgyar
409b4(1): bskyed// 'di ltar drag sngags sbyor ba yis// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang // skad cig gcig la 'chi 'gyur na// dgra bgegs rnams la smos ci dgos// ma ma trag rag sha kha lding nag mo// rag mo shan pa
409b5(1): dgra bo la mA ra ya dza dza// rag sha rbad ling dgra bo snying khrag tshal pa rbad/ ru tra ma tra mA ra ya ha li ha li dgra bo la dun b+h+yo ma ra ya rbad/ badz+ra ki li ya tig sna ha na ha na nri ma ra ya rbad/ bsad pa dregs pa can la
409b6(1): gtad/ gzir ba bka' gnyen mgon pi la'o// thun 'phangs sprul pas nad mtshon dbab// nad byo sngags mthar skabs kyis brdeb// drod tshad ldan byas myur du 'grub// bskal pa nyi shu'i tha ma la// sangs
410a1(1): rgyas mu stegs bdag gzhan sdes// lha srin dregs sngags pho mo rnams// mthu rtsal stobs ldan dmod pa 'bor// sprul pa sha zan skar ltar 'khrug/ dmod pa'i mtshon cha char ltar 'bab// byin
410a2(1): brlabs mthu stobs me ltar 'bar// sngags pa rdo rje dme 'thab byed// de tsho rang gi byed sdebs sngags// phyir la bzlog cing de nyid bsad// 'khor lo drag po 'di bshad do// rang bzhin rnam dag chos nyid
410a3(1): las// brub yig dmar nag yongs gyur las// dbang drag 'khor lo rtsibs bcug pa// rno la rgya chen me 'bar ba// lte ba hUM yig yongs gyur las// dpal chen bud d+ha he ru ka/ yab yum sangs rgyas dbang phyug
410a4(1): ma// gsal rdzogs bsgom pa'i thugs kha nas// rtsibs bcu'i gdan la hUM bcu 'phros// de dag yongs su gyur pa las// shar rtsibs badz+ra he ru ka/ khro mo rdo rje dbang phyug bsgom// lho rtsibs rat+na he ru ka/ khro mo
410a5(1): rin chen dbang phyug bsgom// nub rtsibs pad+ma he ru ka khro mo dbang phyug pad+ma bsgom// byang rtsibs karma he ru ka/ khro mo las kyi dbang phyug bsgom// shar lho gshin rje mthar byed gnas// lho nub shes rab mthar
410a6(1): byed gnas// nub byang pad+ma mthar byed gnas// steng rtsibs gtsug gtor 'khor lo sgyur// ser nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// spyan gsum mche gtsigs rin chen brgyan// 'khor lo ral gri phyag na
410b1(1): bsnams// lha chen gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// 'og rtsibs rdo rje hUM mdzad de// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pas// rdo rje dgra sta phyag na bsnams// ma bdud gdan brkyang bskum bzhugs// ye
410b2(1): shes 'khor lo spyan drangs bstim// dbang bskur byin brlabs skye mched brlab// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul// bdud rtsi myang zhing bstod pa bya// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'bar ba de// drag tu 'khor zhing
410b3(1): gang dmigs pa'i// lha srung rig sngags bcad bzlog gsad// de bzhin dur khrod rab la bri// rtsibs bzhi lte bar hUM bcu gcig/ mu khyud nang mar rtsa ba'i sngags// phyi mar spu bri'i drag sngags dgos// rig
410b4(1): sngags drag po sgra bcad bzlas// bdud bzhi nyon mongs dug lnga gcad// rang byung 'khor lo 'bar ba 'dis// bsrung dang bzlog dang bsad pa dang // byang chub bsgrub pa'i las rnams 'grub// rgyu rten ling ga
410b5(1): ming byang bcas// snying khar mtshon cha'i 'khor lo gzhug spab khang kun srang rten la mnan// de dag gsang sngags 'di lta ste// na ma sa man ta kA ya ba ka tsen+ta badz+ra he ru ka ni/ oM A hUM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/
410b6(1): shrIshri he he ru ru ka ka ma hA tsan d+ha u kra ye hUM/ badz+ra kro d+ha pa la ti ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/ ma hA kro d+ha pradz+nyA/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri ma hA yo gi ni tsiN+Da DA ki ni/ hUM ha he phaT b+h+yo/ tsakra tiSh+Tha wa ra sti/ tsakra tiSh+Tha war sti/ dza la dza la/
411a1(1): pra ti ki ra/ pra te ki ra/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ma tha ma tha/ nA sha la/ nA sha la/ ha na ha na/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ 'khor lo bskor zhing sngags bzlas pas/

411b1(1): dgos// gshin rje nag por lto bar bri// rgyu rten ling ga spyi rus cas// 'khor lo tshil chen gu gul byug/ mi rta la sogs snying sna tshogs// dam rdzas sha khrag gtor ma bsham// gsur chen btang zhing drag sngags

411b6(1): byug/ 'khor lo rtsibs bcu'i sngags rnams ming // ling ga ming byang bya rgod 'brong // lug dkar ra sha'i sha khrag snying // 'bru gtsang nas 'bras gro nyungs kar// dkar gsum mngar gsum gtor ma
412a1(1): gtang // dkar po 'jigs tshul 'khor lo can// sngags bzlas gsur gtang lha chen bskul// ling ga dgra srog srog gcod gsod// sha za khrag 'thung rlag par bsam// gangs ri brag dkar

412a3(1): dra rag sha a la pa ti ya/ de ba rA dzA ma hA na Shi/ badz+ra ti badz+ra laM/ tsa tur mu kha rag sha pra ma na/ ma hA de ba ka la tsan d+ha ya ha ri ha ri/ dgra bo mA ra ya thums rbad nan tsit+ta tshal pa rbad/ bdud la gtad pa'i sbyor

412b1(1): sod// ka la ru tra mA ra ya/ kA la ru tra pra ma ya/ ka la ru tra rag sha dang / dgra bo'i snying mgo chod/ du ru du ru/ ha ra ti ha ra ti/ dgra bo'i snying la dza/ ka la ti pa tsa'i/ dgra bo'i snying la baM ril rbad/ ha na ma ho
412b2(1): 'bi li ma khu ru buM ru/ ru ru tra tra du ru du ru/ ru tra ru tra ka la sha pa tri baM ri la rbad/ ka la he ra haM baM ri la/ dgra bo mA ra ya rbad dze/ rgyal po la gtad sbyar ba ni/ sgyu 'bog shi ba'i shun pa la/ rdzas kyi 'khor lo

412b5(1): 'khor lo dang // ling ga brnag ste gtad byas na// smyo 'bog nad kyis myur du gsod// ma hA rA dza thun b+h+yo/ ma hA rak+ka rak+ta tsa ru mun tra ma hA shi ri ti rtso ka tsa/ la bing bing dgra bo mA ra ya ha ba ha ba/ mA ra na pra ma

413a1(1): ra dmar rta// bya dmar lug dmar gro bo ni// rang shi sha khrag snying la sogs// dam rdzas gtor ma don por dmigs// dmar po rngam pa mdung dmar thogs// sngags bzlas gsur gtang btsan

414a1(1): snying // gtor ma dam rdzas drag po drug/ nag po khro bo be con thogs// dgra bo srog gcod sha khrag za// sngags bzlas mgon po drag tu bskul// lha khang gnyen po byin chen gyi// mgon po nyid kyi

414a6(1): mo a lon tsin dan ma la b+h+yo/ shur mu he ma ya b+h+yo ru lu/ na ga ta na he ma b+h+yo ru lu/ yag+na kro d+ha b+h+yo/ ru lu snying kha rag srog thun b+h+yo ru lu/ ma b+h+yo sri thun b+h+yo/ rdo rje lcam cig pad+ma gsal/ nag po dbu dgu thod zor

415b2(1): bzlas// 'dis ni nag po'i bdud kyang sod// ling kha dmangs rigs klu la gtad/ kha gso nya stong brgyad la bya// rno dpal drag sngags dmod mo ni// hri sti hur yaM klad pa la ha ra ha ra/ dmu phud yaM shig sing nga
415b3(1): ye/ bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ tsa sha mu la/ dgra bo srog la shag shag rbad/ mA ra ya b+h+yo/ gzhan yang las kyi gshin rje ni// lto dkrug sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// ling ga thun sogs de bzhin bca'// mi gsad pa dang gong

415b5(1): con 'khor lo g.yon// gzugs bya de bzhin bsgom par bya// gong bzhin gtor ma mchod yon btabs// rtags byung ling ga gnyen chen gtad// khyo ga grir 'chi bud med smyo// bu tsha rnams ni phyags mas
415b6(1): 'debs// de dag gdug pa'i dmod mo ni// ya ma tsa sha me to ru na k+She ta ni ra yo ni to sa ra/ dgra bo u nan phrog phrol rtsa rbad mA ra ya rbad nan/ gzhan yang ma mo spyi yi lto// dkrug pa'i drag sngags sbyor ba
416a1(1): ni// 'brub khung la sogs de bzhin bca'// mtsho chen dur khrod ri nag la// dme gsum khrag lag na thogs// nad rgyal 'phongs la bkal bar bya// dme gsum khrag gis gzugs brnyan
416a2(1): bya// nag mo rab can 'jigs tshul can// re lde'i gos la zhing phran brgyan// thod 'phreng dre'u phyin phyogs zhon khram bam thod bag chags 'bru gtor bsham// mchod bstabs bzlas shing thun brdeg
416a3(1): gsad// ling ga mtsho bdud klu bdud gtad// stobs chen nyid kyang 'jigs par 'gyur// rims nad rlung ltar 'tshubs te gsod// de dag drag sngags rno dpal zhing // rag mo rgyu thum gzer thum rgyu lu ma/ kha
416a4(1): sha bam rim dgra bo sreg khyer b+h+yo mA ra ya rbad/ gzhan yang gnod sbyin ltod dkrug gi/ rno dpal drag sngags sbyor ba ni// dong rtsang ling kha thun la sogs// de bzhin bshams la sbyor ba bya// gong gsum bzhi mdo
416a5(1): btsas mchod// dur khrod re hrul sa rnams la// rgya rog dkar dmar ra khrag spu// dmar po 'jigs tshul seng ge zhon// ral gri snying sbram lag na thogs// gcer bu snying gi 'phreng bas brgyan// gzugs
416a6(1): brnyan bskyed la drag sngags bzlas// thun brdeg gris gtub phur pas gdab// thon nas dur kha gri btsan gtad/ kha gso la sogs sbyor ba bya// gtor ma bshos bu mkhar thabs bzhag/ dmar po zur gsum
416b1(1): dkar po ni// gru bzhi ldan pa de ltar gsum// ra lug sna tshogs sha khrag brgyan// sum yar bstab bya dmigs pa'o// rno dpal dmod pa'i drag sngags ni// da mun ha s+yA du sti rag sha ya tsa thum bruM ra tri ru shag kri
416b2(1): ka ra shu la ma ma baM hi mang du ru/ dgra bo tsit+ta ro myags rbad mA ra ya rbad b+h+yo/ dregs pa can gyis sbyor ba ni/ me lce btsan dug khol ma 'dra// dam nyams rang srog nyams par 'gyur// dam nyams dus las 'gyang
416b3(1): mi srid// 'jam dpal khros pa'i rgyal po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ dregs pa bzhi sreg gi le'u ste dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje dpal chen pos/ mtha' rgya bsdus pa 'di bshad
416b4(1): do// drag po bsad pa'i mtha' rgya ru// mnan gtad las kyi sbyor bas btul// de yang ji ltar bya zhe na// khrims ldan btsun pa dgrar langs na// bud med yugs mo'i thod par bcug/ dme khrag bskus la
416b5(1): zhabs mas gril// lha khang rgyal ze la mnan na// smyo 'bog 'chi bar the tshom med// sngags pa nag po dgrar langs na// mdze can dmar chod thod par bcug/ dug dang rme ba'i rdzas kyis byug/ dmangs ris nag
416b6(1): 'i klu la gtad// bsrung khog mdze shus 'chi bar nges// mi yi rgyal po dgrar langs na// ma smin mi yi thod par gzhug/ dug sna byugs la zhing lpags gril// mtsho bdud kla bdud la gtad na// lkugs dang smyo
417a1(1): 'bog rims kyis 'chi// bon po dgrar langs rme ba'i rdzas// sna tshogs tshil chen byug byas te// rabs chad nag po'i thod par gzhug/ brag bdud dur bdud la gtad na// 'thib nad drag pos
417a2(1): 'chi bar nges// skye bo phal pa dgrar langs na// dri bo dmar chod thod par gzhug/ gri thag dug sna tshil chen byug/ gong gsum yul btsan la gtad na// gri rgod dag gis 'tsho bar nges// bud med dri mo'i thod
417a3(1): par gzhug/ dug sna khrag sna mngal khrag byug/ lha btsan bdud btsan la gtad na// lcebs sam khyo bos gsod par nges// gshin rje gshed kyi rtogs pa'i rgyal po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po las/ mtha' rgya
417a4(1): bsdus pa'i le'u ste stong tham pa'o// //
